1b1(rgyug): rgya gar skad du
2a1(rgyud): ni ni gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus
2b1(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsham mo// dpal rdo rje sems
2b2(rgyud): dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// shi'adi skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
2b3(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs dang / da ma
2b4(rgyud): tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gsheg
3a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbu rgyun gyis khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal
3a2(rgyud): dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnal 'byor
3a3(rgyud): chen po'i dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud cing
3a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi dgos pa nyid mdzad pa nyid kyis/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams
3a5(rgyud): cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba'i phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje che ba/ rnam par snang mdzad/ 
3b1(rgyud): dus gsum du bzhugs shing / sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs
3b2(rgyud): thams cad bzhugs shing bsngags pa bstod pa/ nor bu dang rin po che chen po smras pa/ kha dog sna tshogs shing / dril du
3b3(rgyud): btagasu pa/ dang dang / 'phan dang / mye tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang / zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams
3b4(rgyud): kyis mdzes par byas pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba drug dgu bcu rtsa dgu la 'di lta ste/ 
3b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang / kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / 
3b6(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / 'dud
4a1(rgyud): kyi stobs rab tu mas pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dag dang / gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de
4a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang tha zos gcig tu bzhugs te/ de yang 'di ltar 'dzam du gling na/ de bzhin gshegs po tshad med gongs med pa de dag gi skas kyang til gyi
4a3(rgyud): gang bu bzhin du kun du gang bar snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa rnams snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na yang
4a4(rgyud): chos kyi tshal 'di nyid 'chad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad bzhin du rtag par bzhags shing / skra dang gsung dang
4a5(rgyud): thugs rdo rje lta bur gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas rdo rje dbyings thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa'/ nam mkha'i
4a6(rgyud): dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo'i rdo rje'i byin gyi brlabs las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid kyis rdo rje chen po'i ye she
4a7(rgyud): nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du spros pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
4b1(rgyud): cad kyi ngo bo nyid dag pa nyid kyis rang bzhin dag par thugs su chud pa/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad du khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad du yang dag par ston pa mkhyen pas/ sems can gyi
4b2(rgyud): khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i rnam pa ngal ba ni spyod pa'i mchog tu gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' don yod par mdzad pa nyid kyis/ thams cad dang mnyam
4b3(rgyud): pa med cing bras pa'i phrin las sna tshogs ladzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bang chub chen por sems dpa' brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang
4b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi legs so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba rin po che'i
4b5(rgyud): dbang chen por bskur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rgyal po nor bu rin po che'i dpal dang / 
4b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag pa'i chos chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab chen po'i ye shes dang / 
4b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa 'chud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za bar thams cad kyi dgongs
4b8(rgyud): pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po'i go tshe shin du brtan po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsrung zhing bskyang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / de bzhin gsheg
5a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i ye shes rnams so// kun bzang rab tu gdon miza// hud dang rab dgyes gtso bo dang // mkhas skyes
5a2(rgyud): shin du gzi chen dang // rin chen dpal dang 'dzum pa che// kun du gzigs pa'i dbang chen dang // 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor thams cad dang // mi gsung ba dang thams cad las/ brtson
5a3(rgyud): 'grus ma rungs dam du gzung // rdo rje lcags kyi mda' gzhu dang // rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan 'dzum// pad+ma ma ral gri 'khor lo gsung // las dang go cha 'jigs byed brtsangs// thog ma tha ma
5a4(rgyud): med cing bzhi// ma rungs khro bor bzod pa che// gnod sbyin srin po dam pa brtan// gzi chen dpa' bo khyab bdag che// u ma'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon// gtogs 'dod rgyal 'dod thub pa che// 
5a5(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong dang mkha' dngas// 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa// 'byung chen sems can don rab mdzad// thams cad gu long tshangs pa dang // 'khor dang mya ngan 'da' dang rtog/ yang
5a6(rgyud): dag 'tsho dang mchod pa che// sangs rgyas drag pa theg pa che// srid gsum rtag pa'ang de yin no// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bde spyod dang // bde spyod mgon po rab 'dul mdzad// rdo rje gtso dang sa rab mchog
5a7(rgyud): ye shes pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar// spyod dang de bzhin gshegs pa kun// sangs rgyas don dang sangs rgyas thugs// byang chub kun dang bla na med// rnam par snang
5a8(rgyud): mdzad rgyal dang mgon// rang 'byung gzungs dang dran pa dang // sems dpa' cha dang phyag rgya che// ting 'dzin sangs rgyas phrin las mdzad// yang dag sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid// sems can rtag don/ 
5b1(rgyud): rtogs mdzad pa// sdong po chen po nag po che// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// thabs chen dang ni mchog chen mchog/ kun gyi mchog dang gnas dbang po// bcom ldan 'das byacu chen po'i thugs// byang
5b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas so// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di/ dper na til
5b3(rgyud): gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'das te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying por
5b4(rgyud): bzhugs pa gang na ba der gshegs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang gi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs
5b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon par ma rtogs par dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing / ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya snyam/ de nas
5b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul pas mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
5b7(rgyud): la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsel to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid ni ji lta bu lags// ji ltar sgrub par bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol// de skad ces gsol
5b8(rgyud): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la so sor rtog cing mnyam par zhog la/ rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di
6a1(rgyud): ni dgar bzlos shing sgrub par gyis shig/ oM tsi ta prad ti d+ye b+hU ka rom// de nas byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di
6a2(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom lda tu bang si de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gi snying kha na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba bdag gis rtogs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
6a3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems 'di ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na/ 'di ni ji lta bur sbyangs pa de lta bur 'gyur te/ dper na ras dkar po mtshon gyi sra bsgyur ba bzhin no// de nas
6a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems shes pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir// oM bo d+hi tsi ta tA ud pa ta ya mi// zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis
6a5(rgyud): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de byang chub kyi sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bkas byang chub kyi sems
6a6(rgyud): bskyed nas 'di skad ces gsol to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba gang lags pa de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal
6a7(rgyud): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun du bzang po khyod kyis mngon sum du gyur gyis/ de legs par bsgrubs shrIg/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sam
6a8(rgyud): bskyed pa kun du bzang po de brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ sngags 'dis rang gi snying kha'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje dbyibs su soms shig/ oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ byang chub sems dpas gsol pa/ 
6b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rjer bdag gis mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
6b2(rgyud): kun du bzang po'i sems rdo rje 'di sngags 'dis brtan par gyis shig/ oM badz+ra ad ma ko haM// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
6b3(rgyud): drang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
6b4(rgyud): kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa de la rdo rje'i dbyings rdo rje'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dbyings kyis de bzhin gshegs pa da
6b5(rgyud): dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// som ldan padas de bzhin ga skye ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku bdag lags par mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems
6b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po de lta bas na sems dpa'i rdo rje de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar bzlos la bsgoms shig/ oM ya tha
6b7(rgyud): sir+b+ba ta thA gu ta sta tha a haM// de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dbyings kyis bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 
6b8(rgyud): bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te/ bos nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag byin gyis brlobs la mngon par rdzogs par bya
7a1(rgyud): chub pa 'di brtan par mdzod cig/ de nas de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs so// 
7a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'du skyes nyi gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis skad cig ma de dag nyid kyi tshe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
7a3(rgyud): so/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pa
7a4(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis dag go// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mnyam pa nyid rang bzhin gyi sa 'od gsal ba'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom
7a5(rgyud): pa yang dag par rlo/ ci sangs rgyas su gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje de las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
7a6(rgyud): kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed// namamapa'i snying po'i nor bu rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur/ kun du bzang po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
7a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad la rab tu gzhag nas/ ri rab kyi rtse mo gang na ba dang / khang pa brtsegasra pa rin po chu rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu rin po che las byas pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon
7a8(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i gdan lo zhal kun du bstan te bzhugs par
7b1(rgyud): gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon
7b2(rgyud): mi za bar grub pa rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du so so nas bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab
7b3(rgyud): tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir bzhugs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par
7b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas nas ring po mi lon pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kun du bzang po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i dbang
7b5(rgyud): gis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes dam pa'i pha rol du phyin pa brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phrin las
7b6(rgyud): thams cad nyid kyis gdon mi za zhing thogs pa med pa ston pa/ dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs nos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du rang nyid bdag nyid
7b7(rgyud): kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po zhes bya bro'i dam tshig las byung ba/ sems dpa'i byin gyi brlabs rdo rje zhes pa'i ting
7b8(rgyud): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // 
8a1(rgyud): badz+ra sa twa/  na snga de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po de nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur nas byung ste/ 
8a2(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi byang chub kI sems chen po yang dag par sbyangs nas/ de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyogs phyogs su'i'akhod do// de na sa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag la si kyi
8a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs su zhugs so// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin du brtan
8a4(rgyud): pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi brlabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ nam mkha'i khams kyi tshad dang mnyam par 'jug pa'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba can rtse mo lnga pa/ 
8a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin rdo rje'i dbyings su gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas byung ste phyag gnyis su gnas so// ngo
8a6(rgyud): nas rdo rje las rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bas khyab par byed pa rnams byung ngo // rdo rje'i 'od zer gyi rtse mo de rnams las 'jig rten
8a7(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mi snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ chos kyi dbyings kun du khyab pa thams cad dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' gtugs pa thams cad dang / 
8a8(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par shes pa mngon par byang chub pas/ de bzhin gshegs
8b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang / kun du bzang po'i spyod pa sna tshogs grub pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par mdzad pa dang / byang chub chen po'i
8b2(rgyud): snying po chen por gshegs pa dang / bdud thams cad gdul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi byang chub chen po mngon par byang chub pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
8b3(rgyud): ba nas/ ji srid sems can gyi khams mi lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su skyob cing / thams cad la phan pa dang badri bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang / mngon
8b4(rgyud): par shes pa dam pa'i dngos grub grub pa la stsogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams kyi bar du bstan nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni kun du bzang po nyid yin
8b5(rgyud): yin pa dang / shin du bstan pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i kun du bzang po'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la
8b6(rgyud): gnas nas/ chud du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni rang 'byung ba'i// kun du bzang po sems dpa' brtan// de ni brtan phyir lusa? min yang // sems dpa'i lus su gyur pa yin/ 
8b7(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nAs bka' nod cing
8b8(rgyud): bzhugs par gyur to// de na rgya bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
9a1(rgyud): nanakyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rang dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / sems can gyi don
9a2(rgyud): bya ba dang / thabs chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / ye shes chen po'i dam tshig/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / thams cad kyi
9a3(rgyud): dbang po bya ba dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad rjes su myong bar bya ba nas// ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa bla na med pa'i theg
9a4(rgyud): pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa grub pa'i mchog thob pa'i bar du/ 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo bsgyur
9a5(rgyud): pa nyid du sangs rgyas kyi sku rin po che'i drub rgyun dang durang dpyangs gyi dbang gis dbang posbyor na ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rngon de de'i sag par byin mo// de nas de badzin
9a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis lhagan rdo rje log na rdo rje zhes rdo rje mong gi skyong dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje phyag na rdo rje phyag g.yon pa rdo rje bsti
9a7(rgyud): pas bzhugs/ phyag gsus pa ni rdo rjeg sbyor ba nyid kyis thugs par bstod pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing tshod du brjod pa 'di rjid du brjod do// sangs rgya sgo kun gyis thong pa 'i// rdo rje bla na med pa
9a8(rgyud): bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin// rdo rjel ni rdo rje gnas// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdon mi tho ba'i rgyal po chen po dmatshig las byung bya/ 
9b1(rgyud): snyems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan drang ba'i dmatshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cung
9b2(rgyud): snying po 'di rang gi thugs nas phyung ngo // badz+ra rA dzA// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas phyung ma thag 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ 
9b3(rgyud): lcags kyu chen por gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje lcags kyu chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
9b4(rgyud): phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i dbyibs chen po de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ngo te/ de bzhin gshegs
9b5(rgyud): pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin du gdon mi za byer rgyal po de nyid yin pa dang / shin du
9b6(rgyud): brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa
9b7(rgyud): 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rdo rje las byung ba'i// lcags kyu nges pa'i rgyal po bdag/ gang phyir kun du sangs rgyas khyab// grub phyir kun nas skyon 'dren no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
9b8(rgyud): shin du gdon mi za bar rgyal po'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ yang byak+Sha' nod cing
10a1(rgyud): bzhugs par gyur to//  nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
10a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad dgug pa dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad myong bar byas nas/ de
10a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba'i byin gyis brlabs dam pa'i dngos grub kyi bar gyi phyir/ rdo rje lcags kyu de byang chub sems deston min mo'i rgyal po de'i lag par de bzhin du byin
10a4(rgyud): no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje 'gugs pa rdo rje 'gags pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo 'gags
10a5(rgyud): pa rdo rje lcags kyu des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yi// ye shes bla na med pa 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi don grub phyir
10a6(rgyud): kun nas spyan 'dren dam pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting ngo / 
10a7(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra/ 
10a8(rgyud): rag gide nas de bzhin gau shegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me tog gi mdor gyur nas bying ste/ bco
10b1(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje'i mda' chen po'i rtabyibs su gyur te/ phyag gnyis su gnas so// / de nas rdo rje'i mda'i dbyibs de las 'dzi rten
10b2(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ nga bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad
10b3(rgyud): kyis rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni ts+tshidung byed+d+hak+Sha nyid dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
10b4(rgyud): dpa' chen po bdud ces bya bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la ga na sI nas chad du brjod pa 'di tshad du brjod do// e mra'o bdag ni rang bzhin dag/ rang 'byung dag pa dgyes byed na/ 
10b5(rgyud): 'dod chags bral rnams dag bya'i phyir// 'dod chags kyis ni 'dul bar byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdad de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
10b6(rgyud): cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
10b7(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyomasapa bzhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud rdo rje'i dam tshig dang // sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams mgo bar bya ba dang / bde ba dang yid zang ba
10b8(rgyud): thams cad myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi mchog thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje'i mda' de byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i de'i
11a1(rgyud): lag tu de bzhin tu byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i gzhu rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sem
11a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po rdo rje gzhu zhes bya bas// rdo rje'i mda' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi// ye shes 'di ni
11a3(rgyud): dri ma med/ 'dod chags kyis ni chags bral bcom// bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las
11a4(rgyud): byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyi brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa
11a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung // / badz+ra sa d+hu// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de legs
11a6(rgyud): so zhes bya bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnamapa snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te// gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje dgos pa'i dbyibs su gyur te/ phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje
11a7(rgyud): dgyes pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcags so zhes bya/ 
11a8(rgyud): bya ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin du dga' bar byed pa dang / rab tu brtan par byed pa'i phyir gcig tu/ 
11b1(rgyud): 'dros par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i lus su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di
11b2(rgyud): ched du brjod do// e ma'o thams cad mkhyen kun gyi// legs byin nang na bdag mchog paste// rnam rtog bral ba de dag gis// nges par dgyes pa bskyed pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
11b3(rgyud): rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i sku du bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha nas byung ste/ da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur
11b4(rgyud): to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dgyes pa bla
11b5(rgyud): namong ba'i ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can thams cad mgu bar bya ba dang / bde ba dang yid pa thams cad myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin
11b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i ro bla na med pa dam pa grub pa thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje dgyes pa de bya chub sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// 
11b7(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dwags pa rdo rje dgyes pa zhes bya ba rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dwags pas/ rdo rje dgas
11b8(rgyud): ba'i dbyibs des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cung la legs so zhes bya bas legs par dgyes par byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi lcags byin pa/ 'di ni rab tu
12a1(rgyud): 'jug byas pas// rdo rje thams cad dgyes par byed// lha rdzas dgyes pa sbrel ba'o// byang chub kyi sems chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig
12a2(rgyud): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes dang / dgyes pa chen po dang / 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa'o// de nas ya
12a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig las byung ba rin po che'i byin gyi brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs
12a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra rad na// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
12a5(rgyud): thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin du rab tu rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid
12a6(rgyud): de nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nas byung ngo // nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas pas thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings lta
12a7(rgyud): bur gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis nam mkha'i dbyings de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs nas/ rdo rje sems
12a8(rgyud): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin du brtan par bsgoms par 'gyur ba'i phyir// yang nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi snying po'i rang bzhin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mi nyam par 'jug pa tshad
12b1(rgyud): tsam rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gyur par gnas so// de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dbyibs de ltas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo/ 
12b2(rgyud): dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba la stsogs pa dang / de bzhin gshig la thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnaMs
12b3(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams cad du byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi snying po las shin du byung ba dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub
12b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di chad du brjod do// oM ma'o tshogs med rgyal ba yang
12b5(rgyud): khams gsum dbang por dgongs pas na// rdo rje rin chen bla med pa'i// dbang bskur mchog ni bdag yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i lus de bcom ldan 'das/ 
12b6(rgyud): kyis thugs kha nas phyung ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga gnas pas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin
12b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can
12b8(rgyud): gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i don thams cad yongs su grub par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid de myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnon phun sum tshogs
13a1(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub dam pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i rdo rje rin po che chen po 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i du/ rdo rje rin po che myu gu'i dbang gis
13a2(rgyud): dbang bskur nas/ lag pa gnyis su rdo rje nor bu de byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyis rdo rje'i snying po rdo rje hrIhrIhozhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis da'i bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
13a3(rgyud): po rdo rje snying pos rdo rje'i nor bu de rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi sems can khams// dbang bskur da ni bdag yin te// bdag
13a4(rgyud): gi lag tu byin pas na// rin chen la ni rin chen bzhag/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyi
13a5(rgyud): brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas
13a6(rgyud): phyung po/ badz+ra ta dza// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid de nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam
13a7(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par 'gyur nus/ rdo rje nyi ma'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de las
13a8(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku phyung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer dgye ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
13b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin du gzi brjid che ba nyid dang / shin du brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems
13b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sems can khams kun du// snang byed
13b3(rgyud): gzi brjid dpe med bdag/ gang phyir sangs rgyas dag pa yi// 'dren pa rnams kyang sbyong bar byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha
13b4(rgyud): nas byung te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs
13b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi byin brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams
13b6(rgyud): ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi gzo brjid mtshungs pa med pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od 'thab cing
13b7(rgyud): grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir/ rdo rje nyi ma de byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po de'i lag pa gnyis su de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i 'od rdo rje'i 'od
13b8(rgyud): rgyas bya ba'i mngo rje rje mo ga dbang gis dbang ba sku rnam/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rten rdo rdo rje 'od rdo rje'i nyi mi des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang bar byed cing/ rgyud du brjod pa 'drin
14a1(rgyud): / du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi snang ba 'dra/ mi mi shesra mun nag 'joms byed pa// shin du phra rdul ji snyed pa// nyi ma'i 'od pas shin tu lhag/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das byung
14a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba rin po che'i byin brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs
14a3(rgyud): su rdzog bya byed gyi dam tshig zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra ke tu// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas phyung ma thag pa
14a4(rgyud): 'di nibacom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rgyal mtshan kha dog dang / gzugs dang / rgyan dang dbyibs sna tshogs par gyur ta byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs zhugs
14a5(rgyud): t+ye/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs su gyur te/ phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam
14a6(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phral rnams byas nas
14a7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin no rin che'i dpal dang shin du brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che dpal gyi skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam
14a8(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o da ni kun grub pa dang / dgongs pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // don rnams thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i
14b1(rgyud): 'dra med dpal ni bdag yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha nas phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon
14b2(rgyud): gyi phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i byin gyi
14b3(rgyud): brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing
14b4(rgyud): smras pa med pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su bskang bar bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don dam pa'i dngos grub dam
14b5(rgyud): thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan de byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal de'i log pa gnyis su de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
14b6(rgyud): kyis rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan des de
14b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sbyor du bcug nas ched du brjod pa 'ang ched brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa kun// yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yi// yid
14b8(rgyud): byi rgyu na burgya lha markun 'phyi/ sbyin pa'i byin pa'i tshum// denas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems par rnyeg par dga' di bdum bu di po ngas rgyag rgyas drung
15a1(rgyud): rin po che'i byin gyi brlabs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dges pa'i dam tshig zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs
15a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra has// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid du
15a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dzum par gyur te/ byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs su gyur te
15a4(rgyud): phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs de las/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra ba dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rnams byung nas/ 
15a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phral rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu
15a6(rgyud): mgu ba'i dbang po yin pa nyid dang shin du brten pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
15a7(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas chung du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do do// gang phyir rtag tu mnyam gzhag rnams// sangs rgyas don la rab tu sbyor// e ma'i bdag ni kun mchog gi bzhad
15a8(rgyud): chen rmad du byung ba yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
15b1(rgyud): cad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams nad kyi rmad du byung ba'i byin brlabs rdo rje zhes bya
15b2(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba bskyed pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi dbang po bya
15b3(rgyud): na med pa thams cad bde ba dang yid bde ba ma thams cad myong bar byas nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes mngon par thosnya pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir
15b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po dri'i lag tu rdo rje 'dzum pa de de bzhin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dga' ba rdo rje dga' ba zhes rdo rje mi
15b5(rgyud): gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dga' bas/ rdo rje 'dzum pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed cing chad du brjod pa 'di ched du
15b6(rgyud): brjod do// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rmad du 'byung ba skyed ston pa po// dgyes chen byed pa'i ye shes te// gtsug lag gzhan gyis shes mi nus// dbang bskor ba chen po dang / 'od kyi dkyil
15b7(rgyud): 'khor 'dom gang ba dang / sems dpa' chen po'i don dang / bzhad pa chen po dang / 'di bzhini de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i sems dpa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
15b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dang sa kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyi brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
16a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha na sa byung ngo // k+Shabadz+rA d+hA grA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca
16a2(rgyud): kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin ni rang bzhin gyis pad+ha ma'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rab tu rtogs pa nyid kyi
16a3(rgyud): phyiradam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer du gyur te byung ngo // dam pa chos kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun du snang bar byas nas/ chos kyi dbyings de dag thams cad kyang / 
16a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje pad ma chen po'i dbyings
16a5(rgyud): su gyur te/ phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje pad ma'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin
16a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / sna cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams
16a7(rgyud): thams cad du byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin du kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po nyid yin pa nyid dang shin du brten pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyun+da nas/ byung
16a8(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyir gyurarotebacom ldan 'das rnam pa snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas rmed du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 
16b1(rgyud): e ma'o rang 'byung gdod nas dag/ dam pa'i don ni bdag yin te// gang phyir gzings 'dra'i chos rnams las// rnam par dag pa dmigs par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
16b2(rgyud): kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod
16b3(rgyud): tsing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
16b4(rgyud): cad sbyang ba'i dam tshig/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi bdag dang gzhan rnam par dag par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin
16b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa drug thob pa'i ban du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dam pa'i chos kyi
16b6(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor ba nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas/ de'i log tu rdo rje pad mo de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
16b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i spyan rdo rje spyan zhes ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rdo rje pad ma'i mdob ma de kha 'byed pas/ 'dod chags rnam par
16b8(rgyud): dag cing ma chags pa'i ngo bo nyid du gzigs pas gzigs shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi// de yi kho na rtogs pa 'di// bdag ste bdag gi lhag
17a1(rgyud): du byin na/ chos la chos ni gnas par gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyi
17a2(rgyud): brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po
17a3(rgyud): 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra tik+Sha// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thug las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ shes rab kyi ye shes kyi ral
17a4(rgyud): glir gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis gnas
17a5(rgyud): so// de nas ral gri'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes
17a6(rgyud): rab dang ye shes la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul bya ste/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin du 'jam dpal yin pa nyid dang shin du brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu
17a7(rgyud): 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jom dpal dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ tshod du brjod pa
17a8(rgyud): 'di ched du brjod do// oM ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'jam dbyangs bdag ni yin par dgongasagang phyir shes rab gzugs med kyang // dbyangs nyid du ni dmigs pa nyid// 
17b1(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yus phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang
17b2(rgyud): bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
17b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyon mos pa gcod pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad bcad pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong
17b4(rgyud): bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba'i shes rab dam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje ral gri de byang chub sems dpa'
17b5(rgyud): chen po 'jam dpal gyi lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i blo rdo rje'i blo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems
17b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i ral gri des 'debs shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul
17b7(rgyud): dgra rnams thams cad gcod byed cing // sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor
17b8(rgyud): bskor ba'i dam tshig lus byung ba'i chos kyi byin brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin
18a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha phru nas phyung ngo // badz+ra he du// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom
18a2(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
18a3(rgyud): mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas par gyur to// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyis
18a4(rgyud): de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra ba dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku rnams byung ste/ sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs
18a5(rgyud): pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin
18a6(rgyud): nga nyid dang / shin du brten pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thug tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom
18a7(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// rdo rje dam pa chos can gyi// e ma'o rdo rje 'khor lo bdag gang phyir sems bskyed tsam
18a8(rgyud): gyis kyang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thog tu chos kyi 'khor lo ba sbyor ba'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la
18b1(rgyud): byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lA ga na si nas/ yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
18b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma
18b3(rgyud): lus shing lus pa med par 'jug pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo/ 
18b4(rgyud): bskor ba dam pa 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje'i 'khor lo de byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas
18b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rdo rje snying po zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos rdo rje'i 'khor lo des de bzhin
18b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'jog cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos rnams thams cad rnam par sbyong // phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo na/ 
18b7(rgyud): byang chub snying po yin par bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po mi gsung ba'i dam tshig las byung ba/ rjechos kyi byin gyi brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
18b8(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs na swA/ rma bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzlas pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi rang thugs kha nas phyung // badz+ra/ 
19a1(rgyud): @b+ha ShaHde nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ de bzhin gyi migs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi
19a2(rgyud): yi ger gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje bzlas pa'i dbyibyas su gyu ra te phyag gnyis su gnas so// 
19a3(rgyud): de nas rdo rje bzlas pa'i dbye bas de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
19a4(rgyud): cad kyi chos nyid la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul la sogs pa byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin du tshig ma yin pa nyid dang / shin du
19a5(rgyud): brtun pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te/ ched du brjod pa
19a6(rgyud): 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rang 'byung rnams kyi gsang // ldem po'i ngag tu bdag dgongs te// gang phyir dam pa'i chos 'chad pa// tshig tu spros las rnam par bral// de nas byang chub
19a7(rgyud): sems dpa' tshig ma yin pa'i sku de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ yang bka' nod cing
19a8(rgyud): bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig las byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
19b1(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs ma cad kyi gsung gi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khyams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi tshig grub pa dang /  thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde
19b2(rgyud): ba myong bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi gsang ba nyid thob pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir/ rdo rje bzlas pa de byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i
19b3(rgyud): lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig rdo rje'i tshig zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i
19b4(rgyud): tshig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i bzlas pa des yang dag par smra zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje'i bzlas pa brjod pa yin/ 
19b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sngags 'di myur du bsgrub par byed/ rdo rje chos nyid kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen
19b6(rgyud): po bskor ba'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi spros pa rnam par mi ldog pa'i ye shes te/ 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sems dpa'
19b7(rgyud): chen po'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po las thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung bya lus kyi byin gyi brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
19b8(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas byung ngo // 
20a1(rgyud): badz+ra kAr+sa/ de nas rdo rje sems dad+yaSh+Ti ting nge 'dzin ni lus thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shrIsuM shin du rtogs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs lus byu
20a2(rgyud): mi thag po 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin te de nyid de// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi 'od zer du gyur te byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi 'od de
20a3(rgyud): ngag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dbyibs kyi rang bzhin du gyur to// / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dbyings
20a4(rgyud): ma lus pa de yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam du gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyin las kyi
20a5(rgyud): dbyibs de las/ kye rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur nas phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin
20a6(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas
20a7(rgyud): nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las mtha' yas pa nyid yin pa dang / shin du brten pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems
20a8(rgyud): denga'i chen pa de bzhin gshegs pa thus na dag phrin pas thams ca skyes bya ba'i skur gyur te/  stan 'dusarnam pa mad kyi zlogs gyu gan sanas/ rgyud du brjod po 'di che du
20b1(rgyud): do e ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi nges// phrin las mang po kun bdag yin// sangs rgyas don ni lhun grub phyir// rdo rje las ni 'jug par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin
20b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i lus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil
20b3(rgyud): 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs
20b4(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa la 'jug pa la sogs pa gdon mi za ba dang / tshad med pa'i lus kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa
20b5(rgyud): med pa rnams kyi las thams cad grub pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar byas nas/ da de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phrin las nyid dang / ye shes dag mngon
20b6(rgyud): par shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las zhes bya ba/ phrin las thams cad kyi 'khor lo
20b7(rgyud): bskor bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur nas/ de'i lag tu lus kyi rdo rje rjede bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin go shegs pa rnams kyisku rdo rje sna tshogs rdo rje
20b8(rgyud): sna tshogs nas rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rdo rje sna tshogs zhes bya bas rdo rje de rang gi rang gA snying khar bzhag skye/ de bzhin gshegs
21a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi phrin las la rab tu sbyor zhing / ched du brjod pa 'di tshad du brjod do// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog
21a2(rgyud): bdag sde bdag gi lag tu byin/ sna tshogs la ni sna tshogs sbyar/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub pa dka' ba'i dam tshig las byung
21a3(rgyud): las kyi byin gyi brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsrung ba 'di zhig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/ 
21a4(rgyud): 'di rang gi thugs kha las phyung ngo // badz+ra rak+Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ go cha brtan par gyur
21a5(rgyud): ta byung nus bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje'i gro cha chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje go cha'i
21a6(rgyud): dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsrung ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i las
21a7(rgyud): la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni brtson 'grus dam pa thub par dka' ba nyid dang / shin du brtan pa'o/ 
21a8(rgyud): pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub thar dka' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te/ 
21b1(rgyud): brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o brtson 'grus go cha ni/ brtan pa'i bdag nyid rab brtan bdagade ni brtan phyir lus min yang // rdo rje'i lus su byed pa'i mchog/ de nas byang chub
21b2(rgyud): sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po thub par dka' ba de'i lusabacom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
21b3(rgyud): par gyur nas/ yang bka'i nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms por zhugs nas/ 
21b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams bskyang ba dang / thams cad kyi bde dang / yid
21b5(rgyud): bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku thob pa'i mchog 'grub par bya ba'i bar du de dag gi phyir go chung byang chub semos dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub par dka'
21b6(rgyud): ba'i log tu de de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje grogs po rdo rje grogs po zhes rdo rje ming gau dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
21b7(rgyud): bo rdo rje grogs pos/ rdo rje go cha des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lca go rgya chen po sgron zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ byams pa'i go
21b8(rgyud): dam bya ste// brtson 'grus brtan pa bsrung ba che/ grogs po chen por brjod pa yin/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i
22a1(rgyud): du d+hIm+b+ha las byung ba lus kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa b+h+ram+b+has rgyud kyi thabs kyi dam tshig ces
22a2(rgyud): bya ba de bzhin gshegs kyi thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nus phyung ngo // badz+rA yak+Sha nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs lAs byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan
22a3(rgyud): 'adz+rasaM rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha chen por gyur te byung nas/ sde bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje mche
22a4(rgyud): ba'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ de
22a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdug pa 'dul ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms
22a6(rgyud): pa nyid dang / shin du brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i lus su gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang
22a7(rgyud): mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// oM ma'o bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams// thugs rje can gyi thabs chen te/ zhing yang sems can don du ni// ma rungs pa ni ston
22a8(rgyud): par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nasade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs
22b1(rgyud): kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu gtum pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
22b2(rgyud): de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dzISh+Ti de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams 'jigs pa mad
22b3(rgyud): par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa rnams thob cing // dngos grub
22b4(rgyud): dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha de byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
22b5(rgyud): thams cad kyis rdo rje khro bo rdo rje khro bo rdo rje khabuM zhes ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khro bos rdo rje mchi ba'i mtshon tshwa de rang gi khar bzhag nas/ de bzhin
22b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la bsdigs shing ched du brjod pa 'di chod du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba'i mchogardo rje mche ba'i mtshon rno ste// thabs dang
22b7(rgyud): snying rje'i bdag nyid do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba/ lus kyi byin gyi brlabs
22b8(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ban+ting ba'i dam tshig zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
23a1(rgyud): po 'di rang gi thugs lda nas phyung ngo // badz+ra sAn d+hi/ de nas nin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa
23a2(rgyud): de nyid de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa nA gur+b+ha sA+e k+Sh+mang nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'das nasu rdo rje bcings
23a3(rgyud): pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibs de las/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
23a4(rgyud): rnams byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams
23a5(rgyud): byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur shin du bcings pa dang rab tu 'dres par brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems
23a6(rgyud): dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e
23a7(rgyud): ma'o rab tu brtan bcings pa'i// dam tshig bdag ste brtan bdag nyid// bsam pa thams cad rab grub phyir/ grol ba rnams kyang 'ching bar byed/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
23a8(rgyud): chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgya ban zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas mang
23b1(rgyud): bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ching ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ de bzhin
23b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcings pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lha rnams kyi dgongs
23b3(rgyud): nipe brtag pa dang / grub pa thams cad dang / thams cad kyis bde ba dang yid bde ba myong ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / phyag rgya'i
23b4(rgyud): dbang dam pa grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyirardo rje bcings pa de byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// 
23b5(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje khu tshur zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur+ya zhes bya ba des/ 
23b6(rgyud): rdo rje bcings pa des de bzhin gshes pa thams cad la'i tshong zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ phyag rgya bcings pa che zhing brtan/ sangs rgyas
23b7(rgyud): kun du myur grub phyir/ dam tshig shin du 'di' bar dka'ade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i las dang / brnon 'grus chen po'i glo cha brtan pa dang // de bzhin
23b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po dang / phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa'i ye shes dang / 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las chen po'i sems dpa'o// 
24a1(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
24a2(rgyud): bskyabs twa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ rdo rje'i pha rotu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting
24a3(rgyud): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // satwA
24a4(rgyud): dz+ri/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs stes byung mu thag pa rdo rje'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// 'od zer de dag las
24a5(rgyud): kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dardza la nyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur na sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol du phyin
24a6(rgyud): pa'i ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas btab nas yang gcig tu dris te/ 'jig rten gyi khamams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje'i dbyibs chen por gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
24a7(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nasached du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e mA'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ sems dpa'i rdo rje brtan pa'i
24a8(rgyud): bdagagang+gA phyir brtan par lus med kyangardo rje'i lus su gyur pa yin/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya bsade bzhin gshegs pa bcom
24b1(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs par bya ba'i phyir/ rin po che'i pha rol du phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje'i byin gyi
24b2(rgyud): brlabs zhes bya ba'i bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ro// rang na badz+ro/ de nas de bzhin
24b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha las byung ma thag tu rin po che'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ rin po che'i 'od zer de dag las kyang / 
24b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas btab nas/ yang
24b5(rgyud): gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yas
24b6(rgyud): phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// / a ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ rdo rje rin chen bdag nyid grags// gang phyir sangs
24b7(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi// dbang gi tshul ni brtan po yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'jig rten dbang gi rgyal posade bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
24b8(rgyud): mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la rgyas gtab par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rigs kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyi brlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin ma
25a1(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nasachos kyi rdo rje tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // d+har+m+ma badz+ri/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
25a2(rgyud): kyi thugs las byung ma thag tu pad+ma m+b+hi'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'dres rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// pad ma'i 'or zer de dag las kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams
25a3(rgyud): cad kyi rdu la shin du pra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/ de bzhini gsheg pa thams cad kyi ye shas la pag rgyas bta paM nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 
25a4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam pa'i rdo rje pAd ma chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyub kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
25a5(rgyud): la gnas nas/ cheng du brjod pa 'di chung du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ chos kyi rdo rje gtsang ma bdagagang phyir rang bzhin rnam dag pas
25a6(rgyud): 'dod chags yin yang dri ma med/ de na? sra bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shwegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin ga shogs ni pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
25a7(rgyud): mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas gdab par bya ba'i phyirargyas kyi pha rol du phyin pa thams cad kyi dam tshig las byung brdo rje'i byin
25a8(rgyud): gyi brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang ti gi thugs kha nas byung ngo // 
25b1(rgyud): karma badz+ri/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu las thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nus byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid
25b2(rgyud): do las thams cad kyi 'od zer de dag las kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/ de bzhin
25b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas btab nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi/ thams
25b4(rgyud): cad du rtse mo bltas pa'i las kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nasached du
25b5(rgyud): brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// las kyi rdo rje mang po bdagagang phyir gcig kyang sems can khams// ma lus par ni las
25b6(rgyud): bzang byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi ye dam tshig dang / dbang bskur ba chen po dang / rdo rje chos nyid dang / mchod pa chen thams cad ni/ 
25b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin pa rnams so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dges bya'i mchod pa'i
25b8(rgyud): dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nasade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha me chen mo 'di rang gi thugs kha nAs phyung ngo // 
26a1(rgyud): badz+rI lA /  nA sa dats+tsha/ gros pa thams cad kyi thugs lus 'di byung ma thag tu rdo rje'i phyag rgyar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid
26a2(rgyud): do rgyu rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i ts+tsho mr-i de dag tukyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thums cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ ya
26a3(rgyud): gcig tu 'dres taM/ lha mo rgyu na mo rdo rje 'dzin ma rAng gi dngos po thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' dri zhing / kha dog dang / gzugs dang r+g+ha mtshan mya dang / spyod lam+ba sna tshogs pa/ rgyan
26a4(rgyud): thams cad kyis klubs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad bsdud par gyur pas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mor gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'odas mi bskyod pa'i rang gi dkyil
26a5(rgyud): 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// / e ma'o rang 'byung rnams kyi ni// mchod pa bdag 'dra gzhan med do/ 
26a6(rgyud): gang phyir 'dod la dga' mchod pas/ mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyuraro/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che phreng ba'i dbang gi sa dam
26a7(rgyud): tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams ts+tshed kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs kha na sa phyung ngo / badz+ra mA lA/ 
26a8(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung mthug tu rin po rgyu'i phyag rgyar gyur nas byung te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// rnon po che'i phyag rgya
26b1(rgyud): dag lus kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du prA me dang mnya ma pa'i de bzhin ga shegs parnams kyi skur gyur nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo chen mo
26b2(rgyud): rdo rje phreng ba ra de bzhin du gyu nas/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon lcogs su zla ba'i dkyis b+ha ga na sa nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 
26b3(rgyud): A ma'o rIn chen mcho dro pa zhes/ bdag dang 'dra bar grags pa med/ gang phyir kham+bas gA s+yam rgya la mchog kyang / rab tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ daM de nas
26b4(rgyud): / yad+ya bcom ldan 'das de gshegs pa thams ca kyi glu'i mchog gi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje byin gyi brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 
26b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyi sgo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo ngo/ badz+ra gI ti/ de nas de bzhin gshig su pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu
26b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya des
26b7(rgyud): kyang 'jig rten gyi khamasathams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyide bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nasayang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo chen
26b8(rgyud): gyur gyu na ga rten gyi byung ba'i rgyal po'i dash+ya m+b+hi m+b+hakhyor gyi gson phyogs kyi rgyu ba kyi 'khon ma kun sa nasadadu brjod pa dzad cid du / nga/ 
27a1(rgyud): ma'o bra dAk+ShA ni kun gzigs pa'i/ glu mchog rang bzhin mchod pa yin/ gang phyir sgra brnyan 'dra ba yi// mchod pa rnams kyis mnyes par byed/ 
27a2(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung brdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
27a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra nI ra t+yA/ de na sa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugasalas byung ma thag tu de
27a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyigar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas par gyur nas phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
27a5(rgyud): gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa de dag thams cad las kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur
27a6(rgyud): gyur nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje lha mo chen mo rdo rje gar gyi sgrar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gdon mi za bar grub pa'i dkyil 'khor
27a7(rgyud): gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// // e ma'o mchod kun don mdzad pa'i/ mchod pa rgya chen bdag yin te/ 
27a8(rgyud): glang phyir rdo rje gar tshigs/ sangs rgyas mchod pa rab rtogs byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba bla na med pa'i dam tshig dang
27b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i las bla na med pa
27b2(rgyud): byed pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'dasade bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas/ 
27b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu tshim pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
27b4(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi g.yog mo'i gtso mo 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra d+hU pA/ de na sa de bzhin
27b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/  bdug pa'i mchod pa'i sprin de bkod pa rnam pa du mas/ rdo rje
27b6(rgyud): dbyings thams cad du khyab par gyur nas byung ngo // bdug pa'i mchod pa'i rgya mtsho de las kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin
27b7(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres nas/ rdo rje bdug pa ma'i lha mo'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su khyud bu brtsegs
27b8(rgyud): slob rtse mo rdo rje dang / non du de'i rin po che las byas pa'i grwar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ rmad du brjod pa 'di chung du brjed du brjod do// e mI'i bdag ni mchod
28a1(rgyud): rab tu tshim ldan dge ba yin// gang phyir sems can 'brub ldan pas/ myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'ongs de bzhin
28a2(rgyud): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che'i rgyan gyi dam tshig lngas byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
28a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grwa stsol kha ma 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra pusme/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa
28a4(rgyud): byad+ma ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ me tog thams cad kyi ma chod pa'i sprin bkod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ngo // me
28a5(rgyud): me tog thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin bkod pa de las/ 'jig rten gyi khams cad kyi rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang gcig tu 'dras te/ 
28a6(rgyud): rdo rje me tog gi lha mo'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi g.yon phyogs kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i grA ra/ zla ba'i
28a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnus nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// a mra'o me tog mchod pa ba dag/ thams cad kyi nI rgyan byed do/ gang phyir mchod
28a8(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegasarin chen nyid du myur du 'grub/ de nas de bcom ldan 'das kyide bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po sa/ bcom
