28b1(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du muchod pa'i phyir/ Sh+Ta de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snang ba'i mchod pa'i dam tshi ga lAM sa byung ba rdo rje zhes bya
28b2(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pAn+ta zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya mo 'di rang gi thugs kha na sa phyung ngo // / badz+ra A lau ge!/ de nAs de bzhin gshegs pa
28b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu snang ba thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab por byed par gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
28b4(rgyud): pa de nyid do// snang ba thams rgyud kyi mchod pa'i bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs po'i sku rnams byung nas ya
28b5(rgyud): gcig tu 'dres te/ !lha mo rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur na swa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang pa brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i grA na zla ba'i
28b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di tshod du brjod do// e ma'o mchod pa mar me 'di// rgya chen dge ba bdag yin te// gang phyir snang bcas myur du ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan yang
28b7(rgyud): 'thob/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i len du slar mchod pa'i phyir// de bzhin gsheg
28b8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dri'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung bArno rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lha snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bran mo 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // 
29a1(rgyud): badz+ra gan+d+ha de nas de bzhin sna shags pa thams cad thugs khwa nas byung ma tha thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed par gyur
29a2(rgyud): / nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// dri thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pa de'i s+yA Sh+Ta jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra ts+tsha dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
29a3(rgyud): rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'das ste/ lha mo rdo rje ngi zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs po rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i gra na zla
29a4(rgyud): bany+tsi dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ chad du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// a ma'o dri yi rang bzhin gyi// mchod pa lha rdzas yid 'ong bdug/ gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri// lus rnams kun lha
29a5(rgyud): sbyin par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dbab pa dang / byang chub chen po'i yan lag bsags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kun snang ba dang / tshul
29a6(rgyud): khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i dri rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed do// de nas bcom
29a7(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyi dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
29a8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po 'di rang gi thugs// Sh+TA nas phyung ngo // badz+ra i/ de nas de bzhin gau shegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas byung mthug tu
29b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag las 'jig
29b2(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags kyu zhes
29b3(rgyud): ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che lces byas pa'i rdo rje sgo khang gnang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cod
29b4(rgyud): kyi dam tshig gis spyan 'dran cing / chad du brjod pa 'di chad du brjod do// a ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag sman 'dren brtan pa'i bdagagang phyir bdag gis spyan dngas pas// dkyil
29b5(rgyud): 'khor kun la brten par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug po'i sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
29b6(rgyud): zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'jug pa'i gsol khya ba 'di rang gi thugs khwa nas phyung ngo // badz+ra pA shA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di
29b7(rgyud): phyung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo mo tshig la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs su gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
29b8(rgyud): tshig 'dren pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub
30a1(rgyud): / sems dpa' chen po rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi khang pa brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang /  nor bu dang Sh+Tha rits+tsha po che las byis pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i sgo khang
30a2(rgyud): gri nang na rin po che zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mas cad 'jug cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// a ma'i sangs rgyas thams nad kyi// rdo rje zhugs pa dam po bdag
30a3(rgyud): brdul phran zhags pa thams cad kyang // bdag gis slar yang drangs pa byas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lpags sgrog sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig
30a4(rgyud): las byung ba sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya 'di rang githugs kha nas
30a5(rgyud): phyung ngo // badz+ra s+pho na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la sna 'di phyung ma thag tu de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi dram tshig bsdams pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs su gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das
30a6(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs
30a7(rgyud): pa'i sku rnams byung nas gcig tu 'dras te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags sgrog zhes bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas
30a8(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje chos kyi sgo khang gi nang ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'ching zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e m+b+ha'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
30b1(rgyud): rdo rje lcags sgrog dam po bdag/ 'ching ba kun las grol ba rnams// sems can don du bcing par 'dod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab pa zhes bya ba'i sems dpa' tshun
30b2(rgyud): po'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bran 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra a bi shASh+Tide nas de bzhin
30b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad du gyu nus byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin
30b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad las 'jig rten gyi khyams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin ga shegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ gcig tu 'dres nas/ byung
30b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'bebs pa'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtsi mo rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje las kyi sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ 
30b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byebs shi rkyed du 'di cad du brjod do// a ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ rdo rje dbab pa brtan pa bdag/ gang phyir kun gyi bdag gyur nas// bra na du yang ni gyur pa
30b7(rgyud): yin da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba dang / gzhug pa dang / 'ching ba dang / dbang du bya ba rnams na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan
30b8(rgyud): 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ rdo rje se gol gyi mtshan ma mdzad nas// de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa nad kyi bsdu ba'i byin gyi brlabs 'di gsungs so// 
31a1(rgyud): // badz+ra sa ma ya dzA/ nga nas skad gcig yang tsam thang cag de'i tshe/  bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sa gol gyi mtshan mes bskal ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byom
31a2(rgyud): sprin gyi rgyu thams cad nas/ 'dzig+d+ha rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang bcas te/ bsdus
31a3(rgyud): nasakhyeng bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dngad+ya na r+ya bu dang rin po che ltas byas pa gang na ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes pa rnam pa raM snang mdzad gudan ba der gshegs nas/ ched du brjod
31a4(rgyud): di ched du brjod do// oM saR+YA ta thA gA ta pa ta b+h+r-in d+ha nA ka ro mi zhes brjod do// rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ni dgar zlos shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshul
31a5(rgyud): nus/ ched du brjod pa 'di chad du brjod do// a m+ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yi// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi// dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes/ 
31a6(rgyud): de nas de skad ces gsungs pa dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcus te/ 
31a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las rang rang gi byang
31a8(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang btsas te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa N+Di mi rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor du
31b1(rgyud): gyur nasaHhrI snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs nas chud du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rgya chen chen po thog myed skye// rdul phrani rnams ni ji snyed kyi// sangs rgyas
31b2(rgyud): rnams ni gcig tu gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas/ sems can gyi khams ma lusang shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bslab pa dang thams
31b3(rgyud): cad la phan pa dang bod pa bstan pa nas/ de bzhin ga sh+ma gas pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i bar
31b4(rgyud): gyi phyir/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di byin gyis brlab par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rang gi rdo rje sems dpa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje chen po/ 
31b5(rgyud): 'dzin pa laming brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab po// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun// rdo rje dang po kun tu bzang // phyaga'i tshul phyag na rdo rje la ma
31b6(rgyud): rdo rje rgyal po sangs rgyas mchog/ rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin gshegs// don yod rgyal po sangs rgyas mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje mgugs khyod la'o// rdo rje chags pa bde chen po// rdo rje mda' ni
31b7(rgyud): dbyung byed pa// bdud kyi 'dod pa rdo rje/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje gzhu khyod la// rdo rje legs pa sems dpa' che// rdo rje mgu ba dga' bo che/ rab dgyes rdo rje rgyal po mchogaphyag 'tshu lu rdo rje dgyes
31b8(rgyud): khyod kyi/ rdo rje ni chen rdo rje don/ rdo rje na ma mkha' nor bu mo// nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje phyug/ phyag 'tshul rdo rje snyid khyod // rdo rjeg zi brjid cher 'byin / rdo rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i 'od
32a1(rgyud): / 'ong+ga zlar+yaM gzi bar+t+tid cha/ phyag 'tshul rdo rje 'od khyod la/ sems can don rab rdo rje dpal// rdo rje rgyal mtshan rab dga' bad/ rdo rje chen po rin chen dpal// phyug
32a2(rgyud): 'tshul rdo rje dpal khyod la// rdo rje kyang mo bzhad pa 'o// rdo rje 'dzum pa ngo 'tshar che// dga' zhing rab dga' rdo rje ston// phyag 'tshal rdo rje dga' ba la// rdo rje cho sau rab de nyid don// rdo rje pad ma rab dga' byed// 
32a3(rgyud): / 'jig rten dpud+yad+habyA dz+nye r+d+har+m+mAn// phyag 'tshal rdo rje spyan khyod la// rdo rje rno ba thag pa che// rdo rje ral gyi mtshon chen po// 'jam dpal rdo rje rab tu zab// d+yaSh+mi tshulA rdo rje blo khyod la/ rdo rje rgyu dang snying po
32a4(rgyud): che/  rdo rje 'kher le tshul chen po// rab skor rdo rje las byung ba// phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying po la'o// rdo rje gsung ba rang rig mchog/ rdo rje zlos pa rab 'grub sbyin// ma gsung rdo rje mchog grub pa// phyag
32a5(rgyud): 'tshal rdo rje gsung khyod la'o// rdo rje ltas rab rdo rje bkra'// lus kyi rdo rje kun rab 'gro// rdo rjengs pa rgya che ba// phyag 'tshal rdo rje kun khyod la// rdo rje bsrung ba brtan pa che// rdo rje gi cha sra ba che/ 
32a6(rgyud): brtson 'grus mchog ni thub par dka'// phyag 'tshal rdo rje brtson 'grus la// rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs chen po// rdo rje mchub 'jigs pa che// bdud 'joms rdo rje ma bzad pa/ phyag 'tshal
32a7(rgyud): rdo rje dag pu la// rdo rje mtshams sbyor rab bsdu so nyid// rdo rje 'ching ba rab grol byed// rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje khu tshur lA// su zhig ming rnams 'chang ba ni// zhi ba brgya dang
32a8(rgyud): rtsa brgyad 'di// rdo rje ming dbang bskur la sdigs// mchog rnams kun gyis de dbang bskur// gang zhig yon tan mying rnams kyis// rdo rje 'chung ba chen po lnga// rtag tu dbyangs kyis bstod na ni/ 
32b1(rgyud): de yang rdo rje 'chang 'drar 'gyur// mang brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis// bdag cag gis ni bste/ theg pa chen po rtogs pa yin// tshul chen yang ni rgya smra smair mdzod// mgon po khyod la gsol
32b2(rgyud): ba na d+hA suM sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo tshe// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yA// cho ga mchog ni/ shrId pA rA gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po 'dzin pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
32b3(rgyud): cad kyis gsol ba'i tshig 'dra thos na sa bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms parla zhugs nas// rdo rje dbyings zhes
32b4(rgyud): bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do// // da nas yang dag bshad bgyi ba/ dkyil 'khor chen po dam pra ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar grags// sems
32b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po'i phyag brgya tshwa ra// sgom zhing byin gyis rlob bgyid cing // dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid de// ci rigs par ni mtshos nas kyang // phyag brgya la gnas de bzhin langs// kun tu rnam
32b6(rgyud): par bltas na swa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' zhesA brjod nas// bsgyings pa'i tshul gyi swa yongs su bskor// / sar pa lags pra ra bkral nas kyang // tshud dang 'thun pa mdzes pa yi// thig gis
32b7(rgyud): mkhas pas canas kyis// dkyil 'khor gyi ni theg gadrab cing // gru bzhin bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang / rta babs bzhis na mdzes bgyis la// thig bzhi dang ni ldan 'gyur pa// da ra dang ma tog phrang
32b8(rgyud): bas brgyan// glo'i phyogs ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen spras par ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab po// de yi rimya pa'i nang zhugs la// 'khor lo
33a1(rgyud): / khyis yongs su smye ba g+sa/ TIg+sa kyis mangs gyis smra// rdo bzhin phyogs su// zla pA'aM dky-i la b+h+yo sa brgyan la// klu dbus
33a2(rgyud): duky-il 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas kun ga gzhogan du// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun gyi// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus rnams so// rim bzhin du ni mtshig mchog/ 
33a3(rgyud): stsogs pa g+ha/ zhig par bgyi// dkyil khro ba dag/ rdo rje'i snyoms pas so na su ni// mi gol ba la sogs pa yi// sangs rgya sa bzhi po thams cad bri sh+log/ mu g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor du
33a4(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin stsogs mnyam par gnag/ rin rgyun 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje sring sogs rdzogs par ba zhag pa/ tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor // rdo rje spyan sogs dag por bzhig/ 
33a5(rgyud): mi za grub dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje rgyug ma la sogs bzhag/ 'khor lo grwa'i na gnas rnams su// rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang bzhig/ dkyilo 'khor phyi ri ma grwa rnams sku// sangs rgyas mchod ba
33a6(rgyud): rnams kyang po zhag/ sgro rnams kun gyen du ni// sgo bsrungs bzhi yang bzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor phyi ma phyogs su ni// sems dpa' chen blo rnamus kyang bzhig/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon
33a7(rgyud): gyis/ dam tshig mchog gi phyag d+ha ni// cho ga bzhi nu ba cings zhugs nas kyang / smyo ti'i phyag rgyas glu pa por gyi/ de la thams cad dbub pa'i snying po ni 'di las so// A// bdag la byin
33a8(rgyud): chags/ snod na // nonano// dasar bam+b+hi na pa nas pa rgyu ma sbyi nga / sa na rnaM
33b1(rgyud): se gol mang po gdab bgyis la// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi// de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcus// dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams// dkyil
33b2(rgyud): 'khor thams cad 'das par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing / ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// cung zad rab tu brjod par bgyi/ de nas 'dus pa dwags
33b3(rgyud): pas na/ de bzhin gshegs rnams bstan par gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rab grub pa/ grogs po nyid du nye ba rA gnas// de nas sgro rnams thams cad tu// lcags kyi la sogs las bgyis
33b4(rgyud): nasaltas chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis// dam tshig rnams ni gzhag par bgyi// dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni/ sems dpa'i rdo rje lta sogs pa/ da ltar sems dpa' chen po skrag
33b5(rgyud): dza hUM baM ho zhes brjod cing // de nas sangs rgyas la stsogs pa// sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu bar// spyan drangos nas ni rab tu bcugabacings nas da yi dbang du 'gyuraro// dade nas bdag nyid
33b6(rgyud): chen po rnams/ gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la// thams cad don kun grub pa'i phyir/ thams cad mdzod ces gsol bur bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon gyis
33b7(rgyud): du bzhin du las bgyi'o// de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir ni/ rdo rje slob ma dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par mchis so// de nas dang po ni gzhag pa lags
33b8(rgyud): sems can gyi khyams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang // phan pa dang bde ba thams cad dang dngos grub mchog gi rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyi slad tu'o// dkyil
34a1(rgyud): / 'kho rA chun po 'dir zhug sa pA yA snod du gyu rU pa dang // snod du ma gyur pa brtag mi 'tshal lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can kha cig ni
34a2(rgyud): sdig pa chen po bgyid pa ya mchis te/ dedag gis rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs te/ mthong na ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor dang brgya
34a3(rgyud): dang btung ba dang 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang / dam tshig la mi dga' ba dang / sngar spyad pa la sogs pa mi nus pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang ji ltar 'tshal ba
34a4(rgyud): bzhin du bgyid cing zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'dreso sems can kha cig ni g+ha rA dang klu dang gradu mo dang rtsed mo dang / kha zas dang spyod pa la dga'
34a5(rgyud): be rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs par chos nyid khong du ma chud pas lha gzhan gyi rigs kyi dal 'khor du 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa
34a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs mar yang dag par bsdus par 'gyur ba/ bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang mgu ba dang / rangs pa rnams 'byung ba rings pa der ni/ bslab
34a7(rgyud): pa'i gzhis 'jigs shing skrag nas mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ de dag ngan song gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug par kha bltas shing gnas pa rnams kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba'i dam pa thams cad grub
34a8(rgyud): cing / bde ba dang yid bde ba myed pa bgyi ba dang / d+han spod gi rgyud thams cad du 'jug par kha bAltas pa'i lamya las zlog par bgyi ba'i slad du/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug du
34b1(rgyud): rung ngo / bcom ldan 'das chos can gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi dngos grub dam pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol ba la na/ 
34b2(rgyud): bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa brgyad la stsogs pa dang / sa rnams kyis 'bad cing nyon mongs par 'gyur ba dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// zhugs ma
34b3(rgyud): thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du grub pa yang rnyed par dka' ba ma lags na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyad ci 'tshal// de nas dang po kho na rau shig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag
34b4(rgyud): bzhi bgyi'o/ da ni 'di ltar lus thams cad kyis rdo rje'i thal mo bskyang ste/ phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM saR+YA ta thA ga ta pu dzI pa s+tha nA yA Ad mA na ma ni r+ya ta yA mI/ saR+YA ti thA ga ta badz+rI satwA
34b5(rgyud): a ti tI sh+tsa sa mA ma/ zhes brjod do// da nas de bzhin du 'dus te/ rdo rje'i thal mo snying khAr bzhig ste/ dpral bAs phyag bya zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM swaR+YA ta thA gau ta pu dza a b+hi ShA krA ya ad mA naM/ ni r+yA
34b6(rgyud): ta ya miHsaR+YA ta thA ga ta badz+ra rAd na a b+hi shin tsa mAM/ zhes brjod do// de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje'i thal mo spyi bor sbyar te khas phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ au saR+YA ta thA ga ta puts+tsha pr-i
34b7(rgyud): baR+Sha na ya ud ma naM/ nIr+yA ta yA mi/ saR+YA ta thA ga tA badz+ra d+harma pA bA ra ta na yA maM/ zhes brjod do// de nas de bzhin du 'dus ste/ rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste/ snying khar bzhag nas spyi byos phyag 'tshal zhing
34b8(rgyud): sngags 'di skad du/ oM saur+yA ta thA ga ta pu dza ka rA ma ni ad ma nai nir+yA ta yA ma~M/ sar+yA ta thA ga tA badz+ra ka ra ma ku ru mAM/ zhes brjod do// de nas stod g.yogs dar dmar po gyon la/ gdaung+ka rasa? dmar po
35a1(rgyud): / bar+t+ti m+b+ha na sad+g+ha aus dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag brgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do// sa ma ya stam/ da nas gung mo gnyis kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la/ drang zhing
35a2(rgyud): snying po 'di brjod do// sa mA ya hUMsl-idA nastAM nA kIm+b+hi tIhau tu 'di skad du bskos shing / dang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ hUMngs khyod la ye shes gang gi sa de bzhin
35a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad du 'grub po seng 'byon/ dngo sa grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i rdo rje ye shes bskyed par byas/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khyer chen po ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun
35a4(rgyud): du ma smra shig/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta rA/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya khwa nang du bstan pa dang / phyir brtan pa bcings pa rdo rje skyob ma'i mgo bor bzhag ste/ 'di skad
35a5(rgyud): du brjod par bya'o// 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis gal te smras na gad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang mna'i chu'i snying pos bsngags la slob ma de 'thung du gzhug
35a6(rgyud): gau/ de nas mna'i snying po 'dri yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ni dang / khyod kyi snying la yang dag zhugs// gal ta tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag tu dal te gshegs// oM badz+ro da ka tha// de nas slob
35a7(rgyud): ma la 'di skad du sgos shig/ deng phyin chad khyod kyis phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis// nga yis 'di byos shig ces bya ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so// khyod kyis nga la brnyas pa ma byed cig/ mi bde ba ma spangs
35a8(rgyud): par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar gyu ra ta rau zhes smras la/ 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgo byin gyis brlobs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab por gyur cig ces smros shig/ 
35b1(rgyud): par sgom pa'o// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du samyas dang 'ardo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad du brjod du gzhug go// 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags// rdo rje
35b2(rgyud): ye shes bla med ni// di ring nyid du 'bab pa ra shog/ oM badz+ra a ba sha a// de nas khro bo'i khu tshur bcings la/ sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya mdud cing dral ga N+DI theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs
35b3(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje'i tshig ci dga' bar brjod du gzhug go/ de nas phab te/ babs ma thag tu lha'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur te/ ye shes dras pha rol gyi sems shes par 'gyur ro// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa
35b4(rgyud): da da ltar byung ba rnams kyi dgos pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad la 'di' sems brtan par 'gyur ro// de'i sdug bsngal thams cad zad par
35b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rje 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral byas gnod pa med 'gyur ro// sems dpa' thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// dngos grub
35b6(rgyud): thams cad kyang 'di'i mngon sum du 'gyur ro// rgyu med par sngon ma byung ba'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang rangs par byed pa'i bde ba'i khyad par thams cad 'di las skye bar 'gyur ro// bde ba de dag kha
35b7(rgyud): TIg gis ni ti 'i grub par 'gyur ro/ DA kha cig gis ni gzungs/ kha cig gis ni rA ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa nas/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su 'grub
35b8(rgyud): pa'i bAr dA'agyur ro// de nas pag rgyad bcings la rang gi snying khar dgrol zhing snying po 'di brjod do// tiSh+Tha badz+ra De D+ho ma b+ha ba sha sha to ma b+ha bA/ hri ta ya ma A d+hi tiSh+Tha sAR+YA sid d+hi ma pra yaM rgya hUMHr+the ha ha ha ha
36a1(rgyud): rkyen N+Di tog gi ng+ge m+b+hi lu 'khor chen por dor shing snying po 'dri brjod du gzhug go/ prazhi n+ya sa so// de nas gu la bab pa de 'dis sgrub po// de nas bred pa
36a2(rgyud): blangs ter+Nor+g+haM snying po 'dis de nyid kyi mgo bor bcings la snying po 'di brjod do gzhug go// oM pra tI g+h+ri h+na sA mI ma~M satwa mya hA ba la/  bAN+Di s+ya pas sems dpa' chen po des bdag gir byas par 'gyur
36a3(rgyud): bris 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas da lta ra bA ba su bzhin du gdong g.yogs bkrol ti snying po 'di yang brjod du gzhug go/ a badzA s+yAt+ma s+ya yun / tsak+ShA ud ga tan ta pa ra ung+ga ga ya
36a4(rgyud): tis+yAR+Wa k+Sho badz+ra tsak+Shu rA nud ta rama?/ he badz+ra pa sh+ya/ de nas dkyil 'kho chen po rim pa bzhin du bstan to// dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ma thag tu yung de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin
36a5(rgyud): gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// rdo rje sems dpa' yang 'di'i snying kha na gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ 'od zur sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i
36a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mthong ba la sogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig
36a7(rgyud): ston par 'gyur ro// dang phyin chad don thams cad dang yid kyi 'dod pa'i dgos pa thams cad dang dngos grub thams cad dang rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid dmya de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur
36a8(rgyud): ro/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba'i 'og tu/ rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i nang gi dri'i chu dang snying po 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shin tsa/ de nas phyag rgya
36b1(rgyud): ding phreng ba gang yang rung ba gcig bcing stsa la/ rang gi mtshan ma lug par gzhag lnga 'di skad du brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dang// / dri rIng khyod la bsgyur byar 'gyur/ sa
36b2(rgyud): rgyas kun du maN+Da phyir/ rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long / oM badz+ra u ti pa ti skaM.a b+hi Shin+tu mi tI s+yA badz+ra sa mr-i ya s+t+waM/ de nas snying po 'dis rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dashi no/ sbyor bar bya'o// oM badz+rA sid ti ti
36b3(rgyud): A b+hi Shin+ti ma~M/ badz+ra na ma a b+hi She kra te/ kye rdo rje zhes gang gis ming grang brjod pa der k+She zhes brjod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas po'o// de nas ci khyod don 'byung
36b4(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub kyi ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub grub pa'i ye shes dang rigs 'dzin gyi dngos grubo 'grub pa'i ye shes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog 'grub
36b5(rgyud): pa'i bur du gang 'dod ces smras la/ de nas gang gis gang 'dod pa de de la brjod par bya'o// de la dang po rI shig don gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab par 'gru bya ste/ rdo rje dbyings
36b6(rgyud): ni gter gnas pa// snying khar yongs su bsgom par bya// bsgoms na sa lA ga naus pa yI/ ga te ra ni de yis mthong bar 'gyur/ tsA/ rdo rje'i dbyibs tswig bris nas kyang // nam mkha'i ngos la
36b7(rgyud): bsgom par byan/ gang+gA ltung byar mthong ba dar/ gte ra yod pA ra ni rnam par bshad/ blo ldan mi yis rdo rje dbyibs lha yi steng du bsgoms na ni/ 'di ni yod ces bdag nyid kyi swaM// bden pa nyid du
36b8(rgyud): / smra bar 'gyur// rang gri las 'di thams cad la/ rdo rje'i dbyibs su bsgoms na ni// babs par 'gyur bas gar gnas pa/ gter ni de na yod par ba shad// de dag gi snying po ni/ 
37a1(rgyud): / 'dra dag yin no// badz+ra na d+hits+tsha rA da na ni d+hi/ darga ni d+hi/ karma ni d+hIHt+yade nas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shaiN+Da kr-i slab parA bya ste/ !rdo rje dbab par
37a2(rgyud): byas nas natshwa yaM rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra ba ra/ bsgoms na chu yi steng na pha ra// 'gro ba'i dngos grub myur de 'thob// da ltar dbab pa bas rnaMs kya / gang gi gzugs su bdag gi las/ 
37a3(rgyud): bsgoms par gyur na bdag nyid ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni skur yang 'gyur// da ltar bdag la phab pas kyang / bdag gis bdag nyi du nam mkhan+da ni/ bsgoms par gyur na ji srid du/ 'dod
37a4(rgyud): pra de nyid mi snang 'gyur// rdo rje dbab par bdag gyur nas/ rdo rje yin par bdag bsgom sngan// gan+das nas ji srid 'dzeg 'dod pa// de snod mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag
37a5(rgyud): yin no/ badz+ra dzA la/ badz+ra ru pa/ badz+ra i ki shaM/ badz+ra ma haM/ ts+tshid nas rigs 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste// zla ba'i dbyibs gcig bres nAswa nI// steng gi tsuMr+dz+dza mkha' la
37a6(rgyud): phags byas te// lag par rdo rje bsgom sma na ni// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// zla bo'i dbyibs steng 'jug nas ni// rdo rje rin chen rlob bsgoms na// bdag nyid dag pa ji srid 'dod// de
37a7(rgyud): srid skad ces lding bar 'gyur// zla ba'i dbyibs kyi snying 'dug nas// rdo rje pad ma lag gnas pa'o// bsgoms na rdo rje'i spyan gyis ni/  rig 'dzin go 'phrang sbyin par byed// zla ba'i dkyil 'khom
37a8(rgyud): dbus gnas na ste// mas kyi rdo rje bsgom smon sa ni// rjerje sna chags 'dzin pa las// rig 'dzin kun du myur bar 'gyu no// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag sbyin no// 'dzid de/ rnye na d+ham
37b1(rgyud): mr-i dza~M krAr+m+ma d+hu ru/ de nas de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi dngos grub dam 'i ma'i phyag rgya'i oM shrIswA bslab par bya'o// rdo rje kun gyi ting nge 'dzin// nam mkha'i da byi ngas su bsams nas ni/ 
37b2(rgyud): bdag nyid ji srid 'dod/ de srid paR+sha tu lding bar 'gyu ra// kun lhas dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bsgoms na bla na mad bzhin du/ ye shes sgrasas myur du ni// mu ni shis lha ni thob par 'gyur/ rdo rje/ 
37b3(rgyud): sems dpa' 'dra bar ni// nam mkha' thams cad dran byas na/ bdag nyid dran pa brtan ldan zhing / rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur/ nam mkha'i dbyings ni ma thams cad du/ sangs rgyas
37b4(rgyud): gzugs su bsams nas ni// sangs rgyas kun tu ting 'dzin las// sangs rgyas kun du 'grub par 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di drag yin te// badz+ra badz+rot+ka/ shudra d+ha shud d+hi/ sa taM sa tA/ 
37b5(rgyud): bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes 'grub pa rnams so// de nas gsang thub pa yin pas de la dang po mna'i snying po brjod par bya ste/ oM badz+ra sa ta yan te h+ya hri daM yaM sr-i mU ya s+thi ta/ ni b+h+rid
37b6(rgyud): t+yo ti do ka nam/ yad yA t+ya/ ya ti bruM yAng yi dam na yaM// de nas 'di skad du khyod kyis mna'i snying po 'di las mda' ba rA mu byed cig/ khyod gnod pa me sbyangs pas 'chi ba'i dus ma yin par/ 
37b7(rgyud): shi bar gyur ta ra/ lus 'di nyid kyis dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta ru zhes bsgo bar bya'o// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shr-is la bslab par bya'o// rdo rje dbab pa bskyed nasaM ni/ tA/ mnyam
37b8(rgyud): pA rA g+hazhog nas rdo d+hA y-i/ thal mye dros kyis dul brdo bas na// ri bo yang ni dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje dbab pa'i cho glo yis// rdo rje bsdams de'i ngos kyis ni// ngal
38a1(rgyud): ma gyis brde pa'i sbyor ba yis// ri bo yang ni kun nas 'babs// de bzhin dbab pa'i rnyog yis// rdo rje bsdams pa brgyad nas ni/ skor mI'i rtse mo mnyam brdabs na// rigs
38a2(rgyud): brgya yud kIs brlag par 'gyuraro// pra mi dbab pa'i cho ga byas// sor mo thams cad mnyam gzhag cig/ rdo rje brngams pa dgrol ba ni// sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba'i mchog/ de nas de dag gi
38a3(rgyud): gsang ba'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ bud med dam ni skyes pa'i lus// bu ga'i nang nas 'jug par bya// de ltar kyang ni zhugs nas kyang // de yi lus kun khyag ste/ de la thal mo'i snying po ni 'di dag yin no// 
38a4(rgyud): badz+ra pA sha/ badz+ra a be sha/ badz+ra ha na/ badz+ra ha raM/ de nas snying po byin la rang gi rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes la bsgrub par bya'o// cho ga 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o// khyod kyis phyag rgya la mi
38a5(rgyud): mkhas pa gzhan su yang rung ba la phyag rgya gang yang rang ba bstan par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis phyag rgyo bcing byar
38a6(rgyud): byas na/ de'i tshe de dag de ltar 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de nas de dag the tsom du 'gyur te/ gnod pa ma spangs pas myur ba nyid du byas nas dmyal pa chen po mnar med pa zhes bya bar ltung bar
38a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ khyod nyid kyang dran song du 'gro bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' sgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bshad do// sems rtogs pa nas
38a8(rgyud): brtsams nas ni// rdo rje dbyings zhes brjod byed cing // sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag sgrub cing // rdo rje nyi ma bsgom par bya// grub ma thag tu 'di yis ni// ye shes tshe stobs na tshod dang / 
38b1(rgyud): kun du 'gro ba nyid rnams thob// sangs rgyas 'grub pa 'dra dka' ba min// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyag rgya'o// de na rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa'i
38b2(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po bcing ba yin te/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjes ni// rdo rje bsgyings par sems bskyed de// bsgyings bcas rdo rje gsoR+Sha byed cing / rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid 'gyur// 'dis
38b3(rgyud): nr-i kun du 'gro ba dang // 'dod pa kAn bdag bde chen dang // / rdzu 'phrul tshwa stobs gzugs mchog rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis// ji ltar ri mo'i
38b4(rgyud): rjes 'thun zhing // mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnam ldan par// sems dpa' chen po bsgrub par bya// da nas 'dir ni rtog kun gyi// sgrub pa dang ni dngos grub dang / grub pa dang ni las chen rnams// 
38b5(rgyud): go rims bzhin du bshad par bya// dang por nyin re dus bzhin du// rang la byin brlabs sogs de bzhin// byas nas thams cad bsgrub bya ste// de yi 'og tu ci dgar bya// de la phyag rgya chen
38b6(rgyud): po sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te// rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni// phyag rgya chen po cho ga bzhin// bcings nas de yi mdun phyogs su// sems dpa' chun po de sgom mo// ye shes sems
38b7(rgyud): dpa'i de mthong nas// rang gi lus su de sgom bya// bkug cing bcug la bcing ba dang // dbang du byas te sgrub pa'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin te// badz+ra sa twa a/ rdo rje dbab pa'i snying pa'o// 
38b8(rgyud): bdas tadi na no// sems dpa'i chen po rjes su dran par bya ba'i snying pa'o//  chub bo// semos dpa'i chen po spyan drang ba dang // gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang dbang du bye bo rnams kyi snying po'o// 
39a1(rgyud): sI mA yA s+yAMm+b+ha/ zhe s+ya ba braM brjod pas/ r+g+ho Sh+Ta da zla ba grub nas ni/ da ra ni bdag tu bsgoms nas ni// dar bdag sems dpa'i lus su skem/ kaMs ma ya staM a haM
39a2(rgyud): brjodasemaswa 'im+b+hik+ShA k+Sha r+g+ha rne bzlas pas 'askye ba paR+ShA ba// phyag rgya thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// 6/ gzhan yang sgrub pa chen de naM// d+hu h+ni ba ho// zhes brjod la/ 
39a3(rgyud): legs pa'i cho ga yid kyi sa na/ lus su stongs rgyaShASh+Ta gzhug go/ da nas bla med rdo rje'i lus// de dag gi ni las bshad de// sangs rgyas rjes su dran sgrub na// sangs rgyas nyid du myur
39a4(rgyud): du 'gyur!sems ma rdo rje ma grub ni// phyag rgya kun gyi bdag por 'gyur/ rin tshwan rdo rje ma grub na// dA na ri Ni/ kun dbang 'gyu ra/ chos kyi rdo rje ma grub na// sangs rgya sde chos ni 'dzin
39a5(rgyud): par 'gyur/ las kyi rdo rje ma phyag rgyas// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings pa yis// rdo rje sems dpar 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje 'dren pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje
39a6(rgyud): 'dzin pa spyan 'dren 'gyur// rdo rje 'dod pa'i phyag rgya ches// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed// rdo rje legs pa'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad dgos par byed// rin chen phyag
39a7(rgyud): rgyu'i cho g.yos// sangs rgyas dbang bskur sbyin par byed// rdo rje gzi brjid cho ga yi ste// rdo rje gzi bad+hA nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje dpal 'dzin bsnyen pas na// rib rnams ni yongs su skrod
39a8(rgyud): rdo rje ba zhad pa'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam du gzhad// rdo rje chos kyi chog yis// rdo rje chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje rnon po'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi shes
39b1(rgyud): mchog/ rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsten pas// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// / rdo rje gsung gi b+hU pa 'thog/ rdo rje lus margyog+sa sgoms pas na// rdo rje mas su ya dag 'gyur
39b2(rgyud): rdo rje'i go cha bsgron bas na/ rdorjesku nyid ba par 'gyur/ rdo rje gnod sbyin sgrub pa smanardo rje'i gnod sbyin 'grub par 'gyur/ rdoHgi du rgyur ba cings pra y-is/ phyug rgyu thams cad 'gru
39b3(rgyud): par 'gyur rdo rje 'dzin ma bsgoms pasanarje chen po'i dga' ba 'jog// rdo rje'i phreng ba bcings pas no// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'gyur// rdo rje klu yi cho ga yis// rdo rje klu na
39b4(rgyud): len par 'gyur// rdo rje gar ni sbyar ba yis// spangs rgyas kun gyis de mchod do// rdo rje bdug pa cho ga yis// 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed// rdo rje me tog sbyor byed pa// des ni 'gro bla dang
39b5(rgyud): du byed// rdo rje snang ba phyag rgya ches// ri bye mchog mig ni sbyin par byed// rdo rje dri yi tshigs ni// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed// rdo rje lcags kyus drangs pasau na// 'dren pa kun gyi
39b6(rgyud): mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje zhags pa'i cho ga yis// thams cad rab tu 'jug par 'gyur// rdo rje lcags sgrog sbyar bas ni// thams cad bcing bar nus par 'gyur// rdo rje dbab pa'i tshig yis// 
39b7(rgyud): thams ts+tshed dbab par rab tu 'grug/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad de// thal mo dam du sbyar ba las// so ra mo thams cad bsnol ba ni// 
39b8(rgyud): rdo rje thal mer bka' stsal te// rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams// dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni// rdo rje bsdams las 'byung bsan/ de drug bsdams pa rdo rje yi// bstims pa blan
40a1(rgyud): med bshad par bya// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// gung mo myu gu mnyam du bsgreng // gung mo mnyam du bzhibs pa ni// sangs rgyas gnyis pa yin par ba shad/ 
40a2(rgyud): gung myo rin chen 'dra ba dang / gud mo pad ma 'dra bar dgug/ sangs rgyas lnga pa'i phyag rgya ni// de bzhin 'jug mo bkug pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pra yi/ rigs kyi dam tshig 'dzin
40a3(rgyud): pa yi/ phyag rgya ba cing dang dngos grub rnams// las rnams yang dgra bshad par bya// zla ba lta ba'i lag gnyis kyis// gung mo'i sor mo btang gyur pa'i// mthe bong mthe'u chung so sor bsgrung / 
40a4(rgyud): sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgreng rdo rje/ 'dzub mo lcags kyu 'dzub mor sbyor// legs so sbyin pa 'dra ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yi/ phyag rgya mang po'i dngos grub 'di// mthe bo bzhi bas ma
40a5(rgyud): 'dzub gnyis bcug/ sde spyad rdo rje rin chen yin// de nyid gung mo srin lag dang // mtho'u chung rnams ni bsnol brkyang ba'o// de nas srin lag mtho'u chung gnyis// mnyam par gshibs pa rgyal
40a6(rgyud): mtshan noHde nyid lngas ni bskor byas kyang / kha yi phyogs su bzhag pa'o// mthu bong gnyis ka mnyam pasaM ga shribs/ 'dzub mo gnyis ka bkug pa dang // de nyid gung mo bsgreng rtse mo// 
40a7(rgyud): bkug pa rdo rje'i ral gri'o// de l-Is srin lag mtha chung ba shibs// 'khor lo yin pAr bshad pa yin/ bsdams la mthe bong gnyis bkrol ba/ ba kanA te kha phyogs bzhag pa'o// mtha
40a8(rgyud): bo mebre'u chung rje sprad bkyed// las kyi rdo rje yin par bshid// de las 'dzub mo gnyisag shibs la// snying khar brgya de ste bzhag pa'o// / 'dzub mon+d+he bkug mche ba la// mthe'u chung ga shrIbs pa
40b1(rgyud): brkyang pa'o//  mthe'u chung gnyis m+bAr mthe bre gnyis// 'dzub mo gnyis kyis btsir ba'o// / snying khar m+b+hathe bong bskyams la bzhag/ rab tu brkyang ba phreng bya'o/ thul mo sbyar+ya te khA na sa dbyu kaug
40b2(rgyud): la thal sbyar spyi byor bzhig/ rdo rje bcings pa thur du blugs// rang gi thal sbyar gyen du 'thor/ mthe bong bsnyams te rab tu bsdams// rab tu brkyang nas byug pa'o// 'dzub mo gcig su bi kug pa dang
40b3(rgyud): mthe bong gnyi sa ni mdud pa dor// mthe bong 'dzub mo gdub bu rab cing / rdo rje khu tshur 'dzub mo bsdam/ de nas 'di rnams sgrub bshad de/ rdo rje sgrub pa dam pa'o// sems dpa'i rdo rje ting 'thun
40b4(rgyud): gyis/ rang gi phyag rgya snying khar bzhag/ de nas 'di rnams lus bshad pa// rdo rje las ni bla na med// rdo rje dbyings sogs phyag rgyas ni// de bzhin gshegs rnams bsdus pa yi// dkyil 'khru
40b5(rgyud): slob dpon slob mar bcas/ da ma thag tu byin gyis rlob// sems dpa'i rdo rje bcings pa ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje lcags kyu bcings pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad kun
40b6(rgyud): nas 'gugs// 'dod pa'i rdo rje'i sbyor bas ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyang minye par byed// rdo rje dga' bas rgyu la ba kun// legs so byas ni bstod par byed// rin chen rdo rje bcings pas na/ 
40b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis de dbang bskur// rdo rje nyi ma bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur// / rdo rje rgyal mtshana'i ching 'gyur bas/ ra ba kun yang rdzogs par byed// rdo rje bzhad pa'i
40b8(rgyud): tshul gyis ni// sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig bzhad// chos kyi rdo rje bcings pas na/ rdo rje rmis dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro// rdo rje ral gri thogs pas ni// nyon mongs thams cad de stsogacod 'i
41a1(rgyud): khor lce bad+d+hAn skye bas// dkyil 'khyer gyen bdag por 'igyu rje smra ba'i sbyor ba yis/ rdo rje'i drug ma/ nub par 'gyur/ sa kyi rdo rje bcings nas ni/ 
41a2(rgyud): rno rje las dang 'ang bar 'gyur/ rdo rje gi tshwa brtan byas pas// lus ni r+d+har+N+Ne 'dra ba rdo rje mche ba'i mchog phyag rgyas// ma ru t+na saM bdud ni nges 'joms so/ rdo rje khu tshur dam
41a3(rgyud): bcings pas/ phyag rgya ku nra yang dbang du 'gyur// 'dzin las lha yi dwa ga'u ba rnams// phreng ba'i ste ni rgyan gyis rnams// klu yis rtag tu skad gIny+dzA la bA/ g+har gyi mchod pa rnyid por 'gyur/ 
41a4(rgyud): bdug pas 'jig rten tshim par byed// mr-i tig gis ni mdzes pa'i gzugs// mar mes snang ba dag pa nyid// dI yis lha rdzas dri cin du'i// rdo rje lcags kyi 'gugs pa ste// rdo rje zhags pa
41a5(rgyud): 'jug par byed// rdo rje'i lcags sgrog bcing ba ste// rdo rje drilta bu 'bebs pa'o// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// badz+rA dz+nyA na sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje dbyibs ni brtan par byed// 
41a6(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// chos kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin// sa ma yaM s+t+waM zhes brjod na// phyag rgya kun gyi dbang por 'gyur// a nA ya sA zhes brjod na/ gdon mi za bar thams
41a7(rgyud): cad 'gugs/ a ho su khe zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas kun kyang mnyes par 'gyur// sa dus dA nis smras na// legs pa'i tshig gis de dgar byed// sa ma hA da tam zhes skyes na// sangs
41a8(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyi dbang bskad thob// rU pa d+yo t+ye zhes smras na// chos kyi gzi brji de nyid du 'gyur ste/ ar thaM pra ba thi zhes smras na// ra ba kun ni rdzogs par bai/ hA hra hUM he zhes brjod na/ 
41b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'dzum po rnyed par 'gyur// / sauR+YA kA ri zhes smras ni/ mi yi bya ba rnams kyang spyod// d+hU khyAr+g+ha d+ha zhes smras na// de ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod/ khyud d+ha bo d+hi zhes sprostan// hU~M/ 
41b2(rgyud): 'khor kun gyi bdag por 'gyu ti shru ta nas smras na// sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan cig smra/ suM bA shing tam+be zhes smras na/ kun gyi dpung ldan par 'gyur/ ni ra ba yA stam zhes smras na/ 
41b3(rgyud): mya sh+log tu 'jigs med 'gyur/ shAtrUM pak+Sha zhes smras na// dgra rnams thams cad za bAr+ya 'gyur// saR+YA si dwi zhes smras na// sangs rgyas grub pa nyid du 'gyur// ma hA r+ya tisA l+yA yi dwaga'u// 
41b4(rgyud): pau sho b+has gzugs bzung nyid// shI ta smr-i khyabade ba sbyin// saR+YA pu tsasA legs mcho de nyid/ prA ha da ni yid bdir 'gyur/ pha la zhes pas 'brus blo thog/ suM tA dza kI gzi brjid che/ 
41b5(rgyud): suM gan d+ha g+ning mchog nyid// a yi hi dzAsi 'gugs par byed// oM yU hi hUM 'jug par byed// he s+tho ta baM 'ching bar byed/ gar+b+ha TA a a rA ba bskyod do// de nas de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag
41b6(rgyud): rgyu sgrub pa dge ba ba shA/ lce la rdo rje dge bsgoms na/ las rnams b+h+rUM ma smi rnyed byed por 'gyur// de nas lus kyi phyog rgyu ba cing ba bshad de// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te// maunya
41b7(rgyud): pa gzhog pas gnyis su bya// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// de nas btsod du rib tu ba shi // g.yon pa'i rdo rje 'dzub mo ni/ ga sa pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya// byang chub mchog gi phyug
41b8(rgyud): sa rgyas rnams kyad sbyin d+ha ky-i/ mi s+ho las gleg/ de bzhi chen jog /  dag med nagadzin mi mi ga
42a1(rgyud): \u0f7fm+b+hadI nasa? phyis kyi phyag rgya rnams/ mdorA sngas rab tu bshad pa ra bau// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams// rdo rje'i las rnams byed pa ste/ bsgyangs bcas gsor ba
42a2(rgyud): g+hanyis ka yis/ lcags kyu 'dzin lngar gnas pa dang // mda' 'phang ba'i tshu l-I dang ni// lcags so zhes pa snying kha ra bzhag// dbang bskor ba ni rdo rje gAny+tsis// sti khA ra nyi ma brtan par bya/ 
42a3(rgyud): g.yon pa lA ni gru mo gzugs/ da dra zhin kha phyogs bskor bAr bya/ g.yas pA yis ni g.yon pa dbyA/ snying kha g.yon pas ral gr-i bAdA / 'gal ma'i 'khoR+Sha lo bskor ba dang // rdo rje
42a4(rgyud): gnyis kA Sha nas 'byung // rdo rje gar bskor dgrol ba yi// thal mo sbyar ba spyi bor bzhag/ gau cha mthu'u chung mche ba mchogakhu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o// rdo rje 'gying ba'i tshul gyis su
42a5(rgyud): bsam pa g.yos pas gdud par bya// phreng ba bcing dang kha nas dbyung // rdo rje ga ra ni bskor ba yin/ rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni/ bdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyin// sangs rgyas kun la
42a6(rgyud): mchod pa yi// phyag rgya'i mchod po byed pa'o// / 'dzub mo lcags kyi bcing ba ni// mtha' lus te lcags kyu cha// khrig ma mdud byas 'dzub gnyis gdub// rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnams te ga nAn/ 
42a7(rgyud): de nas 'di rnams sgrub pa bshad// rdo rje las ni byed dang mnyam// rdo rje kun dngos rdo rje ni/ sgying khAr yongs su bsgom par bya/ de nas 'di rnams las phyag rgya'i// rdo rje las ni rnam
42a8(rgyud): maye shes khu tshur bcings pas ni// sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur/ mi g.yo ba yi bcings pas ni// yid ni g.yo ba myed par 'gyur/ rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yis
42b1(rgyud): / gzhan la phan byed ldan par 'gyur// dam chos 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ mi 'jigs mchog gis myur ba ra ni/ sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ 
42b2(rgyud): rdo rje 'gyings pas brtan byas pas// rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba rnyed// rdo rje lcags kyis skad cig tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun kyang 'gugs/ rdo rje mda' yis rdo rje yi/ lha mo'ang
42b3(rgyud): mnyes par bdag nyid byed// rdo rje dga' byas rgyal ba kun// legs so zhes pa'i tshig gis dgas// rdo rje chen po nor bu bcings// ston pa rnams kyis de dbang bsgyur// rdo rje nyi ma bcings
42b4(rgyud): pus+ya ni hwA rdo rje nyi maM 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas ni// da ni ran tshun char yang 'u ba bas/ rdo rje 'dzum pa bcings pas ni// sangs rgyas 'dra bI Da myur bzhad 'gyur/ 
42b5(rgyud): / rdo rje'i me tog bcings pas ni// rdo rje tshwa sa? ni de yis 'thob// rdo rje ral gri brtan bcings na// de yi sdug bsngal thams cad gcod// / rdo rje 'khor lo btsongs pas na/ chos kyi 'khor
42b6(rgyud): bskor bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshig rnams ni// rdo rje bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje go chus lus
42b7(rgyud): bcings byas// rdo rje'i snying po thob par 'gyur// / rdo rje mchi ba bcings pas ni// rdo rje nyid kyang bdag gis choms/ rdo rje khu tshu ra kun 'phrog cing / oM/ phyag rgya grupa pa kun kyang rAd// rdo
42b8(rgyud): 'dzin mas dga' ba sbyin// rdon phreng ba sgra gi zugs pabyeng pa// don gyu yis glu stan rdorjegi rigs rlubang du byed/ 'dug bla mas ni srid chis / me tig gi sa ni rgyan ni nas
43a1(rgyud): ts+tsha/ ma ru me yis ni gzi chen po/ rdo rje'i dri ni dri rab ldan/ rdo rje'i lcags kyus 'gugs pa ste/ rdo rje'i zhags pa 'jug pa'o// / rdo rje'i lcags sgrog gis ni 'ching / 
43a2(rgyud): rdo rje dri lta bu bskyod pa'o// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i tshi ga rgyas par bshad de// de la thog ma nyid du rdo rje bcing ba'i sor mo snying khyur brdab par bya ste snying po 'di brjod do// 
43a3(rgyud): badz+ra b+han d+ha tra thaM/ de nas phyag rgya brjid pa kun rang gi lusau dang ngag dang sems rdo rje'i dbang du 'gyurarA ro// de nas rdo rje dab byaM pa'i dam tshig gi pyak+ka rgya bats+yait+tasmA pA'i snying po 'di brjod do// AH
43a4(rgyud): de nas yang dag par babs nas grogs pa nyid du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya'i dam tshig sems dpa' chen po rjes su dran par byA ste snying po 'di brjod do// ma hA sa mA yA sa ta hAM/ 
43a5(rgyud): 'dis phyag rgya thams cad 'grub ste/ phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// dri nas spyi'i cho ga rgyas pa'i sgrub pa rgyas par bshad do// dri la thog ma kho nar rang gi phyag rgya ba cing se
43a6(rgyud): nasaH rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpar bdog snying po 'dri sgom mo/ !/ su mA ya hau/ de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpar bsgoms nas/ !sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab po// sau mya ya satwa A d+hiH
43a7(rgyud): tiSh+Tha sa mAM// de nas bsgrub par bya'o// sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// // de nas dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad de/ de la thog ma ra ru shig dngos grub 'dod na snying po 'di yin no// / AR+Sh+ya
43a8(rgyud): sid d+hi'adis phyag rgya grub par 'dod na/ nor chen po bskyed par byed do// de nas rdo rje grub par 'dod na snying po 'di yin no// badz+ra sid d+hi/ 'dis ni 'dod pa bzhin du dngos grub 'grub par
43b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro de nas rigs 'dzin gyi grub pa 'dod na snying po 'di yin no// badz+ra pa d+ya d+ha ra si de d+hI/ 'dis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rig 'dzin grub po/ de nas dam pa grub par 'dod na/ rang gi
43b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i snying pos sgrub po/ dngos grub gyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i rang bzhin du rang gi lus dang / sgra dag dang sems rdo rjer bya ba'i cho ga rgyas par bshad de/ nam phyag
43b3(rgyud): rgya'i byin ba rlabs lhod par gyur tam bdag gtong bar 'dod na/ de nas snying po 'dis brtan par bya'o// // oM badz+ra sa twa sa ma yi/ ma nu pA la lo// badz+ra sa twa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-id+ho me b+ha wA/ 
43b4(rgyud): su tauHmaM b+ha wa/ a nu rag to maM b+ha wa/ su pro dz+ha maM d+hA wa/ saR+Wa sid d+him pra yats+tsha swar+Ya karma su tsom/ ni stAsh+tse ya ku r-in+daha ha hAhAs+ho/ b+hU ga wo nasaR+YA tathA gaH/ badz+ra ma ma munaH/ 
43b5(rgyud): b+ha wA ma hA sa ma ya sa ta a~M/ 'dis ni mtshams med pa byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus pa dang / dam pa'i chos la smod pa dang / nyes pa thams cad byis pa yang
43b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa pos/ rdo rje sems dpa' brtan par gyur pas/ tshe 'di nyid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad dam/ dngos grub dam pa'am/ rdo rje'i
43b7(rgyud): dngos grub pam/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub bam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi bar du myur du 'thob bo zhes/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas
43b8(rgyud): gsungs smo de nas phyag rgya thams cad dgrolta ba'i spyi'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad do// de la zlog ma nyid du phyag rgya thams cad gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nas snying po 'dis dgrol lo// oM badz+ra mu/ de
44a1(rgyud): @nas sbyiHkha nas byung ba rin po che rdo rje'i phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na gnas pas dbang bskur to// 'dzub mo gnyis kyis phreng ba bskor zhing bcings nas/ dri
44a2(rgyud): bzhin du gau nan+tat+ka sI ngib+h+yo 'disra bcing ngo // ai badz+ra rAd Na A b+hi Shi na tsa/ tisaR+YA mu tra ma tr-i ku ru ba ra ka pra tsa na baM/ de nas yang go cha'i phreng ba bcings pa patang la thal mo mnyam par bsdams te
44a3(rgyud): snying po 'dis mnyes par bya'o/ badz+ra d+ha sh+ye ho/ che ga 'dis phyag rgya rnams dkrol ba dang / ! bcing ba dang / mnyes par byas na/ rdo rje lta bur gyur ro// yang na rdo rje sems dpes kyang
44a4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i ldan gcig bzlas// ji ltar 'dod pa bdag bde bar// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin// zhes bcom
44a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kun du bzang pos gsungs so// / rdo rje sems stsogs sems dpa' rnams// sgrub pa dang ni las kun la// 'dir ni tsau dgar bzlas na ni// rtog pa kun las dngos grub
44a6(rgyud): thob snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams// ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshul gyis ni// rtog pa las bshad rang byas pa'am// sgrub pa 'dir ni thams cad do// de nas gasnang ba'i mchod pa
44a7(rgyud): rgyu rjo kyirdorje bskyed pa 'dis glu blangs te/ gsang bya'i mchod pa bzhi pa/  rdo rje sems dung bam+b+has b+hAn/ rdo rje rin chen blun myedardorje chos ni myur blings pas/ 
44a8(rgyud): rdo rje las kun byed par 'gyur// de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje bstod pa'i glu 'di nyid kyis/ rdo rje ga rilag pa gzhibs pas gas bri bya'o// bdug spos la sdigs pa'i
44b1(rgyud): mchod pa byas te// de nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor du bdug pa la stsogs pas mchod pa byas te/ mchod pa de dag rang rang gi gnas su bzhag go/ de nas thams cad ci nus pas mchod ces skye
44b2(rgyud): naMsad+h+r-i de bzhin gshegs pa b+h+ra sa tsad lA ga s+yol+yA to/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bdug spos la sogs pas mchod pa byed du bcug la/ ji ltar zhugs pa rnams ci 'byor ba'i rI dang khwa zas
44b3(rgyud): la sogs pa thams cad dang / oM dkyil 'khoran chen po raM phul ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis mgu bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rdo rje'i brtul shugs 'di sbyin no// 
44b4(rgyud): 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje sems dpa'i lkog na 'dugakhyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu btsung / phyag na rdo rje'i brtulwa shugs bar+t+ta na/ !/ oM saR+Wa ta thA gI tA sAd d+hi badz+ra sa mA yi tiSh+Tha
44b5(rgyud): oM sha taM d+ha ra ya mi badz+ra sata hi hi hi hi hUM// de nas thams cad su lA yang maM smA shr-ig ces sgo zhing mna'i snying po yang bstan no// / da nAs ji lta re zhugs pa rnams slarA ba kye ste/ de bzhin
44b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab la/ sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la kha gyen du bstan te/ snying po 'di bzlas shing bkrol nas/ oM khyed kyis sems can don kun
44b7(rgyud): mdzad/ rjes su 'thun pa'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du bzhud par mdzod// slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol/ oM badz+ra satwA muH/ dwe ltar dkyil 'khor
44b8(rgyud): thams cad la bya'o// dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya rnams kyang dkrol bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po lngas// 
45a1(rgyud): dbyings kyi dkyil 'khyon chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzungs dam
45a2(rgyud): rlig las d+h+yah+ma ba zhes ba bA/ tI ngange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugasnga ma thag tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs lasa?/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
45a3(rgyud): nyid terje rje 'dzin de nyid kyi gzugs 'dzin pa kun du 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cod kyang bzhin
45a4(rgyud): gshegs pa rdo rje'i gzungs kyi ye shes bsgrubs ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshug gi phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dbyings
45a5(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la bkod de/ chad du brjod pa 'di chud du brjod do/ a ma'o gang phyir byang chub sems// sems can kun la
45a6(rgyud): phran bzhed pa/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis dpa' bo gang // bud med gzugs su'ang mdzod par gyur/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje'i byin
45a7(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra d+hA tu shA ri hUM badz+rA ni hUM/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma g.yo
45a8(rgyud): bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje semasad pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig
45b1(rgyud): pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra badz+ri ni hUM/ dra nas de bzhin ga shegs pa rin chen 'byung bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag
45b2(rgyud): rgyu'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lda snyoms par zhugasra te/ oM kr-i rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM rA na badz+ra hU~MH/ de nas dri bzhin gshogs
45b3(rgyud): pa tshe dpag med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thums cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ste/ rang gi rig
45b4(rgyud): pa'i mchog 'di smras pa// oM d+harma badz+ri Ne hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i
45b5(rgyud): 'khor lo dkyil 'khoru ban gyis bArlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms paru zhags te/ ra gi reg pa'i mchog 'di smras pa// oM karma badz+ri ni hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
45b6(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do// oM badz+ra sata gu h+ya sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya badz+ra a~M kuM shI hUM/ oM badz+ra gu
45b7(rgyud): h+ya rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya badz+ra sa d+hu sha ri hUM// kun du bzang mo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcags kyi mo dang / dga' ba la chags ma dang / legs ldan ma s+t+waM/ 
45b8(rgyud): rdo rje'i gzungs chen mo rnams so// oM badz+ra gu h+ya ni nas mo ye hUM/ oM badz+ra guh+ya prA ba~M hU~M/ oM gu h+ya dA dza a gra he hUM/ oM gr-i h+ya badz+ra has badz+ri hUM// rin po che'i rtse mo dang / rin mo che'i smon
46a1(rgyud): myu dang / rgyal mnan gyi rtse myo'i dpung rgyan ma dang / ba nad pa dang ldan pa rnams te/ rdo rje rin po che'i gzungs rnams so// oM badz+radz+rA d+harma guh+ya sa mA ye hUM/ 
46a2(rgyud): badz+ra ko sha ku rbe dz+dza/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya maN+Da Da le hU~M/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya dza pa sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje pad mo dang / kun 'dzin ma dang / 'khor lo thams cad ma dang / stong du bzlos ma ste/ chos kyi
46a3(rgyud): gzungs rnams so// oM badz+ra gu h+ya kar+m+ma sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya ka ba tsenAM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya dr-iSh+TA d+ha ra ni hU~M/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya mu s+t+ri b+h+rUM/ dngos grub kyi rtse mo dang / thams cad bsrung ma dang / 
46a4(rgyud): mdangs slar 'phrog ma dang / gzungs kyi phyag rgya ste/ thams cad kyi gzungs rnams so// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa'i chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
46a5(rgyud): / gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po rnams bshad do// oM gu h+ya sa ta badz+ri hUM/ oM gu h+ya radra na badz+ri hU~M/ oM guM h+ya d+harma badz+ri hUM/ oM gu h+ya krarma badz+ra hUM/ rdo rje pha rol du phyin ma de
46a6(rgyud): dag nyid la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi gzungs spyod pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams te/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por
46a7(rgyud): 'byar ba dang bcas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug par gzhag go// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gaskyang ba'i mchod pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad
46a8(rgyud): do&.oM badz+ra gu h+ya ni ra t+ya pA tsa sa ma ye saR+Wa pA tsi pra bA ra ta na ya hUM/ oM badz+ra guh+ya a bi she ka pA tsa sa ma yai saR+Wa pA tsa pra ba ra ta na ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya gi ta pA tsa sa ma ye saR+YA pA tsa~M pr-i ba ra ta ya hUM/ 
46b1(rgyud): oM badz+rA gu h+ya ni ra t+ya pA tsa sa ma ye saR+Wa pU dzAM pra ba ra ta ya hUM/ rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa de dag nyid de 'bar ba dang / bcas pa rang gi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa rnams 'khor lo'i dkyil
46b2(rgyud): 'khor gyi grwa rnams su dgod do// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ rdo rje
46b3(rgyud): dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje dbyings ni zhus bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni// spangs
46b4(rgyud): rgya sa phyag rgya bri bar bya// mchod rten khril legs 'dug pa// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad/ khri yi steng du rdo rje sogs// rdo rje thugs zhes brjod po'o// rdo rje rin tshun khI yi skyed/ 
46b5(rgyud): rang gi dbang ni bskur pra ra pa shrad// rdo rje pad mo khI yI steng // mtshon cha zhes ni bya ba ra pa shrad// las kyi rdo rje'i khri yi steng // rdo rje kun zhes bya bA ra bA shada?/ pad ma'i steng du bri bA ni/ 
46b6(rgyud): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor brtan pa'o// khwa yi steng du rdo rje bri// lcags kyu 'greng ba gnyis de bzhin// rdo rje rdo rje les skyes pa// legs par sbyin pa gnyis te bzhin// rin chen 'od zer
46b7(rgyud): 'bar bar bya// nyi ma'i phyag rgya'ang de bzhin ni// rgyal mtshan rtse mo'ang 'bar bar bcas// rdo rje gnyis par so yi phreng // rdo rje dbus su pad mo bI// ral gri 'bar bcas de bzhin
46b8(rgyud): no/ rdo rje'akhor mo rdo rje'i rtsibs// 'bar ba'i 'od zer can gyi lce// rdo rje kun du rtse mo dang // go ma rdo rje yang dag ldan// rdo rje mche ba yang dag bri// lag gnyis khu tshur phyag rgyar bya/ 
47a1(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs bri// dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du// mtshan mA'i phyag rgya bri ba ni// rdo rje 'dzin sogs dkyil 'khor du// phyi rol du yang
47a2(rgyud): rigs par rang gi mtshan ma rnams kyang bri// byams pa la sogs rang gi mtshan// ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bri// de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug pa la sogs pa'i
47a3(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa yin te de la thog mar rdo rje sleb dpon gyis sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings te 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas lan gcig bskor te phyok+ka rgyud bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la
47a4(rgyud): phul te \u0f7fDI rang gi snying khar chu lnga bzhin du dkrol te/ sgo bzhir rdo rje lcags kyi la sogs pas dzI lta bI'i las rnams byas te phyir byung ngo phyir byung nas kyang rdo rje slob ma rnams rdo rje dbyings kyi
47a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen por bzung ba'i tshul du bzung ngo // de nas btsud nas dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mtshan ma 'tshang bas g.yogs la byin no// rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes
47a6(rgyud): bslab pa de la dang por re shig gsang ba'i lus kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rkang lag thul mo sbyar nas kha/ glal zhing rdo rje bsgoms byas
47a7(rgyud): naHrdo rje ma yang chags par byed// dpung po bskum pa'i lcags kyu dang // mgo la rdo rje bsgom por bya// lag pA yis ni 'bod byed pa// lcags kyu ma yang 'gugs par byed// 
47a8(rgyud): mda' 'phen ma yi tshul gyis ni// gal zhing snying khar 'phangs pa ni/ nyid kyi rdo rje dga' ma yangabadud kyi tshul gyis mnyes par byed/ bdag gi lus kyi snying kha ru/ 
47b1(rgyud): go cha'i tshul gyis ni// dpung pa snol mar bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang bsrung bar byed// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// / badz+ra ra gA yA to/ badz+re A gu
47b2(rgyud): shA dz+raHbadz+ra ma rA ma rA ya phuT// badz+ra ban d+ha rak+Sha haM// / de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i lta ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// rdo rjeHchags pas ni// / dga' bas mig ni rab tu bgra daM/ 
47b3(rgyud): de yis bud med bltas pas ni// rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ba yin// rab tu myur bar mig bskul zhing / mig gi rdzi ma 'gugs byed pa// lta ba gzi can yin par bshad// 'ag
47b4(rgyud): pa thams cad 'gugs byed pa'o// khro gnyer gnyer mA rab bsdus pa// khro bo'i mig ni btsum pa ste/ khro bo'i lte ba byas nas ni/ khams gsum yang ni 'jig par byed/ 
47b5(rgyud): rapU rI yi brag 'dra ba rA// brtan pas 'dzums pa med pa'i mig/ byams pa'i lta ba yin par ba shwadwa// nad dang gau don dang dug sol to// de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po 'di dag
47b6(rgyud): yin no/ badz+re dISh+Ti maT aM gu sha dza/ kro ta driSh+Ti haM/ dwid+hA d+hiSh+Tha tra dau// / de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// ho ho ho ho zhes sgra smi na/ sgra dang bral
47b7(rgyud): bas de ma thagasems can kun ni 'gro bar byed// de ni rdo rje tshig gsal ba'i// dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nyA dzA zhes brjod na/ khro bo'i tshig ni gsal ba ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra ba yi// skye bo kun
47b8(rgyud): kun kyang 'gags par byed/ hUM hUM hUM hU~M zhes brjod na// tshig tu brjod pa gsal ba yis// ri rab dang ni 'dra ba'o// sems can kun la bdud byed do// ha~M haM haM haM zhes smra na// 
48a1(rgyud): // zla ba'i tshig ni gsal bri ste/ 'jig rten 'di kun bsrung byed pa// rdo rje bdag nyid rgyal ba'ang bsrung // de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra ho ba
48a2(rgyud): badz+ra hUM badz+ra haM// de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom
48a3(rgyud): byas ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du byed// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// rdo rje snying po bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom byas na// phyag na rdo rje
48a4(rgyud): 'gugs par byed// rnam pa thams cade michog ljon pa'i// rdo rje spyan ni bdag nyid la// bdog nyid kyis ni bsgom byas na// chos rnams thams cad des bsdud byed// rnam
48a5(rgyud): pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// rdo rje thams cad badrag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom byas na// rdo rje thams cad de sa bsrung ngo // de la snying po 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra
48a6(rgyud): pA ni b+hi sha mo na ya saR+Wa bud+d+ha ho// badz+ra gar+b+ba badz+ra pa ni ma shrI g+h+raM a ka ra sha ya hUM dzAdz+nyA/ badz+ra ne tra sarba d+harma na ma ra ya hUM phaT/ badz+ra bI sha rak+Sha saR+Wa badz+ra na haM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i
48a7(rgyud): ye shes bslab po// bdag gis bdag gi snying kha ra ni// sems dpa'i rdo rje bcings byas la// rdo rje'i lta bas bltas nas ni/ 'gro ba thams cad gdab par byed// bdag gis
48a8(rgyud): bdag gi snying khar ni// rin chen rdo rje bcings byas la// 'bar ba'i lta bas bltas nas ni// thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur/ bdag gis bdag gi snying kha ra ni// chos
48b1(rgyud): kyi rdo rje bcings byas la// khro ba'i lta bas bltas nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad des bsdud byed// bdag gisu bdag gi snying khAr ni/ las kyi rdo rje bcings byas la/ byams pa'i
48b2(rgyud): lhubs bltas nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad bsrung bar byed// de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// // badz+ra guh+Na sa ma ya oM/ badz+ra gu h+yas ma ya
48b3(rgyud): badz+ra gu h+ya sa ma ya hUM/ badz+ra gu h+Na sA ma ya hU~M/ de nas rdo rje gsang bya'i phyag rgya chen po bcings po bslab po// rdo rje bral mo las byung ba// gsang ba chen po rab tu bshad/ phyag rgya
48b4(rgyud): chen po myed ri bsdus pa// de dag gnu bcing pa bshang+ga// mthe bo gnyis ni bsnol byas lnga// 'dzub mo rtse mo dkug nas ni// gung mo bsnams pa'i tshigs su sbyar// rdo rje
48b5(rgyud): kyi dbang mor ba shid// de nyi dgung mo rdo rjer bya// gung mo gnyis nu nor bur bya// pad mor srin lag mthe'u chung gung // lag pa'i so ri mo rab tu brkyang // 'dzub mo rdo rje 'dzub gnyis
48b6(rgyud): de nyid mthe bo gnyis kyis spras// legs pa sbyin dang 'dzub rin chen// 'dzub mo rin chen can 'od 'bur// srin lag gshibs la mthe'u rini che ni/ zhid nyid yongs su bskor ba'o// 
48b7(rgyud): kun gyi kye mo rab tu bkyed// mthe bu mthe'u chung bar drug zhug/ sor mo rab tu 'khor lor brgyad// de nyid kyang ni kha nas dpyang // mthe bo brgyang ni rdo rjer dga'// 'dzub ma
48b8(rgyud): banyin ma na na du sa/ sa nga sa phy-id mas// dasasan du rdzu ga/  rdzogs pa na/  sags rna
49a1(rgyud): @ba'ang mtshan rnams ni// thal mo nang du bkug pas so// las kyi gsang ba nang nas ni// mtshan mas lngas su bstan pa'o// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// chos kyi phyag
49a2(rgyud): rgya mdor bshad pa// a dz+nyA ho swa/ oM aM/ traM ha/ hri d+haM/ maM r-i kiM haM hUM baM/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya gnyis byas nas// las kyi phyag rgya rnams su bya// dam tshig mchog gi ji snyed pa// gnyis su
49a3(rgyud): phral nas de bzhin no// de nas 'di rnams sgrub pa bshad// sa ma ya sti zhes smras zhing / bdag gi bcings pas bslabs pa ni// 'dod la chags pa bde ba'i bdag/ 'di rnams lhag par gcig
49a4(rgyud): kyang ni/ dus kun du ni bcing mi bya// gsang ba'am ni 'dod chen la// mkhas pa yis ni sbyar bar bya// 'di rnams kun la bdag nyid gnas// rang phyung rnams kyi lha mo brtan// sgrub pa
49a5(rgyud): rnams la rab chags na// rang gi bdag po btang nge re// de nas phyag rgya 'di bcing ba la sogs pa'i las yin no// bdag gam 'on te gzhan la'ang rung // rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni// snying por
49a6(rgyud): byas pa 'di yis ni// 'ching ngam 'ching du bcug kyang rung // badz+ra hU~M ban d+ha/ de nas dgol ba yin no// mdo ran phyag rgya thams cad ni// snying por bya ba 'di nyid kyis// gang dang gang nas byung ba
49a7(rgyud): yide dang de nas dgrol bar bya// oM bid+d+ha mu/ dri nas brtan pari bya ba yin te/ rin chen rdo rjes brtan byas te// snying kha nas ni spyi bor dgrol// 'dzub mo gnyis ni go chab cing // snying
49a8(rgyud): por bya ba 'di nyid ngo // yo brjod byab drug pa'iH/ de nas paning nga'i dam tshig yin no// ji ltar gnas pa rnams su dgrol// cho ga yos ni brtan par byas// thal mo brdabs pas kun
49b1(rgyud): sbyar bsnying por bya ba 'di nyid do// oM gu h+ya sa ma ya tA lu sa/ rdo rje sems dpa' ji dgar bzlas/ dkyil 'khor dang ni las kun la// dus 'di nyid du sbyar bar bya// thams cad sgrub par
49b2(rgyud): byed pa'i mchog// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las// rdo rje gsad pa'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs s+ho// / de nas
49b3(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'phra mo'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi byin brlabs zhes bye ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rang gi
49b4(rgyud): rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM su k+Sho badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor
49b5(rgyud): byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra sa twa su k+ShA dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de na bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas
49b6(rgyud): de bzhin gsheg cad kyi rin po che'i ye shes phra mo 'dim tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms prar zhugs nas/ rlung gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra
49b7(rgyud): ra da na su k+Sha dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/  nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag ta med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i chos kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkal 'a khor byin gyis brlabs pa
49b8(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa mtshig 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra d+harma suk+Sh+ma dz+nyA na sa mA yi hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin
50a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i
50a2(rgyud): mchog 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra karma su kA dz+nyA na swa mya ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam pa rA snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje zhes bya
50a3(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom smra par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nyid kyi chen/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs khA nas rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i 'od zer
50a4(rgyud): rnams byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shos phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa
50a5(rgyud): brtan par byas te/ yang gcig tu 'das nas ting nge 'dzin gyi kau shes kyi rdo rje'i skur dmigs te gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam paru
50a6(rgyud): smang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dri bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi thugs su zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye
50a7(rgyud): shes phra mo'i drim tshig tshon po'i rdo rje 'di skyes pa/ suk+Sh+ma badz+rA/ de nas 'di sgras ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid byung
50a8(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams skad kyi shangs kyi rtse ma'i phyogs su gnas
50b1(rgyud): nas/ ched du brjod pa 'ang ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje phra mo bdag ste che// gang phyir phra yang che ba'i phyir// khams gsum yang ni rgyas myur byed/ 
50b2(rgyud): nas de skad ces snas dang / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs nas rab tu phra mo'i rdo rje ye shes kyi mtshan ma rgyas par
50b3(rgyud): bya ba'i sbyor bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku des khyab par byas nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par bya ba'i tshul gyi nam mkha'i khams thams cad tu rab tu phra ba'i rdo rje'i
50b4(rgyud): ye shes kyi mtshan ma rnams kyis khyab par byas so// na mo mkha'i dbyings thams cad khyab par byas nas/ de bzhin ga sh+logs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid kyis byin
50b5(rgyud): gyis brlabs te 'dug go/ de nas de nyid kyi che na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i chos nyid du dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
50b6(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo'i byi ni gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje de las/ de bzhin gshegs
50b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo // oM badz+rA ni bI ta thA ga ta hUM/ de nas de byung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin
50b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur zhugs nas/ thugs khar rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur nas gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de las ye shes chen po'i
51a1(rgyud): @snying po 'di ba'i nga ngo // badz+ra Ad ma ke ha~M hri la badz+ra a gra sha NI/ tiSh+Tha rAg badz+ra pra be sha hrid+ha sa ma/ a ho bar+d+ha du sti/ rje rje sems dpa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dpa/ de bzhin
51a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsdu ba'i byin gyi brlabs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang // dga' ba chen po'i ye shes kyi
51a3(rgyud): phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po rnams so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mo 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang gi thugs
51a4(rgyud): suM zhugs te/ snying kha'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid kyis byin gyis pa rlabs to zhugs so// de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi phyung ngo // badz+ra rA da na aud mA kaM/ hrI daM ya brdza s+yA r+ya/ taiSh+Tha
51a5(rgyud): badz+ra da dzA gra gr-i hri da ya badz+ra hA sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshes
51a6(rgyud): thA ma sa ts+tshang+ga rI ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dga' ba shugs 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
51a7(rgyud): kyi rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas yong phyag na rdo rjes ye shes phra mos 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang gi snying khir rdo rje snying por zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas
51a8(rgyud): bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di banizhi phyung ngo // badz+rI a dam ke/ hr-id ya badz+ra ka sha/ s+t+ri swA badz+ra tsakle hId yai prA bi shi/ badz+rI dzI hA oM ka~M d+h+ri da ma// chos thams cad mnyam
51b1(rgyud): pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi phyag rgya dang / 'khor lde chen por 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshig
51b2(rgyud): spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ting nge 'dzin to// de nas yang phyug na rdo rjes rang gi snying po rdo rje thugs kha'i rdo rje las byung nas/ ye shes phra mor 'dug
51b3(rgyud): pa'i tshul gyis rang gi snying kha rdo rje skyed der zhugs nas yang rdo rje shin du phra mo'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs so// de nas phra mo'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi phyung ngo // saR+Sha
51b4(rgyud): badz+ra ad ma kro/ hri dA ya badz+ra ka pa tsa/ ti ste badz+ra yak+Sha hri da ya/ badz+rA mr-isti hri da yo/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi sna tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / thub par dka'
51b5(rgyud): ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / bdud thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'chang ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin
51b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rab tu phra bo'i ye shes kyi mtshan mas khyab pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
51b7(rgyud): las byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje'i skur gyur nas/ de nas yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi skur gyur te/ rang rang gi mtshan ma
51b8(rgyud): nyid kyi thugs khar bzhag nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bkod pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ rang gi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhig ste bzhugs so// 
52a1(rgyud): Sh+T+r-ihrIde nas yang ldeg na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi shes kyi mngon par shes pa sgrub pa'i phyir/ rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di
52a2(rgyud): bshad de/ de nas rab tu shad bya ba// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas ni// rdo rje phra mo zhes bshad de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// sems dpa'
52a3(rgyud): po rnams kyang bzhag/ rdo rje'i dbus su sangs rgyas bri// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rnams su yang // sems dpa' chen po rnams bri zhing // de bzhin thags khyer nyid phyag rgya// ting nge 'dzin du
52a4(rgyud): bzhugs pa dang // phyag gnyis rdo rje bcings pa bcings// de nas rdo rje phra mo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khon 'dir 'gags pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du gzhug pa
52a5(rgyud): la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ ye shes kyi mtshan ma lag tu byin nas// rang gi sems las su rung bar bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab pa'o// l+le ni rkan la sbyar bya zhing // sna yi rtse mor
52a6(rgyud): bsam bya ba// rdo rje phra mo bde reg pas// sems ni mnyam par gzhog par 'gyur// rdo rje phra mo bde reg pa// mtshan mo gal te byung ba na// mtshan ma de ni khyab bya ba// sems do kun du khyab par bya// 
52a7(rgyud): ji tsam 'dod par sems khyab nas// khams gsuM du yang khyab par 'gyur// de nas yang dag bsdu ba ni// sna yi rtse mo'i bar du gnas// de nas shin du mnyam par gnas// gang yang rung sti bsgom bya ba/ 
52a8(rgyud): de dag thams cad brtan par 'gyur// ting 'dzin shes pa brtags pa'o// de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no// smug s+the badz+ra/ s+pha ra na badz+ra/ saM hi r-I badz+re/ badz+ra di d+ha tiSh+Tha/ sems dpa' gang gis
52b1(rgyud): byams pa ni// mnyam 'gyur brtan pa chen po ni// sems kyi khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni// sems can kun la des khyad pa// byams pas khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni// snying rje can ni gang yin pa// sems can
52b2(rgyud): kun don ldan pa yis// sgrub pa yis ni khyab par bya// kun kyang rang bzhini 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin// chos sam yang na chos ma yin// bsam pas khyab cing dga' ba ru
52b3(rgyud): 'gyur// gdul dka' ba dang mtshungs 'dra ba// sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin// de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// btang snyoms chen po goms par bya// de la snying po 'di rnams yin no// ma hA me tri
