52b4(rgyud): ya s+pha raHsaR+She shud d+ha pra mo d+ha s+phA raM/ saR+Wa sad taM sa b+ho d+ha ya/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa rjes sud+pan bI yoM shes bslab po// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogagan du// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// 'greng ngam yang ni
52b5(rgyud): 'dug kyang rung // rdo rje dbyings ni goms par bya// de bzhin du yang gnas kun du// rdo rje phra mo sbyor ba yis// mnyam par gzhag pas snying khar ni// rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sgom// ji lta ba yi rims bzhin
52b6(rgyud): du/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// phyag na rdo rje dbyibs chen po// gnas rnams kun du bsgom par bya// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas sku ni dus kun du/ ji lta ba'i glo rims bzhin// 
52b7(rgyud): mnyam par gzhug pa bsgom par bya// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra aM muM khi b+ha bA// ma hA bod+hi sA tak+ki shi/ badz+ra pa ni da rI sha ya ru baM// bu da A nu smITi bi sha/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyi sA ni// goms par
52b8(rgyud): byas dag nyid kyis// zla ba'i dbyibs su bdag nyid ni// byang chub sems kyi bdage sgom pa'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// bdag nyid rdo rje'i dbyibs gyur par// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom par
53a1(rgyud): @pa/ sems dpa' rdo rje sgom pa'o// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar / bdag nyid snying khar rdo rje sems// bdag nyid kyis ni sgom dra ba// rdo rje sems dpa' sgom pa'o// rnam pa'i
53a2(rgyud): mchog kun mchog ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag nyid ni// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba// sangs rgyas bang chub sgom pa'o// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// sa man ta ba tra A
53a3(rgyud): bI shad+ha \u0f7fsatwa badz+ra bi shi/ badz+ra sa ta sa ma d+hi dz+nyA na bi shI/ ta thA ga to haM// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos ti gsang ba'i phya rgya'i ye shes bslab po// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs
53a4(rgyud): dang mnyamak+Sha rdo rje'i tshig tu yang yang brjod/ dbang po gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar// sems can thams cad chags par byed// bdag ni rdo rje chen por mnyam// rdo rje'i tshig tu lan gcig brjod// 
53a5(rgyud): dbang po gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar// gdon mi za bar 'jig rten 'gugs// bdag ni rdo rje chos dang mnyam// rdo rje'i tshul du lan gcig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// de yis
53a6(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad 'jig/ bdag ni sna tshogs rdo rjer mnyam// rdo rje'i tshig tu ldan gcig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// las rnams thams cad des 'grub po// de nas
53a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes brlab po// rdo rje'i dbyibs su bsgom byu ba// bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku nyid du// dus
53a8(rgyud): ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar lo// snying khyer rdo rje la sogs tshogs// bsgoms na rdo rje sems
53b1(rgyud): dpa' sogs// rang gi dngos grub sbyin par byed/  na srang bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// rdo rje bcings la legs byung bar
53b2(rgyud): bcu drug rnams su bshas ste// ting nge 'dzin ni dam tshig mchog/ de rnams kyi ni bcing bshad// dkyi sod krung 'dug gan rgyal du// g.yas bcus de bzhin slar bcus pa// snying khar de bzhin
53b3(rgyud): bzhi pa ste/ rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor ro// dpral ba ra bzhag dang lhag pa dang // phrag pa dang ni dgod par sbyar/ khar bzhag snying khar ral gri dang // snying khur rgyas dang kha nas dbyung // spyi
53b4(rgyud): bo tha~Mng kha kha ra bzhag pa// 'dzub mo gnyis bkug mdA ni de bzhin// de nas gzhan yang chos kyi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// Ta k+Shi gra maT a gA/ taM ti AM aM/ tsa nr-i tiT/ d+hI Ta b+hi Ta gra sha/ ha hA bru bau
53b5(rgyud): baM baM phaT grangs// de nas chos dang las kyi mchog/ phra ba'i rdo rje can rnams bslab// ye shes khro tshur dam tshig las// gnyis su byas nas sbyar bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg
53b6(rgyud): pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa las/ rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas ya bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin
53b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i mchog gi cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i lus kyi dram tshig gi ye shes kyi byin brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di
53b8(rgyud): smras pa/ oM sarA ta thA ga ti bid+ya d+had+d+he/ a nud tar dA tse karma s+phar nas ma ye hUM// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa blan
54a1(rgyud): med pa'i mchod gi smos pas mchod pa'i lus kyi daMg gi rdo rje'i byin brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sa
54a2(rgyud): ta thA ga tA badz+ra sa sa nA ta ru pAr+tha kar+m+ma s+pha ra na sa ma ye hUM// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas
54a3(rgyud): khyab pa'i las kyi dam chog gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ra dwa na a nud tA ra pU tsa karma sA
54a4(rgyud): nas ma ye hUM/  nas de bzhin gshegs pa chu dpag tu med pas de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i chos nyid kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyis dam tshig gi
54a5(rgyud): rdo rje'i bin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM saR+Sha ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma A na ta ra pA tsa karma s+pha ra na sa ma ye hUM// de nas de bzhin
54a6(rgyud): gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i las kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
54a7(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM saR+Sha ta thA ga ta badz+ra ka rma a nung tA ra pU tsa karma stA rA na sa ma ya~M ts+tsha// de nas ying bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod kyi de bzhin
54a8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i lus kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag
54b1(rgyud): tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs lngas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa nam mkha'i dbyings kun du rgyas pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa thams
54b2(rgyud): cad kyi bkod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa/ rab 'byam gyi sprin rgya mtsho'i lha mo rnams su gyur te byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam gyi sbyin rgya mtsho rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi
54b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par bya ba dang / kun du bzang po'i spyod pa
54b4(rgyud): sgrub pa dang / byang chub chen pa'i snying por nyer 'gro ba dang / bdud thams cad gdul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba dang / de bzhin
54b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen bye bskyed pa dang // khams gsum thams cad las rnam byar rgyal bar bya ba dang / dam pa'i cho la 'khor lo bskor ba dang / sems can thams ca
54b6(rgyud): khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don byi ba la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnam sto bsta nAn sna bzhugs so// mchod pa'i sbyin rgya mtsho'i lha mo dag kya rang ni
54b7(rgyud): rgya lag pa gnyis kyis 'dzin cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la cho ga bzhin du yang dag par mchod de/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul la lag nu mu nas ched du brjod pa 'di
54b8(rgyud): tshad du brjod do// e ma tho sangs rgyas mchod nga'i bdag/ mchod pa kun ni byed pa yin// gang phyir sangs rgyas nyid meng du// sangs rgyas kun gyis/ donas yang bya na rdordzas
55a1(rgyud): @de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa la sogalas kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdo rje'i bya ba zhes bya ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// oM sAr+yA ta thA ga ta sar+b+ba ad ma nir+ya tran
55a2(rgyud): pA tsa s+pha ra na karma badz+ri ni hAM au/ aM sar+Yad thA ga ta saR+Wa ad ma niR+Sha bA na pA tsa s+pha ra na a gI dz+nyA/ oM saR+YA ta thA ga tau a da ma Nir+ya ta na a nr-i ra gau pU tsa s+pha ra na karma ba na hUM ho// oM saR+Wa ta thA ga ta ad ma Ni r+ya ta na
55a3(rgyud): sa d+hA ka ra pA tsa s+pha ra na kArma dA ti a// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' zhing bde ma dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa
55a4(rgyud): mo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgos par byed pa mo rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'o// au na ma saR+YA t+ya thA ga takra yaM a b+hi shaM ka rad na b+ho badz+ra ma na au// oM sar+b+ba
55a5(rgyud): ta thA ga ta pU t+ya b+h+yo badz+ra te dzi na dza la hi/ oM na ma saR+Wa ta thA ga tau a sha pa ri pu ra tsin+da ma ni de dzA a gre b+h+yo badz+ra da dza a gri taM/ oM nA ma saR+Wa ta thA ga ta ma hA pra ti mo d+hu ka re b+h+yo badz+ra ha sa ha/ dbang mo chen mo dang snang ba chen mo dang / 
55a6(rgyud): rin po che chen mo'i char 'bebs ma dang / rab tu dga' zhing mgu ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa'o// oM saR+YA ta thA ga ta a nu ga ta badz+ra d+harma ta sa ma ti bi stu no mi/ ma hA
55a7(rgyud): d+harma a grI hI/ oM saR+YA ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pa ra mi ta ni ra ha saM sta nau ma ma hA g+ho sha ne g+he taM/ au saR+YA ta thA ga ta tsa sha rA k+Sha pa ri berta d+hA sar+Ya su tra na ye sA no mi saR+YA maNe d+ha li hAM/ tAM.au saR+YA ta thA ga ta sa d+ha bA Sha bud+d+ha sra
55a8(rgyud): g+h+r-i ti bi ga yam/ spyan ni brjebartse bo/ ye shes chen me'i glu dang / dbyings chen po rjes su 'bring me dang / dIkyi'i 'khor thams cing du 'jug da ma dang / sngags kyi spyod pa rnams ni/ de bzhin go shegs
55b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mchod pa'o// I saR+YA ta thA ga tA dA pa pU tsa me ga swa rA na kra me ka ra ka ra/ oM swaR+YA ta thA ga ta puSh+paM pr-i swa rA nA pA tsa ka ra ki ri ki ri/ oM swaR+YA ta thA ga ta I lo kI dzA lA sma rA na pA tsa ka me
55b2(rgyud): b+ha rA b+ha raHoM saR+YA ta thA gA ta gA nA d+ha sa mr-id trasma ra na pu ka m+b+hi ku ru ku ru/ s+yams can dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po yan lag can dang / mig ldan ma dang / dwi ldan ma rnams ni de bzhin
55b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi mchod pa'o// / de nas dri bzhin gshegs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad la mchod par byed pa'i las kyi dkyila'i khor rdo rje bya ba bshad do// 
55b4(rgyud): de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// la mi kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje bya bA zhes kyang glags/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// sangs rgyas sku rnams
55b5(rgyud): bzhag par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs tshul du// lha mo phyag rgya bcos pa bri// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i dbyings 'dir gzhug par bya ba lnga sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas
55b6(rgyud): par bshad de/ de de la dang po rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis gzhug par bya ste/ bcug nas kyang 'di skad du/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
55b7(rgyud): cad kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig gis mchod pa bcu drug po 'di rnams khyod kyis nyin re zhing ci nus su gyis shigaces bsgo bar bya'o// de nas gdong g.yog
55b8(rgyud): dkrol telas kyi dkyil 'khor bstan la/ thams cad kyi mtshan ma lag pa gnyis su sbyin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mchod na// gzhan gyis mya smos kya ni dgos
56a1(rgyud): de nas byang chub chen po'i sems bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pa sa// bdug ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing // dga' bsu
56a2(rgyud): bdag ni mchod byed na// sa ste rgyas kyi ni bde ba'ang thob// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing // 'durgyu ba la sogs rab ma chod pas// mchod nas de ni/ 
56a3(rgyud): dbang yang bsgobang chub sems ni brtan bskrad pas// bdag na sangs rgas yin bsam zhing // snyan pa'i gle yis rab mchod pas// mchod na bdag par mag par 'gyur// byang chub sems
56a4(rgyud): ni brtan bskyed pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing // gar gyi mchod pas bdag mchod na// sangs rgyas kyis kyang de mchod 'gyur da la snying po ni 'di rnam se yin no// b+hang d+ha a de ma hUM/ 
56a5(rgyud): bud d+ha a b+hi Shi na tsa mi// b+hud d+ha stu ti ka ro mau// b+hud d+hi pu tsau ka ro mi// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// mchog gi
56a6(rgyud): tshul gyis phyag 'tshal zhing // de bzhini sangs rgyas kun mchod pa// rtag tu phyag byar 'os par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad bsod nams ches// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje'i skyes// rjes
56a7(rgyud): su yid rang mchod pa'i bdag/ myur du sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// lha rdzas kyis ni bdag 'bul ba'i// mchod pa kun gyis sangs rgyas rnams// mchod ni de yang
56a8(rgyud): mchod par 'gyur// lus dang ngagi sems rdo rje yi// dge ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad ni// yongs su bsngo ba'i mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de la snying po 'di
56b1(rgyud): rnams yin no/ badz+ra kA ya/ d+harma ka ya/ sad ta ka ya/ b+hud d+ha kA ya/ prA na mA mi/ u nu mo de// b+hud d+ha pU tsu pa ri na ma// de nas chos kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// chos rnams rang bzhin
56b2(rgyud): gyis 'od gsal/ ngo bo nyid kyis bzod nas dge/ chos 'di dag gi mchod pas ni// dga' ba'i bde ba thob par 'gyur// chos rnams kun ni 'dus pa yi// a zhes bya ba sgo zhes brjod// chos kyi phyag
56b3(rgyud): rgya 'di yis ni/ de ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod// 'dir ni chos rnams thams cad kyi// rgyu ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste// dam chos 'khor lo'i mchod pa yis// mchod pas chos ni 'dzin par
56b4(rgyud): 'gyur/ chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis// sgra brnyan dag dang 'dra rA bshad de// chos kyi mchod pa 'di drag gis// mchod na sangs rgyas gsung yang thob// de la 'di dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams
56b5(rgyud): yinA no/ saR+Ya shud d+ha/ sa man ta b+ha drA// d+harma tsa krA/ ni pra ban na// de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// lus dang ngagra sems rdo rje yi// rang gi rdu lA ni phra ma rnams/ 
56b6(rgyud): rdo rje'i dbyibs su bsgoms na ni// rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur du thob// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams// sangs rgyas kun du bsgoms na ni// chos kyi skur ni myur du 'gyur/ 
56b7(rgyud): lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams// rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms na ni// rdo rje sems dpar mnyam par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rangag rdul ni byam
56b8(rgyud): rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi ni skur bsgoms na// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// de lide dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra ka ya/ d+harmA kA ya/ s+yAd t+yA kA ya/ b+hu d+hA kA ya~M//  na ste gas
57a1(rgyud): ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i nyi shes bslab par bya ste/ rang 'byung la ni lus kun gyis/ mkhyud pa'i bde ba'i mchod pa ni// phul ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang // 'atsA NI gi du 'gyur// shin du chags
57a2(rgyud): ba'i sbyor pa yis/  du bsdu I bde byag sangs rgyas rnams la phul 'gyur na// rdo rje'i rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur// shin du dga' zhing bde chags pa/ bstan par gyur pa 'dra ba// sangs rgyas
57a3(rgyud): rnamaso la phul na ni// rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni many+dzam sbyor bas// kun du sbyor ba'i bde ba ni// mchod pa'i phyir ni phul bsnun// rdo rje lus dang 'dra mar 'gyur// de dag / gis sgying po ni 'di/ 
57a4(rgyud): ngadag yin no// ra ti badz+ra/ ra ga badz+ra/ pra ti badz+ra/ karma badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mchod pa'i 'phrin lus kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bskyob par bya ste// snying khar rtsi ba logs rgyab
57a5(rgyud): sbyor ba/ dpral ba la sogs de bzhin du// kha dang rna ba mgo lhag pa// spyi bo phrag pa kha rkyed bzhag/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bsgrub par bya'o// phyag
57a6(rgyud): rgyo chen po'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje bcings pa dam bcas ni// snying kha la sogs gnas tshul du// bzhag nas rgyal ba rnams mchod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i
57a7(rgyud): ye shes la bslab par bya'o// oM gra bya sA dI ro kaM naM khaM shaM hAM haM/ sha no shi sam/ las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bA// de bzhin gA shegs pa m+b+hi thams cad
57a8(rgyud): kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa la sa// rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rdo rje las zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi che ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin
57b1(rgyud): gshegs pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rtog pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa
57b2(rgyud): 'di ni dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i don du// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras dra// oM saR+YA ta thA ga ta mu ti baM// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas// de bzhin gshegs pa
57b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi rigs kyi byin gyi bai rlabs kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub
57b4(rgyud): thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po smras pa// oM badz+ra s+yA tra muSh+Ti A// de nas de bzhin gshegs pA rInra chen 'byung bas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
57b5(rgyud): cad kyi byin gyi bairlabs kyis de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig so bskyed nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dum bu'i rgyal po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir// de bzhin
57b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa// oM badz+ra rad na muSh+NI traM//  nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis// de bzhin
57b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
57b8(rgyud): snying po 'di smras pa// oM badz+ra d+harma moSh+NI khaM// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba grub pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
58a1(rgyud): bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di
58a2(rgyud): smras pa/ oM badz+ra karma maSh+Ti ho// de nas byar chub sems dpa' chen po phag na rdo rje rang gi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskrad
58a3(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dum bu'i rgyal po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir// rdo rje'i dngos grub ces bya ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// 
58a4(rgyud): de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'a khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje'i dngos grub zhis kyang grags// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// mkhas pas srad pu bro bar bya/ 
58a5(rgyud): thog mar sangs rgyas gzugs bzhag ste// phyag rgya bzhi ni bri bar bya// zla bo'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje'i phyag rgya la sogs bri// de nas rdo rje dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa
58a6(rgyud): la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas// de bzhin du btsud de 'di skad du smra bar bya'o// khyod kyis gsang ba'i le'u 'di su la yang ma bstan cig de ci'i phyir zhe na// log par lta ba dang / 
58a7(rgyud): sdig pa'i lus byed pa'i sems can rnams kyang yod do// brtson 'grus chung ba dang / sbyor ba med pa dang ri mo mi shes pa dag rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
58a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po rnams su// brtson 'grus chung bas mi 'jug ste// de dag gi don du rdo rje dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil
58b1(rgyud): 'khor dam tshig tu gyur pa 'di ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad myong bar bya ba nas// de bzhin gsheg
58b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam pa'i dngos grub kyi bar du byin gyis brlabs so// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba 'di rnams la yid mi ches shing ma dang
58b3(rgyud): par ma byed cig/ khyod sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang yid dgas kyi khams su ltung bar 'gyur ba 'am// yid mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus ma yin par 'chi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la// gdong
58b4(rgyud): g.yogs dkrol te/ dkyil 'khor bstan to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig smros shig/ bdag nyid chen po gang dag gi/ phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings pa// bzlas
58b5(rgyud): pa'i snying po'i don gyis ni// der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya// ye shes 'di yi tshul gyis ni// phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin// bdag nyid chen po thams cad kyi// phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par
58b6(rgyud): 'gyur/ de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba brjod par bya'o// rang gi dbang po bshig nas ni// rdo rje bcings pas gzung bar bya// de yis phyag rgya gang reg pa// de ma thag tu de dbang 'gyur/ 
58b7(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi cho sde nyid brjod par bya'o// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar ba// ye shes phyag rgya bcing par bya// cho ga 'di'i tshul gyis ni// ye shes phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur/ de nas
58b8(rgyud): phyag rgya kun gyi lus brjod par bya'o// klu dang gar dang ro dang zas// spyod lam la sogs bde ba rnams// sangs rgyas rnams la phul na ni// lus kyi phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur// de nas dkyil
59a1(rgyud): 'khor thams cad srub pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// mtshan ma brtan par rang gyur nas// dkar por gyur pa'i rus la gnas// mtshan ma rgod rten
59a2(rgyud): byin brlabs te// bdag nyid rdo rje'i dbyings su sgom// rdo rje bcing pa dam byas te// gang mo myug gu bzhin du gshig/ mthe'u rlung dang 'dzub rtse bsgreng // dam tshig mchog gi datshig
59a3(rgyud): rdo rje phra mo'i tshul du ni// rab tu nanyam por gzhag pas sgom// rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'kho re ni/  ting 'dzin dbang du gyur pa'i tshulce// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings la// de gnyi ma rdo rje da
59a4(rgyud): du bzung / 'dzab mi mthe'u chung ba stsol ba ni// rdo rje dgos mchog dkyil 'khor ro// de nas soms dpa' rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba ji lta ba bzhin du bslabs nas// rdo
59a5(rgyud): rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o// rdo rje dngos grub kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du// mi g.yo ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
59a6(rgyud): thams cad phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du// rang gi phyag rgya rnams su bris na dngos grub thams cad kying 'grub po// de ltar res dang rtsig pa dang nam mkha' dang // gnas
59a7(rgyud): thams cad du bris ni dngos grub thams cad 'grub po// dkyil 'khor brtag pa nas brtsams te// la la ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de nyid kyi tshe/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub// la
59a8(rgyud): la ni de nas brtsams nas nyin zhag gcig gis/ la la ni nyi ma bzhis// la la ni nyin zhag bcu drug gis// la la ni mchims med pa lnga byas pa yang ji ltar 'dod pa bde blag tu don
59b1(rgyud): thams cad byed cing / thams cad dga' ba dang ro dang zas dang spyod pa thams cad kyi bde ba rnams myong bar byed bzhin du yang lo gcig gis dngos grub ma tshig 'grub po zhes bcom ldan 'das
59b2(rgyud): kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 
59b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas byung ngo // badz+ra sa te// de nas de bcom ldan
59b4(rgyud): 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyang ba dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad myong bar byas
59b5(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub par bya ba'i bar du// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// sem
59b6(rgyud): dpa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhes kyang bshad// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab po// zla ba'i
59b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' gzhug par bya// de nas dgag pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye
59b8(rgyud): shes rnams bskyed par bya'o// de la thog mar 'di skad du khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba dang // khong du ma chud pas su la yang phyag rgya 'ang mi smra shig/ khyod ngan song thams cad du ltung ba dang
60a1(rgyud): mi bde ba ma spangs par du sa ma yin par shi bar gyur ta De zhes bsgo bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i ye shes bslab po// zla rgyas dkyil 'khor la 'du
60a2(rgyud): ste/ phyag rgya chen po yongs badz+ra sabadag nyid rdo rje sems dpar ni// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gsang ba nyid ma tshug gi ye shes bslab po// 
60a3(rgyud): 'dod chags bral ba'i sdig lta bu// khams gsum na ni sdig med de// de bas 'dod la chags bral bar// khyod ni nam yang ma byed cig ma hA sa ma e ha na pa ny+tsa// de nas mna'i snying po 'di sprin
60a4(rgyud): no// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rnams su dam tshig gi sdom pa sbyin par bya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bzhi'i bcing ba bslab
60a5(rgyud): par bya'o// dngos grub kyang de bzhin no// ri mo la sogs pa dang lugs ma'i sku gzugs thams cad lo yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga bzhin du byas na dngos grub thams cad de bzhin du 'grub par
60a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas par bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du yang bya'o// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de
60a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dgyes pa'i snying po 'dis legs so zhes gsol to// oMHlegs so rdo rje sems dpa'
60a8(rgyud): khyod/ rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon
60b1(rgyud): 'dus pa'i/ mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan gyis kyang // dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// dag par byas nas bsgrubs nas ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang bde bar
60b2(rgyud): thob/ rdo rje chos kyi sbyor bas ni// 'dod pa kun gyi bde bas bde// tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub pas na// bde ba mi zad med mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid sdus pa las// de
60b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba// rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs s+ho// // dum bu dang po'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
60b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor li chen po bskor ba la// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab po// rdo
60b5(rgyud): rje sems dpa' rdo rje che// rdo rje mgon po rab sgrub mdzad// rdo rje'i dbang bskur rdo rje'i 'od// rdo rje dpal khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bzhad pa chos chen po// rdo rje ral gri mchog chen po/ dkyil
60b6(rgyud): 'khor kun gyi rgyal po mchog/ spros med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje las dang bskyang ba che// gnod sbyin gtumA pa gdon chen po// rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che/ kaphyag rgya kun la phyag 'tshal lo// 
60b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dang byang chub che// sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje'i ye shes ye shes che// theg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// don kun kun gyi de nyid don// sems can
60b8(rgyud): don chen kun rig pa// kun mkhyen kun mdzad don chen de// kun mkhyen gzigs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bdag ba rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje brtso ni rab rdo rje 'chang // dam tshig chen po
61a1(rgyud): de nyid don/ sems can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje lcags kyu 'dod pa ni// rab tu dga' ba 'od chen po// rdo rje 'od dang 'od snang ba// sangs rgyas 'od la phyag 'tshal
61a2(rgyud): lo// rdo rje rgyal mchog rdo rje mchog raMgs mchog mchog dang mi g.yo mchog/ rdo rje dam pa mchog chen mchog/ rigs mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje dbyings dang gsung bya re// rdo rje
61a3(rgyud): gsung ba rab gsang 'chang // rdo rje phra ba bsam gtan che// rdo rje dgos la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mchog gsang rdo rje mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub mkhas pa che// sangs rgyas
61a4(rgyud): ye shes sangs rgyas che// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgya sra mchod pa mchod pa che// sems dpa' mchod pa rab mchod pa// thub sa chen dang ni dngos grub che// rdo rje
61a5(rgyud): dngos grub khyod phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs chen po// rdo rje rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// 
61a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas gtso bo rgyal bka' nyan// sangs rgyas bshes gnyen rgyal mchog skyes// rnam par snang mdzad che dang khyab// ston zhi khro la phyag 'tshal stong// de bzhin gshegs pa
61a7(rgyud): de nyid che// yang dag mtha' dang che ba'i tshul// pha rol phyin pa kun mkhyen pa// don mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// kun du bzang dang spyod pa mchog/ bdud dang bdud ni rab 'dul ba/ 
61a8(rgyud): kun gyi mchog dang mnyam nyid mkhyen// kun du 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas hUM zhes hU~M zhes pa// rdo rje hUM zhes 'dul ba'o// rdo rje kun shes rdo rje drag/ phyag na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// 
61b1(rgyud): phyag bya mchod cing brjod pa dang // rim gro raM de bzhin gshegs pas byas// gang phyir rdo rje sems brten pas// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya khyod// rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag lus// kun gzigs
61b2(rgyud): lam ni khyod yin te// byung ba dang ni 'byung 'gyur ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis bsgrubs// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// rab tu mos pas bstod byed cing // grwar blangs gang zhig bstod byed pa
61b3(rgyud): de ni rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun la mnga' mdzad pa'i// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// sems can kun don mdzad pa'i phyir// rang gi rigs ni bskyed par mdzod// de nas de bzhin
61b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo phyag na rdo rjes// rdo rje bdag gi thugs khar bzhag ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas// 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
61b5(rgyud): ma 'tshul lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa// ci'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pas smras pa// bcom ldan 'das dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i ma rungs pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis
61b6(rgyud): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bas 'dul bar mi spyod pa de dag la/ zla bdag gis ji ltar sgrub par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa
61b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu// de'i tshe
61b8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi bar phra mo dang mnyam par spros pa nyid kyis ri rab ri'i rtse mo na// rtse mo dzA rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i kha bu rtsegs par
62a1(rgyud): yang gcig tu 'dus te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid du dmigs na// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kha'i dpal be bur zhugs s+ho/ 
62a2(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
62a3(rgyud): kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi sa ma lu so/ shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su bsgrub pa dang // phan pa bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa dang ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul
62a4(rgyud): ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes la dmigs te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i thabs khro bo'i drim
62a5(rgyud): tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i
62a6(rgyud): dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di byeng ngo // hU~M/ de nas byung ma thag tu phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kha'i rdo rje las// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de// kun du
62a7(rgyud): 'brar ba'i snying po khro gnyer can// smin ma tsum zhing dpral bar ba snyer/ mche ba lhag gir phyung zhing so gtsigs pa// rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang // ral gri dang zhags pa la sogs pa rdo rje'i rtse
62a8(rgyud): me lce 'bar ba'i mtshon cha lag na thogs po// rnam pa du ma'i kha dog dang rgyan sna tshogs kyi cha lugs 'dzin pa// phyag na rdo rje'i sku phyung nas// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du// shin du ma
62b1(rgyud): rungs pa thams cad gdul bar byas nas// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs kun du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste/ ched du brjod pa 'di
62b2(rgyud): ched du brjod do// e ma'o thams cad 'dul ba yi// thabs chen ldan pa bdag yin te// gang phyir sems can 'dul thabs phyir// dri ma med pa'i khro bor gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
62b3(rgyud): pa rnam par snang mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la dmigs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i
62b4(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rig pa mchog 'di smras pa/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ grih+Na gr-i h+na hU~M/ gr-ih+Na
62b5(rgyud): pa ya gri hA pa ya hUM/ a na ya he b+ha ga wan badz+ra hUM phaT// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas byung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjer gyur te byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab
62b6(rgyud): 'byam gyi mtsho'i sprin thams cad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs te spyan drangs nas// rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil
62b7(rgyud): 'khor chen por bcug ste/ dam chog bcings nas// yang cig tu 'dres rdo rje khro bo'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod kyi thugs khar bkog ste// ched du brjod pa 'di tshad du brjod
62b8(rgyud): do/ e ma'o byang chub sems de ni// kun du badrang zhing sdig med de// geng phyir sems can 'dul don du// khro bo yang ni yid 'ong 'gyur// de nas rdo rje khro ba chen po srid bcom ldan 'das kyi thug sa nas
63a1(rgyud): babs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhugs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
63a2(rgyud): pa thams cad dam tshig gis 'gags pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
63a3(rgyud): kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs khwa ni se byung ngo // hUM Ta grI dzaHde nas de phyung ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho sprin thams cad na 'jig rten gsu bang phyug chen po la sogs pa ji snyed pa de
63a4(rgyud): dag thams cad na gnas pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ma lus shing lus po mod pa rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje lcags kyus bkug nas ri rab kyi rtse mo gang na ba dang
63a5(rgyud): rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor ba dang rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang // nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa thams
63a6(rgyud): cad du bskor nas 'khod par gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs kha nas rdo rje blangs te gsor zhing / thams cad dang ldan pa'i khams gsum pa ji snyed pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum
63a7(rgyud): gyi 'khor lo la bltas te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtan pa la bzhugs la/ da yi bka' yang nyon cig/ de nas de dag gis 'di
63a8(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gis ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// skyabs su 'gro ba sgrub par byos// kun
63b1(rgyud): mkhyen ye shes thob pa'i phyir// grogs po rnams kyis sgrub par gyis// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi/ bdag po 'jig rten thams rgyud kyi bdag por gyur
63b2(rgyud): pas dregs te tsher khros par ston cing / 'di skad ces skyes so// kye gnod sbyin nga ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' drag gi gtsoyo das phyug byed pa po// 'jig pa po/ 'byung ba thams cad kyi dbang po// lha'i lha lha
63b3(rgyud): chen po yin na gnod sbyin khyod kyi ngag nga ci'i phyir nyan// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje gsor zhing bka' stsal pa// kye sems can ma rungs pa dkyil 'khor du myur du zhugs te// nga'i dam tshig la yang gnas
63b4(rgyud): par gyis shig/ de nas lha chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i sems can dbang phyug la de skad bka' stsal pa 'di su zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
63b5(rgyud): gyis dbang phyug la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa la bos te 'di skad gsungs so// grogs po rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang // dam tshig dang sdom pa la
63b6(rgyud): sgrub par gyis shig/ phyag na rdo rje 'di gnod sbyin khro bo ma rungs pa gtum pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ste// rdo rje 'bar byas khyed khams gsum pa 'di thams cad rlag par byas sa rem
63b7(rgyud): de nas dbang phyug chen po 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag por gyur pa dang // rang gi shes pa'i dbang gis 'khor mang po dang bcas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'jigs par bstan pa'i phyir/ 
63b8(rgyud): khro zhing gtum po chen po nyid// rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs 'bar ba chen po gtong zhing / ma rungs pa chen pos rtag tu rgod pa nyid bstan nas/ 'di skad du smras so// kyang ni 'jig rten gsum mtha'
64a1(rgyud): drag gi bdag po bas/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir ngal bka' stsal/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje de bsnyems pa dang bcas pas gsor zhing / rnam par bzhad de/ 'di skad ces smras so// 
64a2(rgyud): kye lus srul po mi'i sha za ba dang /  zas su ro bsregs pa'i thal ba za zhing / kha zas dang / mal dang gos kyang de la byed pa nga'i bka' bzhin du byas shig/ de na sa lnga chen po dbang phyug chen pos 'jig
64a3(rgyud): rten gsum po mthu' dag dang / nam mkha nga khams rnams khro bo chen pos nod par byin gyis brlabs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyang nga'i bkra' nyen la/ dam tshig kyang long shig/ de nas
64a4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha chen po zhes bgyi ba'i lha 'di ni nirang gis 'tshal ba dang / snying stobs kyis dregs
64a5(rgyud): pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la 'dud par mi btub ni/ 'di la ji ltar bgyi bar rigs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gsheg
64a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas byung ba'i rdo rje chen po dam tshig dran par byas pa'o// e ni suM b+ha badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i snying po 'di
64a7(rgyud): brjod do// hUM/ de nas brjod ma thug tu khams gsum pa thams cad nas 'dus pa'i lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po'i dbang po thams cad khas bu ba du bsgyel te/ nyams
64a8(rgyud): thag pa'i tshig 'byin cing / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la skyabs su dong ngo // lha chen po'i lha zhes bya ba'i lha de ni sa la 'gyel ste/ dran pa med par gyur nas shi'o// de nas bcom
64b1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje 'jig rten gsum po'i 'khor lo 'di thams cad la skyabs sbyin par byas te
64b2(rgyud): ma gsad cig/ de nas phyag rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thob nas/ lha thams cad la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so// gal te khyed rang gasrog 'dod
64b3(rgyud): na/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su dong la/ nga'i bka' yang nyon cig/ de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas
64b4(rgyud): pa la skyabs su mchi'o// khyod kyis bsten pa'i bka' ni bdag cag gis ma tshal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas de dag bos nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal
64b5(rgyud): to/ kye lha rnams 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa/  de bzhin gshegs pa
64b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po ste/ sems can thams cad gdul ba'i don bya ba'i phyir/ kho bo'i rgyal po chen por dab
64b7(rgyud): bskur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyed kyi nang na yang lha chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can thams cad dag yod de/ de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bar mdzad pas
64b8(rgyud): sdig pa las bzlog par mdzad par mi spyod pa'i sdig pa'i sems can de rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir byin gyis brlabs so// de bas na khyed rnams 'di'i dam tshig la gnas par byos shig par
65a1(rgyud): bka' stsal to// de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi srog yal ba las bskyabs du gsol// bdag cag kyang bka' stsal pa ltar bgyid cing mchis
65a2(rgyud): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed skyes bu chen po 'di nyid la skabs su/ dang drang 'di nyid kyis kun du slob cing gzhan gyis ni ma yin no// de nas khams gsum kun nas 'das
65a3(rgyud): pa'i srid pa gsum gyi dbang po de rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag ga la ba de logs su bltas nas/ nyams thog pa'i sgra chen po mgrin cig tu phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
65a4(rgyud): ldan 'das 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'di las kun du bskyab par gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas kun du bskyab par gsol dro nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes lha la sogs pa de rnams
65a5(rgyud): bos te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma rungs pa rnams nga'i bstan pa la zhugs shing / rdo rje 'bar ba 'di yis gcig tu 'bar bar byas nas/ khyed thams cad kyang thal bar byas sa re
65a6(rgyud): de drug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kan du bzang po de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi sems bsnyed pa/ zhi badra la ba/ sems can thams cad la phan pa
65a7(rgyud): bzhad pa/ sems can thams cad la mu 'jigs pa stsol ba lags na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bsregs par gyur/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos de
65a8(rgyud): dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye grogs po gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa de'i phyir nga ni kun du bzang po ste/ khyed lta bu'i sems can ma rungs pa
65b1(rgyud): ngang tshul can sdig pa'i sems can rnams sbyang ba'i phyir/ gal te nga'i dam tshig la mi gnasnga na chud gsan par bya'o// gsol ba bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas rmA na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang
65b2(rgyud): phyug chen po ma gtogs pa'i lha de dag gzhon dbugs dbyung zhing bslang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje bslang ba zhes bya ba 'di smos so// badz+ro tiSh+Tha/ de nas de skad
65b3(rgyud): ces smras ma thag tu dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs par khams gsum par 'dus pa'i srid pa gsum+b+ha gyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas par de dag thams cad kun du brgyal ba las sems dbugs phyung
65b4(rgyud): ste/ lha'i bde ba myong zhing / 'jigs shing bag tsha ba dang / ba spu langs pa med par gyur nas/ rtsom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la blta zhing langs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen
65b5(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po lha'i bdag po lha chen po 'di sagyu na 'di'i srog de chung gson phyir byas te ci rung / gsos na ni 'di yang skyes bu dam par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rdo rjes
65b6(rgyud): de bzhin du bya'o snyam nas/ shi ba slong ba'i snying po 'di smras so// oM badz+ra A yu/ de nas 'di smras ma thag tu lha chen po lha'i bdag po shri ba las sos te/ ljang 'dod na ldang ma nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
65b7(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ci 'di lta bus 'dul lam/ ba com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu chen po de'i bka' nyan par mi 'jug na/ khyod 'dul ba 'di nyid
65b8(rgyud): yin gying ni ma yin no// dbang phrug chen pos gsol mo// bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis marus pa'i sems can 'di las bskyab par mi dzang mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka stsal pa
66a1(rgyud): ngas 'di las bsgrub mi nus so// gsol pa ci'i slad du bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// bcom
66a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gos ma 'tshal to// ji lta zhe no// khams gsum gyi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i bdag po mchis par ma 'tshal na 'di su
66a3(rgyud): lags kyide nas bcom ldan 'dres byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyug na rdo rjes yang lha chen po la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye ma rungs pa'i sems can nga'i bka' mi nyan tam/ de nas
66a4(rgyud): lha chen pos rdo rje sems dpa' tshig thos nas// 'khrugs shing khros par gyur te de ltar 'gyel bzhin du yang 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs bstan te/ 'di skad ces smras so// nga shi bar bzod
66a5(rgyud): kyi khyod kyi ngag mi nyan to de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rab tu khros par ston cing / nyid kyi zhabs kyis mthil nas rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa 'di phyung ngo // oM pa ta a ka ra Sha na badz+ra
66a6(rgyud): hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi 'thil nas kun du 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i snying po khro gnyer byas pa/ mche ba lhag byung ba gdong pa chen po rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das
66a7(rgyud): / phyag na rdo rje'i spyan snga na bka' nyan cing 'dug par gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes dbang phyug chen po sbyang ba'i phyir 'di skad ce sra gsungs so// oM pA tA oM ka ra Sha ya a kA ra ShA ya/ saR+Ya
66a8(rgyud): badz+ra d+harma a nu tsor kan d+ha badz+rI r+b+hu dzaM/ de skad ces smras pa dang / lha chen po dad lha mo u mar ba chas pa rkas gyen kar bstan te gcer bur byung nas/ skye bo thams cad kyis gad mo btab
66b1(rgyud): cing / rkang pas 'gugs pa'i rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pas kug ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i rgyu sngar zhabs kyi drung du bzhag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag ni rdo rjes bcom
66b2(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can ma rungs pa mchis 'brang dang btsas pa 'di ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ra kra ma ho// da
66b3(rgyud): nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha chen po zhabs g.yon pas mnan/ zhabs g.yas pas u mI nu mra'i steng du mnan nas/ rang
66b4(rgyud): gi snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra a b+ha sha hA na pa t+ya Ta/ de nas smras ma thag tu lha chen po lha babs nas/ rang gi lag pa stong gis rang gi gdong stong la mchog go/ de nas rdo rje'i nor bu rin po che'i
66b5(rgyud): rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i phyi rol na/ srid pa gsum po thams cad kyis/ nged kyi dbang po de bdag nyid chen po des brtul lo zhes sgra chen po phyung ngo // 
66b6(rgyud): de nus bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ sangs rgyas p+pa myas rkyen kyi byams pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM bud d+ha me dri badz+ra ra gA hA/ de nas de skad gsungs ma thag tu
66b7(rgyud): lha chen po babs pa'i srog bsngal de kun zhi bor gyur ste/ de nas phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi 'thal gyis reg pas bde ba dang / bla na med pa grub pa'i dbang dang / rnam par thar pa'i dbang dang / gzungs
66b8(rgyud): dang ye shes dang mngon par shes pa thob nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid 'grub pa'i bar du gyur to// de nas lha chen po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis reg pas/ de bzhin gshegs
67a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang rnam par thar pa'i bde ba myong ste/ lha chen po'i lus phyag na rdo rje'i zha bas la phul nas/ 'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klang sam
67a2(rgyud): bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ thal bas khebs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der thul ba'i dbang po'i dbades
67a3(rgyud): / zhes bya ba 'di bzhin gsheg ga par smras so// de na se lha chen po'i lus de las ched du brjod pa 'di byung ngo // e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni.oM sangs rgas ye shes bla na med// yi ge'i tshig
67a4(rgyud): gis gnas nas su// mya ngan las ni 'das par bzhag/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de las gzhan pa mthu chen po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gsum gyi
67a5(rgyud): badrag po thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ grogs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs shig/ zhugs nas kyang de bzhin
67a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig srung shig/ de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// ji ltar bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje srid pa gsu
67a7(rgyud): nas 'dus pa de rnams bos te/ 'di snyed ces gsungs so// grogs po rnam gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa dang dam tshig dang sdom pa zung la nga'i dam tshig la gnas par gyis
67a8(rgyud): shig tshe de dag gis gsol po// de bzhin du 'tshal ni bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bko dam tshig blo bar mi chud do// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi dam tshig 'di byin no// byang chub sems
67b1(rgyud): ni rim bzhin du/ bskyed nas de'i 'og tu ni// byang chub chen por ci nus par// shin du mnyam gzhag 'bad par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha la sogs pa de rnaMs
67b2(rgyud): 'jug pa'i dam rmege run pa'i pheg rba bcing par bas nos/ dam tshig chen po'i phyag rga sAng po 'di sa 'ching du gzhug go/ oM badz+ra sa ma yo/ gri hA ban dA sa ma ya badz+ra sa ta sa ma yaM/ a na sA ra saR+YA tA
67b3(rgyud): thA gre te sa ya staM/ DI D+ho me b+ha bas+t+r-i ro me b+ha ba/ au hA ro me b+ha ba/ a pra ti ha ro me b+hau ba/ saR+Ya karma su tsa me tsid+ha shri yaM ku ru/ ha ha ha hA ho haM/ de nas 'di smras ma thag tu khems gsum gyi sr-id pa gsum/ 
67b4(rgyud): gyi skye bo 'dus pa thams cad rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya ste/ ti ridri ti ri lag tu babs te/ dam du bcings par gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes tshul bzhin du btsud nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad rim
67b5(rgyud): pa bzhin du bstan te rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur nas/ rdo rje'i mtshan ma yang lag tu byin te/ rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur na sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi don la bkod do// 
67b6(rgyud): de nas 'jig rten gyi bdag po thams cad kyi rdo rje ming rnams yin no// 'di lta ste dbang phyag chen po ni khro bo rdo rje'o// mthu bo ru ni sgyu ma'i rdo rje'o// sgra gzhon nu ni dril ba rdo rje'o// mamal ni thub pa'i rdo rje 'o/ dmang po ni rdo rje'i ma
67b7(rgyud): chu ste/ rig pa'i rgyal po rnams su dbang bskur ro// de nas bar snang la spyod pa rnams le rjes su byin pa 'di lta ste/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ni rdo rje 'khyil po'o'i// zla ba ni rdo rje'i 'od // dbyig pa chen
67b8(rgyud): po'i gtso bon rdo rje dbyig pa'o// ser smug ni rdo rje ser skrag ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje khro bo zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro// de nas nam mkha' la spyod pa thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ spyod rgyas myos
68a1(rgyud): pa ni rdo rje glang po che'i sna'o// sbrang rtsi byed pa ni rdo rje phreng ba'o// rgyal ba ni rdo rje dbang ngo // rgyal bar byed pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ste/ de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso bo zhes bya bar
68a2(rgyud): dbang bskur ro// de nas sa zla ba'i sa'i dbang po thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ mdzod skyong ni rdo rje tho ba'o// me ni rdo rje me'o// rlung ni rdo rje rlung ngo // ku be ra ni rdo rje 'jigs pa'o// de la sogs pa ni
68a3(rgyud): rdo rje pho nya dbang bskur / drarnam sa'i 'og tu dbang po'i lha thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ phyag ni rdo rje lcags kyu'o// ga shin rje ni rdo rje dus so// gtsug pungs ni rdo rje'i bgogs kyi gartsa
68a4(rgyud): lo'o// ba ru ni Nik+Sha'i rdo rje ste/ de la sogs pa ni bran zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdage po'i lha mo thams cad rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur byas dbang bskur bar bya'o// 
68a5(rgyud): rang gi mtshan ma le rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi don la rab tu bkod do// 'di lta ste um
68a6(rgyud): yi rdo rje me'o// rag ma ni rdo rdzogase ra ro// Sha Sh+Ta ni rdo rje gzhon nu ma'o// tshung sa ma ni rdo rje zho ba ma'o// dpung po ni rdo rje khu tshur te/ de la sogs pa na rdo rje rgyal mor dbang bskur ro// de nas
68a7(rgyud): rnabAr snang la spyod pa'i bud med rnams la byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ mi 'chi ba ni rdo rje ma'i 'chi ba'o// ro hi ni rdo rje mdangs so// dbyug 'dzin ma ni rdo rje'i dbyug mchog ma'o// skye ba 'phrog ma ni dza
68a8(rgyud): rje'i bskyed btsongs te/ de la sogs pa ni khro bo chen mo zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro// de nas nam mkha' la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ gsod ma no rdo rje 'jug ma'o// 
68b1(rgyud): zla hA ni rdo rje zab ma'o// maglo ba ma ni rdo rje mgo ba mA'o// dga' mA ni rdo rje dbang ngo // de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso mor dbang bskur ro// de nus sa la spyod pa'i bud myed thams cad la
68b2(rgyud): byin pa 'di lta ste/ zhi ba ma ni rdo rje pho nya mo'o// rlung ni mgyogs ma rdo rje ma'o// me nAM rdo rje 'bar ba'o// ku be ra ma ni rdo rje 'khyor ma ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nya mo dbang bskor ro// de nas sa'i
68b3(rgyud): 'og na gnas pa'i bud mod thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ phag mo rdo rje kha'o// tsa mun ti ni rdo d+hA'i du sa so// sna cha du ma ni rdo rje rul pa'o// ba ru ma ni rdo rje chu srin ma ste/ de la stsogs pa nAM rdo rje bran
68b4(rgyud): mor dbang bskuru ro// den byang chub sems dpa'i phyag na rdo rjes zhugs pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnams bskyed nas phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad bslabs te/ rdo rje dam tshig mna'i snying po
68b5(rgyud): 'di byin no// rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs// dam tshig 'di las 'das na ni/ rigs rnams myur du thul bar byed/ oM ha na sa ma ya hUM phaT/ dri nas snying po gzung bar bya ba'i phyag
68b6(rgyud): rgya 'di yin no// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bya ts+tsha nga? s+yai ti/ 'dzub mo lcags kyung ba cings nas ni/ ga cu zhing phyi yang gcu bAr+ra byi/ dgos pa'i don bsams gang yin pa// de yi mdun du khyed rnams ni// dgos
68b7(rgyud): par 'grub phyir 'dag par byos// khyod kyi srog ni mi rungs pa// dam tshig 'dis ni gyur ta re// rdo rje bcing pa dam byas te/ 'dzub mo kun nas rab tu mnan/ mthe bong gnyis kA n+de tshams sbyar bas// glang
68b8(rgyud): mo gnyis kar rab tu mnan// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'o// dam tshig phyag rgya bcing ba las/ gal te 'ga' yis mda' gyur na// dam tshig 'di yis khyod gsod do// rdo rje'i phyag rgya ga nyis kan+ti// mthe bu tshu
69a1(rgyud): sor mo bcings pas ni// 'dzab mor 'dzub mo brkyang nas mdung // bzlog ste mgo bor bzhag par bya// bdag nyid che ba'i dam tshig 'di// rdo rje rigs 'dzin bcings nas ni// khros te gra
69a2(rgyud): la bltas pa yi// de'i mdun du de bzhin 'dug/ rdo rje'i bsrung ba dang bcings la// rdo rje bsdams pa ngos mnan pa// 'di na sa pa'i dmachog ste// sems can thams cad bsrung ba'o// gang zhig las
69a3(rgyud): la bskyab pa'i phyir/ ni/ khro bIr ljon pas bcings na ni// sems can gang la bsrung ba yi// de yi rgyab tu 'dug par gyis// rdo rje'i phyag+sa rgya gnyis Tha rI dzA sra t+ye shu g.yon pa'i rdo rje'i 'dzub mo la// mA
69a4(rgyud): chung gnyis ni bsdam byas te// gcu zhing slar gtsus drag bkrol ba// khro bor mnyam gzhag gang yin pa'i// dam tshig 'di yang spur byas na// khyed kyis de yi mdun du ni// dngos grub kun gyi
69a5(rgyud): mchog phyir mkhod// rdo rje bcings pa sbal ba ni// 'dzub mo gnyis ni dam por bya// mthe bong gung me rtse mo gnyis// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / bzlog ste dpral bar bzhag par bya// 
69a6(rgyud): gal te gson par 'dod na ni// dgug par bya ba gang yin pa// de yi mdun du rtag par 'dug/ de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi/ snying po 'dri 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dam
69a7(rgyud): tshig 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di yin te// oM ba liM tod ba li to badz+ra a kar shaM ya hUM dza/ rdo rje gtsu ba'i phyag rgyas lha dgug pa'i snying po'o// hUM badz+ra A gra pi Da sa ma sa hUM/ bar snang la spyod pa rnaMs
69a8(rgyud): kyi'o// oM badz+ra ma la a gri ba phreng can rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra ban d+ha haM/ sa li spyod pa rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra pa ta li b+hen dza hU~M phaT/ sa 'og ne gnas pa rnams kyi'o// oM badz+rI he ru ka~M badz+ras
69b1(rgyud): ma ya/ sar+b+ba duSh+TA na sa ma ya/ mu tra pra ban dza k+Sha hUM phaT/ bud med thams cad kyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje sa bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad rtses gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
69b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba por dbang bskur na/ ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor du gtogs pa de dag thams cad ji ltar sgrub par bgyi ba legs par bka'i stsal du
69b3(rgyud): stsol / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// oM badz+ra su b+ha ni hUM phaT// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir/ 
69b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad dgag pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra sa mA ya a gar sha ya/ saR+Wa man da lam badz+ra pA sa t+yaM ma ti kA ma hUM phaT/ rdo rje lcags kyu gnyis bcings te/ snying khar yong su bskor ba
69b5(rgyud): bya/ 'dzub gnyis lcags kyi phyi rol gyis// dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i mchog yin no// de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu dkyil 'khor thams cad ri rab kyi rtse mo'i pha rol du bskor te 'khod do// de nas bcom
69b6(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad la byos te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye grogs po dag srog gcod pa dag spang zhing dam tshig gzung ba la sgrub par gyis shig/ de nas
69b7(rgyud): phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi sems can de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sha 'tshul ba ma rungs pa'i sems can lags pas mdangs
69b8(rgyud): 'phrog pa la srog ltos na bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'tshor bar bgyi ba de bka' stsol cig/ de nAs byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes ma rungs pa'i rdo rje khro bo 'di gsungs so// A~M ng+ku Sh+yA kro d+ha h+ma na dA pA tsa
70a1(rgyud): / mid d+ha na sa ya/ bi ki Na saR+YA Sh+Ta sa ma yak+tha kra man d+ha la ma b+hun dza bAn dza/ ma ra d+ha mAr dA/ khA da khA da/ pa ra man tr-i badz+ra sa mA ya hAM/ rdo rje khro 'dzub legs par ni/ 
70a2(rgyud): se na mo spyad de bkr-i sa nas k+Shang / rtse mo gnyis nau daH sbyar la// phyag rgya 'di ni ma ruHsa 'joms// de nas 'di skad smras ma thug tu ma rungs pa'i dak+Shil 'khon+da thams cad gcig tu
70a3(rgyud): 'dus pa rnams pa du mas gtso zhing bral ba dang / dam tshig gis phyag rgyas cing sde pa yang dral te/ ma rungs pa'i sems can de rnams yang \u0f7fsreg cing shin tu btsos pas 'a dod
70a4(rgyud): ring phongs pa'i sgra phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ga la ba der thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cig srog dang mi bral
70a5(rgyud): baR+Sha skabs mdzad du gsol/ de nas bag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams ji ltar bgyi ba
70a6(rgyud): dz+radag la bka' stsal du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM ni sum b+ha hA nA da ha pa tsa grih+Na ban d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyug na rdo rjes rdo rje khro
70a7(rgyud): b+ho'i mi bzod pa 'di gsungs so// oM ma hA badz+ra kru ra kro d+ha pa ta ya/ sak+tha duSh+Ta ma nA Da lam bi ne sha ya/ tAsaR+YA draSh+Ta si ma yA maM/ b+h+r-i kr-I rA bid d+ha na sa ya/ !spr-i ta ya/ b+han dza ya saR+YA/ 
70b1(rgyud): duSh+Ta sa ma ya mU tra/ ban d+ha na gr-i h+Na ha na da hA pa tsa saR+YA duSh+TA sa ma ya hUM sad ta na badz+ra swa ma ya hUM phaT/ au de nas gsung saM ma thag tu ma rungs pa'i dam tshig dang phyag rgya dang dkyil 'a khor
70b2(rgyud): thams cad kyang gcig tu 'gyur to/ rgya mtsho chen por ltung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso'ato/ bcom ldan 'das
70b3(rgyud): kyis bdag la ma rungs pa thams cad thul cig par bka' stsal na/ phra men ma dang gdon la sogs pa gnod pa de dag thams cad la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di
70b4(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to// oM ha na ha na badz+ra hUM phaT// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes phra man ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad 'gugs pa'i
70b5(rgyud): s+yAng po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra a kar she ya sha g+hamA sar+Ya du ste gr-i hau/ badz+ra d+ha ra srad t+ye na hU~M dza/ de nas do smas ma thag tu phra men ma la sogs pa gdon maM rungs pa thams cad phyi rab
70b6(rgyud): kyi rtse mo'i phyi rol bskor te'i khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad la bos te 'di sbrid ces gsungs so/ 
70b7(rgyud): kye bzod ljon ma rnams srog gcod pa spangs pa'i bslab pa dang / dam tshig dang sdom pa gzung bar byos shig/ rdo rje'abar ba dang / rab tu 'byor ba dang / gcig tu'o bar bar
71a1(rgyud): gyur pas/ khyed kyi rigs rnams ma lus par bsregs sa rA/ de nas phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la bder
71a2(rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sha 'tshal ba na ji ltar gyi bka' stsal du gsol/ da nas bcom ldan
71a3(rgyud): 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje sems can 'di rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed la thabs sbyin par sgrub par byos shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje thugs
71a4(rgyud): rje chen pos sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i mtshan ma shes pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsungs so// / oM badz+ra pra ti gri h+Na hr-i da yaM/ dz+dza a ka ra sha ya/ ya bya yan sa to// ma sad
71a5(rgyud): ya d+he nA m+bi ya te ta d+ha s+ya d+hi yan ni// Sh+Ta ma tu sa ma ya hUM dzA/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcings pa bshad do// snying khur rdo rje lag ngar gnyis// shin du dmu paR+Sha bcings nas ni// rdo rje 'dzub
71a6(rgyud): me'i rtse mo yis// rang gi mtshan khung brud par bya// khyed rnams kyis phyag rgya 'dis// sems can thams cad kyi snying drung la sha zo cig/ de nas pra min ma la sogs pa ma rungs pa gdon
71a7(rgyud): thams cad dga' ba'i sgra bton nas/ mchongs rgal te rang gi gnas su dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
71a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma rungs pa 'dul bar bdag la bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rims la sogs pa nad de rnams la ji ltar bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsol cig/ 
71b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// oM hU~M phaT/ da na byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rims la sogs pa'i nad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra sa
71b2(rgyud): ma ya a na ya saR+Wa duSh+Ta dza ra da na na sha ya hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungasra ma thag tu rims la srogs pa'i nad rnams thams cad ri'i rtse me phyi rol du bskor te 'khod do// de nas phyag na rdo
71b3(rgyud): rjes rims la sogaso pa thams cad kyi nod rnams la bos te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye bzod ldan rnams sems can gsod pa la sogs pa spang pa'i bslab pa gzung ba'i sdom pa long
71b4(rgyud): shigade dag gis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sems can gyi mdang sa phrogs ste 'tsho bar bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'ad sa ji ltar bgyi ba legs par bka' stsol cig
71b5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las rnams dag par gyur po'i ye shes kyi phyog rgya'i snying po gsungs so// oM badz+ra kArma ba sho d+ha ya/ sar+Ya a par na ni/ bud s+ho
71b6(rgyud): sad t+ye na ma se ya hUM/ de nas phyag rgya bcing pa bshad do// rdo rje thal mo rab sbyar te/ 'dzub mau gnyis ka bkug nas kyang / mthe bong mnyam ste sbyar na sa nI/ mnan pa
71b7(rgyud): 'di ni sdig 'phrog pa/ phyag rgya 'di rims la sogs pa'i na thams cad kyis gang la btab pa la las byas pa bstan na// de khyed rnams kyis thong shigakhyed bdag
71b8(rgyud): srog dang bral la ro// de nas de rnams de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol te slar dong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams
72a1(rgyud): cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag sgrib pa thams cad gcod pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
72a2(rgyud): sbyang pa'i slad du nyid kyi thugs kha nas phyung na/ da bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song de rnams thams cad ji ltar bgyi ba bka' sAl du gsol/ 
72a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi sde bka' stsal pa/ oM k+Sha pa ya badz+ra swA haM/ de na sa byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes du 'bod la sogs pa ngan song gi 'gro ba'i 'khor lo/ 
72a4(rgyud): thams cad 'gugs pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// / oM sar+b+bA oM pA ya a ka rA ShA na bi sho d+ha na/ badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT de nas 'di rnams sgras ma thag tu ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod
72a5(rgyud): chen po la sogs pa ngan song na gnas pa rnams ri rab kyi rtse mo'i phyi rol du bskor te 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes ngan song du ltung ba'i sems
72a6(rgyud): can de dag thams cad bos nas 'di skad du/ gsungs so// kye bzed ldan rnams/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi ba dang / dam tshig dang sdom pa
72a7(rgyud): dang dran song thams cad lasathor pa'i phyag rgya dang snying po zung shigade nas de dag gis mgrin cig gcig tu 'di skad cu sro gsol to//  bcomu ldan 'ad so
72a8(rgyud): bdag cag sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba 'di las skyob tu gsol/ bdag cag rnams sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang khyod lha skyabs su mchi'o// de nas phyag na
72b1(rgyud): rdo rje sa ngan song thams cad 'jomasra pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra pa nr-i bi s+pho ta ya saR+Wa A pA yA/ b+han d+ha na ni pra mo k+Sha ya/ taMnI/ saR+Wa a pa yA g+hA ta bya/ saR+YA sod ta ni
72b2(rgyud): saR+YA ta tha ga ta badz+ra sa ma ya tra Ta/ de nas de'i phyag rgya ba cing par bshad do// rdo rje bcing pa dam byas te/ gung myo gnyis ka sbyar nas su/ tha ma bzhi ni rtse mo sbrid/ sdig pa 'joms
72b3(rgyud): par grags pa yin// de ni se ngan song gsumo gyi 'khor lon gnas pa'i sems can thams cad phyag na rdo rje las phyag rgya 'di mthong nas/ ngan song thams cad bcom ldan
72b4(rgyud): 'das rnam par skang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes so/ dran song de rnams kyang rgya mtsho chen por por ro// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje sa bcom ldan 'das la 'di
72b5(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad so sems can gyi khams sa lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can la/ bskyab pa dang phan pa dang badra ba thams cad dang myong bar bgyi ba nas/ 
72b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid grub pa dam pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i b.rarugasol cig bdagal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub
72b7(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal na/ mi 'di rnams ji ltar bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsol cig/ de na swA de bzhin gshegs pa
72b8(rgyud): thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas 'di skad ces dka' stsal to// oM badz+ra pA ni ma ha man dA lam/ pra be sh+yA ya swaR+Yan duSh+TA na ro dA na ni bar ya be
73a1(rgyud): / ya du ra tiSh+Ti pa r+yA pA na ma bi sho d+ha ya na sha yA/  bi na sha ya/ ha ha ha ha hAM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thAms cad kyis bka' stsal pa'i tshig de thos nas/ 
73a2(rgyud): sems can gyi khoms ma las shing lus pa med pa rnams skyeb pa dang / phan pa da rno pa thams cad dang / dngos grub dam pa nas/ de bzhin gang shegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang / 
73a3(rgyud): mngon par shes pad+mo 'bras bu thob par bgyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po 'dam tshig las byung ba/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya
73a4(rgyud): de'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di shad do// de nas rab tu babyed bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa s+ho// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba ladangos grub thams cad byed pa'i
73a5(rgyud): mchog/ 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya/ rdo rje dmatshig las byung ba/ sangs rgyas byang chub 'byin byed pa/ mA rungs thams cad rnam par 'jig
73a6(rgyud): de la sngags 'dis srad bus bri bar bya'o// oM badz+ra sa ma sa su tra ma ti kra mchogrub bzhir bya zhing sgo bzhi gdodarta bebs bzhis kyang rab tu brgyan// slad du
73a7(rgyud): bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ der dang phreng bas shin du bar+d+hanadakyi lce 'khor kun gyi grwarnams dang / sgro khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams surdo rje rin chen brgyan par ni// 
73a8(rgyud): khor phyi rol srad du rno// shes rab can gyis de nang du// rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan to// glu ban pa la slo ba zhig/ kaM ba brgyad dang ni bribs bcus// rdo rdeg pa'i gnas
73b1(rgyud): mchog tu dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa ste// de ltar dkyil 'khor srang bu blo// srad bu b+hes pa mtshon gyis gang // de'i tshon la bzlas pa ni 'di yi// oM badz+ra tsi two sa mU la nAM/ 
73b2(rgyud): de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni// rdo rje slob dpon mnyam bzhug pas// rdo rje sgo ni rnams bzhi po/ yid kyis ni dbye bar bya// de la sgo rnams dbye ba'i sngags ni 'di'o// 
73b3(rgyud): oM badz+rod g+hA ta yA/ sa ma ya pra pi shA ya hUM/ gser ram dngul las byas pa'am/ sa yang rung ste legs bris pa'i/ pha gu gru bzhir byas pa la/ sangs
73b4(rgyud): rgyas gzugs ni gzhog par bya// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i snying po ni 'di yin no/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la a ga ni pra ti bai tA A ka ra shra ya suR+Yo ta thA ga rta na
73b5(rgyud): ma hA badz+ra sa ma ya hUM dza/ sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni/ 'bar bas bskyor ba bzhag par bya// de bzhin rin chen 'od bskor ba/ pad me rdo rje kun de bzhin/  nas
73b6(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya de rnams dgod pa'o snying po 'di yin no// !/ oM satwA thadz+ra dz+wa la mau laM hUM phaT/ oM rad na badz+ra dza la ma la tsUrtA/ o d+harma badz+ra dz+wa lA mo lA ts+tshat+sa/ 
73b7(rgyud): oM karma badz+ri dz+wa la ma la hU~M aM// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni/ sangs rgyas spyan sngar de bzhin du/ shes pas cho ga bzhin brisu la/ klu rdo rje r+g+haM zhes dkyil
73b8(rgyud): de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra beg a grA ma hU~M/ de bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams
74a1(rgyud): cad la yang srad bu la rgal te thams cad du 'gro bar bya'o// de nas 'di'i phyag rgya 'di bshad do// yid kyis ri mo bte shA nas ni/ rdo rje srod bu
74a2(rgyud): 'am gzhan yang rdu na/ phyir byung nang du zhugs kyang ni// dum tshog 'gal ba ra de mi 'gyur/ de yi dbus su sems dpa' chu/ phyag ni rdo rje bri ba ni/ tsu pa la
74a3(rgyud): cher sto 'tsher ba'i mag/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya bar 'dus/ mche ba cung zad phyung ba'i zhal/ khro dang bcas par 'dzum pa'i zhal/ ga yon brkyang tshul du gnas pa
74a4(rgyud): ste/ b+hu 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// g.yon pa'aM zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni// dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya/ g.yas pa'i nabs kyis u ma yi/ kanu
74a5(rgyud): ma'i steng du mnan pa bri// de yo snying po 'di yin no// hUM// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// rdo rje khro bo bzhag pa yi// khros pas mche ba byung ba ste// 'bar ba'i blo
74a6(rgyud): bu'i bkris pa'i 'od// nga nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra sad tA klo ta hUM phaT/ oM badz+dza kro ta a ka ra sha yA hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra karma kre ta ra gA ya hUM phaT/ 
74a7(rgyud): oM badz+ra duSh+Ti kro tA sa d+hu sa d+h+yaM hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dmu pa gnyis par ni// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas kyang // derwa ni rdo rje dbang bskur brdo rje khro bos bskor
74a8(rgyud): badz+ri mi de nas de rnams kyi snying po bshad do// / oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku ti kro tra ha ra ha ra hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra su ru ma hA dz+wa la mA le kro d+ha dz+wa lA ya sa r+b+ba hU~M phaT/ oM badz+rAM kro d+ha kle du he gi
74b1(rgyud): baT/ oM aT hAs krod+ha ha ha ha ha hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum par ni// rdo rje shugs kyis rga lha nas kyang // rdo rje sde ni thi ba bya// khro bo bdag nyid chen pos
74b2(rgyud): bskor/ de nas de rnams kyi snying po bshad do// gri// oM badz+ra d+harma kro ta bi nA shwa ya bi sho d+hA ye hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra tigaSh+Na grod+ha tshon d+ha tshon d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra he du kro ta pra bi sha
74b3(rgyud): mun Da le saR+YA na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta ba sha ba ra ba ta hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhi par no// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas kyang // rdo rje dbab pa bri ba ni// rdo rje khro dron
74b4(rgyud): tshogs kyis bske / de nas de rnams kyi snying po bshad do// a hU~M/ oM badz+ra karma kro ta hUM phaT/ oM badz+re kr-i d+ha ka pa tsa kro ta rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha kro d+ha kha d+hi kha d+ha
74b5(rgyud): hUM paT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha muSh+TaM sa d+ha ya sa ma ya hUM phaT/ dkyila'i khor gyi nI grwa rnams su/ rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul bzhin du/ ji ltar go rim sa bzhin du ni/ 
74b6(rgyud): ge sang ba'i mchod tha kr-in br-i'o// de nas de dag gi snying po 'di yin no// oM badz+ra la s+yai ra ga ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma laM oM b+hi ShI na tsa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra g+hi ti ga ta ga tu
74b7(rgyud): hUM paT/ oM badz+ri ni da te ba shi ku ru hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa'i phyi rol durdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas kyang // de yi gr-i rnams nyid du nimachod pa'i
74b8(rgyud): lce mo bzhi rnams bzhag/ de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM bodz+ra rU pa pU dza s+pha ra na sa me yi hU~M phaT// oM badz+ra puSh+pa pu tsa s+phar na sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra a lo ke pAts+tshaswar
75a1(rgyud): nus me pre hU~MHTa/ oM badz+ra g+h+nAn d+ha btsa sI ranas ma me hU~M ban+da/ sgo rnams pa ni yi dbus su ni// lugs kyul sogs bzhag par bya// dkyim 'khor gyi rol gnas rnams su/ 
75a2(rgyud): yi rdo rje rigs rnams so// de nas de dag gi snying po 'di rnams bshad do// oM badz+ra a gu sha ma hA kro ta A kar sha ya saR+Wa sa ma ya hU~M dza/ oM badz+ra pa sha ma hA kro ta pra be sha ya sa ma ya hU~M hUM/ oM badz+ra kro ti s+pho ta
75a3(rgyud): ya ma hA kro d+ha ya ban dA ban d+ha saR+YA sa ma ya hUM baM/ oM badz+ra a pa shwa ma hA kro d+ha a bai shwa swaR+Ya sa ma ya hUM A/ de nas yang 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa TI dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa
75a4(rgyud): bshad do// de la dang po nyid du rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid khro bo ti ri ti ri phyag rgya bcings te zhugs shing / zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
75a5(rgyud): ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i dbang du mchis te/ tshar bcad par rigs pa rnams ni tshar gcad do// rjes su bzung bar rigs pa rnams ni rjes su bzung na/ da ji ltar sgrub pan
75a6(rgyud): bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol zhes bya ste/ rdo rje khro bo ti ri ti ri'i phyag rgya rang gi snying khor ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag ste/ rdo rje lcags kyu la stsogs pas las byas nas
75a7(rgyud): yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad chings shig dang des na thams cad byon par 'gyur ro// de nas yang grasang bya'i mchod pa bzhi byas nas/ bdug pa la sogs pa yang de bzhin no// de nas
75a8(rgyud): cho ga 'dis rdo rje slob ma rnams chug shog/ rdo rje slob ma rang nyid kyis rdo rje khro To ti ri ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te/ slob ma la snying po 'di dang 'ching du chug shig/ mo gr-ih+Na badz+ras ma ya~M ts+tsha baM// de nas
75b1(rgyud): gos sngon po bgos la/ mgo lnga gtsug tor sngon pos bcings te// dUr sngon pos gdong bkris la sngags 'dis chug shig/ oM badz+ra sa mA ya pre bi sha mi/ de nas bcug s+ho/ rdo rje dbab pa'i dam
75b2(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya dang snying po 'dis de la dbab par gyis shig/ oM badz+ra a be sha a// de nus pabyis pas na de ltar babs pa'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs so// 'das
75b3(rgyud): pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba thams cad skad cig gis shes so// gnod pa yang med par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// hUM zhes pas kyang sems can thams
75b4(rgyud): cad la tshar bcad pa dang phan gdags pa byed nus par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rjes yang rtag tu de'i dgongs pa thams cad sgrub bo// de nas mna'i snying po 'di byon cig/ de nas gdong g.yogs pa dkro
75b5(rgyud): tedakyil 'khor chen po ji lta ba bzhin du ston cig/ dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag las rnam par rgya
75b6(rgyud): pa'i nus par 'gyur ro// hUM zhes bya bas lha chen po la sogs pa lha thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang mnan par nus par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa
75b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing rang gi dngos grub sbyin par mdzad do// de nas de la rdo rje dbang bskur te/ rang
75b8(rgyud): gi mtshan ma rdo rje rnon po ji lta ba bzhin du sngags 'dis lag pa gnyis su sbyin no// oM badz+ra pa ni badz+ra kirma ka re b+ha ba/ de nas gas sngags 'dis rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur ro// oM badz+raM kro t+yA tA/ 
76a1(rgyud): ah+ni Shi na tsa mi/ badz+ra ne ma a b+hi She ka ta he badz+ra na ma/ de nas gang la ming btags pa de la kye zhes bya ba'i sgra dang sgrub pa'o// de nas ye shes rnams bskyed do// 
76a2(rgyud): rdo rje khre bor mnyam gzhag nas// 'bar ba mang po'i 'od can gyis// rdo rje dbyibs ni snying khar bsam// skye bo kun la 'bebs pa rna byed// rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag nas// dpral
76a3(rgyud): bar rdo rje rin chen yang // de bzhin du ni bsams byas nas// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// rdo rje khro bo mnyam gzhag naso// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po yi// rdo rje pad
76a4(rgyud): mo 'gul du bsam// sems can thams cad rlag par byed// rdo rje khro bo mnyam gzhag pas// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po'i 'od// rdo rje thams cad spyi bor bzhag/ skye bo 'di
76a5(rgyud): dag thams cad bsrung // de nas ye shes kyi phyag rgya 'dr-i rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// hUM sa ta badz+ra kro d+ha u bi shra a hod na badz+ra kro d+ha na ma ya tA/ oM d+harma badz+ra kro d+ha na shau ya phaT
76a6(rgyud): hUM badz+ra karma kro d+ha rak+Sha/ de nas lha thams cad 'grogs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya brlab po// lag pa ra hU~M zhes bya ba 'i rdo rje lcags kyu bris+t+ra nAs su// khros nas 'dzub mo bkug pa ni// 
76a7(rgyud): lha rnams 'gugs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// rang gi rkang 'thil dbus su ni// rdo rje lcags kyu bris nas su// de nyid kyis ni rtag mnan na// lha rnams nges pa nyid du 'gugs// 
76a8(rgyud): lpags kyu nyid phyag rgya// legs par phye ste bzhiganas su// bskul ning bu ma la sogs pa// bud med thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur// rdo rje lcags kyu bzhag po ni/ 'dzub mo
76b1(rgyud): nyid du de bzhin te// des mAn na lha ni gang yin pa// da yi 'gugs pa dam pa'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// oM badz+ra k+Sho d+ha a kr-i I ka rapyAsha ya hUM phaTaM/ au badz+ra karmaM au g+hu shwA kro d+ha i
76b2(rgyud): ka ra sha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha da na a kra A ka ra sha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma na ga na tsa A ka ra Sha ya mri ti badz+ra sa ma yaM ma na sma ra ya hUM phaT/ de nas phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi'i yi shes bslab
76b3(rgyud): po/ g.yon brkyang par ni gnanas su// rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis te// hUM tsam gyi ni skad cig gis// skye bo thams cad 'bebs par byed// rdo rje ngag ni legs par smras// hUM zhes bya ba
76b4(rgyud): bzhi ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yis// thams cad kyang ni nges par 'gugs// rdo rje khro bo ro mnyam gzhag nas// rdo rje khro bo'i rta mchog gis// skye bo kun ni gsod byed do// 
76b5(rgyud): rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor ro// yid kyis lus la go bgro bar// bdag gam pha rol rnams la ste// go cha chen po sbyor bas ni// skye bo 'di dag thams cad bsrung // de nas de dag gi snying po ni
76b6(rgyud): 'di dag yin no// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya A baM shwa ya hUM sa?/ oM badz+ra bid d+yod ta ma ma hA kro tA a na yats+tshang+ka/ b+ha gaHhUM paTo.oM badz+ra kro d+hA dr-iSh+Ti ha na da ha pa tsa bi ni sha ya hI ka ra Na pa ta ya badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ 
76b7(rgyud): oM mA no dr-i No badz+rA kA bo tsakro d+ha ra kA hUM phaT/ de nas sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bskyab po// rdo rje khro bo mAnyam gzhag nas/ badz+ra hUM zhes bzlas pa yis// gang dang
76b8(rgyud): gang la kun zhugs pas// phyag rgyas btab par de 'gyur ro// sgra chen du ni brjod par bya// Ta ki hUM phaT khros nas ni// lan gcig gang la smras pa ni// rdo rje 'bar bas de mngon bkug
77a1(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin bcing // rdo rje lta bas bltas pa yi// sems can gang dang glang yin pa// de dang de ni 'ching byarar-i 'gyur// bsod nams yid la
