77a2(rgyud): bsams nas su// snying khar rdo rje sgom par byed// hUM zhes bya bar nyid kyis kun// rgyas btab par ni nyid kyis dgongs// sems can gang lta gang gang gis// yid kyis rgyas
77a3(rgyud): ni Sh+Tadebs pa 'di// smyug rgya 'dis ni shin du yaung // las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// dwe nas de dag gi snying po 'di dag yin no// Ta kI a Ta kir+N+Na/ Ta ki hUM Ta ki haM/ phyag rgya
77a4(rgyud): re res kyang las bzhi rnams la phyag rgya'i snying po bzhis sbyar ro// de nas gsang ba'i khro bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// yan lag kun gyis mkhyud nas ni// hUM zhes gang la sbyar
77a5(rgyud): bAr bya/ dbang po gnyis ni srad byas nas// de yi srog ni ma rungs 'gyur// hUM zhes bya bar ldan pa yis// mchu sbrad sos ni mchu bzung na// dbang po gnyis ni rab spyad pa// ga
77a6(rgyud): yin de ni mngon sum 'gyur// hUM zhes sbyor ba gang yin pa// de ni bde pa mong bar 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni sbrad 'gyur nas// gang yin du ni sdug bsngal 'thob// hUM zhes pa
77a7(rgyud): bar gang sbyar zhing // dbang po gnyis ni spyad nas kyang // yan lag kun gyis btsir gyur na// de yi lus ni bsrungs par 'gyur// de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag go/ hU~M
77a8(rgyud): adz+dza// de nas 'jig rten gsum lngas rnam par rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi phyag rgyu'i ye shes bslab bo// gang gis sems can phan pa'i
77b1(rgyud): phyir/ rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni// sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas nas// de ni sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur// dbang phyug dang ni u ma yang // sa la sris te de ltar mnan// ji ltar
77b2(rgyud): bris pa'i go rims bzhin/ sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// 'di ni bcing pa tsam gyis kyang // de ni 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba// rdo rje hUM dang 'dra ba yis// dngos grub rdzu
77b3(rgyud): 'phrul myur du thob// ji ltar ri mo bris pa bzhin// 'bar bas bskor ba'i dbus bzhag pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// de nas de rnams
77b4(rgyud): las bshad de// rdo rje'i las ni bla na med// sangs rgyas rjes su dran grub pas// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob po// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal bcings na// 'jig rten gsum
77b5(rgyud): lus rnam rgyal 'gyur// rdo rje tshe dang kun du 'gro// rdo rje hUM zhes bya bar 'dra// rdo rje dbang gis rgyal por 'gyur// chos bzang ldan pas 'dzin rten dbang // lus kyi rdo rje khro ba
77b6(rgyud): rdo rje las ni byed pur 'gyur// sems dpa' khro bo rab tu brtan// khro bo'i lcags kyu sra yang dag dgugs/ khro bo'i chags pas chags par byed// khro bo legs par
77b7(rgyud): dga' ba stenaHkhro gAny+tsir gyis ni ma rungs byed/ khro bo nyims gzi brjid mchogadapal gyis khro bo don rnams sdud// ha ha dgod pa bdud byed do// chos kyi khro byos chos
77b8(rgyud): rnams bsdun/ rdo rje ral gris gcod por byed// rgyu'i khro bos sdug bsngal 'phrogakhro bos smra bas tshig 'phrog go// las kyi khro bo sa las rab ste// bsrung ba yis ni
78a1(rgyud): bsrung byar byed// khro bro gnod sbyin dgra yang zla// khro bo khu tshur dngos grub ster// de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bshad do// rdo rje gnyis las
78a2(rgyud): byung ba ni/ dam tshig mchog tu grags pa yin// de dag bcing pa bshad bya gA/ khro bo bcing bu bla na med// lag n-i rdo rjer byas nas ni// mthe'u chung lcags kyur bcing par
78a3(rgyud): bya/ 'dzub mo gnyis kyis bsdigs pa ni// 'jig rten gsum lus rgyal zhes bya// de bzhin 'ju sa ngos sbyar te// nor bu 'dra baR+Sha rab tu dgug/ gung mo mnyam bsgreng
78a4(rgyud): br-id me byAd+d+hagung mo 'dzub mo gnyis kas sdigs// 'dzub mo gnyis ka rdo rjer bya// grayas pa lcags kyur dgug par bya/ de nyid hUM zhes bya bar 'dud// legs par sbyin
78a5(rgyud): pa de bzhin te// 'dzub mo gnyis dpral ba'i gnyer ma ru bzhag/ snying khar 'dzub mos nyi mar bskor// lag pa rkyang ste spyi bor bzhag/ 'dzub mo kha nas rgod ltar bya/ 
78a6(rgyud): 'dzub mo'i sen mo sbyar bar bya// g.yas pa ral gri bcings pa'o// gung 'dzub gnyis bsgreng 'khor lo yi// kha yi nang nas byung ba dang // 'dzub myo gung mo rdo rjer byo// 'dzun
78a7(rgyud): mo yis ni mgul par bsko// 'dzub mo gnyis ni mche ba che// 'dzub mo bkug pa rdo rje rabacings// rdo rje las se la sogs pa// sems mu'i phyag rgya nyid hU~M/ zhes bya chos kyi phyug
78a8(rgyud): rgyasahU~M zhes bya bar lhan cig go// de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// hU~M ni sangs rgyas rdo rjenan// hU~M ni rdo rje snyid do y-i/ nini rdo rjesna yi'o// oM ni rdo
78b1(rgyud): thums cad kyi// hUM hUM trAM/ taM hi hi d+he ha d+h+wi ka d+hI hUM graM kaM baM drI A// rdo rje khro bo mang po yi// chos kyi rgyu rab sgrub pa'o// de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi/ las kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// rdo rje rigs/ 
78b2(rgyud): ni chen po yi las kyi phyag brgya mdor bsdus na// rdo rje 'gying la sogs tshul gyis// khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis su bshad// gang dang gang gi phyag rgya rnams// lus kyi phyogs ni gang du ba/ 
78b3(rgyud): de dang de ru ni bsgyur nas kyang // phyag rgya der ni sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya thams cad kyi go cho ga'o// // de nas 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i spyi'i phyag
78b4(rgyud): rgya bshad do/ 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya ni// rdo rje 'dzub mo'i dam tshig go/ rdo rje hUM zhes sngags kyis te// dngos grub thams cad yud kyis thob// mthe'u chung gnyis kau lcags
78b5(rgyud): kyur bcing d+ha rdo rje gnyis ka'i bla 'og tu// dam tshig lcags kyu'i phyag rgya 'di// skad cig gis ni thams cad dgug/ rig haM thams cad kyi// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bshad
78b6(rgyud): thams cad kyang ni gnod pa ste// de bzhin las rnams thams cad byid// rdo rje 'dzub sor gnyis legs par// rab mnyam gzhag la bsnyams nas ni// shi ba thams cad slong ba ste/ 
78b7(rgyud): rdo rje slong pa zhes bya'o// rdo rje 'dzub gnyis logs par yang // rdo rje bcing pa bcings nas su// bsgyur te gtsug tu bzhag pa ni// tshe dang nad med 'phel ba'o// rdo rje bcing ba
78b8(rgyud): dam byas te// mthe bong bsnyems te nang du gzhug/ 'dzub mo dam por bkug nas su// gtsus pa zhabs su baMkrug pa'o// 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba cings nas su// glang
79a1(rgyud): / gis gzugs la rkang g.yon pas// legs mnan pa yi sems can de// zla ba phyed kyis grub par 'gyur// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings pa// gcig la
79a2(rgyud): gcig ni brdabs pa ni/ sems can gang gi lus la ni// babs nas de yang rdob par byed// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// bdag gam pha rol po cher bya// 'dzub mo
79a3(rgyud): gnyis kyis bcings byas nas// rtag pa nyid du bsrung bar 'gyur// rdo rje 'thil du bcings nas su// yid rgyas khros nas dag par bya// mthe bong rdo rje dam po ste// rdo rdza
79a4(rgyud): rigs chen grub par 'gyur// sems dpa' rdo rje dam byas te// mthe bong gnyis ni ra ba mnan cing // mthe'u chung rdo rje rtse mor ni// rnon po dam tshig 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyi
79a5(rgyud): bcings te/ 'dzub mo gnyis dgug bcings nas su// gcu zhing phyir gcus byas nas ni// lha dgug pa'i dam pa yin// rdo rje bcings pa dam byas te// 'dzu mo gnyis dkug
79a6(rgyud): rab tu mun na// mthe bong gnyis ka sbyar ba yis// dbus su btsir ba bar snang gi'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka las// mthe'u chung gnyis ka bcings pa las// rgya ba sbyar 'dzub mo
79a7(rgyud): gnyis sbrel te// bsgyur ba namra mkha'i spyod pa'i 'o// rdo rje btsangs pa bsdams nas su// rdo rje bsrung ba btsir bar bya// 'di ni sa yi dam tshig te// thams cad byed pos 'da'
79a8(rgyud): rdorje'i phyag rgya gnyis macings te// g.yon pa'i rdo rje 'dzub mo lnga// mthe'u chung mdung cung drag tu gtog/ 'drin sa 'og dgugasa'o// rdo rje baning bsnyel ba ni/ cu mngon
79b1(rgyud): ka dam po ste/ gung mo mthe bong rdo rje ste// gdug pa 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// mnyam par bzhag cing snying khar bzhag/ khro bo khu tshur gnyis btso
79b2(rgyud): ba/ phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'jig pa'o// g.yon pa'i rdo rje 'dzub mo la// g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo bkug pas bzung // rab tu khros nas drag gtogs na// r-i rab kyang na ltung bar byed// 
79b3(rgyud): g.yon pa'i rdo rje 'dzab mo la// g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo lcags kyus bzung // rab tu khros shing dgug pa yis// gdon rnams kun la dbang du byed// rdo rje bcing ba byas nas su// lag ngar
79b4(rgyud): snying khar shin du bsdam// rdo rje 'dzub mo gnyis chan khung // 'brud pa yis ni snying 'byin to// 'dzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yis// mthe bong gnyis ka'i drung du ni// yid kyis khros
79b5(rgyud): nas btsir bar bya// rims la sogs dgug dam pa'o// rdo rje thal mo dam sbar te// 'dzub mo gnyis ka bkug nas su// mthe bong rab tu mnyam sbar bas/ mnan pa
79b6(rgyud): de ni sdigo 'phrog pa'o// rdo rje yi phyag rgya gnyis nang du// 'dzub mo gnyis ni bci sA nas kyang // legs par gyen du 'phangs pa yi// ltung ba slong ba'i dam pa'o// rdo rje
79b7(rgyud): btsang pa dam byas te// gung mo gnyis ka ngos sbyar nas// tha ma bzhi'i ngos sprad pa// skad cig tu ni sdig 'drul lo// de nas de bzhin gshogs pa
79b8(rgyud): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khorachen po sgrub pa'i phyag rgya 'di bshad do// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bzung nas ni// dkyil 'khor dang por srad bu drisrad bu
80a1(rgyud): bris pa'i phyi nas ni// srad bu ji bzhin bri bar bshad// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis ka yi// 'dzub mo rtse so rab sbyar ba// byas nas tshon rnams thams cad la// 
80a2(rgyud): 'u bar ba'i lta bas dgag par bya// rdo rje 'dzub mo yang dag par// sbyar la bkan te bsdams nas su// rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni// sgro dbye ba yI mchog yin no// de nas
80a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa bshad do// g.yon po brkyang pa'i tshul byas te// khro bo yi ni skad 'byin ci khro zhing khro ba'i lta bas ni// lus rnams
80a4(rgyud): thams cad bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pra thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i
80a5(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa// rdzogs s+ho// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes// rdo rjes gzugs kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i
80a6(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM saR+Wa badz+ra ni badz+ra ma te A na ya sar+b+ba badz+ra sad ti na hUM dzA// de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis
80a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kha nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid rdo rje dang rang gi lus thams cad 'dra ba kun nas 'byar bas bskor nas/ zlardo rje khro
80a8(rgyud): kho'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyu nas byung ste// 'jig rten gsum gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don bsgrubs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdzorje sems
80b1(rgyud): dpa'i btsun mo gsang ba smras pa'i phyir sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i
80b2(rgyud): tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lo 'dug nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di cheng du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba'i ye shes bla na med gang // de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i phyir// btsun mo nyid du
80b3(rgyud): gyur ba yin// hrI/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rje rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i dam tshig gsang ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya'o// rdo rje 'odakyil 'tsho
80b4(rgyud): dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// khro bo'i gsang ba 'di bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bri// dkyil 'khor l-I'i gnas rnams su// gas
80b5(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya bzhag par bya// rdo rjed kyil 'khor dbus su nu// sangs rgyas skra gzugs bzhag par ba// sangs rgyas khro bo'i dam tshig kyang // ji bzhin bar na mkhas pas bri// 
80b6(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas na// phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor de ra// dbus su mdung rtse chur bris la// rdo rje rab tu bzhag par bya// 'od 'bar dbus su bris pa ni// de yi go rims ji bzhin te/ 
80b7(rgyud): rdo rje rdo rje lcags kyu dang // mda' daT+TAny+dza ga' ba de bzhin te// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal na swa ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis par yang // 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin chen bri bar bya/ 
80b8(rgyud): khro gnyer dbus su/ de bzhin rgyal mtshan// de bzhin sa oM phreng de yi// ngo sa rdo rje bri bar bya// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas kyang // dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum pa yang // dang ming bu su gnas pa ni/ rdo rje ba mo lnga
81a1(rgyud): 'bar ba'i dbus su pad mo bri// ral gri 'khor lo de bzhin no// rdo rje lce yang tshul bzhin du// rtag tu de'i phyogs su bzhag/ rdo rje'i shugs kyis rgal nas ni// dkyil
81a2(rgyud): 'khor dam pa bzhi par yang // rdo rje bsnyil la rdo rje bri// rdo rje'i 'od ni chen pos bskor// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// 'bar ba kun gyis 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje thams cad go cha
81a3(rgyud): mchog/ rdo rje mche ba khu tshur mchog/ gri dang phyi yi gnas rnams su// tshul bzhin du ni bri bar bya// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i rim+b+ha pa mdor bsdus na// dz+r-IM oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma
81a4(rgyud): ye dzI/ oM badz+ra ro hA aM gu sh+ya// a na ya saR+Wa na dzI// oM badz+ra ro She ke ma badz+ri ni// ba sha ma me a na ya badz+ri// oM badz+ra duSh+Ti kr-i d+ha tai Sha ya sa ban dz+nyi/ rdo d+hA dzA zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// 
81a5(rgyud): dzI/ oM badz+ra b+hi ku ti kr-i d+ha ha ra saR+Ya as+tha ni dzI/ oM badz+ra dza la ma la pra b+he ma hA/ kro d+ha a ga ni dzA la ya/ saR+YA ra na ni// ro ShaM dzi au badz+ra dA dza a gra ge/ u ra ma hau kro d+hi// de hi me saR+YA R+Sha na
81a6(rgyud): dzIHoM badz+ra a Ta ha si ni/ ha sa ha se ad tad te/ ha se na ma ra ya dzA/ rdo rje dzi zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// d+hi// oM badz+ra shud+d+ha kro d+he ha na mASh+Thaya duSh+TA na d+hi// oM badz+ra ti ga shA kro d+he
81a7(rgyud): tshon d+ha badz+ra kro she ne saR+YA na d+hi/ oM badz+ra he du ma kro d+hi pra bi Sha tsag kra ma prA be sha ya saR+YA na d+hi/ oM badz+ra dzi he ma hA kro d+ha// b+ha she bA tsa na pra mu tsa d+hi/ rdo rje 'di zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor
81a8(rgyud): ro/ wa~M// oM badz+ra sar+b+ba mu khai karma badz+rI ni ma ho krod+l-i ku ru saR+Wa na tAM/ oM badz+ra ka tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha ma ma hI/ oM badz+ra tsaN Da kr-i d+hi ma hA yak+Sha~M ni badz+ra dpoSh+TaM/ u kArA la bi sha na~M pa sha ya hU~M/ oM
81b1(rgyud): kro d+ha mu sti ban d+ha hrI rdo rje hrI zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor grwa rnams rdo rje gar la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rig pa rnams gsungs pa// oM badz+ra hUM/ gau/ badz+ra dz+nyA tshA/ 
81b2(rgyud): badz+ra hU~M taM/ badz+ra hU~M s+t+waM/ phyi rol gyi grwa rnams su sil snyan gyi mchod pa'i snying po brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra ti to/ badz+ra TaM Ta/ badz+ra d+ha hu/ badz+ra d+ho d+haHde nas sgo'i mchod pa'i snying po rnams gsungs
81b3(rgyud): pa/ badz+ra dzA dza/ badz+ra hUM hUM/ badz+ra baM baM/ badz+ra a a/ de nas de la 'drir rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ba dzag/ nas de la thog ma nyid rdzu
81b4(rgyud): re shig 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i daphyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i cho ga bzhin du bcug ste/ rdo rje thogs te rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / lan gyi phyag rgya
81b5(rgyud): dang / nye ba'i phyag rgya dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang ba mchod pa'i phyir/ gar gyis mchod par bya'o// de la ga ra dang lan gyi gar dang / nye ba'i gar dang ye shes kyi gar
81b6(rgyud): rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no// de la dang po nyid du rdo rje dbyings su gsungs pa'i snying pos// rdo rje'i glu len cing de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad la bstod
81b7(rgyud): pas mchod par byas nas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya drug tu gtog par bya'o// de nas ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams// phyag rgya rnams kyi yang dag par 'bob so// rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis
81b8(rgyud): ni rdo rje khro bo'i 'dzub mo gnyis// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgyar ni// snying khar shin du bcing bar bya// de nas gar gyi cho ga yi// rdo rje khro bo lhag klu yis// sangs rgyas thos cad spyan drang ngo // rdo rje mdabe ni 'brang bar bya/ 
82a1(rgyud): rdo rje mnga' ni 'phangs pas na// rdo rje dga' bas bsgrub par bya// phyag rgya'i cho ga bzhin dkrol te// thal mo brdab cing bcing bar bya// mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni// phyag
82a2(rgyud): na rdo rje mnyes par bya// mnyes nas dgos pa thams cad ni// 'dod bzhin skad cig nyid kyis sgrub/ de la gar gi phyag rgya'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// sid d+ya badz+ra/ a nA ya badz+ra/ 
82a3(rgyud): rA ga badz+rA/ sA d+hu badz+ra/ de'i 'og tu lan gyi grwar gyi mchod pa bya ste/ de bzhin gar gis g.yon par ni/ khu tshur g.yas pas bzung nas su// bsgyur zhing 'dzub me'i ngos kyis ni/ dpral
82a4(rgyud): ba nyid la gzhag par bya/ de bzhin gar byed nyi ma yang // bskor ba nas yang dag dgug par bya// rdo rje rgyal mtshan bslangs nas ni// rdo rje ha ha zhes rgod cing / mchod pa'i cho ga
82a5(rgyud): 'di yis ni/ rgyal po la sogs mi kun kyang / dbang dang rab kyi gzi brjid kyang / sbyin dang rgod pas mnyes pa dang / de la 'di rnams ni lan gyi gar gyi snying po yin no// a hi badz+ra/ dza la ya
82a6(rgyud): badz+ra/ de hi badz+ra/ ha sA ya badz+ra/ de bzhin gar yang dkrol nas ni/ pad mo'i kha dbus sbyar ba yis/ 'dzub mo'i rtse mo snying khar gzhag/ bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud par bya/ de bzhin
82a7(rgyud): grar byed rdo rje yi// ral gris baglegs ni gsad par bya/ 'gal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba yi// 'khor lo dkyil 'khor tshul du bskor// rdo rje'i tshig tu glu len ltar// phyag ni rdo rjes mchod
82a8(rgyud): par bya/ mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni// thams cad rtag pa nyid du 'gyur// de la 'di rnams ni nye ba'i snying po rnams yin no// kA ma ya badz+re/ tshi ni d+hi badz+dza/ b+h+ra ma ya badz+re/ bru he badz+ra/ rdo
82b1(rgyud): khro bo'i 'dzub yang dag/ bkan nas rtse mo sbyar nas kyang // bsgyur te de nas gtsug tor du/ 'dzub mo'i rtse mos bzhag par bya// rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis ni// las kun mchog gi dkyil 'khor du
82b2(rgyud): gar gyi cho ga bsnun par bya// snying khar rab tu bzhag par bya// de bzhin gar gyi cho ga yis// rdo rje cho ga bcing bar bya// rdo rje 'phye ba bcings nas ni// rdo rje bcings nas mnan par bya/ 
82b3(rgyud): mchod pa 'di ste cho ga yis// las rnams kun kyang nus par 'gyur// mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas ni// cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya dkrol// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// nr-i t+yA badz+ra/ 
82b4(rgyud): rak+Sha badz+ra/ kha da badz+ra/ ban d+ha badz+ra/ de nas khro bo'i gsang pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po/ rdo rje bzung ba'i lag gnyis kyis/ khros pa'i yid kyis drag tog bya// skye bo gang gis ming
82b5(rgyud): smos pa// de yi snying ni 'gas par 'gyur// ma mchu so yis bzung nas su// gang gi ming smos bzar ba ni// de yi mgo yang myur 'gas te// gang gi bka' las 'da' ba'o// khro bo
82b6(rgyud): khro chen lta ba ya// mig kyang 'jams par byed pa ni// gang ga mang na sos bltas pa// de yi shin rdol bar 'gyur// rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag la// bdag rang gi na snang khar yang // rdo rje
82b7(rgyud): bcings pa btsi ra nA ni// dwe yi snyoms ni 'jog par 'gyur// de dgra las de dag gi snying po 'di yin no// hUM badz+ra s+pho T+Ta thA/ hUM muM khA rbad+d+ha thA/ hUM badz+ra ne tA thA/ hUM badz+ra ne mo thA/ de nas rdo rje chen mo'i
82b8(rgyud): rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// de la dang po shog phyag rgya chen po'i bcing ba bshad do/ mthe'u chung myigs kya bcings nas ni/ rdo rje khro bor bzhig par bya// g.yon
83a1(rgyud): rtse gsum rgyab du ni// 'jig rton gsum las rgyal zhes bshad// g.yon pa'i 'dzub mo thad kar brkyang // de bzhin bkan pa pad mo yi// de bzhin du ni bsgyur nas
83a2(rgyud): ni// g.yon pa'i rdo rje bzhag par bya// rdo rje'i 'thil du bcing byas te// khros pa'i yid kyis dgab pa ni// khro bo rdo rje dam pas so// khro bo ti rI he rir ba shar// 'dzub mo lcags kyu dgug pa
83a3(rgyud): nyid// 'dzub mo'i ngas ni sbyar ba'o// de bzhin 'dzub mo legs sbyin pa'o// 'dzub mo spyad de dpral bar bzhag/ snying khar nyi ma rab tu brtan// 'dzub mo bsnyams nas spyi bor bzhag/ bsgyur
83a4(rgyud): nas dgod par bzhag par bya// 'dzub myo pad mas khwa 'bus bzhin//  gnyis ka ral gri 'chang ba 'dzin// 'dzub gnyis 'khor lor bcings pa'o// 'dzub mo bsnyams te kha nas dbyung / 
83a5(rgyud): 'dzub mo shin du brkyang ba dang / 'dzub mo mgul du bcing bar bya// de nyid kha 'gram 'che bar gzhag/ khu tshur dam du bcings pa ni// phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad// de nas rdo rje rig
83a6(rgyud): kyi gsang ba pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// gsang ba pa'i khu tshur las byas pa/ dam tshig mchog tu rab tu grags// de rnams bcing ba shad bya ba// rdo rje bcing ba bla na med
83a7(rgyud): snying khar bzhag nas rtsi ba logs su// mda' drang ba yi g.yon pas ni// snying kha nas ni dbyung bar bya// khro gnyer du ni bsgyur nas ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang // spyi bor lag pa
83a8(rgyud): brkyang ba dang // bskor nas dgod par bzhag par bya// kha'i dbus su rab bzhag dang // 'dzub mo ral gyi 'debs pa 'dra// 'khor lho bskor bar ston pa dang / khA nas rab tu
83b1(rgyud): 'byin pa ste/ spyi bos lus mchog dkyil 'khor ro// dpung pa snying kha rtsi ba logs rnams// rdo rje bsrung ba de bzhin bya/ mche ba'i gnas su bzhig pa dang / khu tshu dam du
83b2(rgyud): bsdoms pa'o// phyi rol dkyil 'khor phyag rgya ni// mtshan ma'i go rims bzhin bcing ba// dam tshig rdo rje bcings pa las// de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur bcing // de nas rdo rje'i rigs gsang ba'i
83b3(rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgya rnamasau bshad do// phaT shau Ta mAT sa Da/ rad ta Ta/ d+h+waM Ta ha Tar+Napa Ta ta Ta ka Ta d+ha Ta/ ku Ta ri Ta kha Ta baT/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// 
83b4(rgyud): mdor ni las kyi phyag rgya ni// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas te/ gnas gang yin par bzhag par bya// khro bo'i lta ba khro dang ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog
83b5(rgyud): chen po'i rgyal po las// khro bo gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
83b6(rgyud): kyis rdo rje rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM saR+YA ta thA ga ta sA ka ShA badz+ra kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po 'jig rten
83b7(rgyud): gsum las rnam par rgyal byas rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra sUkaSh+ma badz+ra kro d+ha kri ma hUM phaT/  nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos 'jig rten gsum las
83b8(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rdo bla ma'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra sA kaSh+Ta bad+d+ha rang na krod+ha bla ma cu n+de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis 'jig rten gsus sa rnams
84a1(rgyud): @rdo rje phra mo'i rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di g+ha sang+yas so// oM badz+ra sugaSh+Ta badz+ra pad ma hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam pa
84a2(rgyud): rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i reg pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM bid+hi su gaSh+ma badz+ra karma kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje si nang gi rigs bskyed pa'i phyir rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil
84a3(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i tshul du 'khod de/ de rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra satwa su gaSh+ma dz+nyA na kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ oM su gaSh+ma badz+ra aM ku sha a ka R+Sha sha ya ma ha kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra su gaSh+Ta~M
84a4(rgyud): ra ga kro d+ha a nu ra ka ya ni pra ma hUM phaT/ oM su gaSh+pa badz+ra duSh+Ti kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM su gaSh+ma badz+ra kro dA b+h+r-i ku te ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ oM su gaSh+mA badz+ra dza la maN+Da la gr-i d+ha su r+ya dza la ya hUM phaT/ oM su gaSh+pa badz+rad dza kle r+d+ha
84a5(rgyud): sar+b+ba artan me pra yad cha shi gr-i hUM phaT/ oM badz+ri sug Sh+Te ha sa kro ta ma hA a Ta ha sa haM ha hUM phaT/ oM su gaSh+Ta badz+ra d+harma krod+b+ha sho d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM su gaSh+Ta badz+ra ched kro d+ha tshin d+ha b+hin d+ha hUM phaT/ oM su gaSh+pA baH/ 
84a6(rgyud): kro d+ha ma hA tsakra tshin d+ha pa ta ya bi shau ra ma pra sh+ya hri da ya ma bin d+ha hUM phaT/ oM su ga Sh+Ta badz+ra hUM kai ra kro d+ha ha na pa d+ha ya bag ma twe Na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra su gaSh+ma badz+ra ka ra ma kro d+ha saR+Wa kar+m+ma ka ro b+ha ba saR+Ya ka t+ya Ni sad ta ya
84a7(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra su gaSh+ma ka pa tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra su gaSh+Ta badz+ra yak+Sha kro d+ha ha na b+ha ya saR+YA du Sh+TA na/ ts+tshi na ti ta ma twe na badz+ra daMSh+TaM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra su gap+sA badz+ra mu Sh+Ti kro d+ha ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ 
84a8(rgyud): de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rigs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa/ de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas narma
84b1(rgyud): bo'i ye shes zhes kyang bshad// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad slad bu bya// de yi dbus su sangs rgyas bri// rdo rje ye shes dbus chud pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyogs
84b2(rgyud): kun du/ sangs rgyas de nyid kun bris shig/ rdo rje'i shugs kyis rgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams su yang // 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal sogs// rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya// de
84b3(rgyud): rnams kyi ni phyogs kun du// rdo rje khro bo cho ga bzhin// de nas 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa rgyas pa bshad de// de la dang po nyid du re shig bcug nas bka' bsku
84b4(rgyud): ba ni/ de ring khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo nyid dang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur gyis de legs par nan tan gyis shig/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing
84b5(rgyud): lus pa med pa yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phan pa dang / bde ba dang dam pa grub pa thob pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir gyi bar du/ rdo rje khro bas sems can
84b6(rgyud): thams cad kyang / yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir btud byed na ma rungs pa thams cad lta smos kyang ci dgos// de skad bsgo nas gdong g.yogs bkrol te/ de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad bstan
84b7(rgyud): nas/ rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du lag po gnyis su sbyin no// de nas rdo rje khro ba'i ye shes phra mo rnams slob shig/ rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje phra mo brtan byas la// hUM zhes bya bar rab sbyar ba
84b8(rgyud): dam sreg ni 'jig para'i gyum// rdo rjem mo banan byas to// cho ga bzhin du mchod nga no// ji srid par du mchod pangs// rdo srid kyi ning/ de 'jig/ rdo drugan lce'i byir gyi s+ya
85a1(rgyud): mo tshal sbyar la// khro bor ldan par ji srid mchog/ de snyed sems can ma rungs byed// de bzhin de yi bsdu ba yang // rnal 'byor can gyis 'dod na ni// ma lus pa ni thams cad la/ 
85a2(rgyud): slar yang 'tshe bar sbyin par bya// dr-i la de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no// hUM hUM na shwa ya badz+ra/ hUM na sha ya badz+ra/ hUM bI na ya saR+Ya na badz+ra/ oM su gA p+ta badz+ra pra da t+ya na ye shrI g+hAn hUM/ sems can gang gi ngagra la ni
85a3(rgyud): lhan cig gyur pa cher bstan pa// byams pa mched pa'i tshul gyis ni// ngag bo spro bas gzhig par bya// dgra ba 'phro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// ga su 'ang rung ba'i snying rje can// rdo rje rnal 'byor de yis
85a4(rgyud): ni// gdug pa thams cad de 'jig go/ chos sam yang na chos min pa// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsol ba// de ltar bsgoms na sems can la// hUM zhes bya bas 'jigs par byed// gdul bar bya
85a5(rgyud): ma'i sems can gang // sangs rgyas byang chub snod min pa// de rnams yang dag sbyar ba'i phyir// hUM zhes bya byas gzhig par bya// de la de rnams kyi snying po rnams ni 'di dag yin no// bai ra badz+ra krod+ha hUM/ 
85a6(rgyud): Tadz+dzaka ru na badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ hUM bi shud d+hA badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje dbyings ni bris nas kyang // yid kyis kyang ni gang su yi// khyim gyi dbus su lhung bsams na// de yi rigs de 'dzag par 'gyur/ 
85a7(rgyud): de bzhin phra ba'i cho ga yis// snying khar rdo rje bsgoms nas kyang // byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs/ lhung na rigs ni 'jig par 'gyur// phyag ni rdo rje'i gzugs chen po// bsgoms
85a8(rgyud): nas gang du srung bde'i// slang sri dgos pa sna tshogs kyis// btsun mor bcas pa 'dogs par 'grug// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa / ngas rgyas gzugs ni ba sgoms nas / 
85b1(rgyud): ba gang la lhung ba ni// de yi snang srid nges par 'jig/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// / hUM badz+ra pr-i pa ta/ hUM b+ho d+hi satwa pra baR+Sha ta/ hUM badz+ra d+ha ra pra ba ta/ hUM dud d+ha pra ba ta/ NAM rdo rje phra mo rab
85b2(rgyud): sbyor bas// zla ba'i gzugs la bdag rang nyid// bsgoms nas su yi bdag nyid yang // gang du lhung ba der lhung 'gyur// zla ba rdo rjer bdag rang nyid// bsgoms nas su yaM bdag rang yang // rab tu
85b3(rgyud): khros nas gar lhung bar// de yi rigs ni mod la lhung // bdag rang phyag na rdo rjer ni// bsgoms nas su ni bdag rar yang // gang du lhung ba de yi yul// ring por mi thogs 'jig par 'gyur// bdag
85b4(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas gzugs nyid du// bsgoms nas su ni bdag nyid yang // gang du ltung ba de yi ni// snang srid ring por mi thogs 'jig/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnas yin no// b+ho d+h+ya g+hu pre ba ta ya hUM/ sa twa
85b5(rgyud): badz+ra pra ba ta ya hUM/ badz+ra sa ta pra pA ta hUM/ bud d+ha pra ba ta hUM/ de nas de'i rigs kyi chos kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// rdo rje khro bor snyoms zhugs la// rang gi lus kyis yongs bskor la/ 
85b6(rgyud): rdo rje hUM byas mkhyud na ni// gang gis ming skyes de 'chi'o// rdo rje phra mo snyoms zhugs la// sna nas phra ba thang cig min// dbugs btang hUM zhes bya tshul gyis// 'jig rten gsum yang lhung bar
85b7(rgyud): 'gyu mo/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la// khros nas rdo rje lta ba yis// ltas pas su ni mdongs par 'gyur// yang na 'chi b.ru ni 'gyur// bu gu nas ni zhugs nas ni// yid kyis gang yang rung ba yi// 
85b8(rgyud): snying drangs pas na de yin// rang ngam 'di yi dbang du 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po 'di rnams gsungs pa// hUM badz+ra li ta kre d+ha ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM su gaSh+ma badz+ra shas bo sha~M pa ta ya hU~M phaH/ oM badz+ra
86a1(rgyud): nA sha ma hA \u0f7f/  g+has kA ts+tsha N+Da kro d+ha pra be shag sa ma hrI sa chen ben d+ha// da d+ha kad d+hA d+hA \u0f7f/ de nas dza rje'i tshigs chos kyi phyag rgya ni ye shes bslab bo// 
86a2(rgyud): shig phyag rgya chen po bcings pa bshad de// rdo rje ye shes sbyor ba yis// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mkhrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje khro bor bdag nyid ni// bsgoms na de ma thag tu 'grub// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi
86a3(rgyud): chos kyi dam tshig gi ye shes bslab po// ting 'dzin dam tshig ye shes las// hUM zhes bya bar gnyis dang ldan// ci rags gnas su bzhag nas ni// sgrub pa thams cad ster ba'i mchog/ de nas
86a4(rgyud): rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// phaT sha Ta maT sa ku/ oM raT ta Ta d+hi Ta ha Ta/ phaT tra Ta d+ha Ta b+haT/ kri Ta riT kha Ta phaT/ zhes bya ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya mdor bshad pa'o/ 
86a5(rgyud): de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// chos kyi khu tshur gnyis bya ste// ji ltar rigs pa'i gnas su sbyar// las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdu na// cho ga bzhin du 'grub
86a6(rgyud): par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las// rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig rgyas pa bshad pa/ 
86a7(rgyud): rdzogs s+ho// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 
86a8(rgyud): gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ oM saR+Wa ta thA ga ta kAr me sha ri hUM/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'i chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM saR+YA ta thA ga ta d+harma d+ha dA/ 
86b1(rgyud): ran ma hA pu karma bi d+hi bi ta ra sa ma yo d+hI lo kya 'i dzi ma ka ri sa r+b+ba d+ya shAn/ d+harma ya badzini hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sau rA ta thA ga
86b2(rgyud): A ka sha d+ha trA skAr na mA ha pu dza karma bi d+hi bi ta ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta d+harmA d+hA drA stA ra na ma ha pu dza kArma
86b3(rgyud): d+hista ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta saR+Wa lo ka d+ha du bi bi d+harma hA karma pu dzA bi d+yA bisti ra sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas
86b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa'i mchod pa'i tshi ga rgyas pa'i lha mo rnams rang gi snying kha nas bskyed de 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegasapa yang spyan drang ba dang dbang
86b5(rgyud): du bya ba dang / mnyes por bya ba dang / las thams cad sgrub pa'i dgos pa nyid du yang dag pa'i sbyor ba la sogs par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par
86b6(rgyud): 'phrul bar byed te/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dang / 
86b7(rgyud): chen po phyag/ rA dz+nyAs/ rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khoran dam pa ste// dzA rje dbyings dang 'dra
86b8(rgyud): bas na// las kyi rdo rje zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad pu bri// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas su ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhag
87a1(rgyud): pAr bya// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du// dam tshig mchog rnams bzhag par bya'o// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams su yang // rdo rje gtse sogs pa
87a2(rgyud): po rnams// ji ltar rims bzhin bzhag par bya// de rnams kyi ni phyogs kun du// mchod pa chen po rnams bzhag go/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya bshad do// oM badz+ra
87a3(rgyud): satwa sid d+hi dz+nyA na kaR+Ya sa ma ye hUM dz+dza/ oM badz+ra oM kaDa sha ya karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dz+r-IM/ oM badz+ra ra ti ra ga karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dz+dza/ oM badz+ra sa d+ha karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dz+nyA/ oM badz+ra b+h+r-i gu ta~M pA shi ku ra hA/ oM badz+ra
87a4(rgyud): sur+yA bA shi ku ru hUM/ oM badz+ra da dza gra ki yu ra be shi ku ru hUM/ oM badz+ra ad Ta ha sai ba shi ku ru hUM/ oM badz+ra pad ma rA ge ra ga ye hUM/ oM badz+ra ti ga ShA ra ge ra ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra man d+ha la rA ge ra gai yai hUM/ oM
87a5(rgyud): badz+ra bA ga ra gau ra ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra karma sa ma ye pA dzA ye hU~M/ oM badz+ra ka pa tsa b+han d+ha rak+Sha hU~M/ oM badz+ra a k+Sha ni ma ra ya badz+ra daMSh+Ta ya bin d+ha hri da ya a mu ka s+ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra karma muSh+NI sad d+ha hUM phaT/ daM nasu/ 
87a6(rgyud): las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te// rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi ye shes rnams bskyed do// de las dang po nyid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bsla ba po// yam shing
87a7(rgyud): mang po rnams kyi me// rab sbyar rdo rje khro bo yaM// mnyam par bzhag par snyoms 'jug pra til bsregs pas ni sdig bsregs shig/ yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// me la rab tu slar byas la// stag
87a8(rgyud): tu 'bras ni bsreg byas nagadon mi za bar khyim rgyas 'gyur// yam shing dbar po rnams kyis kyang // mkhas pas rab du me sbar te// dUr ba'i yal ga mar bcas pas// bsreg par byas na
87b1(rgyud): 'phel lo// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// me ni rab tu sbar byas la// ku sha'i yal ga 'bru mar gyis// bsreg par byas na nges par bsrung // de la de dag gi snying po 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra pa pa
87b2(rgyud): d+ha ha na badz+ra ya swA hA/ oM badz+ra pu sta ye swA hA/ oM badz+ra A yu she swA hA/ oM badz+ra a pra ti ha ta badz+ra ye swA hA/ yam shing tsha bas dang por ni// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// me sbar nas kyang se byA yi// tsher
87b3(rgyud): ma can gyis 'gugs par 'gyur// snyim shing de dag nyid kyis ni// khro dang ldan pAr me sbar nas// me tog mngar ram 'bras bu yang // sbyin bsreg byed na skye bo rangs// rnal 'byor can gyis khros nas
87b4(rgyud): kyang ny+tsa yam shing des ni me sbar la// lcags kyi phye ma bsregs na ni// rdo rje bcing ba nyid du 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// mo nyam par bzhag ste me bus la// 'bras bu kha bo khros bzhin
87b5(rgyud): bsreg/ skad cig du ni 'chi bar 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// hUM badz+ra oM kar sha ya swA hA/ hUM badz+ra ra ka ya swA hA/ hUM badz+ra b+han d+ha ya swA hA/ hUM badz+ra mu ra ya swA hA// mkhas pas yam shing
87b6(rgyud): skyur po yis// khros nas byan za sbar nas ni// 'bras pa lam skyur bsregs na// dbang du bya ba dam pa bo// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// mnyam par bzhag ste ma sbyar la// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu khros
87b7(rgyud): bsregs na// 'dod pa bzhin ni gzugs bskyed do// de 'dra ba yi yam shing gis// me ni rab tu sbar nas kyang // mi snang me tog sdong bu yis// sbyin bsreg 'dod na mi snang 'gyur// yam shing de dag
87b8(rgyud): nyid kyis ni// mnyam par gzhag sti mo sbar la// nam mkha'i lcug ma me tog gis// sbyin po sreg byas na mkha' la 'gro/ de la 'di dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM badz+ra pe sh+mi ka ra ya swAhA/ 
88a1(rgyud): badz+ra karma rU pa badz+ra ya swA hA/ oM a mi sh+tsa badz+ra ya swA hA/ oM badz+ra kha tsa rI ni swA hA// khro bor mnyam par gzhag yam shing // shin du khra bos me sbar la// badz+ri me tog bsreg byas na// 
88a2(rgyud): bka' bzhizhan bad par 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// khro dang ldan zhang me sba re te// dpa' bo gang gis phreng ba bsregs// de yang bka' ni mnyan par 'gyur// khro bo nyid nga mnyam gzhag la// 
88a3(rgyud): yam shing des ni me sbar te// phyag na rdo rje'i phreng ba bsregs// de yang bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// rab tu khros te me sbar la// chos gos bsregs pas sangs rgyas kya/ 
88a4(rgyud): skad cig la ni bka' bzhin mdzad// de la de dag gi snying po 'di dag yin no// oM badz+ra ba shaM ka ra ye swA hA/ oM badz+ra so ri ba shaM ka ra ya swA hA/ oM badz+ra pa ni pa shaM ka ra yA swA hA/ oM badz+ra bad d+ha ba shaM ka ra ya badz+ra ya~M/ 
88a5(rgyud): swA hA/ de nas gsang ba'i lus kyi phyag rgya'i ye slab po// yid 'ong bud med lhan cig tu// gnas shing bu gar an dza na// bcug nas bskul ba byas nas kyang // de yis mig bskus dbang du 'gyur// 
88a6(rgyud): ldong ros bu gar bcug nas ni// rdo rje bsdams pas de g.yogs te// mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi yis ni// dngos grub rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro// go ro tso na bu gar bcug/ gsang ba'i khu tshur gnyis btsir na// 
88a7(rgyud): bzhag na de ni 'bar 'gyur na// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gur kum bu gar bcug nas ni// bu gar sems dpa'i rdo rje yis// bkab nas 'bar bar gyur na ni// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 
88a8(rgyud): dol de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// oM g+hu ha ra ti badz+ra ba shaM kai ra sa~Md d+hi hU~M/ oM g+hu ha sid d+ha hUM/ oM g+hu ha badz+ra sid d+ha hU~M/ oM badz+ra dar g+hu ha sid d+ha hUM/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya chen pan
88b1(rgyud): ye shes bslab po// rdo rje dgos pa'i tshul gyis ni// phyag rgya chen po'i mdor bsdu na// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis na// rdo rje khro bor mnyam par gzhag/ hUM zhes 'dzub mo'i tshul gyis ni/ dam tshig mchog ni
88b2(rgyud): 'dir de bzhin// chos kyi phyag rgya 'dir de bzhin// oM zhes dang po yi ge as// las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya// thams cad grub byed dag pa ste// rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis
88b3(rgyud): so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig tog pa'i rgyal po las rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
88b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas byang chubs so
88b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// hU~M badz+ra maN Ta/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// hUM b+haM ku Ta
88b6(rgyud): badz+ra radwa ta/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra pad ma badz+ri tri gu da nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis/ 
88b7(rgyud): rang gi las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'dagasangs so// hUM badz+ra karma a gri krid/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phag rgya bzhi pa' dkyil 'khor
88b8(rgyud): bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor de ba ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje khro bo zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad
89a1(rgyud): @srad bu bri/ sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs bri// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya ste/ bcug nas
89a2(rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// rang gi phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor// bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la// bud med lhan cig gnas nas ni// grub pa yang ni thob/ 
89a3(rgyud): par 'gyur// rang gi phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor// bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la// chags pas bud med la bltas na// grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur// rang gis phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor/ 
89a4(rgyud): bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la// bud med mdzes pas sprad pas 'grub// rang gis phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor// bris nas chos nyid dag brjed la// lhan cig mkhyud na grub kun thob// de la chos
89a5(rgyud): nyid dag pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di dag yin no// oM saR+Wa ta thA ga ta bI shud d+ha da ra ma ho// oM badz+ra bi shud d+ha dri Sh+Ta dza~M/ oM badz+ra bi shud d+ha mA khi hUM/ oM badz+ra ba shud d+ha ka ya ba ma na kar ma badz+ra hUM/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi
89a6(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i sra ba'i phyag rgya bslab po// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs nas kyang // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis ni// bud med mochog ni mgu byas na// shin du grub pa thob par 'gyur/ 
89a7(rgyud): de nas 'di'i snying po brjod do// he badz+re ka ma/ de nas ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rjes mnan pa'i rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi rnams tshig rgyas pa dang ldan pa bslabs te/ phyag rgya
89a8(rgyud): ban pa'i tshul gyis 'dis// rdo rje sil snyan dang rnga brdung ba bsdabs nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa'i snying byo gru blangs te/ debul nas phyag rgya dang / spyan gyi phyag rgyad nga/ skye ba'i phyag rgyod / 
89b1(rgyud): ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / gar byi mchod pas mchod par bya'o// de la grwar gyi mchod pas mchod pa ni 'di yin no// rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje khro bo'i 'dzub mo gnyis// rdo rje hUM gi phyag rgya ni// snying kha
89b2(rgyud): nyid du bcing bar bya// de bzhin gar ni g.yon pa yi// g.yas pa'i chang ba gzung ba'i bya// bsgyur nas dpral ba nyid du ni// 'dzub mo'i ngos ni bzhag par bya// de bzhin gar yang bkrol bas ni// mnya
89b3(rgyud): par pad ma'i kha dbus sbyar// 'dzub mo snying khar bzhag nas ni// bsam pa g.yos mdud par bya'o// rdo rje khro bo'i 'dzub bsnams te// bkan dang rtse mo spring bya zhing // de las bsgyur zhing gtsug tor du/ 
89b4(rgyud): 'dzub mo'i rtse mo bzhig po'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ rang gi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khro bo'i dam tshig 'di gsungs pa/ hUM/ de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa// de nas rab
89b5(rgyud): tu ba shad bya ba// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba ste// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// de yi dbus
89b6(rgyud): suM legs bri ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje hUM go phyog rgya che// lag na 'dzin pa rdo rjer bcos// brkyang bskum tshul du gnas pa dang // kha dog gzugs su ji bzhin bya// de nas 'dir
89b7(rgyud): gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad byas te/ rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs nas kyang // 'jig rten gsum rgyal 'jug
89b8(rgyud): me ni/ bu gar bcug nas bsgrubs nas ni// las kun rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sgrub pa'i snying po 'di bshad do// oM badz+ra sa ma ya krid/ de nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes
90a1(rgyud): bslab po// dkyil 'khor legs par zhugs nas ni/ shAphyag rgya chen po mchog gnas pa// gnas nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya// las rnams kun ni byed par 'gyur// de la sgrub
90a2(rgyud): pa'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ hA sa ma ya hUM/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi bcing ba// ji lta ba bzhin du bslabs te// de bzhin dngos grub du 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du// ras la sogs pa la bris
90a3(rgyud): pa dang / lugs ma la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad la yang dngos grub ni thun mong ngo // phyag rgya cig pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bos te 'di skad
90a4(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gi rigs 'di la byin gyis brlab tu gsol// ji nas kyang sems can thams cad ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bgyis kyal
90a5(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad thob par bgyi ba'i slad du'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa pa'i rgyal po
90a6(rgyud): la byin gyis bslab pa'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod lags so// rdo rje rin chen khyod lags so// rdo rje chos ni khyod kyang legs// rdo rje las khyod rab tu legs// mdo/ 
90a7(rgyud): sde 'di ni legs par bshad// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ste// theg pa chen po bsdus pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po las
90a8(rgyud): rdo rje chen po'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ mkhyen bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' phyag na
90b1(rgyud): rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' nyon la// dbang phyug chen po'i lus 'di khyod kyis rkang pa'i 'og nas gtang bar byos// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de
90b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i khro bor dbang bskur nas// de dag gis bkum legs// de ji ltar bdag gis
90b3(rgyud): gtang bar gyi// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dog gi bdag po dbang phyug chen po'i lus kyi srog gse ba'i phyir/ shi ba'i rnam par shes pa dgug pa'i snying po 'di
90b4(rgyud): nyid kyi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // oM badz+ra satwa hUM dza/ de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// gsang ba'i lcags kyu bsdam byas te/  mtha' ma mnyam du brkyang nas ni// shi ba'i mgo bor bzhag na ni/ 
90b5(rgyud): srog ni phyir yang thob par 'gyur// de nas de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyings de thol bas khengs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas slar log ste/ dbang phyag gi
90b6(rgyud): lus der slar zhugs nas/ ched du brjed pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// gang phyir shi ba'i lus 'di yang // 'tsho ba'i khams su gyur pa
90b7(rgyud): yin/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rkang pa 'degs pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra mu de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje khro bo'i 'dzub legs par// zer spyad
90b8(rgyud): bsdams te bzhig na ni// rdo rje de dag bsgyur byas zhing // 'og nas yang dag 'byin par byed// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i zhabs 'og nas/ lho chen po thar bar rang / 
91a1(rgyud): gis shes par gyur to// de nas dbang phyug chen po'i lus de/ de bzhin gshegs pa des sos par byin gyis brlabs te// 'jug rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyi
91a2(rgyud): don dang / marungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir/ nyid kyi rgyal cheb tu bcug go/ de nas phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi 'thil nas zla ba'i zhabs zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems
91a3(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya phyung ngo // oM tsan two dA ta rau sa man ta ya b+ha tra krir ni ma hA badz+ri Ni hU~M phaT/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje bcing ba dam bcas te/ kla mthe bong mthe'u chung mnyam par no// mnyam pas
91a4(rgyud): legs pas brkyang ba ni// rdo rje ri mo zhes kyang grags// de nas de byung ma thag tu// zhabs kyi 'thil de las zla ba'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa 'di phyung nas/ dbang phyug de'i mgo la phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs
91a5(rgyud): kyis mnan pa'i rjes su zla ba phyed pa gnas par gyur te/ g.yon phyogs na 'dug go/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag na rdo rje'i grogs su lag pa rdo rje'i mdung rtse byin nas// rdo rje rig pa dam
91a6(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba rdo rje mang gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro// de nas rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje mdung rtse nges 'gal me'i 'khor lo bskor zhing // gar gyi mchod pa
91a7(rgyud): mchod pa byas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sems ni bla na med// zhabs mchog gis ni gang zhig pa// sangs rgyas nyid du grub pa thob/ 
91a8(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rdo rje khro ba'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas bcom ldan 'das su 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
91b1(rgyud): gi sug par rdo rje stsal te/ phyag na rdo rje nyid du dbang bskur bas lU la sogs pa phyi ral gyi rdo rje'i rigs de rnams 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di la gnas pa'i rim pa bgyis
91b2(rgyud): na/ gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sems can de rnams phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/ 
91b3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de bzhin gshegs po thams cad kyi gtsug tor 'di gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra satwa uSh+NI Sha hUM phaT/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug
91b4(rgyud): tor rnams las/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de kha dog du ma'i 'od zer du gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sna bar byas so// yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i gtsug gi mtshams su de
91b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug to ra nyid du 'phungs nas 'khod do// de nas gzi brjid kyi phung po de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor 'di phyung ngo // oM na ma~M sauR+Sha ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha
91b6(rgyud): te dze ra ti a ba lo kA ti mur d+ha hUM/ dz+wa la d+haM ka/ bri d+ha ka/ d+ha ra bi d+hA ra hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM ni sum b+ha badz+ra hUM phaT/ 
91b7(rgyud): de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyi thugs las snying po 'di phyung ngo // oM tA gi dza/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra radA na ud ta ma dzi la ya/ 
91b8(rgyud): hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spya rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM saR+Ya bi shud d+ha badz+ra pad ma sho d+ha ya/ sar+b+ba bidra t+yod ta ma ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub seMs dpa'
92a1(rgyud): chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM madz+ra karma ud ta ma badz+ra d+hA rad+hA ra sa ma ya ma nu sbyar sum b+ha ni sum b+ha a kar shes pra ba shwa ya b+han d+ha ya/ 
92a2(rgyud): man yan gra ha ya saR+Ya karma ni me ku ru ma hA sa twa hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi snying po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'azhibs la phyag bya ba'i phyir phul gsum
92a3(rgyud): b+ha ni sum b+ha badz+ra bi t+yod tam hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ rang gi snying po 'di gsungs pa/ hUM badz+ra shri la/ de nas sgyu ma'i rig
92a4(rgyud): pa'i rgyal pos rang gi snying po 'di gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya bi dar sha ya saR+Wa ma hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dril bu'i rig pa'i rgyal pos/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di phul lo// oM badz+ra g+ha Na De ra na hUM phaT/ 
92a5(rgyud): de nas rdo rje thub pas rang gi snying po 'didabul ba/ oM badz+ra me na ha pra ta hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje mtshon chas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra A yu d+ha d+harma ka huM phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal mo rnams so// de nas
92a6(rgyud): rdo rje 'khyil bas rdo rje khro bos/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rang gi snying po 'di zhabs la phyag 'tshal nasaphul lo// oM badz+ra kun Da li ma hA kro d+ha grih+Na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+wa na sa ya badz+re na madz+nyA naM ma s+pha la ya
92a7(rgyud): b+hin d+ha hri da yo badz+ra kro d+hA ya hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'od rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po 'di phal lo// oM badz+ra pra ta ma ra ya sA mya kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbyug pa'i rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM
92a8(rgyud): badz+ra na na to Da ya sar+b+ba duSh+To na mahA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ donas rdo rje khro bo rdo rje sor pos rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM badz+ra bid ka la bi sha ya sar+b+ba duSh+TA nai bi na kro d+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje khro bo rnams so// de nas
92b1(rgyud): rdo rje glang sna tshogs kyi bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la snying po phul le// oM badz+raSh+To d+ha ma hA ga na pa ti rak+Sha saR+Wa du b+h+yo badz+ra d+ha ra ang mya pa la ya hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje phre ba sa rat+na gi snying po 'di phul
92b2(rgyud): lo// sa badz+ra ma lA ga na ba te ma lA ya a kar sha ya prA bA sha ya b+han d+ha ya ba shi ku ru ma ra ya hUM phaT/ !de nas rdo rje dbang gis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM badz+ra ba shi ma hA ga na pa ti ya b+ha shi ku ru hUM paTade nas
92b3(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag pos rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra bi dza ya br-i dza ya ku ru ma hA gra na pa ti hUM phaT/ tshogs kyi bdag po rnams so// de nas rdo rje'i tho ba rdo rje pho nyas snying po 'di
92b4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje la phul lo// oM badz+ra mu sA la ku Ta ku Ta saR+Sha duSh+Ta hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje rlung gi pho nyas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra nI l+ya ma be g+ha A na ya saR+Wa duSh+Ta Na hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje me'i pho nyas
92b5(rgyud): rong gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra a na la ma~M hA b+hU ta badz+ra dz+wa la saR+Wa smi ku ru saR+Wa duSh+TA na hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'jigs pa'i pho nya chen pos rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra b+hai ra badz+ra d+ha ta ba sha ya saR+Wa dA
92b6(rgyud): NA ma hA ya k+Sha na hUM phaT/ pho nya rnams kyi'o// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje pho nya bran gyis rang gi snying po 'di bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phul lo// oM badz+ra aM ku sha a kar sha ya sar+Ya ma hA te hUM phaT/ 
92b7(rgyud): de nas rdo rje dus kyis rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra ka la mu hA mr-id ta ya mud ta pa ta ya hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje ngan khrid kyis rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra bi na ya kA s+ya big nan ku ru hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje
92b8(rgyud): glu'i rdo rjes rang gi snying po 'di bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phul lo// oM na ga badz+ra a na ya sar+b+ba d+ha na dz+nyA na hi ri ne N+ya suM bar rna bar sna ma ni mug ta a lang ki ra Di ni/ saR+Wa rbo pa/ 
93a1(rgyud): ka ra na Na/ badz+ra d+ha ra sar+b+ba d+ha ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ya kata d+ha grih+na b+han d+ha ha ra pra ban nam ma hA tse da hUM phaT/ bran rnams so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje rigs
93a2(rgyud): thams cad dgug pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra aM ku sha a kar sha hUM/ de nas gzhug pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs pa/ hUM badz+ra pa shau ka da d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas dam tshig bcing ba gsang pa/ oM
93a3(rgyud): badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/ de nas las kyi snying po gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra karma sa d+ha ya kr-ita/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di btashad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya
93a4(rgyud): ba/ dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad pu bri// de la 'di skad du bre'i snying po 'di yin no// oM badz+ra su tra a ka ra sha ya saR+Ya ma d+ha laM hu
93a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus su yang // seng ldeng phur pa btab nas ni// de nas srad pu nyi rim du// byas nas de'i srad bu bri// de la ni pur bu'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya saR+YA bi ga nan ban d+ha
93a6(rgyud): hUM phaT/ srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa dang // dkyil 'khor zlum por srad pa bri// de yi pha rol byung nas ni// nyis 'gyur du ni de bzhin no// de yang rim pa gsum du'o// phyi rol dkyil 'khor srad pu bri// 
93a7(rgyud): phyogs 'tshams 'khor lo'i rtsibs tshul du// grA yi ri mor srad bu bri// srad bu bri ba'i cho ga'o// de nas srad pu bris pa der// dag pa'i tshon gyis dgang bar bya// g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur
93a8(rgyud): chos/ cho ga bzhin du gzung bar bya// dang po bris nas phyis ci bder// de la 'di ni mtshon gyi snying po'o// oM badz+ra ra gA sa ma ye hUM/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni// mnyam par gzhag la dbus
93b1(rgyud): 'dug nas// rdo rje yi ni sgo bzhi rnams// yid kyis kun ni dbye bar bya// de la sgo dbye ba'i snying po 'di yin no// oM badz+ra g+hA ta ya sa ma ya prA bi shA shI g+han smA ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ gaste rA ram yAd+yan dngul yang
93b2(rgyud): rung sa yis legs par bris pa 'am// pa gu grwa bzhi'i steng du ni// sangs rgyas sku ni gzugs par bya/ de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi snying po 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra saR+Ya bid/ sangs rgyas
93b3(rgyud): kyi ni phyogs kun du// sems dpa' chen po bzhi bzhag go// mdun du phyag na rdo rje ni// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bshad// de la sems dpa' chen po'i snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra suM b+ha ni
93b4(rgyud): suM b+ha hU~M/ oM gr-i h+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ oM gri h+NA pa ya gri hA pa ya hUM/ oM a na ya haM b+ha ga wan+ta badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra g+h+ri ku ti kro d+ha ya a na ya saR+Ya rad nan hri hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti kro d+ha Sh+ya ma ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi ku
93b5(rgyud): ru saR+Wa bi sha ru pa ta ya sA d+ha ya hUM phaT/ 'jug gam phyir ni byung ba na// srad bu'i mgo tshul yin bsams pa// rdo rje'i shugs su brjod pa ste// de yis ri mo rgal bar bya// de la rdo rje'i shugs
93b6(rgyud): kyi snying po ni 'di'o// oM badz+rA bi ga hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gnyis par de bzhin du// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin du// rdo rje sgyu ma la sogs pa bri// de la dom
93b7(rgyud): tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra tsakra hU~M/ oM badz+ra g+han d+ha hUM/ oM badz+ra pan Da kaSh+Ta hUM/ oM badz+ra u ng+ga hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal bas na// dkyil 'khor gnyis par de bzhin te/ 
93b8(rgyud): rdo rje 'khyil ba la sogs par// rdo rje khro bor bzhag par bya// de la ngi dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM bidz+ra dz+wa li ta ba ta bidz+ra hU~M// oM badz+ra som hU~M/ oM badz+ra nAn r+d+ha hU~M/ oM badz+ra bIk+ki tI hUM/ 
94a1(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// sgo ni bzhi po rnams su yang // rdo rje glang sna la sogs pa// thams cad rim pa bzhin du bri// de la de dag gi dum tshig snying po ni 'di rnams yin
94a2(rgyud): / no/ oM badz+ra ma da hUM/ oM badz+ra ma la hU~M/ oM badz+ra a ra hUM/ oM badz+ra a ri hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgal na ni// dkyil 'khor gsum la bri bar bya// 1ga rim pA dza bzhin du// rdo rje the lnga sogs pa'o// 
94a3(rgyud): de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra mu sa la hUM/ oM badz+ra pa ta hUM/ oM badz+ra dza la hUM/ oM badz+ra gra ha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi par bri ba ni// rdo rje lcags kyu
94a4(rgyud): la sogs bran// lta 'og rim pa bzhin du'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra daM Sh+Ta hUM/ oM badz+ra ma ra na hUM/ oM \u0f7fhrI g+h+nA hUM/ oM badz+ri ha rA na hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// phyi rol
94a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bzhag pa ni// lta 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// mo rnams thams cad bri bar bya// rdo rje'i sgo ni thams cad du// sgo ba rnams kyang de nyid do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ni// cho ga rgyas pa ji
94a6(rgyud): bzhin pa'o// de nas 'jig rten gsum po yi// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// dgug pa la sogs pa'i las kun byas te/ rdo rje slob dang / nyi khro be ti ri ti'i ste phyag rgya bcings te// 'di skad
94a7(rgyud): sgo shig/ ngas khyod la rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par byas/ de khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas te/ dmyal bar ltung ngo zhes bsgo la/ mna'i snying po 'di sbyin no// / 
94a8(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo'i ti r-i ti ri'i phyag rgya yang ston cing / rdo rje 'di ni khro bo che// dam tshig khyod kyis rigs bsregs pas// gal te 'das na klod pa nas// brtsams te lus rnams 'jig par byed// dam
94b1(rgyud): tshig bcing ba'o// de nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'dis bcing ngo // / oM saR+Sha tra thA ga ta badz+ra d+ha ra grih+Na d+d+ha b+han d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bcing ba bye shad do// mthe'u chung mthe bong
94b2(rgyud): sbrel ba dang // lag gnyis bla za 'og tu btang // las kyi phyag rgya dam tshig 'di// rdo rje 'chang ba zhes kyang bshad// de nas rdo rje chus dbang bskur te/ snying po 'di yin no// oM badz+ra a bi shaM ka bi shin tu
94b3(rgyud): badz+ra d+ha rA twe sa ma ya gra graM/ de nas g.yog pos gdong g.yogs te/ snying po 'dis gzhug go// oM pra bI sha ya a bi sha badz+ra/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha badz+ra hUM/ de nas snying po 'dis me tog dor ro// oM pra tiSh+Tha badz+ra ho// 
94b4(rgyud): de nas de gar lhung ba de 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas gdod g.yogs bkrol nas/ dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin du bstan te/ lce gang yin phyin pa de la ni bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems
94b5(rgyud): can log par lta ba yod de/ gang dag ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes gdon mi za ba'i ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su phyug na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
94b6(rgyud): dam zhes dad par mi 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba ni dam tshig go/ sems can log par lta ba dag yod do// gzhan du nA lha glang dag la dad pa de dag la mna'i snying po byin nas bskrun par bya'o// de nas rdo rje rin
94b7(rgyud): po ches mtshan ma'i phreng bas dbang bskur nas/ las kyi rdo rje lag pa gnyis su byin nas/ rdo rje ming gtags te/ ji ltar dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du bya'o// de nas phyag rgya chen po bco
94b8(rgyud): ba bslab po// rdo rje bcing bu dam+ba bcas te// mthe bong nang du sbyar nas ni// 'dzub mo bkug ste gnyis kas gdab// sems dpa'i gtsug tor zhes kyang bya'o// rdo rje btsing ma byas nas ni// mthe
95a1(rgyud): bong gung mo mthe'u chung bsgyud// gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ste// gtsug tor chen po btsun pa po// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// mthe bong mthe'u chung sbrel na ni// dam du lkug
95a2(rgyud): kyi bcings pa ste/ rig pa chen po dam pa'o// phyag rgya bcings nas dam btsir ba// snying khar mthe bong 'os kyis so// sems dpa' yi ni snying por bshad/ de nas gung mo srin lag ni/ sor mo
95a3(rgyud): rab tu bsdams nas ni// rdo rje rin chen tshul gyis ni// bsgyur bas gdong du bzhag par bya// de nyid bkyed de bzhag nas ni// snying khar yang ni bsgyur bar bya// me tog bzhi pa zhes bya ste// pad mo
95a4(rgyud): rig pa dam pa'o// de nyid spyi bo nas brtsams nas// lus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya// sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni// rdo rje las ni rab sgrub pa'o// sems ma rdo rje dam bcas te/ mthe'
95a5(rgyud): chung rdo rjer bsgreng ba ni// thams cad rig pa'i snying po ni// phyag rgya 'di ni thams cad sgrub// mthe bong mthe'u chung bcings pa ni// g.yon pa sor mo dbus ma gsum// rtse gsum pa yi dbu ma'i
95a6(rgyud): / rdo rje'i phyag rgyas gzung ba ste// rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa 'di// rdo rje'i mdung zhes bya ba'o// de nas rab tu bshad pa ni// rdo rje sgyu ma la sogs btags// rdo rje'i bcing ba dam bcas te/ 
95a7(rgyud): g.yon pa rdo rje bcing bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad do// rdo rje rigs ni kun gyi 'di'o// rdo rje de nas gnyis byas te// mtshan ma kun ni nges bzhag go// rdo rje rigs ni thams cad kyi// phyag rgya
95a8(rgyud): rnams kyang 'byung ba ste// mdun brkyang steng du bzhag pa dang // 'dzub mos 'thob brtan dbyung ba dang // oM zhes bya ba spyir bzhag ste// rdo rje steng du bzhag pa'o// rig pa'i rgyal po phyag rgya chen po'i
95b1(rgyud): tshogs rnams so// rab tu bkyang nas lag gnas pa// lag pa'i rgyab na de bzhin te// khu tshur bcangs bzhag lag ngar bskum// kha phyogs su ni bskor bar bya// rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// 
95b2(rgyud): g.yon pa'i mthe bo steng du bzhag/ phreng ba bcing ba'i thabs su spur// nor byin pa ni g.yas pa ste// ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur mchog/ 'das pa'i dbang po'i phag rgya chen po 'dus pa'o// g.yas pas
95b3(rgyud): mdun du gtun rangs 'dzin// log pa brkyang pa'ang de bzhin to// g.yas pas 'od ni 'bar bstan// rdo rje khu tshur bskyod pa'o// pho nya'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs// bsgying bcas 'dzub mo khar mche
95b4(rgyud): ba// dbyug pa bstan zhang mnan pa dang // dpung pa bskam zhing spang ba dang // g.yas pa g.yon gyis 'dren pa'o// bran gyi phag rgya chen po'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor kun du brtags pa ni// g.yon pas/ 
95b5(rgyud): rdo rje bzung nas so// de nas rab tu bshad pa ni// sgrub pa dang ni las nyid do// sems dpa' gang gis phyag rgya gang // der ni bdag rang nyid 'gyur te// bdag nyid de ni bsgoms gyur pa// phyag rgya/ 
95b6(rgyud): sgrub pa'i dam par 'gyur// gtsug tor chen po bsrung ba che// gzi brjid chen po rab grub ster// rdo rje hUM zhes bya kun byed// snying khar bzhag pas thams cad 'gugs// sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya
95b7(rgyud): rnams so// thams cad rig pa thams cad 'grub// rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa'o// rdo rje mdung gi phyag rgya che// grub pa chen po sbyin par byed// sgyu ma'i rdo rje rab grub ste// dril bu yas ni yi dag
95b8(rgyud): 'bebs// dbyug pa'i shing gis mya ngan 'da'// rdo rje rdo rje gsod par byed// rig pa'i rgyal po rnams so// 'bar ba'i mchog ni ma rungs 'dul// zhi ba'i mchog ni thams cad gsod// dbyug pa'i
96a1(rgyud): mchog ni mchog pa ste// 'jigs pa'i mig ni skud par byed// rdo rje khro ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// myos pas rab tu myos par byed// phreng ba kun ni byed par bshad// 'dod
96a2(rgyud): byed dga' bar byed pa ste// gsod pa thams cad gsod pa ste// tshigs kyi phyag rgya rnams so// tho ba gdug pa 'joms pa ste// ras kyis ras rgyu de bzhin te// 'bar ba'i mchog ni gdug pa
96a3(rgyud): sreg gnod sbyin ma ni gnod sbeng ngo // pho nya'i phyag rgya rnams so// rdo rje mtsho bas za ba ste// gsod pa thams cad gsod pal// bgogasra bzang po ni bkogs kyang byed// 'phrog ma yang ni
96a4(rgyud): thams cad 'phrog/ bran gyi phyag rgya rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshig
96a5(rgyud): rgyas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig las byung ba byin gyi brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin snyoms par zhug
96a6(rgyud): nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra sa pi tre swA hA/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra d+ha ra hUM/ badz+ra bi kra ma~M
96a7(rgyud): hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rad na g+ho hUM swAhA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po rdo rje spyan
96a8(rgyud): gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra pad ma ne tre hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang go rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// 
96b1(rgyud): badz+ra karma ka re hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra shu la gre swA hA/ de nas rdo rje sgyu ma rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi
96b2(rgyud): rig pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+re tsatwe hU~M/ rdo rje dril bus smras pa/ oM badz+ra ga na Ti kri hUM/ thub pa'i rdo rjes smras pa/ oM swar+tha'i na Da kashe hUM/ rdo rje mtshon chas smras ka/ oM badz+ri hUM/ rig pa'i rgyal
96b3(rgyud): po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje 'khyil ba rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di smras so// oM badz+ra dza le hUM/ de nas rdo rje 'od kyis smras so// oM badz+ra se ma hUM/ de nas
96b4(rgyud): rdo rje dbyug pas smras pa/ oM badz+ra g+han d+he hUM/ rdo rje go ser smug gis smras pa/ oM badz+ra b+hi sha Ne hUM/ rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje glang snas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya smras pa/ 
96b5(rgyud): oM badz+ra ma daM hUM/ rdo rje phreng bas smras pa/ oM badz+ra ma le hUM/ rdo rje dbang gis smras pa/ oM badz+ra a be sha hUM/ rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rjes smras pa/ oM badz+ra a ra tsi te hUM/ rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag po'i
96b6(rgyud): dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje tho bas rang gi dam tshig phyag rgya smras pa/ oM badz+ra mu sa la grang hUM/ rdo rje rlung gis smras pa// oM badz+re pa de hUM/ rdo rje mos smras pa/ oM badz+ra dz+wa le hUM/ 
96b7(rgyud): rdo rje 'jigs pas smras pa/ ma bajug te / rdo rje pa nya'i dam tshig go phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje lcags kyus smras pa.oM badz+ra da t+te hU~M/ rdo rje dus kyis smrasmra pa/ sa~M byAd+d+ha mA rAn+ta
96b8(rgyud): ngan khros kyis smras bri/ oM byadz+ra la~M gas/ rjerje grus smras pa/ oM baja ma rin rje/ rdorje bran gyi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs byams cad kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'kho m+bu 'i
97a1(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// gru bzhi pa la byang phyogs sgo// phyi rol srad pa byang phyogs bri// de yi nang du der yang ni
97a2(rgyud): de bzhin sgro ni shar phyogs 'dod// de yi dbus su ci rigs par// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bzhag par bya// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs pa// bzhi po de yi phyogs kun bzhag/ dkyil
97a3(rgyud): 'khor de bzhin mchog rnams su// rdo rje phyag rgya bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rigs kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya// rdo rje glang sna tshogs la sogs pa// bzhi po rnams ni sgo bsrungs
97a4(rgyud): so// 'jigs pa dpal dang sgra dbang dang // dur ka g.yon pa'i grwa rnams nas// phyi'i grwa rnams phyag rgya ni// de rnams nyid ni bri bar bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor rnams su ni// lha mo rnams kyang bri/ 
97a5(rgyud): byar bya// de nas cho ga rgyas pa rnams// de bzhin du ni bshad par bya// de nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'dir// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bya ste// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas// dam tshig gi
97a6(rgyud): ni las bas nas// rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya chog bzhin da bcing la// khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba su'i ma ngan du yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya de rnams ma sla shig/ gsang ba 'angal bar ma ber
97a7(rgyud): cig/ ces sgo shig/ de nas las kyi rdo rje de rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i steng du bzhag ste/ cho ga bzhin du chug shig/ zhugs nas rdo rje de bzhin du// 'or cig gang la babs pa'i dam tshig gi phyog
97a8(rgyud): rgya de'i dbang du 'gyur te// de las thams cad byed do// de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol nas/ dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin du ston// dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsang ba smros shig/ dam
97b1(rgyud): tshig phyag rgya 'od khyod kyo// rtog tu lngas kun byed pa ste// ma dang sring mo rnams dang ni// chung ma bu mo rnams rjes 'brang // de la de dag gi snying po 'di dag yin to// oM saR+Wa badz+ra ga ma ni saR+YA
97b2(rgyud): bA ga k+She sa d+ha gu h+ya badz+ri ni hUM phaT/ 'di lan cig bzlas pas bud med thams cad dbang du byed ste/ bshad na chos ma yin par mi 'gyur ro// ci dga' ba thams cad skyed nas sgrub par byas te/ 
97b3(rgyud): de nas thams cad dag par sems kyis rig nas/ yid kyis kyang phyag rgya thams cad kyi las dam pa thams cad byed do// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'chang bas gsungs so// de nas
97b4(rgyud): dam tshig gi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// dam tshig khro bo 'dzub bcug dang // snying khar yang ni bsdam par bya'o// ngos ni mdzod spu kha nas drang // spyi bor bzhag nas gnyis su bya// g.yon pa'i
97b5(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzub bcings pas// rtse gsum mtshan ma mnan pas bya// 'di bcings pas ni yang dag par// rig pa dam pa grub par 'gyur// rdo rje rigs ni thams cad kyi// g.yon pa rdo
97b6(rgyud): gtso bor 'dus// dam tshig cho ga ji bzhin par// phyag rgya bo cang ba bshad par bya// thams cad 'khor lo sor rtse bcum// dril bu'i phyag rgya yang de bzhin no// de bzhin oM gyi phyag rgya dang // 
97b7(rgyud): seng ge'i rna bar yongs su gzung // rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya rnams so// 'thor ba kun du 'dzin pa dang // 'di ni yang dag 'dus pa nyid// dbyig pa'i khu tshur 'dzin padang // kha 'gram
97b8(rgyud): phyag rgya bskor ba'o// khro bo'i dam chog rnams so// gdung ba'i phyag rgya dang phreng ba// rdo rje mnan nas bdud pa ste// skye bor bzhag pa tshogs kyi ste// dkyil 'khor gyi ni bsrung ba'o// 
98a1(rgyud): tshogs rnams kyi ni dam tshig go// lag pa skum pa khar bzhag ste// rgyab tu yang ni bskor bar bya// 'bar dang me stag btong ba ste// phye dang khar yang gnas par bya// po&
98a2(rgyud): mo'i dam tshig rnams so// mtha' ma gnyis ni khar bcug dang // btsir zhing rab tu gnon pa po// phung pa bsnol bas bsnol ba dang // myur du 'phrog pa'ang de bzhin no// bran mo rnams kyi
98a3(rgyud): dam tshig go/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa/ rdzogs s+ho/ 
98a4(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje byin gyis bsla ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa dam pa
98a5(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ri bid/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM ha na ha na hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje snying pos rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM ha/ 
98a6(rgyud): ra hA phaT/ da nas rdo rje sman gyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gas ngas so// oM ma ra ma ra hI phaT/ de nas rdo n+da sa tshogs kyis rang gi chos kyi dam rlig 'di gsungs so// / oM ku R+Sha gu ru hUM phaT/ 
98a7(rgyud): de nas rdo rje rig pa'i dam pas rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM hUM hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje sgyu ma la sogs pas smras pa/ oM tshin d+ha tshon d+ha hUM phaT/ oM a b+hi She a b+hi Sha hUM phaT/ oM bur bu
98a8(rgyud): bA sa hUM phaT/ oM bin d+ha baM na d+ha hUM phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi'o// oM di me dam hUM phaT/ oM mi ra ya ma ra ya hUM phaT/ oM ga ta ya ga ta ya hUM phaT/ oM b+ha ya b+ha ya hUM phaT/ khro bo rnams kyi'o// 
98b1(rgyud): oM da ma da ma hUM phaT/ oM ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ oM ba sha~M b+ha ba hUM phaT/ oM ya dza ya dzA hUM phaT/ tshogs rnams kyi'o// oM b+h+yo b+h+ye hUM phaT/ oM g+hu g+hA hUM phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa lA hUM phaT/ oM khu da kha da hUM phaT/ pho ha rnams
98b2(rgyud): kyi'o/ oM kha na kha na hU~M phaT/ oM ma ra maDe hUM phaT/ oM gr-i h+Na gri h+Na hUM phaT/ oM pi pa pi pa hU~M phaT/ bran rnams kyi'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'di
98b3(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor te// 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo bzhin// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sog
98b4(rgyud): thams cad snyoms par zhugs pa'o// chos kyi 'khor lo tshul lta bur// snying khar mtshan ma yang dag bzhag/ de nas chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'di cho ga bzhin du las byas nas/ rdo rje
98b5(rgyud): 'chang ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje dril bur bcas pa bcings te/ de skad sgo shig/ khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba dang / lha'i rigs ma mthong ba su la'ang ma smra shig/ ces bsgo la dril bu dkrol du chug
98b6(rgyud): cig/ 'di skyed bsgre nas kyang muna'i snying po byin la/ ji ltar dril bu 'di dkrol la/ de sgra ji ltar mi rtag pa// de bzhin las kyi rdo rje khyod// mI rtag par ni mardung byed// rdo rje slob dpon sti ste
98b7(rgyud): mod/ rdo rje spun la mi midzo dang // gdug pa byams dang chags bral bar// gal te khyod kyis byas na'o// de nas gdod g.yogs bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan te/ chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// 
98b8(rgyud): ye shes la bslab po// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// chos kyi dkyil 'khor rdo bzhin no// thams cad mnyam pa nyid bsams pa// rdo rje rig pad mo pA ste// 'gro ba 'di dge sgyum bzhin
99a1(rgyud): de bzhin sdug bsngal dral ba 'dra/ sdug bsngal thams cad mya ngan 'das// rdo rje 'joms pa bla na med// reg pa'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so// sems can gdul phyur khro
99a2(rgyud): bo mchog/ zhi ba yis ni nges pa /  kA pa 'dra ba'i 'chog pa med// log par lta ba 'jig par byed// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin rnams so// ra ro 'dra bar dpa' ba med// phreng ba 'dre bar
99a3(rgyud): bcing ba med// bud med 'dod pas 'gro dbang med// brtan pa tsam gyis gzhan pham mo// tshogs kyi ting 'dzin rnams so// 'tshog pa 'tshed pa yi mchog yin// reg pa rnams ni rlung gi'o// gzi
99a4(rgyud): brjid can ni ban sa'i mchog/ zas rnams kyi nang khrag dam pa// pho nya'i ting nga 'dzin rnams so// mche ba dag par zhugs pa ste// 'chi bdag thums cad gnas na 'dug/ 'jigs las
99a5(rgyud): lhag pa'i bgegs gzhan med// chu lhas lhag pa'i ro gzhan med// bran gyi ting nge 'dzin rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po las// rdo rje'i
99a6(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig
99a7(rgyud): las byung bas rdo rje'i byin gyi brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra karma pra bar+d+ha na su ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems
99a8(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra bi la se pu dza ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// \u0f7f/ oM badz+ra a b+he sha
99b1(rgyud): ke a b+hi Shi na tsa hUM/ de nas rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra gi te gaM hUM/ de nas rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM nr-id te nrid te hUM/ de nas
99b2(rgyud): rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra bid t+yod ta ma nri te ni t+ya bi kur ba 'i kur hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje khro bo me'i lha mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra
99b3(rgyud): / kro d+ha a ga ni dza la tI shu lam b+hi d+ha hri d+ha yaM badz+re ne hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje gser lha mo chen mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra he me chin d+ha tsug tre na badz+ra ni hUM badz+ra phaT/ de nas gzhon nu mas
99b4(rgyud): rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM \u0f7f\u0f7fko ma r-i shi g+ha ma a be sha ya g+han ta sha ba te na badz+ra pa ni pri ye/ badz+ra sa ma ya ma nr-i sma ra ra Na hUM / phaT/ de nas lha mo rdo rje zhi bas rang gi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM
99b5(rgyud): badz+ra shan te dzu pa dza pa ak+Sha pa ra la ya saR+YA na ra ya shan ti Sh+ya hU~M phaT/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM musti ha na ha na badz+re ni bin d+ha bin d+hu pi ta ya pa tA yA/ 
99b6(rgyud): sar+b+ba duSh+Ta ne hri dza mA ni/ ai suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi'o// de nas dze dz+r-i mi 'chi ba'i rdo rje khro bos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra a mr-i te saR+YA drASh+Ta na gri ban
99b7(rgyud): d+ha ha na pe tsa bin d+ha na sa ya b+hin shr-i ya/ tshone d+he bin d+ha ba swi ku ru mur ngan ta Da ya badz+ra na ye ke tsing ma ma a mu ka s+ya big bi na ya ka ha ma d+hi ma ya daM ba tra kro d+ha b+ha badz+ra Ni hUM phaT/ de nas r+No r+t+r-i mdong saM tsan gyis
99b8(rgyud): rlung gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra kan d+ha mi ro yai s+yai myo rA be pra bid ta re ge na sha gr-i s+pho tA ya hr-i da yA badz+ra s+ya da ra sad t+ya na ma ha bad+hod smA kA ra le shwA badz+raM NaM hUM pheMT/ de nas rdo rje dbyig pa'i mchog
100a1(rgyud): @mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra na Da gra ga ta ya hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje khro mo tsong tsong chen mos rang gi snying po 'di smas so// oM badz+ra me kha lo kha na kha na sha ba
100a2(rgyud): te na pa shi ku ru draSh+Ti ma rA ya be Sh+ya na hUM phaT/ khro bo'i rig pa rnams so// de nas rdo rje 'dzums rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'ang smras pa/ oM badz+ra bi la ye rgyan d+ha a sna ni ban d+he badz+re d+ha ne ma ra ya ud ma
100a3(rgyud): di ba pa bi paM hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje zas kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra a sha ne b+ha ga k+Sha ya saR+Wa duSh+Tan badz+ra da sha na ne sha ga ti da ra ni/ ma nu Sha mnas a ha re/ na ra ru ti
100a4(rgyud): rA ya saR+Ya pri ye ma dza bas nu le kha na ba li ma ta ga tre a na ya saR+YA na d+han+ya hI ra N+ye su pa na a sid ni sang kA ma ya ba ra te bag k+Sha ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje bgo bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badz+ra bas
