100a5(rgyud): ne a na ya saR+YA pa tra a na na pa na hu/ pa ka ra na ni shri g+haM pa shing ku ru bin i dam me pra yad dza a bi sha sad t+yaM kaM tha ya badz+ra kai sha ra ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbang gis rang gi dam tshig smras so// oM badz+ra
100a6(rgyud): pa she a na ya ba shi ku ru saR+YA tri ya saR+YA pu ru sha Na pa shi ku ru krung d+ha na pra sa d+ha ya byA ba ha re b+h+yo pyAd ta ra ya bi dza ya ma ka ri badz+ra pra ta ka na d+ha r-i ni hUM phaT/ rdo rje tshegs kyi'o// de nas rdo rje pho nya mos rang gi las
100a7(rgyud): kyi dam tshig 'di smras paM/ oM badz+ra dA ti o na ya saR+YA man dra lam pra bi sha ya a bai sha ya bin d+ha yA saR+Ya karma ni me ku ru shi nga g+ho/ la g+hu la g+hA traM sa ma ra ya rA pe ne badz+ra kha TA ka d+ha rI ni hUM phaT/ de nas shugs kyis
100a8(rgyud): rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras pa/ oM be ka badz+rI naM g+hA g+h+ya g+hA sha ba te na mA ra ya bi gi ra bI d+ha na sA ya/ badz+rA pA ta d+ha rI ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'byar mAs rang gI dam tshig 'di smras pa/ oM dz+wa le dz+wa la sar+b+ba
100b1(rgyud): ma badz+ra la sa da ha da ha dA smi ku ru hUM paTade nas rdo rje mchu mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra bi ka te daMSh+Ta ka ra le bi shA na bag twe sr-i g+na grah+Na A b+he ts+tsha/ bak+Sha ya rA d+hi DA nA pA ma hA ya k+Shi ni badz+ra pa sha d+ha
100b2(rgyud): rI ni hU~M phaT/ rdo rje po nya ma rnams kyi'o// de nas dze k+Shi r-i bzhin rdo rje bran mos rang gi dam tshig 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra mu khaM a na badz+ra daMSh+Ta ba ya naM/ DAka pa ta la si ni khan kha na/ kha hi khA haM saR+YA mu khe pra be sha
100b3(rgyud): s+pho ta ya ma ra ma ni/ sa R+Sha duSh+Ta nan badz+ra ni She Ti a si d+ha r-i Ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dus mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badz+ra ka la ma hA pre te ru ba ni ma na sha ma na sa rA d+hi ra pri ye h+ye hi gr-i hA baMk+Sha/ badz+ra
100b4(rgyud): Da ki ni badz+ra sha ka la saR+Ya de ba ga Na ma tri bu te ha ra ha ra pra nan a ma ka s+ya ka ba la ma la lang kri ta saR+YA ka ye kin tsa ra ya/ si badz+ra kha T+wAM ga d+ha ri ni pre ta ma nu Sha Sha ri ri shi gr-i a be sha ya pra be sha ya ban drA ya ba shi ku
100b5(rgyud): ru mA rA ya badz+ra rak+Sha si huM hUM hUM hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje bsrul mas rang gau las kyi dam tshig 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra pa ta ne ma nu sha ma ne saR+YA sa rA d+hi ra hA ru mu tra pu rI shau sh+li sh+ma shr-I g+ha na kA re tro ga b+ha hA rI n+ya y+ra sh+yaM g+h+ra
100b6(rgyud): i dam a nu ka s+ya gu ru badz+ra sho d+ha naM ka d+ha ni na saR+YA ka ra maM ku ru hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje ka ma ras rang gi las kyi dam chog 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra ma kau ra gr-i sa gras shi g+ha pra bo sha ya pau ta lo b+ha k+Sha ya badz+ra mu kaM
100b7(rgyud): ra d+ha ri ni hUM phaT/ rdo rje bran mo rnams kyi'o// de nas lag na rdo rjes yang lag na rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsangs so// de nas rab tu bshad pa ba/ las kyi dkyil 'kho
100b8(rgyud): dAm hA smai/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor tshal gyis ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srang bu bre// dkyil 'khor mchog+sa ni thams cad du/ stangs s+yAs+ya dpas na bzhugs pa ra ba/ k+Sha tog pogs ni rim pa
101a1(rgyud): @mams dpa' chen po rnams bzhag go// de yi dbus su chung mar bcas// rdo rje rig pa dam pa mchog/ rdo rje sgeg mo lnga sogs bsam/ don gar gyi mchod la sog
101a2(rgyud): pas mchod// de ni/ k+ki mogo rims bzhin// 'khor la dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// rang gi phyag rgya phyag rgya 'dra// gar byed pa ni bri bar bya// sangas+yA rgyas rdo rje can mchod phyir// rdo rje gar
101a3(rgyud): gyi tshul gyis so// grwa dang sgo yi phyogs rnams su// bdug pa la sogs rim pa bzhin// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// dgug pa la sogs pa'i las byas nas rdo rje 'chang pa'i las
101a4(rgyud): kyi dam tshig gi lag rgya'i dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du bcings te 'di skad ces smos shig/ khong kyis lha'i rigs ma mthong ba dang / las mi shes pa su la yang gsang ba'i las ma smras shig
101a5(rgyud): khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes smras la/ rdo rje slob dpon rang gi las kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/ khro bo'i lte bas lta zhing 'di skad brjod do// 
101a6(rgyud): badz+ra d+hA t+ya a be sha ya/ nrid ta pa ya saR+Ya karma sing dim me pra yad tsa hUM a hUM a hUM la lA la la badz+ri/ de nas yang babs nas bdag nyid kyis 'jug ste/ phyag rgya dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyi
101a7(rgyud): gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o// rje phyin can lus dang ngag dang lba ba dang / yid dang rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyis las thams cad 'dod pa bzhin du bya'o/ de nas yang gdong g.yog
101a8(rgyud): bkrol te/ gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i yo shes slebs shig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin stsogs kyi/ dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas te/ rdo dz+wa la sau la sogs ma
101b1(rgyud): dam pa ste/ rig pa 'di rnams thams cad kyang // lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du// gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya yis// las kyi dkyil 'khor mchod pardo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni// phyag rgya
101b2(rgyud): chen po mdor bsdus so// dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas te// 'dra ba'i phyag rgya bkrol bar bya// gor gyi mchod pa 'di yis ni// gtso bo thams cad mcho na ni/ rdo rje 'dzin pa che sogs
101b3(rgyud): kyi/ las grub pa yang nges par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje dam tshig rtog pa las// rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa/ 
101b4(rgyud): rdzogs s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs de dag thams cad/ sems can thams cad kyi don du bsgoms nas/ phyir mi ldog pa sa la rab tu bzhag
101b5(rgyud): ste/ mkhyen bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po gsang ba thams cad 'dzin par dbang bskur nas/ do
101b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba de gang logs bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug
101b7(rgyud): te/ ni dgashegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin ni// ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba// de lta de ltar sems can don// 'dod chags las
101b8(rgyud): byas// denas rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje gsang ba'ang gsungs so// sems can kun la phan phyir dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i phyir// sems can thams cad bsad kyi ni
102a1(rgyud): drug/ sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos/ rang gi nor bu'i gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sems can thams cad pan phyir
102a2(rgyud): dang kyi sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba yis/ pha rol nor rnams phrogs kyang ni// sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spun gyis/ rang gi gsang ba'i
102a3(rgyud): bud mo 'di gsungs so// 'dod chags 'dra ba'i bde ba med// rgyal ba la ni de phul na// gzhan gyi chung ma sems can phyir// bsten pas bsod nams thob par 'gyur// de nas byang chub
102a4(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sems can thams cad phan phyir dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa'i phyir// las rnams thams cad byas pa yin
102a5(rgyud): bsod nams shin du mang po snyed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'dzin rdo rje 'chang ba la legs so zhes bstod pa/ 
102a6(rgyud): legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// rdo rje theg pa bla med pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi
102a7(rgyud): gsang ni theg pa chen po mngon 'dadus pa'i// mdo 'di yang ni legs par bshadado// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
102a8(rgyud): kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po/ rdzogs s+ho// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad cig tu 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
102b1(rgyud): nyid chos thams cad kyi bdag po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab po// pad mo'i sems dpa' pad mo che/ 'jig rten dbang phyug dbang po che// 
102b2(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang stan pa'i mchog / rdo rje chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi rgyal po dag pa che// sems dpa'i rgyal po blo gros che// pad me'i bdag nyid pad me tsho// pad mo mgon
102b3(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal lo// pad mo las byung pad bzangs 'od// pad mo dag pa rab dag byed// rdo rje pad mo pad dag byed// pad mo pad mo khyod phyag 'tshal// sna tshogs chen po smang ba che/ 
102b4(rgyud): dgos pa chen po che dang mtshungs/ brtan pa chen po dpa' ba che// dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can bsam pa theg pa che// rnal 'byor chen po mes chen po// bde byed bde
102b5(rgyud): dag pa'i don// sangs rgyas pad mo khyod phyag 'tshal// chos de nyid don dam pa'i chos// dga' ba'i chos ni chos rab byed// chos chen po dang chos bzang po// chos kyi 'khor lo khyod phyag
102b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas sems dpa' sems bzang mchog/ chos kyi sems dpa' sems mchog 'dzin// sems dpa' dam pa sems mchog shes// sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// 
102b7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po mchog/ mgron po chen po rnam gzigs pa// 'jig rten snang ba 'jig rten don// 'jig rten mgon khyod la phyag 'tshal// 'jig rten yi ge yi ge che// 
102b8(rgyud): yi ge mchog ni yi ge 'dra// yi ge yi ge thams cad spyan// 'khor lo'i yi ge khyod phyag 'tshal// phyag na pad chen phyag chen po// dbugs 'byin po ni sbyin pa po// sangs rgyas chos ni sangs rgyas
103a1(rgyud): chesangs rgyas bdag nyid khyod pag 'tshal// gzugs ni gzugs chen chen po ste// rdo rje gzugs ni gzugs bzang 'chang // chos kyi snang ba gzi brjid mchog
103a2(rgyud): 'jig rten snang khod phyag 'tshal lo// pad mo'i dpal ni mgon po'i mchig/ chos dpal mgon pos mgon ldan pa'o// tshangs pa'i mgon po tshangs chen po// tshangs sras khyod la phyag
103a3(rgyud): 'tshal lo// snang ba'i snang mchog gnang ba'i gtso// snang gsal shin du snang ba po// snang ba'i mgon po snang ba che// sangs rgyas snu khyod pya kau 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dbang bskur
103a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas mchog sangs rgyas sras po mkhas chen po// sangs rgyas sras po gtsug gi mchog/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas spyan ni spyan chen po// chos spyan/ 
103a5(rgyud): gzigs pa chen po yi// ting 'dzin ye shes chen po pa// rdo rje spyan khyod phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nyid kun gyi yon tan 'di// khyod kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad rnams// bstod dum sgom
103a6(rgyud): par byed pa gang // 'jig rten dbang po thob par 'gyur/ dpa' bo khyod la gsol btab pas// rang gi rigs rnam bskyed nas kyang // chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// thub pa chen pos
103a7(rgyud): bshad du gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i tshig thos nas/ bcom ldan
103a8(rgyud): 'das shikya thub pan// ma ste logs su mngon du phyogs te 'dug nas/ rdo rje pad mo rang gi thugs khar bzhag ste/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rab tu dag pa yi// dza
103b1(rgyud): pad mo 'di dag gi/ pa yin bdag gi bu yang yin// rigs 'di byin gyis brlab par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig lhas byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pad mo
103b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // 
103b3(rgyud): hriHde nas de phyung ma thag tu// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kho nas pad mo lta bu'i 'od zer kha dog dang / gzugs dang rtags dang spyod lam rnam pa du ma byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams
103b4(rgyud): thams cad du 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par dag pa dang // chos nyid kyi ye shes yang dag par sbyangs nas/ slar log ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i thugs khor zhugs so// 
103b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi rig pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra pad mo tA mo hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje
103b6(rgyud): rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rang nod ta ma tr-i/ de nas
103b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra byid byed ta ma hri/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsu
103b8(rgyud): so// oM badz+ra byid t+yod ta ma a/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ gzugs thams cad ston pa'i zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'gro ba
104a1(rgyud): thams cad 'dul ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM hUM hri ho// de nas des smras ma thag tu/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzi gas kyi dbang po'i thugs las
104a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ pad mo la zhugs pa/ phyag rgya'i mtshan ma pad ma 'dzin pa/ kha dog dang gzugs dang cha lugs
104a3(rgyud): dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad sems dpa' thams cad kyi sku 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i lus su gyu nas byung ste/ 'jig rten
104a4(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad ji ltar 'dul bar so sor gzugs su bstan nas/ ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'dul bar bya ste/  yang bslar log
104a5(rgyud): nas/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shakya thub pa'i phyogs thams cad kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la 'khod nas/ ched du
104a6(rgyud): brjod pa 'di tshod du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thabs ni snying rje'i bdag nyid tshe// gang du thabs kyis 'dul mdzad ni/ lha rnams su yang gyur pa yin// de nas
104a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rang gi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ sems can thams cad la
104a8(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / don dang grub pa dam pa dang / rdo rje'i chos nyid dang / ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir phul nas/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes
104b1(rgyud): bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba ni// 'gro ba 'dul zhes bya ba ste// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ 
104b2(rgyud): bebs bzhi ni brgyan pa dang // srad pa bzhi dang ldan pa ste// dar dang phreng bas brgyan pa dang / dkyil 'khor gr-i ni thams cad dang // sgo dang sgo khyud thams cad du// rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan
104b3(rgyud): pa// phyi rol dkyil 'khor spyad pu bre// de yi nang du srad pu ni// gru bzhi par ni bri bar bya/ gnyis pa'i grwa ni sgo 'dod cing // pad mo 'dra bar bya ba yin// ka bA brgyad kyi tshul du ni// pad ma mdab
104b4(rgyud): ma brgyad pa bri// de yI yoM/ oMr dbus su ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs bzhag ste// de la sku gzugs bzhag pa ni 'di yin no// / bud d+ha hUM/ sangs rgyas phyogs kun bri ba ni// pad ma'i
104b5(rgyud): dbus su gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin chen pad ma dang // sna tshogs pad ma'ang de bzhin no// de la de rnams kyi snying po na 'di yin no// oM hUM d+hi kr-i/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje
104b6(rgyud): shugs kyis rgal nas ni// der ni spyan ras gzigs dbang bri// gzugs rnams thams cad 'byin pa ste// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// rdo rje 'gying la sogs tshul du// sangs rgyas
104b7(rgyud): la sogs sems dpa' che// mtsha nau ma pad ma 'chang ba br-i// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// aHau saR+YA ta thA ga tA d+harma hUM// oM badz+ra pad ma aM gu sha ko shad+b+ha r-i bAdz+ra tA hUM phaT/ 
104b8(rgyud): oM mA ra ya ma ra ya pad ma ku su ma A su d+ha ra a mog shar to// oM pad ma sa b+ha wa pad ma hA sta duhU~M/ rdo rje'i shugs kyis rgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'ang de bzhin to// de ma
105a1(rgyud): du / dbus su byA ba ni// thor tshogs dbus na'ang de bzhin gshegs// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// khro gnyer la sogs tshul du ni/ mar+g+han mar pad ma 'chang bri bar// lha
105a2(rgyud): 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// hU o pad mo b+haM ku Ti ta Ti tra/ oM pad ma suR+ya dzA la hu/ oM pad ma mo N+Di tu d+ha ba tsan sde pra h+ma d+ba ya ar+ya pa lo kau to sha ra de
105a3(rgyud): hi me/ saR+Wa ar+d+ha ne shi gram sa ma ya hUM/ oM pad mad Da ha saM ka da sha mu kha ha ha ha ha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gsum pa'ang de bzhin te/ sems dpa' chen po snyoms
105a4(rgyud): zhugs par// pad mo'i steng du bzhag pa bri// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// lha 'og gi rims ji bzhin bya// pad mo la sogs tshul du ni// sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag/ de
105a5(rgyud): lo de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// d+h+waM/ oM tA ra pad ma a wa lo ka ya ya ma ma/ sa ma ya sa twa hUM/ oM pad ma ku ma ra ya pad ma sha ga ti drA ra kha dgA na tshin d+hA bi na d+ha hUM phaT/ oM pad ma ni lA
105a6(rgyud): krAn tha shang kha tsakra ga d+ha pad ma pa ni bya gra tsarma ni b+ha sa ni kriSh+Na pa ra pa krid ta ad nyo ba bi ta/ a tsi na tsarma ba ma kAn d+ho da ri yA nI ra ya Na ru pa d+ha re tre mun pa tsa ad tA ha sa ma smA be sha ya sa ma ya na d+hi hi
105a7(rgyud): me// sid d+hi ma a wa lo kaM te shwa re hu~M/ oM prAh+ma pad+ma ma sam b+ha wa dza pa dza pa pad ma pa sha hUM// rdo rje'i shugs kyis rgal nas ni/ dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'ang de bzhin te// der ni pad zhal ba na
105a8(rgyud): padz+ra pad ma mdung rtse thogs pa bri// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// rdo rje gar las gas tshul du/ mtshan ma pad mo bzhin bri bi/ sems pa chen po tshig bzhin// de dag gi snying
105b1(rgyud): blan 'di rnams yin no//  oM byad ma d+hA shA n+yai shar dbums natan gtam na// rmA sems sa ga pa/ bAn+d+ha d+ha ma rdo rjes / mam+b+ha nA kar+m+ma m-i rlom ma bra nas la
105b2(rgyud): som mame dang /  la ka ti shwar pa// ban d+hU pa ma ka ba tsa/ sam pa la hU~M/ oM mahA pra tsaHbi sha ya ru bi kI ka tA pad ma dang Sh+Thak+Sha rul/ thi shAn dag d+hA dz+ra wAsan+ta pU ma yak+ta khad d+hag
105b3(rgyud): d+h+r-ig d+hi ga d+h+ri/ oM pad ma kyis rgyum ban d+hi dzA phaT/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgol nas ni// glu rnams kun du bra ba ni/ rdo skyes sogs rdul// rdo rje las la sogs
105b4(rgyud): gr-Id+d+ha ni rnams yin no// oM pang ma la skye ga sa mahrI \u0f7f badz+ra sa ma si~M hU~M/ oM pad mA mA l+yA a b+hi nams b+hi'i k+kos ma yan+ta/ oM pad+ma m+b+ha gi te dza gte tog ta pung sa ma s+t+rai 'aM/ oM pad man+tha
105b5(rgyud): nr-i ti sau pa phra bar ta na sa mA saM hU~M/ rdo rje'i shugs kyi si rgyal nas ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rims grwa rnams su// pad ma mtsha tshul sogs ba ni// mchad pa'i lham rnams bu'o// 
105b6(rgyud): pa \u0f7fda pa'i phyag d+hani/ 'di rnams yin no// oM pad ma du pa prAcus mA ye pre d+ha ya pang mgul de ni mngag ni pad ma ta ti d+ha/ oM puSh+pe pA rgyus ma ye padam pa mi ni mahA shi ye
105b7(rgyud): makul pra drA hA DA sa sarbAn sa dam dz+raM/ oM d+b+ha ba bcus ma ye pad ma kun d+ha sun d+ha rim dut+pa le ka ma sa na dza na sa pad+ma ma sa ra yA ma ni h+ma/ oM gan d+h+r-i btses ma yemad pad ma kun l+ya \u0f7f/ tik+Sha
105b8(rgyud): ru rje ni me pa ma sa de nas tshig losags kun// sgra rnams bsrung ba bzhi po dag/ de dag gi snying po'i don gyis ni/ ji bzhin par ni bri bar bya// do seMs ni ts+li
106a1(rgyud): / ma hA pad ma aM gu sha a ka ra sha ya shi g+h+raM saR+YA pad ma ku la sa ma yan pa ma aM gu sha hAM ha rA hUMdz+dzAdz+nyA/ oM a mo g+ha pad ma pa sha gro d+ha a kur sha ya pra be sha ya pa sha ya ma hA pa shu ba
106a2(rgyud): ti ya ma ba ru Na ku pe ra pra ma be sho d+ha ra pad ma ku la sa ma ya huM hU/ oM pad mo s+pho ta ban d+ha saR+YA pad ma kuM la sa ma yAn hrig+ni hUM baM/ oM shra na mu khas nad ku ma ra b+he shA d+ha ra pAd ma ga na d+ha ya/ a pe sha d+h+r-i ra
106a3(rgyud): pad ma gan d+ha ya/ a be sha ya sar+b+ba ma tra ban drA ya saR+Wa sid dA yo me pa tsad tsa pad ma a be sha ya aHaHeHaH// / de nas 'dir 'gro ba thams ca de 'dra la baM zhes bya ba'i pad mo'i dkyil
106a4(rgyud): 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad do// de la dang po kho nar pad mo'i slob dpon nyid rdo rje pad mo tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
106a5(rgyud): po'i tshul du snying po 'dis las rnams bya'o// / oM ma hA pad ma s+pho ta a ti TiSh+Ta a/ de nas de bzhin du bka' mnos nas/ ngom tshig gi phyag rgya bdag pa dgra nyid dbang bskur te/ 
106a6(rgyud): pad mo'i dbyibs blangs nas/ rang gi pad mo'i ming brjod la/ pad mo lcag kyu la sogs pa las rnams bya'o// / de nas chos kyi phyag rgya de dag nyid kyi sems dpa' chen po rnams bsgrub
106a7(rgyud): par ba'o// de nas dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no// de pad mo'i slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste/ de la dang po pad mo'i slob ma rnams la/ ma na'i snying po sprin la 'di skad bsgo bar bya'o// 
106a8(rgyud): der ni khyod kyi snying kha na// pad mo'i sems dpa' nyid bzhugs te// ci ste tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thog tu dral te ga shogs// de nas yang 'di skad du bsko bar bya ste// gsong po'i
106b1(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa 'di su la yang ma smra shig/ khyod kyis mi bde ba ma sbyangs pas dus byas nas/ sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ de nas snying po 'dis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing
106b2(rgyud): bar bya'o// / oM badz+ra pad ma sa ma yaM sta/ de nas gos dkar po bgos la/ dar dkar pos gdong g.yog s+yA nas gzhug par bya ste/ snying po ni 'di yin no// oM pad maM sa ma ya hUM/ 
106b3(rgyud): de nas las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas/ pad mo'i dbyibs lag tu sbyin no// oM pad ma hA ta badz+ra d+ha ra ma taM pa la/ des kyang 'di skad du rdo rje'i chos nyid ji lta bu lags zhes bri bar
106b4(rgyud): bya'o/ de la yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ ji ltar pad mo dkar po 'di rigs kyi nyes pas mi chagasu bzhin/  thams cad dag par bsgoms na ni/ de bzhin pas gos mi
106b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ de la chos nyid de yin no// de nas pad mo'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes brlab par bya'o// snying la pad mo bris nas kyang / pad mo bsgoms nas snying kha ru/ pad
106b6(rgyud): ma dpal yang dbang 'gyur na/ bud med pa la ta smos ci dgos/ dpral bar sangs rgyas gzugs bris te/ rtag tu sgom par byas na ni/ sgom pa dos ni myur du ya / 
106b7(rgyud): dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur// kha yi nang gi lce steng ni// sangs rgyas gzugs su rab bsgoms na// sgra dbang lha mo bdag dbang ni/ rtag tu kha nas gnas par 'gyur/ 
106b8(rgyud): gtsug to dbus su pad mon// snyoms par zhugs te bzhag nas kyang // gtsug tor pad mo bsgoms nas ni/ mkha' 'gro thams cad dbang 'gyur/ de dag gi snying pa ni
107a1(rgyud): 'di rnams yin no// oM pad ma shr-i yaM ba sha ma na sa 'o// oM pad ma a b+hI She ka pra yang caga.oM pad mam sA ra sa sti bi sho ng+ka ya hUM/ oM par
107a2(rgyud): mo su dru ga ma yang na mkha' la'ang rung // pad mo dam pa bsgoms nas ni// 'di ni sems can thams cad kyang / dbang du byed pa dam pa'o// mkha
107a3(rgyud): 'am mngan phyogs gnan rjebyud mo pa dam pa bsgoms nas kyang // gang che mthong ba de che blangs// ci dga' bar ni mi snang 'gyurag po'am yang na nam mkha
107a4(rgyud): la/ pod ma rgya gram bris nas ni// gang che mthong nas blangs na ni/ de che sna tshogs gzugs su 'gyur// nam mkha' 'am yang na phyogs gzhan du/ rdo rje
107a5(rgyud): pad mo bsgoms nas kyang // de blangs skad cig nyid kyis kyang // pad mo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// // oM ba
107a6(rgyud): dza ga dpa shaM ta dz+nyAn padam a b+hi sha sa.oM dz+nyAn pad ma tiSh+Tha a dwi sh+yaM ku ru baM/ oM sa ma d+hi bi sha pAd ma tiSh+Tha b+he sha pad m+ba ru s+yai me dar r+g+ho ya b+ha ga wAn oM sa ma d+hI badz+dza
107a7(rgyud): pad ma tiSh+Tha shA gr-i hU~M hrI/ dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du/ spyan ras gzigs dbang bris nas ni// de yi mdun du rtamagrin gyiphyag rgya'i mchog ni 'dren
107a8(rgyud): par byadakyil 'khor la sogs thamaso cad du/ skyon ras gzigs dbang bri bar bya/ nges par nags pa'i phyag rgya yis/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dren par
107b1(rgyud): byed/ dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du/ spyan ras gzigs dbang bri bar bya/ de yi mdun du pad ma yi// lcags sgrog mchog ni phyag rgya bcings/ dkyil 'khor
107b2(rgyud): la sogs thams cad du/ sprin ras gzigs dbang br-i de yi// mdun du pad mo'i dril bu yis// thams cad 'bebs pa'i dam pa'o// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams
107b3(rgyud): yin no// oM pad ma ai gu shA oM ka ra shra ya saR+Wa ma hA sad tA na hUM dz+nyA/ ai a mai g+ha pa sha kro d+ha hUM ho// oM pad ma s+tho ta baM/ oM pad ma gAn Ta a be sha ya saR+Wa ma A/ bdag nyid nyid
107b4(rgyud): kyis bdag nyid nyid// pad+ma mo zhal bzhi sems dpar yang // bsgoms nas de nas 'grub na ni// skad cig gis ni ga zugs ming 'gyur/ de ltar bdag nyid bdag nyid
107b5(rgyud): kyis// rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gnas// pad mo'i pad mo bsgoms nas ni// zad mi shes pa'i go 'phang thob// spyan ras gzigs dbang thor tshugs dbus// bdag gi spangs
107b6(rgyud): rgyas gzugs su ni// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms 'gyur na// tshe dpag med dang mnyam par 'gyur// sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin gnas// sna tshogs gzugs kyi
107b7(rgyud): ting 'dzin du/ bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang mnyam 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po 'di rnams yin no// pa di ma bI shaM/ d+barma kA ya
107b8(rgyud): dam/ br-id d+ha ya ba~M ke she ka/ lo ke shar de nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes brlab bo// de la re shig dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes
108a1(rgyud): @yin te/ ji ltar 'i tshul du ma/ zla ba'i dkyi 'khor dbus gnas shing // pad mo la gnas sems dpar no// bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid sgom// de nas de dag gi
108a2(rgyud): lus ni 'di dag yin no// sa m+b+ha rgyus phyag rgya tsho bcings nas// tshe dpag med dang mnyam par 'gyur// rdo rje'i pad mes bcings nas ni// spyan ras gzugs dbang mnyam par
108a3(rgyud): 'gyu/ sangs rgyas dbang gis tats+tshings nos ni// bde bshegs pas de dbang bskur// pad mos pad mo'i ting 'dzin thob// sna tshogs kyin sna chags mchog/ sna tshogs gzugs
108a4(rgyud): kyis 'dul ba'o// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskArar+ya ster// pad mo sems dpas ting nge 'dzin// pad mo khro mo dbang phyug dpal// rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gis// pad
108a5(rgyud): rna me 'dod de'i dngos grub mchog/ sangs rgyas dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid// rdo rje pad mos grub mchog sbyin// 'dod pa'i dbang pos rab 'dod ldan// dga' ba yis ni legs
108a6(rgyud): par mdzes/ khro gnyer gyis ni khro zhing 'gyur/ pad mo'i nyams gzi brjid mchog/ pad ma'i zla bas mdangs chen po/ bzhad pas rab tu bzhad pa thob// sgrol bas dngos
108a7(rgyud): grub mchog thob pa// pad mo rol gris skal bzang thob/ mgrin sngon gyis ni 'gugs pa che// gos khar gyis ni dngos grub po/ pad mogar dbang phyug gis 'grub// mi 'dzugs
108a8(rgyud): rtag tu 'jigs pa med// rnab rdum gyis ni ma rungs 'dul// pad mi khu tshur rab srung byed/ seMs dga' zhing phreng bris no// glu dbyings gar byed pa dug pas tshim
108b1(rgyud): mdzes shing mar me lta// dris ni mchog gi drir yang 'gyur// rta mgrin gyis ni yang dag 'gugs// gdon mi za bas dbang du byed// pad ma'i lcags sgrog 'ching ba che// dril bus
108b2(rgyud): kun du 'bebs byed de/ de nas yang pad mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di yin no// rdo rje bsdoms pa bcangs nas ni// mthe bong mthe'u mnyam pa
108b3(rgyud): bsgreng / phyag rgya 'di ni chos dam tshig/ sangs rgyas chos ni rab thob byed// rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni// 'dzub mo gung mo srin lag mnyam// sangs rgyas rigs
108b4(rgyud): mchog phyag rgya tsho// / sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par byed// rdo rje bsdams po bcings nas ni// gung mo rdo rje rab bsnyams nas// 'di ni rig pa dam pa yi// phyag rgya yin te rdo rje
108b5(rgyud): grub/ de las gung mo rin chen 'dra// rdo rje rin chen rab grub byed// gung mo pad mo tshul du byas/ pad ma'i dngos grub rab thob byed// rdo rje thal mo bsdams nas ni/ 
108b6(rgyud): rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// / chos kyi rdo rje bcings nas ni/ skad cig gis ni dam tshig 'grub// / rdo rje bsdams nas 'dzub mo bsnyams/ sangs rgyas dngos grub rab
108b7(rgyud): thob byed// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ sems dpa'i phyag rgya khyad par du// rdo rje thal mo bsnams nas kyang // gung mo mnyam bsnyams de bzhin du/ mthe chung mthe
108b8(rgyud): bong phye ba ni// sna tshogs pad mor bshad pa yin/ de nas mthe bong gnyis bsnol te// dbus kyi rdo rje skye gtsug phud// 'dzub gnyis rtse smad dgug pa'i gzugs
109a1(rgyud): gtsug pung sangs rgyas yin par bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mthe bong bsdams te btud nas ni// 'dzub mo gnyis ni r+Na s+yAng dgug/ bkan
109a2(rgyud): nas ting nge 'dzin du banag/ thal mo pad mo many+dzus sbyor la// 'dzub mo rdo rjer snyams nas ni// mthe bong ngos la sbyar ba ni// nges pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa
109a3(rgyud): bsdams nas ni// legs par bkan te ba tsaM sa nas ni// mthe bong gnyis ni pad mor bsgreng // sangs rgyas pad mo yin pa rab sha d+ha/ mthe bong gnyis ni rdo rje mnyam// 
109a4(rgyud): 'dzub mo lcags kyu ral grir bya/ mthe chung gnyis ni so sor dbye// gung mo srin lag pad mor bya// thal mo mnyam par rab sbyar la/ shagacus te mthe bodA bkug nas ni/ 
109a5(rgyud): 'dzub mos 'dzub mo bzung nas ni// 'dren par byed pa pad mo'i 'da'// thal mo sbyar nas mnyam par gdab// legs pa'i phyag rgya bcings na ni// legs so zhes bya sbyin par
109a6(rgyud): byed/ pad mo legs par yin par grags// thal mo mnyam par rab sbyar la// 'dzub mo rtse mo mnyam ste dgug/ mthe'u chung phral te mdzod spur bzhag/ pad mo khro gnyer zhes
109a7(rgyud): bya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// thal mo thams cad dkyil 'khor du// snying kha ra rab tu bskyang ba ni// pad mo nyi ma yin par bshad// thal mo rab tu dam sbyar
109a8(rgyud): khro na 'jub gnyis rin chen 'ong bar bya// dpung pa spyi bor rab brkyang la// pad mo rin chen rgyal mtshan rtse// rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor bzhag/ kha dang bcas par
109b1(rgyud): brkyang nas// nyid kyi kha nas dgod par bya// kha ni bcu gcig nyid du 'gyur// ting 'dzin pad mo bcings nas ni/ mthe bong gnyis ni so sor bskyed// pad mo sgrol ba'i phyag rgya
109b2(rgyud): 'di// dngos grub thams cad rab ster byed// pad mo sgrol ba'i phyag rgya ni// 'dzub mo pad ma'i tshul du bcing / ral gri'i tshul du byas po 'di/ na pad mo ral gri'i phyag
109b3(rgyud): rgya yin// mthe'u tshod pad ma chen por bya// mtheb gnyis de bzhin dbyug par bsgreng // 'dzub mo'i rtsems dung chen bya// gung mo srin lago 'khor lor sbyar// rdo rje thal mo dam byas
109b4(rgyud): la// g.yas pa oM gyi nang du bzhug/ g.yon pa'i 'dzub mtheb zlas par bya// so kun chu skyes kha bye 'dra// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la// g.yon dang g.yas nas de bzhin du// 'gying
109b5(rgyud): bcas gar byed bskor nas ni// spyi bor bzhag pa pad mo can// rdo rje thal mo dam bcas la/ de bzhin rtsa kun kha bye la// bskor te pad me snying khar ni// bzhag nas brten par
109b6(rgyud): byed pa'o// rdo rje thal mo dam byas la// gsang ba'i gnod sbyin tshul du ni// thal mo brkyang ste bskums nas ni// khar bzhag pad mo gnod sbyin ma// rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas kyang / 
109b7(rgyud): gung mo gnyis ni phyir bkug ste// rang gi mthe bong rgya ba mnan po// pad me'i khu tshur zhes kyang bshad// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni// rdo rje thal mo las byung ba// mchod pa'i
109b8(rgyud): lha mo thams cad kyi// dam tshig mchog rnams bcing ba'o// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// 'dzub mo gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas// bkug nas rtse mo sbyar ba'o// rta mgrin gyi ni
110a1(rgyud): yin par bshad// pad mo'i khu tshur zhes kyang bshad// pad mo'i thal mo mnyam sbyar lha// 'dzub gnyis mdud par mdud pa ni// don yod zhugs pa'i phyag rgya yin// mtheb
110a2(rgyud): 'dzub lcags sgyo ka 'dra bar bya// rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis ni// pad mo thal mo mnyam sbyar la// srin lag mthe'u chung gnyis bar du// mthe bong gnyis bcug dam du btsir// de nas par
110a3(rgyud): me'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ye shes bslab pa ni 'di yin te// hri gri pri hri/ shri shi d+hi hi g+h+r-i d+hi k+ti pi/ bi riSh+Ti a/ pade me'i khu tshur gnyis byas la// las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa ra s+m+R+YuM// de bzhin
110a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang
110a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi gzungs kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyi brlabs pad ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam
110a6(rgyud): pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarA ta thA ga ta d+harma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang
110a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra ma Ni rang na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rong gi
110a8(rgyud): rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM pad ma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM kaR+Sha sa ma lo hUM/ de nas
110b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshang bya dra/ 
110b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba lo// pad mo'i gsang ba zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad pu bri// de dbus
110b3(rgyud): pad mo bzang po la// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// dam tshig mchog rnams snga ma bzhin// rang gi rig pa rnams ldan par// chos kyi rdo rje
110b4(rgyud): la sogs bri// de la de dag gau phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no// oM saR+YA ta thA ga ta d+harme sha re hUM/ oM d+harma sa ma ya/ badz+ra pad ma ni hUM/ oM bud d+ha A b+hi She ka rang Na sa ma ye hUM/ au tAM ra sa ma ye
110b5(rgyud): hUM/ oM b+hi shA mu khe hUM/ sna tshogs gzugs mchog dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// de yi dbus su pad mo yis/ bskor ba'i pad mo bri bar bya// de yi phyogs
110b6(rgyud): rnams thams cad du// pad mo'i phyag rgya nyid gnas pa// pad me'i mtshan maM bri bar bya// bder gshegs nyid kyi nyid phyag rgya// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di dag go/ hriM/ 
110b7(rgyud): pad ma ta thA ga te/ oM sa man ta ba tre/ oM pad ma badz+ra aM gu sha ko sha d+ha ra ni hUM/ oM pad mar taM/ a pad duSh+TaM/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis pAr yang // rdo rje shugs kyis rgalan swa
110b8(rgyud): nigatsug pud dbus su chu skyes che// sangs rgyas dbang bskur bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du// phrad ma'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi// 
111a1(rgyud): s+yA ga zhug+sa par bya/ da la dA dag ga snying po ni 'dri rnams yan no// shri/ e b+haM kA Ti ta Te bA ta Ti pad+ma ma? hUM/ o pad ma dzA la hAM/ o so ma so pad ma hAM/ o par
111a2(rgyud): hA ma hA s+thA ni a gA r+dz+dza shaM bag tA di ri da ri.ad he pad Te tsa la pra dza le/ ku su ma d+ha re a li pra bI sha sid d+hi ma ma pra yats+tsha hUM// de bzhin gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje shags kyis rgal nas kyang // de
111a3(rgyud): yi dbus su pad mo mdzes//  dmo'i phyag rgya gzhag par bya// de bzhin phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin par// pad ma'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi// pad mo la ni gnas pa ra bri// 
111a4(rgyud): de la de dag gi snying po ni mdi dag go// dI// oM ta ra tud d+ha re hU~M/ oM d+hi hUM/ oM pad ma tsa kra shaM bA ra ni/ na~M la kan tha sid d+ha sad d+ha hUM/ oM pa da mu d+ha ra bA swa ni pad+ma ma sam b+ha ba b+ha ba ba da ba da hUMdakyil 'khor
111a5(rgyud): dam pa bzhi par ni// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas kyang // padad+ma mo'i dbus su pad mo ni// 'bar ba'i phreng bas bskor 'od bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin par// pad mo'i
111a6(rgyud): dbus na gnas pa yi// pad mo'i mtshan mar gnas pa bri// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag rnams yin no// sti// oM pad ma na ra te ShA ri pu dza yaM saR+YA ta thA ga ta nan Ta nan Ta hAM/ oM a b+ha ya pad ma ka pa
111a7(rgyud): tsa b+han d+ha ra k+Sha ma ma hUM haM/ oM ma hA pra tsan De pad ma ya k+Shi ni b+hi sha ru ba da ra ni b+hi shA pa ya saR+Wa duSh+TA na khaM da kha da hU~M phaT// oM pad ma muSh+Ti a mu// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams
111a8(rgyud): bri ba pad mo lcags kyu la sogs rgyu// mdor na pad mo'i mtshan ma can// de nas de dag gi phyag rgya 'di rnams yin no// oM pad ma ra tsi pu tse ho// oM pad ma b+hi She pU dza ra ta/ oM pad ma gi ta pU dza ge/ oM
111b1(rgyud): pad ma nid t+ye pU dza kr-id/ oM du pa pad ma ni hUM/ oM pad ma puSh+pe hU~M/ oM pad ma ku la sun d+ha ri/ d+harma a lo ko pu dza ya hUM/ oM pad ma g+han d+he r+m+ma/ mchod pa rnams so// oM pA da ma aM gu sha a kar+Na sha ya/ ma hA pad
111b2(rgyud): ma ku lan/ ha ya gri ba saM ye hUM dz+dzi/ oM a mau g+ha pa sha kro d+ha sa ma yai pra be sha ya/ saR+Wa sa man yan hUM/ oM pad ma shaM ka ra bAM/ oM pad ma gaN DA ri shi g+h+raM ma a be sha ya sa ma yan shA na mu khaM a/ kla nas phyag rgya'i
111b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dir 'gug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ pad mo'i slob ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin btsud de/ 'di skad du khyod kyis gsang ba 'di su la yang ma sme shig/ khyod sems can dmyal
111b4(rgyud): par ltung nga re/ tshe gcig tu sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/ de las phab nas 'di skad du/ khyod kyi mig lam du ci zhig snang zhes dris nas/ des ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du dngos grub 'gyur ro// des ga la
111b5(rgyud): te nam mkha' dkar bar mthong na ni/ da tshe dngos grub dam pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// yang na ser por mthong na ni de nor bsgrub pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// ci ste dmar por mthong na ni rjes su dga'
111b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o// ci ste nag por mthong na ni mngon spyod kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o// ci ste sna tshogs mthong na ni dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes slob po// shes nas ji lta ba
111b7(rgyud): bzhin du gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te/ snod ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes bskyed de/ phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// de ltar rdo rje dbyings la stsogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du/ yang snod ji lta ba
111b8(rgyud): bzhin du phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa ni/ 'di bzhin du brtag par bya'o// de nas dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i ye shes dam pa 'di yin te// spyan ras gzigs dbang sems dpa' tshe// sna tshogs gzugs
112a1(rgyud): / su bdag rang nyid// bsgoms nas phyag rgya chen po yi// mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dbang gi dam tshig ni// mnyam par gzhag pas brtan byas te// bdag nyid
112a2(rgyud): kyis ni bsgoms na ni// mchog gi dngos grab thob par 'gyur// pad mo pad mo sems dpa' rwa// bdag rang nyid mnyam gzhag pas sgom// bdag nyid nyid kyis dam pa 'di// dngos grupa thob pa nyid du 'gyur
112a3(rgyud): rang 'byung gdon mi za ba yi// dbang phyug rang bzhin las kyi rgyu// cho ga bzhin bsgrubs myur du yang // mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas de dag gi snying po ni bdi rnams so// oM pad ma satwa ha ma/ 
112a4(rgyud): sid d+ha ho// oM pad+ma ma bud d+ha bi Sha ko ha ma sid d+ha ma ma/ oM d+harma sa ma ya ra ha ma sid t+ya ho// o a mo g+he shwa ro ha ma sid d+h+ya mam// de nas nor grub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ kha yi mang du dbyig bcug ste// sna tshogs
112a5(rgyud): dbang phyug phyag rgya che// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni// gcig tu gyur pas stong du 'gyur// gser srang brgyad cha blangs nas ni// dam tshig mchog ni rab brtan na// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni// 
112a6(rgyud): gcig tu gyur pas stong du gyur// mu tig 'brum bu khar bcug la// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug du// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni// gcig tu gyur las stong du gyur// las kyi phyag rgya lag gnyis kyis// 
112a7(rgyud): rin chen thams cad blangs nas ni// bdag nyid nyid kyi stangs na yang // gcig tu gyur las stong du gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM pad ma hi ra da na pra da hUM dza/ oM pad ma mug ta pra da hUM dza/ 
112a8(rgyud): oM pad ma saR+Ya rad na pra ta hU~M dza// de nas rjes su dga' bar bya ba'i ye shes ni 'di yin te// sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag rgya che// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms nas ni// pad mo blangs te mdun gnas
112b1(rgyud): pa// gang yin des ni der mgur byed// dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yis// pad mo dmar po dam bzung ste// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms nas ni// bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur// bdag
112b2(rgyud): nyid kyis ni bsgoms nas kyang / pad mo blangs te ji lta ba// rdo rje lta bas de ltar bltas/ 'jig rten thams cad der mgur 'gyur/ las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// cho ga bzhin du pad mo bzung
112b3(rgyud): lhag pa gnyis kyis bskor na ni// bud med thams cad dor mgur byed// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM bi shI shwa ra ma ha pad mo ho// oM sa ma ya pad ma ho// o yog pa da ma ho/ 
112b4(rgyud): oM kArma pad ma ho// de nas mngon spyod kyi ye shes bslab bo// ma lus dbang po'i phyag rgya che// goms par bya ba bdag rang nyid// rang gi mdun du dpad ma// bcad nas 'chi 'gyur skad cig gis// pa
112b5(rgyud): ma brtan bzung yang dag par// dam tshig mchog ni de nyid kyis// rab tu brtan pa de rtogs na// rang gi ming smos de 'jig 'gyur// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings pa las// pad mo bzung ba ji bzhin du// gang
112b6(rgyud): gi ming smos pad ma ste// bcad nas de ni 'jig par 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// pad bzung cho ga ji lta bar// gang la khros pas gtogs byas pas// de yi srog ni 'gag par 'gyur// de
112b7(rgyud): dag gi sIng po ni 'di rnams so// oM ma hA pad+ma ma tshe d+ha ma ra yA ho baT/ oM sa ma ya pad ma s+pho ta na sha ya ra Ta phaT/ oM d+har+m+ma pad mu tshe d+ha bi na sha ya d+hi Ta phaT/ oM karma pad+ma ma s+tho ta ya dzi bi tama? A sa kri Ta phaT// de
112b8(rgyud): nas chos kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no// pad mo la ni bud med bsam// de'i steng bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgyur// pad mo pad mchog rtse byed cing // mnyam por gzhag nas dngos
113a1(rgyud): grub rdo/ pang mo la ni bud med bas ma// de steng bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgyur// rtse zhing sangs rgyas dbu brgyan no// bsgoms na des ni de bsgrub bo// padra mo la ni bud med pas me// de
113a2(rgyud): steng pad mor bdag bsgyur to// rtse zhing pad me pad mo'i mchog/ dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// pad mo la ni bud med bsam// de steng sna tshogs de dag bsgyur te// rtse zhing pad mo ste tshegs
113a3(rgyud): / mchog nya sna tshogs dngos grub thob pa ro 'gyur// de dag gi snying po 'di rnams so// oM pad mA sAna? yo ga sa da ya hri// oM bud d+ha ma kung Ta sanA yo ga sa d+ha ya sh+tsa.oM padad+ma ma pad ma san yo ga sa d+ha ya d+h+r-i/ oM
113a4(rgyud): bi shwa pad ma san yo g+ha satwA ya sti// de nas pad ma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes ji lta ba bzhin du bslab bo// sor mo'i rtse sprad pad mor bya// rdo rje khro bo'i 'dzub gnyis sprang // rtsa
113a5(rgyud): gnyis nor bu pad mo ltar// rdo rje bsdums pa'ang de bzhin te// rdo rje bcibs pa bsdams nas kyang // gung mo gnyis ni myu gur bsgreng // 'dzub mo srin lag gnyis bgug pa'i// phyag rgya shAkya thub pa'i bstan// 
113a6(rgyud): chos kyi rdo rje snying khar bzhag/ bsgyur te dpral bar bzhag pa dang // ting nge 'dzin tshul pang du bzhag/ bsgyur nas spyi bor bzhag par bya// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang bcings la// mchod rten pad mo'i tshul du ni// 
113a7(rgyud): gung mo gnyis ni bcings gyur na// sangs rgyas pad mo yin par bshad// de las mthe bong rdo rje dang // 'dzub gnyis ral gri lcags gyur pa// pad mo'i rdo rje 'dzin pa ste// gsang ba'i phyag rgya yin par bshad// 
113a8(rgyud): de las mthe bong bsnol nas kyang // 'dzub mos 'dzub mo rab bzung la// drangs nas rab dga' yin par bshad// legs so zhes pa'ang de bzhin te// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mtheb gnyis bskams
113b1(rgyud): te bcug nas kyang // 'dzub gnyis rtse bkug rtse mo yang // phral bzhag gung mo pad mor bya// de nyid las ni snying khar yang // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang / de nyid las ni rgyal mtshan bcing // lhag
113b2(rgyud): par rab tu brkyang par bya// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// 'dzub gnyis rtse mo pad mor dgugs// de bzhin pad mo ral gri ste/ 'dzub mo pad mor byas par/ sbyar// rdo rje bsdoms pa dam byas la/ 
113b3(rgyud): mthe bong g.yon pa nang du bzhag/ dung steng mthe bong mtho bar bsgreng // sor mo gung brkyang pad mthe'u chung // de nas thams cad bkug nas kyang // mtho'u chung padad+ma ma lta bur bya// mthe bong g.yas dang
113b4(rgyud): sbyar ba yi// 'dzub mos nor bu bsgreng bar bya// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mthe'u chung pad ma lta bur bya// 'dzub mo bsnyams pi pad ma'i spyan// rab tu gar byed zlog par bya// rdo rje bsdams pa dam
113b5(rgyud): byas la/ mthe'u chung pad mu lta bur bya// dam du 'dzub mo gnyis bkug ste// mthe bong gnyis ni go char bya// de la mthe bong gnyis mcha bar// mtheb gnyis nang du gzhug par bya// de nas rab tu bshad bya
113b6(rgyud): ba/ dam tshig mchog ni bla med de// rdo rje nang du bsdams nas kyang // 'dzub gnyis pad ma 'drar byas la// mthe bong phan tshun bsnol ba ni// gsang ba sna tshogs dpong du bshad// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa
113b7(rgyud): las kyi mthe'u chung gung mo mnyam bsgreng la// mthe ba ngos rdo rjer bsgyur ba ni// gtsug pud na yang de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mtheb mo pade me 'drar byas la// khyu nas 'byung bar
113b8(rgyud): byas nas kyang // pad du ting nge 'dzin ltar gzhag/ de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// sor mo kun gyi ngos rnams ni// mnyam par dam du bsdams nus kyang // 'dzub gnyis rdo rje rwa snyams pa'o// de bzhin
114a1(rgyud): rdo rje bsdams pa las// 'dzub gnyis pad mo 'drar byas la// mthe bong gnyis kyang bsnol nas ni// gung mo gnyis ni rtse spyad bayug/ de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mtheb
114a2(rgyud): gnyis rdo rje ra rab sbyar ma// 'dzub mo ral gri lugs kyur bya// mthe'u chung pad mo 'drar byas te// de bzhin du ni bsgyur nas kyang // 'dzub mo gson pa bstod pa la// 'dzub mo mthe bo cu sbyar nas// dam
114a3(rgyud): du bzung ste dkug ltar bya// de nyid mnyam byas 'dzub mo gnyis// bkug la mthe bos mnan pa ni// pad mo dgyes pa bdag nyid tshe'i// legs so zhes pa sbyin byed kyi// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ 
114a4(rgyud): ser mo kun gyi ngos sbyar la// mthe bong gnyis kyis mnan nas ni// 'dzub mo mnyam par sbyar ba'o// de nas snying kha'i nyi mar bya// spyi bor rgyal mtshan pad mar bya// phab ste kha 'gram bzhag pa ni// pad
114a5(rgyud): mo cher dgod dgod pa yin// rdo rje nang du bsdams byas la// chos kyi rdo rje'i tshul byas te// mthe'u chung mthe bo rab bsnyams pa// 'di ni sgrol ma' dam tshig yin// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// 
114a6(rgyud): 'dzub bkug pad mo ral grir bya// de bzhin nang du 'khor lor bya// bzlos pa sbyin pa de bzhin no// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mtheb 'dzub sprad de gnyis su bya// de nas snying khar sbyar ba ni// gsang / 
114a7(rgyud): pa'i bsrung ba yin par bshad// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe'u rgung pad mo 'drar byas la// 'dzub gnyis shin du bkug nas kyang // mtheb gnyis phyir bkyed mche ba can// de las khu tshur tshul
114a8(rgyud): gyis ni mi mthe bo gnyis kyis btsir ba yi// pad mo gsang ba'i khu tshur che// dam tshig mchog tu rab btags so// bde mo la skyil so pa'i// de dag gzhon rnams kun gyi ni// rdo rje nang du bstims
114b1(rgyud): byas pade 'dra bar ni bcing bar bya// de nas pad mo gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te// hA grA pra hA/ shra sha d+ha d+ha ga da gra bA/ tsha rA b+hA sa// las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus nas// gsang ba'i khu
114b2(rgyud): tshur gnyis bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ chos kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho/ 
114b3(rgyud): / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i pad mo// zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa
114b4(rgyud): dam pu 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma sa ma tI dz+nyA na ta thA ga tu hUM// de nas byad+d+ha chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ rang gi rigs kyi chos 'byung ba'i rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// hUM/ oM badz+ra d+harma
114b5(rgyud): hUMHda nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig po dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM ra da na d+harma hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi
114b6(rgyud): rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma d+harma hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM karma d+harma hUM// de nas byang chub sems
114b7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun du bzang po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nyid kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings
114b8(rgyud): dang 'dra bye ni/ chos kyi ye shes zhes brjod do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad pu bri// de yi dbus su bri ba ni// ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// de yi phyogs
115a1(rgyud): rnam thams cad du// sems dpa' che rnams cho ga bzhin// sna tshogs dbang phyug la stsogs pa// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs bri// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM dz+ha
115a2(rgyud): na bud+d+ha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pi shwe shwa ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na bud d+ha ma ku ta hUM/ e/ dzI na bud d+ha d+harma shwa re hUM/ oM dz+nyA na a mo ge shwa ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na da ma bud d+ha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma ma rA dza dA ri hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad mo mA ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na
115a3(rgyud): pad me tu shri hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad me b+hI ku tI hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma me sur+yA hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad ma tsa ne tra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad ma hA sa hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad ma tA rA hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pa da ma ku ma ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na prad ma na rA ya
115a4(rgyud): hUMta/ oM dz+nyA naM pad ma b+he shrA hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad ma na ri te shwa ro hUM/ oM dz+nyA ne pad ma rak+Sha hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad ma yak+Shar+ya hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma ma muSh+Ti hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad ma lA s+ye hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad ma mA le hUM/ 
115a5(rgyud): s+yai dz+nyA na pad ma gi taM hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad ma ni rA t+ye hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad ma d+hu pe hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad ma puSh+pe hUM/ oM pad ma dz+nyA na d+hi paM hUM/ oM pad ma dz+nyA na gan d+he hUM/ e pad ma dz+nyA na a gu shA hUM/ oM pad ma
115a6(rgyud): dz+nyA na e mo ga pa shaM hU~M/ oM pad ma dz+nyA na s+pho ta hU~M/ oM pad me dz+nyA na a pro sha hU~M// de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// dgug pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste/ 'di skad du
115a7(rgyud): khyod kyis gzhan su laM yang ma brjod cig/ khyod sems can dmyal ba chen po'i ltung nas sdug bsngal myong bar gyur ta ra/ de nas de'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste// 'jig rten dbang phyug snyoms zhugs la
115a8(rgyud): snying khar pad mo bsgoms nas kyang // pad mo ting 'dzin thob na ni// de ma thag tu myur bar lding // 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// dpral bar pad mo bsgoms byas te// goms nas shin du
115b1(rgyud): brtan gyur na// de ma thag tu mkha' la 'gro// 'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis// lce la pad mo bsgoms nas kyang // grub par gyur nas myur du yang // nam mkha' la ni de 'gro'o// 'jig rten
115b2(rgyud): dbang gi ting 'dzin d+hi so// go drug tu pad mo bsgoms nas kyang // grub par gyur na myur du ni// skad cigagacig gis stong du lding kai/ de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM pad ta dz+nyA na hri da ya/ a bi sha/ o
115b3(rgyud): pad ma dz+nyA nA a ba sha Sha ka a bi shaM/ oM pad ma dz+nyA na bId t+yod ta ma a bi shaM/ oM pad mA dz+nyA nA uSh+NI sh+ma a byi sha/ nam mkha' 'am+ba ni phyogs gzhan du// pad mo'i dbyibs ni bsgoms na kyang // cho ga 'di ni grub 'gyur na/ 
115b4(rgyud): skad cig gis na ma snang 'gyur// rna mA r+ya khya' 'am nA pogs gzhan du// pang mo'i dbyibs ni bsgoms pas la// de yi snying du bdag 'dug par// bsgoms par gyur na mi snang 'gyur// nam mkha' 'di
115b5(rgyud): ni phyogs gzhan du// bud mo'i dbyibs cig bsgoms byas la// gang tsha mthong ba de tshe blang // mi snang bar ni myur du 'gyur// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad mo'i dbyibs ni bsgoms byas
115b6(rgyud): lany+tsa/ mthong ba'i pad me de zos na// de ma thag tu mi snang 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM pad ma a ka ra sha ya/ oM pad ma ma ra tha/ oM pad maM dz+nyA na gri hA gri h+na/ oM pad ra sa yan// phyog
115b7(rgyud): rgya DI bcings pad mo ni// kha dog dbyibs rnams sna tshogs pa'i// dbyibs de lag par bzung nas ni// gzugs rnams thams cad 'chang bar 'gyur// pad mo kha dog dbyibs rnams ni// sna rnyogs
115b8(rgyud): pa yi dbyibs bris la// de nyid bsgom par bas na ne// gzugs mang 'chang bar de 'gyur ro// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad ma'i kha dog dbyibs rnams su/ sa tshogs dra bi/ 
116a1(rgyud): / su bsgoms na yang // sku yi gzugs su de 'grod ro// pad ma'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni// sa tshigs dbyibs su byas nas kyang // de la zhon nas mkha' 'gro zhing // ci dga'i
116a2(rgyud): shagazugs su nges par 'gyur// da la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM pad ma d+ha rA bi shAM nu pa pra ba rA ta ya ka a bi sha/ oM bi shr-i pad ma pra bar rta ya ma/ oM s+ya ma d+hi bi shwa pad ma a bi sha
116a3(rgyud): oM bai sha pad ma ma nod k+Shi paM a kai sha bi shA ru pa ma a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM maM// gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya che// ting nge 'dzin gyis lags bcings la// pad mo blangs la rab byin la// rtag pa ru ni dbang du/ 
116a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ gang yang rung ba'i dam tshig ni// phyag rgya legs bya zhes bcings nas// des ni pad mo blangs nas kyang // byin par 'gyur na dbang du 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin skyes dge ba 'i// phyag rgya gang
116a5(rgyud): yang rung bcings la// ye shes pad mo gang bcings pa// de ni de yi myu dbang 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i dam tshig ljon// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// pad mo sbyin pa gang yin pa// de ma
116a6(rgyud): thag tu dbang 'gyur ro// dwe la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM ma ha dz+nyA na pad ma ho/ au sa ma ya pad ma ho// oM dz+nyA na pad ma ho// oM karma pad ma ho// // de nas ye shes kyi dkyil
116a7(rgyud): 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya/ de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig mchog ni bsgrub bya ste// chos kyi
116a8(rgyud): 'khor lo tshul du ni// pad mo'i pad mo bzhag par bya// chos kyi khu tshur brten byas la// las kyi phya te gnyis su bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig rtog pa'i
116b1(rgyud): rgyal po chen po las// ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi las kyi dam tshig
116b2(rgyud): 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i pad mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms phar zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM saR+YA ta thA ga ta karma gri hU~M/ de nas phyag na rdo rje rang gi rig pa
116b3(rgyud): las byung ba rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM hUM di/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM rad na karma sa ma ye hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
116b4(rgyud): rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM pad ma ka rA ma hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM bi shA ka me hUM// de nas
116b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nyid kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra
116b6(rgyud): bas na// pad mo'i lngas zhes bya ba ste// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bya// sangs rgyas phyogs kun pad mo yi// mtshan ma 'dzin par thams cad bri// de
116b7(rgyud): la de dag gi rig pa'i snying po nr-i 'di rnams so// oM b+hu shI raM ni hUM/ oM bi shA kar+m+ma sha ra hUM/ o ta thA ga tau sh+ya r+yA bau sha ka karma bid d+h+ye hUM/ oM d+harma karme sha rI dz+nyA na pU dza sa ma yA hAM/ oM a mo ga karme
116b8(rgyud): ni hU~M oM pad ma karma bud d+he hUM/ oM pad me ga sung rjo N+Di hUM/ oM pyad ma kArma ni mA rarA ni puM dzA karma sa ma swe hU~M// oM pad ma karmad+hats+tshe hU~M/ so pad ma karma bri kr-i ti hU~M trAM/ oM byed ma rAk+Sha karma
117a1(rgyud): hAMHsau pa so+o karma da dze hAM/ oM pad ma karma ha sa hUM/ oM pAd ma kar+m+me tA R+sha hAM/ oM pad ma karma ku ma ri hAM/ oM pad ma kar+m+ma na dza yAr+b+hi hUM/ oM pad+ma ma kArma bra hwe hAM/ oM pad
117a2(rgyud): ma karma ni ru t+ye sha ri hU/ au pra ma rak+Sha karma sa maM ya hU/ oM pa myA ha pra tsan DA ga ta ni pad ma dr-iSh+TaM kar+Ne ka ri hUM/ oM pad ma kArma mr-iSh+TaM ga Ta yA ts+tsha[ऽ]/ sau e shri a bai She kaM pu dza hUM ho// 
117a3(rgyud): oM g+hi ta pu dze hUM hA/ \u0f7fe da dA ta pu dzI hUM paM/ oM d+hU pa pa dzaM hUM a/ ai pus+tha pU dze hUM traM/ oM a lo ka pA dza hUM d+hi/ oM g+han d+ha pA dza hUM baM/ oM ha ya grI baM a na yai dza~M/ oM a me ka pa sha kro d+hi pi Da hUM phaT/ oM
117a4(rgyud): pad ma shaM ka la ban d+ha hUM phaT/  pad ma g+han ra a ba sha ya hUM paT/ shad nas las gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ d+yA ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste/  'di skad
117a5(rgyud): du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis tshul 'di su la yang ma smra shig/ sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur tere ces sgo shig/ de nas ya shes bskyed par bya'o// / de nas sdig pa bshags pa'i ye shes
117a6(rgyud): bslab par bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug phyag rgya cher// shin du mnyam gzhag bsgoms nas kyang // sdig rnams bshags na myur bar ni// sdig pa kun la de 'dag 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang gi ting
117a7(rgyud): 'dzin gyis// dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings te// sdig pa thams cad bshags na ni// mtshams mdo lus ni byang bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang phyug ting 'dzin du// shin du mnyam par gzhag
117a8(rgyud): bsgoms la// sdig pa thams cad bshags na ni// sdog pa kun kyang rab tu 'joms// mdor na gang yang rung ba yi// las kyi phyag rgya legs bcings la// las rnams thams cad bshags na na
117b1(rgyud): las rnams kun las rnam par 'dag/ dwe la dA dug g+hi snying po ni// 'di rnams so// oM saR+YA pA pa saM sho dz+nyA na ma ha pad ma/  o saR+YA a na NA taR+ya sh+lo d+ha na ma ya pad ma/ aM saR+YA pA pa pra na shrA na d+ha ma pang+ga mA/ 
117b2(rgyud): oM saR+Wa karma oM ra na bi sho d+ha ka ra ma pad ma/ de nas sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ba'i ye shes bslab bo// 'jig rten dbang gi phyag rgya cher// shin du mnyam gzhog bsgom byas la/ 
117b3(rgyud): shud d+ha shud d+ha/ zhes brjod na// lus rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi dam tshig bcings nas ni// bud d+ha bud d+hi zhes brjod na// las rnams
117b4(rgyud): kun las 'dag par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// chos kyi phyag rgya bsgoms nas ni// d+hi d+hI d+hi d+hi zhes brjod do// las rnams kun las 'dag par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po'i
117b5(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// hi hi hi hi zhes brjod na// las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM pa pA k+Sha ya pad ma// oM a ra na
117b6(rgyud): k+Sha ya pad ma/ oM ni pa ra nau k+Sha yA pad ma/ oM kar ma k+Sha ya pad ma// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i ye shes bslab bo// 'jig rten dbang gi phyag rgya cher// rab tu mnyam
117b7(rgyud): par gzhag bcings la// oM oM o oM zhes brjod na// mchod pa thams cad rab tu byed// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // rmur+b+hu d+hAr+m+ma zhes brjod
117b8(rgyud): na tatasangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po snyoms zhugs la// chos kyi pad mo bsgoms nas kyang // he he he ho zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur/ 
118a1(rgyud): pad rmon las kyi phyag d+ha // shin du mnyam par gzhag bcings la// de de ste zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur// de la de dag gi stong pa
118a2(rgyud): ni 'di rnams so// oM ka re pad ma/ oM b+hu ka ra pa da la/ oM he ka ra pad ma/ oM d+ho ka ra pad ma// de nas dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab bo// 'jig rten dbang po'i phyag rgya che// mnyam par
118a3(rgyud): gu zhag pas bcings nas kyang // hU~M hrI hri zhes brjod na// 'jig rten dbang po 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig ces bya ba cings nas ni// shri shrI shrI
118a4(rgyud): zhes brjod na// dngos grub dam pa sgrub par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po mnyam gzhag par// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // d+hi ga d+hig d+h+r-ig d+h+r-ig zhes brjod na// pad mo khro bor
118a5(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// pad mo chen po dge pa yi// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // si si si si zhes brjod na// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// de la de drag gi snying po na 'di rnams so// oM
118a6(rgyud): hI saMdra d+h+ya/ oM shri sid d+ha/ oM d+hi ga sid d+hA oM si b+hU/ de nas las kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te// 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// bud med kun dang rtsa byed cing // a ho/ 
118a7(rgyud): su kha zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur// 'jog rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// bud mod kun dang rtse bad cing // pri ya pri ya zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas bcom
118a8(rgyud): ldan 'das dges so// 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// bud mid kun dang rtse byed cing // a ho ra ti zhes brjod ni// de ni rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang por snyoms
118b1(rgyud): zhugs la// bud med kun dang rtse byed cing // su kha su kha zhes brjod na// de yi bde ba mi nyams 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM sar+b+ba bud d+ha p+'u dza pra bar tan pad ma oM pra
118b2(rgyud): kai ra rma pad ma hai// oM ri taM prA ba ro rta na pad ma/ oM maM ha su kha pad ma d+hi D+ha haM// de nas las kyi phyag rgya chen po ji lta ba bzhin du bslab par bya'o// de nas pad ma thal sbyar te// dam tshig phyag rgya
118b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i dgos// las kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// gnas ni kun du bzhag par bya// de nas pad mo'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni// tra zhes bya bar brjod par bya// las kyi dam tshig
118b4(rgyud): gnyis byu la// las kyi phyag rgya yang drag sbyar// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po lngas// las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa/ 
118b5(rgyud): rdzogaso s+ho// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag rgya'i snying po
118b6(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra d+harma pad+ma mA hUM// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi phyag rgya'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+rA dz+dza// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rong gi phyag rgya 'di
118b7(rgyud): gsungs so// oM badz+ra rad na ma ku te hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma pad ma d+hi// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyi
118b8(rgyud): rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM sir+b+ba mu khe hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa snyun ras gzigs kyi dpa' bos phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyila'i
119a1(rgyud): so/ donas rab tu bshad byang // phyag rgya bzhi mchog dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba dang // dkyil 'khor chen po 'dra bar bya// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dbus
119a2(rgyud): su ni// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bzhig par bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje pad ma la sogs bri// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ 
119a3(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/ 'di skad du 'di khyod kyis su la yang ma brjod cig/ khyed rtag tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dang / mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar lhus
119a4(rgyud): nga re zhes bsgo shig/ de nas de'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste// log par pad mo bzung nas kyang // bsgribs te legs par bsnam par bya// dri des sangs rgyas rnams mchod na// myur du
119a5(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur// mnyam par gzhag pas gtsug phud dbus// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bzhag la// 'gro zhing sbyongs par brtan na ni// 'jig rten thams cad dbang du
119a6(rgyud): byed/ pad+ma me'i pad mo gzugs chen por// ting nge 'dzin gyis byas nas ni// ji bzhin tshul du 'dug nas su// yid kyis 'di ni bsad par bya// pad ma'i rgya gram nyid du ni// byas te lag pa
119a7(rgyud): g.yon pa yis// bzung nas kyang ni dbab stsogs la// bskor ba de ni rab tu byed// de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'dri rnams so// oM g+han d+ha pU dzA g+ha sto d+hA ya hI/ oM pad mA mA kr-i ti ta thA ga ta ba shrI ku ru sa
119a8(rgyud): kai shwa ra a b+hi shaM ka sa ma ya ha~M// oM pad ma pad ma ma ra ye saR+Wa br-id t+yedan+ti kan/ sa ma d+hi ga dz+nyA na d+hig/ oM b+hi sha pad ma sar+b+ba karmaM ka ro b+hA ba la li lu la li li hUM phaT/ de ni sa phyin
119b1(rgyud): rgya gsang ba'i ye shes bslab bo// chags nas dgos pa thams cad kyi// sgrub par byas te dam tshig 'di// sgrub par dka' ba'i phyag rgya yang // rnal 'byor gyis ni myur du 'grub// de la
119b2(rgyud): 'di'i dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM sa d+ha ya pad ma ra ga sa ma ya iH// de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcang ba bslab par bya'o// bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
119b3(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa// rdzogs s+ho// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes pa'i dkyil
119b4(rgyud): 'khor 'di gsungs so// oM saR+Wa bi gad bi na ya ma hA sad tA a gad dza g+ha ma bai sha ru ban da ra sha ya ma ma hA ma tsa saR+YA sid d+ha ya pra tsa ya hri// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras
119b5(rgyud): gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul
119b6(rgyud): du nikaphyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// da yi nang du pad mo yang // de bzhin du ni bri bar bya/ de kun mngadab ma kun khyam pa'i// sna tshogs gzugs ni bri bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir cho
119b7(rgyud): gi rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du btsud nas de bzhin du bsgo ste/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes bslab bo// 'gro ba'i 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas kyang // phyag
119b8(rgyud): rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni/ sna tshogs 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ kyad nas 'gro ba 'dul ba yi// gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du// mnyam
120a1(rgyud): / par gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // dbang po gnyis ni sbyar bar bya// dkyil 'khor du ni de grub bo// de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya bcing ba rnams bslab bo// 
120a2(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no// de bzhin du ras la sogs pa yang bya'o// phyag rgya gzhon rnams kyang bcing ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs
120a3(rgyud): pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod lags so// rdo rje rin chen khyod
120a4(rgyud): legs so// rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mdor bsdus pa'i// mdo 'di
120a5(rgyud): yang ni legs par bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid skyes pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rtog pa'o rgyal po chen po// 
120a6(rgyud): rdzogs s+ho// / de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cig tu bsdus nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che rdo rje 'dzin pa da
120a7(rgyud): nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab bo// nu ma mkha'i snying po sems can don// sems
120a8(rgyud): dpa' chen po gzi chen po// rin chen che ba rin chen mchog/ rdo rje dzin chen khyod phyag 'tshal// dbang phyug sbyin pa rin chen tshe// dag pa che zhing dge ba ni// sangs rgyas rin chen
120b1(rgyud): dgra sku// rin chen rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal// nam mkha' nam mkha' las byung ba'i// nam mkha' thams cad 'od che ba// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi phyogs kun gyi// re kun mchog ni
120b2(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen mdzod spu ri chen 'byung // sangs rgyas mdzod spu bde gshegs rab// rin chen thams cad bde kun mchog/ rin chen dgos pa khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen
120b3(rgyud): rin mchog rin chen dran// de bzhin ga shegs pa kun rin chen// rin chen dam pa nam mkha' che// mkha' mnyam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyan yin pas na mdzes pa che// mdzes pa'i 'byung
120b4(rgyud): gnas rab mdzes mdzad// don kun dag cing rab dag don// sbyin spyod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos rin chen ni rnam dag mchog/ dge 'dun rin chen de bzhin gshegs// dbang bskur chen
120b5(rgyud): po 'jig rten don// don sbyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin pa rab sbyin sbyin pa'i mchog/ gtong zhing gtong mchog sbyin pa mdzad// sems can don kun de nyid don// dron chen don ni khyod phyag
120b6(rgyud): 'tshal/ bsam pa'i rgyal po gzi brjid che// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// de bzhin gshegs pa sems dpa' che// sangs rgyas kun te khyod phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa rin
120b7(rgyud): chen che// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen te// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal chen po// bzhad chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur mchog/ dbang chen khyab
120b8(rgyud): bdag chen po ste// 'jig rten mgon rab 'jig rten mchog/ 'jig rten nyi ma khyod phyag 'tshal// rin tshon phul te rab kyi mchog/ rin chen brgyan te rin chen mdzad// rin chen stong pa
121a1(rgyud): shA rIn+da R+shan+ta r+m+ma// rIR+Ya nAn bye zlas pa khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen phung po rin chen 'byung // nor bu rdo rje nor yon tan// rin chen 'byung ba kun rab 'bar// rin chen kun te khyod
121a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal// rgyu nyidar pra thams cad bskongs mdzad pa// bsam pa thams cad legs par mnyas// rin chen phung po khyod phrag tshal// 'od mchog khyab pa
121a3(rgyud): bdag nyid kun// mchog do ni mchog rU bA// phun sum thams cad 'byor pa'o// rdo rje snying po bdag phyag 'tshal// ming brgya rtsa brgya zhi ba 'di// su yang rung bas 'tshang dad na// 
121a4(rgyud): rgyas kun gyis dbang rje skur ba// skad cig du ni sdig mede thobo// rin chen khyod lo gsol ba ni// nor 'dus pa ni bshad par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur mchog/ rang gi rigs ni
121a5(rgyud): bskyed par mdzod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' 'di thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dram
121a6(rgyud): tshig ces bya ba rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rad na hUM// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i
121a7(rgyud): dam tshig ces bya ba'i rlig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sar+b+ba taM thA ga ta a sha pA rI pA ra NA mahA rad na hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje sa rang gi rigs byung ba'i rig pa dam pa
121a8(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra hU~M tra~M// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rlung gi g.yas 'di gsungs so// oM ma Ni hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis
121b1(rgyud): rigs dbyung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM pad ma hI/  nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM bi sha rA da na hUM/ de nas byang
121b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas snyoms par zhugs
121b3(rgyud): ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas/ rdo rje nor bu rin po che lta bu'i 'od zer rnams byung nas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas te/ sems can thams cad de
121b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas yang gcig tu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs su zhugs so// de nas nam
121b5(rgyud): mkha'i snying po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po// rdo rje dang nor bu dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi dbang bskur ba la srogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan
121b6(rgyud): pa'i sku rdo rje nor bu rin po che chen po'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma phyag na bsnams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i sku rnams su gyur te byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rin po che chen po'i char
121b7(rgyud): phab pa la sogs pa'i nor bskyed pas sems can rnams mgu bar byas nas slaro yang byon te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
121b8(rgyud): po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rin chen thams cad bsdus pa yi// rdo rje rin chen rigs
122a1(rgyud): nyid du/ 'gro ba'i don du 'di 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' namra mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsam pa
122a2(rgyud): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di phul te/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tuH shAd bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ 
122a3(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba las// don kun grub pa zhes bshad pa// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa ste// srang ba bzhi dang ldan pa la// dar dang phrang ba lnga ldis brgyan/ 
122a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i grwa rnams dang // sgra khyud kyi ni nang rnams su// rdo rje rin chen sbas par ni// phyi rim dkyil 'khor srad bu bla// de yi nang du rdo rje yi// rin chen sna tshogs las byung gnas// 
122a5(rgyud): ka pa brgyad kyi tshul du ni// rin chen sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba'i// dkyil 'khor lngas no brgyan 'gyur ba'o// da raM ni srad bu bri bar bya// rang gi phyag rgyas bskor ba ste// der ni sangs rgyas
122a6(rgyud): bzhag par bya// de laM da dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM bud d+ha rAd Na hUM/ oM badz+ra ma Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra rA da na ang ku ra hU~M/ oM ra na pad+ma ma hUM/ oM ra da na pad mu bar sha hUM/ ra ba kun
122a7(rgyud): grub dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// rdo rje snying po der gnas shing // rin chen mchog ni sbyin par bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'og go rims dza bzhin du
122a8(rgyud): na phyag rgyar ldan pa yi/ sems dpa' chen po rnams br-i'o// oM saR+Wa AR+YA sid d+ha pra d+hA hA/ oM badz+ra sa ma no tsin d+ha a kor ShA gA rba ba pa ga ban sidai d+hA sid drA hu/ oM badz+ra a guM
122b1(rgyud): shA a kar sha ya/ sar+b+ba an+d+ha a na ya shri gra/ sar+b+ba ta thAg ta sad t+ya ma nu stA ra hUM/ oM ma nu rA ga ba shi ku ru saR+Wa aR+tha na a na ya? a kAr Sha garba hUM/ oM rad na duSh+Ti hUM/ rin chen phreng ba'i
122b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// tshon chen phreng ba 'dzin pa'i mchog da yi dbus su legs par gri/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ ltu 'og go rims ji bzhin byar/ 
122b3(rgyud): nor bu'i mtshan mo thogs pa mo// sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams s+ho// so rad na dr-iSh+NI ta/ oM sar+m+ma ta thAg ta a bi sho ka rAd na mA li hUM/ oM ma ni su d+ya hU~M/ 
122b4(rgyud): ma Ning rdo sats+li Sha par bro rA ga sha garbahUM/ oM rang na ad TA ha sa hA sa hU~M// rin chen pad mo'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nus ni// rin chen pad ma dzin khyab bdag/ de dbus
122b5(rgyud): gnas par bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams ma de// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin par// nor bu'i mtshan ma 'ching ba yi// sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o// de dag gi snying po nr-i 'di rnams so// sa
122b6(rgyud): nga na pang ma hUM/ oM t+yags mo d+hi dz+nyA nA gaR+sha hUM/ oM rIng+ga na ko shAg+h+ra hUM/ oM ma NI tsak+ka bar d+ha ya~M hU~M/ oM rad na b+ha sha hUM// rin chen char 'bebs dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni/ 
122b7(rgyud): rin chen chur rlig 'bebs pa yi// sems dada' che rnams der yid b+h+rUM// de la phyogs rnams thams cad du// mdor na lag na phyag rgya yang // rin chen mtshan mar ldan po yi// sems dpa' chen
122b8(rgyud): rnams cho ga bzhin// de la de dag gi snying po na 'di rnams so// oM rad ne br-iSh+TiM bar Sha ya sar+b+ba a sam b+hi d+ho b+ha ga wan ma hA ma Ni ha sta hUM/ oM ma Ni pu dza sa ma hUM/ oM ma ni ban d+ha ka pA tsa hUM/ 
123a1(rgyud): / oM ma nI dAMSh+Te ka DaM la ma hA yak+Sha ha ra ha rA saR+Wa ma ra thAn bi Sha ya hUM/ oM ma NaM rad na ban d+ha sa ma ya hUM// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nasA naM// gr-i yi phyogs na thams cad du// lta 'og go/ 
123a2(rgyud): rims ji bzhin par// ri na rgA Na la s+ye la sdigs bri// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so// oM rad na ra ti hU~M/ oM rang na mA lA hUM/ oM rang na gi taM hUM/ oM rang ni ni ra te hUM// phyi rol dkyil
123a3(rgyud): 'khor dam pa ni// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas kyang // phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su// bdug pa'i mchod pa la sogs bri// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM d+hU pa ra ne/ oM
123a4(rgyud): puSh+Ta ma Ne/ oM rad na a lai kaM/ oM ma Ni g+han dwe// sgo rnams bzhi yi dbus sa ni// sgo ba rnams ni bzhag par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// ai rad na a ka ra sha ya ar+ya ru na
123a5(rgyud): ma sa ta ta da b+ha ga wa na ta a ka ra sha kA rbaM tsi da ya a ka ShA yA shrI gr-i ma hodz+dzA/ oM sats+tsharAd na pra ba shi ya sa ma yan mau hA mau Ni ra tsa ku la no ra da nA pa sha hUM/ o ma ni ban d+ha hU~M bau/ oM ma Ni rad na a bau sha
123a6(rgyud): yats+tshade nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir nor bu rin po che'i slob dpon nyid ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te/ cho ga rgyas pa bdag nyid kyis byas la/ de nas rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i chus nor
123a7(rgyud): bu'i slob ma dbang bskur te/ rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snying po ni 'di brjod do// oM badz+ra ma Ni ra da na sa ma ya baM/ de nas kha dog ji lta bu rnyed pa'i gos phrag pa cig tu bzar te/ 
123a8(rgyud): / drabras gdong ga yogs la/ snying po 'di brjod du bcug ste gzhug par bya'o// oM AH ma Ni rA dza ku las// de nas de ltar bcug nas/ 'di skad du 'di khyod kyis sul yang ma brjod
123b1(rgyud): cig/ khyod tshe rabs thams cad da dbul por gyur ta re/ sdug bsngal las mi thar bar gyur ta ra/ sems can dmyal ba na yun ring du gnas par gyur ta re zhes bsnol/ dam tshig gnyi spyi su byas te/ 
123b2(rgyud): theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa yang brjod par bya'o// de nas babs pa dang gter chen po gang na yod/ ji ltar thob par gyur zhes rdo rje tshig gis dri bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub
123b3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos thams cad sgrar gsol cig ces smras ma thag tu gdong g.yogs bkrol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig
123b4(rgyud): kyang bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la thug gi bar du dkyil 'khor thams cad bstan par bya'o// de nas ci 'byor pas mchod par byas nas/ dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par
123b5(rgyud): bya'o//  nas ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te// rdo rje snying po phyag rgya che// shin du mnyam par bzhag pas bcings// gter bskos pas ni gang dag na// gter yod pa de mthong bar 'gyur// ma
123b6(rgyud): tshig gi ni mchog bcings la// gang na gter rnams yod gyu ro pA// der ni phyag rgya bA tsiR+Sha na ni// de tshe bdag nyid 'byung bar 'gyur// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du// shin du mnyam bzhag bsgoms
123b7(rgyud): na ni gang du gter rnams yod na yang // yid kyis shes pa nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje'i snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gang du phyag rgya babs gyur pa// des na gtar
123b8(rgyud): yod shes par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM mi hI ma Ni rad na a bI sha hUM/ oM ma Ni prad ya dar sha ya hU~M/ oM rang nas ma dwai drA haM/ I rId na a bi sha dA ri shA ya hU~M// phyag rgya
124a1(rgyud): chen por bsgoms na ni// gang du lus ni 'khor gyur pa// de ni rin chen gter yod par// dam tshig nyid kyang nges par bya// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // gang du babs na
124a2(rgyud): gnyis gyur pa// de'i rin chen chen po yi// gter yod pa ni shes par bya// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gang la babs par bdag nyid kyis// gter na gang ni yod pa smra// las kyi phyag rgya
124a3(rgyud): bcings nas kyang // gang tshe lag gnyis phan tshun nas// bcas nas dam tshig bcings gyur pa// da na gter ni yod par bshad// de la de dag gi snying po na 'di rnams so// oM ma hA rad na ka ya dar
124a4(rgyud): sha yo rad nama?/ oM a ka sha garba mA NI rad na s+pho Ti sU Ta ya tI ni d+hI/ oM ma ni rAdA nA dz+nyA na sa ya br-i hI/ oM sU n+yA sa mA ya bAn+ta d+ha d+ha rA shA ya swa// phyag rgya chen mor bsgoms nas ni// de bzhin gang du dogs
124a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba// da ni rin chen 'byung po yi// gter ni yod par shes par bya// gang du dogs yod dor yang no// dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings la// gang tshe nyid kyi grol gyur pa// de la gtor ni
124a6(rgyud): yod par bshad// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gang du nges par dogs 'gyur ba// de ni nges par gter yod par// ye shes bskyed de shes par bya// gang na yang dang yang dogs pa// 
124a7(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin// der bcings da ni gnyis 'gyur na// gter ni yod par shes par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ni dI dz+nyo na a bi sha/ oM rad na sa ma ya mun ca ni/
