124a8(rgyud): oM da ma ra da na bruM hi dI nam/ oM sar+b+ba karma Ni s+pho Ta ya ni d+hi ban d+hod kyi pa// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni// gter gnas kun du btsal nas kyang // gdon gnas pa d+mo
124b1(rgyud): 'bab pa// de nas yod pa rnam par bshud// dam tshig mchog ni bcing nas kyang // gter rnams kun du btsal nas ni// gang na gnas pa btags gyur pa// de na gter ni yod pa myi bshad// 
124b2(rgyud): ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gtar rnams kun kyang btsal nas kyang // gang na yod pa nges par shes// da na gter ni yod par bshad// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // gtor
124b3(rgyud): rnams kun du btsal nas kyang // gang na yod par las phyag rgya// bskor ba da na yod par bshad// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ma hA ra da na pa ri k+Sha/ oM ra da na sA ya hI d+ha da ra sha ya/ 
124b4(rgyud): oM rad na pa ri k+Sha dz+nyA na a br-i shi/ oM ma Ni ka ra ma b+h+ra ma ya// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// gter rnams kun du tshul byed cing // phyag
124b5(rgyud): rgya chen por bsgoms na ni// babs par gyur na gter rnyed do// dam tshig mchog na bcings nas kyang // bud med kun dang rtse byed cing // gang du phyag rgya dam gyur pa// de nAM ga ta rA ni yod par bshad
124b6(rgyud): dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// gter rnams kun du tshol byed cing // ye shes phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gter gyi ye shes 'jug par 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni ting 'dzin gyis// las
124b7(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gang du phyag rgya gnyis 'gyur ba// de na gter ni yod par bshad// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ma hA mA ni san yo ga a bi shi g+has ma ya sa na yo
124b8(rgyud): g+ha twe d+ho mo b+ha ba/ oM ni dza dz+nyA na a bo sha a ba sha sa na yog/ oM saR+Wa s+pho t+ya san yo ga/ de nas nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes bslab bo// de nas phyag rgya
125a1(rgyud): chen po na 'di yin te// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ji lta ba yi ri mo bzhin// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni// don gyi mchog kun sgrub par 'gyur// de nas phyag
125a2(rgyud): rgya chen po rnams kyi las ni 'di yin no// sangs rgyas phyag rgya sangs rgyas nyid// rdo rje snying pos gnyis rab grub// rin chen lcags kyus spyan kun 'du na// ner bu dga' ba rdo rje gar// nor bu mgu
125a3(rgyud): bstu dgas par byed// nor bu lta bas nor 'phrog pa// nor bu blang bas dbang bskur zhing // nor bu nyi mas grwa zi brjid mchog/ yid bzhin nor busa? ts+yai dgu'u sbyin// raM na chen ba zha dA bsre nor
125a4(rgyud): 'phrog 'gyur// rin chen chos kyis chos kyang mthong // rtog pa'i mchog gis dam pa rnyed// rin chen ral gris mdzod chen po// nor bu'i 'khor las bdag por 'gyur// smra ba'i 'tshal bas
125a5(rgyud): don grub thob// rin chen char gyis nor chen po// nor bu mchod pas rab mchod nyid// rin chen go chas brtan par byed// rin chen mtsho bas nor 'phrog 'gro/ khu tshur nor bus dngos grub thob// 
125a6(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur thob// nir bu rdo rje che bcings la// rdo rje rin
125a7(rgyud): chen 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gnyis las nor bur bcus// rdo rje 'dzin pas n+dor thob bo// de nyid mthe bong rdo rje yis// nor bu sbyin te snying khar bzhag/ 'dzub gnyis pad mo'i nor bu ra
125a8(rgyud): bcings// 'jig rten dbang gis nar sbyin 'gyur// rdo rje las nir sna tshogs kyis// nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan sbyin// rdo rje dbyings 'dzub nor mchog gis// sangs rgyas rin chen nyid
125b1(rgyud): thob bo// 'dzub mo snyoms te rgyub bskum la// mthe bo rdo rje bcings pa yi// rdo rje snying po phyag rgya byung // 'di ni rdo rje nor bur gsungs// 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang // rdo rje'i nor bu chen po thogs/ 
125b2(rgyud): 'dzub gnyis rin chen 'drar bcings la// gung mo myu gun rab bsgrengs ste// 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang // rang gi dbang bskur thob par gyur// de nas gang mo srin lag dang // mthe chung rnams
125b3(rgyud): ni pad mo bya// 'di ni kun du spyan rus gzigs// mtshan 'dzin pas ni nor sbyin 'gyur// 'dzub me mthe bo mthe'u chung rnams// rdo rje rin chen tshul du bya// gung mo gnyis ni sen mor sbyar// srin
125b4(rgyud): lag myu gu 'dra bar bsgreng // rdo rje bsnams pa dam byas la// 'dzub gnyis nor bur byas nas kyang // mthe bong gnyis brkyang ngos snying kha// don kun grub pa sbyin par byed// rdo rje bsdam
125b5(rgyud): pa bsdams nas kyang // gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya// nor bu mtshan gyi phyag rgya 'di// nor bu rin chen rab sbyin no// de nyid la ni 'dzub mo gnyis// lcags kyu'i tshul du byas pa ni// don 'gugs
125b6(rgyud): pa yi phyag rgya ste// nor bu rin chen lcags kyur bshad// du nyid du ni skyur nos kyang // 'dzub mos 'dzub mo bzung nas ni// mda' 'phang pa yi tshul byas la// drangs nas 'gro ba dga' bar byed/ 
125b7(rgyud): de nyid las ni 'dzub 'brib gnyis// sbyar la legs so zhes bya'o// de nas mtheb gnyis sbyar ba yis// 'dzub gnyis rtse mo dag ba de bzhin// mthe bo gnyis ni dbus sbya la// 'dzub
125b8(rgyud): gnyis ngos dang s+thir g+ha ni// nor bu'i lta bar bshad pa ste// lta bas don rnams 'phrog byed pa'o// don kun grub pa'i phreng ba yi// rang gi dbang gi sbyin par 'gyur// de nas snying kha
126a1(rgyud): / mthe bo gnyis// steng ste ngos kyis sbyar ba ni// nor bu'i nyi ma sbyar ba ni// nor bu'i nyi ma snying khar bzhag/ gzi brjid chen po rab stim gyur// srin lag mnyam ste sgreng
126a2(rgyud): nus ni/ phye ste spyi bor bzhag par bya//  ra bu chen po'i gtso// re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// de nyid las ni 'gying byed cing // kha 'gram dgod par bskor bas ste// rin chen
126a3(rgyud): cher dgod zhes bya ba// bzhed pas don rnams thams cad thob// kun rtswa nor bu'i pad+ma m+me ni// ting nge 'dzin gyi nor 'phrog pa/ d+ya lA s+ya nu tha' nas dgrol pa nI// sbyin pa chen po rab sbyin
126a4(rgyud): byed/ mthe bo gnyis ni nang du dgug/ 'dzub gnyis nor bur byas pa ni// nor bu ral gri yin te mthus// 'gro ba rnams kyi nor 'phrog go/ rdo rje bsdams rtse 'khor lor bya// 'thab gnyis
126a5(rgyud): nang du btsud nas kyang // 'dzub gnyis nor bu ltar byas la// 'khor los bsgyur ba 'theb par byed// de nyid thal mo'i tshul du sbyar// kha nas 'dron por byas pa ni// de bcings pa ni dag yin
126a6(rgyud): tetu ring gi bkas ni nor 'phrog 'gyur// rdo rje nor bu che bcings la// rin chen char ni rab 'ab pas ste// sor mo thams cad bsgreng nas ni// phyogs bzhi nas ni nor char 'bebs// rdo
126a7(rgyud): rje nor bu che bcings la// gar byas gtsug pud dbus bzhug gnas// kun la cho ga bzhin bcings na// rin chen kun gyis nges mchod 'gyur// don kun grub pa'i phyag rgya ni// mgrin
126a8(rgyud): pa'i phyogs su mkhyud par bya// nor bu byicings pa zhes bya ste// bsrung ba yi ni go char grags// de nyid don kun sgrub pa'i phyir// gnod sbyin khu tshur khar bzhag pa// nor bu'i mche
126b1(rgyud): ba zhes bya ste// 'jigs pas don kun 'phrog pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// 'dzub kun mthe bong gnyis kyis ni// legs par mnan ta btsir ba ni// nor bu'i khu tshur dngos grub
126b2(rgyud): sbyin tu dam tshig rnams kyi mchod mchog rnams// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul du no// ji bzhin ner bu ldan pa ste// 'di ni dam tshig mchog tu brtag/ gung mo nor bu'i tshul sbyar bar// de dag nyid
126b3(rgyud): las rnam par btab// lugs kyu cig sogs tshul du no// las rnams thams cad rab grub byed// de nas nor bu rin po che'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no// tra gra tri
126b4(rgyud): hri shri i ha ra d+hi d+hi kri ba ri pa ya a// rin chen phyag rgya gnyis byas la// las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las// 
126b5(rgyud): don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas po// / rdzogs s+ho// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang
126b6(rgyud): bskur ba'i gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rin po che'i byin brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rad na d+hU pa hUM// de
126b7(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i phyag rgya 'di gsangs so// oM badz+ra a bI shaM ka ma la oM bi shin tsa sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas byang chub
126b8(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rlung gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM rad na a b+hi shI ke hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang
127a1(rgyud): gi phywa 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma a b+hi ShI na tsa mAM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po rdo rje sna rtogs rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// 
127a2(rgyud): oM saR+Wa u b+hi She ka pa tsa sa ma ya de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos/ rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsangs
127a3(rgyud): so/ tang nas ra bu taM bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin chen gsang ba zhes pashad de/ dkyil 'khor rme po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor
127a4(rgyud): thams cad srad bu bri// de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du// sangs rgyas phyag rgya bri bar bya// khri la gnas pa'i nor bu'i gtso// rdo rje dbyings kyi mdun du bri// nor bu'i phreng ba pad mo'i nor/ 
127a5(rgyud): nor bus bskor ba'i nor bu rnams/ de l-i de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM tr-I/ oM ma Ni sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni ra da na a bri shaM ka ma le hU~M/ oM ma NI rad na pa du ma hU~M/ oM ma Na
127a6(rgyud): rAd ni b+hISh+Ti sa ma ye hUM// thams cad sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// rdo rje rin chen dbus su ni// rdo rje'i nor bu chen po bri// de yi phyogs ni thams
127a7(rgyud): cad du/ lta 'og go rims ji bzhin par// rang gi phyag rgya nor bu ldan// rin chen slob dpon nyid kyis bri// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so// oM saR+Wa aR+YA sid d+hi pra d+hA
127a8(rgyud): mahA badz+ra rad na sa ma ya ma ni saR+Wa eR+tha na me sang+go ya d+hA ra ya d+hA ra Ni hU/ oM me Ni rad na a kar shaM hUM/ oM ma Ni rad na sa ma me aM gu shA yA a kar sha ya ma Ni ku laM dz+nyA/ oM
127b1(rgyud): ma NI rA gA sa ma ya hUM/ oM ma Ni sa d+he hUM// de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis par yang // rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// spyan gnyis dang ni ldan pa yis/ nor bu de yi dbus su bri/ 
127b2(rgyud): de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lte 'og gro rims ji bzhin par// nor bu'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi// rang gi phyag rgya rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so// oM badz+ra ma Ni
127b3(rgyud): rA da nau tra yA a nA ya a sha ku ru saR+Wa Ar+d+ha sa ma ba dwe shri g+h+raM driSh+Ta aM ku ru shaM hUM// oM badz+ra ma laM a b+hi Shi na tsa hUM/ oM ma ni ra da na su t+ye dzA ya saR+Wa ma ma hA te dzi ni hUM/ oM ma NI tsan tsa d+h+wa dza au
127b4(rgyud): gri hUM/ oM ma Ni tsan dra ha ho saM ha sa hUM// rdo rje shugs kyis rgol nas ni// nor bu'i padra mo bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// de la
127b5(rgyud): de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so// oM ma Ni sa ma d+hi pad mA ma ni hUM/ oM ma Ni ra na t+ye gA sa ma ya hUM/ oM ma NaM rad na sa ma ya ko shra hUM/ oM maM Ni sa ma ya tsag kre hUM/ oM ma Ni b+ha sh+tsa ya gr-i
127b6(rgyud): hUM// dkyil 'khor ba zhi par dam par ni// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// rdo rje rin chen ldan pa yi// rin chen char 'bebs dar gnas shing // las kyi phyag rgyu ci bzhin pas// 
127b7(rgyud): yongs su bskor bar bri ba ru bya// nor bu'i mtshan ma re ldan pa rnams// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin bA// de nas de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so// oM rang na b+hiSh+Ti sa hA ya mA hA ma ni
127b8(rgyud): hUM/ oM mahA pA dza sa ma ya nod t+ye.oM/ oM ma na pad ma se ma ya rak+Sha hU~M/ oM badz+ra ma ni ra dar dang Sh+Ta ka ra li pa ra ha ra hUM/ oM mo ni sau ma ya muN+Di hUM// de nas nor bu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
128a1(rgyud): 'dir las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas// gang gi slob ma rnams btsud de// 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o// rkyen kyis 'di sa la yang ma smra shig/ khyod
128a2(rgyud): rab tu dbul ba dang dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung da ra zhes bsgo la// rang gi nor bu'i dam tshig ye shes bskyed par bya'o// rdo rje de na rkyen ting 'dzin gyis// mkha' la
128a3(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen bya// bdag nyid kyi ni dpral bar yang // gzhan na rgyal po ra nges par 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen bcings nus ni// rdo rje rin chen mkha' la hri// bdag nyid gnas su
128a4(rgyud): bzhag na ni// nges par rgyal po nyid du 'grub// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri// ye shes rdo rje de bzhig na// nyid kyis grub pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ 
128a5(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// mkho' la rdo rje rin chen bris// rang gi gnas su de bzhag na// nyid kyis grub pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ma hA/ 
128a6(rgyud): badz+ra rAd ne a b+hi Shi na tsamAM/ o a ma ya rad na a b+hi Shi na tsama?/ o dArma rad na aM b+hai Shi na tsama?/ oM karma ra daM na a b+hi ShI na tsa ma?// phyag rgya chen po'i sgying kha ran+ma// rdo rje rin chen
128a7(rgyud): bsgom par bya// bsgoms nas mngon par dbang bskur ba/ mchog tu rmad du byung ba thob// rab mnyam gzhag pas rdo rje yi// rin tshon dpral brla bsgoms na ni// rin chen rdo rjer
128a8(rgyud): bcings 'gyur na// thams cad kyi ni rgyal por 'gyur// rdo rje rin che ni ting 'dzin gyis// lce la rdo rje rin chen bsgoms// chos kyi rgyal po nyid du ni// dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur/ 
128b1(rgyud): rab mnyam gzhag pas rdo rje yi// rin chen+ya ga nag tor bsgoms nas kyang // las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// las legs byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur//  la ni 'di rnams
128b2(rgyud): so!oM badz+ra ra da na hr-i daM yaM a b+dza na na d+he/ b+h+yAMsmai badz+ra rod na hri da ya a b+hi She ka tAM/ oM badz+ra radan d+harma a b+hi Shi na tsa baM/ oM badz+r-i rad na A b+hi ShI uSh+TaM Sha aSh+Ta p+ti sa mAphyag rgya chen+da por
128b3(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis// bsgoms na rdo rje rin chen yang // ras la sogs pa br-i nas ni// rgyal po chen por de 'gyur ro// rdo rje rin cher bla na ra da/ res la sog NA pa bI ma?nyis kyang / 3/ sems
128b4(rgyud): dpa' rdo rje bsgoms na ni// dam tshig rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur// rin chen rdo rje bdag nyid kyis// ras la sogs la bris nas kyang // bsam gtan phyag rgya bskams na ni// nges par
128b5(rgyud): chos kyi bdag por 'gyur// ras la sogs la rdo rje yi// rin chen bris nas las rnams ni// phyag rgya bsgoms par 'gyur na ni// ga/ nyi las kyi bdag por 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni
128b6(rgyud): 'di rnams so// oM badz+ra rad na b+him b+ha a ti tiSh+Tha/ oM rad na bam+ba b+ha pra tiSh+Ta/ oM badz+ra rad na b+him b+ha a biSh+Ta/ oM badz+ra rad nra b+him b+ha gu ru// gas+dza r+ra ram yang na dngul yang rung // rdo rje/ 
128b7(rgyud): rin chen bcangs gyur tam// yang na rin chen bzhag na yang // snying khar bsgoms na dbang bskur 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// gsar rom rin chen gzhan las byas// rtag tu
128b8(rgyud): dpral bar bzhag nas ni// nor che ba yi rgyal por 'gyur// gser ram ya na chen gzhan dag gi/ rdo rje rin chen bsgoms nas kyang // rkang gi khAr yang bcug na ni// tshig la dbang ba
129a1(rgyud): / de 'gyur ro// gsar ram/ rin chen gzhan dag gi/ rdo rje rin chen bsgoms nas ni// gtsug tor du ni yang bsgoms na// lus rnams kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// 
129a2(rgyud): de la de dag gi snying po na 'di rnams sa/ oM badz+ra rad na hri d+ha ya a ba ra na hUM/ oM badz+ra rad na a b+hi Sho ka ma hA aR+YA pra dA/ oM badz+ra rad na pa tsaSh+ma te/ k+ShuHoM badz+ra rA da~M na ma hA karma pa te// 
129a3(rgyud): nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes bslab go// phyag rgya chen por bsgoms na ni// rdo rje nor bu che bcings la// nor bu bud med bu gar bcug/ de ltar dngos grub
129a4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// dam tshig mchog gi nor bu ni// bud med bu gar bcug nas kyang // dam tshig mchog bcings thams cad kyis// dbang bskur ba yi dngos grub 'gyur// rdo rje nor bu
129a5(rgyud): cher bcings nas// chos kyi phyag rgya bsgoms nor bu// de yi bud med bu gar bcug/ bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya nor bur bcings// bud med bu gar
129a6(rgyud): lAs phyag rgya// bcing sa par gyur pa las kun gyi// dngos grub bla na med par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ma hA ma Ni sid d+hi/ oM ma hA sa ma ya a
129a7(rgyud): b+hi She ka sad d+hi/ oM d+har+m+ma sid d+hi oM karma sid d+hi// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i phyag rgya chen po blo shad do// rin chen rdo rje myu gur bcing // gung mo srin lag mthe chung rnams// 
129a8(rgyud): sor mo brkyang ba byas nas ni// spyi bor bzhag pa grub mchog sbyin// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas kyang // 'dzub mo gnyis mdud mthob gnyis dang // srin lag rdo rje re bsgyur nas
129b1(rgyud): ni// mdzod spur bzhag pas dbang bskur thob// rdo rje rin chen tshul byas la// de nyid yongs su bsgyur nas ni// 'dzub mo gnyis rtse gdong spyad pa// da ni dbang bskur thob byed pa'o// 
129b2(rgyud): nyid mthob gnyis 'dzub gnyis ni// chos kyi rdo rje'i tshul du yang // bcings nas dpral bar bzhog pa ni// chos chen gyi ni dbang bskur sbyin// las kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang // dbang
129b3(rgyud): bskur kun gyi phreng ba ste// bsgyur bas dpral ba nyid du yang // bzhag na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur// rin chen 'byung gi phyag rgya ni// rdo rje dbyings skyes dam tshig kyang // bcings
129b4(rgyud): nas rin chen gnas bdag nyid// dpral bar bzhag nas dbang bskur 'gyur/ mtheb gnyis phan tshun stsol nas ni/ 'dzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang // nor bu 'dra bar bkug pa ni// 
129b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i nor bu chen po thob// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni// gung mo gnyis kyang nor bur bya// nor bu'i phreng bas dbang bskur 'gyur// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni// gung mo nor bu rA
129b6(rgyud): 'drar byas la/ 'dzub mo srin lag gnyis pad mo// kha 'byed 'dra bar byas pas 'grub// gung myi gnyis ni nor bur bcings// sor mo thams cad bsgreng ga rnams/ nor bu nyid
129b7(rgyud): du bsgoms na ni// 'khor rnams dag dang ldan par 'gyur// rdo rje rin tshon tshul bcings nas// 'dzub mo mthe bo sbyar ba dang // srin lag mthe chung bsnyams pa rnams// khyer bzhag lci stong
129b8(rgyud): nair rab ster// de las 'dzub gnyis rdo rjer bya// de bzhin de gnyis lcags kyur bya// 'dzub mos 'dzub mo drang ba dang // de gnyis dga' bar rab sbyin pa'o// gung mo gnyis ni nor
130a1(rgyud): bur bcings// 'dzub mo ngos la bkug pa'o// srin lag ngos gnyis mdud pa lA// mthe bong gnyis kyis bkag pa ste// de nyid rdo rje nyi ma bsgor// dpung pa spyi bor
130a2(rgyud): brkyang bar bya// nor bu'i rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i brgyan// bzhad pa'i tshul du byas pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas kyang // 'dzub mo smin lhag byin du bsgreng // de drag pad mo 'dra bar
130a3(rgyud): bya gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya// de las tha ma rab sbyin bya// rdo rje rol glir sbyar bar bya// rdo rje 'khor lho'i tshul du bya// de nyid kha nas dbyung bar bya// rdo rje rin chen myu gun
130a4(rgyud): bcings// sor mo thams cad brkyang ba dang // de dag spyi bor bzhag pa ni// rin chen tshwar ni rab 'brabs so// de nyid 'khor lo'i tshul du ni// snying khar rin chen gnyis bcings
130a5(rgyud): la/ nor bu 'dzin rtse mche ba yin// dbus su bsnyams pa khu tshuru ro// dri nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// phyag rgya chen po de dag nyid// sbyar ba byas te bcings nas ni// 
130a6(rgyud): mad+mo rlan gsang ba'i gsang ba ste// dngos grub bzhi 'gyur sbyin par byed// de ltar rdo rje gsang po bzhon// dus rnams kun du bcing mi bya// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i mdo bshad par bya'o// 
130a7(rgyud): t+yaM gai haM saM g+h+raM/ kha hA he br-i d+haM kl-i br-i ku re spya me// gsang ba gsang ba'i khu tshur mchog/ gnyis su byas nas las kun byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig rtag/ 
130a8(rgyud): chen po las// rin po che'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa// rdzogs ste// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de
130b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi dam tshig byung ba'i byin gyi brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ oM
130b2(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga taM a b+he Sho ka dz+nyA nod ta ma hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyog na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM dz+nyA na a b+hi She kaM sa ma ye hUM// de nas
130b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM ma ni rang na a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan
130b4(rgyud): po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma a b+hi Sho ga dz+nyA na hU~M// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa'o chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa
130b5(rgyud): rnam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sar+b+ba a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// 
130b6(rgyud): de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin chen ye shes zhes bshad de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor
130b7(rgyud): thams cad sid bus bri// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// snying kha'i mtshan ma bri bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i ye shes kyi snying po nu 'di rnams so// oM sar+b+ba Ar+yA sid d+hi dz+nyA na
130b8(rgyud): hU~M.oM mi Ni dz+nyAn d+h+ri/ oM ma dz+nyA na ma~M gu sha/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na reka/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na toSh+Ti/ oM dz+nyA no dISh+Ti ma Ni hU~M/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka oM ma Ni dz+nyA na sur+ya/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na da
131a1(rgyud): oM ma Ni dz+ha ra AHoM ma Ni dz+nyA na pad mA tAM/ oM dz+nyA na mA Ni trAg hAM/ o dzA na mra ni kro sha/ oM dz+nyA na ma NI tsak+Sha/ o dz+nyA da ma Ni b+ha / o dzA na ma Ni rad na b+ha ri sha hUM/ 
131a2(rgyud): oM ma Ni dzA na nr-i da ts+tsha pu ts+tsha sa man rak+ShaM/ oM ma Ni dzA ni yak+Sha/ oM ma Ni dzA na muSh+Ti/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rbu sa paM dza lta b+ha bzhin du byas+dza nA sa/ slob ma la
131a3(rgyud): 'di skad ces bkr-i'i bsgo bar bya te/ khyod kyis chos ma mthong ba su la yang ma smra shig/ khyod dngos grub ma thob par myur du shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo lo/ rkyen na bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi ye
131a4(rgyud): shes bslab par bya// ting nge 'dzin gyis ras sogs la// rdo rje snying po bris nas ni// bsgoms nas don ni blang ba zhing // byin cig byin cig ces kyang brjod// ting nge 'dzin gyis ras
131a5(rgyud): sogs la// rdo rje sring po bris nas ni// bsgoms na rin chen don byin byed// tshig tu smra zhing gsol ba gdab/ rdo rje snying po ras sogs la// bris te mnyam par gzhag nas kyang // rnam
131a6(rgyud): par bsgoms te ye shes la// dam tshig byin+da zhes gsol ba gdab// rdo rje snying po rasi sogs la// mnyam par gzhag pas bris nas kyang // bsgoms nas dam pa'i las byin zhes// las
131a7(rgyud): la gsol ba gdab par bya// de nas de dgo gi sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM d+h+we hi sar+b+ba aR+tha na b+ha ga wan badz+ra garbA/ oM dI hi saR+Wa nA ra dan b+ha ga wan badz+ra garba/ oM de haM sid d+ha
131a8(rgyud): d+harma b+ha ga wan badz+ra garba saM sad da/ oM da haM sad karma b+ha ga wa na badz+ra garba// nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// nam mkha'i snying po legs sems pa// mnyam par gzhag
131b1(rgyud): pas bsgoms na ni// phun sum tshogs par gsol bar bya// nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// nam mkha'i snying po sems dpa'i mchog/ mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms
131b2(rgyud): nas kyang / nor bsags pa ni gsol bar bya// nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan tu/ nam mkha' snying po sems legs pa// mnyam par gzhag nas bsgoms nas kyang // 
131b3(rgyud): la sogs pa ni gsol ba gdab// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM dz+nyA na garba di hai saR+Wa aR+YA nA/ oM dz+nyA na garba de saR+Wa rAd na/ oM dz+nyA nA garba de hi sar+m+ma pA ra man/ oM dz+nyA na
131b4(rgyud): garba de hi saR+Wa kar man// rdo rje snying po snying khur bris// shin du mnyam gzhag bsgoms byas la// gang gi tshe na snying 'bar ba// de tshe sgrub par nor ster to// rdo rje snying po phral bar ni// 
131b5(rgyud): bris te rnam par bsgoms nas kyang // gang tshe mgo bo mdar 'gyur ba// des ni mngon par dbang bskur thob// rdo rje snying po khar bcug la// de nyid du ni sgoms nas kyang // gang tshe de ni
131b6(rgyud): byed 'gyur ba// de tshe des ni ngag grub bo// rdo rje snying po bdag spyi bor// rab tu bzhag skye bsgoms nas kyang // gang tshe de nyid 'bar 'gyur ba// de tshe 'phang du lding bar 'gyur// de la de dag
131b7(rgyud): gau sprang po ni 'di rnams so// oM hU~M da ya garba de hi d+ha nan/ oM rad na a b+hi She ka garba a b+hi Shi na tsa maM/ oM dza gra ga sa sid d+ha/ oM rang na gar+thoSh+NI Sha a ka shaM ga tshe// rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya
131b8(rgyud): che// mnyan par gzhag pas bsgoms nas ni// bdag la grub stsol zhes gsol ba// oM li rang na zhes brjod 'grub// nam mkha' snying bye'i dam tshig ni// rab mnyam gzhag pa
132a1(rgyud): / bcings nas kyang // dbang bskur bar ni gsol btab la// mi li rad na zhes brjod thob// rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin du// rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms
132a2(rgyud): nas kyang chos bdag stsol zhes gsol btab la// tsi li ra na zhes brjod 'thod// nam mkha' snying po las kyi mchog/ rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings nas ni// rin chen thams
132a3(rgyud): cad gsol btab la// ki li rad na zhes brjod 'thob// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// o I li/ o mri lI/ e tsi li/ oM kAM li// // de nas nor+ra bu'i ye shes
132a4(rgyud): gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bskyab bo// nam mkha'i phyogs sum phyogs gzhan du// rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sdud na// dngos grub mchog ni
132a5(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// bzhi la ri me bris po bzhin// rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur// rdo rje snying po bsgoms
132a6(rgyud): nas ni// dbang po nyid ni mnyam sbyar la// sdug pa de dang mnyam rtses la// 'jig rten kun gyis de dgur byed// nam mkha' kun gyi rdul dbyibs kyi// rdo rje snying po bsgom sA nA ma
132a7(rgyud): dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// thams cad 'grub par nges par 'gyur// de la de dag gri snying po 'di rnams so// a ka shaM guM h+yaM dz+nyA na sa d+ha ya hU~M/ tsit+taM gu h+yaM dz+nyA na aM b+hi Shi na
132a8(rgyud): tsi/ phrin nu m+me ti na gro rgyam tu logs da ma mi ts+tsha/ sar+b+ba gu ts+yai hrInas rgya med rjes sa bla mas wa~M// de nas phyag rgya tshon pa'i dngos pa bzhin du 'isong bar bya'o/ 
132b1(rgyud): dngos grub kyang de dang 'dra'o// de nas chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje nor bu'i rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshu du bzhag par bya'o// blonas chos kyi
132b2(rgyud): phyag rgya ni 'di yin no// sa ra sa ra/ ra daM ke ha ha ti ha b+ha/ ka ra ya a/ mdor na las kyi phyag rgya ni// gnas ni ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
132b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi las kyi dam rmig brtan pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ las kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa// / rdzogs spyo// de nas yang bcom
132b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dbang bskur ba'i las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang
132b5(rgyud): gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// // oM sar+m+ma ta thA ga ta karma a b+ho She ke hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs
132b6(rgyud): so/ oM badz+ra hUM ka ra a b+hi ShI ke hUM// de nas bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra a ka sha sa ma ta a bI She ki hUM// 
132b7(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi gAHdam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sad d+harma a b+he She ke rad ne hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' semAs dpa' chen po rdo
132b8(rgyud): rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM a b+hi shA ya a b+hi Shi ka~M hU~M// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi
133a1(rgyud): rigs kyi dus tshig 'di na mi blangs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin chen dgos pa zhes
133a2(rgyud): brjod do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srang ba bri// de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhag go bya// sems dpa' chen po'o
133a3(rgyud): tshul gyis ni// rin chen mad pa rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so// oM ma NaM rad naM pU dzas+t+yA/ oM sar+b+ba an+mA sid d+hi bar+Na da na a b+hiSh+Te kahUM/ oM badz+ra ma ni d+ha ri NI sa
133a4(rgyud): ma yi hUMTa.oM ma Ni ra da na a ka ra sha ya ka ra ma sa mA ye hUM/ oM mo Ni rad na ra ga ra ti/ kar+m+ma pA dze pra bar+d+ha/ a mr-i/ NIru na s+yAd+YA ka raM pA dz+nyA sa ma yA/ o murbA ma Na rA na dISh+Te a kar she/ au
133a5(rgyud): ma Ni ra daM na ma la pU dzi/ oM ma Ni rA na sUr+ya a lo ka pU dzA/ oM ma Ni rad na d+hu dzA ba tA ka/ oM ma Ni radwa na a Ta hA sa pU dze/ au pad ma mo Ni sa ma d+hi sA ma ye hU/ oM saR+Wa ti ga a nu smr-i ti sa
133a6(rgyud): ma d+hi kArma d+hi karma ka ri hUM/ oM ma NI rang nA ti ga ShA sa ma yau na d+ha tshin d+ha hUM/ oM maM NaM red na tsakra sa mA ye hUM/ oM ma Ni raMd na b+ha She khAnA ng+ga hUM/ oM ma Ni ra na waM ra shA na sU/ oM ma Nai rad na
133a7(rgyud): karma NaM hUM/ oM mu Ni rad na ka pa tsi rak+Sha haM/ oM ma Ni rad na dang Sh+Ta kha d+ha kha d+ha hUM/ oM ma Ni rAd na karma muSh+TaM d+h+waM/ o mu NaM rad na la s+ye pU dza ya ho// oM ma Ni ra da na ma lA a b+hi She ka pu dza/ 
133a8(rgyud): oM ma Ni rad na ner te prA dza/ oM ma Ni ride nad+ha pe pU dza ya/ oM maNi rad na puSh+pe pU dza ya/ oM ma Ni rad na d+hi na pI dza ya/ oM ma Ni ra dan g+hon taM pU dza ya/ oM ma Ni rad na aM gu sha a kar sha
133b1(rgyud): dza/ oM ma Ni rang nA pa she hUM/ e ma Ni rAd na swo ta baM/ oM ma Ni rad na a she a// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// cho ga ji lta ba bzhin pyA h+Na sa par byas nas bcug ste/ 'di skad
133b2(rgyud): du bsgo bar bya'o// 'di khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig/ khyod las kyi sgrib pas non nas shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la/ lus kyi ye shes pasgrub r+ya po'o// rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya che// 
133b3(rgyud): bsgoms pas kyang ni rab mnyam gzhag/ mchod pa kun gyis mchod na ni// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin gyis dam tshig mchog/ phyag rgya gang yang rung bcings
133b4(rgyud): lasangs rgyas thams cad mchod na ni// dbang bskur dam pa des 'thob po// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du// rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad
133b5(rgyud): rab mchod na// 'gro ba'i dam pa 'jig par 'gyur// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod gyur na// skad cig tu ni
133b6(rgyud): don kun thob// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM rad na pA dza ba shi ku ru/ oM rang+ga na pU dzaM A b+hi sa ma yA A b+hi Shi nA tsa/ oM ra na pU dza d+harma na sha ya ma/ oM rad na pA dza karma
133b7(rgyud): saR+Wa an+ma na med dam// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes las/ las kyi ye shes ni 'di yin te// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dbang po gnyis ni m+b+hany+tsam sbyar nas// 
133b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mchod na ni// 'jig rten thams cad des mgur 'gyur// de nas yang phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya
134a1(rgyud): ye shes bslab par bya'o// rdo rje rin chen bcings nas ni// gnas rnams kun du bzhag par bya// rdo rje dgos pa'i tshul du ni// lta 'og go rnams ji bzhin bya/ 
134a2(rgyud): de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin to// tA dzA ga du sna dza tus/ rma sha tu na/ rmak+Sha k+Shi d+h+r-i/ rdo rje rin chen gnyis byas la// las kyi phyag rgya de sgrub bo// / de bzhin
134a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las// las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa// / rdzogs spyo/ de nas yang
134a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rad na tAM// de nas byang chub
134a5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra mA lA hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di
134a6(rgyud): gsungs so// oM ma Ni ra da na// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma ra na// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
134a7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis oM gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM bi sha dwiSh+Ti/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po sa rang gi nor bu'i rigs
134a8(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag
134b1(rgyud): par bya/ de nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste bslab par bya'o// khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// de nas ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ 
134b2(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen bcings na sa ni// dpral bar raprA NAM bzhag na nI// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// de nas snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra rad na saR+YA a b+hi She kaM/ saR+YA
134b3(rgyud): sid d+ha yo mo pra ya tsha ra la ra la hUM tAM// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya bslab par bya ste// khyod dam yang na sdug pa'am// bud med dam ni skyes pa'ang rung // dpral ba gnyis ni sbyar ba dang // 
134b4(rgyud): sbyar bas gnyis ka'ang 'grub phyir 'gyur// de la da dag gau snying po ni 'di yin no// au badz+ra ra da na sa khaM bid d+hA d+ha ra tA ma/ prad ya tsa shr-i g+ham/ a b+hai Shi na tsa hi/ ha ha ha ha tAM// de nas
134b5(rgyud): phyag rgyu bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du bcing ba dang rnam pa bzhi de bzhin du bslab par ba'o// dngos grab thams cad kyang de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i
134b6(rgyud): snying pos don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra ma Ni d+hA ra sAR+YA aR+YA sing+ga di ma mA pra ya tsa ho b+ha grA wan badz+ra rad nA hUM// de nas dkyil 'khor 'di yin te
134b7(rgyud): de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// dngos grub kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni// ji bzhin par ni bri bar bya// de nas 'dir ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye
134b8(rgyud): shes bslab par bya'o// gzugs la sogs pa 'dod rnams la// chags bral ma gyur bde ba ni// sangs rgyas la ni phul 'gyur na// las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 
135a1(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// ras la sogs pa'i sems dpa' dang // phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris te bsgrub par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs
135a2(rgyud): pa thams cad gcig tu 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la legs so zhes bya ba 'dis bstod do// logs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod
135a3(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen khyed legs so/ rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs kyi kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon
135a4(rgyud): 'dus pa'o// mdo sde 'di ni legs par bro shad // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya
135a5(rgyud): bA bro rtag pa'i rgyal po/ rdzogs smo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
135a6(rgyud): kyi de kho na nyid chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la re shig dang por ni// phyag rgya chen po'i dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
135a7(rgyud): phyag rgya che// bcings nas mkha' dbyings thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku gzugs byin brlabs la// rang gi snying gi nang bcug nas// ji ste 'dod na tshe 'dri la// zhi ba'i dam pa
135a8(rgyud): mchog gyur pa'i// sangs rgyas nyid thob nges 'di 'grub// ji ste mi 'dod gong ma bzhin// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni// de nyid chen po brjod bya ste// tshig der thams cad bdag
135b1(rgyud): yin par// sems dpa'i rnal 'byor bdag gis sgom// ji ste 'dod na bdag nyid des// de bya gzi can dge ba yi// go 'phang tshe 'di nyid la thob// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ 
135b2(rgyud): de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin 'grub po// de ltar bdag ces bsgoms nas ni// sangs rgyas dang ni gzi can thob// mi
135b3(rgyud): 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis// dag ces brjod na nges par yang // sangs
135b4(rgyud): rgyas dang ni gzi can 'gyur// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// thams cad kyi ni kun dag par// las rnams
135b5(rgyud): thams cad sbyangs nas ni// sangs rgyas gzi can thob ci ste// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub rnams so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes
135b6(rgyud): rang gi rigs dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// dngos grub kun sbyor sangs rgyas nyid// bkas ni sems can kun don du// phyag rgya chen po bsgrubs na ni// tshe 'di nyid la spangs
135b7(rgyud): rgyas 'grub// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du ni// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin 'grub po// de bzhin bdag ces bsgoms na ni/ 
135b8(rgyud): skad cig tu ni gzi can thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// yi ge med pa'i chos rnams la// rab tu spros pa yod min te/ chos mcho
136a1(rgyud): / 'di ni brjod byed cing // bsgoms na gzi can nyid du 'gyur// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// dge ba'am yang na mi
136a2(rgyud): dge ba'i// gang gis las rnams byas pa yi// rgyal ba rnams la phul gyur na// skad cig gis ni gzi can 'gyur// de rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
136a3(rgyud): chen po rdo rje pad ma'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la dang por ni phyag rgya chen podam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// // 'dod
136a4(rgyud): chags ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ mu stegs can gyis smad gyur pa// de la chags pa'i chos 'di ni// theg pa che la grub par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i grub pa
136a5(rgyud): 'di yin to// ting 'dzin brtan pa'i tshul gyis ni// byams pa chen po bsgoms nas kyang // cho ga bzhi ldan khyab byas nas// skad cig gis ni gzi can thob// de nas chos kyi / 
136a6(rgyud): phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub gyi rgyud bshad do// 'dod chags ngo bo nyid dag ces// smra bar gyur pa'i tshul 'di ni// 'dod chags pha rol phyin rnyed de// skad cig gis ni
136a7(rgyud): go zi can thob// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// bdag nyid lce dang reg pa dang // mnyan pa dang ni dran pa'ang rung // sems can rnams ni thams cad
136a8(rgyud): kyi// sdug bsngal kun ni mthar byed 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes nor bu'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// 
136b1(rgyud): de la phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub gyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying po dza bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun dbang bdag 'gyur zhes// bsgom par bya ba rnam bsgoms nas/ 
136b2(rgyud): skad cig gis ni gzi can thob// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyad ma tshig dngos grub bshad do// nam mkha'i snying po 'dra bar ni// sems can kun gyi ri ba kun/ yongs su rdzogs
136b3(rgyud): par byed 'gyur zhing // skad cig gis ni gzi can thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// bdag nyid kyang ni sbrengs nas su// nor byin rab tu dga'
136b4(rgyud): byed cing // chos 'byung phyag rgya smra ba ni// gzi can tshe 'di nyid la thob// de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub gyi rgyud 'di bshad do// dbul po rnams la phan pa'i phyir// nor grub
136b5(rgyud): pa la brtson ldan na// gzi can 'gyur ro dzi ste yang // mi 'dod dngos grub grong ma bzhin// rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
136b6(rgyud): dngos grub thob pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi
136b7(rgyud): rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'didri yin te// gang gis 'dod la snyoms zhugs pa// de la 'dod pas sbyor
136b8(rgyud): ba byed/ sangs rgyas phyag rgya chen po yi// ye shes dam tshig yin par bshad// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud
137a1(rgyud): bshad do// 'dod pa rnams la chags bral min// dam tshig tshul du tshul chen 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa// rgyal bas
137a2(rgyud): kyang ni 'da' mi mdzad// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sems can don du khro min yang / khro bo chen por rab tu ston// rdo rje rigs
137a3(rgyud): ni chen po yi// dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'// de la pad mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ dwa bzhin dag par shes nas kyang // de
137a4(rgyud): dgos gang dang gang byed pa/ 'di ni pad mo'i rigs chen gyi// dam tshig 'da' bar dka' bre'o// de la nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// 
137a5(rgyud): nyung ngam yang na mang yang rung // ji tsam nus pa nyid du ni// sbyin pa nyi ma ma stongs par// bya ba dam tshig 'di yin no// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dngos
137a6(rgyud): grub gyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag ni rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyag
137a7(rgyud): rgyu'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// dri la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sangs rgyas chos zhes grags so zhes/ 
137a8(rgyud): brjod na chos nyid mi ge ni/ sangs rgyas chos ni phyag mi shes mchog gi tshul yon no// de yi de bzhini gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub
137b1(rgyud): rgyud ni 'di yin no// 'dod chags las ni dag pa'i chos// bde ba thams cad rab byin byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni// dngos grub byed pa'i chos mchog
137b2(rgyud): 'di'o// nyid la rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sangs rgyas bka' ni sbyang ba dang // sems can drang bar bya ba'i phyir// de ltar khros por ma gyur
137b3(rgyud): kyang // ma rungs bdud byas dngos grub thob// de la pad mo'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// pad mo chu yis mi chags pa// de bzhin 'dod pas mi chags zhes// / 
137b4(rgyud): smra zhing dgos min byed kyang ni// sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro// de la nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sbyin dang mnyam pa'i chos med de// 
137b5(rgyud): sgrub pa byed cing smra ba ni// nor bu'i rigs ni chen po'i chos// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi cho gargyas
137b6(rgyud): pa'i rgyud do// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyilas kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud
137b7(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub kyai rgyud ni 'dri yin te// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i nyid
137b8(rgyud): rnams su// ji bzhin par ni brtul na ni// las kyi phyag rgya mchog 'grub bzhin// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub ni 'di yin no// dus bzhi yi ni tshul dag du// 
138a1(rgyud): mchod pa rnam pa bzhi yis ni// rtag tu ldan pa rnam bzhir yang // byas pasA las rnams bsgrub par bya// de la rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// 
138a2(rgyud): ma rungs sems can gdul bya'i phyir// dngos po gang dang gang de byed// lus kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi 'di// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin byed// de la bud me'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin
138a3(rgyud): no/ 'jigs pas gzir lo mi 'dzegs sbyin// ji bzhin par de 'dil de bzhin// 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi las// sangs rgyas dngos grub rab sbyin pa'o// de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos
138a4(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud 'di yin no// sangs rgyas dngo bskor de bzhin du/ lus can rnams la sbyin pa dang / ra ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i// los kyi don kun sgrub pa'o// rigs thams cad ts+tsho las
138a5(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// / de nas byang chab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi chos nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi
138a6(rgyud): rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dgos// 'di ni sangs
138a7(rgyud): rgyas sangs rgyas nyid// gzhan las sangs rgyas 'gyur ba med// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos nyid mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te/ phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas
138a8(rgyud): ni/ dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi// chos nyid dngos grub dam pa thob// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 
138b1(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // las rnams thams cad bsgrubs na ni// rdo rje dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi cho sa nyid
138b2(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// chos kyi phyag rgya brjod byed cing // rdo rje chos kyi chos rnams ni/ ches nyid du ni 'dis 'grub bo// da l-i 'di ni
138b3(rgyud): nor ba'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// las kyi rdo rje snying khar bzhag/ chos nyid 'di dag bsgoms na ni// las kyi chos nyid
138b4(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyuraro// rigs thams cad kyi chos nyid mkhyen pa'i cho ga rgyas po'i rgyud do// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje sra/ de bzhin gshegs
138b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyu'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i
138b6(rgyud): ting 'dzin gnas// zla ba rdo rje'i chu l-i gyis ni// ji ltar de gnyis kha dog shes// ji ltar 'jig rten des shes de// dag la dga' dang dkar por gsal// dmar la chags dang dmar dmar khro/ 
138b7(rgyud): shes dang khe dog ji bzhin pa// de yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur// de la 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bcus pa yi// phyag rgya chen
138b8(rgyud): blo bcings nas ni// rang gi lus la ji ltar shes/ de ltar khro bar yid shes so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu do// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ khros pas
139a1(rgyud): gyur na dkyil 'khor ni// ji lta bur yang mthong gyur na// de lta bur ni yid ches so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rISh+Ti kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / nam mkha' 'ams
139a2(rgyud): phyogs phra mo 'am// ye shes phreng ba mthong gyur na// mdor na kha dog ci 'dra bar// shes pa de 'drar des sems shes// de las 'di ni ni ri bu'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 
139a3(rgyud): 'jig rten kun las bltas nas kyang // ji lta bur ni mthong 'gyur yang // mthong bar gyur pa de 'dra bar// 'gro ba'i sems ni shes par bya// de nyid las ni snyoms zhugs nas// 'gro ba dang
139a4(rgyud): ni 'ong ba dang // byed pa dang ni 'chog pa'ang rung // ji lta mthong ba de ltar rtogs// snyoms par zhugs te bsams nas ni// sems can gang dang gang yin pa// de dang de ni de bzhin du// seMs
139a5(rgyud): rnams thams cad rtogs par 'gyur zhes/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mkhyen pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sas
139a6(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do// 
139a7(rgyud): sems dpa' byin gyis brlab tshul gyis// sangs rgyas su ni bdag bsgoms na// ye shes kyi ni tshu l-i de yis/ sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig
139a8(rgyud): kyi shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// ser skya'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mthong // sems dpa' nyid kyi phyag rgya nyid// mngon sum nyid du mthong 'gyur na'o// 
139b1(rgyud): de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do// / dri lta bu'i dbyibs su gyur pa'i// dbus na sngo bsngangs snang na ni// rdo rje rigs mchog dngos grub ni// ji ste 'dod na myur du 'thob/ 
139b2(rgyud): de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do// / de nyid la ni mkha' 'dra ba'i// pad ma sngon po lta bu mthong // pad mo chen po rigs rig pa'o// dngos grub du ni legs par gyur
139b3(rgyud): de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub ky-i ye shes kyi rgyud do// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan na// de nyid mkha'i bzhin dri med pas// 'od zer dkyil 'khor 'phro ba ni// mthong na dngos grub
139b4(rgyud): myur du thob// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas pas// dngos grub dus su rang bzhin du// bdag nyid kyi ni mdun mthong na'o// rigs thams cad kyi
139b5(rgyud): dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos
139b6(rgyud): grub kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do// / rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ 
139b7(rgyud): lus kun de bzhin gau shegs rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsgoms la// de bzhin lus las 'byung mthong na'o// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi mngon par
139b8(rgyud): shes pa rnams kyi rmongos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che// rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings na ni// sgrub pas cho ga 'di yis ni// mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// de
140a1(rgyud): la 'di du 'phrul gyi spyan gyi ye shes bshad do// phyag rgya chen por mnyam gzhag s+ho// mig gi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang // gang yang rung ba des bsams na// shin du ring ba 'ang
140a2(rgyud): des mthong 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// phyag rgya chen por mnyam gzhag ste/ rna ba'i rnam shes bskyed nas kyang // des ni dgos pa gang bsams kyang / 
140a3(rgyud): shin du ring na gnas pa thos// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// phyag rgya chen por mnyam gzhag ste// yid kyi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang // sems can gang la des
140a4(rgyud): brtags na// de yi sems ni de shes 'gyur// phyag rgya chen phor mnyam gzhog ste// zo dag gam yang na gzhan yang rung // yid kyis bltas nas gar skyes pa// gzugs ni de yis shes pa
140a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de nas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho ga shes pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin no// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang // rdzu 'phrul gang dang gang 'dod pa// 
140a6(rgyud): des ni gang na'ang rung bar ni// ting nge 'dzin gyis mthong bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i
140a7(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khams gsum rnam rgyal mchog tu ni// rab mnyam gzhag paso bcings nas ni// cho ga 'dis ni bsgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga thob po// khros nas
140a8(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad ni// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin gyi// 'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis// mngon shes mngon du skad cig 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// / 
140b1(rgyud): de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings nas ni// cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos// mngon
140b2(rgyud): par shes pa lnga 'thob bo// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin du// cho ga bzhin du 'dod pas tshogs// 'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis// mngon shes thams cad thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom
140b3(rgyud): ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// don kun grub pa'i phyag rgya ni// rab mnyamu gzhag pas bcings na ni/ 
140b4(rgyud): chog 'dis ni sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga thob po// lte 'og go rims ji bzhin du// 'phrul gyi mig la sngags tshul gyis// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod byas na// mngon shes lnga ni des thob po// 
140b5(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// // de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
140b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyeg na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni
140b7(rgyud): 'di yin no// bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa yi tshig gis mna' ni 'dir byed cing // bden pa chen po bsrungs na ni// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob po// zhes sangs rgyas bco ma ldan 'das kyis gsung
140b8(rgyud): lha 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs byung ba'o// dam tshig la ni mna' 'dor lo// rdo rje'i bden bsrungs na na/ 
141a1(rgyud): dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ji ste dngos
141a2(rgyud): grub mchog 'dod na// shin du 'di la sa 'dra'i bka' bar// rdo rje 'dzin gyis mna' 'dor zhing // bden pa 'di la bsrung bar bya// bcom ston 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la
141a3(rgyud): 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ji ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na// padad+ma mo chen po 'am rigs mchog gi/ dam pa'i chos la mna' 'dor zhing // bden pa'i
141a4(rgyud): dam tshig bsrung bar bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // 'di la shin du 'da' dka' bar/ 
141a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas myi chod po mna' 'dor zhing // bden pa'i mchog 'di bsrungs na ni// dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mchod pas gsungs so// rigs
141a6(rgyud): snrums ts+tshed kyi mu ni'i dngos grub kyi cho ga'i rgyas pa'i rgyud do// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag ni rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
141a7(rgyud): kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin go shegs pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ sa mra yo sgo zhes
141a8(rgyud): badzi na/ de yi ga dum bsgobs pa// po ga rgya kun dang rigs rnams la'ang // nyid kyis bcings nas bstan par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i di khon nyi kyis
141b1(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// su ra ta s+t+waM zhes brjod na// de nyid bskul bas bdag nyid che'i/ ma bsgrubs
141b2(rgyud): pAr ni byang chub kun// nyid kyis bcings nas grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshi ga chen po'i de kho na nyid kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dri kho na nyid
141b3(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / hUM zhes bya ba gcig tsam gyis// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// bdag gam gzhan nom gang yang rung // nyid bcings 'ching du btsug kyang rung // de la 'di
141b4(rgyud): ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / saR+Wa shun d+ha zhes brjod na// bA dag gam yang na gzhan gyis kyang // bud med sogase le sbyor ldan la// thams
141b5(rgyud): tsAd du ni grol mi 'gyur// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi di kho ni nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // oM zhes bya bas mdor bsdu na// phyag rgya thams cad 'grub 'gyur te// 'jig rten gyi
141b6(rgyud): ni mchog nyid kyi// rang 'byung nyid la mchod par 'gyur// rigs thams cad kyi drim tshig de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// // de nas byang chub sems
141b7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud na
141b8(rgyud): 'di yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dran byed cing // sangs rgyas phyag rgya bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas byang chub bsnyen par yang // bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de la
142a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag r+b+ha n+te// bcings nas de yi mdun du yang // rdo rje sems dpa' bu sgoms na ni/ 
142a2(rgyud): sbyin du myu byung ba myi rlung 'gyu// de ma 'dzin 'i rigs kyi ngas p+lu Sh+Ta do// rdo rje sem spyod ma tid 'dzin gyis// dam tshig gi'i mchog bac+doM sa na// rdo rje sems dpa'
142a3(rgyud): naninyi rim du ni dngos grub thAMT// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dam chog gi drang rdza rgyud do// / 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ chos kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // 'jig rten mgon
142a4(rgyud): po bsgoms nas ni// nyi ni m+me du ni dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin gyis// lus kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // rdo rje snying po
142a5(rgyud): bsgoms na ni// nyi rim du ni dngos grub 'gyur// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa
142a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do// phyag rgya thams cad bcings
142a7(rgyud): nas ni/ bdag nyid dang ni mdun du ni// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bsgoms// de nas de ma thag grub ces// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
142a8(rgyud): rigs las dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do// / rdo rje bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'dod pa bo dag ces bsgoms nos kyang // phyag rgya thams cad bsgrubs na ni// sgrub mchog kun gyi sgrub pa'o// 
142b1(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do// / bdag nyid kyis ni rdo rje'i dbyibs// rab mnyam gzhug pas
142b2(rgyud): bsgom byed ci // sangs rgyas cad bcings ni ni// de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs
142b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid nyid// pad mo'i dbyibs su bsgoms nas ni// thams cad shes pa'i ngo bo yis// pad mo'i rigs su 'grub par bshad// 
142b4(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i rgyud do// / nor bu 'od zer ro ni tshan 'bar/ 
142b5(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms nis ni// nor bu chen po'i rigs bshad pa'i// mchod pa kun gyis rang bzhin 'grub// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams
142b6(rgyud): cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i chu ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
142b7(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// / rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug rgya ni// rabra mnyam gzhag pas bcings nas kyang // sbyong kha mi
142b8(rgyud): spur mgrin spyi bor// bzhag na sangs rgyas byin rlob po// zhes sangs rgyaso bcom ldan 'dis kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi dngos grub kyi/ 
143a1(rgyud): mas da du ladzin+da gyis// sems ma'i dzi rje badzin byas la// spyim+b+ha ba mdzod su mgrin pa dang // skye bar bzhag na byin gyis rlog/ ces bcom ldan
143a2(rgyud): 'das rdo rje sems dpes gsungs so// de la 'di ni byin gyis brlabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rje rje hU~M gi phyag rgya ni// rab tu mnyam pa ste bamings nas kyang // snying kha mdzod spu mgrin sgyu
143a3(rgyud): blor bzhag na nyid du byin gyi so rlob// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtso bros gsungaso so// de la 'di ni padi ma'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu dang // 'jig rten dbang po
143a4(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje pa ma dam byas la// snying kha mdzod spu mismin spyi bor// rab tu byin gyis brlab phyir brtag/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan res gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// 
143a5(rgyud): dri la 'di na nor bu'i rigs kyi byin gyi sau brlabs kyi rgyud do// rdo rje snying pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje nor bu che bcings la// snying khe mdzod spu me gra ni spyi bar// byin gyi brlab phyir bzhag par bya// 
143a6(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshig
143a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gaslongs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // rdo rje rin tshun bcings
143a8(rgyud): nas ni// dpral bar rab tu bzhog byos na// rgyal bas rdo rje rin chen gyis// dbang bskur bar ni der 'gyur ro// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin
143b1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje dbyings dbang la srogs pa// sangs rgyas phyag rgyas mdun nas ni// brtsam par byas nas ngos bzhir yang // phre ba nyid kyi
143b2(rgyud): dbang bskur 'gyur// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje dbang gis phyung bas ni// bcings nas dpral ba bzhag nas phreng ba dbang bskur de yis ni/ 
143b3(rgyud): rdo rje rnams kyis de dbang bskur// de la 'di na pad mo'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// chos kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang // mgo bor bzhag ste des dbang bskur// sangs rgyas
143b4(rgyud): kyi ni 'jig rten gyi// dbang phyug gi ni dbang bskur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyon rIs gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
143b5(rgyud): do/ rdo rje rin chen myug gur bcings// dpral bar bzhag ste dbang bskur bar// sangs rgyas kyi ni mchod pa yi// dpung phyug du ni dbang bskur 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying bris
143b6(rgyud): gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin
143b7(rgyud): gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegos pa'i ting 'dzin gyi rgyud do// / rgyal ba kun gyi rnam pa ni// phyag rgyas mnyam par gzhag pas bcings// sngags kyi rig
143b8(rgyud): pa bzlas nas no// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'dri ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos byung
144a1(rgyud): sems dpa'i byin brlabs tshul gyis ni// ting 'dzin rdo rje chos kyis kyang // snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams// zlos pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das
144a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas ki ting nge 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rags kau ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // 'dod chags las ni khro bya'o ste/ bdag ni khro bo yin bsgoms na// snying po
144a3(rgyud): phyag rgya sngags rig rnams// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad me'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / 'jig
144a4(rgyud): rten dbang po'i rigs zlos pas// byams pas 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis ni// snying po la sogs bsgrubs na yang // dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs kyi
144a5(rgyud): dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / nam mkha' kun gyi ting 'dzin ni/ kau ra ba mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms na yang // snying po phyag rgya sngags rig
144a6(rgyud): rnamasabasgre bas na kun du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas bang chub
144a7(rgyud): sems dpa'i chen po phyag ni rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mcho
144a8(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / rab mnyam gzhag pas dang por ni// bdug po la sogs mchod byas la// de nas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes
144b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam bzhi yis// gsang ba'i mchod pa
144b2(rgyud): brjod byed cing // bdag dbul ba la stsogs pa yi// mchod pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub
144b3(rgyud): kyi rgyud do// khro bo rdo rje mchog chen po// khro bo'i gsang ba brjod byed cing / khro bo'i khu tshur rab byas na// myur du bdag gi rigs 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ 
144b4(rgyud): de la 'di ni pad mra'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba'i// tshul rnams legs par brjod nas kyang // yid dang ngag gis phul nas ni// dngos grub myur du thob
144b5(rgyud): par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po sa gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'bon rnams
144b6(rgyud): kyis/ rgyal ba mchod pas mchod byed cing // sbyin pa thams cad byin na ni// nor bu'i rigs ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rong la byin gyis brlabasu
144b7(rgyud): srogs ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur// cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi yis ni// rdo rje sna tshogs 'grub byed cing // dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ljon 'das rdo rje sas
144b8(rgyud): dpes gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mchod pa rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
145a1(rgyud): chen po phag na rnge rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhi
145a2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / lus la sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ni// 'di ni bder gshegs nyid mngon shes// 'di ni rib tu rtogs nas ni// sangs
145a3(rgyud): rgyas pa yi dngos grub thob// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grubo kyi rgyud do// / 'phral
145a4(rgyud): gyi mig sogs mngon shes ni// rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // mngon shes lnga ni bdag 'gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'odas rdo rje sems dpas/ 
145a5(rgyud): gsungs/ de la 'di na rdo rje rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro bo med na shes bskyed nas ni// rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms na yang // mngon shos lngar ni/ 
145a6(rgyud): bdag 'gyur nas/ dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsang so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i yang shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 
145a7(rgyud): 'dod chags mngon par bskyed nas kyang // rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms nas ni// mngon shas ldir ni byadag 'gyur nas// dag pa'i dngos grub thog 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
145a8(rgyud): can gyis gsungs so// de la 'di na nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// mchod pa'i mngon shes bskyed nas ni// ra'i mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms nas ni// mngon
145b1(rgyud): shes lngar yang bdag 'gyur nas// / dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi mngon par shes pas ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi
145b2(rgyud): che ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chubo sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ nade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// 
145b3(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// bdag gis sangs rgyas t+ye cig/ sa sa rgyas byang chub ye shrI 'i/ bsgoms na dngos
145b4(rgyud): grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de lnga 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje
145b5(rgyud): sems dpa'i ting 'dzin bdag/ phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing // byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub chen pos gas
145b6(rgyud): so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro bo'i rgyal po'i ting 'dzin gnas// lag pas dam tshig mchog bcings la// byang chub chen po'i
145b7(rgyud): ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bco ma ljon 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad me'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 
145b8(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug ting 'dzin gnas// de bzhin chos kyi phyag rgyas bzlas// byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob por 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu/ 
146a1(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi che ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// rdo rje snying po'i
146a2(rgyud): ting 'dzin gnas// lus kyi phyag rgya la sna logs byed// byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsung
146a3(rgyud): / rigs thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
146a4(rgyud): rigs kyi mnyes par byed po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'dri gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nyid kyis sangs rgyas byang chub phyir
146a5(rgyud): sems can don rnams rab byed cing // sangs rgyas rjes su dran 'gyur na// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed// cus bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chags pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni de
146a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyas pra ru bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// ji ltar yul dang ldan nas ni// rdo rje seMs dang sgom byed cing // de nyid bskul na myur bar ni// mnyes par bya bar
146a7(rgyud): des 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dri la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas bka' ni bsrung ba dang / sems
146a8(rgyud): can spyang phyir khros pa yis// skyem drangs mngon spyod byas na ni/ 'dzini rdo rje mnyes par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'ongs 'jig rteni gsu mi las rnam par rgyal bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni dang// 
146b1(rgyud): mo'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / chags pas kun du lta ba dang // byams dang snying rje chos smra dang // mi 'jigs kun la sbyin byed rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyis mnyes
146b2(rgyud): par byed ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sprin gyis gsungs so// de lnga 'di ni na rI bu'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// dbang bskur ba ni rab sbyin dang // nor ba sregs rab tu/ 
146b3(rgyud): sbyin byed cing / de yang sangs rgyas de kun spyir// 'di ni sangs rgyas mnyes par byed// ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mnyes par bya byi
146b4(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag ni rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// 
146b5(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / de ltar rnam drag bde sbyin pa'i// 'dod chags la ni brnyas mi bya// sems can kun gyi don gyi sbyor// 'di ni spangs
146b6(rgyud): rgyas dbang byed ces// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sgo gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / 'dod stan bde ba'i bdag nyid kyi/ 
146b7(rgyud): su ra tA s+t+waM zhos smra zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrubs nas ni// de nyid bskul ni dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i
146b8(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / sangs rgyas bka'i yis sems can rnams// dge ba lu se tsan skyabs sbyin dang / sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// bsad na yang ni dbang du 'gyur// sa
147a1(rgyud): // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / pad me'i med pa ma khu bye zhing // 'dod chags
147a2(rgyud): dag pa kun rtog la// 'dral ba'i phyir ni cha gos byed cing // 'dod par byed na dbang du 'gyur// zhus bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gis gsungs so// de lo 'di nor ba'i rigs
147a3(rgyud): kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur phyir// rdo rje rin chen nyin re rar// spyi bor bzhag ste dab bskur na// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur// 
147a4(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ 
147a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // sems can kun don
147a6(rgyud): ma mthong zhing // sangs rgas de nyid ma spangs la// yod dang las dang ngag gis na// bsad pas dngos grub gleb par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
147a7(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bsod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / dngos grub thams cad ma mthong la// rigs rnams kyis ni mi brtson zhing // rdo rjes kun du brdeg
147a8(rgyud): nas ni/ bsad nas dngos grub theb par 'grub ka zhes bcom ldan 'das phyi gan rdo rjes gsungs sa// de 'i 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi bas pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mi rudus ma du'i khri ma
147b1(rgyud): cing / de bzhin sems can mi 'dul la// bdag nyid sdug bsngal thob par byed// hU~M zhes bya bas bsad par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs
147b2(rgyud): kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// snying rje med cing byams med la// sems can mi rungs mi sbyong zhing // bdag nyid la ni slus na ni/ bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan
147b3(rgyud): 'das 'phags pa kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // mi gto kha nor med cing // nor grwa tor ba dang gnod byed
147b4(rgyud): la/ sems can rnams ni dbul 'gyur na// bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das re ba thams cad yongs su bskong bas gsungs so// kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyis/ 
147b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma tho ba gsod bcug lnga// de dag drang bar bya ba'i phyir// bdag gis dngos grub sbyin par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu bzang pos gsungs so// rigs thams
147b6(rgyud): cad kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bsrung ba'i phag rgya'i
147b7(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungasaM so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems can thams cad mi gtong zhing // rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod bdog
147b8(rgyud): nyid rtag+na pa'i sangs rgyas yid la byed// 'di ni bsrung ba rmad kyi mchog/ ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegis pa'i rigs kyi dngos
148a1(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud kyi bsrung ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan tsam zhig/ lan cig tsam yang brjod gyur na// 'di la bsrung ba brtag chen po// skad cig gis ni dngos grub
148a2(rgyud): ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// da lnga 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rigs dang rgyud kyis chog mi shes// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid kyis
148a3(rgyud): rdo rje hUM las myos byed pa// 'di ni bdag dang gzhan bsrung zhes// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M zhes bye bas gsungs so// de lu 'di ni pad+ma mo'i rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod
148a4(rgyud): chags dag cing byams pa che// thams cad la ni mi 'jigs sbyin// 'jig rten dbang gis mtshan zlos pa// bsrung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar che// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la
148a5(rgyud): 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // sangs rgyas sems can gtong byed par// ci nus par ni sbyor bad cing // nyi ma stongs par mi bya bar// bsring ba 'di ni ngo mon
148a6(rgyud): mchog/ ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsrung bas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
148a7(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rgyud 'di bzhes par gsol/ gang gis sems can
148a8(rgyud): thams cod rtog pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug du gyur nas/ rtogs par bgyis te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i slad du'o// 
148b1(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so// gan rdo rje legs par bshad pas/ de nyid kyis blang zhing byin gyis
148b2(rgyud): brlabs so// de nas de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lags so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje
148b3(rgyud): rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje sems khyod legs pa ste// rdo rje lngas ni khyod logs so// rdo rje theg pa bla na mod// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang // rdo rje thag pa bla na mAd// theg pa chen
148b4(rgyud): po mngon 'das pa'i// mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ rtog pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// // de nas yang bang
148b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos
148b6(rgyud): grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud de/ sangs rgyas byang chub ting 'dzin te// rab mnyam gzhug pas bsgoms nas ni// byang chub bde bas thob 'gyur zhes// bsams nas kyang ni rtogs par bya// 
148b7(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud de// sems dpa
148b8(rgyud): rdo rjer snying khar bcings// nga la chung ma khyod sdug pa// brtan par gyur cig ces smras nas// phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub bya ste// cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni// rang gi las rnams mdzub kyang / 
149a1(rgyud): gsang ba'i chung ma zhes smras na// shin du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos
149a2(rgyud): grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// // de la de ltar khros pa dang // ji lta bzhin du bsgrubs na yang // dngos grub thosnga ma gyur na// hUM gi phyag rgyas bsad na ni// skrag ste dngos grub sbyin par byed// ces
149a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin kau shegs pa thams cad kyi hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pe de mo'i rigs kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// rdo rje
149a4(rgyud): lta bas bltas nas kyang // bdag gis chung ma 'am gzhan chung ma// sdig pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad mo dam pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rig
149a5(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi dngos grub dam pa gsang ba'i rgyud de/ dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar lo// bde ba'i mchog ni sgyu byed cing // sangs rgyas kun la dbang thob po// phul/ myur du 'grub par 'gyur
149a6(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu bzhad pas gsungs so// rigs dam pa thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa
149a7(rgyud): phyug na rdo rjes// de bzhin gro shigs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud 'dra gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi gsang
149a8(rgyud): bo'i rgyud do// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod cing // bud med kun la chags byas la// sems can don gyis skye ma mdzad// brjod na sangs rgyas des mnyes so// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan
