149b1(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// 'dod chags la ni brnyas ma bya// bud med kun dang rtse
149b2(rgyud): byed pa/ rdo rje rnams kyi gsang dam tshig/ 'di ni bsrungs na dngos grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so//  la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gis dngos
149b3(rgyud): grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// gsod pa'i 'jig rten thams cad gsod// lus ngag las bzang dgyes pa dang // 'jig rten rnam par sbyangs nas ni// dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin no zhes bcom
149b4(rgyud): ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rgyal bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// / dag pa'i bdag nyid 'dod chags dag/ ma stegs
149b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor can dag la// dag pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig ni// bsrungs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di
149b6(rgyud): ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud do// de la rdo rje nor bu sngar bcings la// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// ma rungs rnams kyi nor 'phrogs na// dam tshig
149b7(rgyud): rdo rjes gre ba sbyin tha dza~M 'a gyur// zhesra bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po chos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems
149b8(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos
150a1(rgyud): / kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// chos rnams rang bzhin dag par ni/ rab mnya ma gzhug pas bsgoms nas kyang / dgos pa thams cad byas nas ni// sangs rgyas
150a2(rgyud): pu lI dngos grub theg/ 'as bcom ldan 'di sa skor dbyings kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsong ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // sems can rnams la chug
150a3(rgyud): byed cing / yul la skye bar ma gyur la// bud med dga' ba'i dag pa ni// gsang chos dngos grub mchog sbyin no// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i
150a4(rgyud): rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdo rje phra mo'i ting 'dzin gnas// sna yi hUM gis sbyor ba yis// mi rungs thams cad bsad nas ni// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom
150a5(rgyud): ldan 'das dam tshig gis gsangs so// de la 'di ni bya pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis// bud med
150a6(rgyud): kun dang rtsi byed na// chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan res gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'dra ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos kyi rgyud do// 
150a7(rgyud): bud med dmo ni sdug pa dang / dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/ re ba thams cad yongs bskangs na/ dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po che yis
150a8(rgyud): gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gosang ba'i rgyud do// de na chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi da/ 
150b1(rgyud): grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran bsgoms la// 
150b2(rgyud): bud med lus kyi bu gar zhug sde// bud med rnams ni dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos
150b3(rgyud): grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// bu ga nas ni de bzhin bzhugs// bud med lus su legs khyab byas// sems med pa yang mgu bar 'gyur// zhes bcom
150b4(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje dwagos pas gsangs so// de la 'di ni du bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i rigaso kyi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud de// rdo rje hU~M gi phyag rgya ni// rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings nas kyang / 
150b5(rgyud): khros nas bu gar zhugs nas ni// yid kyis de nas dbang bya zhes// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi lus kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// / chos
150b6(rgyud): kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni// bcings nas pod mo'i ting 'dzin ni// bu gar zhugs nas bud med rnams// thams cad kyang ni bsrung bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad mos gsungs so// 
150b7(rgyud): lo 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub gsung ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi rdo rje nor bur bcings// bu gar zhugs nas bud med rnams// skad cig gis phab gar byed
150b8(rgyud): 'gyu / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas po'i rgyud de// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i
151a1(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa
151a2(rgyud): cad kyi 'khor lo dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bya zhing // phyag rgya bud mad rnams kyis bskor// der ni sangs rgyas bzhag
151a3(rgyud): par bya/ gsang ba dar ni zhugs nas kyang // sangs rgyas la smra de ma thag/ 'di ni khyab pa'i btsun mo ste// kun gtong ba ni bdag stsol cig/ ces rigs pa rnams kun phyag rgya// tshul
151a4(rgyud): la yang ni de skad brjod// sangs rgyas mnyam med 'od monga' ba'i// gsang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
151a5(rgyud): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gasdang ba'i rgyud do// / rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bar ni// dkyil 'khor lags par bri bar bya// de bzhin ga shegs pa'i rigs rnams ni// thams cad
151a6(rgyud): kye na mchog tshul du// dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs nas kang // dngos gra ba 'dod pa myur ba ni/ sr-i ra ta su ma ya swA ho// badz+ra sata d+ya sid+d+ha sa ma/ zhes brjod snying po 'di bzlas te// bsgrubs na
151a7(rgyud): thams cad 'grub por 'gyur// de nyid bskal ba'i tshul gyis ni// mgo nas myur du 'grub par 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi
151a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud de// khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dra bar ni// rdo rje kun gyi rigs rnams kyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad tshul du yang // mkhas
151b1(rgyud): sa legs par dri bar bya// des nugs nas ni myur ba srug// dngos grub gsol byas bde byed cing // 'dod chagasu las ni khyod byung zhes// sgyuspya na kun du 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom
151b2(rgyud): sngon 'angs rdo rje ni gropa so// de ma 'di ni bang mo'i rigs kyi kyis 'khor thams cad gyi ngos glabu gas ba'i rgyud do// pad ma rigs ni rnams cad kyi/ ni 'gro ba 'dul ba
151b3(rgyud): tshul du ni/ mkhris pas dkyil 'khor bri brer bya// der zhugs nas ni brjod bya ba// 'dod chags chos te pad+ma mA na// khyuH bdag nyid myur dngos grub// de skad gsungs na dkyil 'kho
151b4(rgyud): kun gyis des ni dngos grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gi sang ba'i rgyud de/ 
151b5(rgyud): nor bu chen po'i rigs rnams ni// don kun grub pa'i tshul cu yang / dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas ni// zhugs nas ji skad smra bar bya// bsam pa kun gyis dngos grub las// 'dod
151b6(rgyud): chags bsam pa dngos grub mchog/ grub shig grub shig sems dpa' che// bcom ldan 'das thams cad 'grub pa'o// de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor ni// thams cad du ni zhugs
151b7(rgyud): gyur na/ mchod pa gsung ba bla med pa'i// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// de phyin chad ni grub pa drag nyid// bsgrubs na rtag tu 'grub pur 'gyur// gang tshe myur du ma grub na// de nyid bsku
151b8(rgyud): ni grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gas nga ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sa
152a1(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'dri gsungs so// de la 'di na dra bzhin gshegs
152a2(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi d+hA dade/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha mo che// sdug rnying bde ba kun sbyin pa// bden las bying ba'i tshi gau 'dun pas s+thASh+Ta na da nI ma grub na'o// 
152a3(rgyud): zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshugs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// lha 'og gi rims ji bzhin du/ 
152a4(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni// 'di ni de nyid gsang ba yi// rdo rje tshul tshig 'di smros shig/ badrag ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// khyod de'i chung ma'i snying la gnas// lus kun la ni
152a5(rgyud): mkhyud nas kyang // rdo rje 'gying bas bgying bar mdzod// rdo rje 'gying ba'i lha mo che// de nyid bskul te chags gyur pas// lus la de ni brtan 'gyur na// ji bzhin myur du 'grub par 'gyur
152a6(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'gying ba'i bdag pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// grub shig grub shig lus rnams kun/ 
152a7(rgyud): ni dam tshig khyod nga'i sdug/ zhes bskul myur du chags 'gyur nas// rab tu yang ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dram tshig gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs
152a8(rgyud): kyi chos kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sems dpa' mo// nga yi chung ma khyod rab sdug/ zhes ni bskul ba myur du yang // rjes su chags pas 'grub
152b1(rgyud): rar 'gyu zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya gsung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khyod kyi las kun byed pa ste/ 
152b2(rgyud): chu mde sa drug/ rdo can gyi sgyur 'gyur ba ro// rjes su ma/ 'a grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan ljongs nam ma kha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs khrimam cad kyi phyug
152b3(rgyud): gis nga ba'i dngos grub kyi tshig rgyas bu'i rgyud // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsung ba'i dngos
152b4(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gra shigaso bo'i dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / mu ste gus can rnams phan gdags phyir// ri mo'i phyag rgya'i tshul
152b5(rgyud): gyis ni/ sangs rgyas btsun mor rab sbas par// shes nas rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// dri la
152b6(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud du/ sems can kun gyi yid la khyab// sems can kun la bde sbyin zhing / sems can kun gyi yab nyid ni// 
152b7(rgyud): dam tshig mchog ni 'dod pa'i mchog/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ gsung ba'i mchog ni rmad
152b8(rgyud): che bar// dad ldan shes nas dang byas nas// sgrub dka' ba yang sgrub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gas
153a1(rgyud): ba'i dngos grung kyi rgyud de// chags pa dga' bas chags bral gyi// sems can don gyi yid byung nas// mu sngags lnga bar bya ba ste// lta ba ngan pa'i gcong drong ltung / 
153a2(rgyud): theg pa che la dgod pa'i phyir// ga srid pa'i dam tshig mchog yin te// de ltar shes na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs
153a3(rgyud): kyi dam tshig gsung ba'i dngos grub kyi spyad de// mu stegs can rnams gzhom pa'i phyir// 'byung ba'i tshe las thams cad 'byung // mi gtsang zhes ni ci phyir brjod// dras par dngos grub thob
153a4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// bud med chags phyir rin chen rnams// rtag
153a5(rgyud): tu legs par bsam par bya/ pad mdo bla med rin chen zhus// bsams na da ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi broka' bzhin du mdzad pas gsungs so// rigs thams
153a6(rgyud): cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas rgyu do// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i
153a7(rgyud): rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bud med rnams kyis yongs bskor la// kun nas brtses pa'i blang ba ni/ 
153a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas mchod phyir phul na yang // mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi
153b1(rgyud): 'i sa gru ga / rab drug lda d+d+he sa byu gA sa zla mdeb ste/ phyag dun kyis ni ma rmo pa gyi / bu na myur du 'gru ra gyur
153b2(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di na rdo rje'i tshogs kyi mchod pa'i dngos su khrigasang ba'i rgyu / hU~Mgs dam tshig rngu tsu sa nas kyang / skyesna paM bud mo ma byung nas kyang // mkhyung/ 
153b3(rgyud): gyun pa'i bde ba de// rdu li ni de ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dri gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni brad me'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud
153b4(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang por bdag bsgoms la// sdug po'i gdong la bltas nas ni// bltas par gyur pa'i bde ba de// phul na da ni 'grub par 'gyur// / zhes bcom ldan 'das pad mo'i spyan
153b5(rgyud): gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ lus kyi phyag rgya bcings gyur la// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas kyang // bud med mkhyud
153b6(rgyud): pa'i long spyod ni/ mchod phyir phul na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po chos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // dra nas
153b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
153b8(rgyud): po'i gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu dade// sangs rgyas su ni bdag bsgoms la// d+hI nas sus kyang mi tsher byar// gzhan gyi bud med rtswa byed na// mchod pa'i dngos
154a1(rgyud): grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // rdo rje
154a2(rgyud): jo ma byas nas kyang // rdo rje phreng ba brling bad cing // de nas rdo rje'i glu blangs pa// rdo rdza gar gyis mchod byas nas// 'dod pa'i dga' bas dpung bskur mcho ga// gla dang gar gyi bde
154a3(rgyud): ba las/ byed ba gzhan na yod man te// de phyir gsang mchod 'di bla med// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud du/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal
154a4(rgyud): sgom/ cho ga ji bzhin tshul du yang / gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod na ni// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs so// de la 'di
154a5(rgyud): ni pad mo'i rigs gsang po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgyar gnas// gsang ba'i tshul ni ji bzhin par// las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na// mchod pa'i dngos
154a6(rgyud): grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa sman ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor ba'i rigs kyi gsong ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 
154a7(rgyud): don kun grub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// gsang ba'i tshul ni ji bzhino par// las kyi phyag rgya rab mchod na// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsung
154a8(rgyud): so// rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i tshig rgyas pa'i rgyud do// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
154b1(rgyud): gyi de kho na nyid brjod pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// mdor na ting 'dzin ye shes lnga/ 
154b2(rgyud): sems can rnams la chags tshul gyis// srangs rgya sa nyid du 'grub 'gyur na// myur du bla mad thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni
154b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid chen po brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// sems can thog ma tha ma med// nam mkha' 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid can// kun du bzang po kun
154b4(rgyud): bdag nyid/ 'dod pa 'gro ba kun bdag po// sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// brtan phyir sems dpa' zhes bya'o// rdo rje mnyam par mnyam gzhag nas// nges par rdo rje nyid 'gyur te// 
154b5(rgyud): sems dpa'i byin brlabs tshul gyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid de// rdo rje 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs// rang sems rab tu rtogs la sogs/ 
154b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas byeng chub cho ga bzhi ni// de nyid bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// thams cad kyi ni rigs su 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das theg ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsungs so/ 
154b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs de nyid// de nyid rdo rje'i rigs su bshad// de nyid pad mo'i rigs dag pa/ de nyid nor bu'i rigs mchog go// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
154b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los gsungs so// rigs thams cad bskyed pa gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
155a1(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag ni rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan ma'i mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
155a2(rgyud): mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' nyid de// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs la gnas// mnyam par gzhag pas ting 'dzin te/ 
155a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grub// ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// 
155a4(rgyud): rab tu rtogs phyi rI rdo rje ste// bzung ba'i tshul gyis lcags kyu yin// phra mo rtogs phyir mda' yin la// mgu bar gyur phyir lags zhes bya// ka smras pa'i phyir na rin chen gsungs// gzi
155a5(rgyud): brjid tshul gyis nyi ma ste// rgyal mtshan legs par bsgreng bar gsungs// 'dzum pa'i bshad pas grags pa yin// 'dod chags dag phyir pad ma yin// ral gyi nyon mongs dgra gcing
155a6(rgyud): phyir/ dkyil 'khor tshul gyis 'kho'o ste// tshig gis brjod pa smra zhes bya// sna tshogs phyir ni kun rdo rje// mi tshugs tshul gyis go cha yin// 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis mche ba ste/ 
155a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i tshul gyis bsdams pa'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rtag pa// rdo rje sems dpa' kun 'gro ba// de bzhin rdo rje mtshan la sogs// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ 
155a8(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan mas mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na/ 
155b1(rgyud): rdorjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i skye bar 'gyur ba'i
155b2(rgyud): dngos grub gsung ba'i rgyud do// / rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// rdo rje dkI lA mo dkrung bcos la/  lag gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa las// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'grub ces/ 
155b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcings pa'i skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// ji ltar rgyal po nyid
155b4(rgyud): phyag rgyas de rgya lnga po'i khrims la 'di bsngo pa ltar// bdag nyid chen po skya rnams// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi/ gzugs brnyan gyi ni tshul du yang // nyid kyi phyag rgya sa btab pu ni/ 
155b5(rgyud): bdag nyid chen po'i phyag rgya cher// shes nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhu su bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen po sa gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcings pa skye bar
155b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i dngos grubo gsong ba'i rgyud de// ji ltar dam tshig dam pas ni// skye bo 'ga' ni bcings gyur no// shin du 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba// de ltar de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// 
155b7(rgyud): dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa yi// rdo rje bcing ba mchog bcings na// ma shi bar du mi 'da' bar// shes nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis
155b8(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i rigs bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// mdor na rgyal bas rdo rje dag/ 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te// 'di na bcing
156a1(rgyud): @par shen kyang des ni chos kyi dngos grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba'i skye bar
156a2(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang pa'i rgyud do// // rdo rje bka' dang las mang rnams// 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing // bka' dang ldan pa'i las da ni/ shes nas myur du 'grub par
156a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud do// // de nas
156a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di yang bdag gis yongs su bzung zhing bani gyis brlab
156a5(rgyud): so/ de nas yang de bzhi ni gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba 'di byin no// 
156a6(rgyud): legs so zhes bya rdo rje sems dbu' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje ches khyod legs pas te// rdo rje las ni khyod ldogs so// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin glo shags
156a7(rgyud): pa kun gyi gsung // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// de bzhin gshags pa thams ts+tshed kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ rig pa thams cad kyi brtag
156a8(rgyud): ma gseng ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos dam pa
156b1(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsus so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dum pa'i dngas gru kyi rgyud sa rgyas rjes so sprin du la gyis/  rgyas chos kyi na gyis
156b2(rgyud): nam mnam gzhig pasdu ba rnams na yang // bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'dres de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni de buzhin gshegs pa'i tshigs kyi
156b3(rgyud): rnam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud nga// chags pa'i rjes su dran tshul gyis// sems dpa' thams cud ting 'dzin gnas/ rab ma myi gzhag pas bsgom ldan ni/ dngos grub thams cad
156b4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi sa pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu de// khrims gsum rnam rgya
156b5(rgyud): tsha lugs su// bsgoms nas mdun du'ang de bzhin te// phyag na rdo rje'i mthur gyur nas/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs
156b6(rgyud): so/ de la 'di ni brang mo'i rigs kyi tshe sri dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rjes su ni/ bsgoms nas myur du de bzhin te// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan par/ 
156b7(rgyud): 'dul bar de ni rab byed do// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyi sku gsungs so// de la 'dri ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// don kun sgrub pa'i skur yang ni/ 
156b8(rgyud): bsgoms nas mdun du de bzhin te// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// phun sum tshogs don das thob bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungs rigs thams
157a1(rgyud): cad kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ ji bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di
157a2(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / sangs rgyasu rjes su dran 'gyur la// rdo rje pra mra'i tshul gyis ni/ badz+ra badz+ra zhes brjod na/ 
157a3(rgyud): srungs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgya sra bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 
157a4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin du// rdo rje phra mo bsgom byed cing / badz+ra sa twa zhes brjod na// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'grub bo// zhesra bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// 
157a5(rgyud): de la 'di na rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // khams gsum rnam rgyal chu lugs su// dran byed mdun du de bzhin te/ !hU~M hUM hUMHzhes brjod na/ dngos grub
157a6(rgyud): bla med thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so// da la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs kyis ni/ 
157a7(rgyud): rdo rje phra mo bskyed byed cing // shud d+ya shung+ga d+ha zhes brjod na// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i
157a8(rgyud): rigs kyi dngos grub kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// don kun grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni// rdo rje phreng bas bsgoms nas kyang // sid+d+ha sid+d+ha nas brjod na/ 
157b1(rgyud): don gyi dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das ner bu'i chos kyis gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// // de nas
157b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi du ma tshig gi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// TI shide la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de'i chos kyi
157b3(rgyud): ye shes dngos grub kyi rgyud du// dam pa'i chos ni yig mad// ting 'dzin ye shes las byung ba// a zhes pa des chos rnams ni/ 9/ skye ba med par bshad pa yin/ phyag rgya 'di yi tshul
157b4(rgyud): gyis ni/ shes rab kyis ni bsgoms nas ni/ yig kun gyis ye shes dngos// bdagashogs skad cig gis grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal de bzhin
157b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// de bzhin gshegs kun de nyid kyi// mdo sde 'di ni/ 
157b6(rgyud): dad pa yis// dad pas bcangs nas klags gyur na// dngos grub bla ma thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi
157b7(rgyud): dam pa'i chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud dade// sdig pa'i sems can pani don du// sdig can+da sdig spyod bzlog pa dang // sangs rgyas bka' ni bsrung ba dang / bsad pa byas nas 'grub
157b8(rgyud): par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'ong bzhi
158a1(rgyud): rnam par shes nas ni// pad+ma mo'i don ni yin par bshad// thog ma tha mar 'di bsgoms na/ chos kyi dngos grub myur du thob// ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa
158a2(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sems can kun la mngon sbyin byed// bsam/ 
158a3(rgyud): pa thams cad rdzogs byed cing // nor bu'i rigs kyi chos yin te// chos 'di bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rin chen gyis gsungs so/ 
158a4(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de// / de nas byang chub semus dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting rje
158a5(rgyud): 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs// de la 'odo ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi lus kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin
158a6(rgyud): lus sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrubs pa na/ 'di ni bsgrubs par byas na yang // dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so// 
158a7(rgyud): de la 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dnga'i ting 'dzin gyis/ b+hi myed las nI mang po rnams// sems dang
158a8(rgyud): kun bgyur thams cad kyang // shes na yong ni 'grub par 'gyuraro// nis bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni ji nags kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos chub kyi sbyin
158b1(rgyud): sdig pa dag pa'i rgyu yi phyir// sdig kun rab tu 'dul byed pa'i// sems can thams cad bsad pa la// dad par gyur na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ 
158b2(rgyud): so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sdig kun rnam par drug pa'i bdag/ kun las dga' bar dgos pa kun// des byed las ni yin no bar// shes
158b3(rgyud): na yang ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad mos gsungs so// de lnga 'dri ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sred ldan dbul ba thams cad kyi
158b4(rgyud): rtag tu bsam pa kun bkang la// don kun grub pa'i kun bdag ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// ces bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyis gsungs so// rigs thams
158b5(rgyud): cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cadwa kau phra mo'i yegs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// 
158b6(rgyud): dri la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rtag tu rdo rje phra mo'i tshul// 'brad pa kun gyis sbya rA na ni// rnam pa'i mchog ni kun ldan pa'i// mngon
158b7(rgyud): shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// slob
158b8(rgyud): dpon ma yin gzhan dang ni// slob min la min bu min pa'i// mdun du phyog rgya mi brjod de// de dag phyag rgya gsang bas 'grub// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// 
159a1(rgyud): de la 'di ni rje rje'i tshigs kyi mo m+b+hiHshes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ rje mo tshul gyis ni// snyunas hU~M b+hUHspun rtswar pa/ rdo rje khro bo'i nyid ba na gnas/ 
159a2(rgyud): grub thams rgyud 'grub par byed// zhus bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so/ de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// pad mchen po'i ti 'dzin
159a3(rgyud): gnas/ rdo rje phra mi'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje'i lta bas bltas na ni// 'dod chags dngos grab thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad me'i 'dod chags kyis gsangs so// de la 'di
159a4(rgyud): ni nor bu'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// shin du phra ba'i lta 'bar bas// don ni thams cad 'dun pa
159a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor busau gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi phra mo'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje
159a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mig gis ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi ye shes dngos grub kyi rgyud de// gang tsha phyag
159a7(rgyud): rgya'am ting nge 'dzin// sgrub phyir rtsol bar gyur pa na// gang tsha mkha' khams skar ma 'dra// dkar por gyur par des mthong na// de tshe blo ldan sangs rgyas kyi/ spyan ni bdag gis
159a8(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// de phyin chad ni sangs rgyas kyi// rtog pa kun las bsgrub par bya// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa
159b1(rgyud): rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes dngos grub kyi rgyud do// gnas dang 'gro ba de bzhin te// ji snyed dngos po yod gyur pa// ji snyed kyi ni gzugs brnyan rnams// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba'ang rung / 
159b2(rgyud): mkha' lo rgyug par mthong na ni// rdo rje n+dan ni rnam par dag/ shes nas mthong na dngos grub ni// bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur// nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// 
159b3(rgyud): la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ g.yas pa'am ni g.yon phyogs kyi// mkha' la nam mkha' dbyings nyid ni// sprin 'dra myur du 'khor bar ni// mig gis
159b4(rgyud): mthong bar gyur nas kyang // rdo rje lasra byung phyag rgya de// mthong na 'jigs par mi 'gyur la// phyag rgyud yang bzung nas ni// phyag rgya'i spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes
159b5(rgyud): gsungs so/ de lo 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi sbyin gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// // gang tsho skya dmar dkar ba dang / sAr po'i dkyil 'khor mthong 'gyur ba// de tshe dgongs pa nyid
159b6(rgyud): 'gyure zhing // 'khor lo'i spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad mos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// / mkha
159b7(rgyud): la rin chen 'dra ba dang // dbyings la sogs par 'dra bar ni// gang gi tshen ni mkha' mthong // da ni mkha' mig grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rigs
159b8(rgyud): thams cad kyi sbyin gyi ye shes kyi dngos drus kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi las
160a1(rgyud): dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las 'di dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// chos kyi dkyil 'khyer tshul du ni// 'dod chags
160a2(rgyud): bde ba rnam sbyin phyir// gsuM bo thams cad mchod byas na// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la
160a3(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud du// 'dod chags bdag casra sgom byed cing // gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas nas// rdo rje 'dod pas gzi can
160a4(rgyud): mnyam/ dngos grub dram pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bzhad pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje bzhad pa'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 
160a5(rgyud): khro bo bdag ces sgom byed cing // gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas na/ khrims gsum rnam par rgyal 'dra ba'i// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags
160a6(rgyud): pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// nang du song ba'i yid kyis ni// 'dod pa dam pa sgom byed cing // dbyangs ldan thig
160a7(rgyud): las sangs rgyas rnams// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan rasuM gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las
160a8(rgyud): dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdo rje snying por mnyam gzhag la// bsam pa g.yos pas ba tud na ni// phyag rgya rtag tu brtson byas na// dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyuraro// zhes
160b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i dpung bskul ba'i rin po chos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa
160b2(rgyud): chen po phyag na rje rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'dri gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dam tshig
160b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'dod pa lnga stsogs bde ba kun// rtag tu bdag ni snying la gnas// e ma'o sems can don rnams la// skyo bar gyur pa gang bshad rmad// 'di
160b4(rgyud): ni las kyi dam tshig ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin du// bsgoms pa'i sangs rgyas mchod na ni// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas
160b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gan
160b6(rgyud): sems can kun la bde byin pa'o// kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das 'did pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i
160b7(rgyud): rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sems can kun la phan byed pa'i// kun bzang khro bo bdag yin te// rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis/ mchod na dngos
160b8(rgyud): grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag ni rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i rgyud do// byed pa thams cad rab sbyin pa'i/ 
161a1(rgyud): kun bzang 'dod pas bdag yin te// bdag nyid 'gro 'dul skur gnas la// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad ma dam pas gsu
161a2(rgyud): 'di ni nir du'i kyi kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sems can kun la don cheni sbyin// kun bzang rgyal po ba gi yin te/ don kun grub pa
161a3(rgyud): gzugs kyis ni// mchid na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dang skye grub kyi chog
161a4(rgyud): rgyas pa'i rgyud do// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lus kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'ang
161a5(rgyud): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rang gi rig pa 'dzin pa yis// g.ya sro pa'i 'dzub mo 'dud pa yin// glo char bcings te spyi bor bzhag/ shin
161a6(rgyud): tA yang ni bsrungs par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rtsig
161a7(rgyud): pr-i la ni lnga 'dre bar// ri mo bris nas mtshan bsgreng ba// mnyes nas bud med gang bsams pa// da ni 'di yi dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// 
161a8(rgyud): de la 'don rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sa la gnod sbyin gdong bris la// de yi mig gi phyogs su ni// 'dzub me'i sen mo btsugs nas kyang / 
161b1(rgyud): med mchog ni 'dren par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// log pa gnyis su pad
161b2(rgyud): mo blangasa'adod chags dag par blta byed cing // rdo rje lta bas bud mud de/ bltas na yang ni dga' bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das phrad mo 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la
161b3(rgyud): 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gnas// lag pa gnyis ni nor bu bzang // hUM zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ni// bud med
161b4(rgyud): kun la 'dud bad do// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mo ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// / de nas byang chub sems
161b5(rgyud): dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// 
161b6(rgyud): mchod pa'i las kyi cho gar sbyar// grang dang gang gis dngos bsams pa/ de dang de yi gsol btab po// mkhas pas phyag rgya bsgrub par ba/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings
161b7(rgyud): kyis gsungs so/ de la 'di na dri bzhin gA shegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub dgos pa'i rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ gsang bya'i mchod pa rgyogar
161b8(rgyud): sbyoradagos pa gang gis smras pa de// myur du dngos grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos
162a1(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud dade/ khro bo'i ting 'dzin bzhags nas kyang // rigs kyi gsung ba'i rna drod chen byas// mkhas pas cung zad gang bsams pa// de ni myur
162a2(rgyud): du 'grub par 'gyur/ TI zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khro bos gsangs so// de la 'di na pad mo'i rigs kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud dka 'jig rten dbang po'i tshul 'dzin
162a3(rgyud): gyis yang gos mchod pa byas nas kyang // mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa// de yi dngos grub thams cad thob/ ces bcom ldan 'das pad mo 'dzin pas gsungs
162a4(rgyud): so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigis kyi las kyi dngos grub ki rgyud do// // rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ bdug pa la sogs mchod bas la// mkhas pas dgos pa gang
162a5(rgyud): bsams pa// da kun skad cig nyid kyis 'grub// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// 
162a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis
162a7(rgyud): brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis dengos grub kyi rgyud do// // sangs rgyas rnal 'byor te 'dzin gyis// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyi sa ni/ spangs rgyas phyag rgya rab bsgrubs pa'i// dngos
162a8(rgyud): grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sems dpa'i byin gyis
162b1(rgyud): brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sems dpa' zhes glags kun bdag nyid/ bdag gi lus la gnas pa ste// srams dpa' bdag ces byin brlabs pa/ 
162b2(rgyud): nga rgyal bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di
162b3(rgyud): ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du/ sems dpa' ji bzhin rgya de bzhin// phyag rgyad bzhin bdag de bzhin/ sgom pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ 
162b4(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rnyogs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de// chos kyi
162b5(rgyud): phyog rgya'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje phra mo bsgom bsal// ngag gi phyag rgya de dag kun/ sems dpa' chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun du spyan
162b6(rgyud): ris gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi byin gyi brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas kyi kun dbang bskur dang / mchod po'i
162b7(rgyud): dam tshig dngos grub rnams/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bsgoms nas kyang // rdo rje las rnams bsgrub par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// rigs thams
162b8(rgyud): rgyud kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das
163a1(rgyud): skyems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba/ phyag na rdo rje la legs so bya ba 'di byin no// legs so rdo rje sems dpa
163a2(rgyud): khyodad+hor+g+hA ts+tshats+tsha byed / rdo rje chos khyod legs pas te// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsung // theg pa chen po mngon
163a3(rgyud): 'das pa'i yang ni khaMts+tsha kyis bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i las rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// / 
163a4(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dma' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes chags su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// lta ba ngan cing chugs bral la// de do rje 'di ni mi rigs te// sems can
163a5(rgyud): kun la phrin don du// de bzhin cho ga bshad par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga
163a6(rgyud): rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de la 'di ni snying po'i yo byad dang cho ga rgya so pa'i rgyud yin
163a7(rgyud): to/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthong nas bdug pa dang // me tog dang / mar me dang dri'i phyag rgya rnams kyis mchod pa byas te/ de nas rdo rje'i tshig gis brtsam par bya'o// de la 'di ni
163a8(rgyud): bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te/ zla ba bzhir gnas ji bzhin rab tu 'dug ste/ du so bzhir bdug pa la sogs pos chog bzhin du mchod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
163b1(rgyud): thag pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan brgyad rtsa brgyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod de/ phyag rgya bzhis phyag bya ba'i tshul gos phyag pas la// sngags 'di bzhis bdag gi/ 
163b2(rgyud): lus dbul zhing mchod pa bya'o// oM saR+YA ta thA ga ta pa tsa A pa Sh+Ta ya/ ad ma naM ni ru ta ya mi saR+YA tA thA ga ta badz+ra sata a d+hi tiSh+Tha sa swa maM/ oM sa ru ta thA gau ta pr-I tsa a k+ShI sha ka ya ad ma naM nai ra ta ya mi
163b3(rgyud): saR+YA ta thA ga ta badz+ra ra da na oM b+hi Shi ni tsA maM/ au saR+YA ta thA ga tA pA tsa pra baR+Sha na ya a daM ma naM ni r+ya ta ya mi saR+YA ta thA ga te badz+ra d+harma pra baR+ShA na ya maM// au saR+YA ta thA ga taprA ts+tsha kar+m+ma ni Ad mA nAM ni r-i ta ya mi
163b4(rgyud): saR+YA ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ka ru maM// de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang // ma bral ba la kha zas kun dang 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod cing / bdag nyid snying po'i don du sangs
163b5(rgyud): rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan mngon du tshig tsam gyi sna bsgoms la// ci dga' bar byed cing // rdo rje'i tshig gis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ myur byar dngos grub du 'gyur ro// zhes bcom
163b6(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dap+tas gsungs so// ci ste bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'dod na ni/ de nas rus la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbus na bzhugs pa de'i sems dpa' chen po
163b7(rgyud): zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshu laM hUM khaM dog dang / rgyan rnams ci dga' bar byas ste// sems dpa' chen po rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs la/ rigs kyi lha mo rnams grwa bzhir bri'o// 
163b8(rgyud): de nas ri mo sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas la/ 'dzab bya ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du zla ba bzhi pa'i bar du bzlas por ba'o// de nas mthan mchod pa rgya cher byas la/ mtshan thog
164a1(rgyud): / b+hag bzlas phye bya'o// de nas nam longs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub dam pa thob pa Dogyur ro// zhes bcom ldan
164a2(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzan+ta k+Shas ga sa so// yang phyag rgya sgrub par 'dod na ni/ des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bA rnyings lA rA mi'i gzugs kyis sngar ci dag
164a3(rgyud): ba bzhin tu h+yA sukI la te/ rdo rje'i tshig gis 'bum bzlas par bya'o// da nas mtshan thog thag ngal mi bso bar cung zad tsam zhig phyag rgya bkrol la// ji lta ba bzhin du bcings te
164a4(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// de nas phyag rgya 'bar zhing 'ab la// 'phyar zhing smyo bar 'gyur ro// de phyag rgya bcing sla bzhin du nam mkha' la lding por 'gyur ro// gzugs ci dga' ba dang / mi snang
164a5(rgyud): bya dang / las thams cad kyang byid par 'gyur ro// bcings ma thag tu phyag rgya thams cad kyis las thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs
164a6(rgyud): so/ de nas ting nge 'dzin sgrub par 'dod na ni/ des rdo rje phra mo nas brtsams te// ting nge 'dzin dga' ba'i snying po'i rnal 'byor gyi tshul du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bsgoms la// de nas mtshan thog thug dkyil
164a7(rgyud): me dkrung ma bshig par snyoms par zhugs te 'dug par bya'o// de nas na ma langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de nas ji ltar
164a8(rgyud): 'dod pa de lta bur thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdorjesems dpas gsungs so// de nas las grub par 'dod na yid/ de bzhin bzlos shing zla ba gcig gis bar tu bsgrubs
164b1(rgyud): la/ de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thams cad kyi dngos grub du 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de nas la so shig
164b2(rgyud): bya bar 'dod na yangalan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang bdag dang gzhan dang grong dang grong khyer rnams/ go cha bcing ba la sogs pas bsrung bar 'gyur ro// dbab pa byas te tsan don dri zhim pos
164b3(rgyud): gdon gyis zan pa dang / gdon gyis ma zin pa rnams dang / rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang / mda' dang lag pa dang rin po che dang / nyi ma dang / rgyal mtshan dang / so'i phreng ba dang / ral
164b4(rgyud): gri dang pad mo dang / 'khor lo dang / lce dang / rdo rje rgya gam dang / go cha dang / mche ba dang / khu tshur dang / phyag rgya la sogs pa thams cad la lan cig brjod pas 'bebs par
164b5(rgyud): byed do// sgyu ma'i las kyang byed de/ rma bya'i 'jug ma'i nang du rdo rje bcug ste/ bcings la/ de la rma bya'i 'jug ma de sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la/ de bzhin
164b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bA cas kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas rma bya'i 'jug malas gzugs sna tshogs la sogs
164b7(rgyud): pa snang bar 'gyur te/ de phyin chad rma bya'i'ajug ma rang gi lus la cho ga bzhin du gzugasa? hA thams cad ston te/ 'jug ma de nyid la lan gA cig bzlas te
164b8(rgyud): bsko rlabs kyanibadag nyid las gzugs thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro// 'jug ma de nyid kyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu ma'i lus rnams kyang ston/ sangs rgyas
165a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs brnyan yang ston// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad zhing khyams thams cad no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
165a2(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khon dang bcas pa la sogs pa rnams kyi bdu sde dang bcas pa la sogs pa 'dul ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rol pa mdzad pa rnams kyang ston pa nas// bdag nyid
165a3(rgyud): las rnams pa'i cho ga thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyang ston pa'i bar du'o// de nas dbang du byed par 'dod na yang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'
165a4(rgyud): rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la// phyag rgya de 'bar bar gyur pa'i bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par
165a5(rgyud): byed cing dbang du byed na// sems dpa' gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos// ji ste 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub grub par 'dod na yang / des dang po kho nar de bzhin du
165a6(rgyud): zlos shing // zla ba cig tu brgya stong bzlas la// de nas mthar phyag rgya bcings la// de bzhin du mtshan thog thag phyag rgya 'bar gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o// de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings
165a7(rgyud): tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi dngos grub dang // rigs 'dzin gyi dngos grub gang yang rung gcig tu 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin paso gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs
165a8(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi ma byung dang chog rgyam po rdzogs s+ho// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi ye byed dang // cho ga rgyas pa 'di yin te/ de la dang pon sngar bsnyen pa byas te/ de ltar
165b1(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin du// yi ge'i 'bru 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de'i mtha' mar mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas par bya'o// de phyin chad sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / ka chad pas
165b2(rgyud): bcad nus par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// 'on te sgrub par 'dod na yang // de ji lta ba bzhin du ri mo'i sku gzugs bris la des de bzhin du mchod pa byas la/ 
165b3(rgyud): zla ba gcig 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing dga' ba bzhin du byas nas brgya stong du bzlas pa du sa bzhir rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas shing zla ba'i mthar phyin pa dang / ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher
165b4(rgyud): byas nas/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ phyag rgya bcings pa de la hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra byung gi bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po dbang phyug chen po la sog
165b5(rgyud): po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mdun du gnas nag nod par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs 'dzin gyis 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o// gang tshe ngas khyod tshur shog/ 'di byos shig ces bsgre ba de'i tshe khyod
165b6(rgyud): 'dir 'ongs la nga'i bka' bzhin du byos shig dang phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag par 'gyur ro// yud tsam gyis kyang sa gsum po thams cad la ci dga' bar bka' stsol
165b7(rgyud): cig tubaskor te slar 'ongs nas kyang phan gdags pa dang chad pas bcad pa rnams byed cing // lha rdzas kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi longs spyod la nye bar spyad nas/ ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du
165b8(rgyud): byed cing lha rnams kyi dbang po'i bud med la sogs pas mgu bar byas nas/ nye bor spyod kyang su gang gis nus pa med de// hUM zhes bya bas lnga la sogos pa ma rungs pa cad gnon mi
166a1(rgyud): don skye bskal po chung du sdong gi yun du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci ste phyag rgya sgrub par 'do do na yang // ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas
166a2(rgyud): pa byas la/ zla ba'i mahAHdzA dz+dza hUM zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la mtshan thog thag du bzlas pa bya'o// de nas na ma longs pa dang / phyag rgya 'grub po rI 'gyur ro// de nas hUM zhes bya ba dang ldan par ji lta
166a3(rgyud): ba'i cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya bcing sel// nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / gzugs sna tshogs ston pa dang / mi snang bar gyur pa dang / sgyu ma snams ston pa dang / thams cad dbab pa dang / dgog pa dang / dbang du bya
166a4(rgyud): ba dang / thams cad kyi dga' ba bskyed par bya ba dang / rin po che thams cad bsdu ba dang / 'od zer 'bar ba chen po bstan pa dang / rin po che'i tsher 'bebs par bstan po dang / gad mo chen mo dgod par bstan
166a5(rgyud): pa dang / sems can thams cad sbyang bar bstan pa dang / bcad pa dang / dbye ba dang dus kyi 'khor lo bsgyur ba dang / ji lta bzhin de kho na nyid brjod pa dang / las thams cad 'jug pa dang / bsrung ba dang / rmongs
166a6(rgyud): pa dang gnod pa dang / sdigs pa dang / bsad pa dang / sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i dngos po la 'jug pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / dngos po thams cad klu len du 'jug pa dang / 
166a7(rgyud): gar byed du 'jug pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang dbab pa la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci ste rdo rje phra mo sgrib par
166a8(rgyud): 'dod na yang / des rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nas brtsams shing // bsgoms zhing de bzhin du bzlas pa'i tshul gyis zla ba gcig tu bsgrub par bya ste/ de nas mthar ting nge 'dzin nyid kyis mtshan gcig
166b1(rgyud): thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang / mngon par shes pa lngar gyur pas// sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa tshar gcad par nus par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom
166b2(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci ste las sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du yang bzlas shing zla ba gcig tu bsgrubs na/ de nas mtshan theg thag tu bzlas par bya'o// des las thams
166b3(rgyud): cad grub par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de rnams thams cad byed par 'dod na yang lan gcig brjod de// yid kyis bsams pas bsrung ba la sogs pa
166b4(rgyud): las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// / de nas pad mo'i rigs kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te// de la dang
166b5(rgyud): por 'bum bzlas par byas na bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa byas te/ ras la bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba la sogs pa bris la/ de'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor
166b6(rgyud): bzhi'i tshul du rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi bris la/ grwa rnams su lha mo rnams bri'o// de nas bzlas pa'i cho ga de bzhin du rgyas par byas la/ zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas te/ 
166b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba byon te/ dus ji bzhin par mchog gi skabs 'byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ji ste phyag rgya bsgrubs
166b8(rgyud): par 'dod na/ yang des de bzhin du pad me rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la// stong phrag brgyad du brjod pas dus bzhin bzlas pa bya'o// de nas mthur mtshan thog thag tu phyag rgya bcings te/ 
167a1(rgyud): bzlas pa bas rnanas longs nas dngos grub du 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcings pas ji lta bzhin du 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byed do// zhes bcom ldan
167a2(rgyud): 'das kun tu sman ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// ci ste ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul bsgrub par 'dod na yang / de bzhin du zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu ji lta bur dag
167a3(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas pa bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// ci ste
167a4(rgyud): las bsgrub par 'dod na yang / de bzhin bzlas pa zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
167a5(rgyud): pas gsungs so// pad ma'i rigs kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang po kho na de bzhin
167a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la phyag rnam pa bzhi byas la 'bum bzlas pa bya'o// de nas de bzhin du ras la bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa nyid dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du bris la/ de nas
167a7(rgyud): de bzhin du mchod pa byas ste/ de bzhin du bsgrubs la// zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag du bzlas pa bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
167a8(rgyud): cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byin nas/ dbang bskur ba sbyin par mdzad do// dbang bskur ba des stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
167b1(rgyud): khams der rigs 'dzin gyi 'khor lo bsgyur bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci ste phyag rgya sgrub par 'dod na yang / de bzhin du chos kyi rdo rje ma'i tshul gyis rdo rje rin po
167b2(rgyud): myu gu yis// phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bsgribs na bsgom pa thams cad kyi las byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci ste nor bu'i ye shes bsgrub par 'dod
167b3(rgyud): ni yang / des de bzhin du rdo rje rin po 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ji lta bzhin du bsgom par bya// dngos po med pa'i nam mkha' las rin po che ji ltar 'byung / rin pa che las byang chub sems dpa'i sku
167b4(rgyud): ji ltar 'byung / zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dus bzhir bsgoms la/ ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin bzlas par bya'o// de nas zla ba'i mthar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan gcig thog thag tu
167b5(rgyud): bzlas pa bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin nas/ ci dga' ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos
167b6(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas las bsgrub pa bshad de/ de bzhin du bzlas pa zla ba'i mthar mtshan thog thag bzlas pa bya'o// de nas na ma langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos don thams
167b7(rgyud): cad grub par 'gyur te/ de nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// nor bu'i rigs kyi yo byad dang tshi ga rgyas pa rdzogs ste/ 
167b8(rgyud): de nas rigs thams cad kyi mthun mong du sgrub pa'i yi byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa ni 'a dag yin te/ de la dang po'i snying po thams cad kyis byed dang // chog rgyas pa bshad do// snying po sgrub par
168a1(rgyud): 'dod na ya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub par gyur cig ces brjod la/ snying po ci dgar bzlas shing sgrub pa'i cho ga bya'o// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i yo
168a2(rgyud): dang cho ga ste phyag rgya thams cad bdag la dga' bar gyur cig ces smras la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/ ji ltar dga' bar ci nus kyis bzlas pa bya'o/ da nas ji lta ba bzhin du dngos grub du
168a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi yo byad dang chog ste/ spros pa med pa'i tshig thob par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bye dag la skye bar gyur cig ces smras
168a4(rgyud): la/ sngags ci dga' bar bzlas par bya ste/ 'di ni dngos grub bo// de la 'di ni rig pa'i yo byad dang cho ga ste/ kye ma sems can 'di dag thams cad ni ma rig pas mdongos par 'gyur ro// de
168a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rigs pa thugs su chud cing sdom par gyur to// zhes smras la rig pa ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin
168a6(rgyud): pas gsungs so// de nas snying po dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang rig pa thams cad ji ltar dga' ba nyid du bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa nyid du yin te/ sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang
168a7(rgyud): sngags dang rig pa rnams bzlas pa'i don du sgrub pa rnams bya ba'i don du bdag sems dpar bsgoms nas/ bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs
168a8(rgyud): so// rigs thams cad dang thun mong du bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// / de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrubs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang po
168b1(rgyud): nor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dngos grub ni 'di yin te/ nor grub pa'i dngos grub dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub dang // rigs 'dzin gyi dngos grub dang / dngos grub chen po rnams so// de
168b2(rgyud): la nor bu sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ gang na gtor yod par dogs pa der phyag rgya bcings la/ rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas ste gnas der rdo rje'i lta bas bltas na/ ci ste rdo rje lta bur yang bar mthong na/ de na
168b3(rgyud): gter yod par shes par bya'o// de nas rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya bcings nas bskor te/ ji ltar dga' ba nyid du blangs na brtsod pa med par thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
168b4(rgyud): dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/ phyag rgya gang sgrub pa byed pa na badz+ra sid d+hi zhes brjod par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub ni rnam pa bzhi yod de/ de la 'di ni
168b5(rgyud): 'di ltar chu'i steng nas phar 'gro zhing 'dug pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs su ston pa dang / ji srid du dga' ba de srid du mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / nam
168b6(rgyud): mkha' la 'gro ba dang dpag tshad stong gi steng na lding ba dang / 'og tu 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong du dga' bar song ba bskor te/ slar 'di ba dang dpag tshad stong kho ma khom
168b7(rgyud): yug gi sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pa dang / dngos po thams cad mig gis mthong zhing rna bas thos pa dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong kho ra khor yug du gnas pa'i bud med
168b8(rgyud): thams cad ci dga' bar phrang du blangs te 'gug pa dang / gser dang nor bu dang mu tig la sogs pa dbyig thams cad dang / nor thams cad phyogs kyang sus kyang cung zad brgal bar mi nus
169a1(rgyud): te bdag gi rdo rjes kyang mi thub par gyur na/ gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos// skyes bu stong phrag bcu bsdoms pa'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan
169a2(rgyud): pabapa dang / rtag tu 'dod pa thams cade la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu dar la ba ba cing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
169a3(rgyud): cad mthong zhing rdo rje'i dngos grub bla na med pas mchod pa byedade cing / lo stong phrag bzhi'i bar du 'tshe bar 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dngos
169a4(rgyud): grub gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/ phyag rgya bsgrubs na rdo rje'i rigs 'dzin zhes brjod do// grub pa dang rdo rje'i rigs 'dzin gyi 'khor lo
169a5(rgyud): bskor bar bskor bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig gcig gis bskor zhing / slar 'ong zhing bde ba thams cad la
169a6(rgyud): longs sbong po dang / lo bcwo brgyad pa'i tshod dang ldan pa dang / sku 'khyil pa dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje chen po'i rigs 'dzin du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje sems dpa'
169a7(rgyud): thams cad mthong zhing / bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni dngos
169a8(rgyud): grub chen po sgrub pa yin te/ bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po'i don du bdag nyid kyis phyag rgya bsgrubs na/ sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur nas/ skad cig gis kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
169b1(rgyud): khams thams cad du/ gzugs sA tshogs bya ba sA tshogs byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rdza sems dpar bcas pa thams cad mthong nas/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i de
169b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod shes yang rtag par mchod nas/ sems can ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don byas nas/ slar ljongs te 'jig rten gyi khams tham su cad kyi rnam pa'i mchog
169b3(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad la spyod cing / rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub masapar gyur nas/ tshe'i tshad ma lus shing lus
169b4(rgyud): pa med pa'i bskal pa chen po'i tshad du 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos gru ba chen pos gsungs so la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub yin te/ yang 'di/ 
169b5(rgyud): ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub dang / dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / yang bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grubA dang / dngos grub dam pa rnams
169b6(rgyud): so// de ni 'di ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub yin te/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ dbang phyug chen po rkang pa g.yon pas man ni te bsgrub
169b7(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas gzugs de skad 'byin pa dang / hUM zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o// hUM zhes bya ba brjod tsam gyis/ dbang phyug la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po rnams cad bdag pi 'a
169b8(rgyud): dang bcas pa rnams sgrub pa po'i mdun du bka' nyan cing dbang du gyur par 'gyur ro// de phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po'i rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la
170a1(rgyud): / 'gro zhing 'jig NA na gsum po'i 'khor lo thams cad kun du bskor ste/ slar 'ongs nas lha ma rungs pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad hUM zhes bya bas 'dul bar byed do/ 
170a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i gzugs dang ldan pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad bka' nod cing / rdo rje sam+b+ha sa dpyan bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
170a3(rgyud): mthong nas/ mnyes par byed cing lo steng du 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsangs so// de la 'di ni dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dngos grub ste phyag na
170a4(rgyud): sgrub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dang por bdag nyid dbang bskur ba la bsgrub par bya ste// des grub pa dang dbang rnam pa bzhir
170a5(rgyud): gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbang drang rin po che'i dbang dang / chos kyi debata dang las kyi dbang rnams so// de la rdo rje'i dbang tho na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rin pa
170a6(rgyud): tshe'i dbang gis ni rin po che thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbang gis ni chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// las kyi dbang gis ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las
170a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyurazhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni bde ba dang mid bde ba thams cad kyi
170a8(rgyud): dngos grub ste/ de la 'di lta ste rtag tu gisar ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// sa
170b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yod bde bas gsungs so// la 'di ni dngos grub dam pas ste/ de yang 'di ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dnga'adag myunyam mo nos ban
170b2(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di dag ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te/ da ni 'di ltar menyes par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bsrung bye du pad mo'i dngos grub rnams
170b3(rgyud): se de la mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te/ ji ltar pad mo 'dod pa bsgoms na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems dpa' thams cad mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ 
170b4(rgyud): bdag nyid 'jig rten rjes su dran par byas nas sems dpa' thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro// byams pas 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba dang / sba ba
170b5(rgyud): dang skyab nus par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid pad mo'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la/ pad mo lag par blangs te bsgrubs na/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rnam pa'i
170b6(rgyud): mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing lo stong phrag bzhir 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pad+ma mis gsungs so// de la 'di dag ni nor bu'i
170b7(rgyud): rigs kyi dngo glub rnams te/ de yang 'di myur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dbang gis dngos grub dang / gzi brjid chen po dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
170b8(rgyud): pa dang / rin po tshe 'ang rjes grub rnams so// des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub ni 'di lta ste/ nyid kyis dbang bskur dbul ba da // mon me dbul ba nga
171a1(rgyud): ni nus kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rin po che'i sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod na ring po ma
171a2(rgyud): thogs par mngon par grub bo/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po ches gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi thun mong ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa
171a3(rgyud): rdzogs s+ho// / de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi spyi'i thabs kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sam sna pas gsungs so// de la dang po kho
171a4(rgyud): nAn+da snying pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten 'dul ba ji lta ba/ de 'dra bar ni dngos grub 'dod// de ni thabs kyi phyag rgya ste// dngos grub chen po kun sbyin no// de la 'di ni phyag rgya
171a5(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten tshogs dang bral bas 'dul// phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags las skyes// de'i thabs ni sgom pas ste// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// de la 'di ni sngags kyi
171a6(rgyud): thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bden las 'jog rten 'di nyams pas// sngags kyi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// spros pa med pa'i thabs kyis ni// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// de la 'doni
171a7(rgyud): rig pa'i thabs kyi dngos grub ste// ma rig mngon chags 'di la ni// rig pa'i dngos grub yod min te// de yi thabs ni rgya che bas// dngos grub kun gyi mechog thob bo// rtog thams cad kyi thabs kyi
171a8(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la dang po
171b1(rgyud): kho nar snying po thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas ni// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te// bsod nams med kyang sangs rgyas mchod// dngos grub 'di la
171b2(rgyud): the tsom med// de la 'di ni phyag mar bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// dam tshig gsang ba bsrungs na ni// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te// bsod nams med kyang myur bar ni// dam tshig bsrungs
171b3(rgyud): na 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di sngogs kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas mtshan las sogs brjod na// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te// bsod nams med kyang myur bar
171b4(rgyud): ni/ chos sbyin pas ni dngos grub thob// de la 'di ni rigs pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// bsod nams nang na sbyin pa mchog/ byin pas bsod nams thob 'gyur te// sbyin pa'i pha rol
171b5(rgyud): phyin rdzogs na// myur du sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// rtog pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes
171b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la dang po kho nor snying bri mi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ yi ge a las 'jun cing // yi ge thams cad rnam pasgom
171b7(rgyud): / rang gi kha nas gzhan nul du// bsgom na dngos grub thob phyir 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dpal gyis gsungs so// de la 'a
171b8(rgyud): phyag rgya'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ shes dbings 'bigs zhes bya ba// ting nge 'dzin zhes grags pas so// des ni phyag rgya mur grub par// bsgomasan dngas grwa'i zin par 'thu na
172a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shes rab mchog gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni sngags kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ shes rab skya'i rjes 'brangs la// ting 'dzin mchog ni rab
172a2(rgyud): spros na/ de bsgoms nas ne myar klung yang // sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje blo gros kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ga d+ha T+Ti rlob kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 
172a3(rgyud): rlig dang sngags gnyis khyad par du// khyad par yod pa ma yin te// shes rab bsgoms na myur bar ni// nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
172a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi ye shes kyis gsungs so// rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub gyi tshig rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o/ 
172a5(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la dang po kho nar snying po thams cad kyi tshogs kyi ngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa thams cad rab mchod na// dge ba yi ni chos rnams kyi// 
172a6(rgyud): tshogs ni rnam par 'phel 'gyur te// de rnams tshogs ni 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi tshogs kyi rgyud de/ 'khor lo mang po zhugs pa dang // dkyil 'khor mang po bris
172a7(rgyud): pa'i phyir// tshogs rdzogs pas na phyag rgya rnams// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni sngags kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rjes su yid rang la sogs tshul// de bzhin dam pa'i
172a8(rgyud): chos klogs kyang // bzlas pa mang po byas na ni// nges par sdigs kyi dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni rig pa'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ma rig rab tu spangs pa dang // smin pa'i pha rol phyin
172b1(rgyud): tshul las// tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs nas kyang // myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
172b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la ji ltar rdo rje 'byung zhes na/ de nyid bcom ldan sems dpas ste// thams cad sems te/ 
172b3(rgyud): nyid bdag po// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje ni// sems dpa' brtan par rang 'byung gi/ sems dpa' kun gyi mchog sems dpa'// rdo rje snying khar rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar
172b4(rgyud): grags/ 'di la rdo rje rab tu gnas// de nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni// ye shes tshul te mnyam med 'od// snying la sna tshogs byung nas ni// sna tshogs pa yi gzugs gyur te// khams gsum kun gyi
172b5(rgyud): rdul snyed du// de dag nyid ni rgyal ba yin// rdo rje'i sku ni de rnams las// rdo rje sems dpar yang dag 'gyur// sems dpa' dang po de nyid las// mtshan ma thams cad yang dag 'byung / 
172b6(rgyud): mtshan ma las nas ni sems dpa' che// de las tshul 'di thams cad 'byung // gang gis 'di ni thos gyur ni// dad cing 'dzin byed snying khor yang // rtag tu dga' bas bsgoms na ni// de ni
172b7(rgyud): myur du 'grub pa thob// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub
172b8(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag ni rdo rjes rtog pa thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems
173a1(rgyud): kyi rtog pa byang ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtog med pa'i// ye shes rtog pa nyid 'gyur ba'i// mi rtog pa i ye shes las// brtags pas rtog
173a2(rgyud): pa zhes brjod do// de la 'di ni ngo bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ mi rtog gang la rtog bdag nyid// brtags pas rtog las byung ba yi// rdo rje sems dpa' sems
173a3(rgyud): dpa' che// de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i rgyud de/ cho ga bzhin du ri mo bris// rtog pa grub phyir zhes rtog so// rtog dang bral ba'i bdag nyid kyis
173a4(rgyud): de phyir rtog pa zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad me'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ rtog pa las ni 'dod chags 'byung // pad me la ni de gnas te// de phyir rtog la gnas pa
173a5(rgyud): ni/ grub pa nyid du de 'gyur ro// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ rtog pa med pa'i nor bu ni// mthu yis shin du mchog du 'gyur// de ltar rnam par mi rtog las
173a6(rgyud): lha rdzas dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi bdag po 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi snying
173a7(rgyud): po 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de// yid kyis 'dod pa tshe ga yis// yid kyi 'dod pa dngos grub ste// ting 'dzin sgrug nyid la gnas// de'i phyir snying po zhes brjod do// de nas rtog pa thams cad
173a8(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog/ khrims ni 'da' dka' mi phyed bzhin// bdag nyid chen po'i gzugs brnyan gyi// mtshan ma phyag rgya zhes byar grags// 
173b1(rgyud): do nas de dag thams cad kyi sngags 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing // dbye bar dka' ba gsang ba nyid// gsang ba grub phyir brjod pas na// de yi phyir ni sngags zhes brjod// 
173b2(rgyud): de nas rig pa 'byung ba ye shes kyi rgyud de/ ma rlig pa ni gzhom pa dang // ngag gi rig mchog grub pa'i phyir// rtogs shing rig pa'i dngos grub ste// de phyir rig pa zhes brjod do// zhes bcom ldan 'das
173b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po la sogs pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi 'byung ba'i rgyud de/ de la dang po kho nar snying po'i ye
173b4(rgyud): shes kyi skye ba'i rgyud yin te/ snying po bzlas te bdag gi ni// gzhan yang rung ste 'byung ba dang // byung dang 'byung 'gyur gang gis ni// thos shing mthong 'gyur shes par bya// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i
173b5(rgyud): ye shes kyi 'byung ba'i rgyud de/ bdag gi cho ga ji bzhin du// gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya bcing // 'jig rten pa la bltas na ni// gong ma bzhin du kun shes 'gyur// de la 'di ni sngags kyi ye shes
173b6(rgyud): 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te// lan cig tsam yang sngags brjed na// 'das dang 'byung dang 'byung gang yin// rang gi lce la smra 'gyur ba// de bdag thams cad bden par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan
173b7(rgyud): 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rig pa'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud de/ rig pa lan cig brjod na ni// byung dang 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rnams// ji ltar rdo rje'i
173b8(rgyud): bka' ba zhin du// yid kyis de ni shes pa ru 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi skye ba'i tshig rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// de nas rigs thams cad pa'i thun mong ba'i gsang ba
174a1(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud yin te/ de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar de ltar 'dug
174a2(rgyud): nas kyang dkyil mo dkrung byas bsgrub pa ste// ji ltar ri mo'i tshul byas nas// sems dpa' chen po 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje senas dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni
174a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'o sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar ri mo'i tshal du ni// brkyang bskum tshul du rab gnas na// shin du bsgribs nas bsgrub par bya// the tsom med par 'grub
174a4(rgyud): par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// de li 'di ni pad me'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrib pa'i rgyud yin te/ rdo rje dkyil mo dkrung bcas pa// 
174a5(rgyud): lan gnyis rdo rje bcings nas kyang / ting nge 'dzin gyi skur gyur la// pad mo'i 'byung ba bsgrub par ba// zhes bcom ldan 'das pade mo'i sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i
174a6(rgyud): rigs kyi gsang ba'i skra'i sgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar 'dage gam nyal ba'am// 'chag kyang rung ste de ltar na// rdo rje rin chen dbang bskor na// the tsom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom
174a7(rgyud): ldan 'das rin chen snying pos gsungs // de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de// lce rtse shin du mi bskul zhing // so dang mchu gnyis sbyar
174a8(rgyud): nas ni/ rtog pa thams cad bsgrubi bya zhing // sgra bral rdo rje'i tshig yin no// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsung / gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud
174b1(rgyud): yin te/ hUM zhes bya ba 'brug sgrar bsgrags// khro bo'i ngag ni zab cing brtan// rdo rje chen po khro bo gsal// rdo rje khro bo'i gsung grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so// 
174b2(rgyud): de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de// dbugs mi 'byin ltar dbugs 'byin pa// phral ba'i tshig ni shin du gsal// ting 'dzin ye shes snying po yis// 
174b3(rgyud): zlos pa po rnams 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying pos gsungs so// de la 'di nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba gsung
174b4(rgyud): phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de// shin du yongs su gsal tshig gis// rtag tu 'dud la brtson byed cing // tshul 'di bzlas par gyur na ni// myur du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das
174b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ rtag tu 'dod pa bcom ldan 'das// sems
174b6(rgyud): can thams cad bde sbyin pa// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid du// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang
174b7(rgyud): ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyad do// sem can kun la phan pa dang // ma rungs pa rnams gdul ba dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// khro bo dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes
