174b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// ji ltar pad morab
175a1(rgyud): chags pa bsgos pa'i skyon gyi mi gos la// de ltar bdag gi chags skyon yang // srid na chags pas de 'grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad mo 'dod pas gsung
175a2(rgyud): so/ de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ nam zhig sems can thams cad kyi// dgos pa'i don ni kun bsgrub cing // rin chen chur 'bebs par 'gyur
175a3(rgyud): zhes/ grub na myur du de 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub
175a4(rgyud): pa'i rgyud de/ ji ltar langs sam 'dug pa'am// 'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni// lag pa g.yon pa phyag rgya mchog/ thams cad byed na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de
175a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ de lta de ltar gnas nas kyang // ji lta ji ltar byed
175a6(rgyud): par rung // rdo rje khro bo'i 'dzub mo bcing // gos kyis g.yogs na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rgyal pos gsungs so// de la
175a7(rgyud): 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi gas de bya'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ lag pa g.yon pas pad mo yi// khu zur btsangs te sbas nas ni// ji dga' myur du pad mo yi// dngos grub kyang ni
175a8(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsung ba'i rdo rje phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// g.yon pa
175b1(rgyud): na chen khu tshur ni// bcings te dam pa'o lag g.yon par// ci dga' bar ni rim gro byed// rin chen dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs
175b2(rgyud): so/ de la 'di ni rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rigs thun mong gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do/ rang gi sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du ni// rdo rje'i ngag dang rdo rje'i lha/ 
175b3(rgyud): ring por mi thogs mchog grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'ongs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi gas rdo ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs
175b4(rgyud): rdo rje phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bos nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
175b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa 'di byin gyis brlabs pa mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas yang legs so zhes bya ba 'di byin no// 
175b6(rgyud): rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen
175b7(rgyud): khyod legs so// rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsngos pa las/ rgyud thams cad kyi phyi
175b8(rgyud): ma'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab bo// 
176a1(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa' che// sems dpa' don mchog bdag nyid can// shAkya'i rgyal po ye shes che// rdo rje'i bdag nyid khyod phyag 'tshal// sems dpa' 'byung
176a2(rgyud): pe de nyid don// sems can rgyu ste tshul chen po// sems can don chen dgos pa'i don// sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas rgyas ni chos chen po// chos kyi 'khor
176a3(rgyud): lo rab bskor ba// smra ba chen po rib rig mchog/ sems dpa' chen po khyod phyag 'tshul// las chen dga' ba chen po ste// las rnams thamasu rnyed rab sgrub ste// bdag nyid chen pa
176a4(rgyud): 'gro spyod mchog/ sems dpa' rgyud khyod phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol phyin pa kun mnyes pa// kun mkhyen ye shes mkhyen pa po// sems dpa' kun te the bos chen po// shes rab tshon
176a5(rgyud): po khyod phyag 'tshal// thugs rje chen po mchog gi mchog/ thugs rje thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// thams cad gtong la byams pa che// kun mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shAkya'i seng/ 
176a6(rgyud): gang shAkya che// shakya shAkya thab pa che// 'dul ba chen po khyab pa po// bkri don 'dul mchog khyod phyag 'tshal// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mnyes pa// chos dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa ste// 
176a7(rgyud): rdo rje mgon po mgon cheni po// sems can tshogs ni khyod phyag 'tshal// 'od chen snang ba chen po ste// brtson 'grus chen po stobs chen po// dpa' bo chen po rab dpa' mchog/ bde spyod dpa'
176a8(rgyud): bo khyod phyag 'tshal// tshangs pa rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das// shAkya dpa' bo thub pa che// kun dga' thub pa dge pa yi// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i sku ste sku yi mchog
176b1(rgyud): sku gsum sku min sgom pa'o// kun gyi sku ste sku che ba// rdo rje'i sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo// gsung min gsung ste gsung gi mchog/ gsung ga sum gsung min ston pa po// gsung kun rgyu shin du gsu
176b2(rgyud): che ba/ rdo rje gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sems min sems te sems kyi mchog/ sems gsum sems min ston pa po// thams cad sems te sems che ba// rdo rje'i sems khyod phyag 'tshal
176b3(rgyud): lo/ rdo rje min te rdo rje'i mchog/ rdo rje gsum po rdo rje min// rdo rje thams cad rdo rje che// rdo rje rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// kun khyab srid pa'i rtse mo mchog/ bde gshegs bdag po rgyal ba ni// khams
176b4(rgyud): gsum pa'i rgyal po che// rnam snang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// gang zhig skad cig nyan byed dam// klog gam yang na bsgom pa'ang rung // kun gyis sangs rgyas
176b5(rgyud): nyid thob 'gyur// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang // chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam
176b6(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bka' stsal pa'i tshig gsan nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom
176b7(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// yang gcig tu 'dul bar mdzad par gsol// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsung
176b8(rgyud): so rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu// sangs
177a1(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang // 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mdun du rdul phra mo ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du kun du khyab par byas nas/ 
177a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag ni rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa
177a3(rgyud): bzhi gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul ba yi// rdo rje/ brer lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de
177a4(rgyud): bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad kyi rdal shin du phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dukyilu 'khor rnams su// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis/ rdo rje
177a5(rgyud): dbyings la sogs pa rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
177a6(rgyud): pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsu
177a7(rgyud): ma thag tu// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing khyams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum las
177a8(rgyud): rnam par rgyal bas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun du spyan ras
177b1(rgyud): gzigs kyi dbang pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul ba yi// pad mo'i 'khor lo rab
177b2(rgyud): tu bskor// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin du phra mo ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snrusnams kyi chos kyi rgyal po
177b3(rgyud): pad mo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du/ 
177b4(rgyud): sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul ba'i phyir// nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems
177b5(rgyud): can phra ba 'am/ sbom pa yang rung ste de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ri'i rgyal po'i rtse mor rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che'i lus byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par de bzhin
177b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdan la bzhugs nas// rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bskor bar phyogs kun nas mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag
177b7(rgyud): na rdo rjes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// mi yi nang du babs nas kyang // dgos pa'i don phyir sems can don// rdo rje 'khor lo mchog bskor zhing // mgon mo rab tu sgrub par
177b8(rgyud): mdzod de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang cog tu 'dre bar mdzad
178a1(rgyud): / du gsol// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cag cig tu 'dus nAs// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa ra snang mdzad kyi thugs khur zhugs so// de nas
178a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ska dang / gasbyong phyogs rdo rjer bdag nyid gyur par mkhyen nas/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsang
178a3(rgyud): so/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyang nga'i thugs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rigs thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
178a4(rgyud): dang nga'i thugs su zhugs shig/ de nas bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnang nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// 
178a5(rgyud): mdor na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// zhugs nas sems can thams cad la// phan pa'i phyir ni bsgrub par bya// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu// 'jig
178a6(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs rnams las// de bzhin gshegs pa re res 'jig rten gyi khams thams
178a7(rgyud): cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang / mnyam pa'i sku/ lbo ba mdzad pa rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
178a8(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag ni rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad dgegasung thams cod 'jug pa'i gnas dang / sems
178b1(rgyud): kyi rgyud las 'byung ba thams cad dang / rdo rje'i tshul thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang / mtshan thams cad dang / dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i khung
178b2(rgyud): bu thams cad dang / rdul phra mo rnyed kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thugs rnams su zhugs nas bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
178b3(rgyud): nas ring po ma lon pa zhig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid gyur pa ra mkhyen nas/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo
178b4(rgyud): nas snying po byang chub gang na der gshegs te/ ched du byang chub kyi shing drung du 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir/ rtsa blangs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e mgo
178b5(rgyud): sems can brtan pa yi// sems can don ni bdag don mchog/ gang phyir 'dul ba brtan pa rnams// mu stegs lta la gnas par mdzad// mdor na mi 'dul 'jig rten pa// 
178b6(rgyud): lta ba ngan pas 'dongs pa rnams// ye shes snang bas dag bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de kho
178b7(rgyud): na nyid mi shes nas 'di skad du/ kye dge sbyong ci byang chub kyi phyir// 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal mi zad pa drag cing spro bar mdzad dam zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
178b8(rgyud): rtsa de bting ste/ steng du bzhugs nas/ lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams kho bos byang chub thob par bsgrubs shig/ de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams
179a1(rgyud): kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don ma rtogs nas// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gang na ba der song ste/ ched du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la de ltar gyur pa rnams
179a2(rgyud): brjod do// de nas lho rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i tshogs kyis bskor te/ gzugs na spyod pa rnams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po la de ltar gyur pa 'di brjod do// 
179a3(rgyud): nas tshangs pa chen po 'dod pa ni spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyad pa'i lha thams cad dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag pa dbang phyug chen po la de ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do// 
179a4(rgyud): de nas 'jig rten gsam po mtha' dag gi bdag po/ dbang phyag chen pos lha rnams kyi bdag po mthe bo che la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang
179a5(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dang 'thun par mdzad cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ston gyis/ ji ltar 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no// snyam
179a6(rgyud): du shes par mi byed cig/ lha nyid las de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur gyis// lha dag de nyid du bsgrub par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du sgrub pa ni ma yin no// de legs kyis der
179a7(rgyud): mchod pa la 'dong bar bsgrub par bya'o// de nas lha thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa snying po byang chub gang na ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snying po byang
179a8(rgyud): chub na bzhugs pa gang na ba der dong nas/ ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdago la
179b1(rgyud): thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ rang gi gdan 'di las bzhengs la/ lha rdzas kyi gang na 'di lta stsogs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad du
179b2(rgyud): gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po de la 'di skad bka' stsagr-i gis po dag kho bo la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par bsgrubs shig/ de nas de
179b3(rgyud): dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub rtsol bar mi nus so// de bdag cag gis nus par gyur na/ bdag cag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'o
179b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid gsal bar mdzad de/ yang tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// de ni gzugs min gzugs min min// bden
179b5(rgyud): min brdzun min gsang ba yi// sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di// brtags na rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur// de nas lha'i dbang po de dag cung zad cig cang mi slu bar gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom
179b6(rgyud): ldan 'das de nyid rtsa'i gdan de nyid las bzhengs te/ lha de snams la 'di skad cesra bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di lta bu rtogs par bya ba bsgrubs shig/ de dag
179b7(rgyud): gis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rngo mi thog go// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// yid kyis rab tu rtogs pas na/ 
179b8(rgyud): byang chub sems ni rab bstan byos// sems dpa' rdo rje brtan byas le// sangs rgyas su ni bdage bsgoms shig/ de dag gis 'di skad du legs so zhes bya ba thams cad kyis smras nas dang
180a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo de'i tho rangs 'jig rten dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir/ bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang
180a2(rgyud): dag par rdzog saHsa rgyas su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad la phan par mdzad pa dang / 'phags pa
180a3(rgyud): lag na rdo rje rang gi thugs la zhugs pa la/ mtshan bcu rtsa brgyad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// theg pa chen po'i bdag nyid che// snang ba che zhing
180a4(rgyud): gsal ba che// mag no chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje che// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun// sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus che// thabs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal
180a5(rgyud): lo rdo rje 'dod pa dag pa che// kun gyi bde ba bde ba che// bde mchog thog ma tha ma med// bzhed chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje legs pa dgyes pa che// legs zhes bya bas rab
180a6(rgyud): mnyes pa// mnyes pa che zhing dgyes pa che// rab dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che// dbang bskur bzang po bdag po che// rin chen thams cad mdzes pa che// 
180a7(rgyud): rnam rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid che// 'od chen lha me chen po ste// rgyal po'i 'od de 'bar ba che// sangs rgyas 'od khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal mtshan dpal ched
180a8(rgyud): rgyal mtshan che ba nor rab gtong // nam mkha'i phyag mtshan yu ba che// gtong ba'i rgyal mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje bzhad pa bzhad pa che// dgyes pa che zhing rab dgyes pa// dgyes pa'i shugs/ 
180b1(rgyud): kyis rol mdzad dgyes// chos dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje chos ni chos che ba// sems dpa'i chos ni rab sbyong ba// sangs rgyas chos te chos rab mchog/ 'dod chos khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 
180b2(rgyud): rdo rje rnon po ral gyi // sheso rab ye shes blo gros che// sdig gcod ral gri chen po ste// sangs rgyas mtshon khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyud ste 'khor lo che// sangs rgyas 'khor lo gter chen po/ dkyil
180b3(rgyud): 'khor kun te chos kyi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje gsung ba gsung ba che// spros med yi ge chen po ste// yi ge med pa bzlas pa che// sangs rgyas gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje las
180b4(rgyud): te las rab mchog/ las che las rab byed pa ste// gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod pa che// sangs rgyas mchod khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bsrung ba go cha che// go cha'i mchog ste bstan pa che// bsrung ba che zhing
180b5(rgyud): snying po che// sangs rgyas brtson 'grus phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che// ma rungs thams cad bsreg byed pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen te// bsrung ba mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bsdams
180b6(rgyud): pa phyag rgya che// dam tshig chen po bcings pa che// khu tshur chen po phyag rgya mchog/ rdo rje khu tshur khyod phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pas phyag byas zhing // brjod cig bstod de sti snang byas// gang phyir thog
180b7(rgyud): mtha med// byang chub sems ni khyod yin te// khyod la brten nas rgyal ba dang // dbang po byang chub sems dpa' kun// 'byung zhing yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi rgyu// rdo rje
180b8(rgyud): sems dpa'i khyed phyag 'tshal// rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje las de khyod phyag 'tshal// yang dag par ni phyag 'tshal zhing // mtshon mchog gis na khyod
181a1(rgyud): sbestod pa yi// bsod nams gang yin de kun yang // sangs rgyas byang chub thob par shog/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yi// rab dad pas ni lan gcig tsam// gang
181a2(rgyud): zhig legs par brjod na ni// kun kyang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la
181a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ gsang gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba byin no// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'das pa'i// 
181a4(rgyud): mdo ni legs par bshad pasnya na// rdo rje sems pa khyed legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
181a5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshes pa dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' bcas pa rang gi thugs la zhugs pa thams cad dgyes shing mnyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung
181a6(rgyud): pa la mngon par dgyes par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+re shi kha
181a7(rgyud): ma hA gu h+ya yo ga tan tra bod skad du/ gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse ma// oM kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
181a8(rgyud): rnam pa'i snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal mo// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang // kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis// 'khor lo de ni bdag byas nas// rnal 'byor can ni mi gsung bzhugs
181b1(rgyud): mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun// ma lus thub pa'i skyes mchog gis// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// thub pa'i dbang phyug la gsol ba 'debs// rnal 'byor tshul chen sgrub byed cing / 
181b2(rgyud): cho ga sna tshogs yang drag 'byung // rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba'i/ 1'khor lo mchog ni bshad du gsol// mgon po khyod ni skal chen te// khyod ni bya ba don sems byed// gsang ba
181b3(rgyud): mkhyen cing dgongs bshad mkhyen// rnal 'byor rig las mchog gyur gsungs// de nyid rjes kyi de nyid ldan// rnal 'byor bdag nyid rnal 'byor che// rdo rje chen po byang chub sems// gsungs
181b4(rgyud): shig gsungs shig tshul chen po// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ste// rdo rje sna tshogs rnal 'byor bdag/ gsang ba'i snying po dkyil 'khor che// chos kyi tshul ni sgrib byed pa// rtog pa med pa'i
181b5(rgyud): chos rnams kyis// chos kyi don 'di ci yin brjod// 'dir ni rtog pa ji lta bu// sgrub pa'i don 'di ci yin brjod// 'dir ni rtog pa ji lta bu// sgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar lags// ci phyir 'di ni rgyud
181b6(rgyud): phyi ma/ rgyud don ci yin brjod par bgyi// ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma lags// rgyud kyi doni ni ji ltar 'byung // rdo rje 'chang dag 'di ci zhig/ ci'i phyir na zhi bar brjod// phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir// rdo rje gtum
181b7(rgyud): pa'adra ci zhig lags// ci yi phyir na gtum por brjod// ci yi phyir na khro bor brjod// rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa// ci'i phyir rdo rjer brjod par bya// rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci// de yi rdo rje ci lta bu
181b8(rgyud): rdo rje rigs kyi don 'di ni// rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du// rdo rje'i rigs kun gang gi lags// chen po gnas gang zhig na gnas// rigs ni rnam pa du ston brjod// tsaM yi phyir ni rigs su brjod// 
182a1(rgyud): rigs byu dag rlung ba ninas zhig yon// ci yoM phyir na sems dpar brjod// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du// tsau phyir jirje sems dpa' lags// rdo rje rgyal pos yin
182a2(rgyud): brjod// rdo rje chags pa 'di don ci// rdo rje legs pa tsa yin brjod// rdo rje rin chen ci yi phyir// rdo rje gzi brjid ci yin brjod// rdo rje rgyal mtshan bzhad pa che// gsungs shig ci yin de
182a3(rgyud): brjod gsungs// ni ya~M phy-i na dzaHchos// rdo rje rnon po ci min brjod// rdorje rdzu ni 'khor lo che// rdo rje smra ba ci yin brjod// rdo rje las dang gnod sbyin no// rdo d+ha ka nod skyon drug po che// 
182a4(rgyud): srung ga khu ra no// bsrungs shig ci yon brjod pa gsungs// sems dpa' 'di rnams galas byung // de bzhin pa dang man gang // dang po gang zhig gleng gzhi ci// dmigs pa'i rkyen nog
182a5(rgyud): zhig lags// gsang ba 'di rnams gang las byung // khyab bdag 'di rnams galas byung // thog ma tha ma med 'di ci// gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs// rab tu dga' nyid da
182a6(rgyud): bzang nyid// rdo rje snying bdag ji lta bu// ci yo phyir na kun du bzang // de bzhin rdo rje 'chang ba ci// dang po'i rigs ni ji lta bu// chos kun skye ba med pa dang // 'byung ba ji ltar rung ba
182a7(rgyud): 'gyur// byang chub sems dgra' ci yin brjod// tso phyir srungs rgyas brjod par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod// bcom ldan 'das bcom ci yin brjod// de bzhin ston pa'i ston
182a8(rgyud): brtson na mi phyir nA ye shes brjod// shes rab mo shes ni yin brjod/ na rgyur shes rab brjod par bya'o// de bzhin shes rab pa sa phyin// chul na ci zhig ting 'dzin gtan bas mthun
182b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor don ni ci// srid gsum 'jig rten gsum de ni ci// ci yi phyir yang khams gsum pa/ 'khor ba'i don ni ci zhig yin// mya ngan 'das pa'ang ci zhig brjod// rtag dang 'jig rten
182b2(rgyud): de bzhin dog ka theg pa chen po ci yin brjod// nam mkha' yang ni ci yi phyir// sa nyid kyang ni ci phyir brjod// 'byung ba chen po gang nas byung // 'gog pa ci zhig gang gis byed// ci yi phyir na phog
182b3(rgyud): rgyar brjod// ci phyir sngags su brjod par bya// ci yi phyir na rigs sngags brjod// de bzhin oMn ra gzungs sngags rnams// phyag rgya yin na mtshan nyid gsungs// sngags kyi mtshan nyid brjod
182b4(rgyud): par bya// rigs sngogs kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod// de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags rnams// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i'o gan sen gang // ji ltar bcing ba thub chen po// phyag rgya dag ni 'ching ba na// ji lngar
182b5(rgyud): rdo rje can kun mnyes// rig sngags ji ltar bzlas par bgyi// thub pa chen po de gsungs shig/ rIg sngags dag ni bzlas pa na// ji ltar yid kyis rdo rje bzlas// dri ba'i tshogs dang po mdor bstan
182b6(rgyud): pa'o// oM ni tsa zhig yin par bshad// yi ge hUM ni ci zhig brjod// ci yi phyir na yi ge phaT// swA hA zhes bya ci yin brjod// mchod pa ci phyir brjod par bya// de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang // ci
182b7(rgyud): phyir na dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor cho gi ji lta bu// dkyil 'khor dang po du ma yis// gsang ba gsungs shig blo gros che// rnal 'byor rnam pa du ru brjod// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung du// 
182b8(rgyud): ji ltar rtsa ba'inargyung du bshad// bsang ba'i rigs byung ji lta bu// nga ni rang byung nyid yin pas// khams gsum 'jig rten sa 'ag na// sa spangs sa bla mya ngan 'das// rdo skad bshad rje/ 
183a1(rgyud): spyang bru ga nas// rdo rje chen cid khyab 'jug pa nyid man// tsam hA bag shin rje drug pa nyid// rang nyid skye dgu'i skyes mchog gas// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyam mtsho// 
183a2(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug la gsol 'dob so// rnal 'byor tshul che ni sgrib byed cing // chug sna tshogs yang dag 'byung // rigs kyi dkyi la 'khor spyod 'byung ba // 'khor lo mchog ni bshad du gsol
183a3(rgyud): mgon po khyed ni sbrul chen te// khyod na bya bya don sems byed// gsung ba mkhyen cing dgongs bshad mkhyen// rnal 'byor rig las mchog gyur gsungs// de nyid rjes kyi de nyid ldan
183a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor bdag nyid rnal 'byor che// rdo rje chen pa byang chub sems// gsungs shig gsungs shig tshul chen po// rigs kyi dkyil 'khod 'khor lo ste// rdo rje sna tshogs rnal 'byor bdag
183a5(rgyud): gsang ba'i snying po dkyil 'khor tshe// chos kyi tshul ni sgrib byed pa// rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi// chos kyi don+da 'ad+hi ci yin madz+ye dAM// 'byu na rtag pa r+d+ha lA bu// sgrub pa' ngan 'di tsa yan
183a6(rgyud): brjod/ 'dir ni rtog pa ji lta bu/ sgrub pa'i don 'di ci yin brjod// 'dir ni rtog pa ji lta bu// sgrub pa'i dIn tAM dI ji ltar lag saM/ r-i Di di ni rgyud phyi ma// rgyu de dron ci yi ni brjod
183a7(rgyud): par bgyi// ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma lags// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar 'byung // rdo rje 'chang drug 'di ci lkog/ ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjod// phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir// rdo rje gtum pa'ang ni
183a8(rgyud): zhig lags// ci yi phyir na go dum por brjod// ci yi phyir na khro bo brjod// rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa// tsau phyir rdo rjer brjid par bya// rdo rje 'chang nas gsungs 'di ci// de mi
183b1(rgyud): rdo rje ji lta bu// rdo rje rigs kyi don 'di ni// rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du// rdo rje'i rigs kun gang gi lcags// chen po gnas gang zhigan gnas// rigs ni rnam pa du srin brjod// tsa yi phyinan
183b2(rgyud): rigs su brjod// rigs bdag rang bzhin ci zhig yin// ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du// ci phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lags// rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod
183b3(rgyud): rdo rje chags pa 'di don gyi// rdo rje legs pa ci yin brjod// rdo rje rin chen ci yi phyir// rdo rje gzi brjid ci yin brjod// rdo rje rgyal mtshan bzhad pa che// gsungs shig ci yin de brjod gsungs// 
183b4(rgyud): ci yi phyir na rdo rje chos// rdo rje rnon po ci yin brjod// rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo che// rdo rje smra ba tsi yin brjod// rdo rje las dang gnod sbyin tshe// rdo rje gnod sbyin drag pa che// rdo rje bsrung ba khu tshu ra che/ 
183b5(rgyud): gsungs shig ci yin brjod pa gsungs// sems dpa' 'di rnams grwa las byung // de bzhin pha dang ma ni gang // dang po gang zhig glong gzhi ci// dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gang zhig lags// gsang
183b6(rgyud): ba 'di rnams gang las byung / khyab bdag 'di rnams ga las byung // bdag ste pha ma yin 'gal ba'i// tshig ni ji lta rung bar 'gyur// dri ba'i tshogs gnyis pa mdor bstan pa tho/ 
183b7(rgyud): tshungs pa'i 'jig rten gsum lus dbang phyug che// gdong drug tshogs bcas lha yi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor na// gzhan yang bza' dang tshogs sogs gang yin pa// bdag nyid ces ni
183b8(rgyud): ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// nga ni 'dod pa thar pa nga // nga ni dmyal ba'i dmyal ba de// de ni yi dgas dud 'gro'i bdag/ tshig 'di ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang 'dod la
184a1(rgyud): cho ga sems ldan// lta bcas tshig ldan 'dzin pa'i lha la chags// mu stegs theg ngan mngon dga'i skye dgu'i rigs// ji ltar 'dod rnams don rnams rtog byed
184a2(rgyud): cing ji skad pa shad pa'u s+ya tshogs rigs dkyil 'khor/ dag pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas dgongs mu shes/ rang gi rdeg pase ma ngan dze g+sa byed / de la ste dgu'i bdag chen ba
184a3(rgyud): bas gsungs// mchod 'os chen pos mchog ni dang po'i gnas// gsang ba'i dbang phyug mngon bsdus bde bar gsol// slo gu'i bdag po dkyil 'khor gyis mdun du// dam tshig
184a4(rgyud): mchod pa ji ltar mchod par bya// 'dod pa lnga bcas rol pa byed pa yis// dngos grub tshigs mchog chen po thob par 'gyur// dmyin pa'i 'dod las rigs kyi dngos grub 'byung // 'gal ba
184a5(rgyud): tshig dag ji ltar byung bar 'gyor// de bzhin pag ji ltar rtogs ci 'dra// de yi 'jug pa yang ni ji ltar 'gyur// rdzas de dge ni ji ltar rab tu sgrub// 'jig rten gsum na dman pa ji ltar 'gyur// 
184a6(rgyud): de nas 'dod chags zhen pas dngos grub thob// 'dod chags dag phyir de ni ji ltar rung // chags bral sdig pas chags dang bral ba la// gi sang po bstan pas sdig dngos ji ltar 'gyur// gtor
184a7(rgyud): mas bsod nams mchog thob ji lta bu/ skye dgu kun bsad bsod nams ji lta bu// ma byin blangs pas bsod nams 'gyur zhes pa'o// 'gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// dga'
184a8(rgyud): bsnyen po ba bu med bsnyen pa mas// cha 'drim ni sangs rgyas mchog grangag migaca 'dod pa bskyed pas seMngs rgyas dang // rdo rje sems dpa'i byung byu ji ltar 'gyur// 'didzin mdzun
184b1(rgyud): mtshungs pa'i bsod nams med// ji ltar brdzun ni bsod nams ldan par brjod/ 'dir ni sems can gzhan bsad bzas par bya/ 'gal ba'i tshig ni dz+ha ltar rung bar 'gyur// 'khor baspangs
184b2(rgyud): kyang chos min 'gyur ba dang // mya ngan 'das la gzhol ba chos ma yin// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gyi ni rjes mjug pa// chos min 'gyur zhes ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// drag dang sdang ba'i ser sna sems
184b3(rgyud): ldan pa/ chos min spyod cing brdzun pa'i tshig la chags// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags bcis pas lhag par brgya la// rigs kyi rnal 'byor las byung ji ltar 'grub// bla med go phang dngos grub 'dod pa
184b4(rgyud): yis/ dag cing ngo mtshar rnal 'byor lhun blang bya// sbyor bas gcin 'thung gshang ba za ba yis// dag cing mchog gyur rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod// mi ga cung ga shang tsa zos shing 'thungs po yis// 
184b5(rgyud): yid 'dod dngos grub dngos su ji ltar 'dod// bud med bcas par lhan cig chos spyod cing // gnyis ka lhan cig gyur pas dag gratsang skyed// ji ltar bud med lhan cig dkyil 'khor mchod/ 
184b6(rgyud): dngos grub dam pa mchog tu ji ltar 'gyur// gzhan yang rdo rje rigs 'byung kun ldon zhing // mchog tu mi bzad drag po las can te// dag cing shin du sdug la mtho bar 'gro// 'gal ba de ni
184b7(rgyud): slar rung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang bajig dang bsad pa lhur len cing // bstod deng drag pa'i las can de dag ni// dag cing sdug la shin du mtho bar 'gro// 'gal ba de ni dzaM ltar+ya rung ba yin/ 
184b8(rgyud): gzhan yang ba ba' dang btung ba ltar len cing // snying 'byin pa yis dag par 'dod pa nyid// de ni dag cing sdug la mtho bar 'gro// 'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung ba yin// gzhan yang nor bu chen
185a1(rgyud): rjen phrogs pa // sdug cing bstan la dag cing mthor 'gro dang // gzhan yang nga rgyal ser sna ltar len pas// dag par 'gyur ba nyid ni 'gal ba yin// gzhan yang
185a2(rgyud): lus kyi rigs pa 'byung ba yis// mye dge ba'o las rnams thams cad bya// 'khrig sogs tshogs rnams mang po yi// las byed pa ni ji ltar skyon mi 'gyur// gzhan yang brdzun tshig de bzhin
185a3(rgyud): 'khrig pa mas// 'phags pa min pas gsang ba yi// rgyal ba'i dbang chen 'dod pas bdud rtsi ltar// sdug cing mther 'gro ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// kye mgon khyod ni dag po'i chags
185a4(rgyud): te khyod ni rtag tu rnal 'byor 'gyur// kye mgon khyod ni dgyes chen bdud rtsi 'chang ba dam pos gsang ba'i 'byung gnas te// kye rgyal khyod ni dri med nyom bzhin du mi shes kun du skyong mdzad pa// 
185a5(rgyud): khyab byed rgyal ba'i ngang tshul 'jig rten gsum gyi 'dren chen byang sems dga' ston kye mdor bsdus pa'o// kun mchog thams cad rig pa ste// kun mkhyen dri ma gsum spangs pa// byang
185a6(rgyud): sems sangs rgyas rgyal po che// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid ni// ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas kyang // phyogs rnams kun du gzigs mdzad de// thub pas mgon rnams la btud de// 
185a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun la 'di skad gsungs// kye ma'o rnam dag ye shes bdag/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas nyer thob pa// kye ma'o gar mkhan 'khor lo 'di// rang gi ye shes 'dri bar byed// rtog
185a8(rgyud): pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'o// mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya// shin du rnyed dka' dam pa yi// rin chen sgrom gyi khwa dbye bya// bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi// rgyal mtshan dam pa sgreng
185b1(rgyud): bar bya/ rlon chen sgrom gyi kha bye nas// shes rab kyis ni snang bar bya// de nas gsang ba mchog gyur pa// dam pa yang dgra bshad par bya// bya ba bsgrub pa'i tha byas chen po// rtog pa thams cad
185b2(rgyud): bsdus pa dang // gsang ba'i bye brag 'byeng byed cing // rnal 'byor dgongs pa rnam par grol// de nyid dam pa shes byed pa'i// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // rdo rje'i rnal 'byor
185b3(rgyud): ga dang // 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor cho ga ste// mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ste// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // dus gsum khyab pa'i bya bar ldan// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor kun 'byung zhing
185b4(rgyud): bya ba kun gyi thabs chen gyis// rtogs pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // sangs rgyas rnal 'byor cho gar ldan// rdo rje chos ni rab 'jug pa// sku gsung zhes bya gsang chen gyi// rtog pa thams cad
185b5(rgyud): bsdus pa dang // rdo rje rnal 'byor tshe gar ldan// ma rungs thams cad 'dul byed pa// khams gsum rnal zhes bya ba'i// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // chos kyi rnal 'byor cho gar ldan/ 
185b6(rgyud): pade mgur mkhyen bskyed pa yi// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // sbyin pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan// rin chen 'khor lo bskyed byed cing // byang chub sems
185b7(rgyud): dpa' yid ches byed// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po// sna tshogs gar mkhan bskyed byed pa// las kyi rnal 'byor tshig yin// rdeg pa thams
185b8(rgyud): bsdus pa dang // de nyid shes shing dgongs pa shes// tshul chen mchog ni shes byed cing // mchog gi dang po sangs rgyas mchog/ rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa ste/ go rims bzhin du
186a1(rgyud): / 'jug byed pa'i// gcig cer sems can bya ba byed// bya ba chen po mchog zhi ba// chos dang longs spyod mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas gar mkhan 'khor
186a2(rgyud): lo ni mchog tu ngo mtshur gyur pa 'di// skal pa ji bzhin gsang ji bzhin// ji ltar sems can 'dul 'gyur bshad// sngon gyur 'das pa'i dus su ni// byang chub sems ni
186a3(rgyud): yongasu 'dzin ci / thobs dang shes rab ldan pa yi// byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na// spros pa chen po ngo mtshar che// dka' ba dpag tu med pa sprad// go rims bzhin
186a4(rgyud): du de yis ni// dbang bskur bar du legs thob gyur// shes rab chen pos sa mthar phyin// chos kyi dbang ni thob gyur nas// 'og min stug po nyams dga' bar// blo gros
186a5(rgyud): chen po bzhugs par 'gyur// bdag ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur zhes// rnal 'byor pa yis bsams nas ni// bya ba mthar phyin bdag gis ni// sems can don kun thob bya zhes// 
186a6(rgyud): bya ba de la dgongs nas ni// sngon dang phyi mar bde chen med// chos kyi dga' ba rmad chen po'o'i// dka' ba spyad pa bya snyam ste// byang chub shing drung bzhugs gyur nas// bya dka'i bya ba
186a7(rgyud): skyon ldan te// dbugs dbyung rngub ba'i 'gog pa dang // sems dpa' med cing g.yo ba med// lus ni gang yang mi 'byung zhing // yan lag bskyed par mi byed de// de bas go yo
186a8(rgyud): mod chestsa la// yun ring du ni gnas par gyur// phyogs bcu po ni thub dbang pos// sangs rgyas kun gyis dgongs gyur pa// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub dus// sngun
186b1(rgyud): bsngal bya ba rigs pa yin// do bas bdag cag kun lhan cig/ bkur bAr bya phyir 'gro sum du// dgongs nasra thams cad raSh+ka rAs te// stug po ru ni byon pa ru// byon nas thub
186b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis/ bskol ba mchog ni mdzad par gyur// oM uSh+Ta ShA zhes pa yi// / rig pas se gol brdabs nas ni// byang chub sems dpa'i kun du bslang / phyogs rnams
186b3(rgyud): kun du bltas pas na/ sangs rgyas kyi ni rgya mtsho mthong / thub pas mgon rnams la btud de// bka' gsol zhes ni gsol ba btab// mgo tshon sangs rgyas thams cad
186b4(rgyud): kyis/ gsung gcig gis ni bka' stsal pa// sems kyi spyad pa ci 'dra zhes// rang gi rigs ni so sor rtogs// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsung thos nas// rang gi sems la
186b5(rgyud): brtog bzhin du// yun ring du ni gnas pa yi// sems kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste// yan lag kun gyis rab btud nas// zhus pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// sems
186b6(rgyud): kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste// sems kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// sems kyi spyod yul shes par bka'// khyod la snying po rab sbyin gyis/ 
186b7(rgyud): phra ma'i bzlas pa rab tu spyod// a tsa~M pra tI b+he da kaD+heM mi// snying po dag pa blings nas ni// rang gi sems la ba teg // zang cag de la gnas pa nas// zla ba'i
186b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bzhin du mthong // de nas sems 'di ci zhig yin// nyon mongs sa bon can nam ci// dge ba 'am mo sems// kun gzhi'i sa bon can sems
187a1(rgyud): sa ma/ chos kyi mtha' ni ni rdzas gyur nas// pha rol phyin pa drug spen nas/ 'di ni sems can dag pa ste// kun nas nyon mongs gnas ma yin// yun rings
187a2(rgyud): sun tha mdzan mas dang / rgyo/ sa chen bsags pa ste// ji ltar zlab gang ba sbyin// dag cing dang brnyog pa med// de bzhin tshogs na/ pa'i phyir// sems
187a3(rgyud): ni zla ba gang dung ma rgyus pa yod dang med min pa'o// ji ltar zla ba'o mtshungs nyid yin// 'on kyang bsod nams ye rdzogs pa zla ba de mchung
187a4(rgyud): bstan/ legs par chags ldan rang sems kyi// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong nas ni// dga' zhing mgu ba skyes nas kyang // slar yang tshig tu rab smras pa// bcom
187a5(rgyud): ldan mgon po bdag gis ni// nyon mongs dri ma rnam dag cing // gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i// rang sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong // sangs rgyas thams cad
187a6(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa// thog mar byung ba'i sems 'od bzang // dang por blo bur nyon mongs rnaMs/ byang chub sems kyis dag par byed// dngos po thams cad rnams spangs pa'i
187a7(rgyud): dag pa yi ni snying po 'dis// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// byang chub kyi ni sems la rtogs// oM bo te tsi ta taM ud ma ta ya mi// snying po dag pa blangs nas ni/ 
187a8(rgyud): sems kyi dbus su rtogs pa na// zla ba'i dbus su rtogaso pa na// zla ba'i dbus su bla nga ni// dkyil 'khar gnyis pa mthong ba yin// thub pa rnams mchig
187b1(rgyud): skyes pa /  khor gnyis pa ga su byung // de na su spyad sta rgyus spyan gsungs pa// byang nung sems kyi dang banan bskrun// bstan par bya ba'i mi dun// dus ma
187b2(rgyud): sgrub par gyis// khyod la snying po sbyin byinazlos shing de ni brtun par dgongs/ oM tiSh+Tha badz+re// dkyil 'khor gnyis ma dbu so gnas pa'i// rdo dz+nyA rgyun
187b3(rgyud): ma spyi byed cing // tha tsog sa sar bad+mags pa na/ shin du byasman par mthong gyur nas// smras pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyusgra rnams// dkyil khyo dbus swA dzoHmtho
187b4(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa yi// dbus na rdo rje dang ldan mthong // de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// lha rnams kun gyi ye shes tshe// rdo rje'i dbyings ni spyod pa yi// shin
187b5(rgyud): du brtan pa 'di spros shig/ oM badz+ra ad mi ko ha// snying po dag pa blangs nas ni// rdo rje lus su rnam bsgoms pa// de ni sra brtan khong stong med// rdo rje sku ni thob gyur nas
187b6(rgyud): skyes pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rang bdag rdo rje'i skur mthong ngo // de nas sangs rgyas skur gsungs pa// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam por sgom// oM yA ta saR+Wa
187b7(rgyud): thA ga ta A ta a haM// / snying po dag pa blangs nas ni// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms pas// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// kun mkhyen ye shes thob par gyur/ 
187b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun la rabya btud nas// smras pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// mgon po bdag la byin brlab cing// bdag gi byang chub brtan par mdzod// glags chen
188a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dris// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshig thos nas// mgon rnams thugs khar zhugs gyur nas/ rdo rje si ni rnal 'byor gsungs/ 
188a2(rgyud): oM saR+Wa drug pa mya rnaMs dAk+Shadz+nyA ban d+ha/ grags tshun sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rig sngags chen po brjed pas na// rdo rje dbyings ni shin du brtan// de nyid ye shes
188a3(rgyud): mngon songs rgyas// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni// / rdo rje thugs kha nas byung ste// chos kyi dbang bskur bzhi po yis// de tshe thub pa dbyang byiskur 'gyur// rdo rje sems
188a4(rgyud): da pas byas pa yi// byang churdza sems kyi dbang bskur ba// 'bras bu byang chub semos ldan gang // rdo rje sems pa'i dbang bskur ba'o// bskal grangs med gsum dag gi
188a5(rgyud): sbyin pa sbyin pa'i 'bras bzang gang // mkha' mtshungs rin chen thob byed pa// nor bu rin chen dbang bskur yin// bskal pa grangs med gsum du ni// gzhan gyi bka' ba
188a6(rgyud): spyod pa dang // brtson 'grus kyis ni 'bras sgrub pa// rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dag/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul chen te// nyon mongs
188a7(rgyud): 'dam gyis ma gos pa// rdo rje pad ma'i dbang bskur yin// byang chub sems rdzogs rdo rje rnal 'byor gyis// dbang bskur bzhi po de rnams chos kyi dbyings// de nas gsang
188a8(rgyud): pa'i dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas rang bzhin yon tan dam pa'i tshogs// rdo rje sems pa'i dbang bskur bas// ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru 'dod// rdo rje rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba
188b1(rgyud): ljongs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'dod// rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur bas// de bzhin mtshan drang dpe byad do// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che// mkha' mtshungs chos kyi snying po nan/ 
188b2(rgyud): rdo rje las kyi dab bskur bas// sprul pa yi ni ska ru 'dod// gsang ba bzhi yi dbang bskur bas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub tho ba// de nas ming gi dbang bskur bas/ 
188b3(rgyud): thub de rnam snang mdzad chen gyur// chos nyid kyang ni yang dag rtogs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par brtag/ chos kun dngos po med pa ste// mtshan ma med cing gsal byed
188b4(rgyud): min/ mtshan nyid med pa mkha'i dang mtshungs// dmigs pa rnam par spangs pa ste// rang bzhin med cing brjod du med// chos kun tshig gi spyod yul min// gzhan yang gas
188b5(rgyud): byar brtags pa ste// de phyir 'di ni rtogs par brjod// rtogs pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi// chos kyi don 'di ci yin brjod// bdag med dngos po yod pa min// chos rnams
188b6(rgyud): med cing rtog pa med// 'on kyang chos nyid yang dag rtogs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par rtogs// rtog pa nyams su myong bar brjod// 'dir ni ngo mtshar nyid rje
188b7(rgyud): rtogs/ chos kun gzugs can min pa dang // gzugs can du yang 'di ru bstan// chos kun tshig gi spyod yul min// sme ru yang ni 'di ru bstan// de bas ngo mtshar chos 'di
188b8(rgyud): murtog pa rnyog pa yin par brjod// tso phy-ir 'di ni ngamatshar tshis// de nyid gsang ba sgrub pa'i phyir// las rnams drug pa nyid dang ni// gzugs can tshig gan
189a1(rgyud): dag dang 'bras phyir sdom pa'i ngo mtshar te// de phyir 'di ni ngo mtshar chos// de phyir 'di ni rtogs par brjod// de bas ngo mtshar chos 'di ru// rtog
189a2(rgyud): bya 'ba' zhig rtog pa yin// bA di ni rnyog pa ji lta bu// sems can kunAM gyi don bya'i phyir// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas// pha rol phyin drug spyod pa dag/ brten pa
189a3(rgyud): rtog pa nyid yin no// sgrub pa'i don ni ji lta bu// gang zag chos la bdag med dang // bzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yang // rab tu dga' ba'i sa bsgrubs pa// de tshe sgrub pa'i
189a4(rgyud): don yin no// kau ci phyir 'di ni rgyud phyi ma// rgyud ni rgyan chags zhes bya ste// 'khor brgyad du 'dod pa yin// phyi ma zhes bya pha rol te// rgyud ni phyi mar brjed pa yin// rgyud ni rgyun
189a5(rgyud): chags zhe bya ste// phyi ma snga ma las byung ba'o// de nyid gsang ba sbas shes pa// rgyud ni phyi mar brjod par bya// ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma yin// sa mthar phyin pa rgyal ba'i
189a6(rgyud): mchog/ srid pa'i brtson ra las rgal yin// yang na gang zhig rgal 'gyur ba// rgyud ni phyi ma yin par bshad// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar 'byung // sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// 
189a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ljongs spyod// sangs rgyas thugs rjes bskul ba ni// rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs byung ba'i// chos dang longs spyod byung
189a8(rgyud): bdang / sangs rgyas kun g+hi gsang chen ni// rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin// rdo rje'i chang drag 'di ci zhig/ sangs rgyas gzugs kyis mi 'dul ba'i// sems can gdug sogs
189b1(rgyud): do yi phyir// rang gi ye shes byang chub ske sa// rdo rje drag pots+tsha yang dag byung // drug po'i don 'di ji ltar 'byung // drag po drag po'i ming gis ni// drug po'i khro bo zhes su bA shad/ 
189b2(rgyud): drag pa'i las ni spyod byed rnams// 'chas shing zlog par byed pa yin // rdo rje zhi ba 'di yi zhig/ gdug pa de kun gtul nas ni// slar yang zhi bar yang dag byung / de nyid rgyal
189b3(rgyud): pa rdo rje 'chab sems can don gyi thabs ston mdzad// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad ni// khro bo'i dbang phyug dag tu bstan// de nyid zhi dang drag po dang // phyag na rdo
189b4(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul che// ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjod// sna tshogs gzugs can rnal 'byor tshe// sems can smon bya 'ba' zhig phyir// nyon mongs gdug pa brtser dgongs shing // zhi ba
189b5(rgyud): don ni yang dag byung // phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir// nyon mongs gdug pa nges 'joms phyir// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin bzang // rdo rje phyog na bsnams mdzad pa// de ni phyag
189b6(rgyud): na rdo rjer brjod// dus gsum bdud rnams de bzhin du// mi mthun phyogs kyis mi shigs pa// byang sems rang bzhin rdo rje ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan pa'i tshogs/ 
189b7(rgyud): de ni sangs rgyas kun dang ldan// gsang chen rdo rje de lta bu// phyag na rtog tu bsnams pas na// de ni phyag na rdo rjer brjod// rdo rje gtum po'i don ci zhig/ rdo rje gtum po gnod
189b8(rgyud): sbyin che// rdo rje gnod sbyin shin du bstan// nga rgyal nyon mongaso zhags pa za// byang chub sems dpa' rang byung ba'o// ci yi phyir ni gtum par brjod// gtum po drag po
190a1(rgyud): chen po ni/ rang byung nga nyid kho na ste// srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed phyir// drag po'i don ni gtu mu po yin// ci yi phyir na khro bor brjod// 
190a2(rgyud): gsong dang skrong dang dran la ste// da ni khro bo'i don du brjod// nga ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar// nyon mongs thams cad bsreg par byed// rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa// ci ya
190a3(rgyud): phyir rdo rjer brjod par bya// sla zhing snying po khrong steng med// gcad dang gzhig par bya ba min// bsreg par bya min 'jig med par// stong nyid rdo rjer brjod par bya/ 
190a4(rgyud): 'gro drug 'khor lo spong byed cing // sdig pa bral bar byed pa yi// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// nyon mongs thams cad sel bar byed// rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di
190a5(rgyud): ci sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dang // byang sems brtan pa gang yin pa// de ni rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ de yi rdo rje ji lta bur/ 
190a6(rgyud): rtog thams cad dang bral zhing // chos su 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// stong pa nyid ni rdo rjer brjod// gzugs sogs chos kyi rang
190a7(rgyud): bzhin gang // 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa gang // de lta bu ni 'di rdo rje// rdo rje rigs kyi don 'di ci// bden zhing don yod de bzhin
190a8(rgyud): nyid 'gyur ba med cing skye ba med// 'gag med de kho na nyid gong // de lta bu ni rdo rje yin// don yid 'gyur ba med pa yi// de lta bu yi rigs 'gyur ba// byang chub sems
190b1(rgyud): dra pa'i rigs su brjod// de ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin brjod// thog ma tha ma med pa'i chos// byang chub sems dpa' zhes su brjod// bden zhing slu ba med pa yi// byang chub
190b2(rgyud): sems gang de rigs yin// rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du// phyogs rnams thams cad kun khyab pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas po ni// chos dbyings dang
190b3(rgyud): mnyam thug pa med// rdo rje 'chang rnams de snyed do// rdo rje'i rigs kun gang yin pa// chos kyi bdag po bla med pa// rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas// 
190b4(rgyud): mgon des yongs su bzung ba de// de yi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor yin gsungs pa// ston pa gang zhig 'di rnams su// rjes su ston par byed pa gang // de yi spyod
190b5(rgyud): lam bya ba ci// gsang ba kun du bsdus pas gsungs// 'di yi ston pa byang chub sems// rjes su ston byed shes rab thA bas// phyag rgya rnams ni spyod lam ste// 
190b6(rgyud): sngags rnams de yi bya ba yin// rdo rje 'tshang gi rigs gang yin// rdo rje 'chang ba de kun gyi// rigs ni byang chub sems yin to// byang chub sems dpa'i brtul zhugs
190b7(rgyud): bzang / sangs rgyas kyi yang de nyid yul// chen po gnas gang zhig na gnas// chos rnams kun la gnas med de// rtsa ba med sems spyod yul lo// chos rnams thams
190b8(rgyud): cad gzugs can min// chos kyi dbyings de spyod yul med// rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod// rigs ni rnam pa brgyar gsungs te// me do rung sbrus na rnam pa lnga
191a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang // chos dang las dang rnam pa lnga// ci yi phyir ni rigs su brjod// mchog dang dman pa'i bye brag gis
191a2(rgyud): rigs zhes bya ba de rnams gnyis// sems can las ngan zhugs pa yi// rigs ni dman pa yin par brjod// las ni 'gro ba spangs nas ni// byang chub sems la
191a3(rgyud): 'jug pa'i mi chog/ de bras rdo rje rigs brjod pa// rigasre de yat+ma nI lnga pa yin// rigs bdag rang bzhin 'dri ci zhig/ byang chub sems ni rgyal po che// rdo rje sems
191a4(rgyud): dpa'i 'jigs pa meng // mgon po chen po rigs kyi bdag/ de ni rigs kyang lnga pa brjod// ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod// sems pa zhes bya rnam gsum ste/ 
191a5(rgyud): byis pa de bzhin mkhas pa dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dang // rnam gsum sems par brjod par bya// yang gsungs pa// ci yi phyir ni sems par
191a6(rgyud): brjod/ sems pa byis pa ci yin brjod// sems pa mkhas pa ci yin brjod// byang chub sems dpa' tsuM yin brjod// gnas gang zhig du brjod bya ba/ 
191a7(rgyud): de ni de yi sems par brjod// chos sam yang na chos min dang // legs byas nyes par byis pa la// mi shes mun pas sgrib gyur cing // chos la nyon mongs
191a8(rgyud): bdag nyid 'dzin// dman zhing gti mug rigs can gyur// de lta bu ni rigs par brjod// nyon mongs kun la chags pa dang // de bzhin srid pa ngan song
191b1(rgyud): gsum/ mi shes mun pa la chags pa// de 'dir byis par brjod par bya// sems dpa' mkhas pa gang zhig yin// dri ma las 'das nyon mongs spyod // rnal 'byor
191b2(rgyud): ldan zhing brtul zhugs che// mi shes lang tog 'joms byed pa/ de ni sems dpa' mkhas par brjod// 'dir ni byang chub sems dpa' gang // chos kyi de nyid rtogs
191b3(rgyud): gyur cing // 'khor ba'i gnas nas sad gyur de// sems can rnams ni sad byed pa// de ni byang chub sems dpa' brjod/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du// 
191b4(rgyud): de la byang chub rnam gsum ste// dman dang mchog dang bar ma'o// dman pa nyan thos sems yin te// bar ma rang rgyal byang chub po/ mchog ni byang chub sems
191b5(rgyud): yin te/ de ni mi 'gyur rdo rje yin// sku gsung thugs rnams gzhag pa gang / byang chub mchog tu brjod par bya// ci phyir rdo rje sems dpa' yin/ byang
191b6(rgyud): chub mchog gi ye shes gang // de ni rdo rje re nges par brjod/ ye shes rdo rje lus byung ba/ de ni rdo rje sems dpor brjod/ rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rgyal// ci yi
191b7(rgyud): phyir na sems dpar brjod// rje rje sems dpa' mgron chen po// dga' chen de ni chos sam ci// sems can thams cad dgrol ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams
191b8(rgyud): la chags pa ste/ de ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su bsgrags// byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu ni// sangs rgyas ye shes bla med gtu/ 
192a1(rgyud): n+ya n+ya r+ya/ de ni rdo rje sems rang bzhin// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'o// rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod// rdo rje rigs kun rgyal po ste// rdo rje lcags kyu zhes su brjod// dgug dang dbab
192a2(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje na// de ni rdo rje rgyal por brgyad// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dag ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang spyod pa// sems can dgug pa'i thabs shes pa// rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung // rdo rje chags pa 'di don ci
192a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed pa// rjes su chags pa zhes su brjod// rdo rje chags pa bdud chen po// da ni rdo rje chags par brjod// sems can smin phyir bcom ldan gyis// gang phyir byang chub spyod pa spyad// 
192a4(rgyud): byang chub spyod pa rjes chags pa// rdo rje chags par yang dag byung // rdo rje legs pa rA ci bzhin brjod// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing // logs so zhes bya rab ster byed// byang chub sems
192a5(rgyud): dpa' kun mgu byed// da ni rdo rje legs par brjod// sems can dag pa mgu byed cing // rdo rje 'chang rnams bsgrub byed cing // sems can rnams la dga' byed cing // gaslong ba 'dzin pa rangs par byed
192a6(rgyud): chos dang longs spyod sbrul sku'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das 'dis chos rnams drug/ gdug tshe na ston bsgrubs pa// rdo rje lags par yang dag 'byung // rdo rje rin chen ci yi phyir// byang chub sems dpa'
192a7(rgyud): sbyin pa gang // mkha' mnyam rin chen lta bu ste// rdo rje rin chen bskal pa che// de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod// sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur te// sems can kun gyi dbang bskur gau/ byang chub snying
192a8(rgyud): po'i dbang bskur ba// rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'dzin par byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin pa gang // mkha' mtshungs rdo rje yang dag byung // de ni rin chen don yid de// de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod/ 
192b1(rgyud): rdo rje gzi brjid ci yin brjod// ma rig ling tog 'khor ba yi// mi shos mun pa 'joms byed cing // thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che// da ni rdo rje gzi brjid brjod// ci phyir rdo rje rgyal mtshan yin// rgyal
192b2(rgyud): mtshan sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// thar pa'i lam 'gro rgyal mtshan te// chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyal mtshan che// da ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan brjod// rdo rje bzhad pa ci yin brjod// rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje bzhad// 
192b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad bzhad byed cing // byang chub sems dpa' kun dbugs 'byin// de ni rdo rje bzhad par brjod// ci yi phyir na rdo rje chos// rnal 'byor chen po sangs rgyas chos// sangs rgyas sems can
192b4(rgyud): rtog byed pa// dag pa de bzhin gshegs snying po// de ni rdo rje chos su brjid// rdo rje rnon po ci yin brjed// shes rab rnon po ye shes che// shin du sdug pa'i nyon mongs gcod// shes bya'i sgrib pa'ang
192b5(rgyud): gcod pa na// de ni rdo rje rnon por brjod// rdo rje rgyu yi don ci zhig/ 'khor lo sangs rgyas gar shes pa// chos kyi 'khor lo shin du brtan// dam chos raM yi bcud las byung // de ni rdo rje rgyu zhes bya// rdo rje
192b6(rgyud): smra ba ci yin brjed// sangs rgyas kun gyi chos chen po// mkha' mtshungs tshig dang bral ba ste// tshig mad tshig lus yang dag byung // de ni rdo rje smra bar brjod// ci yi phyir na rdo rje las// sems can smin
192b7(rgyud): dang grol ba las// sangs rgyas kun gyi las gang dang // sangs rgyas lus ni bdag med pa// de ni rdo rje las shes pa// rdo rje bsrung ba ci yin brjod// byang chub sems dpa'i bsrang ba ste// theg
192b8(rgyud): pa dman pa spong byed cing // rtse me nas ltung bsrung byed pa// de ni rdo rje bsrung bar brjod// rdo rje gnod sbyin 'di don ci// sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing // nyon mongs thams cad nges
193a1(rgyud): myur gaspyod// srid pa ji byed gnod sbyin che// rje rje'u tshur ci yin brjod// bden ning gzhan min de bzhin nyid// 'gyur ba med tshan nyid gang // sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid me shes
193a2(rgyud): gangs de ni rdo rje khu tshur brjod// skyon du byang chub sems 'gyur gang // rdo rje sa mas dpar yang dag byung // bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi pa ni// rdo rje rgyal po yang dag byung // sems can sprin byed chags pa'o// 
193a3(rgyud): byang chub spyod pa legs pa ste// de nyid ces bye dam tshig rgya// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // stan gyi sbyin pa'i spyod 'gyur gang // de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// 
193a4(rgyud): do ni rdo rje gzi brjid brjod// 'byung po kun l-i byams pa ni// rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag byung // chos kyi sbyin pa bzhad pa tsho// dbang bskur bzhi por bstan pa yin// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gang // 
193a5(rgyud): chos ni dri las byung // nyon mongs gcod pad+ma rdo rje ste// rdo rje rnon por yang dag byung // mngon shes dang ni mthu la sogs// de ni rdo rje rgyu ru brjod// gsung la sogs pa grub pa ni// rdo rje smra bar yang dag byung // 
193a6(rgyud): ye shes chen po chos chen po// dam tshig ces bya'i dga' chen po// ye shes mngon par rtogs de dag/ rdo rje chos las yang dag byung / brtson 'grus pha rol rgyal po ni// rdo rje las su yang dag byung / 
193a7(rgyud): theg pa dman pa spong byed pa// de phyir rdo rje bsrung bar brjod// nyon mongs srid pa gdon chen po// rdo rje gnod sbyin yang dag byung // de nyid ye shes mngon byang chub// de nyid rdo rje khu tshur brjod// las kyi dam
193a8(rgyud): tshig bzhi po ste/ las kyi sems pa'i bdag nyid che// las kyi dkyil 'khor las byung ba'i// rdo rje las ni de las byung // gzhan yang byang chub sems ni bskyed pa las// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag
193b1(rgyud): byung rdo rje rang bzhin sems de yang // rnam pa bzhi ru byung ba ste// sgrol ba dang ni grol ba dang // dbugs 'byin mya ngan 'das 'god byed// sems dpa' rgyal po chags pa che// rdo rje legs par yang dag byung / 
193b2(rgyud): bsod nams ye shes tshogs nyid las// rdo rje rin chen ra ba ta bsgrags// bsod nams rang bzhin ran chen te// rnam bzhi ji skad bshad pa bzhin// ye shes kyin tshogs rdzogs pa// de na rdo rje chos zhes pa// 
193b3(rgyud): ye shes rang bzhin chos de yang // rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag byung // brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa nyid// de ni rdo rje las su brjod// brtson 'grus rang bzhin las de yang // rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag
193b4(rgyud): byung brtsom dang sbyang ba zhes bya dang // so sor rtog dang bsgrub pa ste// brtson 'grus de bzhin las bzhi po// de las mthar gyis byung ba yin// sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung // rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin
193b5(rgyud): du byang chub sems las yong dgu byung // pha rol phyin drug spyod pa las// rdo rje can rnams byung bar 'dod// de bzhin pa dang ma ni grang // ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// pha ni thabs la mkhas pa ste// padad+ma ma
193b6(rgyud): las ni sangs rgyas sras// rdo rje can rnams gang las byung // rdo rje rgyal po de bzhin chags// rdo rje rin chen rgyal mtshan dang // rdo rje chos dang de bzhin no// de rnams shes rab gtso bor bstan// rdo rjes sa
193b7(rgyud): dpa' rdo rje legs// gzi brjod de bzhin bzhad pa nyid// rgyu dang smra ba sems dpa' chu// de rnams thabs las byung ba yi// rdo rje las drang rdo rje bsrung // gnod sbyin de bzhi khu tshur nyid// shes rab thabs
193b8(rgyud): su grags pa ste// bstan pa chen po tshog su bshad// rdo rje rigs rnams kun gyig tso// rdo rje lcags kyu ma ru bshad// rdo rje rigs chen mchog gyur ma// rdo rje sems dpa'i di bzhin pa// pra ni
194a1(rgyud): rgyal po rgyu// sham ni rdo rje rnon po ste// pad ma'i rigs chen bzang po yi// pad 'dzin gang las byung ba'o// rdo rje gzi brjid rin chen pa// rdo rje rgyal mtshan ma ni yin par brjod// nor
194a2(rgyud): bu rin chen bzang po yi// rin chen gang las byung ba'o// pha ni rgyal po rdo rje las// mra ni gnod sbyin bsrung ba ste// lus kyi rigs can bzang po yin// lus rnams gang las byung ba yi// dang po gang zhig ci zhe na// / 
194a3(rgyud): dngos kun dang po'i sa bon te// rdo rje can kun dang po sems// 'dun dang ngan dang ting nge 'dzin// rigs rnams kun gyi dang por bshad// yang gleng bzhi tshe yan zhe na// rigs bzhi las ni yang dag 'byung // tshangs
194a4(rgyud): pa'i gnas chen ldan pa yi// snong rje'i bde bo nyid can rnams kyi// snying rje chen po gleng bzhi yin// dmigs pa gang zhig yin zhe na// rtog pa med cing dmigs pa med// dang por byang chub sems byung ba'i/ 
194a5(rgyud): pha rol phyin pa mchog drug na// de yi dmigs pa yin par bshad// rkyen gang zhe na// rtag tu srid gsum mngon dga' ba// sems can sdug bsngal 'gyur bltas nas// snying rje dang ni ldan pa yi// bang
194a6(rgyud): chub sems kyis bskal ba'o// gsang ba 'di ni gang nas byung // 'og min stug po nyams dga' zhing // stug po'i zhing khams 'jig med pa'i// de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos// rdzogs par
194a7(rgyud): longs spong tshul 'di byeng // khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung // rdo rje ron chen mchog chen gyi// gzhal yas khang pa yid 'ong zhing // sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ldan pa'i// de nas khab
194a8(rgyud): bdag 'di rnams byung // thog ma tha ma med 'di ci// gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs// sems can kun gyi shes pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po gang // chos dbyangs rdo rje chen
194b1(rgyud): bo / thob ma tha ma med par bshad// rab tu dga' ba nyid 'di ni// byede rjen rab tu grub bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// rdo sems dang du rgyal po che// rab tu dga' ba nyid ces bshad// 
194b2(rgyud): na pa nang nyid ni ji lta // dngos po kun+da ma tshig rdo rje ni// byang chub kyi ni sems zhes byerjod// sangs rgyas skyed byed bzang po yi// rdo rje rab bzang nyid ces bshad// rdo rje snying bdag ji lta bu// gdul bya
194b3(rgyud): 'phags pa skyes mchog nyid// de ni rdo rje snying por brjod// de rnams bdag po rgyal po ni// rdo rje snying por bdag por bshad// ci yi phyir na kun du bzang // byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ldan pa'o// 'gro
194b4(rgyud): ba srid pa'i skye gnas gang // da kun rtag tu bzang bas na// kun du bzang por brjod par bya// rdo rje rdo rje 'chang ba gang // byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// rdo rje gang de rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po
194b5(rgyud): rma rdo rje rdo rje 'chang bar brjod// dang po'i rigs ni ji lta bu// sangs rgyas kun gya byang chub kyis// grags chan rdzogs par byang chub pa// da ni dang por rigs byung ste// de kho nyid kyi rigs las so// yang na
194b6(rgyud): rtsub tu mkhas pa rnams// bskal pa grangs med 'das nas ni// rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob gang // de na dang po'i rigs yin gang // chos kun skye ba med pa dang // 'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// de
194b7(rgyud): nyid shes shing rtogs pa yis// chos rnams thams cad rtog pa med// cho sa dang gang zag bdag med las// rigs de 'byung ba nyid du 'dod// chos rnams 'ga' yang skye ba med// chos rnams 'gag
194b8(rgyud): par 'gyur ba med// rnam par rtog pa nyer zhi gang // de nyid sangs rgyas rigs chen yin// byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod// chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa dang // 'khor ba'i grwanas las
195a1(rgyud): sa dgyur cing // sems can rnams kyis rtogs byed sems// de ni byang chub sems dpur brjod// ci byir sangs rgyas brjod par bya// de bzhin nyid dben shin du brtan
195a2(rgyud): de kho nyid glang tshogs byas rnam// chos kun rtogs pa zhes bya glang // de nyid rtogs pa sangs rgyas brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod// chos kA de nyid yang dag gnas// sgyur
195a3(rgyud): gzhan du mi 'gyur ni// de nyid lam ni sbyin byud na/ de ni de bzhin gshegs zhes bya// bcom ldan 'das ni ci yin brjod// lus dang nyon mongs de bzhin sgra// de bzhin nyon mongs shes
195a4(rgyud): bya'i sgrig/ mi mthun to kyi chos rnams gang // de bcom pas na bcom ldan brjod// de yi bcom pa ci yin brjod// bcom ldan de bzhin bcom pa brjod// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags gcod// 
195a5(rgyud): byed cing nga nyon mongs 'joms shing pham byed pa// de ni de yi bcom par brjod// de bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci// nyon mongs bdud stsogs gcod byed cing // skye dgu ma lus thabs chen gyis// ngan 'gro/ 
195a6(rgyud): srod las skyob byed pa// ston pa ston par brjod pa yin// ci yi phyir na ye shes brjod// de nyid shes pas ye shes te// slar yang chos su rtog pa min// rtag dang chad pa spong byed cing // 'chi med de
195a7(rgyud): bzhin ye shes yin// shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod// rnam pa mang po shes byed cing // rtag pas sdug bsngal las sgrol byed// kun nas nyon mongs chos spong ba// shes rab ye shes zhes bshad// 
195a8(rgyud): ci phyir shes rab brjod par bya// rab sbyor sbyor ba shes 'gyur zhing // khad par du ni rtogs par byed// bden pa de bzhin nyid shes pa'o// shes rab shes rab zhes su bshad// shes rab pha rol phyin
195b1(rgyud): don cing nyan thos rlung rgyal phyi rlol gyi// shes rab las ni bla mar brjod// de bzhin nyid gzhol pha rol phyin// shes rab pha rol phyin zhes byashad// tshul zhes bya don ci yin brjod// de ni dgag pa'i don chen to// 
195b2(rgyud): dngos med dngos po med min pas// gang du dri ma med gyur pa// de ni de yi tshul du brjod// ting 'dzin de na ni ci yin brjod// chos kun dngos po med ces pa'i// mnyam pa nyid du rab gnas pa'o// 
195b3(rgyud): shes rab can gyis lhag par brten// sems la dmigs pa brjod par bya// ci yi phyir na bsam gtan brjod// sdug bsngal thams cad spong byed cing // nyon mongs dra bar rab 'joms pa'i// shes
195b4(rgyud): rab bcas par sems dpa' na// srid pa 'joms par byed pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor don ni tswi yin brjed// chos rgya chen por dam pa dang // thob mo'i'o mchog tu gyur pa des// kun shes kun rig ldan
195b5(rgyud): 'byor pas// rnal 'byor du ni brjod par bya// rnal 'byor pa ni ci yin brjod// shes rab kyis ni des sems pa// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor don sems shes// sems can kun gyi den sems pa// de ni
195b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa don brjod// du ni kun gyi rgyal po che// thams cad rig cing thams cad ster// rdo rje 'chang chen dang po ste// bde ba yi ni rgyu 'di yis// de bzhin du ni 'jig rten gsum// khams gsum
195b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor rig pa'i mchog/ de bzhin 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// bde 'gro dang ni ngan 'gro dang // 'dod pa lnga las longs spyod yin// srid gsum 'di yi dron ci zhig/ sems can kun gyi sems gang
195b8(rgyud): yin/ smod pa gsum du brjod par bya// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa// 'di ltar thams cad rig pa'i mchog/ bdag med byed pa po yang med// chos kyang yod pa ma yin te// dag dang / 
196a1(rgyud): mi dge byed pa yi/ klu dag chags kyis ni bsgribs bya yi// chos ni thog med dus can de// byed pa po ni yod ma yin// rnyog pas nyams pa'i sems ldan pas// rgyu ba dus
196a2(rgyud): zur masbyong bar 'gyur// kun gzhis don thams cad pa/ de ni chos kun bskyed par byung // basmros shing bag chags dang ldan pas// de na srid pa gsum zhes bya// 'dod bralas skyes
196a3(rgyud): grosum gyi// d+hAR+Sha dI kun da ni nyid stu // gzugs dang gzugs myed 'gro ba yin// rgyus rnam sa kun g+hi gnas kyang sbyin// chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir// gos pa kun dang bral du ste// thog ma
196a4(rgyud): meda'i byung chos snying bri// zla bur ma nyon mongs 'gyur// nga nyid kho na chos chen po// nga ni chos kyi snying por bri shod// de bas nga ni rgyal por bshad// nga ni srid pa gsum du bsgrags// 'jig rten gsum
196a5(rgyud): ni yin par brjod// 'dod pa 'jig rten de bzhin gzugs// gzugs med pa yi skye dgu rnams// 'jig rten gsum pa zhes pa de// rang 'byung nga nyid kho na yin// 'dod pa zhes bya chos can de// dag
196a6(rgyud): pa btsal bar bya ba'i phyir// gzung 'dzin chos rnams zhes bya ba'i// de bzhin nyid las so sder rtog/ chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir// nga ni chos de dag par byed// de bas nga ni rgyal po che// 'jig
196a7(rgyud): rten gsum gyi bdag por bstan// ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin gzugs// de bzhin gzugs med rab tu bsgrags// stong pa nyid dang dbyer med pas// nga ni snying por bdag por bshad// khams gsum
196a8(rgyud): pa yid ni ci zhig/ 'dod khams de bzhin gzugs khams dang // gzugs med pa ni nyid dag dang // khams gsum bzung po 'odi dag ni// rang byung nga nyid kho na yin// 'di ni khams dang rgyu dang
196b1(rgyud): don khams gsum gyi ni rgyo sems dpan// stong dang mtshan ma med sems shing // smon pa med pa nga nyid bshad// 'khor ba'i don 'di ci zhig yin// byis pa rnams ni kun du 'byung // de bzhin yang
196b2(rgyud): dang yang du 'khor// 'khor ba dag pa'i bdag nyid de// rangadwa 'byung ngo nyid kho na yin// gang la 'khor ba yod pa yi// chos ni rdul tsam yod ma min// yang dag ma yin kun brtags phyir// de ni thog
196b3(rgyud): mtha' med pa yin// med gang de ni stong pa che// stong pa gang yin de nyid do// de bas 'khor ba de nyid ni// rdo rje 'chang rgyal nga nyid bsgrags// mya ngan 'das pa ci yin brjod// gang zhig de bzhin nyid
196b4(rgyud): rtag stong // bden bzhi'i rang bzhin bzang po nyid// mtshan nyid dang ni dngos po gzugs// mtshan ma nyid ni rnam par spangs// tshig dang sgra yis bzung ba min// rnam par rtog pa yod ma yin// de bas
196b5(rgyud): mya ngan 'das sgra ru/ nga nyid kho na rab shes bya// da yi rtag pa'i don ci zhig shartag cing rtag la 'byung gnas te// rnal 'byor rtog pa dang bral gang // rtag pa de nyid kho nar ni// mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra
196b6(rgyud): ru bsgrags// 'jig pa yang ni ci yin brjod// gang zhig 'khor bar mi 'jug cing // thams cad mi rtag pa nyid de// sdug bsngal 'byung ba 'gog byed pa// 'jig pa mya ngan 'das sgra yin// 
196b7(rgyud): dag pa yang ni ci yin brjod// yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang min// dngos po'ang ma yin dngos med min// brjod bya brjod byed ma yin min// dag pa mya ngan 'das nyid yin// theg pa chen po ci yin brjod// 
196b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs gyur cig/ theg pa kun las nges grol ba// yang dag gyur pa'i sems chen no// theg pa chen po zhes su bshad// mthu dang las rnams 'jug pa dang // tshogs dang / 
197a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor ngo mtshar rnams// rgya chen zhes bya theg chen te// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo mtshar mchog/ nam mkha'i don ni ci zhig yin// sa nyid kyang ni ci yin brjod// 'byung ba med
197a2(rgyud): cing rdzas kyang med// skye bo med cing 'chi ba med// dus gsum dngos po dang bral mchog/ nam mkha'a'o zhes pa'i sgra ru bshad// yang dang yang du skye ba dang // de bzhin nyon mongs kun bdag nyid// grangs med/ 
197a3(rgyud): dpag med dang bral ba// de nyid sa nyid brjod par ba// 'byung ba chen po ga las byung // 'gog pa ci zhig gang gis byed// ma rig nyon mongs la sogs pas// 'byung po chen pa yang dag byung // sa bon
197a4(rgyud): kun ldan kun gzhan// pha dang nang ga bdag nyid 'dod// gnas ni yongs gyur pa dang // kun gzhi sa bon mi 'byung zhing // rtog pa chen po dang bral ba// 'byung ba chen po 'gog pa yin// rtag pa chen po
197a5(rgyud): rgyal mchog tu// gsang zhing sbas pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo las// shin du gsang ba sdug po'i tshogs kyi las thams cad bsdus pa ste// drug pa las sems dpa' bcu drug gi bzhad pa
197a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba ste// bshad pa dang po rdzogs s+ho// // ci yi phyir na phyag rgyar brjodado// gang gis phyag rgya bcing 'gyur ba// des ni srog chags gdugs kun dang // 'gro ba sems can thams
197a7(rgyud): cad dang / rtag tu rgyas ni btab par 'gyur// ci phyir sngagasu brjod par bya// gsang sngags rnams ni 'bod byed cing // gdug pa thams cad bskyod par byed// nyon mongs sngags rnams 'joms byed
197a8(rgyud): cing sangs rgyas chos kyi spyan 'dren yin// tsuM yi phyir na rig sngags brjod// 'dod chags mun pa rnams 'dul ba// nyon mongs rnams kyang rnam par 'dul// ma rig pa ni bzlog byed pa// de ni/ 
197b1(rgyud): rAg sngags nges par brjod// gzugs rnams kyang ni ci yin brjod// chos rnams kyi ni rten byed cing // srid pa'i phyogs ni rab 'joms byed// sangs rgyas chos rnams thob byed cing // dge bya la rten
197b2(rgyud): sbyin pa'ang yin// phyag rgya yin mtshan nyid brjod// sangs rgyas kun dang brtul zhugs ldan// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni// rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad bdag/ spyod len phyag rgya mtshon par
197b3(rgyud): byengaHsngags rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te// chos kyi snying po sgrib byed cing // chos kyi dbyings dang yung dag ldan// sngags kyi mtshan nyid gang yin brjod// rig
197b4(rgyud): sngags kyi mtshan nyid gsungs// 'khor ba myong ba'i sdug bsngal dang // 'dod chags la sogs nyes pa'i tshogs// rigs dang bcas pa zhi byed pa'i// rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod// de bzhin
197b5(rgyud): kho nar gzungs sngags kyi// sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dzin byed cing // chos rnams 'dzin par byed pa dang // dag pa zhes bya 'dzin byed po// gzungs sngags kyi na mtshan nyid brjod// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i sngags
197b6(rgyud): ni gang du ji ltar bcing ba'i thub chen po// phyag rgya dag ni 'ching ba ni// ji ltar rdo rje can kun mnyes// dang po kho nar khrus byos shing // de bzhin phyogs dag bcing dza dang // log 'dren rnams kyang bcing bya
197b7(rgyud): ste gos dag gtsang ma bgo bya zhing // grong dang yul 'khor dag dang ni// grong khyer dang ni grong brdal rnams// de yi dbus su phyag rgya rnams// nam yang bcing bar mi bya ste// lha khang yang na dgon pa'i/ 
197b8(rgyud): ri bo yi ni phug dag gam// rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dben zhing // 'dra 'dzi me pa'i gnas gtsang ma// der ni dkyil dkrung bci' bar bya// bkra shis dkyil dkrud nyid bca' ste// ji ltar byang chub
198a1(rgyud): sems dpa' yis// byang chub snying por bcings pa bzhin// der ni mig dag btsum bya zhing // so la so ni bzhag par bya// mchu gnyis dag ni mnyam sbyar zhing // dran pa rtse
198a2(rgyud): gcig byas nis kyang // sbyor med sbyor ba'i sngags bzlas shing // phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya// phyog rgya'i rnam pa de lta bu// bcings pas rdo rje tsan+da kun mnyes// rlig sngags ji lta bzla
198a3(rgyud): / bAr bya/ dbang phyug rkyen bye gr-isang bas gsungs// rag sngags dag ni zlos pa na// ji ltar yid kyis rdo rje bzlas// dkyil dkrung ji lta de bzhin bya// dra na dang yang ni ma yangs pas// rag sngags dag ni bzla ba
198a4(rgyud): zhing sku nyid kyang ni bsam bya bar// mchu yis ma yin lces kyang min// rkan gnyis kyis kyang ma yin te// lha dang lkog mas kyang ma yin// rtag tu snying kha nas kyang 'dzin// shin du phra ba'i yid kyis ni// sems/ 
198a5(rgyud): ni chos nyid nang chud bya// de ltar bzlas po byas na ni// yid kyis rdo rje bzlas pa yin// oM ni ci zhig yin par bshad// mchog dang nor star dpal dang ga yang // skal bzangs rnam pa dang ldan zhing // dam
198a6(rgyud): bca' ba dang bkra shi sau don// nor bu 'dzin pa'i snying po yin// yi ge hUM na ci yin brjod// sdug bsngal 'chos zhing 'joms par byed// srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed cing // gdug pa bsngags shing gsod
198a7(rgyud): byed pa'i di hUM ni mchog tu dran par bya// yi ge phaT ni tsa yin brjod// gdug dang sdug bsngal 'joms byed cing // bde ba dag ni 'gugs par byed// phaT na 'joms byed sgra yin te// grogs dang bcas pas
198a8(rgyud): 'joms par byed// swA hA zhes pa ci yin brjod// sdig pa thams cad zhi byed cing // dge ba'i tshogs ni 'brel ba dang // nyes par byas pa'i phrog byed cing // sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog
198b1(rgyud): mchod pa ci phyir brjod par bya// mchod par byed pas mchod pa ste// glang du sred bya ma 'jigs pa'o// de yi mchod pa rnam mang 'gyur// phyi rol gyi ni mchod pa man// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyis mchod// de
198b2(rgyud): bzhin du ni thor pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i mchod pa dra rnams ni// 'jigs med rgyal sras rnams kyi yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin no// srid kyi sras kyi mtshungs med dang // cho ga bsrung ba'i gsang ba ni// 
198b3(rgyud): rtag tu rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang // zhugs pa gang dang gang yin pa// de ni dam tshig shes pa yin// dam tshig goms par byed pa yi// dam tshig shes pa yin par brjod// 
198b4(rgyud): bskal pa grangs med 'das pa yi// byang chub sems dang mtshungs par 'gyur// gsang bya'i dam tshig la zhugs pa// de ni dam tshig shes par brjod// ci yi phyir na dkyil 'khor yin// dam pa'i chos kyi
198b5(rgyud): bcud snying po// 'byung ba de ni dkyil 'khor brjod// dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba mchog/ chos tshon shin du brtan pa'o// dkyil 'khor cho ga ji lta bu// cho ga chos dang rnal 'byor te// gsang ba'i thar
198b6(rgyud): pa yang dag 'byung // skye ba 'di nyid kho na la// rab dga' sgrub par byed pa'i lci rtog/ dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs pa yi// skye ba'o ma yang na bud med kyi// bya ba gang zhig bya ba ni// gsungs shig gsang ba'i dbang
198b7(rgyud): phyug che/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro dang // byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang // de bzhin du ni sgrub pa'i mchog/ shin du brtan par bya ba yin// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la// sdom pa
198b8(rgyud): ji ltar sbyin par bya// khyod kyis srog chags bsad mi bya// ma byin par yang blang mi bya// 'dod pas log par g.yem mi bya// brdzun du yang ni spyi mi bya// nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba yin// chung dag 'thung
199a1(rgyud): ba spang bar bya// bya ma yin thams ca// mchog tu sems can gdul bar bya// dam pa rnams la rim gro bya// rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bskur bya// rnal 'byor rig
199a2(rgyud): pas sgrub pa'i phyir// mkhas pa rnams la brten par bya// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi yang ni rnam pa bzhi// yid kyi yang ni gsum dgu dang // ci nus par ni bsgreng bar bya// slob dpon
199a3(rgyud): brnyas par mi bya ste// bla ma sangs rgyas rnams dang 'o tshungs// sngags dang phyag rgya rnams la yang // nam yang brnyas par mi bya'o// 'khor lo rdo rje pad mo sogs// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gang yin pa
199a4(rgyud): sgom pa nyid du mi bya ste// bza' bar yang ni mi bya'o// de bzhin sman ma lha yi gr-ig// rkang pa dag gis rdzi mi bya// de yi steng du 'dug mi bya// slar yang bzhag par mi bgyi'o// lnga yi phyag mtshan bzang
199a5(rgyud): po dang lha yi zhen pa'i mtshan ma rnams// 'gom zhing brnyas par mi pa ste// sems can lan gnod mi bya// de yis srog gi phyir yang ni// 'dor bar mi bya gang zhig yin// 'tsho bo'i srog gi phar
199a6(rgyud): yang na byang chub sems ni der mi ga// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya ni// namo yang dor bar mi bya'o// dkon mchog gsum dang dad pa yong // nam yang kun du btang mi bya// sdom pa btang bar mi bya zhing // 
199a7(rgyud): bdag nyid gdung bar mi bya'o// khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya// mi dag bcu ni spangs nas su// dag pa bcu ni stan byed cing // 'byung po rnams la phan 'dod pa// nang gi bdag nyid khrus su 'dod// 
199a8(rgyud): bdag nyid rab du dag bya'i phyir/ bdag nyid phyag rgyas rgyas gdab cing // phyag rgya thams cad yang dag cing // rnol 'byor pa mi khrus su bshad// gsang ba'i spyod pa khas len pa'o// chu mi khrus
199b1(rgyud): ni byi ba ste// las 'di rnam par rtog pa'i khros// rdo rje slob dpon dag gis bya// yang na tshogs khrus bya ba// mchog tu ngo mtsha ru bshad bya ste// dang por bdag nyid ge bgo zhing // khro bo yang ni
199b2(rgyud): dAn par bya// dron kun rab tu sgrub byud pani// yad gnyis go cha bzang po yin// rdo rje gnod sbyin drag chen dang // khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// oM badz+ra ki li ki la badz+ra hUM phaT// oM hUM go cha'o// oM a
199b3(rgyud): rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi'o// oM i mr-i te hU~M phaT// bdun rtsi 'khyil pa'i 'o// rdo rje'i gsang sngags 'di dang ni// rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje rab 'bar bzod dka' bas// bdag nyid dag ni 'bar bar
199b4(rgyud): bya oM d+hu bo d+hu bAM ka du pra dzA ni swA hA// chu yi nang du 'jug pa dang // snyam pa gsum ni blugs pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs dag la// rig sngags 'di ni brjod pa yin// rig sngags mngon
199b5(rgyud): paur bzlas pa yi// sa yi phung po gsum dag ni// bdag gi sted dang smad dang dbus// rab tu dag byed mchog yin no// oM b+hu ru dza la hUM// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran nas// rig sngags
199b6(rgyud): thams cad mngon zlos pa'i// chu ni phyag rgya gun gyis blang // rig sngags 'di ni gsang bar 'dod// phyogs ni ji ltar bcing ba yin// me lha rgyal chen shar phyogs su// lho phyogs su ni gshin
199b7(rgyud): dang nub tu rlung lha nyid dang ni// byang du chu lha gzhom par 'dod// rnal 'byor pas ni gzugs bzhi ni// phyogs bzhi dag ni nges par bcing // de nas steng 'og mtshams rnams su// rdo rje nag mos
199b8(rgyud): nges par ba shad// bgegs bcing ba ni ji ltar lags// rdo rje khu tshur rab 'bar dang // rdo rje nyi ma ltar 'bar dang // rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya yis// bgegs bcing ba ni brten par 'gyur// dga'
200a1(rgyud): pa chen pos ji lta bu// rab tu gus pas phyag dag bya// phyag rgya bzhi yis phyogs bzhi ru// lnga pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yis// steng dang 'ug dang 'tshams rnams su// spod
200a2(rgyud): dang bcas pas phyag pa'o// rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyis// mchog tu gsong ba drim pa yis// brtsegs pas phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du// de bzhin nyid du bcang bar bya// mchod pa ji ltar yin zhe
200a3(rgyud): nA rig sngags mngon par bzlas brjod dang // phyag rgya bcing ba lhu dza min dang // rnal 'byor sgom pa'i mchod pa dang // sgrub pa dag gi mchod pa'o// kau sta no bsreg la sau ni r+Na lta gu/ kau lus kyi las
