243b5(rgyud): thams cad gcod pa'i phyir/ rtag tu drag po nyid du 'gyur// sdig pa ldan pa rnam spong na// des ni gsang sngags rab sgrub 'gyur/ drag dang ldan pa'i
243b6(rgyud): sems ldan pa// dris ni 'grub par 'gyur bar 'dod// sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i phyir/ rtag tu drug pa nyid du 'gyur/ sdig pa ldan
243b7(rgyud): ma spong ni// des ni gsang bai rabA 'grub 'gyur// chos min spyod pa rnal 'byor mchog grub yin// gzung dang 'dzin pa chos shes pa/ gang che spong ba gyur/ 
243b8(rgyud): pa ni/ rtag tu chos mchog spyod pa ste// des ni gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur// srid gsum mngon par chags pas rnal 'byor sgrub/ rnal 'byor sa lha yongs
244a1(rgyud): rtogs phyir// srid gsum la ni chags par 'gyur// sems can don du gtogs pa'i phyir/ de ni rnal 'byor sgrub pa yin/ 
244a2(rgyud): rtag du 'dod pa'i 'dod chags rgyal 'gyur bya// gsang ba chen po brtan par sgrub pa yin// 'dod par bya ba 'dod pa ste/ 'dod pa'i dod chags zhes bshad
244a3(rgyud): rab tu dga' la chags po ste// blo ldan blo gros de la chags/ gaN+DI bar khyor ba gang 'thungs na/ bshang pa cung zad bza' bar bya// thams
244a4(rgyud): dag pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// gci ba rdo rje zhes bshad de// gsang ba pad ma yang dag ldan// dga' ba'i chos la reg
244a5(rgyud): pas ni/ de nas thar pa'i grong khyer 'gro// rnal 'byor chen po bA ga 'thung // rnal 'byor rab tu sgrub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes gang / bA ga yi
244a6(rgyud): ni sgra ru bsgrags// gang zhig bdud rtsi btung ba 'thung / rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu/ dkyil 'khor chen po brtag par
244a7(rgyud): rigs kyi lha yi rnal 'byor byung / rig pa sdug pa nyid yin te/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba brtag byas na/ skad cig de la rab 'grub 'gyur/ 
244a8(rgyud): khro zhing gtum la drag po che// rdo rje yi ni rigs su 'gyur/ gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams la khro/ 'khor ba'i sbyor 'byung las sdang ba/ 
244b1(rgyud): 'byor phun tshogs 'gyur// rigs ni nyams par 'gyur ba yin/ dge ba thams cad spangs nas ni// chos min pa ni yang dag spyad// bya sbyin byed pa'i
244b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas// las kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor rtog pa kun spangs nas// dge ba la ni rab tu 'jug/ chos la rtog par gyu
244b3(rgyud): pa nyid/ chos min kun du spyod mi bya// bye min gang zhig dngos med do// de nyid brtan par byed par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po de lta bus/ 
244b4(rgyud): rtog pa chen po rab 'grub 'gyuraro// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa yi// drug pa gsang ba'i tshegs chen po'o// mchog tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor rtse mo las
244b5(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dgongs pa rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba/ rnam par bshad pa gsum pa rdzogs s+ho// // rtog pa thams
244b6(rgyud): cing bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba lasade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mchog gsang ba'i chos kyi gnas mchog
244b7(rgyud): tu gsang ba ya'i rdzogs s+hod// #sangs rgyas dang byang chub
244b8(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum gshegs pa'i sras bcas la// yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas// mchog tu rmad 'byung rig pa'i rgyud// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya
245a1(rgyud): hUM a dza ka ra ho da ra sa// oM a tran ha ha he wa ra d+hi d+ha d+ha d+ha d+hi d+ha ra ni ma i ho// raM ka ka ma rna naM// ka brtse hUM baM/ de la gsang ba mchog tu gsang // ye shes dam pa'i rang bzhin cha// rgyal po
245a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i mdo dbang po// thag pa chen po kun du bsdus// rigs 'byung blo ldan chen po dang // sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba dang // rdo rje kun dbang cho ga ni// mchog tu rmad 'byung ba shad par bya// ngo bo nyid kyi sku
245a3(rgyud): / ru niHsangs rgyas rdo rje can du 'byung // rmad 'byung chos kyi rgyud chen po thar pa mchog tu bstan pa ste// thub pa'i dbang phyung rnam snang mdzad// thugs kha nas ni rgyud 'di phyung // kun du bzang po rdo rje'i bdag/ phyag na rdo rje
245a4(rgyud): 'od po che// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// don yod dbang phyug dam pa ste// thag pa chen po byang chub sems// bden pa dam tshig zhes bya ba// thub pa chen pos chos phung po// stong phrag dag na grangs med
245a5(rgyud): gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' mchod rten gyis// chos kyi mngon par rtogs pa bshad// so sor rtogs pa'i mngon rtogs dang // de bzhin mngon par byang chub dang // dra pe byed mchog ni mngon du byung // de bzhin ya
245a6(rgyud): shes thob pa nyid// ye shes chen po chos 'di ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni mngon rtogs bshad// theg pa chen po mngon rtogs yin// shin du gsang ba'i tshul chen po// rang sems so sor rtogs pa ni// byang chub
245a7(rgyud): sems dpa'i tshul chen po// pha rol phyin drag spyod pa'i mchog/ theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus// mthar thugs ltas chen mom rgyam bzhin ste// thag pa chen po mngon par rtogs// ye shes thob pas rtogs byed pa/ 
245a8(rgyud): spyod pa bcu'i byang chub che// pha rol phyin pa dam pa bcu// sa bcu kun du rtogs pa ste// theg po chen po mngon par bsdus// byang chub chen po rgya che ga// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog/ kun mkhyen pa ya
245b1(rgyud): shes rdzogs byang chub// theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// theg pa chen po chos kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs ma kun gyi gas // chos kyi gnas
245b2(rgyud): ni yongs su gyur// sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor shin du drag/ mkha' mnyam dang ni mtshungs pa yin// gnas ngan ldan ni kun nas grol// rnam par rtog pa kun las grol// nyon
245b3(rgyud): rmongs dri ma kun dag pa// dang po zla ba bzhin du mthong // thugs rje'i brtse ba yang dag byung // sems can rjes su 'dzin par byed// byang chub sems ni dag po che// sangs rgyas zhing ni gos pa med// dge ba'i chos
245b4(rgyud): gyis kun du gang // nyon mongs thams cad nges par 'joms// zla chen gang ba'i dbus su ni// byang chub zla ba gnyis pa ste// bskal po grangs med gsum byang chub// yang dag nges las byung ba nyid// dam pa'i chos
245b5(rgyud): mchog grangs med pa// sbyin pa'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan// sa dang sa ru rtogs byed pa// ye shes dag pa zug med pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// de yi rdo rje bzhin du brtag/ sangs rgyas kun kyi sku gang yin// 
245b6(rgyud): snang ba med cing gnas pa med// ma skyes ma byas dag pa ste// sku dang 'jigs pa rnam par spangs// mi tshig mi mchod mi byed pa// lhag ma med pa chos kyi sku// rdo rje'i bdag nyid yang dag byung // rdo rje'i sku ni bla na
245b7(rgyud): med sku dang gsung ba de bzhin spyod// spyod yul kun du rtogs pa dang // lnga po de dag kun thun mong // sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid can// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// chos kyi ye shes bla na med// lnga pa
245b8(rgyud): de dag gi sang ba zhes// snying por yang ni de dag gsungs// gang phyir don kun grub pa'i phyir// sngon ni don kun grub par byed// bcom ldan kun du bzang po dang // rdo rje las ni bla na med// rdo rje dbyangs na brtan
246a1(rgyud): pa'i bdag/ rnam par snang mdzad bla na med// de dag gsang ba'i mtshan nyid yin// rnal 'byor gyi ni gnas skabs thob// de nas snying po ni/ oM tsit+ti pra t+yai be d+haM karo mi// oM b+ha d+hi tsit+ta ud
246a2(rgyud): pa ta ya me// oM t+pA ti badz+ra/ oM baN+Din at+ma kodz+haiM/ oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa twa ta a haM// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni// thub pa yi ni thugs khar zhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsung // rdorje
246a3(rgyud): rigs pa 'di brjod do// oM sar+b+ba ta thA gAng a b+hi sa~M b+ho d+hi d+hi d+hi badz+ra tiSh+Tha// sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad kyis// rig pa 'di ni brjod pa na// rnam par snang mdzad thub chen po// de nyid ye shes mngon sangs rgyas/ 
246a4(rgyud): de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni// nyid kyi thugs las byung bar 'gyur// chos bzhi rnal 'byor chen po ni// byin nas lha mos dbang bskur gyur// sems can kun don yang dag ldan// bsam pa thams cad
246a5(rgyud): yongs rdzogs byed// mkha' mtshungs brjod las yang dag byung // rin chen chos gos dbang bskur gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes gang // ye shes pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// rnam pa kun mkhyen ye shes cha/ 
246a6(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug chen pos byin// bya ba kun la don yod pa// dga' ldan la sogs rnam par 'phrul// gdul bar bya ba'i thabs kyi las// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlab sa// sangs rgyas kun gyi
246a7(rgyud): gsang ba gang // byang chub sems ni tshul chen po// nyon mongs kun lasna rnam par grol// sangs rgyas gtso bo chen pos byin// dbang bskur tsam gyi mdo la ni// gsang ba'i mang ni yang dag byung // sangs
246a8(rgyud): rgyas kun bdag rgyal batsho// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o// de nas snying po ni// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a sha dza A b+hiShi ki hUM// de nas sangs rgyas rgyal po che// chos ni mngon gsum gyur pa mdzad
246b1(rgyud): sdug pa'i gnas na gnas pa ni// sangs rgyas lhan cig sna tshogs cha// rnal 'byor dang bcas bdag nyid che// rdo rje dbang po'i gnas su gshegs// de nas ngo bo nyid sku las/ slar yang byung
246b2(rgyud): bai spros par gyur// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las chen po// ji bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas// rdo rje'i dbus su bzhugs par gyur// sngon gyi sangs rgyas mdzad pa bzhin// sangs
246b3(rgyud): rgyas kyi ni mdzad pa bstan// gsang ba rol pa'i 'khor lo ru// ske ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid che// sna tshogs rnal 'byor bdag nyid che// 'khor
246b4(rgyud): lo thams cad bzhags par 'gyur// phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams thams cad de/ rnga bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas// sangs rgyas rol pa yang dag ldan/ sangs rgyas rol pa bzhags
246b5(rgyud): par gyur// dus gsum rjes su 'thun ye shes nr-i// sangs rgyas kyi ni rnal 'byor brjod// hUM badz+ra satwa/ oM badz+ra ra da na// hri badz+ra d+harma a badz+ra kArma// bskalu pa grangs mud gsum sngon du/ 
246b6(rgyud): bcom ldan byang chub mdzad pa gang // rnal 'byor sems dpa' bzhir bcas pa'i// rdo rje dkyil 'khor snang bar bgyi// byang chub chen po chos kyi mchog/ byang chub chen po tshul chen po/ rdo rje
246b7(rgyud): sems dpa'i ring bzhin gyi// zla ba ni dkyil 'khor snang // pha rol phyin pa spyod pa na// sngon du bcom ldan spyad pa gang // rdo rje rin chen spyod pa yis// zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang // theg
246b8(rgyud): pa chen po mngon par rtogs// chos kyi mchog ni rab rtogs pa// rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba yis// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rab snang ba// sems can smin cing grol bar byed/ sangs rgyas mdzad
247a1(rgyud): // rab tu 'jug/ brtson 'grus dang ldan las chen po// zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang // byang chub sems ni gas pa chen po// bsod nams tshogs dang shes rab dang / 
247a2(rgyud): byang chub spyod pa rab sbyor ba// rgyal ma bzhin rab tu byung // go cha'i sbyor ba gang yin dang // spyod pa de bzhin rtogs pa ste// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang chungargyal po bzhin rnam par byung / 
247a3(rgyud): byang chub snying po mngon rtogs dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur dang // chos kyi 'khor los gdul ba dang // rgyal po bzhin rnam par byung // tshe skye mtshol mngon par rtogs pa dang // ting nge 'tshan
247a4(rgyud): sgo gzungs dang na// sangs rgyas thams cad thabs chen po// rgyal po bzhin rnam par byung // rgyal chen rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang // de bzhin chos na mngon rtogs dang // chos mchog byang chub chen
247a5(rgyud): po dang // rnam pa bzhin yongs su byung // mgon pos thugs kha nas spros te// rgyal po bzhin rnam par byung // phyogs rnams thams cad kun nas na// sa na thams cad g.yos byas nas/ 
247a6(rgyud): phyogs rnams thams cad kun nas ni// 'od kyis gsal ba snang bar byas// mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ rmad du brjod pa ched du brjod/ a mu'o gsang ba'i chos chen po/ 
247a7(rgyud): e ma'o ye shes bla na mang // a ma'o ya shas 'khor lo'o// a ma'o sangs rgyas rmad 'byung che// a ma'o sangs rgyas thabs chen po/ !/ a ma'i ngo mtshar ldan pa nyid// mi snang rang bzhin la
247a8(rgyud): chos rnams ni// 'di ni snang bar bcas par dmigs// rgyal po rnal 'byor chen po rnams// phyogs rnams kun du gsal byed cing // chos kyi sku yi ting 'dzin gnas// nam mkha'
247b1(rgyud): dang mi tshungs rmad byung ba// gang zhig shar gyi phyogs cha ru// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun// / rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// chos kyi dbyangs su yang dag sngo// chos kyi sku ru spros nas ni/ 
247b2(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings ni sdig par gyur// gang phyir shar du yang dag byung // mi bskyod pa ru yang dag nyid// lho ru rdo rje rA ni cha ste/ nub du rdo rje chos yin no// byang du rdo rje las nyid de// chos kyi sku
247b3(rgyud): ru ldan par 'gyur// ma lus mchog tu brtan pa yi// sangs rgyas thams cad phyogs bzhi ru// mi bskyod rin chen rdo rje dbang // don yod grub pa bla na med// rgyal po bzhi ni phyogs bzhi ru
247b4(rgyud): rdo rje'o steng du bzhugs par 'gyur// phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams bzhi dag du// mnyam par dmigs nas bzhugs par 'gyur// rdo rje rnal 'byor rgyal po che// sangs rgyas thams cad yang
247b5(rgyud): dag bsdus// chos dbyangs dag pa'i ngo bo nyid // gsang ba kun du khyab par gnas// dbus su mgon po rnam snang mdzad// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur ba// phyogs dang las
247b6(rgyud): mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kun// bstan par mdzad nas rab tu bzhugs// gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgya la// thub pa'i skyes mchog mi bskyod pa// sangs rgyas thams cad brten mdzad nas/ 
247b7(rgyud): shar gyi phyogs su yang dge bzhugs// dbang bskur ba ni rgyal po che// nam mkha'i thus sgo mchog ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bstan mdzad nas// lho yi phyogs su bzhugs par 'gyu
247b8(rgyud): dag pa'i chos 'dzin rgyal po che// chos 'dzin gtso bo chen po ni// sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas// nub kyi phyogs su bzhugs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mdzad pa 'dzin
248a1(rgyud): rgyal po// don yod grub pa bla na med// sangs rgyas thams cad bsran mdzad nas// bang gi phyogs su bzhugs par 'gyur/ mi bskyod rdo rje sems dpa'
248a2(rgyud): ste/ nam mkha' snying rin chen 'byung gnas yin// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od dpag med// rdo rje las ni don yod grub// gsang bzhin shin du gsang ba'i mchog/ N+Di / chos
248a3(rgyud): dbyings brtan pa gang yin pa// de nyid mgon po rnam snang mdzad// sangs rgyas kun kyi bdag por bshad// sangs rgyas thams cad phyogs bzhi ru// sbyin pa bzhir
248a4(rgyud): ni rab tu gnas// phyogs 'tshams drug na brtan mdzad nas// rnam par snang mdzad yang dag ldan// shar gyi sangs rgyas dbang phyug rgya la// rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs ma
248a5(rgyud): mnga'// thub pa mi bskyod snang ba des// snying po bzhin na gsungs par 'gyur// hU~M badz+ra sa twa/ dza badz+ra rA dza/ ho badz+ra ra ga/ sa badz+ra sa d+hA// dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya
248a6(rgyud): ba/ de bzhin rdo rdo rje sems dpa' sogs// 'jigs pa mi mnga' sems dpa'i bzhi// mgon po'i thugs las yang dag byung // phyag na rdo rje rje bzang mchog/ rdo rje lcog
248a7(rgyud): kyu chen po bsnams// rdo rje chags pa bde chen po// rdo rje legs pa rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje rgyal po bzhi thub pa// thub pa'i thugs kha nas byung ba// grang sa bzhi dag ni ldan pa dag/ 
248a8(rgyud): 'khor lor mi gyis bzhugs par 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen bskal pa che// rin chen 'byung ldan rab grags pa// lha yi bdag po sangs rgyas che// snying po bzhi ni gsungs pa
248b1(rgyud): pa gang // oM badz+ra rad na/ a badz+ra te dzA/ trAM badz+ra ke k+sha rbA ha badz+ra ha sra// rdo rje rin chen rin chen po// grangs bzhi dang ni yung dag ldan// rin chen rgyal po lus byung ba// thub pa'i
248b2(rgyud): thugs kha nas byung ba// rdo rje rin chen rin po che// rdo rje gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin du mtho// rdo rje bzhad pa rdzu 'phrul tshe// de drag re re lus kyang ni// rgyal po
248b3(rgyud): grangs med rab tu byung // g.yas dang g.yon drang rgyab dag dang // dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun du bzhugs// drag pa'i chos ni ye shes che// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med// shes
248b4(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin drag pas// snying po bzhin gsungs par gyur// hri badz+ra d+harma/ d+hI badz+ra tAM k+Sha NaM/ maM badz+ra he tu/ raM badz+ra b+hA sha/ chos kyi rgyal po bzhi yang ni/ mgon po'i thugs kha
248b5(rgyud): nas byung ba// sems can kun la phan don du// 'khor lo rims bzhin bzhugs par gyurA// chos rnams kun la don yod pa// spyod pa yi ni slob dpon mchog/ don yod grub pa
248b6(rgyud): rgyal po che// snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyu ro// kaM badz+ra karma/ hU~M badz+ra rak+ShiN+Di Adz+ra muSh+NI/ kun kyang 'khor lo yang dag ldan// ye shes dad pa mchog gA rnams// sangs rgyas rnam
248b7(rgyud): 'phrul 'khor lon// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog/ sngon gyi byang chub sems gang yin// rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam pa byung // bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni// rdo rje rin chaH
248b8(rgyud): nyid du gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin dag pa// de ni rdo rje chos mchog ldan// thabs la mkhas pas 'khor lon// rdo rje las su rnam par 'phrul// de nas chos 'dzin rdzogs
249a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas// chos dang longs spyod pa'i rdzogs pa'i rtan// byung gyur byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas mdzad pa bla na med// byang chub sems ni mchog tu
249a2(rgyud): 'dzin// dgu pa'i chos kyis 'dul 'dzad pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po che// dbu ma'i chos las rnam pa byung // gzhan yang rjes su brtse ba dang // de bzhin shes rab thebs dang ldan// chos kyi
249a3(rgyud): rgyal po bzhi po de// rnam par snang mdzad thugs las byung // 'du shes 'du shes med pa min// brtags pa ma yin gnas pa med// bdag dang ches lta ba min// rnam rtog las ni byung ba
249a4(rgyud): mni// ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru ni// so sor snang ba yang dag byung // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yis ni// chos kyi ljongs spyod 'di lta bu// thams cad brjod pa dang bral zhing // zhing dang phra ba blta/ 
249a5(rgyud): bar dka'// sangs rgyas rnams ni dgongs mdzad cing // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mthong bar gyur// de nyid theg pa che rang bzhin// mdzod chen po'i rlung bzhin mchog/ shes rab chen po
249a6(rgyud): thabs chen po// theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus// sangs rgyas ye shes mngon par rtogs// mngon du bcom ldan mdzad gang yin// sems dpa' bzhi po de rnams dang // thag
249a7(rgyud): chun mngon par rtogs par 'dod// byang chub kyi ni sems de las// thub pa mi bskyod rnam par byung // sems de yang na rnam pa bzhi// rnam pa bzhin yang dgra byung // byang chub sems gang
249a8(rgyud): de rdo rje che// rdo rje phyag na rdo rje yin// sgrol dang grol dang dbugs 'byin pa// lcags kyu 'dzin par rab tu gnas// sems dpa' brtan pa don yod pa// ye shes de nyid shin du chags/ 
249b1(rgyud): slar yang brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ legs pa las ni yang dag byung // gang zhag mgon po thub byung ba// sems can rjes su 'dzin mdzad pa// ran chen 'byung ldan zhes bya ba// de ni slar yang
249b2(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi// chos kyi sbyin pA rin po che// mi 'jigs pa gzi brjid yang dag gnas// byams pa rgyal mtshan yang dag brjod// zang zing gzhan par yang dge ldan// shes rab pha rol
249b3(rgyud): phyani rgyal po/ tshe dpag med ni rnam pa bzhi// so sor rig par mngon par rtogs// ting nge 'dzin sgo pad ma can// sdug bsngal gcod pa shin du rno// chos kyi 'khor lo cha dang ldan/ 
249b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul gzhan// brjod du med pa chos kyi mchog/ don yod grub pa mdzad pa ste// thabs de yang ni rnam pa bzhi// sems can la la sogs 'dul ba las// rdo rje las
249b5(rgyud): ni mchod pa che// theg pa gzhan du mi 'jug pa// rdo rje bsrung ba rab tu brjod// gdug pa 'dal zhing dusu byed pa// rdo rje gnod sbyin yang dag sde brjod// phyir mi ldog pa khu tshur yin// de
249b6(rgyud): nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i mtshan ni// rdo rje sems dpa'/ rdo rje rgyal po/ rdo rje tshogs pa/ rdo rje legs pa/ rdo rje rin chan// rdo rje gzi brjid/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan// rdo rje bzhud pa/ 
249b7(rgyud): rdo rje rgyu/ rdo rje s+sa hAdz+dzaH/ rdo rje bsrung ba/  rdo rje gnod sbyin/ rdo rje khu tshur/ da las dang po na rdo rje sems dpa'/ rdo rje rin chen/ rdo rje chos/ rdo rje las/ de nas
249b8(rgyud): rnam grangs mi bskyod pa// rin tshan 'byung ldan/ 'od dpag med/ don yod grub pa/ de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i snying po na/ hUM ma~M a hA/ rgyal po'i snying po'o// oM hU~M hriM hU~M/ bcu
250a1(rgyud): // drug gi snying po ni// hUM dza ho sa/ oM a tra ha/ \u0f7fhr-i d+haM maM raM/ kaM haM hUM baM/ shin du gsang ba'i rgyud chen po 'di'i pha rol du phyin pa rnam pa bcu dru ga hUM yang dag par byung ba/ 
250a2(rgyud): gang yin pa de na rdo rje'i pha rol du smin pa dam pa'o// byang chub sems kyi mthu yis ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyi pha rol byon/ bos pha rol phyin ldan pa// rdo rje sems mar brjod par
250a3(rgyud): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi pa na// pa rol phyin pa mchog chen po// chos bzhi cig tu gyur pa ni// rdo rje rin chen ma ru brjod// gsang ba'i cho swA k+She ya ga ni// de nyid pha rol phyin pa'i mchog
250a4(rgyud): phra rol phyin pa chen las byung // rdo rje chos mar brjod par bya// sbyor ba yang dag shes pa gang // rdo rje las ni mer brjod par bya// rgyal mar pha rol phyin pa na// rdo rje pha rol
250a5(rgyud): phyin pa'i mchog/ gang phyir rnam par rol pa mchog/ sgeg mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// brgyan pa'i lus can yid 'phrog ma// phreng ba tshul khrims pha rol phyin// chad du
250a6(rgyud): brjod pa ched du brjod// glu ma bzod pa'i pha rol phyin// myur du sangs rgyas ster byed pa// gar ma brtson 'grus pha rol phyin// 'dod pa'i 'dam gyis mgos pa// me tog
250a7(rgyud): bsam gtan pha rol phyin// kun du mtshungs par spro ba yi// bdug pa shes rab ril phya ni// dI nga mi dag los phyir phyogs// thabs na dri dang yang dag ldan// phyogs rnams
250a8(rgyud): kun du snang byed pa// smon lam snang ba chen po yin// thabs kyi pha rol phyin zhes bya// stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa mchog// mi shes mun pa 'joms mdzad pa// lha mo shes rab
250b1(rgyud): pha rol phyin// bdu rnams thams cad pham byed pa// lha mo ma thib pha rol phyin/ !TA/ byang chub rdzogs pa'i byang chub cha// rdo rje pha rol+la phyin pa'i tshul+yA// rmos kyi 'khor lho bskor/ 
250b2(rgyud): mAdza dA damr-i/ bdug med chos kyi rang bzhin mtshog/ rdo rje'i lha mo yang dgra byung / 6/ rdo rje'i pha rol phyin pa mchog// de nas 'di rnams kyi gasteng ba'i mr-ing mA/ rdo rje sam sa ma
250b3(rgyud): ran rgyun ma// rdo rje chos me/ rdo rje las ma/ rdo rje skrag mo/ rdo rje phreng ma/ rdo rje glu ma/ rdo rje gar ma/ rdo rje me tog mo// rdo rje bdug ma/ rdo rje dri ma/ dzarje mor ma ma/ rdo rje thob mordo rje 'a
250b4(rgyud): ma rdo rje mthub ma/ rdo rje las ma/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen mo// rnam pa bzhini rab tu 'jug/ sems can dgug pa'i thabs chen po/ rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba shad// byang chub spyong
250b5(rgyud): la stong pa// rdo rje zhugs pa rab tu bsngags// thug pa gzhan la 'dod med pa// da ni rdo rje lcags sgeg bshad // ches rnams thams cad skye ba med// rab tu 'od gasngal bzod nas ni/ 
250b6(rgyud): theg pa thag pad+ma/ rdo rje dril bu zhes byur brjod// de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i mngon 'di dag ni// rdo rje lcags / rdo rje zhags pa/  rje lcags sgrog/ rdo rje rdul blo/ de nas pha rom na
250b7(rgyud): pathabs kyi 'khor la// drang ga thams cad kyi snying pa ni// hU~M /  la ldan no/ ga sa mchis mas// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor 'di yis nichos kyi dbyings spyad ni rgyun/ 
250b8(rgyud): su na ma par 'gyur// dbus kyi sa ngas rgyas sangs rgya ma tsho// 'khor lo lnga dang yang dga'as// de rjerna la 'byor dbang phrug na/ ma 'byin dzin
251a1(rgyud): ra r+ya zhing yang rdo rje ni// grangs med pas kyang yongs su bskor// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung // dag pa'i chos kyi tshul chen po/ da na spyad rnams kyi snying
251a2(rgyud): po ni/ oM satwa badz+ri/ oM rAd na badz+ra/ oM d+harma badz+ra/ oM karma badz+ra/ oM badz+ra la s+ya/ oM badz+ra mA le/ oM badz+ra gIrti/ oM nai ra ti badz+ra/ oM badz+ra pu shrI/ oM badz+ra d+ha rmA/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he/ oM badz+ra
251a3(rgyud): A la~M ke/ oM badz+ra A gu sha dz+dza/ oM badz+ra pu sha/ oM badz+ra pa s+pho ta/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he/ de nas 'di dag thams cad kyi/ thun mong gi ni snying po/ mgon po rnam par snang / 'khor
251a4(rgyud): lo bsgyur ba chen po bzhi// sems dpa' chen po bcu drug dang // gsang chan lha mo bcu gnyis dang // sgo bsrung ba ni bzhi dge ste/ sum bcu rtsa bdun lus ma nyung / gsang ba'i lha mo
251a5(rgyud): bzhi po ni// phyis kyi pha rol phyin pa mchog/ gsang po'i lha mo kun las na// mi bskyod rjes thogs nyid du yang dag byung // byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid ches// sum bcu rtsa bdun bgrang
251a6(rgyud): mi bya// rnam par snang mdzad thugs kha nas// chos kyi rigs mchog yang dag byung // byang chub sems las kun du byung // mi bskyod la sogs tshogs chen po// nga yis rdo rje'i rigs su
251a7(rgyud): bya shod// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid chu// sbyin pa'i spyod pa kun du byung // rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa// nga yaMs rin chen rdo rje'i bdag nyid cha// dag pa'i cho sna lus kun du byung // tshwa dpag
251a8(rgyud): myed la stsogs paM ni// de ni pad ma'i rigs su bshad// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid cha// grub pa'i las las kun du byung // don yod grub pa la sogs pa// da ni las kyi rigs su bo shad// na mkha
251b1(rgyud): mdzod ni las chen po// rdo rje ji bzhin lha mo yang // lha mo je bzhin gtam de 'dra// ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin zhi// ji ltar zhi ba de bzhin byung // rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod mtshungs// shar gyi
251b2(rgyud): phyogs su yang dag bzhugs// rdo rje rin chen rin chen mchog/ lho'i phyogs su yang dag bzhugs// rgyal po 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon// nub kyi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs// bya ba kun
251b3(rgyud): lo don yod pa// byang phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur// dbus su mgon po rnam snang mdzad// kun mkhyen ye shes rnal 'byor che// nub kyi phyogs zla bo gang ba bzhin du ni// rdo rje 'khor lo glen
251b4(rgyud): med/ gang phyir kun du sngon 'gro ba// rdo rje byang chub sems don ldan// de las spyod pa de las chos// de las spyod pa spyad dka' ba// sems dpa' chen po bla na med// rdo rje rnal 'byor bzhugs
251b5(rgyud): par gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gcig gis// mgon po la ni gsol ba gdab// thub pa'i dbang phyug rdo rje sems// mgon po la ni gsol ba 'debs/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag lus
251b6(rgyud): khyod la brten nas de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// khyod la brtan nas byung bar gyur// dang po'i thugs ni rnal 'byor che// byang chub sems ni shin du rnyed dka' ba// kye ma
251b7(rgyud): sems can 'di sdug bsngal// sangs rgyas chos kyi snod min pa// sems can rnams kyi don chad du// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dam pa gsungs// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog gnas
251b8(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug gis// mgron po'i gsung ni gsan nas su// 'khor lo sbyor ba gsungs par 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'khor lo chen po grong khyer cha// sangs rgyas kun kyi thugs las
252a1(rgyud): snying po chos mchog rnal 'byor ldan// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i bstan pa yi// sems can 'di dag bya ba min// de rnams bde ba'i don chad du// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bshad
252a2(rgyud): byar bya// rdo rje slob dpon cho ga'i tshul// bdag nyid ji bzhin rnal 'byor byas// sangs rgyas byang chub thob gyur pa// da la dang po rab bshad bya// da ru sems can thams cad kun// kun du
252a3(rgyud): bstan par rab 'jug ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rdo rje nyid// thob 'gyur 'di la tha tsom med// theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus// sangs rgyas byang chub shin du gsang // thar pa mchog du bsten
252a4(rgyud): pa nyid// sngon du gzhung mchog mnyan par ba// bskul pa brgya phrag dag tu na// tsa ste mngon par brtson pas kyang // gang zag bzhin 'jig rten du// bsgrubs kyang grub pa nyid ma 'gyur// bong chub
252a5(rgyud): sems ni ma skyes dang // the tshom ldan pa nyid dang na// dka' ba bzhin du ma byed dang // dad pa med nyid 'grub mi 'gyur// ji ltar dus gsum gshegs de bzhin// byang chub du ni sems bskyed nas
252a6(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la dad byas nas// the tsom med pa yi ni mchog/ khyim pa dang na rab tu byung // phegs na gnyis po 'dri bsgrub pa// ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham pa ru// go rims bzhin
252a7(rgyud): du rab bshad pa// byang chub sems ni lhur blangs nas// lha gzhan 'dod pa brtson mi bya// dkon mchog gsum la dad bya zhing // de la mchod pa rab tu brtson// srog gcod rga dang 'khrig
252a8(rgyud): pa dang // brdzun dang myos byed rnam par sbyang // khyim pa'i sdom pa la gnas nas// de tshe rig pa'i rgyal po sgrub// gal tid ni rab drung gyur// sdom pa gsumya la yang dag gnas
252b1(rgyud): so sor thar dang byang chub na/ rnyigs 'dzin sdom pa'i mchog yin no// zla ba'am yang na lo rA 'am// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// ston du reg pa'i klut+pal zhugs bya/ kaunyin rwa bzhin
252b2(rgyud): du ci nus pam// thun mang du ni cho ga sgrub// rtogs pa 'dir ni thun bzhi ru// ji ltar+ya 'os shing 'tsham pa ru/ sdig pa thams cad bshegs par bya// sod nams kunau la rjes yid rang
252b3(rgyud): ngas rgyas kun lnga gsol ba gdab// de ying bsod nams byang chub bsngo// de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi// sangs rgyas bla med thams cad lnga// gsol ba gdang ci per rabya btud nas// 
252b4(rgyud): zhabs la mnya me gzhag phag bya'o// ji skad gsung rgya che las gsungs// phyag rgya bzhi ni sbyor ba yis// rgyud gzhan dag na thams cad du// rdo rje'i sngags ni rab brjod pabya// de yi snying po 'di yin te// 
252b5(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dza a b+hau sha gr-i na ya/ ad ma naM ni r+ye t+yaHmi/ saR+Wa t+ya thA grata byidzI s+yAt+ma ad+h+ye d+hoSh+Ta sa maM/ N+ya.au s+yaR+Ya t+ya thA gra tA pU dzA A b+hiSh+Ta krA ya/ Ad+ya mA nA ni r+yA t+ya ya mi// saR+YA ta thA ga tA badz+rA rat+na AM b+hI Shany+dza maM/ 
252b6(rgyud): oM saR+YA ta thA ga ta pU dza pra bar+t+ta na ya Ad mA naM nir+yA tA ya mA/ kAsaR+YA ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma pra brta ya maM// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dza kaR+Ya na ad ma NaM ni r+ya ta ya miShi[:]saR+YA ta thA ga tA badz+ra kar+Ya ku ru mau// phyog rgya dang bcas
252b7(rgyud): cho gar ldan// yang dag nyid du rab bshad bya// sor mo thams cad sbyar ba ni// rdo rje thal mo rab tu sbyar// sa phyogs gtsang mar 'dug gnas nas// mkhas pas yan lhag kun phyag bya// rdo rje thal mo
252b8(rgyud): brkyang nas ni// rgyal du rnams la dbul bar bya// mgo bos de bzhin byas nas ni// mkhas pas dpral bar phyag bya'o// mgo ba nas na phab byis nas// de bzhin kha yis phyag bya'o// 
253a1(rgyud): / khar bzhag byas na// spyi bos nas ni phyag bya'o// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje rnal 'byor pas phyag bya// slar yang cho ga la gnas te// mchod byas cho ga dang ldan pa// spos
253a2(rgyud): dang me tog mar ma dang // dri dang phreng ba byug pa ni// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas nas// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// sbyin pa rnam bzhi'i sbyor ba yis// n+ya nas par ni mkhas pas dbul// 
253a3(rgyud): gtsang zhing gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan// gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu// rdo rje sdom pa bla med pa// bslab pa'i gnas ni blang bar bya// sbyin pa rnam bzhi'i sbyar ba yis// dad cing de la rab gzhol bya/ 
253a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // slob dpon yang ni phyi ma yin// nyin re zhing ni ci nus par// khrus bzhi dag ni rab tu bya// rnal 'byor ji ltar khrus bya ba/ go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya// 
253a5(rgyud): sdom pa gsum la yang dag gnas// dang po'i khrus su brjod pa yin// gnyis pa rgyud las gsungs pa yi// bshags dang gsol ba 'dabs la sogs// phyag rgya bcang ba gsum pa ste// bzhi
253a6(rgyud): pa chu ste gsum pa yin// khras kyi cho ga 'di yis ni// mkhas pas 'di ru ni khrus bya'o// gos ni ldan gsum brje pa yi// bsgrub pa pos ni bya ba yin// sdom pa la ni legs gnas pa// gos ni
253a7(rgyud): dang por brjod par bya// gnyis pa cho ga sgrub pa dang // gsum pa ngo tsha khrel yad po// gtsang ma'i gos ni gsum po dag/ ldan gsum du ni brje bar bya// gang la kha na ma tho med// thams
253a8(rgyud): cad bza' zhing bstan par bya// sha dang tshang dang sgeg pa sogs// bza' ba min pa rnam par spangs// dring ba dang mi gtsang nyid// bza' dang btung ba rnam par spang // gzhan la gnod pa
253b1(rgyud): dang ldan pa// lus kyi phyir yang bya ba min// 'khrig pa bdun dang yang dag ldan// mI sdug sngo sgom pas spang bar bya// yid gzhungs mkhas shing gastsal ba dang // theg pa chen po'i don sems pa/ 
253b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rgya chu// shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs// klog pa dang ni bsam pa dang // yang dang yang du gsol ba gdab// dgra dang grogs dang bar ma la// sems snyoms mi
253b3(rgyud): 'jigs rab tu sbyin// snyan cing bden pas smra ba yis// zhe sdang 'joms bad byams pa sgom// chos dang gang zag bdag med cing // 'dus byas dag ni 'khrul pa tsam// blo ldan gsal bas
253b4(rgyud): brtag par bya// 'dus byas kun la rmongs mi bya// 'tsho ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni// byang chub sems na dor ma bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// byang chub sems gang da
253b5(rgyud): dru rdo rje// shes rab dril bu zhes bya gleng // slob dpon la ni brnyas mau byA// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// sbyor ba stong par mi bya'o// cho ga ston pa lhar bung bya// pha rol phrin drag spyod pa l+ya// gro
253b6(rgyud): rims bzhin du bslab par bya// sems can gyi ni don ldan pas// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad// kha na ma tho chung ngu la// srog gi btang snyoms do re mi bya// khyim pa 'am rab tu byung yang rung / 
253b7(rgyud): 'dris pa thams cad rab tu spangs// bu dang chung ma dag la yang // srid pa'i 'tshong ba las grol ba// brkam zhing chags la sdang ba dang // rmongs zhing lnga lo ldan pa'ang min// bag yod shin du brtson pa
253b8(rgyud): yis// rnal 'byor cho ga sgrub par bya// lta ba kun las rnam par grol// de nyid las ni lags par mthong // dge zhing dgongs pa bshad pa yi// don shes don na rtogs par 'gyur// rigs rang mi rigs
254a1(rgyud): cho ga shas// de nyid rnal 'byor shin du mkhas// spyod pa rnams la rab tu mkhas/ brtsa ldan byang chub spyod dpar ldan// spyod pa rnams la rab tu mkhas// de 'dra'i tshul ni sna
254a2(rgyud): tshogs dang // de lta bu yi sgrub pa yis// dngos grub dang ni thar pa thob// dngos grub kun la the tsom med// gnas dang gos dang bza' ba yi// lhag ma thams cad rnam par spangs// lha rnams thams cad
254a3(rgyud): sgom pa bya// bya ba ma yin thams cad spang // le lde med pa nyin ra zhing // bsrung ba yi ni tshig bya// bragags med 'jigs par mi bya ste// rang gi sems ni gdul bar dka'// phra dang ma ru 'dzin pa dang // bram
254a4(rgyud): ze dge sbyong de dang 'dra// sems can don gyi phyir// dag cing dul bzhi pa dang // bsdam zhing thar pa shes pa dang // rgyal srid mtho ris longs spyod min// 'dod pa'i longs spyod sbal phyir min// gzhan du sems/
