269b8(rgyud): por 'dzin par mi 'gyur te// de bas nyung bar rab tu bsgrags// mdo sde'i dbang po gsang rgyal po// nga nas phyag rgya rab tu bshad// thag pa chen blo mngon par
270a1(rgyud): rtogs/ rin chen snod du blta bar bya// ye shes kyi ni mngon rtogs pa// rdzogs s+ho// / rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi snying po// gang las 'khor lo yang dag
270a2(rgyud): byung rnal 'byor thams cad kun 'byung ba// mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya// dbus kyi 'khor lor yang dag bshad// rnam 'phrul zhes na rlob tu bsgrags// byang chub sems
270a3(rgyud): dpa' rnam 'phral rgya// 'khor lo thabs ni rab ston pa// 'khor lo lnga ru yang dag bshad// thabs na rnam pa lnga yan te// gsang ba ya na deb pare gnas// 'khor lo yin ni rnam 'phral ston
270a4(rgyud): dbus ma gang yin pang chub sems// shar gya bsngo ba rnam pa bzhi// lho yi phogs su bshad pa ste// bsod nams tshegs dang yang dag ldan// ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs rnams dang // rlos su
270a5(rgyud): 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// nub du yang dag brjod pa yin// sa byang ni sems can sman bya ste// pha rol gra bzhi gang yin pa// tshad med pa na bzhi dang bcas// byams dang snying rje btang snyoms dang // dga'
270a6(rgyud): ba zhes ni bya bar bshad// gang zhig theg skad yang dag bshad// chos kyi rgyun gyi lom las byung // lta ba thams cad rnam dag 'di// theg pa gzhan ni rnam par spangs// gang zhig kha khyer zhes bya
270a7(rgyud): bya/ ting 'dzin chos nyid dag pa ste// rdo rje lha mo yang dag bshad// gzungs kyi sgo zhes brjod par bya// sgo ru yang dag bshad pa grang // thar pa'i sgon bzhi po yin// rta babros dang ni
270a8(rgyud): dra ba nyid// chos mdzod rang bzhin grong khyer yin// dra badra phyed bla re ni// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rnam 'phrul pa// tshon rtsir yang dag bshad pa gang // de 'dra ba ni byang chub tshogs
270b1(rgyud): gang zhig mar mes yang dag bshang// da ni chos kyi snang byar bshad// dri ru yang dag bshad pa gang // grags pa'i dri ni bla na med// rdzu 'phrul byug pa gang yin pa// tshul khrims dri yi byug pa yin/ 
270b2(rgyud): bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs pa// chos kyi zas ni bla na meng // rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bar bshad// rtog pa thams cad rnam par sbyangs// grong khyer du ni bshad pa gang // der ni thar pa'i grong khyer mchog/ 
270b3(rgyud): gang zhig dkyil 'khor yang dag bshad// chos kyi snying po'i rang bzhin grol// nad med ces ni bya bar brjod// de ni dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// dbus su rnam snang mdzad ces pa// chos kun cig tu
270b4(rgyud): bsdus pa yin// sangs rgyas rgyal po gtso bo che// phyogs rnams kun du rnam par gsal// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bshad// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin mchog/ de bas rgyal po byang chub sems// 
270b5(rgyud): bang chub sems las yang dag byung // rdo rje rgyal por yang dag bshed// sems na rnam pa bzhi zhes bya// sgrol dang dgrol dang dbugs dbyung dang // mya ngan 'da' ba lcags kyi'o// rdo rje chags
270b6(rgyud): po ra yang dag bshad// byang chub spyod pa la sbyor ba'o// rdo rje legs par yang dag bshad// rab tu sbyor bar bstan pa nyid// rdo rje ran chen yang dgra bshad// sems can bsam pa yongs
270b7(rgyud): rdzogs byed// rdo rje gzi brjod yang dag bshad// chos kyi snang ba 'od byed pa// rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag bshang // sems can 'khor ba las grol byed// rdo rje bzhad pa yang dag bshad// sems
270b8(rgyud): can the tsom gcod byed pa// rdo rje chos su yang dag bshad// chos kyi ye shes bla na med// rdo rje rnon po yang dag bshad// nyon mongs gcod cing 'joms byed pa// rdo rje myu ru yang dag bshad
271a1(rgyud): @'khor le'i rnam 'phrul yang dag ston// rdo rje smra bar yang dag bshad// rdo rje chos ni ston byed pa// rdo rje las su yang dag bshad// sems can gdul bar byed pa'i mchog/ 
271a2(rgyud): rdo rje bsrung bar yang dag bshad // sems can grol bar byed pa'i mchog/ rdo rje gnod sbyin yang dag bshad// 'khor ba'i zhags pas zas bang pa// rdo rje khu tshur yang dag bshod// byang chub mchog
271a3(rgyud): ni brtan par byeng // rdo rje sems ma rdo rje chas// rin chen las kyi rdo rje ma// rdo rje rin chen chos chen po// las kyi gsung ba las byung ba// rdo rje lha me lngag ma brgyad// pha rol phyin mchog
271a4(rgyud): lhag ma brgyad// chos ma shes rab pha rol phyin// las ma tha byas kyi mchog yin no// pha rol phra ni bcu dam pa ni// sa bcu dag tu yang dag bshad// dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyir bsrung // 
271a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' zhes par bshad// oM ma'o ye shes/ a ma'o chos/ a ma'o thar pa'i grong khyer mchog/ e ma'o rnam 'phral 'khor lo ni// thub pa'i dbang phyug dag gis bstan// chos
271a6(rgyud): kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mgon po thar par dgod par bya// gang du sangs rgyas rgyal gyur pa// sems can rnams kyang dgrol bar mdzad// 'di ni chos kyi rang bzhin gru// 'di
271a7(rgyud): chos rang bzhin shing rta ste// chos kyi rang bzhin snying po 'di// 'di chos rang bzhin grong khyer yin// de kho na nyid mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po gsang la
271a8(rgyud): ba'i rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje rtse mo las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa dang po rdzogs
271b1(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad bla na medad nas gsang ba bshad par bya// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa ni// bdag nyid kyis ni sbyar bar bya// chog ji lta ba bzhin du// phyag rgya bcing ba bshad
271b2(rgyud): par bya// tsa rigs pA ra naM bcing bya zheng // gzhan du myur du 'grub mo 'gyur// thal mo mnyam par bcang du sta// snron la thal mo mnyam par sbya rA/ de nas rdo rje thal mo bcing / 
271b3(rgyud): rdo rje bsdams pa bcing ba R+Sha bA// rdo rje sor mo bsdams bcings na s+ya// snying po brjod bcing dra laM bai R+Sha bAde nas phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur/ 'grub 'gyu bya
271b4(rgyud): 'di lA thai ts+tsho ma mang/ !bodz+ri b+han d+ha tra Ta/ ![ऽ]'di ni sngon du brjod bya zhing / da naswa phyag rgya yang dag pau tsa dzi/ geng gi drang du btsing swe pa na/ bAdag nyid yang
271b5(rgyud): dag byin gyi su brlab/ mahA sa ya mi ya sa twa a/ shaM sA rab tson gyis dbab par bya// bdag la sems dpa' dbab par bya/ dam tshig phyag rgya bcing sra na sa ni/ 
271b6(rgyud): snying pi yang ni brjod par bya/ a phyag rgya bcings pa tsAm gyis ni// yan lag kun l-i yongs su gnas// skang pe brjod pA rau byA ba ste// sta~Md+bi khA nas badz+rod snying po
271b7(rgyud): 'di dag nyid yin no/ sa ma yA haM/ de nas bdag nyid byan brlabs nas/ rang lha yang dag rjes su drA na// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ snying po brjod par
271b8(rgyud): bya ba yinas+yA mA yA satwa u tI ti s+thA sa ma// phyag rgya sgrub pa lhur ldan pa// de nas shes rab can gyis sgrub/ dam tshig sems dpa' chen po drag/ rnam pa
272a1(rgyud): bzhi ni yang dag bsgrub// de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i snying po ni// aR+tha sid d+ya/ badz+ra sid d+hi/ badz+ra sid d+hi/ badz+ra bi byar/ budang+ga sid d+ha/ de nas phyag rgya brtan par byed pa ni// oM badz+ra sa ta/ sarba
272a2(rgyud): yam nu pA lA ya/ badz+ra sa twa tA no pa tiSh+ma/ Shi D+hi me b+hA wa/ su twoSh+yame b+ha wa/ a nu rag to me b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ saR+Sha sadi d+hi mi/ pra yats+tsha/ saR+Wa karma su tsa me/ tsit+ta shr-i yaM kA ru hUM/ ha hau ha ha ho// b+ha ga wan san+ma ta thA
272a3(rgyud): ga ta badz+ra ma me muny+dzu/ badz+ra b+ha wa ma hA sa ma ya satwa AH// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// phyag rgya thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhing // thams cad 'grub par the tsom med// de nas
272a4(rgyud): thams cad dgrol ba ni thun mong gi yin no// phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni// tha mar bdag nyid dbang bskur bya// sor mo'i rtse mos phreng ba che// rnam bzhi yang na rnam pa gsum// oM badz+ra radwa na a b+hi shi na tsa/ shas
272a5(rgyud): rab can gyis go cha bcing // ci nus par ni dbang bskur bya// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// phyag rgya thams cod brtan par bya// badz+ra ka ba tsa na baM/ gang nas byung ba der bkrol te// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// 
272a6(rgyud): gnas dA ru ni dgol bar bya// gzhan du bya ba mi byed do// oM badz+ra mu/ mgon po thal mo mnyes byas zhing // rdo rje thal mo bcing bar bya// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// rdo rje can kun mnyes par bya// badz+ra ta byA ho/ 
272a7(rgyud): cho ga 'di yis dgrol bya ste// phyag rgya dgol ba mchog yin no// phyag rgya thams cad brtan gyur na// rdo rje can ni mnyes par 'gyur// rno'i dus su nyin re zhing // shin du bsdams shing gsang gyur pas// rdo rje/ 
272a8(rgyud): sems dpa' ci 'dod bzlas// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// badz+ra sa te/ gsang ba'i yi ge hUM bzlas pas// rnam pa lnga ni thob par 'gyur// gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i tshig yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub
272b1(rgyud): par 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// zla ba gnyis pa yongs su sgom// bdag nyid sangs rgyas dang ldan pa// rdo rje dbus su bsgom par bya// mdor na rdo rje dbus su ni// yi ge hUM ni sbyar bar bya// rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di
272b2(rgyud): yis ni/ yi ge hUM ni bsgrub paR+Sha bya// hU~M de ltar rnam pa bcu drug ni// phyag mtshan thams cad rab tu bsgom// zla ba'i dbus su rab sbyor bas// bdag nyid thams cad rab tu 'grub// yang no yi ge'i sbyor bas ni// dbus
272b3(rgyud): su sbyor bas bsgrub par bya// zla ba yi ni sbyor ba yis// yi ge'i dza sogs 'grub par 'gyur// yi ge ho dang ma dang ni// yi ge o sogs rab sbyor ba// zla ba la ni oM a tr-i/ yi ge haM ni rab tu bsgrub// hI dAng d+hi dang mau bAM raM/ 
272b4(rgyud): kaM hau hUM baM bsgrub par bya'o// rdo rje'i tshig ni 'di dag gis// rdo rje bzlas pa bsgrub par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// bcu drug bdag nyid rab sgor byas// rnal 'byor rgyud tu bsgrub bya zhing // zla ba'i
272b5(rgyud): dbus su bsgom bya ba// de bzhin dkyil 'khor cho ga ni// nyi ma shar ba nas brtsams te// bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa// sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa bya// rdo rje can rnams gzod de par gsol// phyag
272b6(rgyud): rgyu thams cad bcing bya zhing // rdo rje thal mo gnyis par bya// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// thams cad byas nas gdon par bya// lan gsum dang ni len bdun du// bskor ba dag kyang rab tu bya// rdo rje
272b7(rgyud): sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// mkhas pa yis ni dril bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che// 'khor lo'i dbus su steng du bo cing // gang gis sems ni dag 'gyu rI bA// phyag rgya thams tso yang dag
272b8(rgyud): bcing / oM badz+ra mu tra/ snying po 'di ni brjod nas su// phyag rgya thams cad steng dro bcing // sgo dang phyi rol mchod pa la// rdo rje mu ni brjod par bya// gsang ba 'di ni gsang ba tshe// rdo rje rig pa'i
273a1(rgyud): pa yin// shes rab can gyis kun mi bstan// snod dang ldan pa mchog la sbyin// shin du 'od chen pha rol la// de ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs te/ lag pa g.yas su rdo rje ste// g.yon du dril bu
273a2(rgyud): / sbyin par bya// rdo rje brtul zhugs gsang chen po// snying po 'di ni sbyin par bya// da byin snying khar 'dzin du gzhug/ thams cad bsgrub pa'i mchog yin no// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag
273a3(rgyud): ni gnas// khyod kyis kyang ni dza ga tA bcang // phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sid d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e shaM staM/ d+ha ra ya mi badz+ra sa twa/ hI hi hi hi hUM/ de nas thams cad mtshungs pa ru// phyag rgyas
273a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dgol bar bya// badz+ra sa twa mu/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi bya ba rdzogs s+ho// // ji ltar cho ga rab ldan nyid// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che// de bzhin kun tu bsgrub par bya// rdo
273a5(rgyud): rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yin// rnal 'byor gyi ni rgyud bsdus pa// mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur// a mra'o sangs rgyas mgon po che// spyod pa sprad phyir 'byung ba ste// chos kyi
273a6(rgyud): mgon po rnal 'byor cha// rgyud rnams thams cad yang dag 'byung // sangs rgyas med cing sems can med// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor sgrub pa med// sa dang gsang ba'i mchog med do// ji bzhin gdul ba'i don du
273a7(rgyud): byung // sangs rgyas mchog dang dam tshig mchog/ sems dpa' mchog gi bsgrub pa dang // gsang mchog sems dpa'i spyod pa mchog/ rdo rje rnal 'byor yang dag byung // yon tan mchog dran dam tshig rnams kyi
273a8(rgyud): mchog/ yon tan mchog dran dbu rgyan dam pa ste// grags chen dang ldan spyod pa mchog 'dzin pa// yon tan mchog ldan rnams kyi spyod pa mchog/ rdo rje bsdams pa chen po nas// rnal 'byor chen po mchod pa
273b1(rgyud): chen po spyod// gsang ba chen po yon tan 'dzin mdzad pa// bde ba chen po yon tan 'dzin pa gsol// yon tan mchog dran ldan pa gcod pa na mchog/ dam tshig tshogs mchog 'byung bas brgyan gyur pa// mi yo rab
273b2(rgyud): mchog mchog ste dri ma med// slod mchog sprod pa'i mchog ste dri ma med// tshogs kyis bskor ba shin du bzhad pa mdzad// gnod byed 'joms pa tra ta tra tA sgrogs// g.yo byed bskyed pa bzhad cing bzhad pa mdzad// 
273b3(rgyud): yon tan mchog drag tsa la tsa la po// ha da ha ro pa ya gnod mdzes 'joms// ha ra ha ra ha ra har mchog/ gnas chen po ni stobs kyis sgrol byed pa// rigs mchog stobs kyis sgrol zhing sgrol bar mdzad// ha ha ha
273b4(rgyud): haha hA ha ha hA/ hi hi hI hI hi hI hi hi/ hi hi hi hI/ hu hu hu hu/ hu hu hu hU/ hu hu hu hu/ rab mchog bdag nyid mkhas pas 'dren g+hu r+yA ba// Te Ta Ta Ti Ta Ti Ta Ta Ti Ti Ta Ti Ta Ta Ti Ta TA Ta~M Ta Ta TI/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ n+yanr-i/ D+ha n+ya n+yeH/ 
273b5(rgyud): n+ya T+ya T+ya Tu D+ha// rgyan gyi bshod pas bdar zhing bad ro bar mdzad// spyod pa spyad pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur// spyod pa spong byed rab mchog bdag nyid can// dam tshig brgyanA tA rigs drug mchog gyur/ 
273b6(rgyud): pa bdag po chen po 'phrog byed 'joms par mdzad// 'phrog byed sgrub pa rnams ni sgrib mdzad pa// mchog gsol mchogro gau bdag nyid yang dag byung // Ta nr-i ti TaM brtan pa'i spyan mnga'o ba// yi ge dza las
273b7(rgyud): rab byung mchog rab ster ba hU~M na dang po la sbyor ba/ ho ho 'dod tshogs mchog ldan bud med brtan byed sa ni legs par rab ster ba// oM ni dang po bla na mad TuM Ta Ta Ta siHa ni gzi brjid rab 'bar ba// tAM t+ma
273b8(rgyud): rjes su rdzogs byed chags pa'i rnal 'byor rdzogs byed ha ni bzhad pa yang dag sbyor// tI ni chos can 'byed cing rab rno dri med ho ni rgyu yi 'khor lo che// haM dang raM ni mkha' dges smra ba'i sbyor ba 'ching byed a naM
274a1(rgyud): / sna tshogs byed// haM ni bsrung ba tA ta bgegs byed ta Ta Ta Ti sa ni hAM ni za zhing 'cha// baM ni dga' byed ho ste tsha ti tsha ti ta ni rab tu dga' bar byed// ho ni rdo rje partan pa dang bcas bde sngon 'dod chags bcas
274a2(rgyud): bu dga' byed do/ ho ni mgon po skye ba mchog gi rgyur 'gyur hi ni dga' ba'i bdag nyid can// hi na spyod pa 'god byad rdul spyong mchog ste dus gsum mgon po su bskor gyur pas// gsang zhing gsang ba'i yon tan
274a3(rgyud): kun mchog dri med ho na ngang chub sbeng po mchog/ mchog gi mchog ste mchog gsol go 'phang mchog thob yi ge hUM ni gsol ba mchog/ nyon mongs dri mo thams cad 'jims shing rab 'ad+mo hUM ga mtsha ba'i mtshen char ldan// 
274a4(rgyud): sna tshogs dga' ba mchog gos hUM gi rnam par brgyan mdzes yi ge oM dang yang dag sbal// ho ho haM ni yid 'ong hUM gis rnam 'joms gnod mdzes nges 'joms bdag nyid can// bde mchog glu dang rol mo drang bcas
274a5(rgyud): pa'i// gzugs bzang dang ldan lha mo rnams kyis mchod// zla ba ltar dkar 'phro ba'i zhal mnga' ba// rdo rje gsang ba'i yon tan brtsegs pas mtshan// rin tshun kun gyis rnam spras yid 'ong ba// rin chen dra
274a6(rgyud): bAs bla raMs rnam spras pa// rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod cing mdzes// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ni 'jigs med pa// sa rnams kun gyis rnam sbyangs dri med pa// byang chub sprod pa yongs rdzogs bdag
274a7(rgyud): nyid can// chos mdzod yongs su rtogs pa'i zas dang ldan// bsod nams de yis bskyed pa'i dga' ba che// tshangs pa'i rnal 'byor grwa bzhir yang dag gnas/ chos mchog go ri mos bzhin du thig btab pas// / 
274a8(rgyud): 'khor lo mu khyud rab tu mdzes bris pa// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni gtso bo bzhugs// ting 'dzin mchog rnams kha khyer gyis mdzes po// gzungs kyi lha mo'i tshigs kyis mchod pa'i tshogs// thar pa'i theg pas byas pa'i
274b1(rgyud): sgo yis brgyan// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'dren pa bzhugs// pa rol phyin nas btsun mo gar byed pa// sems can smin byed rnam par 'phrul pa dga'// bsam gtan zas ldan mngon shes mchod
274b2(rgyud): gisra brgyan// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la na 'dran pa bzhugs// dkyil 'khor de ni gtso bo'i chos nyid can// chos nyid brtan pa'i snying po kun du bzhags// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshogs 'dus mdzes pa yis// bde bar
274b3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gsang ba zhes byar bshad// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug dam par 'gyur// gsang ba kun 'byung ting 'dzin yang dag gnas// de ni yi ge A ste chos nyid gzigs// gsang ba kun 'byung ting 'dzin yang
274b4(rgyud): dag gnas// gzungs dang dam tshig yang dag 'byung ba'i mchog/ dga' ba chos nyid yang dag rdo rje gnaso// de ni rnam snang thub pa'i dbang phyug gtso// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po nges par byung // hUM shan dag
274b5(rgyud): pa'i chos nyid lta byung byung // sangs rgyas dbang phyug dam pa kun gyi mchog/ rtse gcig dang bcas e ma'o dga' ba che// sangs rgyas sku yang bud med gzugs can te// sems can khrums ni gdul phyir yang dag gnas// 
274b6(rgyud): bud med gzugs kyang chos nyid dag pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs gyur granas gyur pa// rang gi rigs chen phyung ba des phyung mdzad// oM badz+ra d+he tu shwa ri hUM// oM badz+ra badz+ri ni hU~M/ oM badz+ra rIng+ga na badz+ri nI hU~M/ oM b+hadz+ra
274b7(rgyud): d+harma badz+ri na hU~M/ oM badz+ra karma badz+ri na hU~M// mchog gi dang po rme 'byung gsang po lnga// sangs rgyas lngas byas bud med gzugs can te// rmad 'byung dang bcas dbang phyug dam par gnas// rdo rje gsang chos
274b8(rgyud): nyid kyi gsang ba mchog/ 'khor lo'i sbyor bas kyang ni bzhugs gyur pa// rdo rje rnal 'byor gyis ni shar du bzhugs// de ni rigs kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ re re zhing yang rnal 'byor mchog/ 
275a1(rgyud): @dang ldan// rnal 'byor 'khor lo yongs su spyad pa mchog/ de yis mi bskyod mchog tu byung ba yi// mchog tu gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor gsungs// oM badz+ra sa ta ga h+yaM sa ma ya hUM/ 
275a2(rgyud): oM ga h+ya badz+ra a ka shi hUM/ oM badz+ra ga sbyar ga ra ga ya hA/ oM badz+ri ga h+ya sa twa sha ri hAM/ rdo rdza ra na chen dkyil 'khor brtan gyur pa// de yis slar yang snying po bzhagasungs so// oM badz+ra gaM sbyor da na sa ma ye
275a3(rgyud): hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya praM be hUM/ oM badz+ra d+he dzA gra ga h+ye hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ye hA se hUM/ rdo rje chos ni dbang phyug dam pa ste// de yis slar yang snying po bzhi gsungs so// oM badz+ra d+harma gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra ko sha gu/ 
275a4(rgyud): h+ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya man+ta la ye hUM/ oM badz+ra ge h+ye dza pa saM ma ye hUM// rdo rje las ni yongs su dag pos mchod// 'khor lo thams cad la ni yongs su gnas nas mdzes// chos mchog dbang phyug dam pa
275a5(rgyud): mchog gyur pa// da yis snying po bzhi po gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra gu h+ya karma sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra ga h+ya ka pa tse hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya daMSh+Ti ni hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya ma shrI hUM// snga rA bzhin 'khor lo'i grong khyer
275a6(rgyud): yongs gnas pa// rdo rje'i gzugs su yongs gnas mdzes gyur pa// de nyid sangs rgyas sras de rdo rjer bcas// 'on kyang da ltar bud med gzugs su sprul// de dag srid pa dag byed rab tu 'bar// 
275a7(rgyud): thar pa'i grong du 'dod chags dge byed pa// rtog dang rnam par rtog pa bzlog pas dag/ chos la dga' zhing ska mchog 'byung 'gyur ba// bden dang mi bden rnam dag nyi shu dang / chos dang chos
275a8(rgyud): na dga' ba'i srid // bye nga dbyed min rje rjem dang cig/ rdo rje bstan po nyi mas ra basbyangs spyod// gsang mdzod rten che ni lus byas chos grong ni// rnam 'phrul 'kho ro li de ni ma nga mngom
275b1(rgyud): rdo rje bla re'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// gsang dbang rdo rje thar pa'i grong khyer mdzod// sems can kun la phan don du// 'khor lo lnga ni yang dag byung // de bzhin gshegs rigs rin chen dang // mi
275b2(rgyud): byed brtan par byed pa dang // byang chub spyod pa rab mchog spyod// theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ gdul bya ji bzhin 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// gtso bo'i longs spyod ji bzhin lhan cig spyod// sam
275b3(rgyud): can gdul bya ma yin snod mchog min// mthu chen rnams ni dngos grub gsol mi mdzod// der ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin dag/ yon tan mang po'i yang dag byung // sems can rnams ni gdul bya'i phyir// rdo rje
275b4(rgyud): btsun mo yang dag byung // de nyid sangs rgyas sras bcos pa// de nyid 'khor lo'i grong khyer che// mchod pa sgo bsrungs dang bcas pa// gsang ba'i 'khor la yang dag byung // mgon po rdo rdzogasang dbang phyug/ 
275b5(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings kyi dab mor bshad// rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog/ sngon ni ji ltar de bzhin phyis// de bzhin dbus su rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs yin to// gsang
275b6(rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba yang dag byung // rdo rje'i dbyings ni ji skad brjod// de nyid gsang ba zhes byar brjod// theg pa chen po mdor bsdus nas// rgyas par phyag rgya dang bcas par// 'khor lo lnga'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ 
275b7(rgyud): rgyas po ru ni yang dag bshad// mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po ni// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las// gsang ba'i rgyud dang phyag rgya dang // dkyil 'khor 'khor lo zla ba dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyis ni// 
275b8(rgyud): de ni rnam pa lnga ru bshad// rdo rje dbyings kyi rab snying mchog/ mdor na drug du bshad pa yin// dam chos spyod pa dang ldan pa'i// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// nus pa ji bzhin rigs pa bzhin// ji ltar
276a1(rgyud): @spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ ci rigs par ni cho ga bzhin// mchog tu rmad byung bshad par bya// sngon la de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi// sems dpa' rnga yis dbye bar bya// nga ye/ saM mdo
276a2(rgyud): sde gsang dbang bshad// gang du byis pa dag rmong ka pa// rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcu drug ni// gsang ba'i nges par bslab par bya// zla ba'i
276a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rkang lag thal sbyar rdo rje ni// kha gyes pas ni bsgom bya zhing // rdo rje can yang chags par byed// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir// zla ba gcig tu yongs su bsdu// rdo rje
276a4(rgyud): dbang phyug lha mo nga // dbus ma la ni yongs su bzang // sgeg pa dang bcas 'gro ba zhing // rnam par 'phrul pas bzhin rmongs bya// bsgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje can yang mnyes par bya// sems
276a5(rgyud): dpa'i dkyil dkrungs bcas nas ni// spyi ber thal mo sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings nas su// bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlabs// sgom pa'i phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sku yi phyag rgya rnam par bcing
276a6(rgyud): lag ngar lcags kyur bskum bya zhing // bdag nyid yongs su bsgrub par bya// de bzhin sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mda' ni kun du dgang // lag pas legs so zhes bya zhing // dpung pas bdag nyid go/ 
276a7(rgyud): bgo ba// slar yang gsang ba bya ba ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// bdag nyid rdo rje gcig pu gnas// gsang ba'i lha mo dbang phyug mchog/ de bzhin lag drar skam bya zhing // spyi bor rdo rje bas/ 
276a8(rgyud): bya zhing phyogs gcig tu ni nga smras te// rdo rje gnyis kyi cho ga bya// thams cad rdo rje'i lus yan te// rin chan mig ni yongs gsal ba// gdong dang mag ni pad ma dang // me tog ku na dar bsgom
276b1(rgyud): par bya// byis pa bya bzhin mig bskyod cing // bud med rgyu mtshan yang dge sgrub// smin ma bskyod cing khro nyer gtsigs// khro bo'i lta bas mig gdangs pa// phra ba'i lta bas 'dod chags che// mdzum bcas
276b2(rgyud): mig ni btsum par bya// mig gdangs pa yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje lta bas dgod par bya// slar yang tshig ni rnam pa bzhi// ho ni rkan dang lkog ma la// dz+ha ni lce yi bus dang rtse// oM ni lkog ma mchu dag la// mchu
276b3(rgyud): dang mchu yi rtsolam go/ de rnams gsang ba rab rgyas pa// s+yAd dang spros dang gcod pa dang // bcing ba rdo rje'i tshig gis bya// de bzhin kho na ra b+hU dbus nas// phyag na rdo rje rang bdag nyid// rin chen ches
276b4(rgyud): dang de bzhin las// gsang ba bdag nyid bsgom par bya// cho ga thams cad rgyas pa ru// rdo rje gsang ba rjes su gzung // ji ltar rnal 'byor yang dag gnas// de bzhin gsang ba mchog gi ga nas// gzungs
276b5(rgyud): kyi dngos grub rdzogs s+ho// / rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bla na med// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rdo rje phra mo bsgom par bya// dpa'o rdo rje sems dpa'i ni// phyi rol las grol yang dag gnas// 
276b6(rgyud): longs sam yang na 'dug kyang rung // rdo rje rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam// theg pa chen po'i tshul dag la// spyod pa chen po tshul chen po// bdag nyid chen pos rab bsgoms na// rdo rje'i dngos grub thob par
276b7(rgyud): 'gyur// 'du byed sdug bsngal chen po las// dga' ba'i spyod pas spro bar bya// snying rje chen pos dmigs nas ni// sems can btang snyoms dor mi bya// lce ni rka na la sbyar bya zhing // sna yi rtse mo
276b8(rgyud): bsgom par bya// ring nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// sna yi rtse mor de bzhin gnas// snying kha spyi be tsa nus par// sku ni thams cad yongs su spro// rdo rje phra mo'i bde rig pas// sam so ni mnyam par gzhag par
277a1(rgyud): 'gyur// rdo rje mdun du rdo rje ste// rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya// rdo rje bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje phra mo yongs su s+ho// rang gI lus kyi mdun du ni// rdo rje sems dpa' ba
277a2(rgyud): par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' thugs dbus sa// rdo rje kan gyi dkal 'khok+ka no// rdo m+b+hi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// lte bar de bzhin gshegs sangs rgyas// rdo rje phra mo bsgom par ba// rdo rje rnam bsgoms
277a3(rgyud): sems gang zhig/ gzugs med bstan du med pa dang // rmongs pa med cing 'jigs pa med// rdo rje phra mo 'di rjod do// dngos po med cing rdzas med pas// snang ba med par rab tu sgom// bdag med sems
277a4(rgyud): can med pa ru// rnal 'byor pas ni rnam par sgom// lus ni rdzas lnga'i bdag nyid can// khams bzhi la ni yang dag brtan// skye mched bcu gnyis nyid dang ni// gzhan yang khams ni bcwo brgyad
277a5(rgyud): dang // sha dang rus pa khrag nyid dang // klad dang klad pas kun du khyab// sna tshogs rdzas kyis kun du khyab// bad kan 'khris pa la sogs tshogs// sna tshogs srin bu'i rigs kyis khyab// dri ngan mi
277a6(rgyud): gtsang 'byung ba ru// rang gi lus la so sor brtag/ sdug bsngal gsum ni kan 'byung bar// nyin dang mtshan mo rtag tu ni// lus ni rjes su dran pa sgom/ rang sems so sor ba rtag bya ste// gang zhig
277a7(rgyud): da ru yang dgra byung // 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med// de la 'pho ba yod ma yin// de las 'byung ba yod min no// nyeng la sems ni yang dag byung // yang dag ma yin kun rtog 'di// brdzun bzhi ni sems ni
277a8(rgyud): rmongs par byed// sems med tsam yang yod ma yin// brdzun zhing 'byung bar snang bar 'gyur// 'di la gnas dang mtshan nyid dang // rab gnas 'byung ba yod me yin// gzung bar dka' ba gti mug
277b1(rgyud): ni rdo rje gsum por brjod par bya// de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis// sems sgom pa yi rnam pa bzhin// lus dang sems dang tsher bdag/ phra mo'i rnam par bsgom par bya// suSh+Ta badz+ra// rdo rje reg pa'i mtshan ma
277b2(rgyud): yi gnas ni yang dag shes par bya// da ni byung nas spr-i byas te// stong gsum du ni yongs su spro/ s+pha rA na badz+ra/ reg pas sbyor bas bsdu bya ste/ skrag cing rmongs par mi bya'o// gnas gsum du yang ba sdu bya ste/ 
277b3(rgyud): blo yis so sor brtag par bya// saung ha ra badz+ra/ chos la dmigs pa'i sems nyid ni// rmongs zhing gzhol bar mi bya'o// rdo rje da ni brten byi zhing // rdo rje phra mo reg par bya// badz+ra tiSh+Tha/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs
277b4(rgyud): med pa// rgyal po tshangs pa'i gtsug phud can// spyi bor sems dpa' bsgom bya zhing // skra ni thams cad yongs su spro// badz+ra Ad mA ko haM// dpral bar rdo rje rin chen ni// mnyam par gzhag pas
277b5(rgyud): bsgom par bya// mtshan ma dag ni spr-i bya zhing // sems dpa' kun yang spro bar bya// badz+ra re do na od ma kaM/ rdo rje tshos ni shin du dag/ sna yi rtse mor bsgom par bya// de yi mtshan mar spro bar bya// lus
277b6(rgyud): rnams kun kyang spro bar bya// badz+ra pad+ma mA ad ma kA/ lus ku ne la ni yang dgra khyab// chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su sgom// de yi mtshan ma spro bya zhing // sems dpa' kun kyang spro bar bya/ saR+Wa badz+ra Ad ma
277b7(rgyud): ka/ sems dpa' rin chen de bzhin chos// las ni spyi bor rab tu sgom// da ni mtshan ma spro ba zhing // sku ni thams cad yongs su sngo/ saR+Ya badz+ri/ sna la lcags kyu yang dge gnas// blo ldan mi yis bsam
277b8(rgyud): par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs bya zhing // rang gi lus ni brtan par bya// snying khe 'dod chags gnas su ni// 'dod nags dag par rnam par bsam// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas te// 
278a1(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings ni bstan par 'gyur// legs so zhes pa bzang ba ste// spyi bor yang dag gnas pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes bya zhing // chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro/ 
278a2(rgyud): d+hId+hi badz+ra aM ku sha/ TiSh+Ta badz+ra re ga d+hI da ya/ a ti badz+ra tuSh+Ti// snying khar rdo rje nyi ma nau// bla ldan mo yis bsgom par bya// 'od kyis gzi brjid spro bya zhing // 'jig rte na kun kunganga? spro bar bya// spyi bor khri shing 'od
278a3(rgyud): bcas pa// rgyal mtshan rtse mo rnam par bsam// rin chen char dag spro bya zhing // snod kyi sprin ni yang dag spro// bzhad pas bde ba bsams na ni// mashin du sdug bsngal nges par 'byung // chos kyi dbying
278a4(rgyud): ni spro bya zhing // snang ba'i sbyin yang spro bar bya// hri dA ya badz+ra su r+yA tiSh+Tha/ badz+ra d+ha dza gI/ hri da ya badz+ra ha sa// spyi bor rjes dran nas brtsams te// ral gri'i gtso bo bsam par bya// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
278a5(rgyud): gcod bya zhing // snang ba'i sprin yang spro bar ba/ ko snying kha'i 'khor lo'i gnas su ni// chos kyi rgyu 'thun bsgom par bya// nam mkha' kun du spro bya zhing // chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro// de yi rigs
278a6(rgyud): las byung ba'i sgra// shes rab can gyis lha rtsor bsam// chos kyi tshig ni spro bya zhing // phyogs rnams kun du yongs su spro// d+hid badz+ra badz+ra kau shi tiSh+Tha/ badz+ra hri dA yaM pra ba sha/ badz+ra badz+ra wa ga/ spyi bor rdzas
278a7(rgyud): dran nas brtsams te// mchod pa'i las ni rnam par bsdum// mchod pa'i phyir ni rdo rje sgo// phyogs rnams thams cad yongs spro bya// snying khar rdo rje glo cha nI// shin tu mnyam par gzhog byas
278a8(rgyud): bsam// sdug bsngal kun las grol byed pa// go cha'i rnam par spro bar bya// spyi bo nas brtsams rkang 'thil du// rdo rje bsdams pa bsam par bya// rdo rje snying pos gzhug bya zhing // rdo rje'i rang
278b1(rgyud): bzhin thams cad spro// yAk+Sha p+tA pa/ d+hI badz+ra kA pa tsa/ badz+ra muSh+Ti hr-id yaM/ grogs dang grogs min ma lus pa// 'byung po kun la byams pa mI/ ma lus lus pa med pa ru// mnyam du khyab par spro bar
278b2(rgyud): bya// kye ma sems can 'di sdig bsngal// 'gro ba lnga ru kun du 'khyam// nyin dang mtshan du mnyam sbyor bas// snying rje nyid ni reb sbyar ba//  nyin dang mtshan dang na sdang med// semra sau canu drage bdon
278b3(rgyud): gnyer gang // rjes su yid rang bde chen po// sems can kun la yongs su spro// rgal bar dka' ba'i lam zhugs shing // sangs rgyas byang chub la gnas pa// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// blo
278b4(rgyud): chen ldan pas bAtang snyoms bzhag/ ma hA me tra s+tha Ta na/ ma hAM ka ru na/ s+pha rA ne/ saR+Wa bud+yA d+ha pra mo s+tha ra na/ ma hI pe k+She s+pha ra na/ saR+Wa bud d+hA pr-i mo s+pho ra nA/ ma hA pe k+She swa pa ra na// nam mkha' 'am nau phyogs
278b5(rgyud): gzhan du// rdo rje gzugs ni rnam par bsam// sems can mnyam par dmigs pa yas// nam mkha' kun du spro bar bya// badz+ra mr-i khi bya ba/ rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// snying khar rdo rje chos nyid
278b6(rgyud): brtan// don rnams thams cad bsgom par bya// chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro// sangs rgyas rjes dran nas brtsams te// rnam pa kun du sna tshogs nyid// de ni rang gi bdag nyid sgom// chos kyi dbyings
278b7(rgyud): ni yongs su spro// rdo rje phra mo gzhan dang ldan// chos rnams thams cad rnam sgom pa/  mya rA dA phyogs ku na yongs su spro// snying kha ra rdo rje bsgom bya zhing // ma hA b+ho d+hi sid ta ba shi/ bud d+ha a nA smr-i ti
278b8(rgyud): bI sha/ badz+ra pa ni d+ha ra shwa ya sa ru pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya// sa man ta pa tra bi sha/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// bdag nyid rdo rje rnam
279a1(rgyud): par sgom// badz+ra sa te/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje sems dpa' rol bcas pa// badz+ra sa twa sa ma tri dz+nyA na bi shi/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sangs
279a2(rgyud): rgyas gzugs su rang bdag nyid// ta thA ge ta sa mo hUM/ dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa// rdo rje slob dpon bdag gis bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// shes rab can gyis nges par bya/ 
279a3(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis ni// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsam// ji bzhini mtshan nyid kyis brgyan pa// rtag tu bdag nyid rnam par sgom// ji ltar sangs rgyas de bzhin bdag/ bdag nyid
279a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rtag tu sgom// sangs rgyas gang yin de bdag nyid// sangs rgyas mang po yang dag gnas// bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs// rdo rje'i tshig na yang dag brjod// dbang po
279a5(rgyud): gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// sangs rgyas kun dang bdag mnyes bya// oM saR+Wa ta thA ga ta sa mo haM// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// ji lta cho ga ske mdog bzhin// dbang po gnyis ni yang dag gnas// 
279a6(rgyud): de bzhin bdag ni rtag tu sgom// oM badz+ra satwa saM mo haM// bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs// rdo rje tshig ni yang dag brjod// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// nges par 'jig rten pham par bya/ 
279a7(rgyud): khams kyi snying po gang yin dag/ de ni rdul phran dri ma med// bdag ni rdo rje chos nyid du// rtag tu bsgom par bya ba nyid// oM badz+ra d+harma sa mo hUM/ bdag ni rdo rje chos dang mtshungs// rdo rje chos ni yang/ 
279a8(rgyud): yang brjod// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje chos ni thob par 'gyur// rdo rje las ni bdag nyid de// tha dad med cing rtag cig gis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod byed// rtag tu
279b1(rgyud): bdag nyid bsgom par bya// oM badz+ra karma sa mo haM/ bdag ni rdo rje las dang mtshungs// rdo rje tshig ni yang dag brjod// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje las dang mtshungs par 'gyur// nga ni rdo
279b2(rgyud): rje rin chen nyid// sangs rgyas kun+da gyi dbang bskur nga // rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// rdo rje rin chen mtshungs par 'gyur// oM badz+ra ra de nA sa mo haM// bdag ni rdo rje rin chen mtshungs// rdo rje'i
279b3(rgyud): tshig ni yang yang brjod// rdo rje rin chen sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas dbang bskur thob par 'gyur// gzugs gnyis 'brel pa ni dbang po gnyis zhes bya'o// bdag gi lus gang yin pa dang / 
279b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi sku gang yin gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa ni/ dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya'o// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// rdo rje gcig ni yongs gsal ba// rdo rje rin chen ting
279b5(rgyud): 'dzin gyis// dbus su bdag nyid bsgom par bya// ci nus ba ni byin gyis brlab// rdo rje gcig na rnam par bsgom// rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis// rtag tu bdag ni bsgom par bya// sangs
279b6(rgyud): rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya// rin chen bdag nyid dbus su sgom// kun du rdo rje'i dbus su ni// rtag tu bdag nyid lus su sgom// gtso bo gang dang gang dag gi/ sku mdog cha byad ji bzhin du/ 
279b7(rgyud): rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom pa rdzob// sems can dam pa de nyid thob// bdag gtso rdo rje'i tshige brjod cing // rdo rje'i thugs su bsam pa ra bya// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje 'dzin pa
279b8(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// yang na sgom pa'i sbyor ba ni// rang dbang du ni rab bshad bya// ji ltar yid la byung ba bzhin// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam par sgom// sna yi rtse mo la brten nas// sems kyi rgyud
280a1(rgyud): ni yang dag gnas// brgya las rtsa bdun lhag pa ni// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// gal te bsgoms pas dngos grub 'dong // rdo rje bsgom pa bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas
280a2(rgyud): rjes dran sbyor ba yis// bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor yang ngag gnas// sems dpa'i rjes dran sbyor ba yis// gdon mi za ba ngas par bya// gang dang grang la 'dod pa nyid// bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgom
280a3(rgyud): par bya// ske mdog rnal 'byor ji bzhin da// ci rigs par ni sna tshogs dag/ yang na rdo rje skem gtso bo// sgrub pa yang na bsgom par bya// chos kyis dngos grub rdzogs s+ho// 
280a4(rgyud): e me'o nga mtshar rnam 'phrul 'khor lo 'byung // e ma'o ngo mtshar spong mchog dam pa sgrub// e ma'o ngo mcher gsang mchog gnas thob pa// bdag ni da yi rnal 'byor sgom pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor/ 
280a5(rgyud): mkhas pa'i sgrub pa ste// rnal 'byor rig pa sgrub byed pa// mchod pa sgrub pa'i sbyor ba yis// de nas mchod pa rab bshad bya// thun bzhi dang ni kha dog bzhi// dus bzhi yi ni rab sbyor bas// sangs
280a6(rgyud): rgyas rnal 'byor brjod byed cing // sangs rgyas la ni mchod par bya// phyogs rnams kun du yongs spro zhing // mchod pa'i phyag rgya yongs su spro// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pas// rtag tu yang
280a7(rgyud): dag rnal 'byor sgom// mchod pa spro ba yang dag sgor// zhes bya chos ni yongs su spro// ting 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas twa// chos kyi mchod pa rab tu ba// oM saR+YA tau thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a na tu ra pu tsa
280a8(rgyud): spyir rnas mam // rdo rje yi ni gaming sngags 'ag/ yang da pa song du rab tub // rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yin// byab rgya la ni ba rgyu bri/ na ma rtogs dang mi chen rtogs da/ rdo rje pan ma
280b1(rgyud): rdo rje'i bdag/ rgyas pa ru ni sngar bshad pa// rdo rje dbyings ni rab tu bskyed// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ma lus pa// rang gi bdag nyid bsgoms nas su// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// thub pa'i
280b2(rgyud): dbang phyug dag la dbul// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// thub la mchod pa phul nas ni// bdag ni mgon po rnam snang mdzad// bdag gis khams ni rnam par spro// byang chub sems ni/ 
280b3(rgyud): spros nas su// thub pa'i dbang phyug dag la dbul// rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni// mchod pa thams cad rab tu dbul// oM saR+YA ta thA ga ta badz+rA sa to a nad ta rA bu tsi s+pha ro na saM ma ye hUM/ 
280b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskor bas// rdo rje rin chen spros nas ni// bdag gi mgon po rnam snang mdzad// bdog gi khams ni rnam par spro// rdo rje'i sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur// thub
280b5(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug dag la dbul// rin chen mchod pa spro bya zhing // bsdams pa'i sbyor ba rab tu sgrub// oM saR+YA ta thA ga ta badz+ra rad na a nad ta ra spr-i tsa s+phA ra na se ma ye hU~M// sde ma ji lta bu bzhin du// 
280b6(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad ting 'dzin gyis// ji ltar sems dpa' phyung ba bzhin// de bzhin bdag ni bsgom par bya// rang bdag nyid ni bsgoms nas su// rmad 'byung chen po yongs spro zhong // sangs
280b7(rgyud): rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// rdo rje'u sbyor bas sgrub par 'gyur// de lta ba la snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje chos ni rab tu byung // phyogs rnams kun du rab spro zhing // rdo rje dag la dbul bar bya// 
280b8(rgyud): oM saR+YaM ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma a nud to ra pU dza s+thi ra na sa ma ya hUM// ting 'dzin sbyor pa la gnas te// rdo rje las rnams spro zhing bya// sangs rgyasaM ka na la dbul bya zhing // thams cad du ni spro bar
281a1(rgyud): @bya/ oM saR+YA ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma a nud tA ra pA tsa s+pha ra na sa ma ye hUM// mchod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// thun bzhi ru ni rab tu skem// mchod pa'i tshogs ni 'grub 'gyur te/ 
281a2(rgyud): sdig pa can yang 'grub par 'gyur// mchod pa'i las ni bla na med// ni rigs par ni rab bshad pa// chos phyag rgya yi rgyal par ldan// 'grubo 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// ai sa ta thA ga ta ad
281a3(rgyud): ma ni r+yA tA na pA tsa sma ra ne kArma badz+ra e// rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bdag nyid// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom por bya// bdag nyid yang dang yang du ni// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// oM saR+Wa
281a4(rgyud): ta thA ga ta ad mi ni r+ya ta na pA tsa s+pha ra na karma gri dzi// rdo rje'i lcags kyu rang bdag nyid// phyogs kun du ni sgo bar bya// sangs rgyas thams cad dgug pa zhing // thub paM dgra le dbul bar bya// oM
281a5(rgyud): saR+YA ta thA ga ta ad ma ni r+ya te naM e nad ta rA ga na pA tsa swa ra na karma pa ne hAM b+ho// rdo rje'i rigs ni rjes chag sa par// rtag tu bdag ni bsgom par bya// ches rnams dag la mnyes byas shing // 'di
281a6(rgyud): brjod nas ni spro bar bya// oM swaR+YA ta thA ga ta e de ma ni r+ya ta na ka sa d+ho kau ra pA tsa s+pha rA na karma duSh+Ti mAM// rdo rje rin chen rnal 'byor che// bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya// rin chen mchod pa bla
281a7(rgyud): na med/ phyogs rnams kun du spro bar+ya bya// oM saR+YA ta thA ga ta kA ya oM bi shi ke ra da ne b+h+yo/ badz+re ma Ni au// sangs rgyas thams cad rgyal po che// byang chubo snying por dbang bskur ba// sems kyang
281a8(rgyud): de ltar bsams nas ni// rdo rje rin tshon thob par 'gyur// bdag nyid rdo rje gzi brjod ni// phyogs rnams kun du snang byed pa// sangs rgyas thams cad bskul bya zhing // mchod pa'i gzi
281b1(rgyud): yongs su skye// oM nam sam+b+haH thA ga ta sUr+ye b+h+yo badz+ra te dz+nyA ni dz+wal hU~M// rdo rje rgyal mtshan kun tu mthong // shes rab can gyis rgyal mtshan bsgreng // sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes bya zhing / 
281b2(rgyud): sngags kyis bskul bar bya// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta oM shrI pa ri pu ra na/ tsin da ma ni dA dzA at+se tI// grogs chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis bal+la// rtag tu bdag nyid
281b3(rgyud): dga' bya zhing // rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya// oM na maHsaR+Wa ta thA ga ta ma hA pre taM pra mo d+ho ga re b+h+yo// badz+ra ha se// sems can thams cad tshes chen po// sangs rgyas snying po grags pa tshon// bdag
281b4(rgyud): ni chos chen dag pa ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskal bya// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kun// dkyil 'khor grong khyer thams cad bdag/ shes rab can gyis bdag nyid bsam/ 
281b5(rgyud): rdo rje sngags kyis rab bskal byA// oM na maHsaR+YA ta thA ga te badz+ro d+harma tra sa d+hI b+h+yo tu no mi ma hA d+hArma aM grI hi// ba dag ni shes ra ba ra la gr-i rno//  shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshulA// 'khor lho'i yi ge rab tu
281b6(rgyud): bskor na mdo sde thams ca de 'dzin pa yin// oM saR+YA ta thA ga ta pra dz+nyA pa ra mi taM byA ni ra tA ri sta no mi mahA g+ho sha na ga baM/ sems can de ga na kun gyi tshig/ bdag ni sems dpa' sla ba brta na/ 
281b7(rgyud): rdo rje smra ba gsang ba'i bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// oM sauR+Ya ta thA ga tA sa tA bi shwad d+ha sr-i gr-ida? b+hi ka yaM stu no mi wa tsa wa// ba dgra ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'khor+ya lo'i
281b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sbyin byed pa// rdo rje'i 'khor lo yongs su bsngo// mchod pa thams cad yongs su sme// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ti tsakra ak+Sha ra pa ri bar+ya twe d+ha saR+Wa mu tra ni stu no mo sauR+Wa maN+Da le hUM// bdag
282a1(rgyud): ni rdo rje lA sa rgyal po/ phyogs rnams kan du rab mchod byed// ma tog bdag pa la sogs br-i// rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul ba rA ba// oM saR+YA ta thA ga ta d+hi pa ma g+ha swa ra Na pA tsa
282a2(rgyud): karma kA ra/ go ta bgos pa dA lAn pa// ma tog mchod po 'bol bad pa// bdag nyid rang nyid rgyal po che// dz+re R+Sha'i sngags ni rab bskal ba// ai sar+m+ma ta br-i ga he pa tsa srA pre sa ra s+pha ra pA tsa ka re me
282a3(rgyud): b+ha ra/ bdag ni rde D+h+we gnod sbyin te/ gyi nyon mong+yas za byed chos sgron 'ab rau// phyogs rnams kun du sbro bya zhing // snang ba 'ab rA ba ya dge spro// au sar+b+ba te thA gA ta a k+Sho ki dz+wa la swai ra na pU tsa kAr
282a4(rgyud): me b+ha ra b+ha ra// rdo rje khu tshwa ra rang bdag nyid// dA yi snod dang yAng dag lAnau// phyogs rnams kaun du s+pho bya zhing // cha rA rnams kun gyis rab spro bya// au saR+YA ta thA ga ta ga nA d+ha sa mu tra smA ra na/ 
282a5(rgyud): pU rtsa kar+m+ma ku ru ku ru// sems ca na kun don yang dag ldan// byang chub sems ni bskrad nas su// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// mchod pa mchog ni rab sgrub pa// oM saR+YA to thA ga ta badz+ra
282a6(rgyud): ed ma nar+ye ti na pA tsa ma ga sa mu tra s+pha ra naM ya hUM/ shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor br-i// yan lag kun gyis ra bA butad bya// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing // phyogs rnams kun du spro bar
282a7(rgyud): bya// oM sar+b+ba tu thA ge ta ka ya nIr+ya ta na pU tsa me ga saM mu tA s+pha ra na sa ma ye hUM// rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas naM// rdo rje rin tshe na bla na med// rdo rje chos ni klur blangs pas// rdo rje las rnams byed par
282a8(rgyud): 'gyur// rdo rje yi ni glu 'di yis// ring brag nyid ni dga' bar bya// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing // rdo rje'i gsang sngags rab brjod bya// oM saR+Wa ta thA ga ta wa ka nIr+ya tan pu tsa migs
282b1(rgyud): mu tra stA ra na sa ma ye hUM// phyogs rnams kun du mchod pa kun// mkhas pa yis ni bsam par bya// sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bya zhing // rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta
282b2(rgyud): ts+tshi ta ni r+ya ta na pu tsa mo go sa mu tra s+pha ra na sA mi yai hU~M// phul nus shes rab can gyis ni// rdo rje btsun+da mo'i ting 'dzin bsam// rdzas mchog ldan pas spyo bye zhing // sangs rgyaso kun la yongs su dbu
282b3(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA~M a nud ta ra hau ri sha/ ra ti pra ti su a nud ta ri pradz+nyA pu tsa meg sa mu tra s+pha ra na sa ma ma~M hUM// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas kun la rab mchod byo// rdo rje slob dponi dka'
282b4(rgyud): thub ches// bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor thams cad kun bsdus nas// shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bsam// 'tshed pa'i tshogs ni bla med pas// sangs rgyas
282b5(rgyud): thams cad mchod par bya// rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// tshe dang mdog dang na do med nyid// phun sum tshogs pad thams cad thob// sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor
282b6(rgyud): gang zhig gis// nyin ra bzhin du mchod byas na// the tsom med par dngos grub kun// rdo rje rnal 'byor pas thob 'gyur// rdo rje'i sngags kyis bslab pa da // phyag rgya thams cad bsam par bya// 
282b7(rgyud): theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las// phyag rgya shin du rgyas par bshad// rdo rje ltos kyi go rims bzhin// shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bslab// rdo rje dbyings dang rab mtshungs pa// sla
282b8(rgyud): yang rnal 'byor pa la bslab// 'jig rten mgon po rdzu 'phrul che// rtag tu de bzhin mchod pa bya// gsang mchod rnal 'byor pa gang a// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya// gang tshe sngon du
283a1(rgyud): sems bskud pa// rdo rje sems ni bla na med// byang chub sems ni rnam bskyed nas// mchod pa bya ba bslab par ba// rdo rje slob dpon gyis spon ba// rdo rje dga' ba bsam par ba// 'dod
283a2(rgyud): chags dga' ba bskyed nas no// dga' ba'i mchod pas rab tu mchod// bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgom bya zhing // bsgoms na mchod pa rab tu bya// dga' byi chen po'i bde don du// rig pa'i lho mo rab
283a3(rgyud): 'brel pas// bud d+ha ad ma hUM/ byang chub sems ni rab bsnyed pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya// stobs dang mi 'jigs sogs rnams kyis// rlung bdag nyid ni dbang bskur ba// bud
283a4(rgyud): d+ha a b+hi shI tsa ma// byang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas// bdag ni sangs rgyas zhes bsam pa// rdo rA yau ni glu blangs shing // bdag nyid mngon par mchod par bya// bu da d+ha sad d+hi ke ro mi/ byang
283a5(rgyud): chub sems ni brtan bskyed nas// bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya// rdo rje gar gyi ga ro bya zhing // mkhas pas bdag nyid mchod par bya// bud d+ha pu tsa/ skyo dang gsung thugs rdo rje mchod
283a6(rgyud): sbyor bas de bzhin phyag bya ste// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod byas naso// nges par phyag ni byis par 'gyur// pra na men/ rdo rje sku gsung thugs las byung // sangs rgyas bsod nams
283a7(rgyud): chen po kun// rjes su yid rang mchod dag gis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur// a nu me de/ bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// mchod
283a8(rgyud): pa kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid// mchod pa'i bdag nyid can gyis mchod// bud d+ha pu tsa/ rdo rje sku gsung thugs las byung // dge ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad kun// yongs su bsngo
283b1(rgyud): ba'i mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas kan dang mtshungs par 'gyur// pa ri nam/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po che// 'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa// bzod na sa dag pa skye ba med// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho
283b2(rgyud): pad+mad ma mtshungs// saR+sha shang du/ chos rnams thems cad ma skyes pa// bzod nas zhi zhing gos pa myed// blo bur dri mas gos pa med// yi ge a yis rnam par s+phar// sa mni tA pa tA// e ma'o 'khor lo// 
283b3(rgyud): bde rang bzhin// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// chos rnams thams cad nyid kyis ni// 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs pa rgya// d+harma tsa kr-i/ sgra snyan dang ni mtshungs pa'i sgo// med de bzhin yang yod ma yin// 
283b4(rgyud): chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin du// bdag ces bya ba 'ga' yang med// ni pra pAn tsa/ sngon du blo dang ldan pas bsam// mnyam par gzhags pas bsgom pa zhing // de 'og rdo rje sna tshogs brjod// de nas
283b5(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// rang gi rdul ni phra rab dge/ rdo rje'i gzugs su bsgom bya zhing // rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya// badz+ra kA yi/ sku dang gsung thugs
283b6(rgyud): / rdo rje yi// yan lag rnam pa ji snyed pa// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing // thams cad yongs su spro bar bya// d+harma kA ya/ rang gi lus la gnas pa yi// phra rab rdul ni ji snyed pa// rdo rje sems
283b7(rgyud): dpa' sgom pa zhing // don yod mchod pa rab mchod bya// sa tA krA ya/ de bzhin lus ni thams cad kyi// rang gi phra rab rdul rnams ni// kun du bkod pa bsgom bya ste// de ni sangs rgyas mchod par bya// 
283b8(rgyud): b+hud d+ha ka ya/ sangs rgyas rjes dran thams cad brnyas// byang chub sems ni slob gang yin// shes rab can gyis mchog gsang bslab// sangs rgyas sa na thob par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po
284a1(rgyud): tshe/ lus rnams thams cad yongs su bsdams// yan lag kun la chags pa dang // ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pa'i sa// lus kun la ni yongs su chags// bde ba'i mchod pa
284a2(rgyud): rab byung ba// e ma'o rjes su chags mchog bdag/ rdo rje'i tshig ni brjod par bya// A ma'o yid 'ong e ma'o sdug/ e ma'o dga' ba rab tu mdzes/ chos kyi rgyags pa 'dod chags tshe// gang la rab
284a3(rgyud): dga'i chags 'gyur ba// chos dang gang zag bdag med pa// stong pa 'dod tshogs brjod par bya// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal spang bya zhing // sems can yang ni spang bya zhing // sred pa dang ni tshigs bya
284a4(rgyud): spyod// rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs// mang dang gzugs ni shes bya zhing // mtshan nyid gsum ni rtogs par bya// theg chen bde ba zhes bya ba// 'dod chags chags par rab brjod pa// 
284a5(rgyud): lta ba thams cad mi bzung zhing // srid pa'i sdug bsngal rnam par spangs// rtog dang rnam par rtog pa med// sdug bsngal thams cad nges pa ru gcod// phung po dang ni skye mched khams// rtog
284a6(rgyud): pa rdul tsam yod ma yin// des 'das zas mo de ma yin// 'dus byas min pa nyid kyang med// skyes ma zung med bdag nyid med// bdag dang sems can rnam rtog med// 'dod chags zhe sdang
284a7(rgyud): gti mug med// nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs med// de lta bu yi chags pa yis// gang dri rdo rje can chags 'gyur// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes chags bya// khe yi
284a8(rgyud): 'o ni mchog dag pa// gsang ba'i sbyor ba rab bsgrub bya// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa// rIs su chags pa'i go tsho brtan// dpung po dam por bsdams bya zhing // 'dod chags chags par
284b1(rgyud): brtan pa yas// rdo rje sems dpa' rab 'grab 'gyur// chags pa la las rab grol bas// 'dod la chags par mu be zhing // blo ldan chos chags dga' ba yis// dngos grab thams cad 'gra
284b2(rgyud): par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga yi so// gsang ba thams cad rab brtan bya// zhi ba thams cad mnyes byas te// rdo rje ma sogs mnyes par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am
284b3(rgyud): rdo rje can dang dga' chen po// 'dod chags chags chen 'di lta bus// grub 'gyu ro 'di la the tsom med// AM sauR+Ya ra ga ya mi hUM/ ra ta ya mi hUM/ las kyi dngos grub rdzogs s+ho/ 
284b4(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba dam pa mchog/ gang zhig byas na gra sang bya kUn// brtags na su 'gru bA pAr 'gyur ba yin+da// lhag pa shes rab can gyis bslab// mtshanA ma bArtan por rang grub na/ 
284b5(rgyud): pad+ma ma'i lci bar 'dug bya zhing //  mtshan ma mchod rten byin porlabs nas// rang bdog rdo rje mtshungs pa nyid// mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las// de yis shin du gA sang tshi ga gsungs// 
284b6(rgyud): de ni dgongs pos gosangs pa ste// de ni dgongs par shes par ba// mtshan ma phyag mtshan zhes par bshad// brtan pa lhag ma nyid yin te// byang chub sems dpa'i phyag mtshan gang // 
284b7(rgyud): mkhas pas lhag pa re bcang bar bya// pha rol phyin pa drug po spyod// de ni mtshan ma ro rab tu bsgragaso// gang phyir lhag par brtan bya ba// slob dpo ni rnams kyis rigs 'byor ba// mtshan ma
284b8(rgyud): brtan par rang gyur pa// de dag kho nar rab tu bsgrags// pha rol phyin drug spyod pa ni// rdo rje'i rigs su brjod par bya// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// rdo rje mtshan mar 'di brjod bya// byang
285a1(rgyud): chub sems kyi rab sbyor bas// mtshan ma brtan por brjod par bya// pad ma shes rab pha rol phyin// pad ma'i lte bar 'dug bya ba// shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi// 
285a2(rgyud): rnal 'bor yang yang snyom sa 'dzag pa// bu ga long ga'i spor ba yis// yang dang yang du bstan pas na// g.yo dang nyes pa rnam spangs pa// ga de rde mi za bar yang dag 'byung // shas rab
285a3(rgyud): dang ni byang chub sems// yang dang yod du bstan byas na// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshu la// byang chub gdon mi za bar 'gyur// bsgrub byar gyur pa'i chos 'di ni// lus can kun gyis
285a4(rgyud): rnyed dkra' bya// byang chubu sams drang shwe sa rab chu// mchod d+he n+sa mya na ma'i rjes chags bya// rnal 'byor pas ni 'dra sgom dang // 'di lta bu yi sgrub pa dang // spyod pa gsang ba 'di
285a5(rgyud): yis ni// rdo rje gsang ba nyid thob 'gyur// gsang po dgongs pas bsdus pa yi// mdo las rgya cher ji skad gsungs// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// se mos can thams cad
285a6(rgyud): rnam par sgom// rdo rje gsang ba bsdus pa yi// sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor 'dzi yis ni// gsang ba chen po bsgrubs na ni// skad cig de la rab 'grob 'gyur// kha gcig nyin zhag de la naM// 
285a7(rgyud): yang dang yang du 'grub par 'gyur// nyi ma gnyis gsum bzhi lnga 'am// drug gam bdun la the tsom med// mtshams me lnga po byed pa yang // ci rigs pa yi cho ga yis// lo gcig tu ni
285a8(rgyud): rab sgyur bas// 'grub 'gyur 'dri la the tsom med// rdo rje gas ba'i tshig rdzogs s+ho// gsang ba yini dkyil 'khor mchog/ rdo rje slob dpon chog ni// ji la
285b1(rgyud): rigs shing 'tsham pa ru// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mdor na rig pa'i brtul zhugs ni// gong du dkyil 'khor las bshad gzhan// ji ltar spro zhing ci nus pa ru// sngon du mkhas
285b2(rgyud): pas bshad par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' skal pa che// rgyal po kun du khyab pa'i 'ong // the tsom med par stong phrag brgya// rtag tu rdo rje'i tshig brjod bya// sems dpe'i rdo rje goms byi zhing // 
285b3(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor goms par bya// chos rnams dag pa goms par bya// goms pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// nyon mongs rab slong nyon mongs bzlog par bya// rnal 'byor goms po yis
285b4(rgyud): ni rnal 'byor sgrub// bzlas pa tsama? gyis dga' chen 'grub 'gyur te// rnal 'byor cho ga bsgrubs pas 'grub par 'gyur// yad+hA na bzlas ma tsam nyid ni// bzlas pa mchog gis bzlas pa
285b5(rgyud): bya/ rnal 'byor rig pa bsgrub bya'i phyi ru// dngos grub cho gas bzlos par bya// de ni rnal 'byor cho ga yi// skad cig sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// rnal 'byor cho ga med par ni// 'grub
285b6(rgyud): mi ni 'di la the tsam med// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba bzhin yang dag bshad// gsang ba chen po tshad med pa// bzhi po thams cad bsdus pa yin// bzlas brjod sbyin
285b7(rgyud): bsreg cho ga dang // phyag rgya bcing ba lhar len pa// rig pa'i tshig gi cho ga ni// gsang ba bsdus pa dang po yin// bsad dang snyam byed pur bus gdab// rdeg pa dang ni mngon spyod dang / 
285b8(rgyud): bgegs bskrad pa dang 'khrul 'khor 'di// gsang ba 'das pa gnyis pa yin// cho ga mi 'gyu re bcing ba bcing // sgro dang de bzhin rab bskyod dong // bdag nyid mngon par bsrung ba nyid dang / 
286a1(rgyud): bgegs rnams bsal bar rabya pa dang // rdzas 'phrog pa dang gzhom pa dang // gdug pa thams cad mngon bsrung ba// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba bsdus pa
286a2(rgyud): gsum pa yin// sngags dang phyag rgya mchod pa dang // de bzhin rig pa'i dngos grub nyid// bgegs rnams bsod nams nye bar bsngo// gsang ba bzhi pa ru 'dod pa yin// gsang ba bzhi po thams
286a3(rgyud): cad ni// rang gzhan rje 'phral kun bsdus pa// gsang ba mchog gi rgyud chen po// rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad// bzlas brjod sprin bsreg cho ga ni// de ni rgyud mchog las bshad pa// gang
286a4(rgyud): phyir rig par+ya 'dzin kun gyi// bzlas brjod smin bsreg bsgrub par bya// bzlas brjod spor ba med pa na ni// rig pa'i dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur na// sbyin bsreg tsam ni med pa ru// rig
286a5(rgyud): pa'i bya ba byed mi 'gyur// gang gis bya ba byed 'gyur ba// bizlas pa'i rim pa bshad par bya// rlig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi// snying po 'di ni gsang mchog yin// gsang ba'i rigs 'di/ 
286a6(rgyud): bzlas pa ni// rnal 'byordza nyi sha yang dag byung // bzlas pa rnam pa nyi sha ni// gsang ba'i rgyud du nyi shu ni// gnas ngan len gyi bag chags rtogs// rtog pa bag chags zhes bya ste// bzlas
286a7(rgyud): pa tsam gyis thim 'gyur te// bzlas pa tsam gyis brjod par bya// nyes par byas pa spong ba dang // dri bzhin srid pa sbyor byed cing // rmad 'byung sna tshogs mthong gyur te// de bas bzlas
286a8(rgyud): pa brjod par bya// byang chub spyod pa 'byung 'gyur zhing // tshul mchog mthong bar 'gyur ba ste// de bas bzlas po'i cho ga ni// rnal 'byor pas ni nges par bya// b+hag sang chen po'i
286b1(rgyud): rgyud 'di rwa// hUM ni dang por rab tu bsgrags// gsang ba thams cad yang dag 'byung // hUM gis bzlas brjod bya bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo ni// de bzhin yi ge hUM ra ba mchog/ gsang
286b2(rgyud): ba thams rnyed 'khor lor bcas// rigs lnga dag dang bcas pa 'byung // 'di ni yi gaM hUM 'byung bar// sngon la shes rab can gyis brtag/ lce sogs thams cad khong stong do// lus kun la ni
286b3(rgyud): brtag pasbyor ba mchu las 'byung mi 'gyur// so las rnam pa kun du min// lce dang rtsa ba las kyang min// rkan las rnam pa kun da min// gnas gang las ni sbyor ba 'byung // snying
286b4(rgyud): kha nyid lar+b+hu byAng mi 'gyur// khong stong dngos po thams cad la// skye ba nyid ni sna mi 'gyur// yi ge hUM gi sbyor mi 'gyur// yi ge hU~M gaM sbyor ba yis// rang gi dbyings la sa yang dag sbyar
286b5(rgyud): da ni ny+tson mi sa rten mi 'gyu rA/ kun bzhi sa bon thams cad pa// rkan dang lkog ma'i 'brang bA dang / lce yi tshogs las yang dge byAd+yau/ yi gre hUM gA sgra byAd+tha bau// nga? ni mi rtagra yang dag
286b6(rgyud): byung // de ltar 'byung ba'i sbyor ba las// gnas ni nyon mongs can ma 'gyur// tshig dang bcas pa'i ji bzhin sgra// 'dus byas thams cad dor mi bya// ji bzhin hUM gi sbyor ba las// chos
286b7(rgyud): rnams thams cad skye ba med// rnam par rtogs lus yang dag 'byung // de ni ma rtog yang dag 'byung // 'khor ba dag gi thog ma ni// ji ltar yang ni shes myi 'gyur// 'di ni skye ba
286b8(rgyud): mi snang zhing // 'dus byas dag ni 'jig pa min// de bas yi ge hUM tsam gyis// 'dus byas so sor ba rtag par bya// dag cing mthar thug gnas nyid ni// hU~M gis kyang ni sbyar b.ro bya/ 
287a1(rgyud): rang bzhin med sa'i sgra 'di ni// yi ge hUM las yang dag byung // 'di la dngos po yod ma yin// rang bzhin med cing bdag med pa// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad
287a2(rgyud): kyi// rang bzhin nyid ni yod ma yin// bdag gem sems can gse ba me// bzung dang 'dzin pa rnam pur spangs// zag pa med cing 'dul byas min// gnas na drig pa brtan par bya// dngos
287a3(rgyud): grub sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de lta bu yi sbyor ba des// yi ge hUM ni yang dag byung // ye shes dge ba yang dag byung // chos kyi dbyings kyis brton par
287a4(rgyud): byas// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po yang // 'di ni nye bar mi dmigs te// gang phyir dus gsum gshegs snying po// sangs rgyas snying po tshigs su za shad// sangs rgyas sras byas thams
287a5(rgyud): norgod dang // rdo rje can gyi rgyal skas bcas// hU~M tsam gyis ni sbyor ba yis// kun du yang dag dgug par bya// yi ge sbyor ba gcig gis ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po brnyan// gang phyir rdo
287a6(rgyud): 'dzin rgyal po// 'dir ni rang gi sbyor bas gnas// chos kyi rgyu 'thun bdag tshigs ni// byang chub sems ni ma gtogs par// thog ma ma ldan 'khor ba las// 'byung ba cung zad yod ma yin// 
287a7(rgyud): nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal dang // byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul ni// byang chub kyi ni sems med par// 'grus kyang mya ngan 'da' mi nus// gal te byang chub sems med na// nyan thos dang na
287a8(rgyud): gang nas byung // sangs rgyas 'byung ba brjod med na// rang rgyal de ni 'byung mi 'gyur// gal te byang chub sems med na// sangs rgyas rnams ni gang las byung // gal te byang chub sems
287b1(rgyud): med na/ de bas 'khor lo 'di kun na// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // byang sems gsang ba chen po na// yi ge hUM lus yang dag byung // sangs rgyas thams cad rab byung ba// yi ge hUM gis/ 
287b2(rgyud): snang bar 'gyur// sangs rgya se mAts+tsha n+ya ljin/ nye thigs can ni// rtag tu sangs rgyas rab 'byung ba// hUM gi yi ge sbyor ba hUM// de nyid rdo rje yang dag byung // chos dbyings rab sbyor rdo rje ni// de las yang
287b3(rgyud): yang dag 'byung bar+ya gyur// dwe las+yA rdo rje rnal 'byor che// rnal 'ab+h+r-iR+Sha dbyung phyug bla na med// the tsom med par rnal 'byor kun// yi ge hUM gi sbyar bas 'grub// de lta bu yi bzlas pa yis// de ltar
287b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis ni// sngon gyi bsngo ba mdzad pa lhor// mthas kyi sa dge ba bsngo// byang chub sems dpa'i mtho yisaM ni// rang gi se mos kyang bsde bar bya// rdo rje chen po mthar phyin byed// 
287b5(rgyud): byang chub sems kyis bsgral bar bya// chos kyi dbyi kyi snying po che// sems can thams cad gos pa med// thams cad de bzhin gshegs snying po// ji ltar zla ba bzhin du dag/ zla ba
287b6(rgyud): gang po 'od gsal ba/ rtag tu yang dag rdzogs par gnas// rab tu dang bu 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni dang po'i chos ye shes// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yin// rtag pare yang dgra
287b7(rgyud): gnas pa ste// rang gi nyon mongs dag gis bsgribs// de bas rang sems rnam pa ni// zla ba gang bar shes par bya// bdag ni 'ga' yang yod ma yin// chos nyid de na rgyal bas shes/ 
287b8(rgyud): ye shes zla ba gang ba min// gang phyir bdag ni yod pa min// zla ba gang ba dang mtshungs rigs// gang phyir dag cing gos pa med// sangs rgyas ye shes skyon med pa// zla ba'i sbyor bas
288a1(rgyud): sgom par bya// mthong nas shes rab can gyis bsam// 'di yang gang gis rtogs par 'gyur// yun chings dus su sdug bsngal ba'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa btsa
288a2(rgyud): ldan 'das// nyon mongs pa'u bag chags kun// de bzhin sbyong bar byed par bsam// byang chub sems dpa'i sems chen po// nyon mo dris thams cad 'joms byed pa// chos kyi rgyu
288a3(rgyud): 'thun bag chags kyis// gnyen po ru na 'byung ba'o// de bas 'di yi mthu yis ni// sangasu rgyas ye shes rnam par sbyong // gnas ngan ldan ni bag chags btsas// 'dod pa'i
288a4(rgyud): 'drum gyis gros ba myed// nyi mA lwa bu ra sems chen po// nyon mo sa rtsa ni rab bsreg byed// gazla ba lta bu'i sboms chen po// dge ba'i sems ni rnam 'phel byed// sos
288a5(rgyud): ka'i tshwa ba zla bas bzhin// nyi ma'i gdung bai ra bsal byed// shar bar gyur pas zhi bar byed// gdung ba thams cad zhi byed pa// nyon mongs gdung bas ma gdungs shing // mi shes pa
288a6(rgyud): las nyi ma nyid// byang chab sems ni zla ba cha// nyon mongs gdung ba zhi bar bad// kun nas nyon mongs bag chags bcas// gnas ngan len ni 'joms pa'i mchog/ khab lan gyis/ 
288a7(rgyud): ni lcags bzhin du// nyon mongs bag chags 'dren byed pa// rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa sa// byang chub sems de bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas da ru// slar yang
288a8(rgyud): zla ba rnam par bsgom// byang chub sems kyi mthu yis ni// bag chags thams cad bsreg byed pa// ye shes de ru 'byung 'gyur te// bzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa spangs// rnam par mi rtog mtshungs
288b1(rgyud): med pa// bdag med de bzhin stong pa nyid// mi shes ri mo 'joms par byed// rdo rje dang mtshungs khong stong med// rdo rje'i rang bzhin snying po che// 'jig tshogs ri bo brtan pa ni// rdo rje des ni 'joms par
288b2(rgyud): byed/  phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin brtan// de bas rdo rje rnal 'byor pas// zla ba'i dbus su zla ba mtshungs// zla ba'i gnyis dbus rdo rje yis// rdo rje'i ye shas brtag par ba// slong nyid de bzhin nyid
288b3(rgyud): de nyid// yang dag mtha' dang 'dus ma byas// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// yi ge hU~M ni sgom por bshad// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa mchog/ nam mkha'a'i dbyings dang mtshangs pa ni// zla ba'i
288b4(rgyud): dbus su bsgom par bya// hUM gi sbyor ba de yis ni// rdo rje'i mchog na bsgom par bya// lus kun la ni spro bya zhing // stong pa nyid dang mtshungs pas spros// gzugs 'di nyid ni ming tsam ste/ 
288b5(rgyud): dngos po 'ga' yang yod ma yin// cha rlags kyis ni rnam spyad na// gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin// de dag 'phro ba rnams brtags kyang // phra rab zhes bya yod ma yin// 'jig rten bya ba kun rdzob

288b7(rgyud): yang de la yod ma yin// ming yang gang las yang dag byung // ming zhes bya ba ci 'dra ba// dngos po zhes bya de dang mtshungaso// ming de so sor brtag byas na// gnas gang zhig ni rab tu gnas// dngo
288b8(rgyud): po gcig ni rnam phye na// ming ni mang po yang dag byung // re re yis ni dbye ba yis// sngar gyi ming ni nyams par 'gyur// de la ming ni yod min pas// ming ni yang dag 'byung ba med// ga
289a1(rgyud): ming ni yod min la// ji ltar ming ni rab gnas pa// rnam pa kun du dmigs mi 'gyur// gzugs ni nye bar mi dmigs pa// de la gzugs ni ji ltar yod// 'di ni

289a7(rgyud): po khong stong med// rdo rje'i bstan pa bla ni med// lus kun la ni spro bya ste// bdag gi lus ni 'di lta bu// rdo rje'i bdag nyid ces bya gang // yi ge hUM ni yongs su spro// sgro mo pa'i spyod pa/

289b1(rgyud): nyid dag pa bden pa kang // yang dgra mtha' ni zag pa med// chos dbyings bar+d+han pa dam pa ni// yi ge hU~M ni 'diro rab bsgrubs// rdo rje yi ge hUM de nyid// chos nyid sdug po brtan pa yin// byang chub

290b3(rgyud): pa'i gsang ba nges sbas pa// gsang ba 'di ni rnam pa drag/ rigs 'dzin rnams kyi snying po dang // rnal 'byor rgyud ni bsdus pa dang // don yod shin du rmad 'byung ba// go sang ba bas kyang

291a2(rgyud): ling gar bcug nas ni// mdo snga gsang ba las gsungs so// bA ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mkhas pas ling khar gzhug par bya// gsang ba gzi brjid chen po 'di// me sgrub pa'i sprir bre yis// 'gra'

293a8(rgyud): ga/ rdo rje sems dpa' bo dag grub mdzod// rin chen chen po rdo rje me// rgyal mtshan chen po de rnam che// s+yA ng+yas rgyas dran pa rdo rje che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// chos kyi sa
293b1(rgyud): pa 'khor lo che// slu ba las ni bla na me// bsrung zhing bsrung ba drag po che// rdo rje khu tshur bdug grub mdzod// rdo rje yi ni glu 'di yis// de nyid mchog tu bskul nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal
293b2(rgyud): po che// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che// rdo rje sems dpa' go bya zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor dgod par bya// 
293b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor snga ma dang mtshungs par// dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag bri// de nas rdo rje langs nas ni// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad gdon par bya// chos kyi rig pa 'dzin pa ni// dbab dang gzhug/ 
293b4(rgyud): pa la sogs pa// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// las rnams thams cad yang dag bya// bum pa la sogs yo byad dang // spos dang me tog la sogs mchod // rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// 
293b5(rgyud): lus rnams thams cad yang dag byi// rdo rje sems pa'i rig pa yis// bum pa brgya rtsa brgyad zlas nas// de ni zhabs kyi drung bzhag na// rdo rje bdud brtsi'i chu ru 'gyur// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor
293b6(rgyud): ba yis// cho ga ji bzhin 'jug bya zhing // rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches// bdag nyid la ni dbang skur bya// hU~M gis yang dag bzhugs nas ni// rdo rje mchod pas yang dag mchod
293b7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// ci rigs par ni bsgrub par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gdu ba re ge nas// phyag rgya chen po yongs su bzung // rdo rje sems dpo'i trid+ya 'dzin gyis/ 
293b8(rgyud): rang bdag nyid ni bsgrub par bya// de nas gsang ba phyag rgya che// skad cig re re bsgrub par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// brtan par 'gyur bar the tsom med// gsang ba'i rnal
294a1(rgyud): (bsgrubs nas ni// shin du brtan pa bla na med// rjes chags sems dpa' chen po ni// skad cig gis ni bslab par ba// de 'dra'i mchog tu gsang ba'i mthar phyin
294a2(rgyud): pA/ sems dpa'i rgyal chen yongs su dag pa'i slod// dag pa'i tshul 'di cung zad mtshungs pa med// rdzas chags 'dod chags yongs su dag pa'i spyod// rdo rje rgyal mchog rab dag dri ma med/ 
294a3(rgyud): gsang ba las byung 'khor lo dam pa 'dzin// rig po'i gsang sngags tshul 'di byang chub byed// snying rje dang ldan spyod pa sbyang byed pa// de bzhin rab 'jigs sdug bsngal chen po'i pha rol phyin
294a4(rgyud): gyur pa// mchog tu mkhas shing phra la rgyud dang rgyud las dag byung ba// de ru srid pa dog ni dri ba chen po gcod mdzad pa// gsang sngags 'khor lo las byung ba'i// gsang ba'i cho ga de 'dra
294a5(rgyud): bshad// gsang rigs mchog tu byang po'i 'khor lo ste// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dgongs pa gcig/ sras kyi gtso bo dbang bskur rgyal po ste// de yis thar pa'i grong khyer rab
294a6(rgyud): tu ba shad// ga sang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po de kho na nyid ngam pa mchog tugasang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje rtse mo las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mdo sre gsang ba' dab
294a7(rgyud): po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// / de nas rnal 'byor gsang ba che// sangs rgyas byang chub kun 'das pa// chos
294a8(rgyud): kyi dbyings ni brtan pa'i mchog/ nam mkha' sna tshogs dngos ldan pa// ri dbang rgyal po chen po ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa sprul// rdo rje dbang phyug tshon po'i gnas// sangs rgyas
294b1(rgyud): thams cad yang dag 'dus// rdo rje rgyal po rtse mo ste// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag byung // rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs dang mtshungs// rdo rje kun gyis rab mdzes pa/ 
294b2(rgyud): mchog tu gyur pa'i gnas de ru// rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che// rnal 'byor pa ni mi gsung bzhugs// sems dpa'i dkyil dkrungs kyis ni bzhugs// gtse bi chos kun dbang du 'gyur// rol bcas
294b3(rgyud): rdo rje sems tshul ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas gcig ste// chos chen po yi rnal 'byor mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dos nas ni// grub pa'i dbang
294b4(rgyud): phyag la gsol btab// rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// byang chub sems dpa'i dga' chen po// sems dpa' bang sems las byung ba// rang gi rigs byang bshad du gsol// rgyud kyi snying po
294b5(rgyud): gsang ba che// gsang ba chen po'i rigs kyi dbang / ga mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po ste// theg pa chen po mngon pa sdus pa// zhi bas byang chub 'grub 'gyur te// thams cad yang dgra bye stes pa min/ 
294b6(rgyud): gra tA ma po thams cad rab 'joms pa// rang rig rtag tu be shad du gusol// rdo rje 'chang ba rgyal po che// kune du mi gsung bzhugs par 'gyur// mr-i grisung gsang ba ma gsungs te// zhi ba bad
294b7(rgyud): ba lo zhugs 'gyur// gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs// gdong gcig gzigs par mi mdzad de// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bzhugs par
294b8(rgyud): gyur sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni//  chos kyi dbyings ni bstan pa mdzad// sangs rgyas ji bzhin yang dag 'gyur// don yod grub pa bla na med// sangs rgyas thams cad rnal 'byor che// 
295a1(rgyud): @gsang ba kun las yang dag byung // rdo rje sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje can la skul ba gsungs// oM badz+ra satwa u tiSh+Tha// rdo rje skul ba gsungs pa na// chos dbying
295a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas gcig pu nyid// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhengs par 'gyur// thub pas mgon rnams waM btud nas// tshig ni ji srid gsungs pa
295a3(rgyud): 'gyur// rnam pa kun du ci zhig bgyi// bdag lo sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs// phyag na rdo rje bstan pa la// de nas sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs// gsang ba rdo rje rigs zhes pa// rigs
295a4(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas// rdo rje'i dbang po gnas snang byed// rab tu btud nas tshig gsungs pa// mgon po rnal 'byor gzigs su gsol/ 
295a5(rgyud): bdag gi snod dang ldan pa'i mchog/ 'di na sems can 'ga' yang mod// gang phyir mu stegs la chag so shing // skye dgu lta ba'i dri mas khyab// sems can 'di dag gi dul bya min// sangs
295a6(rgyud): rgyas chos kyi snod ma yin// log pa'i lam du yang dgra zhugs// mun pa sdug po la gzhol ba// la la lha'i lta ba chags// kha gcig brtul zhugs lta ba'i gnas// kha cig dka' thub
295a7(rgyud): gdung bas 'khrul// nyon mongs pas ni dkrugs pa'i sems// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chags// skyo bar yang ni mi 'gyur te// rdo rje rigs kyi gsang 'di la// nam yang sbyor bar mi
295a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de dag 'dod chags me la chags// 'dod pa'i chags pa dag las rgyal// sangs rgyas byang chub chags bral ba// gsang ba 'di la sbyor mi 'gyur// lta ba'i chags pas rgyal
295b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i chags pas rgyal bar 'gyur// 'drod pa'i chags pas lta ba can// srid pa'i zhags pas shin du chags// sangs rgyas bstan la 'dod chags bral// nga rgyal lhag
295b2(rgyud): lhag pa'i dri rgyal bcing // gdug cing drog la shin du khro// snying rje med cing brtsa med 'gyur// de la gsang ba rung ma yin// rmongs pa kun mkhyen yin snyam pa// ye shas snying po la mkhas pa/ gsang
295b3(rgyud): ba 'di ni rung ma yin// 'dren pa ji ltar bshad par bgyi// gnod sbyin dang ni srin po mchog/ sha za 'byung po gsang ba pa// lha la sogs pa gdug chen po// bstan pa la ni 'jug mi 'gyur// da ni
295b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas shin du zhi// byang chub sems ni dga' chen po// sems can 'di drag shin du ga drug/ bdag gi tshig ni 'grub mi 'gyur// nga ni rgyal chen chen po la// nam mkha'i dbyings ni rab tu
295b5(rgyud): sbyangs// kye ma sems can 'di dag dman// bdag gi tshig ni 'grub mi 'gyur// dza ni thig chen dag pa ste// nyon mongs 'dam gyis gos pa med// kye ma sems can 'di nyon mongs// bdag gi
295b6(rgyud): tshig ni 'grub mi 'gyur// nga ni shes rab ye shes che// theg po che la shin du brtan// kye ma sems can shes rab dran// bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur// bsod nams chen po ye shes che// 
295b7(rgyud): nga ni mchod pa chen po'i tshigs// kye ma sems can bsod nams chung // bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur// sems can 'di dag nye bar gtses// 'jigs pa sna tshogasu kun du khyab// rnam
295b8(rgyud): rtog gis khyab shes rab ngan// sangs rgyas chos kyi snod ma yin// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// bdag po chen po dbang phyug kyang // rmo sa pa kun stsal nyid gyur pa// spro bos tshon rdzu 'phrul
296a1(rgyud): chen po ste// de la rgyal po grogs byed yod// sgyu ma'i sngags 'di yongs su 'dzin// de ni mi rgyud ces bya ste// sems can rmongs byed lhur len pa// de ni rgyal po lha chen
296a2(rgyud): po// gtso bo rgyal po cha dang mtshungs// da ni dbang phyug che zhes bya// gri drug pa sems can 'joms byed pa// de yi gzugs can rgyal po che// skyed byed byed pa po bdag po// tshangs pa chen
296a3(rgyud): po rgyal po che// lta ba sna tshogs rab ste ra ba// 'dod pa'i khams kyi rgyal po ni// dbang po zhes bya sha ci'i bdag/ brtson 'grus dbang phyug chen po ni// gdong drug rdzu 'phrul chen po ni// dpung
296a4(rgyud): can zhes bya'i ming can de// gzhon nu mi 'pha ma 'od ldan pa// rgyal po chen po 'ji lta ni// khoms gsum gyi ni bdag por ba shadra// rgyal po lnga ni grazi brjid che// lus gsum gyis ni rngo
296a5(rgyud): mtshar byed// skul byed dbang phyug chen po ni// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug ni// de yi lus can rgyal ba che// dbang phyug chen po grags pa che// sems can gdug pa shin du drag
296a6(rgyud): sngags bcos 'khor dang bcas pa yi// rgyal po lnga po de drag ni// sems can dag ni rmongs bye ba rnams// lta ba chen po 'dzin byed pa// bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa ste// nyon mongs
296a7(rgyud): thams cad rab nyon mongs// gzhan yang kun nas nyon modzes byed// sems can dag ni 'joms byed cing // bdag gi tshig ni 'gru bo mi byed// dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid che// bdag
296a8(rgyud): nyid dam pa nyid chen po// de lta bu'i rnam rtog gis// sems can rnam par rmongs par byed// tshongs pa 'byin byed skye dgu'i bdag/ byed bye rang dgra byed pa'o// lta ba chen po de lta bu
296b1(rgyud): sems can dag ni rnam rmongs ba// khyab 'dzag kan song khyab byed pa// khyab 'dzag rang bzhin grong khyer ka na// da ltar yang dag mi 'dzin par// lba ba'i 'ching ba skyer bad pa// rgyal chen
296b2(rgyud): rgyal po 'di rnams na// lta ba sla la nges par ston// rmongs pa mabs pa yan sems shing // sems can 'ching bar bad pa yin// sems can de rnams gzhan gyis bskal// lta ba smra ba
296b3(rgyud): nges par bstan// khyab 'jug tshangs pa la sogs pa// dbang phyug cha la phyag byedad de// sangs rgyas yang shes rnam kun du// bdag gi tshig 'di grub mi 'gyur// sems can 'di rnams
296b4(rgyud): rnam rmongs 'gyur// de la gsang ba rung ma yin// da lta bu yi rnam pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyis mkhyen nas ni// rnal 'byor can ni mi gsung bzhags
296b5(rgyud): mgron po chen po sangs rgyas kun// thub pa nyi ma ma lus po// grwa sung gcig gi so ni gsang ba che// rdo yi ni tshig gsungasra po// kye ma sems can 'dri gdul-i dka'// ga dug ci d+he dag
296b6(rgyud): shin du ga tum// sangs rgyas kun gyis ma 'dul ba// de phyir bdag cag gsol ba 'debs// mgon khyed shes rab chen po ste// khyod ni thabs chen brjod par bya// byang chub
296b7(rgyud): sems ni bdag chen po// nyon mongs thams cad rnam par 'joms// gdug pa thams cad rab 'dul bya// mgon blo khyod la gsol ba 'debs// gdug pa 'dul byed rnam
296b8(rgyud): 'phrul pa// thabs chen po ni rab tu gsungs// sangs rgyas kun gyis sems can 'di// gdul bar mi 'gyur snod min po// thabs chen khro bo chen po ni// thub pa tshon pos stan du
297a1(rgyud): #gsol//  sangs rgyas ka na gyi tshig gsan nas// phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phral che// tshig dag gi sa ni zhus gyur pa// sangs rgas ku na la 'di skad gsungs// e ma'o gsung ba 'khor
297a2(rgyud): lo che// thabs chen bdag nyid che po ste// chos kyi dbyings ni bstan pa'i dngos// thabs kyi 'khor lo rab ston pa// ji skad du ni bka' stsal po// de bzhin du ni bdag gris bgyi// sems can kun
297a3(rgyud): la phan bya'i phyir// drag pa nyid ni bstan par ga de skad gsungs nas sems dpa' chen// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// mi gsung bzhugs na bdag nyid kyis// drag po nyid la snyoms
297a4(rgyud): parar+ya zhugs// drag po'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog/ zhes bya'i ting 'dzin de lta bu// drag po chen po snyoms par zhugs// de bzhin thugs khA nA s+ye byung ba// drag po 'jig sa ru d+ha yi gra hAM// khro bo/ 
297a5(rgyud): chen po brjod par 'gyur// rdo rje hUM mdzud khro rgyal po// mgon po thugs kha nas byang gyur// sa gzhi ma lus g.yos gyur cing // sa 'di dag ni sgra sgro gros 'gyur// stong gsum ma lus 'di dag nI/ 
297a6(rgyud): hUM hUM zhes bya brjod par gyur// tshad med gzhal du med pa yin// khro bo'i rgyal po byung gyur pa// phyogs rnams kun du dug chen dag/ skad cog de la gtum par 'gyur// slar yang cig nyid
297a7(rgyud): gyur nas ni// grong bu ri byas nas rab bsnams te// khro bo yi ni sku chen blo// 'jigs su rung ba gcig tu gyur// da ni khri bo'i rgyal po che// sangs rgyas thams cad grags chen po// khro rgyal
297a8(rgyud): mdun du 'dug nas ni// slar yang snying po rab du brjod// hUr+ya hUM duM/ 'jigs su rung ba spu langs byed// gnod sbyin kun bdag gnod sbyin te// rdo rje gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul tshe// khro bo chen
297b1(rgyud): po brjod pa yis// stongs gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'od kyis khyab// rdo rje me ni drag po che// ma lus gsal zhing 'bar bar 'gyur// phyi rol gyi ni gdug pa
297b2(rgyud): kun// ma lus dkyil 'khor las byung ba// rdo rje ma ni rab 'bar bas// g.yo ba med cing shrI bir gyur// // lha chen la sogs gdug pa rnams// gang dgu rigs kyi bdag 'khor
297b3(rgyud): rnams// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis brdungs nas// g.yo ba med cing 'bar bar gyur// de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin che// drag po'i gzugs can+da rab 'byed byed// khro gnyer ba yi gdong can te// 
297b4(rgyud): de bzhin nag dang sngo bar 'gyur// mche gtsigs pa yi zhal lnga pa// dbu skra gyen brdzes shin du skrag/ spyan 'bar spyan dang ldan pa ste// de bzhin rdo rje bstan pa'i zhal// drag po rdo rje drag tshog
297b5(rgyud): 'dzin// gcig tu 'brar ba rab ldan pa// zhags pa lcags kyu rdo rje'i bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ gas rnams ma lus g.yo bar byed// gnod sbyin 'byung po 'byu
297b6(rgyud): me tshogs// g.yo ba med cing 'og tu 'gyel// de ni drag po gnod sbyin che// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa// dre yi spyan sngar 'dug nas ni// ched du brjod pa yang dge
297b7(rgyud): brjod// e ma'o byang chub kyi ni sems// kun du bzang po ku nr-i dge ba// sems can 'dul ba'i thabs su ni// brtse medo khro ba nyid du 'gyur// snga ra nI rdo rje sems dpa'
297b8(rgyud): gang // zhi ba'i gzugs su rnam gnas pa// rdo rje gdon sbyin 'jigs gyur pa// rdo rje nag po zhes byar grags// de ni drag po rdo rje 'dzin/ 'jigs su rung ba spu
298a1(rgyud): langs kyang// yi ge hUM gr-i phyag rgya yis// sr-i po gsum po ShA kyang gsung / oM suM bA ni suM p+tA hUM// gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Nad+hU/ gr-ih+Na dA ya grAha pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho b+hA ga wAn
298a2(rgyud): badz+ra hUM phaH// shin du gtum zheng cher drug pa// de yi thugs kha nas byung ste// zhal bzhi dang na phyag brgyad pa// skal ba yi ni me ltar drag/ rdo rje dus kyi me ltar byung // nyon mongs phyogs ni mes
