298a3(rgyud): bsreg byed// smin ma pa skyod pas gtsigs pa'i zhal// de bzhin rnam par 'jig pa'i gdong // 'dzag rten gsum bsreg dam tshag ste// rdo rje can ka na bsreg par byed// 'bar ba 'phreng kun 'khrags ma'i
298a4(rgyud): sgra/ rdo rje bskal pa'i me ltor 'bar// rdo rje hU~M mdzad phyag rgyan// phyag gnyikyi ni yongs su gzung // rdo rje bsdams pa 'dzin rgyal po// lcags kyu dang ni zhags pas brgyan// rdo r+N+Na ya nI lu gu rgyud// phyag
298a5(rgyud): gnyis na bsnams 'jigs rung zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad sdigs byed pa// rdo rje gtum po yang dag byung // drag po bka' ni don byed pa// myur ba nyid du bka' stsol cig/ min na sangs rgyas khyod rnams
298a6(rgyud): kun tu the tsom med par bza' bar bya// de nas sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs// Ti ki dza hU~M shin du drag/ rigs dang bcas par lha chen po// stobs chen po yis dgag par gyis// de nas rig pa'i mchag
298a7(rgyud): rgyal po/ dza snyems pa'i tshul gyis bzhad byed cing // khro bo drag po rkan sgra sgrogs// rdo rje zhugs pos bskul bar 'gyur// rdo rje zhags pa drag po che// dpung ba tsa saM grogs dang bcas pa dang // de bzhin
298a8(rgyud): rigs dang dkyil 'khor bcos// song lo dbang phyug chen po khug/ badz+re pa sha hUM/ dbang ldan rgyal po chen po ni// sna tshogs nang gi 'khor na 'dug/ 'jigs byid ma dang lhan cig tu// 'dod cha
298b1(rgyud): can ni mchog tu rol// rdo rje zhags pa der song ste// khro ba'i sgra yas sngags par 'gyur// dbang ldan rgyal po la smras pa// khyod la ston pa spyan 'dren mdzad// skrag cing khros nas lha chen po// 'jigs pa
298b2(rgyud): yi ni tshig brjod pa// nga ni 'dzugs rten gsum rgyal po// nga las ston pa gzhan gang yod// rdo rje zhags pa khro bo ches// tshig ni lan gsum brjod par byas// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che// khyod la khro bo spyan 'dren
298b3(rgyud): mdzad/ lha chen dbang phyug chen po yis// slar yang lan gsum smras pa ni// nga ni kho na rgyal po nga// nga la spyan 'dren gang zhig yod// de nas zhags pas bka' bzhin byed// khro bo drag pos rab 'jig
298b4(rgyud): pas/ yan lag thams cad bcings nas ni// dbang phyug chen po bkug par 'gyur// 'jigs shing skrag nAs lha chen po// shin tu skye sngags 'den cing du// skyabs tshel dbang phyug chen po la// skyabs
298b5(rgyud): ni gong yang yang ma yin// 'jigs pa chen pa kun tu byung // stobs dang de bzhin nga rgyal gyis// stobs dang shugs ni stan nas ni// zhags pa bcad nas bres par gyur// rang go ga gnas su song gyur
298b6(rgyud): nas/ 'jigs rten gsum gyi lha rnams bos// lha dang lha min dri zar byas// skad cag gis ni 'dus par gyur// 'khor rnams dag ni du bar gyur// ji ltar sngon ni ma byas pa// de lta bu ni yang dge mthong / 
298b7(rgyud): sems can rab dag 'di su zhig/ rdo rje zhags pa 'di song ste// rdo rje rig pa mchog la zhus// dbang phyug chen pos bdag bcad de// drag po tshangs pa rab tu bros// rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// khro bo gtum pa
298b8(rgyud): shin du dag/ de lta bu'i tshig gis na nas// thams cad du ni 'bar bar 'gyur// khro bo rdo rje lugu rgyud// drag po ya~M ni bka' bsgo ba// myur du song la lha chen po// rigs chen po dang bcas pa khug/ khro bo rgyal
299a1(rgyud): ma/ lu ga rgyad gang nas dbang phyug che gnas pa song // yan lag thams cad bcings nas su// lha mo dang bcas kun du bkug/ skrag cang 'jigs pas du byed cing // lha rnams thams cad shan
299a2(rgyud): dra 'jigs// 'jigs pa sa sdig bsngal smre sngags 'don// de rang 'di 'dra lha chen min// stobs dang shags na thams cad kyis// rdo rje kA na dang 'thab par 'gyur// mtha dang spobs dang shugs kyis ni// bcag nas thams
299a3(rgyud): cad bros par 'gyur// lha chen la sogs pa thams cad ni// phyogs rnams kun du bros par 'gyur// mun pa yI ni kun du 'phrul// phyogs rnams kun du 'jigs par gyur// khro bo lu gu rgyud 'ongs nas// rnam pa kun
299a4(rgyud): tu smra bar byed// ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du/ bdag bcag nas ni br-isra par b+ha// khyo be dzA rje rlag pa mchog/ slar yang shin du khros pAn gyur// 'bar ba'i phreng bas rab 'thar zhing // rdo rje drag po nyid du gyur
299a5(rgyud): drag po ha ha zhos bzhad cing // rang gi yan lag za bar byed// rang gi mgo la brdeg byed cing // rdo rje gsor ba bskor bar byed// de lta bu ya khyad par dang // bcas pas khro bo yang dag byed // slar yang rang gi
299a6(rgyud): bdag nyid dran// khro bo'i rgyal po ra ba brjed gyur// oM suM b+ha na suM b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya he b+ha ga wan badz+ra hU~M phaT/ khro bo'i rgyal po bcas nas ni// yaM ge dza na yongs su
299a7(rgyud): brjod/ rdo rje lcags kyu rab tu bsngags// stobs dang ldan pa khug le shog/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la ag ni sa twa shaM/ aM kA sha dza dzaH/ rdo rje lcags kyu rab 'bar ba// song nas phyogs kun bdag nyid
299a8(rgyud): me lan gcig gis ni stobs tshon rnams// lha rnams thams cad bkug par gyur// rgyal po dbang phyug lce dang ni/ lha rnams thams cad grangs med pa// rigs bcas dpung dang bcas ma
299b1(rgyud): nyid/ gcig nyid du ni 'dus par gyur// rdo rje lcags sgrog rab tu bsngags// chings shig stobs chen dang ldan pa// tshogs dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kun// bcings pa lha yis bcings par gyur// ra
299b2(rgyud): ga'i'akhor dang bcas pa'i tshogs// lha tshegs gnod sbyin srin po dang // lha man klu dang 'byung po'i tshogs// gzhan yang gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ni// thams cad bcing bar gyur nas ni// rdo rje zhags
299b3(rgyud): pa rab tu bsngags// rdo rje lcags kyu dang bcas par// srong la dkyil 'khor dag khug shog/ rdo rje zhags pa mngon chags pas// yan lag kun las yongs su spro// rdo rje rang bzhin zhags pa di// 
299b4(rgyud): rtan par 'gyur b.rar+ya thi tso mu med// bye ba dag ni grangs med bcu// rdo rje lcags kyu rab tu byung // lha la sogs pa re re zhing // spyi bo nas 'gugs yang dag sbyor// lha chen dbang phyug chen
299b5(rgyud): pro yi spyi ba'i gtsug tu bta bA nas ni// rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal po yis// dbang phyug chen po 'gugs par byed/ lha sogs tshogs dang bcas pa gun// phun tshun du na du byed cing / shugs
299b6(rgyud): rangs kun de phyung nas ni// phan tshun du na smra bar byed// kye ma'o sdug bsngal kye ma'o sho/ tshegs ni gang du khyer bar ba gyur// rdo rje 'bar ba chen po des// skad cig de la bsregs gyur nas// ri rab
299b7(rgyud): r-I ya rtsi mI ru/ lha la sogs pa thams cad bkug/ gan sa de ru ni thams cad dag/ yongs su bskor nas kun tu gnas// rdo rje kha khyer phyi rol du// lha rnams de dag thams cad gnas// rdo rje
299b8(rgyud): ba'i phyi rol tu// lha la sogs pa yang dag gnas// phyi rol rdo rje rab ni// lcags bsregs rang bzhin rdo rje mtshungs// rdo rje can gyi 'od 'bar mes// nang nas shin du gdungs par 'gyur/ 
300a1(rgyud): / tshogs sems can thams cad kyang // 'jigs su rung ba'i 'odod 'bod// stong gsam 'di dag thams cad kyang // hUM hUM sgra na yongs sa brjod// 'o dong bos nas smra bar
300a2(rgyud): byed/ ngan song thams ca dag ni ci zhig byed// sngon ma mthong ba 'di ci zhig/ 'dir ni rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po de// slar yod thugs rje kun du skyes// thams cad bcings
300a3(rgyud): pa las bkrol te// rdo rje ma yis nyo bar mdzes// rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che// rang gi nikyil 'khor nas byung ste// lha la sogs pa kun bos te// nga yi tshig ni rab tu nyon// de nas lha rgyal la sog
300a4(rgyud): pa/ khyod ni su yin smra bar byed// nged kyis khyed ni sngar ma mthong // gnas mchog 'dzi yang sngar ma mthong // rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che// ha ha zhes dgod bzhad pa ya si// smras pa rdo rje gnod
300a5(rgyud): sbyin nga thams cad za byed bzed dka' ba// de nas lha tshon gyis smras pa// rdo rje gnod sbyin ngas mi shes// nga yis khyod na sngon ma mthong // bdag nyid kho na rang 'byung ba'o// rdo rje dag
300a6(rgyud): pas slar smras pa/ nga'i bka' la myur gnas gyis// med na rdo rje 'bar ba 'das// rang ga ragasra na bsreg par byed// lha chen po yis tshig smras pa// bsten pa la ne da mi gnas
300a7(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum dbang phyug lha nga // su ya bstan pa la gnas bya// 'khor dang bcas pa'i stobs gang yin// de ring nga yis bstan par bya// khyod la stobs ni ci yod pa// stobs chen pos
300a8(rgyud): ldan pas bstan par gyis// dbang phyug chen po rgyal po che// 'byung ba'i tshogs bcos lhan cig tu// tshig dag smra bar gyur pa ni// dag por nyid ni bsnyen par bya// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten
300b1(rgyud): 'di/ 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab// ha ha zhes bya shin du dag/ dbang phyug chen pos bstan par gyur// oM shu la a d+hi shu la ma hA sa hA sr-i shU la a r+g+haM t+ye/ mye gsum mngag gzhag rgyal po ni// stong
300b2(rgyud): phrag gcig ni byang bar gyur// rtse bcas kan tu 'bar ba yi// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab// na ra ya nas smras pa/ oM ma ha sa ha sr-i tsakra a yu dz+ye/ khyab 'dzag giswA ne 'di skad smras// 'khar
300b3(rgyud): le chen po rnam pa stong // thams cad 'od zer 'bar bas khyab// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab// brgya byin gyis smras pa// oM mi hA saM hA sra badz+ra a yu d+he/ rdo rje steng ni phung bar gyur// 'od zen 'bru
300b4(rgyud): ba tsha bas khyab// brgya byin gyis ni smras pa yis// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'bab// gzhon nus smras pa/ oM ma hA saM hA sra shag ti/ a~M yu d+haM/ gzhon nus de skad smras nas ni// mdung ni rtsa gsum
300b5(rgyud): sdong byung gyur// sgra ni drag po sgrogs byed cing // rdo rje can gang lhan cig 'thab// tshangs pas smras pa/ oM ma hA sa hA sra dan d+ha a yu d+he/ tshangs pas de skad smras nas ni// dbyig te steng ni byung gyur nas
300b6(rgyud): mtshan che drag pas 'jigs byed pas// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab// gzhan yang lhag ma rtsa lus pa// rnams kyis yang ni mtshon cha dag/ re re stong phrag gcig gyur nas// rdo rje can dang ldan cig
300b7(rgyud): 'thag tha na sprul pa gang yin dang // pha rol gyi ni dbang ldan dang // de rnams nges par stong gyur kyang // rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thob// me yang kun tu 'bar gyur cing // 'jigs par byed pa'i
300b8(rgyud): gas+thi dang glog chen po// khyab par sring gsum gnas par 'gyur// ha la ha la sgra chen po// nam mkha'i bar snang la ni gagos// rdo rje dag po tshogs chen po// rtswa rnams
301a1(rgyud): / thams cad 'thab par byed// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// gtum po dag po 'jigs byed pas// lha ya lan gyi phyag rgya ni// rdo rje yi snying pos gsungs// oM ma hA sa
301a2(rgyud): hA swa ra badz+ra tsa kr-i/ oM ma hA badz+ra sha le// ma hA badz+ra sha/ oM baM ba tA dz+wa la a gI ni badz+ra/ oM badz+ra zhag te/ oM ma hA badz+ra na Da// de lta bu yaM rnam pa ra// s+yAd pA dag pa sbrang phyug sa tsug/ srad gsum zh-i
301a3(rgyud): bar bya ba'i phyir// rdo rje'ichang ni chen pos byeng/ gtum pa 'od zer 'bar bas khyab// rdo rje me dang yang dag ldan// drag po'i snying po las byung 'gyur// rdo rje 'chang na dbus na bzhags// lha
301a4(rgyud): tshogs phyag rgya de dag ni// rnam par bshig cing dum bur bas// bcom zhing skams te bsregs nas na// phyogs rnams kun du 'thor bar 'gyur// rdo rje me yis rab bsdams pas// lha
301a5(rgyud): rgal pa 'bar bar gyur// 'og nas sa na ram tu 'bar// ster nas me na shan tu gdangs// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches// dbang phyag chen po las gsangs pa// lus sprul pa na dag pa ke// nga ya
301a6(rgyud): bga' na rab tu nyon// dar/ khrod gnas la rab tu dga'// lus la thal ba dag gis bugs// mi yi sha ni za bod pa// nga yi bka'o na rab tu nyon// khrag rlon gyis na rab tu bskas// lpags pa rlon
301a7(rgyud): kha gos sa gyon// lha rnams thams cad khyod kyi 'khor// nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyan// gdug pa dag chen mtshan mo rgyu ba slongs mo ba// khrag la spags pa'i sngags can lus la thal bas byugs// nga yi
301a8(rgyud): bka' nyon dag pa'o sems can lus sprul po// min na bskal pa'i'o me yis rtswa bzhin khyod bsregs bya// ro bsregs thal ba'i phung po bzhin du thal bar 'gyur// bskol pa'i me chen dang mtshungs dang
301b1(rgyud): ni rab 'jigs 'gyur// rigs bcas dpung ldan dkyil 'khor dang bcas gnod sbyin drag/ rdo rje drag po rab 'joms nga yis bshig par bya// dbang phyug chen pos smras pa/ nga ni ma lus dbang phyug
301b2(rgyud): chen po 'khor lo sgyur// 'jigs rten gsum gyi lha tshegs ma lus nga yi 'khor// shin du drag cing rnam gtsigs 'jigs chen khyod yin yang // khyod kyis nga yi bka' ni myur du mnyan par gyis// 
301b3(rgyud): gdugs dang sangs rgyas mang po 'khor ni sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas nga yis sbrul/ zhi zhing des la rnam dul gsang ba dri med nyon mongs med pa'i pha rol phyin// de 'dra'i mgon po dga' ba dus gsu
301b4(rgyud): bzhugs pa thams cad ngas dbang bskur// slar yang nga las byung ba'i tshig nyon zhes bya bya'i tshig 'di ji lta bu// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// gdul ba'i don la shin du mkhas// khro bo gdug pa
301b5(rgyud): gtim chen po// rab 'bar khro bo'i rgyal po ni// rdo rje byin brlabs phyag rgya ches// bya ba de 'dra'i tang 'dzin la// snyoms par bzhugs nas sems dpa' che// rlung rigs khro za las gas nges
301b6(rgyud): gdug pa rnams rnams ni gdul ba'i phyir/ khra ba chos kyi tshul bzung nas// rkang nas brtsams spyi bo'i bar// lus kun la ni rnam par phyung // oM badz+ra kro d+ha uSh+Ti shi hU~M// rdo rje khro bo gtsug gdom
301b7(rgyud): cheH'bar pa'i spyi bo nas phyung nas// sau rnams thams cad g.yo byed cing // khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad 'joms// oM badz+ra b+hi ku tra kr-i ta hUM// khro bo'i rgyal po khro gnyer can// mdzod s+tha las ni rab
301b8(rgyud): tu byung / 'jigs byed drag po yang dag ldan// lus rnams thams cad 'bar gyur pa// oM ni sum b+ha badz+ra hUM/ rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// kha las rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// spyi bo nas brtsams
302a1(rgyud): rkang 'thal bar// rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag ldan/ ta ka hU~M dza/ thugs kha khro bo rgyal po che// thugs kha nas ni rab tu byung // 'bar bA'i phreng bas khyab pa'i sku// 'jigs su
302a2(rgyud): rang ba s+phu langs pa// oM badz+ra a sha.a kar sha ya hUM// rdo rje ljags kyu khri ba che// phyag pa g.yasa? nas rab tu byung // rdo rje lcags ky-i gsar byed cing // rdo rje 'brar ba yang dag ldan// 
302a3(rgyud): badz+ra pA shi kr-i ta hUM phaH// rdo rje zhags pa khro bo che// phrog pa g.yon nas rab tu byung // rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag ldan// rdo rje zhags pas bskor bar byed// oM badz+ra ka la kro da hUM// khro ba'i rgyal
302a4(rgyud): po lcags kyu thigs// lci ba'i dbus nas rab tu phyung // kun nas 'bu re ba yang dag ldan// blo mchog rnga rje gnod sbyin mtshungs// oM badz+ra khA lA kro tra hUM phuT// khre bre chen po ska rigs na// 
302a5(rgyud): rgong pa'i rdo rje rab tu byung // kun nas 'brar ba yang dog ldan// phyag rgya dang na lhan cog ldan cig ldan// oM badz+ra kA d+ha pa la hU~M// khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i stobs// dpung pa g.yas nas rab tu byung
302a6(rgyud): rdo rje 'bar bas 'bar bar gyur// me yis shin du nga rgyal 'gyur// oM badz+ra ba la ya kr-i TA ya hUM// khra ba'i rgyal po'i gdu bu ni// dpung pa g.yon nas rab tu byung // gsal zhing rdo rje 'bar bas khyi
302a7(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo rab tu khongs// oM badz+ra sa ma ya badz+ra kro d+he hU~M hU~M phaT// dam tshig khro bo'i rgyal po ni// de bzhin khro bo gnod byed pa// khu tshur g.yas nas rab tu byung // kun du nas 'bar ba yang dag
302a8(rgyud): ldan// oM badz+ra mr-i NI kr-i hU~M phaT// khro bo khucur drag po che// khu tshur gson pos rab tu byung // rdo rje mi yis rab tu brgyan// oM ban d+ha krota hU~M/ badz+ra si ma ya r+g+haM/ oM badz+ra an dza la kri hUM/ 
302b1(rgyud): rdo rje 'ching ba rgyal po che// de bzhin rdo rje sor mo nyid// khro bo log pa g.yas g.yon gyi// sor mo dag las rab tu byung // oM badz+ra na ga hUM/ oM badz+ra ang ku li mu kha kro ta hUM/ rdo rje sder mo khro bo che// de
302b2(rgyud): bzhin rdo rje sder mo'i gdong // phyag ni g.yon dang g.yas pa yi// sor mo dag las rab tu byung // oM badz+ra ku ma raM kr-i ta ka ri ta ga hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ku ma ra kr-i ta mu d+ha Ta kaM hAM pheMT// khro bo'i rgyal po rked
302b3(rgyud): pA dang / de bzhin khro bo'i spyi gtsug dang // rgyal po brla ni g.yon pa dang // g.yas pa dag las rab tu byung // oM badz+ra sha ma kha le ma hA kro ta b+ha d+ha hUM phaT// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ye sha ni ban d+ha hUM/ gnam lcag
302b4(rgyud): rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ khro ba'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// rgyal po 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab// pus mo'i lhang dag lus byung // oM badz+ra d+ha na do kr-i ti ha na hUM phaT// oM badz+ra kro ta ye ka hUM phaT// rdo rje dbyug pa khri
302b5(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo yan lag drag/ 'bor ba dang btsas gnod sbyin gnyis// rje ngarA dag las rab tu byung // oM badz+ra b+hA pu ra kro ta hUM phaT// oM badz+ri kro ta a mo ka a na ya hUM phaT// de nas dka' thub
302b6(rgyud): bo che/ de bzhin rdo rje don yod nyid// rgyal po shugs chen chen pa na// gdub pu'i rkang nas rab tu byung // oM badz+ra pi ta la kra ta hUM phaT// oM badz+ra pa la kro ta hUM phaT// rkang pa khro bshags chen po// 
302b7(rgyud): de bzhin 'thil gyi khro ba nyid// 'bar bsdu 'phra la lhur len pa// gnyis pa zhabs kyi 'thil las byung // de dag la sogs rgyal po ni// dpag tu med pa rab tu byung // gang ga'i bye snyed grangs med
302b8(rgyud): gi phrar ba rdul gyi khams dag na// baspu'i gso pa ni thams cad dang // lus kyi gas pa na thams cad dang // rdorje khra brgyal pon// rang gi snying ba las byung ga ni rje khri bo nga mdzin gyis/ 
303a1(rgyud): phyogs rnams kun nas yongs spro ste// slar yang gcig tu gyur nas na// dkyil 'khor ngan yang dag gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar 'das// ched du brjod pa yang dag
303a2(rgyud): brjod/ e ma'o sangs rgyas thabs chen po// e ma'o ye shes shin du bzang // sangs rgyas kun kyi ting 'dzin ni// theg pa chen po zhes byar bshad// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad ni// dpag tu
303a3(rgyud): med par 'gyur// rdo rje rag pa khro bo 'di// khro ba rdo rje rags sa bshad// sems can kun gyi don gyi po'i// de nyid thams cad rigs chen po// de nas da' gsang ba'i mtshan// thams cad rdo rje'i
303a4(rgyud): rigs sa bshad// khro bo che las yang dag byung // rdo rje khro bo'i dbang phyug bshwang // rdo rje gtsug gtor rdor mdzod sba// gnod mdzes bdag cag stobs chen po// thugs kyi khro bo rgyal po che/ 
303a5(rgyud): rgyal po 'khor lo bsgyur ba dang // rdo rje lcags kyi rdo rje zhags// rnyed pa'i khro ba stobs chen po// ske rags stobs ldan nyid dang ni// lag gdub de bzhin dam tshig dang // rdo rje khuHrdo rje bsnams
303a6(rgyud): rdo rje sor mo shin du dag/ rdo rje sen mo rdo rje gdong // de bzhin rked pa khro rgyal po// khro bo skye gtsug rgyal po dang // rdza 'phrul chen po lug rgyud// rdo rje gnam lcags rdo rje dbyig/ rdo rje khro bo yan lag
303a7(rgyud): drag/ rdo rje rkang gdu ba dor don yod// rdo rje zhags pa rdo rje 'thil//  ma chog rgyal po rdo rje 'di// rdo rje yA na rigs su bai shwadr-i// de la dag la sogs rgyal po na// rgyal po chen po rdzu 'phrul che// byang
303a8(rgyud): chub sems las yang dag byung // rtag tu gzhan la grags med pas// khros pas rang gi sha za zhing // 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab par gnas// bskal pa'i mi ni me ltar 'o ba re// rdo rje khri
303b1(rgyud): kho'i dkyil 'khor na// rdo rje'i rigs na skyed nas kyang // rab tu dag 'dzin bka' bsgos pas// gdug pa rnams na gdul bar gyis// nga yi bka' yang mnyan par gyis// rdo rje can kun rang nyid kyi/ 
303b2(rgyud): bka' thob nas ni bzung bya ste// lha rnams kun gyi gsung gcig gis// rig pa 'di ni brjod par 'gyur// oM ni suM b+ha badz+ra hUM phaT// rdo rje khro bo stobs po che// gtsug ga tor la sogs kyis gsu
303b3(rgyud): pa/ lha chen la sogs gdug pa rnams// 'og tu kha bltas 'gyel bar 'gyur// rdo rje khro bo stobs po ches// lha rnams brgyal bar gyur nas ni// rdo rje me ltar 'braro zhes pas// snying po dag na
303b4(rgyud): yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra a na ya ha na da ha pa tsa ra na hUM phaT// khro bo chen po rdo rje ma// skad cig de la phyung nas na// lha rnams de dag bsregs nas kyang // de bzhin 'og tu 'gyel bar 'gyur// rdo
303b5(rgyud): rdo rje mes na rab tu bsreg/ rdo rje 'bar pos 'bar bar gyur// tshig cing bcas par gyur na sa ni// lha la sogs pa'o dang 'bod// rdo rje khro chen de rnams dang // de bzhin khri chen la sogs pas/ 
303b6(rgyud): thams cad gsum gcig byas nas ni// slar yang snying po gsungs par 'gyur// oM badz+ra a po sha ya// rdo rje dbab pa khro bo che// rdo rje can gyi thugs las byung // lho rnams kun gyi gsong song nas
303b7(rgyud): de bzhin lha chen la sogs pa// lha rnams kun la yang dag ba bas// rdo rje dbab pas rab sdug bsngal// babs nas rang gA yan lag dag/ gcig lci gcig ni za bar byed// rdo rje can+ya dang bcas pa kun// 
303b8(rgyud): rdo rje zhags pas yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra dz+wa la ag ni prad+d+ha pa tam pa badz+ra ma~M ku sha a ka re sha ya hUM// rdo rje lcags kus rgyal song nas// skad cig gis ni yang dag 'gugs// lha rnams thams
304a1(rgyud): cad bkug nas ni// spyi bo ru ni gdung bar byed// rdo rje lcags kyus yang dag 'gags// rdo rje zhags pas drangs par byed// rdo rje 'bar bas ra ba bsregs nas// steng du
304a2(rgyud): rkang pa 'og tu ma ge/ ha da zhes ni sgrogs byed cing // 'jigs pa'i skad chen sdug bsngal gyur// rdo rje con la gsol ba 'dabs// stobs chen gzhol bar ma mdzad cig/ de bzhin lA la sogs pa
304a3(rgyud): kun/ dkyil 'khor du ni bkag par gyur// rdo rje can dang bcas kun gyis// rdo rje lcags sgrog yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra ban dA hUM paT// lha tshogs gdug pa de dag ni// 'chang ba lnga yas
304a4(rgyud): btsongs par gyur// rdo rje lcags sgrog khro bo ches// 'ching ba brtan par bcings par 'gyur// khro ba rgyal po rdo rje chen// shin tu gtumi pa stobs chen pos// slar yang snying po yang dag rngan// rang
304a5(rgyud): ga snying po yang dog brjod// hAM snying po yo dag po brjod pa yis// gdug pa de rnams rab tu 'gyel// g.yo med shi ba bzhin du gyur// 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar thob// de nas rgyal po
304a6(rgyud): rnam snang mdzad// chos kun dbang phyag dbang dang ldan// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che// rdo rje 'chang la bos par gyur// sems dpa' chen po mnyan par gyis// 'di rnams sems can rab
304a7(rgyud): 'jigs byed// 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo 'di// srog gi gzhom pa ma bya zhig/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje kun bdag dbang ldan pas// sangs rgyas gsung ni thos nasu/ 
304a8(rgyud): rig pa 'di ni ming dge brjod// oM badz+ra su n+yam+b+ha/ rdo rje slong brdzu 'phrul che// de ni brjod pa tsam gyis ni// lha la sogs pa thams cad ni// slar yang gson pa nyid du 'gyur// sdug
304b1(rgyud): bsngal kun dang bra lnga 'gyur// 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar gyur// rdo rje slong ba'i byams pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskul bas// de nas lha la sogs pa kun// sangs rgyas
304b2(rgyud): byams pas langs par 'gyur// thal mi sbyar nas tshig gcig gis// bcom ldan 'das la zhus gyur pa// bcom ldan de la gang gis na// bdag cag 'di ltar 'dul bar mdzad// sangs
304b3(rgyud): rgyas thugs rjes can kun gyis// bdag cog yongs su bskyab tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyed cag yongs su bskyab pa dang // phan gdags par na ngas ma nis/ 
304b4(rgyud): 'di ni drag po rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag por bshad// de rnams kyis gsol pa// khyed kyi bcom ldan 'das kyi don// ji lta bu logs mi 'tshal lo// gang zhig sangs rgyas bdag
304b5(rgyud): por gyur/ sangs rgyas 'phags pa ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub gang // de na rdo rje can dgyur// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// rdo rje gang
304b6(rgyud): yin drag po 'dzin// de rnams kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu zhi// de nas byang chub de dang mtshungs// brtse dang byang chub sems la sa byung // de yi drag po gang las byung // 
304b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'di na thabs kyis 'dul ba ste// gdug pa thams cad rab 'dul byed// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa 'di// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // de nas rgyal po rdo rje
304b8(rgyud): 'dzin/ rdo rje khro bo bdag chen pos// lha tshogs kun la bos nas ni// dbang phyug chen po las gsungs pa// nga yi bstan pa'i bka' dag no// gyi/ gdug pa can dag nyan par gyis// min na rdo
305a1(rgyud): 'bar ba yis/ rigs dang bcas pa nga yis bsregs// khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams kyis// tshig gcig tu ni 'di skad zhus// gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa// rgyal po
305a2(rgyud): chen po de bzhin bgyi// de nas lha chen gyis smras pa// nga ni nga nyid rgyal po ste// nga yi bka' ni mnyan par gyis// lha chen po yi tshig gsan nas// rdo rje khro ba rab 'bar zas// rdo rje gnod sbyin
305a3(rgyud): 'joms zhes pa// khro brgya lnga po yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra na suM b+ha hUM// shin du gtum pa stobs chen po// khro bo 'di ni brjod pa yis// dbang phyug chen po brgyal gyur nas// de bzhini sA la 'gyel
305a4(rgyud): byar gyur/ g.yo med 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur// shing 'gyel bzhin du gnas par 'gyur// mgul ba med cing g.yo ba med// rdo rje khro bas bdungs par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
305a5(rgyud): stsol pa/ rdo rje khro bo thams cad mkhyen// bdag nyid chen po 'di yis na// srog gi rgyu ni zad pa dang // de nyid nyams par ci phyir byed// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas thugs rjes
305a6(rgyud): bskul ba yis// rdo rje tshe zhes bya rdo rje// rdo rje'i rig pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra a yu// 'di ni rig pa brjod pa yis// dbang phyug chen po yang dag ldangs// rdo rje tshe yis gsan byas nas/ 
305a7(rgyud): bde ba chen po thob par 'gyur/ rnam par snang mdzad thub chen lnga// zhabs dgal na bitud nus gsol// mgon po bcom ldan skyabasu gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pa de gdug ma ni// kun mkhyen
305a8(rgyud): bcom ldan bka' stsal po// nga yis brtse ba bya mi nuso// 'di ni gdug pa shin du drag/ de nyid la ni skyabs su song // rdo rje khro bos lho chen la// kun du bas nas 'di skad smras// nga lo bsnyon
305b1(rgyud): pa'i bka' stsal dag/ gdug pa chen pos nyan par gyis// rdo rje gnod spyan bdag chen la// lha chen po'i slar smras pa/ 'chi ba chen po bzod nus kyis// khyod kyis bka' la gnas ma byed// 
305b2(rgyud): rje khro bo drag po che// khros pas gdug pa sel gyur nas// hUM ni shan du 'jigs pa po// snying pa drag po brjod par gyur// hUM yig hUM ni brjod pas ni// dbang phyug chen po slar yang 'bye lo// rdo rje
305b3(rgyud): khro ba drag pa ches// rkang pa bgug pa yang dag brjod// oM ba ta aM kar sha ya badz+ra hUM// de nas rdo rje dbang po 'di// brjod pas rdo rje khro bo phyung // tshig ni 'di skad brjod par gyur// bka
305b4(rgyud): stsol mdzod cig 'od chen po// rdo rje khro bos bka' stsal pa// oM pa ta a kar sha yA sar+b+ba badz+ra d+hA ra ka tsa ra phaT// badz+ra hUM dza/ khro bo chen pos 'di gsungs nas// dbang phyug chen po u mar bcas
305b5(rgyud): rkang pa dgug pa rdo rje yos// rdo rje rkang pa dag gis dgug/ rdo rje khra bos de dag dgun/ steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgu/ 'jig rten thams cad dgong gyur cing // rdo rje gdung bas gdungos par
305b6(rgyud): 'gyur/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// dbang phyug chen po u mar bcas// zhabs kyis man no nas rdo rje yis// dbang phyug chen po bdag par byed// de nas rkang pa g.yon pa yis// dbang
305b7(rgyud): phyag chen po mnan byas nas// g.yas pas lha mo uM ma yi// ni ma dag gi bar du btsir// rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni// dbang phyug chen po'ang rab tu mnan// uM badz+ra a kra ma ho// slar
305b8(rgyud): yad dbab pa'i rig pa ni// rdo rje khro bo yang dag brjod// oM ba dz+ra A be sha ha na ha~M na tra ta// dbang phyug chen po babs gyur pas// rang gi lag pas lan stong du// rang dzang 'jigs sa rung ba rdog/ 
306a1(rgyud): stong phrag cig tu yang dag ni// 'jig rten gsum gnas thams cad ni// 'odod chen po 'bod par gyur// bdag cag gi ni rgyal po 'di// 'di lta bu'i bdag nyid gyur
306a2(rgyud): de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// brtse dang snying rje skyes par gyur// snying rje steng du bzhug byas te// sangs rgyas byams pa yang dag brjod// oM bad d+ha mAM tri rag+na hUM// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin
306a3(rgyud): gtso bos// de nas sngags 'di gsungs pa yis// dbang phyug bzhi po'i sdug bsngal de// skad cig de la nye bar zhi// phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs dag gis// rlig pas dbang phyug na chen po
306a4(rgyud): sa chen po ni yang dge thob// ting nge 'dzin dang bzungs de bzhin// tha mal ba yi gzugs ber nas// rdo rje 'dzin la phul bar 'gyur// lha chen 'di nas sha 'phos nas// shi zhing lus
306a5(rgyud): ni bor nas su// gang gsum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi// bye snyed sangs rgyasnga zhing dang mnyam// thal bas g.yogs pa'i gnas zhes pa// sangs rgyas zhes ni yid 'ong ba// de ru song nas lha
306a6(rgyud): chen po/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang bstan par 'gyuraro// thal ba'i dbang phyag sgra dbyangs can// de bzhin gshegs par de gnas gyur// de nas sha bi'i lus de yis// ched du brjod/ 
306a7(rgyud): pa yang dag brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yas ni// tshogs bcad gcig ni mngon par brjod// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// bas
306a8(rgyud): sa skad cig dge gis ni// mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas mgon mdzad// rdo rje khro ba rgyal po chos// dbang phyug chen po yang dag byung // khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams la/ 
306b1(rgyud): kun tu bres nas des gsungs pa// kArab mchog dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni// gtse pho rab tu zhugs par gyis// gal te de bzhin ma byed na// dbang phyug chen po bzhin du bya// de nas lha
306b2(rgyud): kun 'jigs gyur to// skrag nas thams cad kyis zhus pa// de bzhin du na bgyid par 'tshal// bdag cag khyed kyi bran du 'gyur// rgyal lo khyod kyi dam tshig ni// ji ltar sgrub par
306b3(rgyud): mi bgyid lags// bdag cag rnams ni khyed kyi 'khor// bskal pa chen po bka' sol cig/ rdo rje khro bas bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// skyabs su rab
306b4(rgyud): tu 'gro bar gyis// byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni// sems can kun la yang dag sbyor// srog gcod pa na spong bar bya// rku dang rdzun du smra ba dang // gzhan gyi chung mo de bzhin du// 
306b5(rgyud): dri ni dang por spangs pan gyis// sems can gnod pa dang ldan pa'i// ci nas kyang ni mi bya'o// byang chub spyod pa rab sbyor ba// de la lhod ma ni brtson mi bya// nga yi bstan pa'i bkra
306b6(rgyud): yi ni rdza 'di dag dam tshig yang dag brjod// nga yi bga' ni nyan por gyis// mnan khyod ni kun tu bsreg/ de nas 'jig rten gsum 'khor lo/ de nas dam tshig blangs nas kyang // byu
306b7(rgyud): chub sems kyang bskyed nas ni// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song // rdo rje khro ba rgyal po che// kun tu phyag rgya byin nas kyang // phyag rgya'i snying po 'di yis ni// dzI r+N+Ne ti rin ti yis ni// 
306b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun tu bcug gyur pas// oM badz+ra sa maM ya g+h+r-i hA b+ha na g+h+r-i sa ma he// badz+ra satwa sa ma ye mA sma ro na sauR+YA ta thA gau ta ma hA sa ma ye s+t+wa~M/ D+hau D+ho me b+hA ba tsa ro a pra ti hA ra maM b+ha ba/ sar+b+ba kaH
307a1(rgyud): ma su tsa rbe/ tsid+ha shai yaM ku ru ha hra hra ha hA// de nas mchod pa tsam gyis na// phyag rgya kan+ta tu ba bas par 'gyur// twe r+the ta r+yan ti ra l+r-i// phyag rgya kaR+sha tra bstan par 'gyur// 
307a2(rgyud): de dag rim bzhin bcug nas na// rdo rje rin chenr-i dbang bskur gyur// rdo rje mtshan ma log byin nas// rdo rje'o ming ni dbang bskur gyur// de la lha rnams thams cad no// rdo rje ming gri dbang
307a3(rgyud): bskur gyur/ sngon la 'jigs rten gsum bdag po// go rims bzhin da dbang bskur gyur// khyab 'jug zhes byar gnas pa ni// sgyu ma rdo rje zhes byar grags// gzhon na rdo rje grol bu ste// 
307a4(rgyud): tshungs pa rdo rje thub pa nyid// dab po rdo rje mtshon cha nyid// de dag rig pa'i bdag por bshod// rgyal po bzhi bri ga brjid che// rdo rje chen po stobs chen pa// bar snang la na rgyu ba nyid// rdo rje/ 
307a5(rgyud): mdo gis dbang bskur gyur// nyi ma rdo rje 'khyil pa ste// de bzhin zla ba rdo rje 'od// dbyig chen rdo rje dbyug te ste// ser skya rdo rje ser skya yin// de la sogs pa khro rgyal po// rdo rje khro bos dang
307a6(rgyud): bskur gyur// de nas mkha' spyod lha rnams kyis// rdo rje mang gis dpang bskur gyur// myos chen rdo rje myos pa ste// rdo rje phreng ba sbrang ci byed// rnam par rgyal dang rgyal byed dang // rdo rje
307a7(rgyud): shis dang rgyal bar ldan// tshogs kyi bdag po rgyal po bdag/ zhes bya la sogs dbang bskor gyur// de nas sa la gnas pa rnams// rdo rje ming gas dbang bskur gyur// gtun shing
307a8(rgyud): mdzod ni bsrung ba ste// me ni de bzhin rdo rje me// rdo rje rlung ni rlung chen po// rdo rje 'jigs byed don rdorje// de 'dra la sogs po nya rnams// rdo rje mchog gi dbang bskur ro// de nis 'og
307b1(rgyud): gnas pa na// rdo rje lcags kyu rkang za ba// de bzhin gshin rje rdo rje nag/ sa yaM gtsug ni bgegs rdo rje// chu lha mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// de nas lha mo de bzhin du// go rims bzhin du dbang
307b2(rgyud): bskur gyur// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur gyis// yum ni mchog rnams dbang bskur gyur// khyab 'jug ma na rdo rje ser// drug ldan rdo rje gzhon nu ma// tshangs pa rdo rje brgya bcu ma// dbang
307b3(rgyud): mo rdo rje khur tshur ma// gsod byed rdo rje gsod nyid ma// snar ma rdo rje 'od ldan ma// de las dbyig pa rdo mtshig ma// 'phrog ma rdo rje skye rags te// ga sod byed rdo rje 'jigs byed ma// gnam
307b4(rgyud): lcags rdo rje gnam lcags ma// nam grwa rdo rje dbang ldan ma// gos can rdo rje gos can ma// rdo rje pho nya zhi ba ma// rlung lha rdo rje shugs can ma// lus ngan mo ni rdo rje gdengs// me lha de bzhin
307b5(rgyud): rdo rje ma/ phag mo rdo rje gdong can ma/ rdo rje nag me tsi mun ti// chu lha de bzhin chu srin ma// sna chud man srul mo ste// de 'dra la sogs grangs med ma// lha ma rnams na dbang bskur gyur/ 
307b6(rgyud): rang rang rigs na rtags nas so// ji bzhin lha yi bdag por bshang // de nas phyag rgya bcing ba ni// de bzhin dam tshig snying po'o// lha mo kun gyi bdag po kun// bkug nas de bzhin dbang
307b7(rgyud): du 'gyu / rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings na swa// sdigs 'dzub dang ni lugs kyu bcing // bcang ba dang ni ba dgrol byed pa// dngos po bya ba'i don sems pa// de yi mngon du khyed rnams ni// / 
307b8(rgyud): bya ba sgrub phyir gnas par gyis// khyod kyi srog ni nyams gyur pa'o// de phyir dam tshig sbyin mi bya// rgya cher phyag rgya chen po ni// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus nas// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bskyed
308a1(rgyud): / byed pa/ de nyid zhes bya bstan pa yan// dkyil 'khor mchog rnams de dag dang // de bzhin lha la sogs pa kun// bkug cing rab tu bcing bar 'gyur// rdo rje can
308a2(rgyud): gyis dbang byas nas// rdo rjes thams cad dbang bskur gyur// rdo rje'i ming gis mtshan mar byas// lha chen po ni gcig pu nyid// zhabs kyo 'og tu degs nas bzhag/ 'jog rten gdag
308a3(rgyud): pa cher drag pa// gdug pa'i snying po zhes byar grags// gdug pa'i snying bro'i dkyil po ni// sems can 'ongs par the tsom med// thang cig tshwas grangs rI re dang // gang du zla gcig dkyil
308a4(rgyud): 'khor du/ sems can stong phrag brgya dag ni// skad cig de la sdug bsngal byed// yid ni nye bar 'jal bar byed// mdangs ni nye bar 'phrog pa'i nad// mi yi skye bo gsod pa dang // bla na dug
308a5(rgyud): tshen nyid dag ni// grong khyer drang grong brda la dang // grong dag 'joms par byed pa dang // sems can rnams ni gcod byed po dang // skye bo stong sar sbyor byed dang // de ltar dag cing 'jigs
308a6(rgyud): rung dang / brtse ba med cing sdig byed pa// gsod pa dang ni 'joms par byed// shes rab 'phrog par byed pa dang // drag sna tshogros gzugs 'dzin pa// dud 'gro'i 'gro ba'i bar
308a7(rgyud): dge dang // sems can rnams la gsod byed dang // myur du mdangs ni 'phrog pa dang // le nyes thog dang chur dang ni// tshar ni ma 'beb byed pa dang // gang dang gro ba'i gdung ba dag
308a8(rgyud): skad cig de la bskyed pa dang // gdon ni babs par byed pa dang // de bzhin bdud mchog bskyed pa dang // sems ni rnam par g.yeng byed dang // de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mtha' yas pa// 
308b1(rgyud): de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ste// skye dgu sna tshogs nad kyis khyab// ye shes kyi ni spyan gyis gzugs/ dam tshig sdud pa'i sems can dang // yams
308b2(rgyud): dang de bzhin nye bar 'tshe// rIms dang gdan dang dug drag po// skye dgu 'di rnams 'joms par byed// sna tshogs sdug bsngal kun tu 'khrugs// 'jigs pa sna tshogs dag gis khyab/ 
308b3(rgyud): thams cad nyams zhing zal gyis gnon// sdug bsngal stug por ldog bsngal gyur// slar yang bde bar bya ba'i phyir// nag me'i sngags 'odi yongs su gzung // mkha' 'gro ma mo rnal
308b4(rgyud): 'byor ma// 'gro ba 'di ni kun du khyab// rims dang gdon dang 'bying po dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang 'byung po dang // gdug pa rnams kyis kun du khyab// 'jig rten sdug bsngal gdon
308b5(rgyud): 'di ni/ gzigs nas rdo rje 'joms rgyal po// thugs rdo rje dog na bskyed par 'gyur// kye ma sems can 'di sdug bsngal// de la rjes su brtse bad med/ nga nyid kho na ro rang byung ste// 
308b6(rgyud): de bzhin sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog/ nga la log par rtog pa ste// skye dag de la brtse bar bya// dbang phyug chen po gang yin dang // gdug po thams cad rab 'dul byed// yang dag
308b7(rgyud): byang chub rang byang gyur// skye dgu ma lus bskyab pa dang // thams cad dag ni dge bya zhing // de bzhin dam tshig bsrung bar bya// gnod dang phan pa byas nas ni// skye druge 'di dag rnam par
308b8(rgyud): dgal/ de nas rgyal po rgyal po rdo rje 'dzino// dkyil 'khor skyob dang phan 'dogs pa// zhes bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs// mgon po chen
309a1(rgyud): / po sangs rgyas kan// 'di ltar bka' ni nod par byed// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// de bzhin snying po phyung bar gyur// oM suM b+he ni suM b+ha hUM phaT// de nas
309a2(rgyud): rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas bka'i na bzung bar bya// phyi rol dkyil-i 'khor dgag pa'i phyir// lcags kyu'i snying po rab tu phyung // oM badz+ra sa ma ya a ka sha ya sar+b+ba mon Da la badz+ra
309a3(rgyud): d+ha ra sad t+ya ma ta tA ma hUM phaT// rig pa brjod par gyur pa yis// rdo rje lcags kyi shan du brten// lcogs kyi bdag nyid che mchog na// brgya phrag gangs med 'byung rgyar 'gyur// stong gsum
309a4(rgyud): gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// rims bzhin rab tu tham par gyur// gang zhig phyogs rnams bcu po ru// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba kun// gdug pa de rnams gdug nas kyang // de
309a5(rgyud): bzhin gong bu gcig tu bya// rdo rje me yis kun du gdungs// ri'i rtso mar phob nas ni// tsha de med bgang du med pa rnams// phyi rol gyi ni dkyil 'khor 'ongs// rdo rje dbang po'i gnas kun to// / 
309a6(rgyud): 'khor nyid du ni yang dag gnas// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor bas nas ni// kye gdug pa skye dag rnams lha ni// rnam par mchi ba spang bar gyis// khyed
309a7(rgyud): rnams kyis ni dam tshig leng // srog chags thams cad gsod pa spongs// mnan khyed rnams g.yas 'bar byas// de bzhin nga ya sa thal bar bya// gdug pa'i dam tshig dkyil 'khru
309a8(rgyud): gyis/ tshig cig tu ni zhes gyur pa// mgon po bdag cag sha za ste// ji ltar bgyi bar ba bka' stsol cig/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin drag pos// ma bsdoms pa'i tshig gsan nas// rdo rje
309b1(rgyud): bo rab bzod dka'// snying po drag po gsungs par gyur// / oM ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha ha na hAn pa tsa b+h+r-i d+ha sa yA bi ki ra saR+Wa duSh+Ta sa ma ya// mud tra mAn Da la b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ mar d+ha ma ra d+ha khAng+ga khAd+b+ha/ pU
309b2(rgyud): man tra badz+ra sa ma ya hUM paH// khro bo chen pos 'di brjod pas// ra ba dag gdug pa de dag ni// tshig cing rab tu 'gyel gyur cing // dam tshig phyag rgya nyams par gyur// 'o dod 'bod cing du
309b3(rgyud): bar gyur/ gci gri la gcig ni skye bar byed// ji skad smras bzhi ni byas te// 'on kyang bden pa smra mi bya// rdo rje sems dpa' drag po che// rang bzhin gyis ni sangs rgyas dag/ stobs
309b4(rgyud): / chen gsang ba pa'i dbang po// bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/ ai na saM b+hA ha nau da ha pa tsa gr-i hA ban d+ha hUM pAT// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas bka' la
309b5(rgyud): rab gnas pas// rdo rje khro bo rab za byed// snying po drag po brjod par bya// oM ma hA badz+ra ku ru kro d+hi pa Ta ya sar+b+ba duSh+Ta ma ne DA la ma bI na ya sha/ saR+Wa duSh+Ta sa ma ya naM baM gI ri b+hi d+hi/ sa ya swo tra ya ngan
309b6(rgyud): dza ya/  bana? dza saR+Wa duSh+Ta sa ma ya// mr-i traM b+han d+ha gr-i hA/ he na da ha da tsa/ sauR+Wa duSh+Ta sa ma ye/ satwA badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT// de nas 'di ni brjed paM tsAm gyis// rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che// gtum
309b7(rgyud): po drag po shin tu 'jigs// rdo rje khro bo rab tu byung // rigs bcas dpung dang bcas ldan pa// dam tshig sdang ba bzung nas ni// shin du 'jigs pas skrag gyur cig / rgya mtshor yang ni
309b8(rgyud): rab tu bskul// phyag rgya rab 'jigs de dag gos// rnam par bcom zhing zil gyis men na// rdo rje me yis bsregs nas ni// thams cad du ni thal bde bya// byang sems las byung
310a1(rgyud): rje ltar sems can bsreg par byed// 'don gzhug pa'i tshig yin te// phan pa'i tshogs n+d+ha ra rgyal dgu skyes// 'dod chags skyon la sogs lnga pa/ 
310a2(rgyud): nyon mongs ma dri mas gang shes nas// rdo rje can gyis dri med// bzung nas ye shes me yis bsregs// sems can shin du bsreg de'i 'jigs// byang chub spyod pos byang chub gnas
310a3(rgyud): ma bskyod pa yi gnas skyes zhing // rdo rje can ni mchog tu 'gyur// phyag na rdo rje sems dpa' che// rdo rje chen po phyag rgya dgug/ zhes de 'ad ya tid 'dzin la// 'jigs pa med par snyom
310a4(rgyud): par zhugs// mkha' 'gro ma na rjes sbyang zhing // rgyal ba'i bkra' na nod par 'gyur// phyag na rdo rje stobs tshon l-I// de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// oM ha na ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ 
310a5(rgyud): do nas rdo rje 'dzin drag po// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung byung nas// 'jigs pa dgug pa rdo rje ni// rang nyid kyi ni sngags 'di brjod// oM badz+ra a kar sha ya Sh+To gA ma/ sar+b+ba dASh+Tha
310a6(rgyud): gr-i h+Na badz+ra sA d+ha sang+ga t+ye na hUM phaT// de nas brjod pa tsam gyis ni// mkha' 'gro ma ni mi ngos 'phrog ma// rnal 'byor sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas// re rab tu ni kun tu 'dus// rdo rje/ 
310a7(rgyud): lcags kyus bkug nas ni// 'bar ba dang bcas 'bar bar 'gyur// spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas chog/ smras pa rdo rje 'dzin pas skyobs// skal chen rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ 
310a8(rgyud): gdug po tshegs chen myur ba cu// gsod pa spongs la bka' nyon gyis// de dag re re zhing spras pa// bdag cag 'di rnams sho za ste// gang gis rtag tu gson 'gyur ba// dad/ 
310b1(rgyud): cag la ni thabs bstan gsol// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de yis thabs ni 'di gsungs so// zla gcig lon nas shi ba gang // de ni bza' bar blang bar bgyis// byang chub
310b2(rgyud): sems las chags bral nas// gsang ba smod pa lhar len pa// khyed dang lhan cig yang dag sbyor// de na khyed kyis bza' bar ba gyis/ phyag rgya yis na snying po 'di// rtog tu
310b3(rgyud): bcang bar bya ba ste// phyi rol thams cad spangs nas ni// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar gyis// oM badz+ra pr-i ti g+ha hA hri da ya a ka ra Sha ya tsau t+yA ya me ni ya ste/ ha sa ri d+ha ya nI
310b4(rgyud): rnam duMs ma ya hUM dza// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan// khro bo spyi gtsug rgyal po ni// rnal 'byor pa ni de yis spros/ gal to dam tshig las
310b5(rgyud): 'das nas// khro bo bdag pa nyid chen po 'dis// rtag tu mgro bo 'grems byed pa// rims dang bcas pa nges par bsreg/ bdun rtsi sman gyi rgyal phyo zhes/ bya ba de
310b6(rgyud): 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/ sems dpa' chen po snyoms zhugs nas/ nad kyi don du 'char bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sI bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ra hUM phaT/ 
310b7(rgyud): nas rgyal rdo rje 'dzin// sems can thams cad 'jigs byed pa// nang rnams thams cad bkug nas na// 'gugs pa yi ni snying po brjod// oM badz+ra sa mA ya a na ya sar+m+ma
310b8(rgyud): duSh+Ta badz+ra ra d+hi na na sha ya hUM phaT// de nas brjod pa tsam gyis ni// nad dang gdon gyi tshogs kun dang // rims dang la sogs kyis na di thos nas// steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo
311a1(rgyud): 'bar ba'i me dang yang dag ldan// ha ha zhes sgrags 'jigs par byed// bdag cag rims ni ma gzhom par/ khro bo chen po bka' stsal ci/ 
311a2(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor chen pos gsungs/ d+ya ya bka' ni rab tu nyon// sems can nye bar 'joms pa spongs// madrangs kyang 'phrog par ma byed cigade rnams kyis smras pa// rgyus
311a3(rgyud): pa rdo rje bdag cag gi srog ni bsrung por mdzad du gsol// bdag cag kun na gzi brjid za// thabs na cung zad stsal du gsol/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyal po che// de
311a4(rgyud): nAs+ya stobs can gyis smras pa// da yau sdigs dang phyag rgya dag/ gang zhig bsrung la gnod ma byed// oM badz+ra kA ra ma byi sho d+ha ya/ sar+b+ba a ka ra Nan po shad d+ha sa te na sa ma
311a5(rgyud): ya hUM/ de nas phyag rgya chen po kun/ theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'o// mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las// yongs su bshad pa thams cad kun// sngags dang phyag
311a6(rgyud): rgya gnas gang na// rtag par rab tu spyong byed pa// gnas de ru yang rtag pa ru// khyed rnams shin du gnod ma byed// de skad gsungs pas gdon kan nI// hi hi zhes nr-i sgrogs
311a7(rgyud): par 'gyur/ spyi ba'i rnal 'byor po rnal 'byar pa la ni// gnod par byed pa thams cad gtad// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ni// sdig
311a8(rgyud): pa bral ba'i phyag rgya che// blo gros chen po snyom par zhugs/ ngan song bcing bar bya ba'i phyir// mgon po dag la bka' nad byed// mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad
311b1(rgyud): kyis/ kun nas snying po brjod par 'gyur// oM k+Sha pa ya badz+ra swA hA// rdo rje sems dpa' thabs chen po/ snying rje las ni yang dag byang // sems can rnams la brtse ba'i phyar/ 
311b2(rgyud): sdig pa 'a thams cad dgug par 'gyur/ oM saR+Ya a pa a a kar sha Na bi sho d+ha na/ badz+ra saM ma ya hUM phaT/ de skad brjod nas rnal 'byor ches// skad tsog gas na ngan song bkag/ 
311b3(rgyud): ri yi rgyal po nye ba ru// ngu 'bod la sogs snang bar gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rnal 'byor ches// ngan sang sems can la smras pa// dkon mchog gsum dang ngayi bstan pa la/ 
311b4(rgyud): myur du brtan pas skyab su song // de dag thams cad kyis smras pa// bstobs chen bdag cag sgrub du gsol// gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa// de bzhin du ni bgyi bar 'tshal// 
311b5(rgyud): de na sa r+g+ha lA pe rdo rje 'dzun/ sdig pa dral ba des bcings// sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa/ mchog tu gsang ba gA sungs pa raM gyur/ oM badz+ra pa nI bi s+thi ta ya sAR+YA a pa a
311b6(rgyud): b+hin d+ha ya ni/ pra mo kA ya saR+Ya a pa yo ga ta/ saR+Wa satwA na sAR+YA ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ya Ta D+hA/ sems can ngan song rgya can rnams// rig pa 'di yas dbang bskur bas// ngan song 'khor
311b7(rgyud): le dral bar 'gyur// rgya mtsho ru ni rab tu lhung // de bzhin ngan song shr-i 'phos nas// de bzhi kun rab tu grol bar 'gyur// sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol/ n+do rje dbang po'o/ 
311b8(rgyud): gnas thob gyur// de bzhin thub pa rnam snang gi/ zhabs drung du ni skye bar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis ni// de bzhin mi khrom ze bar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i
312a1(rgyud): mthu yis ni// de nas skad cig des zhing thob// rmad 'byung sna tshogs gsang chen po// cho 'phrul dag na skye bar 'gyur/ stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten
312a2(rgyud): s+yaid+hag tu smra/ rdo rje rin chen gyis rab mdzes// de yi rigs kyi ngan song kun// sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par sbyangs// sems can
312a3(rgyud): bde ba skye bar 'gyur// rdo rje bde ba skye bar 'gyur// rdo rje bde ba yang dag ldan// mchog chen po yi zhing 'di ni// dag pa'i zhing du rab tu gnas// sems can dag la kun tu
312a4(rgyud): khyab/ de bzhin rnal 'byor rdor rang bzhin// slar yang shing ga nags la sogs// rmad 'byung chen po snang bar byed// rin che ni sna bdun rang bzhin kun// nags deng
312a5(rgyud): lo sogs pam/ mthon dpon dag dang rnam par bral// lag 'thil bzhin du mnyam par snad // katso la ni da ltar reg pade/ stong gsu me rab tu gnas par
312a6(rgyud): dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal 'gyur// dang po ngan song skye bar ni/ bkres skom pa yi sdug bsngal dag/ kun tu 'gags par rnam par gnas// rgya ma mo kun du thim par gyur/ 
312a7(rgyud): mo gzugs kyang kun tu khyu'o// gzhan yang 'phrul g+hi nI l+yA rnams dang // mtshungs padren mi rnams gyur// sgrar yang mu khyud 'khor la med/ ring bi mni dang dag med/ 
312a8(rgyud): de bzhin ste mi gnas kyang mid// rgya mche med cing lha ma ni meng// klu yi gnas pa zhi dag kyang med/ mi yi khyim dang khang po'i ma/ grong khyer ljongs dang yul 'a
312b1(rgyud): dang // phug dang bcas pa rnam par bral// mi yi gnas kyang med pa nyid// chu bo phug dang lung pa'ang med// mi dag gi ni lus kyang med// sems can 'ga' yang 'dir mi snang / 
312b2(rgyud): dran song 'khor lo dag kyang med// mi khom med ci sdug bsngal med// bud med skyes pa la sogs med/ rnga me glang po lug kyang med// dpag bsam shing dang gos kyis shing // 
312b3(rgyud): rin chen sna bdun rab tu mdzes// spos kyi chu yi rgya mtsho dang // rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes// shing ni yid 'ong thams cad las// rol ma'i sgra ni mngon par
312b4(rgyud): byung / rol mos chos kyi sgra dag kyang // stong gsum du ni yongs su gsal// ji ltar rdo rje dbang po'i gnas// ri rab ri'i rtse mo ltar// dri bzhin stong gsum gyi ni gnas/ 
312b5(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs 'bar bar 'gyur// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir// gru bzhi rab tu gnas par gyur// kun nas phyi rol gnas rnams ni/ kha khyer du yang gnas
312b6(rgyud): par gyur/ slar yang nyi ma zla ba med// skar ma med cing lha yang med// rang gi khang pa'i nang du yang // lha rnams nyid kyang mthong mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'od kyang yongs
312b7(rgyud): su gsol// 'od zer sna tshogs yid 'phrog pa// gang gis zhing ni yang dag sbyangs// rdo rje rin chen yid 'ong ba// rdo rje dbang po'i gnas nyid kyang // slar yang snang
312b8(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan du gzhin gcig po'i gnas// gang du sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ lha yi pad ma yongs su gsal// rin+da
313a1(rgyud): chen sna bdun yongs su mdzes// dri yi tshigs ni yid 'ong ldan// bskal pa chen po'i zhing gi tshigs// dkyil 'khor shin du stug steng du// dpag tshad
313a2(rgyud): stong phrag brgya bcu ru/ rdo rje steng ge'i khro byang gyur// kun du phyogs rnams bzhi dag tu// dpag tshad stong phrag drug bcur ldan// rdo rje rin chen ring bzhin mdzes// seng
313a3(rgyud): ge'i khri la ni bzhi byang gyur// rdo rje'i bla re rnam par bres// dor gyi chun po rnam par sbyangs// dal bu dra ba rnams mdzes po// zhing ni kun nas rab tu smras/ me tog sna tshogs
313a4(rgyud): kun tu bkram/ sna tshogs sprin gyis rab tu g.yogs// sna tshogs dri yis kun du khyab// dpag bas shing gi nye bar spras// dpag bas shing ni nyer dang ldan// rdo rje rol mo mdzes pa dag sgra ni mngon
313a5(rgyud): par 'byin par byed/ 'di nyid dang ni lhan cig zhing / sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin du// phyogs rnams kun du snang bar gyur// slar yang 'jigs par ma 'gyur ro// 
313a6(rgyud): stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// gang ga'i bye snyed grangs med pa// shin du 'phra ba'i rdul snyed kyis// sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su gsal// til gyi gang bu gang ba
313a7(rgyud): bzhin/ sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su gsal// phyogs rnams kun nas ma lus par// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dir gshegs 'gyur// dbus kyi seng ge'i
313a8(rgyud): gdan dgal// chos dbyings 'jigs pa med pa la// rnam par snang mdzad stobs chen po// ston pa bcom ldan bzhugs par 'gyur// shar du yang ni mi bskyod
313b1(rgyud): lho ru rin chen 'byung gnas ldan te/ nub du 'od dpag med yin no// byang du rgod grub pa ste// mgon po chen po phyogs bzhi ru/ rdo rje yi ni steng du bzhugs
313b2(rgyud): phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams dag tu ni// mnyam du dmigs nas rnam par gnas// tshes kyi dbyings ni brtan par gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad brtan par bzhogs/ 
313b3(rgyud): mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mdzad// sangs rgyas grangs med thams cad ni// rdo rje can ni lnga la bzhugs/ phyogs ni ri rIr khyab
313b4(rgyud): gyur pa/ sangs rgyas/ cig nyid yang dag bzhugs// 'tshams dang 'og drang steng dag ni// rnam snang mdzad kyis brtan par mdzad// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan gyur pa// dbus
313b5(rgyud): gyi chos ni dbang phyug bzhugs/ donas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa/ chos dang longs spyod rdzogs snying po/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul pa/ sangs rgyas thams
313b6(rgyud): cad rang bzhin gyi// seng ge'i khri ni lnga la bzhugs// grangs med tshad ni med pa yi// sangs rgyas chos nyid ma lus pa// ri mo gsal ba dang mtshungs pa/ sgo
313b7(rgyud): gsum dag ni ma lus gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' dag pa che// pad ma'i steng du bzhugs par gyur// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan/ byed pa dag ni grangs med
313b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas re ba dang ldan pa/ rdo rje can ni thams cad bzhugs// shar gyi cha la yang dag rten// bye ba dag ni grangs med / rdo rje rnam 'phrul ston byed
314a1(rgyud): pa/ 'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur// lho yi phyogs su nas yang dag gnas// bye ba dag ni glengs med lnga/ rin chen rnam 'phrul yang
314a2(rgyud): dag ldan rta 'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur// bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga// nub kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas/ pad ma'i rnam 'phrul ston byed pa// 'kho
314a3(rgyud): le dang ldan bzhugs par gyur// bya ba dag na grangs med lnga// byang ga phyogs na rnam par gnas// las kyi rnam 'phrul ston byed pa// 'khor la dang ldan bzhugs
314a4(rgyud): par gyur/ gsung dang mchod pa gang yin dang // lha me rdo rje lha mo ni// grangs med tshad ni med pa dag bcu gnyis kyis ni dkyil 'khor gang // sgo bsrungs
314a5(rgyud): dag ni grangs med pa// rnal 'byor mchog dang ldan pa bzhi// rgyal po shar dang lho dag dang // nub dang byang ni yang dag gnas/ chos kyi sku las yang dag byung // 
314a6(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gyur pa/ sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung / gang zhig phyogs bcu dag gis yang // byang chub
314a7(rgyud): sems dpa' bdag nyid che// rnal 'byor chen po'i sa thob pa// de dag kun kyang 'di ru 'ongs/ sangs rgyas zhing ni gong ga yi// bye ma dang mnyam ji snyed
314a8(rgyud): yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i tshogs// de dag thams cad yang dag gshegs/ sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yas ni// zhing dag rgya ni chen por gyur// yul
314b1(rgyud): rnams thams cad bya ba yang / gnod pa med cing 'tshe ba med// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ ji ltar sngon ni bar med par// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnam ni// / 
314b2(rgyud): bar med par ni de bzhin gnas// gang na sangs rgyas mi snang ba/ phyogs ni rdul tsam yod ma yin/ 9/ byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor che// gang dag sa ni bzhi
314b3(rgyud): bcu dang / yang na chos las byung ba nyid// sangs rgyas sras ni grags pa tshe// rigs las byung ba la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston mdzad pa/ 
314b4(rgyud): 'dir gnas byang chub sems dpa' sogs/ mchog rnams phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams mthong / sangs rgyas zhing na grangs med kun/ lha rnams yang dag gnas
314b5(rgyud): 'di rusongs rgyas ldani mthong bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dgra bcom mgautogs par/ zhing 'dir 'ga' yang mthong ma gyur/ rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor lo min/ 
314b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshigs kyang min// dbus dang phyogs ni yang dge bzhugs/ sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar 'gyur// dbang phyug chen po gnod byed pa'i/ rdo rje/ 
314b7(rgyud): khro bos mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas lnga dang de bzhin du// khro be drug bdun rnam par gnas// tshangs sngogs lha rnams de dag kyang // ngo mtshur dag ni skyes par
314b8(rgyud): nga skrag nas lha de dgagacig le gcig ni smra bar byed// gtso bo dza bzhin mthong 'gyur zhing // shin du 'gyur zhing mtshar ji bzhin snang // slar
315a1(rgyud): yang lha yi 'jigs rjen dgasrid pa'i nang du mthong ma gyur/ 'gro ba lnga ni sems can min// ri rab dang naN+Di mtsho mni// nyi ma zla ba ma mthong
315a2(rgyud): zhing ri dang khang pa dag kyang man/ ni/ bdag cag gam ni rmongs gyur dma?/ yang na mig ni long gyur ram/ yang na bdag cag sems g.yengs pa// sgyu ma'i
315a3(rgyud): rnam 'phrul 'di ci nag bdag cag gis ni sder gzigs mthong // drag cing bkug nas thal bar byed/ ri rab ri ya rtsi mye ru/ sdug bsngal chen pos gzir bar
315a4(rgyud): gyur/ slar yang rI ra ba yod ma yin// khro bordzu 'phrul chen po med// gzhan dang khro bo chen po gcig/ dbang phyug chen po gnon par byed// gnas ni tshu ngur gyur pa
315a5(rgyud): ya rgya chen po ru 'di ru snang / stong go su mo 'di yang mi snang ste// bdag cig 'jig rten gzhan du phyin// de ltar brjod pa sna tshogs pa/ gcig lnga
315a6(rgyud): gcig ni smra bar byed/ mi sme bar ni gnas gyur nas/ rdo rje can la blta bar byed/ gnod sbyin 'byung po sha za ma tshogs// gdug pa kun dang gdon tshegs kyis/ 
315a7(rgyud): mun pas khyab po bzhin du ni/ stong gsum 'din mthong gyur cigagazhan ni cung zad ma mthong ste/ gzhan du phyogs dag mun pas khyab/ rdo rje khro bos 'phrul 'gyur
315a8(rgyud): sgyu ma yis ni rmongs gyur cing // gcig la gcig ni rmongs par gyurahA ha zhes bya'i sgra sgrogs shing / bdag cag 'dir ni gang du byinatshig ni dang
315b1(rgyud): dri brjod byed cigagacig la gocig ni smra bar byed/ 'di ni su zhig bdag cig gang / 'di ni sa yi gan tu phyin/ bdag cig rang gi gnas nas ljang // bdag cag
315b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gzhan du phyin// rdo rje khro bos bsad par 'gyur// 'o na 'di ni ci zhig yin// lha yi gnas kyang ma mthong zhing // rdo rje can yang mthong ma gyur// sangs rgyas
315b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'khoraro lo man// bdag cag rnams ni mun par gyur// rang gi gnas kyang ma mthong zhing // ri rab nyid kyang mthong mi 'gyur/ mtsho dang rgya mtsho dag kyang min// 
315b4(rgyud): skar mu zla ba nyi ma man// bdag cag thams cad gang nas 'ongs// yul gang zhig du 'gro bar bya// / 'gro ba lnga las yod ma yin/ 'jig rten med cing ma mo med/ ma
315b5(rgyud): dang mi ma yin pa dag/ rnam pa kun tu mthong ban gyur/ sngon ni ji ltar dri bzhin phyis// rmad du byung zhing mthong ma gyur// gzhan du sa ni g.yos par gyur// rlung dag
315b6(rgyud): gis ni rnam par bskyod/ 'brug gi sgra yang glog chen po/ sdug bsngal thams cad yang dag ldan/ bskyes skem la sogs sdug bsngal dang / bral min kun du sdug
315b7(rgyud): bsngal gyur/ de ni lha chen rdzu 'phrul dag/ cung zad kyang ni mthong ma gyur// dmyal ba yi dgas dud 'gro dag/ rnam par nyams zhing gshig par gyur// sdig pa bri ma/ 
315b8(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya yis/ ngan song gsum ni nye bar zhi// lha gang 'du shes med pa dang // gzugs med par ni spyod par gnas// phung po lta ru rang bdag nyid// bdag
316a1(rgyud): ngo mtshar de bzhin mthong bar 'gyur// rung bdag nyid kyang rtog byed cing // gcig la gcig kyang blta bar byed/ de bzhin thams cad bsreg
316a2(rgyud): nango ma nar gyur pa 'di ci zhigatshad med skal pa chen po ru// bdag cag dag par gnas par gyur// bangag ma chog la ni rnam par gro la/ 
316a3(rgyud): slar yang dag tu 'anyin par gyu// sngon gyi bag chags mngon 'dod pa// skyid gsum gnas ni mthong bar gyur// srid pa gsum yang yod ma yin// de bzhin 'a
316a4(rgyud): ba lnga yang med// gzhan du shin du dgu pa gcig/ chos dang ldengs spyod rdzogs sbrel pa// sbyangs rgyas lda ni mthong bar 'gyur/ srid gsum gnas ni gzhan
316a5(rgyud): dag min// tshogs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur/ gcig la gtsug ni smra bar byeda'adi ni su zhig bdag cag gang // bdag cig 'jog rten gzhan
316a6(rgyud): dunaskyon ni bdag gi 'jig rten 'di// 'gro ba lngar bcas de bzhin du/ ri rib dang ni rgya mtshor bcus// lha rnams drug ni 'khor bcas mthong / 
316a7(rgyud): sring po gsum gyi lho rnams mthong // 'ga' zhig kyang ni mthong ma gyur/ gzhal yas khang dang sems can ni/ gtsu bots+tsha zhig mthong bar 'gyur// de
316a8(rgyud): 'di'i ngo ma tshur sna tshogs pa// gnas chen 'di ru mthongad par gyur// byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul 'di/ sangs rgyas kun k+Shi ril pa rol yin// gang nig
316b1(rgyud): stong gsum 'di yin// rang rgyal ba dag mchog tu gyur// de yang kun tu rmongs par gyur// rnam par 'phrul pa'ang ma mthong gyur// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mtho
316b2(rgyud): mi yinargyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyang smin chos kyi dbyings ni bar+d+han+ti zhi bganas ni de ru mthong ma gyur/ gzhan du srong gsum po 'di/ rnam pa kun tu ma
316b3(rgyud): mthong nyid sa dang me dang chu khyams man/ gser gyi dkyipa 'khor dag kyang man// 'gro ba lnga yi sems can mnazla ba nyi ma dag kyang min// ska
316b4(rgyud): gza' dang rgyu skur min/ sems can gang dag khams gsum min/ 'di dag thams cad stong par gyur// gzhan du nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor min/ de nas
316b5(rgyud): thams cad 'jigs skrag pa/ mya ngan 'das pa nye bar blo ga// gang yang phyogs rnams bcu pa yi// nyan thos 'jigs pa med rnams/ byung sems rdo rje can
316b6(rgyud): chen pos/ de dag kyang ni skrag par 'gyur// rang rang gan zhing dag tu// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma gyu'adus pa chen po dag dang ni/ chos rnams sgo
316b7(rgyud): pa dag kyang min// lha dang mi rnams dag kyang min// zhing de yi ni sems can min// lha dang mi rnams dag kyang min// khang pa med cing zhing yang myed// sa dang me
316b8(rgyud): dang rlung yang min/ rlung gi zhing nyid ma mthong zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs par 'gyur// skad cig nyid ni mi dga'ar 'gyur// thang cig du yang rmongs par gyur/ 
317a1(rgyud): de lta bu yin 'phrul du// byang chub sems ni rab tu snang // sngon gyi bskal pa chen po la// 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul pa ston
317a2(rgyud): bcom ldan dona'i dbu 'byon pas/ de la bu'i byin gyis rlabs// sems can gang dag 'di na gnas// nyin dang mtshan mom shes par// de nas de nyid gsang rgyu
317a3(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings ni brtan para'i tshigs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'di lta bu'i rnam 'phrul byung // stong gsum gyi yongs su bsdus pa ste/ 
317a4(rgyud): yi tshogs ni bkod par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas gcig tuchos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ la ltar sngan ze sngon po che// rdo rje sngon por
317a5(rgyud): mdzes/ sa yi phyogs ni rab tu smrasardo rje mngon po rab tu brgyan// la lang gser gyi mdog tu snang // kha dog ser pos rab tu brgyan// sa mi tshor yang nab
317a6(rgyud): sgras/ rdo rje ser pos rab tu brgya nakA la lar kha dag dmar po'i ni/ b+hi ru lA bur rab tu mdzes/ su yi char yang rab tu s+thAs// rdo rje dmar pos rab tu brgyan// 
317a7(rgyud): lcer btsod kyi mdog can gyibai dUr+ya mtshungs rab tu mdzes// sa yo char yang rnam par mdzes// rdo rje bcod kyis rnam par mdzes// la ltar shel gyi mdag can
317a8(rgyud): shIl du snang ba rab tu mdzes/ sa yicha yang rnam par spras// rdorje shel gyis rnam par brgyan// shar tu sngon po chen po ste/ lhor ni ser po yang dag
317b1(rgyud): nub kyi che ni dmar bye stebyang gA btsud dang yang dag ldan/ dbus kyis yi cha dag ni/ shel gyi mdog can blun mardorje chen po shin du dgatshon
317b2(rgyud): wA ya ba zhi// / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis rib tu mdzes/ cha mnyam legs par dgasam+b+ha dang ni skyed dag ldan// kun
317b3(rgyud): nas phyi rol gnas dag na/ rdo rje kha khyer yang dag ldan// kun nas kha khyer dang ldan zhi / sgro yi kha khyer dag gis sprasaste rang banan/ gzhan ma
317b4(rgyud): gser gyi mdog can dang // kha dog dmar po mchog dang ni// gzhan yang shel ni bza' ba dgarin chen kun gyi rang bzhin mchogadakyil 'khor sna tshogs mdzes
317b5(rgyud): gyur pasna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa'i mchogakA rdo rje lha mo'i tshigs kyi mchog/ dra ba dra ba phyed pas skyes/ zla ba phyed pas nye khor mdzes/ ga mkha
317b6(rgyud): dra bas kun du khyabs/ dril bu mchog ni kun du 'phyang / sna tshogs shing ni yid 'od ldan// dpag bo sam shing ni yid 'ong ldan/ spos dang me tog de bzhin dr-i/ snang
317b7(rgyud): ba'i shing chegs dag dang ldan// / sna tshogasaM be kod pa nye bAr ldan/ sna tshogs rdo rje bdad rtsi'i chu// mtsho mchog chu yisi gang bar gyur/ rdo rje rgya mtsho rgya chen+da ldan/ 
317b8(rgyud): tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram// sna tshogs gdug pa dag gis bdugs/ sna tshogs dri yo chu yis gtorasna tshogs dri yis kun du khyagadag po chen po sras bla
318a1(rgyud): dag dang padad+ma sogs thams cad la// chos rnams 'byung ba thos par 'gyur// phyogs rnams kun du rnam byung nas// dag pa
318a2(rgyud): nga stong nyid bcas/ rna bar sgra na gang zhig drag/ chos kyi bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ yaM laM shaM bi/ AM badz+ra satwa k+She d+h+r-i hwA hrID+haM au badz+ra k+ko d+hi a ka ra sha ya
318a3(rgyud): o badz+ra kro d+ha rA ga ya hAM paT/ ai badz+ra duSh+Ti kro d+ha ya dA sa d+ha hUM paTaM// khre bi rdo rje rin chen mchoga'abar ba'i phreng byA bad dka' be s+yA/ khro be rdo rje p+la na med/ 
318a4(rgyud): me chog tu gsang ba gsangs par 'gyur/ oM badz+ra bI ke ti kre d+he ha na hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra sur+ya ma la kro d+hA dza la ya saR+Wa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kai dA ma hA kro d+hi hUM phAT/ oM badz+ra a da ha
318a5(rgyud): sa kro d+ha ha ha ha ha hAM paT/ khro be chen po rdo rje chos// 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab gyur pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po la bzod dka'/ mchog tu 'jigs su rung bas smras// 
318a6(rgyud): oM badz+ra d+harma bI shid+hi ya hUM phaT/ oM ti gaSh+Ta kro d+ha tshin dA hUM paT/ oM he tu krod+b+ha pra biM sha ya maN+Da d+ha lam sar+b+ba hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra krod+ha b+hA sha ta bad DA hU~M phaHrdo rje las ni rgyal po che
318a7(rgyud): gsang ba thams cad kun bsdug pas/ 'bar bas gsal bar khyab par gyur pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po brjod par 'gyur/ oM badz+ra karma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ka pa
318a8(rgyud): ts+yaikr-id+ha rAk+Sha ra kAR+ShA pA oM badz+ra yak+Sha kr-i d+hA khAd khA hU~M praH/ oM badz+rakrod+hA mr-id+d+hi s+yAd+hA ya sa ma ya hUM paTasems dpa' 'di rnams gsang ba zhi ba'i gzugs
318b1(rgyud): lus rnam par 'gyur/ rdo rje khro bo drag po che/ 'khor lho'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs gyur/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ 9/ khro bo chen po stobs chen po// gsang ba chen
318b2(rgyud): po 'di rnams yongs su badz+red/ mchod pa'i lha mo gsungs par gyur// oM bidz+ra la s+yer gA ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma la A bi bi na tsa ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gti ga ta ya hUM phaT/ 
318b3(rgyud): oM badz+ra AM lo ke pAn+ta nirA t+ye ba shaM ku ru hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pu sro pA tsa s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra gan+d+ha pA tsa s+pha re Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra d+hU pa pA tsa s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra a la
318b4(rgyud): ke pA tsa s+phA re NA sa me hUM phaT+Ta/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// khro bo drag po shin du gdugardo rje khro bo rab gtum pa/ sgo gsum dag ni rab tu phyung // / oM badz+ra aM ku sha
318b5(rgyud): ma hA kro d+ha a ka ra shA yaM sar+b+ba sa ma ya hUM dza/ oM badz+ra pa sha ma hA kro d+ha pra pe shA ya saR+Wa se ma yai hUM hU~M/ oM s+pho Ta ma hA kro d+ha b+hAn d+ha ya sAr+b+ba sa ma yA hUM bIHoM badz+re a be shwa ye sar+b+ba sa ma ye
318b6(rgyud): 'khor lo yongs su zlum po na// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por gyur// khro bo chen po'i tshogs kyis khyabadakyil 'khor chen po yang dag ldan// khams
318b7(rgyud): bdun rnam rgyul gyi/ dkyila'i khor chen po kun bsdus pa/ shin du gsang ba chos chen po// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// de nyid snying pa gsang ba che/ thar
318b8(rgyud): parkyen de'i gling khyen mchogadakyil 'khor gyin rgyal po che// sems can don kun yang dag ldan// chos nyid rdzogs par byang chub pa// 'di 'dra'i chos dang longs
319a1(rgyud): spyod rdzogasarigs lnga'i gsang ba gang yin pa// gdon mi za bar byed pa nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rabs bzhi pa// gang
319a2(rgyud): phyir dag pa'i tshigs chen po/ de bzhin rdo rje'i rigs drag po// gang phyir lha chen rab 'dul byed// lha chen la sogs sprul byed pa// de bzhin pad ma'i rigs
319a3(rgyud): mchog ste/ gang phyir 'dul bya'i sems can rnams// sprul pa sna tshogs yang dag byung / sprul pa'i 'khor lo zhi ba ste// drag pa'i mchod pas rab bskor bya/ 
319a4(rgyud): sna tshogs rigs can 'khor le ste/ rigs bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mchog ni// dang po'i 'khor lo yang dag ldan// de nas rdo rje
319a5(rgyud): drag po/ sems can don du yang dag gzigs// rdo rje yi ni rigs mchog 'di// dkyil 'khor mchog ni kun bsdus pa// gsung ba'i dbang bskur rgyal po
319a6(rgyud): chenagang phyir gsang ba'i bdag por bshad// rdo rje thams cad kun bsdus pa/ rang gi rigs mchog bshad nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po ches// dkyil
319a7(rgyud): 'khor chen po kun tu sprul/ lha la sogs pa'i bdug pa kun// skad cig de la yang dge gdug slar ni bcug par byas nas kyang // skad cig gis ni dam tshig phyog/ 
319a8(rgyud): chen ma nyid bye myung ba 'idam tshig ldani pa byin nas ni/ bzhag ster ba tu byin nas kyang/ de bzhin bcings te dbang du byas// dmatshig las ni brtsa
319b1(rgyud): byas te/ dam tshig ston pa de bzhin no// / mi rnams la ni phan bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor mchog ni gsungs par gyur/ 'khor lo chen po grong khyer che/ rdo rje
319b2(rgyud): du rigs mchog chen po ste// khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes su bya ba// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// 'jig rten gsum tshogs pham byas nas/ b+ha la sogs pa rab bcug gyur/ 
319b3(rgyud): de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal gnas// 'khor lo chen po grong khyer che// gang ma ni gzung ba tsom nyid kyis// sems kun rab tu bcom nasagadon la sogs pa bros
319b4(rgyud): ra byed// rims dang gdon dang drug da dang ni// drag po gdug pa dam tshig sdang // mtshan bzung ba yi mod nyid la// sgeg pa dang ni g.yo bar 'gyur// sku ni ljongs spyod
319b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i mchog/ mi gang dag ni gdul bya min// de bas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal rje// dkyil 'khor chen po sprul par gyur/ rdo rje slob dpon skal brargya/ shin du byang zhing
319b6(rgyud): rab tu mkhas/ dgongs pa'i tshig rab shes pa/ gzhung rnams zlas shing don la mkhas// rab tu dang zhing blo ldan brtan// rigs dang rigs min rab tu shes/ 
319b7(rgyud): byang chub sems la brtson par 'gyur// lha gzhan dag la 'do ldan min// gsang ba'i snying po mchog mthong ba// sbyin rje'i bdag nyid brtse brtan pa// dag
319b8(rgyud): tsong nge sel rnam par dus// rang gi ngang gis rnam par gnas// zhen cing chags la 'dug pa min// rmongs pa med cing le le med// brtse ldan bsam pa phan pa can// 
320a1(rgyud): rtag tu rnam par dgod la dga'// gzugs 'dod pas yon tan la// chags shing ldag par rgyal ma gyur/ sred la sems ni skrag par byed/ 
320a2(rgyud): srid la mngon chags pa med// theg pa chen po'i tshul brtson po// theg pa bzhan la 'dod ldan min// sems cad kun gyi don la brtson// dkon mchog gsum
320a3(rgyud): ni mchog 'byung ba/ nyon mongs kun tu chags pa spangs// gnyen po dag ni kun tu sgom// 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs che// mi sdug pa la sogs pa sgom/ 
320a4(rgyud): rigs dang rigs min chog shes// sngags dang phyag rgya kun tu mkhas// dgug gzhug dang ni bcing ba dang // dbang du bya dang shes gsol dang // ji skad rdo rje dbyings bshad
320a5(rgyud): bzhin sngon du rig po'i brtul zhugs bya// kha ni mi the rdul tsam la// kun du mdzes par bya yin// tshon dang chen rtsi srad bu dang // yo byad cho gar yang dag ldan
320a6(rgyud): bcing dang phur bus gdab nyid dang / sngar bshad rdo rje'i dbyings bzhin du// bza' ba dang ni mi bza' ba/ rdo rje snyems tshul ting 'dzin gyis/ rdo rje dbyings stsogs
320a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// sngar ni ji ltar de bzhin bya// de nas yang dag bshad rab bya// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu mtshungs// dngos
320a8(rgyud): grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ grubazhi pa lnga sgo bzhig/ rta babs dag gis rnam par brgyan// thig bzhi da na yang dag ldanadrar gyo chun pos rnam par brgyan/ 
320b1(rgyud): rgya cher ji ltar rigs pa ru// ji bzhin rdo rje grong khyer che// rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu mtshungs// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i grong khyer bri// 'khor lho lnga dang yang dag ldan// kA ba brgyad
320b2(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan/ de bzhin de dbus 'khor lo yi/ dbus su sa d+g+hag/ rgyas dgod par bya// rnam par snang mdzad ston pa che// rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che// byang
320b3(rgyud): chub sems ni rgyal po chu/ sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs dkyil 'khor/ sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni// 'bar ba'i dbusu dgod par bya// rdo rje me ltar 'bar nyid
320b4(rgyud): phyag rgya 'jig rten gsum 'joms ni// g.yas su rin chen phyagar+b+ha ni// 'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya// g.yon du pad ma'i phyag rgya ni// rgyab tu rdo rje gnon po
320b5(rgyud): 'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya// phyag rgya yi ni rgyal po bzhi// 'bar ba'i me dang rab tu ldan// rnam par snang mdzod rgyal po che// chos dbyings grong khyer
320b6(rgyud): po yinartena'akhor los bskyer ba bzhi po la/ phyag rgya dag kyang dgod par ba/ gang dang gang gi thog gyur pa/ dkyil 'khor shes rab can thig bya/ rdo rje yis ni
320b7(rgyud): sngags 'di yis// rdo rje'i thig ni yongs su bzung / oM badz+ra sa ma ya su tra me tak+ki ma hUM/ dkyil 'khor thams cad bsngos pa'o// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / 
320b8(rgyud): phyag rgya yongs bsdus pa// rgyal po bri zhing dgod par bya// oM badz+ra be ga oM kra ma hUM/ chen rtsi thams cad yang dag ldan// 'bar ba'i lte bas yang dag lta
321a1(rgyud): dge bzhirdo rje'i sngags ni rab tu bskul// oM badz+ra tsi tre sa ma ya hUM// phyag rgya gang zhig dgod pa ru// snying pos tham sa dgod par bya// sngar ni
321a2(rgyud): dgod pa gang yin pa// rdo rje gzugs na bskor byed pa// rdo rje hUM mdzad dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// mi bskyod shin du
321a3(rgyud): mnyam gzhag pa/ zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs// khro bo rgyal po 'bar bas khyab/ phyag ni phyag rgya dang bcas mtshon// rdo rje hUM mdzad
321a4(rgyud): phyag rgya dang // steng du phyag gnyis yang dag ldan/ de bzhin kha nar phyag gnyis dag lcags kyi 'bar ba yang dag ldan// phyag gcig gis na zhags pa bsnams// 
321a5(rgyud): gcig gis rdo rje yang dag bsnams// mda' 'gengs pa yi phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya dang ni shin du ldan// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya ste/ dbang phyug chen po shin du gnon
321a6(rgyud): g.yas pos lha mo u ma ni// nu ma'i bar du gnon par byed// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje khro bo bkod par bya// 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing 'bar
321a7(rgyud): khro bo 'jigs par byed pa'i mchogamadun du rdo rje sems dpa' ste// g.yas su rdo rje rgyal po'o// g.yon tu rdo rje chags pa ste// rgyab tu rdo rje legs pa'o/ 
321a8(rgyud): shugs can kyis song nas kyang // lho ru khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ni/ khro bo'i rgyal po khri nyer can// khri bas yongs su bskor bar gri/ thams cad 'a ba'i phreng bas khyab
321b1(rgyud): gdong ni khrobacas bzhad ldan pa/ rdo rje dbang bskur phyug rgya ldan// khyo gnyer can+da ni yongs su brjod// de s+yAd/ g+han tham skad du// rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid tshe/ sngags da
321b2(rgyud): phyag rgya yongs su bskyerang gi gnas su yang dag blo/ mdun du rdo na chen po// goms su khro bo gzid do// g.yon du rgyal mtshan drag paste/ rgyab du khro bo bzhad
321b3(rgyud): 'ordo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // nub kyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor no// khro bo chen po rdo rje ste// khyo dag rnams kyis bskor/ rdo rje chos ni mdun du ste/ 
321b4(rgyud): rje rje rnon po gsas su'o// de bzhin g.yon du rdorje / rgya 'i tu rdo rje smra ba'o// rdo rje shugs kyis sa nas kyang // daladag ni mchag gzhi ga/ rdo rje dbab bi sa las
321b5(rgyud): chen po/ khro bo chen pos yongs su bskor/ rdo rje las ni mdun gyis bskor// rdo rje chos na mdun gyis gam+b+has /  bsrung bgro/ gzhon du rdo rje gnod sbyin to// 
321b6(rgyud): rgyab rdo rje khu tshur / dbus su kyi 'khor lo'i 'tshams bzhilha mo bzhini yang dag bri/ 'tshams kyi ba'i dekyil 'khor la/ rdo rje sgeg mo la sngags pra/ 
321b7(rgyud): phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'tshams rnams su// rdo rje me tog la sogs bri// rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// dzA skAr sbyin b+hashad cho ga bzhin// sgo bzhi dag ni thams
321b8(rgyud): sgo bsrungs rnams ni dgod par bya// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu dbang sa b+hU mengarlung gi phyag rgya snying khar bzhi/ 
322a1(rgyud): gi na snying po yis// rdo rje dril bu yid 'ong ldan// rnam par snang mdzad la sogs dgod// bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo ni// gtso bo rdo rje rig pa mchog rdo rje'i bdag po mchog zin mchog/ ra ni
322a2(rgyud): phyi la 'khor bdag po ste// de yas dkyil 'khor de bris nas// rdo rje ni teti sa 'jug// yang dag par ni brtag byas la// lan bdun du ni skor ba bya// chang pa kA yi na mo su // mkhas pas lhag par dbyi Tha ba/ rdo rje dril bu gtogs par bya/ 'grub
322a3(rgyud): par 'gyur te nyes pa med/ rdo rje lugs kyu la sogs kun// mnyam par gzhag pas las rnams bya// 'khor lo'i dbus su bzhugs nas ni// mkhas pas
322a4(rgyud): sgo ni dbye bar bya// yid kyis rdo rje yi ri ma ni// gtog tsong kun tu phye nas kyang // rdo rje'i sgo ni bzhi po dag/ yid kyis dbye bar bya ba nyid// de la snying po 'di yin/ 
322a5(rgyud): te/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra Ud ka ta ya pra be sha ya sa ma ya hUM/ dkyil 'khor phyi rims gnas rnams su/ phyi rol rdo rje rigs dag bri/ khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams
322a6(rgyud): nakha khyer gyi ni phyed la gnas/ 'khor lo dang bcos rigs bcas lha/ sems can gdug pa gdon la sogasarigs dang 'byung po sha za dang / 
322a7(rgyud): mkha' 'gro/ byung po ma mi dang / lha mo mtshan n+ya dang ldan kun// dzI ltar 'dod pa mngon par br-i/ phyi rol kha khyer rnams su ni// rdo rje/ khyer mdzes pa rnams
322a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus su 'dug nas ni// rdo rje dkyil me dkrung bcas te/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'jug bya// ji ltar
322b1(rgyud): ltar rdo rje rigs byung ba'i/ de bzhin nyid rnam par byas ma/ rdo rje rigs pa mchog rgyal po/ bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brtagardo rje khro bo rgyal po mchog
322b2(rgyud): bya de 'dra'o ting 'dzin la/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// skal ba chen po snyoms zhugs nas// ji ltar gong du bsgrag bya bzhin// shes rab can gyis
322b3(rgyud): thams cad bsam// ji ltar rdo rje rigs byung ba'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni// rgya cher gsang ba chen po dang / rdo rje slob dpon cho ga mchogargyud
322b4(rgyud): chen gsang ba zhes bya ba/ rtog pa 'di las rab tu bshad// de nas dbus su 'dug byas nas// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub chen// khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings
322b5(rgyud): nas su phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bcing // khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu bcingasasangs rgyas thams cad spyan dran bya// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ 
322b6(rgyud): lan gcig tu ni brjod par bya// rdo rje me tog sogs mchod pas// 'dren pa thams cad mchod par bya// gsang ba'i mchod pa gang bya ba// phyag rgya
322b7(rgyud): thams cad yongs su bcing / phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya ldan/ de bzhin du na mchod pa nyid/ phyag rgya'i ldan la sogs pa kun/ chog rab tu ldan
322b8(rgyud): blas dbulardo rje dril bu rab tu dkrol// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor sdigs par bya// gdog pa'i sems can gdul bye zhing / nyon mongs
323a1(rgyud): // mchog tu gsad par bya// dbab cing mchod pa nyid du bya// rdo rje mchod pas mchod par bya// glu dang mchod par
323a2(rgyud): yang dag ldan// rdo rje'i glu ni blang bar bya// rdo rje'i ni glu 'di dag/ blang zhing mauchog rnams mnyes par bya/ btud cing dbul bar bya ba nyid/ 
323a3(rgyud): rdo rje grA ni brang por bya/ sha ti shu ta sha ta maM/ sa ta ri Ti ta mar+thi/ bri ti ha Ta/ ma Ta shaT/ tra Ta kA Ta ku Ta Tan+da/ bai Ta Tan+dza ni i Ti ti/ r-id+hau d+ha
323a4(rgyud): ra Ta ra To ra Ta/ rdo rje ti rin ti ri yi// phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur bya// ji ltar 'dod par bka' mnos nas/ rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul/ 
323a5(rgyud): sngon po'i gos kyis stod g.yogs nas// sngon po yis ni mag bkab bya// rdo rje ti rin tir yi// phyag rgya rdo rje slob mas bcing / oM g+ni h+Na badz+ra sa mu ya
323a6(rgyud): hUM baM/ ci rigs par ni gzhug bya zhing // rdo rje sngags ni bskul bya zhing / rdo rje yi ni sngags 'dri yis// rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya// oM brdza
323a7(rgyud): sem ya pra pre sha ya ma// rdo rje slab mya dbyings rdzogs dkyil 'khor / rgyas pa'i ji ltar snga ma bzhin// ye shes dbab pa'i las dag ni// mkhas pa
323a8(rgyud): drug gis bya ba nyid/ mchod pa dang ni gnyer ma nyid// rdo rje rgan gyis skur gsungs bzhin// shes rab can gyis kun bslabs bzhin// bdag nyid dang ni dbadang bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad
323b1(rgyud): byug rgyas yos// shes rab can gyis hUM bstar bya// lhal sogs pa gdug bkun// bkug cing de ru bcug par bya// rdo rjen la 'byor bsrab bya ning // bdag nyid dang ni ba dngagro// bangan
323b2(rgyud): da dam ni gzhan yang rung // rdo rje phreng bas dbang bskur bya// rdo rje mAn yi phyag rgya skyes// sngon la mna' ni bsgrag par bya// rdo rje ye shes ye shes rtse// rdo rje ye shes rab bsgrub bya// lag
323b3(rgyud): rdo rje mtshan ma brdung / rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgrub bya// rdo rje yin sngags 'di yis// rdo rje'i mtshan ma rab tu sbyin// oM badz+ra pa NI badz+ra kar makA ro b+ha bA// de nas ming gis dang
323b4(rgyud): bskur zhing / rdo rje'i sngags na rab tu bskul// rdo rje yon stegs 'di yis// rdo rje mag gis dbang bskur bya// oM pradz+ra krong+ga tra~M a b+hi Shin tsa mi// badz+ra na ma maM b+hi She ka ta he badz+rAn ma/ 
323b5(rgyud): ye shes 'byung ba phun 'tshogs la// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// shes rab mchog gos bslab bya zhing // rdo rje rnal 'byor rab tu skrag/ snying khar rdo rje dris
323b6(rgyud): nas na sna tshogs las rnams yang dag ldan/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing 'bar// snying khar rdo rje bsgrim par bya// rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po/ 
323b7(rgyud): bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya// yang na khro bo'i nang na gcig/ bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya// rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas// 'gro ba thams cad
323b8(rgyud): dbab par bya// hU~M satwa badz+ra kro d+hi/ a b+he sha ya/ khro ba rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje rin chen yang dag bri// bdag nyid rdo rje rin tshon te// sangs rgyas tham cing dbang du mdzad
324a1(rgyud): rdo rje pad ma mgrin bcangs nas// lkog ma'i phyogs su yang dag bri// bdag ni rdo rje chos sgoms nas// des ni nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// 
324a2(rgyud): s+thi byor rdo rje dri bya zhing // rdo rje'ibar ba 'dzin na dgod// bdag nyid rdo rje las sgoms nas// gdug pa thams cad bsam babya// ho rA dra na badz+ra kro d+ha ba na/ hI badz+ra d+harma
324a3(rgyud): kro d+ha phaT/ kr-i dA raSh+Ta// lnga tshogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni// phyag rgya dang bcus bgug par bya// ye shes bslab cing da nas bzu// de bzhin kho nar yang dag bslab par
324a4(rgyud): bya// lag par rdo rje lcags kyu bri// sdigs 'dzu ba yi ge hUM ldan pa/ khros pa yis ni sor mo bskyod// lha ni 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a ka ra Sha ya hUM phaT// de
324a5(rgyud): bzhin 'og tu rkang 'thil la// rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag br-i// de yis lha ni gang zhig dman// de dgug pa'i mchog yin no// oM badz+ra kro d+ha a kra ma a ka ra Sha ya hUM phaT// dpung
