324a6(rgyud): pa'i rkang dang yang dag lnga ni// rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bri// lha ni gang dang gang la phab// de dang dra ni dgog pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha d+ha da na ha a ka ra Sha ya hUM phaT// stan la
324a7(rgyud): rdo rje lcags kyu ni/ yang dag bris nas de dman cing // lha ni gang zhig kun du dman// de dang de ni dgug pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a sa na/ e gang tsha tsha ya/ 
324a8(rgyud): kai roSha ma mi te/ badz+ra sa ma yo ma nu smA ra hUM paT// phyag rgya byab bas yang dag dbab// mkhas pas ye shes bslab par bya// rdo rje ster ba thams cad kyis// sgrub pa
324b1(rgyud): ngag dang brtsam par bya// g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas nas su// bdag nyid khro bor bsgom par bya/ myur du sangs rgyas ye shes ni// ring por mi thogs yang dag dbab// oM
324b2(rgyud): badz+ra kro d+ha a b+hi She ya hUM a/ rdo rje hUM mdzad yang dag sbyor// khro borA bdag nyid bsgom pa ra ba// sangs rgyas byang chub yang dag bgugardo rje'i sngags ni rab tu bskul// oM badz+ra
324b3(rgyud): bid d+ho d+hA ta na ma hA kro d+hi An yaM ho// b+ha ga wan badz+ra hUM pheM Ta// bdag nyid khro bor bsgom bya zhing // khro bo'i lta bas lta bar byaM// 'khor ba'i btson re 'jig su rung ba rau// sems can thams
324b4(rgyud): cang bsad par ba// oM badz+ra d+hiSh+Ti ma hA kro d+ha mA ra ye saM tA hAM// rtag tu da ni go bgos pau rA// yid kyis bdag nyid bsgom bya zhing // gzhan dag kyang ni sgom byas na// 'gro ba 'di kun
324b5(rgyud): bsrung bar bA/ oM badz+ra bak+Shi kro d+ha rak+Sha ka pa sar+b+ba satwa hU~M phaT/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor che// rnam pa bzhin bslab par+ya bya/ rdo rje ye shes de ni che/ sangs rgya sna
324b6(rgyud): byang chub ye she mo bsom// rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas// sems n+dan gang phyi ru kun du chags// yid kyis gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing / yi gau hUM ni
324b7(rgyud): rab tu badz+rod/ rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di dang ni/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya yis// sems tson gang la yongs su chug so/ de ni nyon mongs rnam par ny+tsam si/ 
324b8(rgyud): tra ki aM/ sA la ge/ a la pai/ oM tsha tsha Ta ki hUM phaT// 'di ni lan cig brjod pas kyang // kun nas nyon mongs ni zhing g.yo// Ta tA ki dza/ sems can gang gi rgyud la ni// rdo rje
325a1(rgyud): nai dA lta bas lta// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor spyan chen pos// de yi sdug bsngal nyams par 'gyur// Ta ki hUM/ yi ge hUM ni gyur pa las// nye ba'i sems can gang yin pas// de yi snying khar rdo rje
325a2(rgyud): yang / shes rab can gyi yid kyis bsam// de nas 'jigs pa thams cad las// phyir mi ldogs pa'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dang // rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab bya// Ta ki ho/ rdo rje rnal 'byor rmad 'byu
325a3(rgyud): no/ rdo rje rnal 'byor rdo rje gang // rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor ni// shes rab can gyi mchog gsang slab// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// yan lag kun la yongs su mkhyud// gang zhig hUM ni sbyor byed
325a4(rgyud): pa/ de yi sdug bsngal nyams par 'gyur// rdo rje khro bo rab dag 'dzin// rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// de yi khro bo'i sku gang yin// cig tu mchog tu gsang ba brtags// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'ang rung
325a5(rgyud): bdag nyid dang ni mtshungs pa ru// lus ni yang dag sbyor ba ni// dbang gnyis snyoms 'jug brjod par bya// sangs rgyas sam ni byang chub sems dpa' 'am// rdo rje khro bo 'am ni sems dpa' gzhan// de yi lus la
325a6(rgyud): gang yin dang // bdag gi lus gang yin pa dang // mtshungs par shes pa nyid 'di ni// dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya'o// yang na rnam pa'i sgom pa yis// ji skad bshad bzhin yan lag mkhyud// 
325a7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// dpung pa dam por bsdam par bya// yan lag kun la yongs mkhyud pa// sangs rgyas byang chub rab grub gyur// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags brtag
325a8(rgyud): mi byaba'adi ni mtshungs pa sgom pa yi// mtshungs pa nyid ni dbang po yin// hraM tI/ hUM gi sbyor ba'i sa dag gis// mchu bzung nas ni 'o bya zhing // sems dang gang zhig rnams bsgoms pa// des ni bde ba don yod thob// 
325b1(rgyud): hUM dza sems can thams cad bde byed pa// yi ge hUM ni rab sbyor zhing // bdag nyid khro bo rnam spangs nas// des ni bde ba thob par 'gyur// hUM gang zhig hU~M ni ra ba sbyor bas// sems ni gang dang gang dag gi/ yan
325b2(rgyud): lag thams cad bsdam byas nas// de yi nyon mongs bsrabs par 'gyur// hUM phaT/ ye shes chen po thabs ldan pa// rdo rje rigs ni thams cad nyid// de bzhin 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bcas// mkhas pa yis
325b3(rgyud): ni bslab par bya// sangs rgyas sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// rtag tu sgom pa'i bdag nyid bya// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par sgom// sgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// skad cog sangs/ 
325b4(rgyud): rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// a/ rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya// hU~MHkhro bo rdo rje khro gnyer can// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// traM/ rdo rje sde ru rang bdag nyid// sangs rgyas chos
325b5(rgyud): ni bsgom par bya// hri/ rdo rje dbab pa khro bo che// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// a bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpar rnam par sgom// hU~M badz+ra swA hA/ rdo rje rnal 'byor bdag bsgom bya// dzA ba badz+ra
325b6(rgyud): ra dzaHrdo rje chags pa bsgom par bya// badz+ra ga ya/ khro bo legs par bsgom par bya// sa tu sa/ de nas rdo rje rin chen no// ha ra ha ra/ rdo rje gzi brjid de bzhin no// dz+wa lA ya/ bdag nyid rdo rje rgyal mtshan sgom// 
325b7(rgyud): he hi/ rdo rje gzhad pa rnam par sgom// has/ rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya// d+harma/ rdo rje gnon po rnam par sgom// na d+ha/ rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo che// pra be shA ya/ rdo rje smra ba'ang rnam par sgom// pa sha/ rdo rje las ni bsgom
325b8(rgyud): par bya/ karma/ rdo rje go cha rnam par sgom// rak+Sha/ rdo rje gnod sbyin bsgom par bya// khA dang / rdo rje khu tshur rnam par sgom// baM/ gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid// rigs kyi lha ni lha 'dra bar// rang bdag nyid ni bsgom
326a1(rgyud): par bya/ de ni 'di yis skad cig 'grub// hUM/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya lan gcig bcing // mkhas pas rdo rje'i bzlas pa nyid// ji skad bzlas pa'i rgyud du bshad// gzhan du khro bo bzung bar bya// 
326a2(rgyud): yid kyis kyang ni brjod bya zhing // lus kyi phyag rgyas bskur bar bya// dkyil 'khor gsum ni mnyam sbyor bas// skad cig de la mkhas pas 'grub// de nas nyams dga' rdo rje'i rigs// phyag rgya chen po'i
326a3(rgyud): grangs med pa'i// lus kyi phyag rgya yang dag ldan// gang phyir sems can snod min pa// de yi phyag rgya nyung bar gsungs// phyag rgya chen po yongs bsdu ba// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las// rgyud chen gsang ba
326a4(rgyud): zhes bya ba/ rgyud de rab tu bshad pa yin// gsang ba'i cho ga 'di yis ni// rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis// skad cig gis/ sangs rgyas 'grub// 'dir ni phan yon mang po dag
326a5(rgyud): rang gi las la nges par sbyar// gang zhig brtul zhing mngon par spyod// skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas thob// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // zhugs nas mngon par brtson gyur cing // rnal 'byor cho gas
326a6(rgyud): sgrub byed na// 'grub par 'gyur ba the tsom med// tshe 'di las ni rnal 'byor pas// rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob 'gyur// gang gis rdo rje can sbyor bas// gdon mi za ba thob par 'gyur// bskal pa grangs med
326a7(rgyud): dka' ba ni// spyod pa'i bdag nyid med pa min// rnal 'byor 'di dag mngon par brtson// de bas sa ni rnyed dka' min// theg pa chen po 'di ni gsang ba ste// sangs rgyas chos kyi tshul brtan pa// sangs rgyas
326a8(rgyud): byang chub snying po che// de las sa ni thob dka' min// g.yon brkyang cha byed byas nas ni// khro bo'i tshig ni rab tu brjod// khro bo'i blta bas yang dag bltos// las rnams thams cad yang dag sgrub// 
326b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdo sde'i dbang po gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bsam pa de kho na nyid dam pa mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rtse mo las/ khams gsum na rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba
326b2(rgyud): rnam par bshad pa gsum pa rdzogs so// / rdo rje'i rigs kyi le'u las dang po'o// / de nas gsang ba dag gi kun bsdus pa// sems kyi dga' ba kun sbyor yang dag byung // bya ba byas shing
326b3(rgyud): mchog tu yang dag mdzes// rdo rje dbang phyug thams cad rnam 'phrul tshogs// de nas sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs chen mchog/ rdo rje snying po'i thugs byung bde ldan pa// shin du gsang ba'i yon tan mchog bsdus pa
326b4(rgyud): rdo rje rgyal po bud med gzugs can gyur// e ma ho/ bud med dga' spyod ma// gsang ba kun du bsdus pa las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'jigs mi mnga'// de yis gsungs nas cang mi gsung
326b5(rgyud): bar bzhugs// gzugs kyi dam tshig yang dag 'byung ba'i mchog na ting nge 'dzin gnas gsang ba ni// spyi bo rkang 'thil kun bsdus brtan pa las// de yis rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs dag byung // d+hi sI/ de nas
326b6(rgyud): dga' ba'i mig can dag gis phyung // rdo rje bud med thugs las byung ba mchog/ gzugs mchog dag gis lha las shin du 'das// rdo rje mtshams rnams lha mo'i tshogs dag grag/ dga' bcas 'dzum pa dang
326b7(rgyud): bcas spyan mnga' ba// bzhad cing sgeg dang bcas pa'i zhal ldan pa// tshangs pa la sogs rigs kyi lha yi lha mo ste// yid 'ong dga' ba chen pos rgyal gyur pa// lha mo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma de dang / 'khor lho'i dbus
326b8(rgyud): su gnas nas rtog med pa// de yi rim bsdus 'joms zhes yid du 'ong // rdo rje chen mo rdo rje rmongs byed ma// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA ra ga mo hA na ya swA hA// snying po sangs rgyas rmongs par byed pa gsung
327a1(rgyud): // de bzhin gshegs pa mchog kyang rmongs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyis dga' ba rmongs byed dga'// sangs rgyas gzugs dag yongs su bsgyur ba'i mchog/ rnam snang
327a2(rgyud): thub pa'i dbang phyug mchog tI ni// bud med gzugs kyis sprul pa nyid du gyur// dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul chen po mchog de ni// 'khor gyi sring mo gang yin bzhi por+ya g+hu / oM byAdz+nyA kro d+ha sa ma
327a3(rgyud): ya s+thi thi/ de nas gsang ba brtan pa'i tshig bzhi pa// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs skus kun khyab pa// rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang phyug rmongs byed bdag/ sangs rgyas btsun mo dag pa'i chos nyid bzhugs
327a4(rgyud): sa ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur// 'od ze sna tshogs phyogs bcu dag tu gsal// lha mo lha dang bcas pa'i lha mo rnams// zil gyis mnan cing shin du rgyal bar gyur// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
327a5(rgyud): dang mtshungs lha mo'i tshogs// de dag rang gi gzhal yas khang na gnas// de nas sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ba ni// gsang ba'i dbang phyug 'dren pa ste// rdo rje dga' ba chen po rnam par dgod// 
327a6(rgyud): gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug yi ge smi// snying po las byung chos nyid dag pa yi// rdo rje btsun mo bzhi dang dbus ma lnga// dkyil 'khor tshogs kyi sher gyi cha la gnas// mi bskyod thub pa'i dbang
327a7(rgyud): phyag dam pa'i mchog/ de nas rdo rje'i rigs can las byung ba'i// shar gyi dkyil 'khor khro bcas dkyil 'khor bcas// mi bskyod dam pa'i bdag nyid can de yis// snying po bskul ba'i
327a8(rgyud): mchog ni gsungs par 'gyur// snying po rab mchog 'byung ba gsungs par 'gyur// / oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ye dzI/ oM badz+ra r-i sha a ku sha a na ya saR+Wa dzA/ oM badz+ra ra sha ka ma/ badz+ri ni/ 
327b1(rgyud): bi shi mi a na ya hi dzI/ oM duSh+Ti kro te to sha ya saR+Wa d+hi/ rin chen rin chen mchog tu yid du 'ong des// 'khor gyi sring mo dag ni bzhi po gsungs// / oM badz+ra b+hi ku ti kro d+ha ha ra saR+Wa ha ra i raM dzI/ aH
327b2(rgyud): badz+ra dza lam la pra b+he ma hA kro d+ha/ a ga ni dz+wa la ya/ saR+YaM ra bi ri Te dzi/ oM badz+rA dA dza a kra ke yu re ma hA kro da de hi saR+YaM dzi/ oM badz+ra a Te he sa ni ha sa ma sa a ta ha ra ha ra dza// / yi ge dzi ni shin du rnam par gnas
327b3(rgyud): snying po shin du mchog tu gyur pa gsungs// rin chen dbang phyug dam pa de yis ni// snying po bskul ba byed pa'i mchog dag gsungs// snying po mchog mtshungs rmad du byung bar gsungs// 'od dpag med do bud med
327b4(rgyud): gzugs gyur pa// rdo rje btsun mo dam pa 'byung ba'i gnas// snying po bzhi po 'di ni gsungs par gyur// / oM badz+ra shud d+ha krod+ha/ ha na duSh+Ta di/ oM taSh+Thi badz+ra kro d+hats+tshin d+ha badz+ra ko she na saR+Wa d+hI/ oM badz+ra he dA
327b5(rgyud): mahA kro d+hi prA pe sha ya saR+Wa 'di/ oM badz+ra dzi haM/ kro d+ha she btsa u ka ra ya d+hi// / snying po'i rigs mchog dam pa gsung bar gyur// pad mo'i dkyil 'khor dbang dang ldan pa'i mchog/ 'od dpag med pa
327b6(rgyud): gseng ba'i chos bstan te// snying po bskul ba'i mchog ni gsungs par gyur// hrIHdga' ba chen pos mtshan ma dag kyang phyung // don yod grub pa bud med gzugs gyur la// las la shin du skal ba dang
327b7(rgyud): ldan te/ 'khor gyi sring mo dag ni bzhi po gsungs// // oM sar+b+ba mu khi karma badz+ri Na~M ma hA kro d+hi ku ru saR+Ya ni/ oM badz+ra kam pa tsa kro to sha ma ni/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA yaSh+NI ni badz+ra hU~MSh+TiM ka rA la bI ka ba ya saR+Wa ni/ oM mu
327b8(rgyud): muSh+Ti badz+ra kro d+ha ni// / de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dag/ mchog tu gseng ba bsdus pa dga' chen po// dbus kyi gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor bskul byed pa// las kyi btsun mo'i snying po
328a1(rgyud): mchog 'di gsus// hUMHdbus kyi gsang ba sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba// gtso bo 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad gsungs// // oM badz+ra shaM ba ri hUM/ oM rad na sha ba rI hUM/ oM pad
328a2(rgyud): ma sha ba ri hU~M/ oM kArma shrI d+hI hUM// rdo rje rgyal mo dag dang bcas pa bskul ba las byung gang yin pa/ rdo rje btsun mo de dag rnal 'byor bzhi'i dbus kyi dbang phyug nyid du gnas// rdo rje rin chen chos
328a3(rgyud): dang ldan/ btsun mo yan lag mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ 'di ni gsang ba'i tshogs las gzhan du rnal 'byor mchog gzhan ni 'ga' yang med/ rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'jigs mi mnga'// de ni
328a4(rgyud): nang gi 'khor tshogs dbus na bzhugs// des ni brtse dang phan pa'i sems kyis ni// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog gsungs gyur// de nas 'khor lo'i grong khyer brtan byas nas// khams
328a5(rgyud): gsum rnam rgyal rgyal ba'i bdag nyid des// rdo rje btsun mo dbang phyug rnal 'byor gyi// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag bri// grong khyer rnam pa gnyis su yang dag bri// 'khor lo
328a6(rgyud): rnam pa gnyis su bskor bar bya// de bzhin grong khyer 'di ru yang dag bri// yang na ji ltar 'dod bzhin yang dag bri// de yang phyag rgya dag dang tshogs dang bcas// sgom par 'os pa rdo rje yang dag bri// 
328a7(rgyud): yang na gsang ba'i tshogs kyis mchod gyur pa// nga ni gzugs dang ldan pa yang dag bri// dbus kyi rim par rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs// zhags pa dang ldan 'khor gyi phyag rgyar bcas// rdo rje 'bar
328a8(rgyud): ba nor bu pad mar bcas// 'bar ba dang bcas mi dang ldan par bcas/  shar gyi dkyil 'khor lnga yi bdag nyid no// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gang du mi bskyod gtso// rdo rje phyag rgya che dang rol par gyur
328b1(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po rtsa gsuM ldan mnan mchog/ de nas phogs bzhi yi ni gnas dag tu// rdo rje lcags kyu mda' dang dga' ba dang // 'bar ba'i me tog 'od zer yang dag ldan// 'bar ba'i dbus na
328b2(rgyud): gnas pa'i phyag rgya lnga// de nas rin chen rigs ni yid 'ong ba dang // rdo rje'i dbus na rdo rje rin chen bzhugs// de nas phyogs gzhi yi gnas dag tu// rin chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan gzhan phyag rgya// 
328b3(rgyud): de bzhin pad ma'i rigs ni yid 'ong ba// rdo rje pad ma'i phyag rgya ste// de nas phyogs bzhi'i 'tshams dag tu// pad ma ral gi de bzhin smra// de bzhin las kyi byas pa'i rig de las// rdo rje rnon po me
328b4(rgyud): chen dang ldan pa/ de yi phyogs bzhi'i tshogs ni brtan pa ru// las dang gnod sbyin bsrung ba khu tshur rnams// de nas rgyal chen gzugs kyi tshogs dag las// rdo rje btsun ma'i mchog drag mkha'
328b5(rgyud): 'gro maka' bar ba'i mche ba chen po 'jigs rung bas// dbus na rdo rje nyi ma 'bar bar ldan// sa dag bsrung ba'i cho ga bcas// rgya cher gzhung mchog dag tu blta bar bya// sbrang dang dbab pa'i lus
328b6(rgyud): rnams thams cad ni// / yan lag mchog ldan dam pa nas gzung bya// de nas phyag rgya yang dag bslab// mchod pa'i phyag rgya mchog ni phyag rgyar brjod// de nas sgo dang mtshams bcad dkyil
328b7(rgyud): 'khor du btsun mo drag mo gnam lcags gnod sbyin mchog/ de nas sgor 'jug pa yi tshogs la ni// badz+ra dzA dzA/ 'gugs pa'i pheg rdob sprin ni rgya che ba// badz+ra hUM hUM de bzhin bcing ba'i chos ni ster
328b8(rgyud): byed ma/ badz+ra ba baM/ de nas ye shes chos nyid sna tshogs pa// badz+ra a a/ de nas gsang ba'i sgeg pa dang bcas mchod// badz+ra hUM khaM/ de nas yan lag phreng po sna tshogs brgyan// badz+ra hU~M hUM/ 
329a1(rgyud): / de nas gla blang ba dang rol mo dag/ badz+ra hU~M daM/ de bzhin gzhan yang dkyil 'khor dbang phyug mchod// badz+ra hUM sti/ rdo rje pha rol me tog rgya chen po// badz+ra ti te/ de bzhin rol
329a2(rgyud): cha stong phrag dag brdungs pa// badz+ra taM Ta/ spos dang drir ldan ri mo dag bri ba// badz+ra da du/ de nas 'od zer snang ba rab tu spro// badz+ra kro d+ha/ rdo rje khro bo rab tu sgom// badz+ra go d+ha/ rdo rje lcags kyu
329a3(rgyud): tshogs kyis dgug par bya/ dga' bas mnyes bya rdo rje yang dag ldan// oM s+yid d+ha badz+ra a na ya badz+ra/ de nas chags pa yaM ni 'dod chags pa// ro ga ya badz+ra/ a hi badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin nyi ma la lta ba
329a4(rgyud): badz+ra la ya badz+ra/ rgyal mtshan gyi ni dro yi badz+ra/ bzhad pa yis ni ha sa ta sa badz+ra// de bzhin du rjes su chags pa ni/ ka ma ya badz+ra/ ral gri bzung bar bya ba ni/ tshin d+ha ya~M badz+ra/ gzhan yang bskor ba'i
329a5(rgyud): b+h+ra ma na badz+ra/ de nas tshig gi tshogs 'byung ba/ b+hu hi badz+ra/ las kyi mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i tshogs/ sat+ya badz+ra/ de nas go cha yi ni rak+Sha badz+ra/ de bzhin bza' ba yi ni kha'i badz+ra/ yid 'ong
329a6(rgyud): lus ni gtan bcing bar bya/ b+han d+ha ya b+ha badz+ra/ de nas ye shes kyi ni de bzhin brkyang // de nas khros pa'i yid kyis bskum par bya// so dag gi ni chu bsdam par bya// de bzhin mig dag kyang ni
329a7(rgyud): btsum par bya// de nas khro bo yi ni ting 'dzin sgom// gsang ba'i phyag rgya dag gis bdud bzhi bcom// de nas rdo rje tshig gi snying po brjod// phyag rgya'i tshogs ni rnam pa sna tshogs bslab// lus kyi
329a8(rgyud): phyag rgya'i tshogs dag ni// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las// rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bzhin du// rgyas pa ru ni yongs su brjod// rdzogs s+ho// / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// 
329b1(rgyud): kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ni// rdo rje phra mo la bzhugs pa// rdo rje phra mo brjod par bya// // oM saR+YA ta thA ga ta/ su ka s+thA badz+ra kro d+ha kra mA hU~M phaT// bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugs su ni// phan pa'i
329b2(rgyud): don du rnam bsam bya// rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni// sems ni zhi ba nyid du 'gyur// oM suk+Sha badz+ra kro d+ha kra ma hU~M// rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya// rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni/ 
329b3(rgyud): rang sems skad cig gis ni 'dul bar 'gyur// oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra rad na badz+ra kro d+ha mA hUM phaT// rdo rje rin chen rang bdag nyid// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas chos ni myur thob cing // rin chen
329b4(rgyud): kun mchog gtso bor gyur// oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra d+ha ma kro d+ha kri ma hUM phaT// bdag nyid dag gi rdo rje chos// bzod nas dag pa rnam par sgom// gsung gi phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur
329b5(rgyud): oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra karma kro ta kA ma hUM phaT/ bdag nyid rdo rje las su ni// yang dang yang du bsgom bya zhing // rdo rje bsngags kyis bskul nas ni// rdo rje las dang mtshungs par 'gyur// dbang bskur ba yi sems
329b6(rgyud): dpa' che/  'khor lo bsgyur ba bzhi po ru// rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom byas nas// dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur// oM badz+ra suk+Sh+ma dzA ra na kro d+ha hU~M phaT// rdo rje rgyal po rang bdag nyid// rnam par
329b7(rgyud): bsgoms na reg par 'gyur// snying po 'od dag nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes chags pa// oM sU khA badz+ra a ku sha a kar shaM ye mahA kro d+ha hU~M phaT// mda' 'gengs pa yi sbyor ba yis/ 
329b8(rgyud): rdo rje chags pa bsgom par bya// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad kun du bkug/ oM suk+Sha badz+ra kro d+ha a nu ra ga ya hUM phaT// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyos byed cing // bdag
330a1(rgyud): nyid kyang ni rnam par sgrom// rdo rje dga' ba bdag nyid che// rdo rje dngos grub thob par 'gyur// oM suk+Sha ba duSh+Ti~M kro d+ha swA phaH// rdorje rin chen rgyal pong // dbang bskur ba ni ban
330a2(rgyud): pa'i mchog/ rdo rje bsngags kyis bskul byas na// rdo rje rin tshon mtshungs par 'gyur// oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra bi ku te kro d+ha ha ra ha ra hUM phaT// rdo rje gzi brjid ting 'dzin gyis// rtag tu bdag nyid 'bar bar
330a3(rgyud): byas phyogs rnams kun du yongs spros nas// rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul// oM badz+ra suk+Sha dza la man Da la kro d+ha sU r+ya dz+wa la hU~M phaT// sbyin pa rin chen rgyal mtshan du// rtag tu bdag nyid rnam par
330a4(rgyud): bsam/ sems can thams cad dag bya zhing // rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul// oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra d+hA dza kro d+ha saR+Wa a hU~M me pra yats+tsha a hUM phaT// chos chen po'i bzhad pas bzhag/ rdo rje bzhad pa'i bdag
330a5(rgyud): brtan pa'i/ rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bya zhing // bdag nyid kho na chos kyis gsungs// oM swak+Sh+ma badz+ra saha kro d+ha ha ha hUM phaT// bzod nas zhi ba skye ba med// chos rnams thams cad rnam dag
330a6(rgyud): pa/ bdag nyid rdo rje chos rgyal po// rdo rje'i tshig ni lan cig brjod// oM sU kA badz+ra kro ta ya sho d+ha ya hUM phaT// shugs can ral gri dag gi tshogs// rdo rje rnon po shin du brtan// chos kyi 'khor
330a7(rgyud): lo bskor byas nas// rdo rje 'khor lo dang mtshungs 'gyur// oM sU k+ShA badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA tsakra hUM phaT// oM sU k+Sha badz+ra tshe d+ha kro d+ha tshin d+ha pa da ya shi traM pra b+he sha ri yaM tshin haM hUM phaT// nga ni brjod
330a8(rgyud): byed brjod bya min// bdag ni rdo rje smra ba brtan// chos 'dod pa nyid brtan byas nas// rdo rje smra ba thob par 'gyur// oM s+'u k+Sha badz+ra hU~M ka ra kro d+ha hUM kA ra pa ta yaM wa mai tre na hUM phaT/ 
330b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing // rdo rje las ni brtan pa dag/ rdo rje tshig gis chos bshad na// rdo rje las ni thob par 'gyur// oM su k+Sh+ma badz+ra hUM ka ra ma trata sa ka ra ma ka ra b+ha ba saR+Wa ka r+ya
330b2(rgyud): hri sa d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ bdag ni rgyal po byams pa che// rdo rje bsrung ba brtan pa bdag/ rtag tu bdag nyid sgom byas na// ngan 'gro thams cad nyams par 'gyur// oM sU k+Sh+ma badz+ra ka ba tsa kro d+ha ra
330b3(rgyud): k+Sha hU~M/ sdig pa thams cad zad bya zhing // rdo rje bsrung ba bsgom par bya// rdo rje bsngags ni bskul byas na// rdo rje nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// oM badz+ri sU k+Sh+ma badz+ra rak+Sha kro d+ha ha rA ha ra b+ha kA ya saR+Wa
330b4(rgyud): duk+ShA n+ta badz+ra dik+ShA na phaT// rdo rje khu tshur rgyal po bdag/ byang chub sems ni rjes su dran// bgegs rnams thams cad bcing byas na// rdo rje khu tshur dang mtshungs 'gyur// oM sU k+Sh+Na badz+ra muSh+Ti b+han d+he b+han d+ha/ 
330b5(rgyud): hUM phaT/ sna yi rtse mo sems de ni// brtan pa byas na yang dag brtsam// yi ge hUM nyid sbyar byas na// nyon mongs thams cad rnam nyams 'gyur// hU~M// dang po snying kha sna rtse ru// brten par byas nas de rang
330b6(rgyud): bzhin/ mtshan ma de ni spros byas nas// nad sogs dag ni 'jig par 'gyur// na sha ya badz+ra hU~M// sems de brtan par byas nas kyang // rnal 'byor 'dzin pas spro bya zhing // shes rab can
330b7(rgyud): gyis khro bdag bsam// gnas ngan len ni nges par 'jig/ b+hi na sha ya saR+Wa hU~M/ rnal 'byor rig par ji srid 'dod// mtshan ma de ni bsdu byas na// ma lus par ni sdig thams cad// nyams shing / 
330b8(rgyud): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra pra pa tA ya na shrig+h+ra~M hUM// gsal bar phyogs rnams ma lus par// sems can kun la byams pa spro// ji srid rdo rje spros byas pas// de srid sems can bde
331a1(rgyud): pa ma 'gyur// b+hair ba kro d+ha hU~M Tu/ e ma go mgon med sems can 'di// 'jigs pa las ni skyob pa dag/ snying rje'i sems do sngo par bya// rdo rje ye shes thob par 'gyur/ 
331a2(rgyud): run badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun snying po// sems can thams cad bzod nas dag/ e ma'o bde ba'o e ma'o chos// phyogs rnams kun du yongs su spro// hU~M bi shud d+ha kro tra hUM
331a3(rgyud): phaT tu'akhor ba'i sems can la dmigs la// bde ba dang bcas btang snyoms bya// gtang snyoms sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sems can rnams la yongs su spro// hU~M bi sho d+ha na badz+ra gro d+ha hUM phaT// rdo rje
331a4(rgyud): gzugs ni yang dag bri// gang gi steng du nges bzhag pa// de nyid kyi ni dri ma tshogs// thams cad rnal 'byor pa yis 'joms// hUM badz+ra pra pa ta/ gang la byang chub sems nyid ni// rjes su dran pas rab
331a5(rgyud): pham na/ sems can de yi sangs rgyas kyi// byang chub nyid ni thob par 'gyur// hUM bo d+hi satwa pra pa ta// phyag na rdo rje rjes dran nas// dag pa'i chos nyid phab byas na// sems can de yi bde ba ni// dam
331a6(rgyud): pa thob 'gyur the tsom med// hU~M badz+ra da ra pra pa ta// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnal 'byor pas// sangs rgyas chos rnams phab byas nas// 'jigs pa med par 'byung
331a7(rgyud): mi 'gyur ta hU~M bud+d+ha pra pa ta/ zla ba rdo rje rang bzhin dngos// bskyed pa bzhin du sgom byas na// lo bzang zla ba rdo rje mtshungs// myur du mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// bud d+ha grA pra ba ta ya hU~M/ zla ba'i dbus
331a8(rgyud): rang bdag nyid// sgom zhing gang la phab byas pa// sems can de rnams mi ldog par/ zla'agyur pa ru ni the tsom medat+ta/ a tA badz+ra pra pa ta ya hU~M// phyag na rdo rje rang bdag nyid// mkhas pa yis ni
331b1(rgyud): bsgom bya zhing / gang du phab pa'i gnas de ni// dpal dang bde ba thob par 'gyur// badz+ra satwa pra pA ta ya hUM// sangs rgyas gzugs su rang bdag nyid// mnyam par gzhag pas sgom bya zhing // rdo rje de ni
331b2(rgyud): gang phab pa/ rdzu 'phrul rgya ni chen por 'gyur// bud ta pra pa ta ya hU~M// rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas// rang gi lus ni yongs sgor bar// rang gi mig gis byas pa des// the tsom med par byang chub thob// 
331b3(rgyud): oM badz+ra pa li ti kro d+ha ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ dbugs ni 'byeng dang rngub pa dang // yi ge hUM ni rab sbyar zhing // rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas// 'dod chags la sogs nyes pa bcom// oM badz+ra sha swa bI ba ta ya hUM phaT/ 
331b4(rgyud): rdo rje lta bas lta bya zhing // rdo rje khro bo rab sbyar bas// sems can gang la blta byas pa// de ni 'khor ba las 'joms 'gyur// oM badz+ra d+hiSh+Ti ba ni sha ya hU~M phaT// lus ngag yid ni bdag nyid nas// rang sems
331b5(rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang // byang chub sems ni rjes dran na// des dang sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// hU~M d+hi d+hA ya a kar sha ya badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M phaT// rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// mkhas pa yis ni
331b6(rgyud): bdag nyid sgom// 'bar ba yis ni khyab pa'i sku// rdo rje bsgoms pas 'grub par 'gyur// hU~M gsang ba'i dbang po kun gyi snying po'i sngags ni gsungs par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i rnal
331b7(rgyud): 'byor dbang po'i rtog par mdzad// gdul bya'o min pa shin du 'phrog cing gdul bya la chags blo// sa 'dzin mchog gi dbang po bslabs pa'i rnam par rol pa'i sa// suk+Sh+ma rdzogs s+ho// 
331b8(rgyud): gsung ba skar ma nyi ma ste// rdo rje dam tshig brjod par bya// rnam rtog gis ni rtags mdzes gyur// de nas mchod pa'i cho ga bshad// bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugs dang ni// sangs rgyas rnam
332a1(rgyud): / 'phrul rab tu sgom/ dang po sbyor byung ji skad bshad// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA badz+ra karma shwa ri hU~M// rat+na gi snying khar byang chub sems// sangs
332a2(rgyud): rgyas kun gyis tshogs bsags nas// mchod pa yi na mchog 'di yis// 'den pa thams cad mchod par ba// hU~M/ dbang phyag chen po dang bcas pa// lha rnams thams cad dgug pa zhing // bdag
332a3(rgyud): nyid rdo rje khro bo yis// khro bo'i mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM saR+YaR+Wa ta thA ga ta pu tsa me ga ra ma sa ma ya ba di b+hau sta ri tri lo ka b+hi dza ye karma saR+Wa duk+ShA na d+ha ma ya badz+ra ni hUM// khro gnyer can kun rab bdag
332a4(rgyud): nyid/ khro bo rin chen gyis bsgom bya// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs bya zhing // rin chen mchod pa rab tu mchod// oM saR+Wa ta thA ga ta karma pra saR+YA shwa ma hA pu dzA a kar sha ya/ b+hi d+hi b+hi sta ra sa ma hU~M// chos
332a5(rgyud): kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par snang // rdo rje chos dang brtan par bdag/ chos kyi mchod pa rab brjod pas// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+ha du pa ra na ma hu bu dzaM b+hi hI/ 
332a6(rgyud): birti ra sa ma ye hU~M// bdag nyid rdo rje las nyid ni// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing // las kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM saR+Wa ta thA ga ta
332a7(rgyud): saR+Wa ka ta lo ka d+hi tu tsi b+hi ti ma hA karma pu tsa bi ti birta ra sa ma ye hU~M// phyag na rdo rje bdag rdo rje// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dgug par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod pas// mchod pa ru ni
332a8(rgyud): bsgoms par bya// oM badz+ra sid ta sod d+hi d+ha na sa ma ye hU~M/ dzo/ rdo rje lcags kyu brtan du'i bdag/ rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// sgrub pa bsgom pa bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad/ 
332b1(rgyud): dgug par bya/ oM badz+ra a kar sha yA dz+nyA nA sa ma ya hUM dza// rdo rje chags pa bdag nyid de// dkug pa rnams ni mnyes par bya// rdo rje chags pas rab mchod pas// bsgrub par bya zhes yang dag sbyar
332b2(rgyud): oM badz+ra ra ti ra~M ga ya sa ma ya hUM dza// rdo rje legs par rang bdag nyid// sgom zhing rgyal ba mnyes par bya// rdo rje legs pa rab mchod pas// sangs rgyas thams cad dgug par bya// oM badz+ra sa du karma
332b3(rgyud): dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M dza// rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che// rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya// de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang bya zhing // rin chen cha ba ni kun du dbab// oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku ti byA sha~M ku ru nAM// rdo rje nyi ma
332b4(rgyud): rang bdag nyid// 'od zer phreng ba dang ldan sgom/ sangs rgyas rnas ni dbang bya zhing // phyogs rnams su ni 'od zer 'phro// oM badz+ra sur+ya man Da lA ba shi ku ru hUM// bdag ni rgyal mtshan sbyor ba che// de bzhin gshegs
332b5(rgyud): rnams dbang bya zhing // sems can bsam kun rdzogs par bya// rin chen rgyal mtshan rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra dA dza gA ke yu re ba shi ku ru hU~M// ha ho zhes dgod bzhad bya zhing // rdo rje bzhad pa bdag nyid ste/ 
332b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du bya// bzhad pa'i mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra ad ta ha se na ba shi ku ru hU~M// bdag ni pad ma'i rgyal ba nyid// btsun mo brtan pa rang byung ba// bdag gis sangs rgyas
332b7(rgyud): rjes chags bya// 'dod chags mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra pad mA ra ga ra ga ya hU~M// bdag ni rang bzhin rnon po ste// shes rab pha rol phyin pa brtan// bdag gis nyon mongs bcas bya zhing
332b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs rnams chas par bya// oM badz+ra ti gaSh+Ta ra ga ya hU~M// lha mo rdo rje sgrol ma bdag/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// bdag gis rdo rje can mnyes bya// 'dod chags brtan pas
333a1(rgyud): / rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra man Da la la dwe ge ra ya hUM// nam mkha'i lha mo chos smra ma// brjod du med pa bdag nyid brtan// dam pa'i chos la chags bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs
333a2(rgyud): rnams mnyes par bya// oM badz+ra ba ga ra ra ge ra ga ra ya hUM// bdag ni rang nyid las yin to// phyogs rnams kun du rab tu grags// bdag ni nas mkha'i mdzod kyang yin// mchod pa'i char
333a3(rgyud): gyis rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra ka ma sa ma ye pu tsa ya hU~M// bdag ni rang nyid bsrung ba ste// sangs rgyas byams pa'i brtan pa bdag/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod par byed// chos kyi mchod
333a4(rgyud): pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra ka ba tsa bAn d+ha ra k+Sha hUM// bdag gis nyon mongs bza' bar bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin brtan pa bdag/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod par bya// chos kyi mchod pas rab
333a5(rgyud): tu mchod// oM badz+ra yak+Sha ma ra ya badz+ra dISh+Ta hUM phaT// nga ni sangs rgyas byang chub 'dzin// rdo rje khu tshur rang bdag nyid// phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ste// las kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra
333a6(rgyud): karma muSh+Ti sid d+h+ya hU~M phaT// de 'dra'i sna tshogs mchod pa kun// ye shes gsang sngags rab tu mchod// ma lus lha mo sems dpa' kun// rgyal po ji bzhin rang snying hU~M// sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin
333a7(rgyud): glu/ gar ma me tog sogs sbyor bas// sems dpa' la sogs lha mo dag/ shin du bsrung ba'i mchod pa yis mchod pa'o// de nas las ni thabs chen po// gang gis myur du rab 'grub 'gyur
333a8(rgyud): gang gis dga' ba las sbyor bas// sbyin bsreg las ni cho ga'o// ji ltar sbyin bsrog dngos grub kyi// las ni bla med byed pa ltar// de bzhin rig pa'i las rnams kun// de lta bu yi byed
333b1(rgyud): pa min/ sbyin bsreg rnam pa lnga ldan pa// mdo ru bsdus na rnam pa lnga// rgyas par rnal 'byor chen po yi// gsang ba'i mdo las rab tu bshad// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnam 'phrul pa// ji ltar sbyin
333b2(rgyud): bsreg rnam pa yis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur ba// mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya// sbyin bsreg las ni rnam pa lnga// re re zhing yang rnam pa lnga// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa nyid// mngon
333b3(rgyud): spyod dang ni gsum pa ste// dgug pa yang ni bzhi pa yin// lnga pa dbang dang yan lag ldan// sbyin bsreg lnga po de rnams ni// dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no// de nas thab khung rab bshad bya// spyod
333b4(rgyud): po ji bzhin sbyar bar bya// zhi ba thab khung zlum po ste// kun nas yongs su zlum po yin// rgyas pa yi ni gru bzhi ste// mdo bor spyod la gro gsum pa// thab khung rdo rje'i rnam pa can// kun du dgug par
333b5(rgyud): byed pa'i mchog/ de bzhin thab khung ring por bya// dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no// de dag rnam pa lnga ru bshad// thab khung las ni bla na med// srod kyi dus su zhi ba bya// snga dro'i dus su rgyas pa las
333b6(rgyud): nyi ma phyed na mngon spyod kyi// drag po las ni nges par bya// dgug pa'i rnam pa thams cad du// mtshan mo dbang du bya ba yin// sbyor ba lnga po 'di yis ni// mnyam par gzhag pas las rnams bya
333b7(rgyud): shar du kha bltas zhi don du// rgyas la byang du yang dag gnas// lho ru kha bltas gyur pa yis// mngon spyod kyis ni las rnams so// steng du khwa bltas de bzhi dgug/ phyogs rnams kun du dbang
333b8(rgyud): du bya/ phyogs rnams thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// yang na nub kyi phyogs su bshad// zhi la sangs rgyas phyag rgya ste// rgyas la nor bu'i mtshan mas so// rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la// dbang / 
334a1(rgyud): la pad ma'i rigs kyi'o// shin du 'gugs pa dang ldan pa// rdo rje lcags kyu dgug pa la// sbyor ba lnga po 'di yis ni// sbyin bsreg las ni rab tu sgrub// zhi ba'i shing
334a2(rgyud): ni dngar ba ste// rgyas pa de bzhin 'bras bur bcas// tsha ba mngon spyod las dag la// dgug pa la ni tsher ma can// dbang la me tog bcas par bshad// de rnams yams shing go rims bzhin// 
334a3(rgyud): sngon la yam shing rnam pa lnga// rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag sbyar// de la 'dam gyis byugs pa yis// shing la zhi ba rab tu bsgrags// gang du sdig pa rnams 'jog cong // kun du 'khrug pa bsreg 'gyur/ 
334a4(rgyud): ba// bud shing dang ra ba dag gi me// mnyam par gzhag pas rab sbyar nas// til mar gyis ni sbyin bsreg chags// sdig pa thams cad bsregs par 'gyur// oM saR+YA pa ba ta/ ha na badz+ra ya swAhA// bud
334a5(rgyud): shing dngar ba dag gis ni// shin du mnyam par gzhag par sbyar// 'bras kyi sbyin bsreg byas nas ni// bsod nams tshogs ni 'phel bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swA hA// bud shing dngar mo dag gis
334a6(rgyud): ni/ mnyam par gzhag pas mi sbar nas// mar skyugs dur ba'i sbyin bsreg gis// rdo rje che ni mngon 'phel 'gyur// oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// dge ba 'byung bas me sbyar nas// 
334a7(rgyud): ku sha'i myu gu til mar gyis// 'jig rten gsum yang bsrung bar 'gyur// oM a pra ti ha da ya badz+ra ma swA hA// sngon la zhi ba sgyur bar bya// dbus kyi chal rgyas de bzhin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa yi// sbyin bsreg
334a8(rgyud): las ni dang por 'gyur// shing ni cha ba'i yams shing gis// mngon spyod kyi ni lus dag la// dgug pa la yang de nyid kyi// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// sngon la chu ba'i sems shing gis// khros pas me ni/ 
334b1(rgyud): rab sbar nas/ mkhas pas tsher mas sbyin bsreg bya// tsher ma dang bcas de dag kyang // tsher ma can gyis nges par dgug/ gang dang gang gis 'dod gyur pa// sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par 'gugs// oM badz+ra
334b2(rgyud): u kAr shra ya dza// bud shing me tog dmar sogs kyis// rab tu 'bar ba'i ma sbyar nas// me tog 'bras bu dmar po yang sbyin bsreg byas na dbang byed mchog/ hUM badz+ra dri ShA ya dza/ tsha ba'i yam shing dag
334b3(rgyud): gi shing / rab tu drag pa'i mi sbar nas// 'bras bu khu ba bsgrogs byas nas// mngon spyod kyi ni mchog yin no// hU~M badz+ra ma ra nr-i yoM phaT/ gsang ba'i sbyin bsrog thams nAd ne// de nas gzhan yang rab
334b4(rgyud): bshad bya// sbyin bsreg 'khor lo cho ga yis// de nyid du ni ji bzhin sbyar// yams shing tsha ba dag gis ni// shin du drag pa'i me sbar na// 'jigs rung lcags kyis sbyin bsreg bya// gdug pa thams cad rab
334b5(rgyud): 'jigs 'gyur// oM badz+ra b+han d+hA b+han d+hA hUM phaT// me tog dang bcas shing me la// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// sngags sogs 'bras bu'i spyan bsreg gis// dbang du byed pa mchog yin no// oM
334b6(rgyud): badz+ra b+ha shaM ka ra ya s+yA hA// kha ba dang ni dang ra ba nyid// yam shing dmar po sbyar bya zhing // 'dod pa'i me tog 'bras bsregs na// 'dod pa'i gzugs can mchog tu 'gyur// oM badz+ra kar+m+ma ru pa Ne swAhA/ 
334b7(rgyud): bu shing de dag nyid kyis ni// rab tu khros pas me sbar nas// sdug ma'i 'bras bu phra mo bsregs// myur du mi snang nyid du 'gyur// oM badz+ra a dri sh+ya ya swA hA// shes pa bud shing de nyid kyis// dag
334b8(rgyud): po'i me ni rab sbar nas// nam mkha' stobs kyis me tog dang // bsregs na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra kha tsa ri ni swA hA// de nas mnga' bzhug pa dang g.yog/ bka' bzhin byed par rab tu bsku
335a1(rgyud): @ci nas kyang ni myur bar 'gyur// go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya// shing ni kha bas bud shing bya// thab khung rdo rje'i dbyibs su brko// khros pas rdo rje me tog bsreg/ yi ge dza ni yo
335a2(rgyud): su brjod// sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje sngags no rab tu bskul// rdo rje'i me tog dag bsregs nas// dka' byed mchog ni rnyed par 'gyur// hUM badz+ra a dz+nyA ga rA ya dz+nyA// yams shing de dag nyid
335a3(rgyud): dang ni/ thab khung deng ni rko byas shing // byang chub sems dpa'i smin ma gang // bsregs na bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// hU~M so ni ba shaM ga ra ya dza// yam shing de dag nyid kyi me// kun du thab khung de kho
335a4(rgyud): na/ rdo rje sems dpa'i smin ma ni// bsregs na bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// oM badz+ra pa ni pa shaM ka ra ya dza// yang na sangs rgyas smin ma 'am// yang na ba dan mtshan ma dag/ 'grub pa'i sbyor bas
335a5(rgyud): sbyin bsreg byas// sangs rgyas bka' bzhin gad byed 'gyur// oM bud d+ha ba shaM ka ra ya dza// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sbyin bsreg bya zhing myur du 'grub// rdo rje sbyor bas dngos grub kun// 
335a6(rgyud): the tsom med par 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje'i rigs la sogs kun kyang / de nas gsang ba phyag rgya che// rdo rje rnal 'byor rab sgrub phyir// rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya// rig pa gang zhig yid 'ong ba
335a7(rgyud): srin mo'i rigs ni thob bya'i phyir// rig pa'i lha mo dang ldan pa// rdo rje rnal 'byor bsgrub par bya// bud med sgrog dong ldan cig tu// mkhas pas bdug pa bsten par bya// mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po/ 
335a8(rgyud): las/ de nyid du ni ji skad bshad// rtag tu gur gum phye ma dang // bA ga gar mig sman bcug nas ni// de yi sems dpa'i shes par bya// gang phyir dgongs par rab tu sgrags// bsdug pa de yi
335b1(rgyud): rig pa ni/ mngon par 'dod pa gang yin pa'o// rang gi rig pa'i lha mo gang // de ni bud med zhes byar grags// rig pa'i sbyor ba de yis ni// rang gi rigs kyi lha dgra sgrub// mig sman la sogs gzhug
335b2(rgyud): pa ni/ pad ma'i steng du yang dag dgo// bA ga pad ma zhes bshad de// gzhug pa dgod par brjod par bya// bA ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mig sman dag na ba dag ni bsgrub par bya// bA gar mig sman gzhug
335b3(rgyud): pa ni ltu da ma'i steng du yang dag dgod// pad ma dang ni lhan cig dgod// rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur// oM badz+ra gu h+ya ra ti dza shAM kA ra sId d+han+taM// dro dang du ba 'bar dang 'jaru// rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub
335b4(rgyud): par 'gyur// oM badz+ra gu h+ya ya sid d+ha hUM// bA gor gi haM gzhag nas ni// gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhag par bya// mtshan mo rnam pa bzhi dag gis// dngos grub rnam pa bzhi ru bshad// oM gu h+ya badz+ra sid
335b5(rgyud): dA hU~M/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya yis// bA gar gur gum bcug nas ni// dgab cing de ni 'bar gyur na// rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur// oM badz+ra d+ha ri sid d+hu hUM// rdo rje bya ba'i sbyor ba dang // rdo rje phyag rgya
335b6(rgyud): bsdus pa dang // rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug dang // rdo rje khu tshur sbyor ba dang // dam tshig mchog ni 'di dag dang // hU~M gis sor mo'i sbyor ba dang // chos kyi phyag rgya de bzhin 'dir// oM la sogs pa'i yi ge dang // 
335b7(rgyud): sbyin bsreg cho ga 'di yis ni// ye shes phyag rgya rab tu bsgrub bya// rgyas pa ru ni thams cad dag/ gsang ba'i rgyud du rab tu bshad// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'ang yis ni// rdo rje sgo dpon dka' thub ches// tshe 'di nyid la
335b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas ni// mchog nyid la ni 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje rigs chen yid 'ong la// rgyud chen gsang ba btus pa la// gang zhig mngon par brtson gyur pa// don yod grub pa dngos grub 'grub// tshogs ni bsags
336a1(rgyud): ga pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa ru// gsang ba'i snying po chen po 'di// thos pa tsam yang mi 'gyur ro// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga rdzogs s+ho// / de nas gas
336a2(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya bzhi// dkyil 'khor mkhas pas bslab par bya// ye shes de nyid gsang ba yang // yongs su bsgrubs pas rab dang bskor// shin du gas praHrkyen po rga ni// dngos po thams cad khya ba la dgod
336a3(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje drag po bzhi// rang nyid lnga pa dang bcas pa/ gsang ba brjod du med pa mchog/ ye shes mchog ni tshul thob byed// bde ba chen po rab grub don// dga' ba chen po shin du brtan// / oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga
336a4(rgyud): ta badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ hU~M badz+ra ma d+ha/ oM badz+ra pra ta b+haM ku ti badz+ra ra Ta/ oM badz+ra pad ma badz+ra ti Ta/ oM badz+ra kar ma gri kI ti Ta// shar dang lho'i phyogs cha dang // nub dang byang gi phyogs cha dang // dbus dang phyogs bzhi
336a5(rgyud): dag tu ni// sbyor bas phyag rgya dgod par bya// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// thams cad bri zhing dgod par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mthong 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// ji skad bshad pa'i
336a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor bzhin// rdo rje rnal 'byor bzhin sbyor skyes// rnal 'byor dag ni lhag ma dag/ de dag thams cad brtag par bya// shin du gsang ba de nyid che// mchog tu gsang ba de nyid mchog/ gsang ba chen
336a7(rgyud): po gsang ba 'dzin// rdo rje gsang ba brtan mnyam pa'i// rig pa mngon par 'dod gyur la// rang gi lag gis yang dag bri// rgyal mo chen mo brjod byas nas// dkyil 'khor du ni skad cig 'grub// oM saR+Wa
336a8(rgyud): / ta thA ga ta b+hI shud d+ha dArma hi ho// rang gis dkyil 'khor che bris nas// rig pa brjod pa la brtson bya// byams pas dgag pa sbyor ba yis// 'khor ba'i snying rje gcad par bya// oM badz+ra ba shud d+ha dauSh+Ti dza// rang
336b1(rgyud): gis gsang chen bris nas ni/ pus me'i mchu laM 'o bas te// 'jig rten dbang phyag btsun mo ste// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// oM saR+YA bA b+hi shud d+ha mu khi hU~M// pha rol phyin drug spyod pa yis// byang
336b2(rgyud): chub spyod pa rab rnyed dka'// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor brtan gyur na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug bya zhing // 'dod pa'i yon tan mchog lnga zhing // rol cing
336b3(rgyud): dga' ba nyid du bya// mdo sde gsang ba las bshod pa// gsang ba lnga ni rab sgrub pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru bshad
336b4(rgyud): 'dod pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// bskal pa can gyi dngos grub thob// gsang ba'i de nyid chen po ste// rigs lnga dag ni rab bsgrubs pa// 'dod chags chen por rab sgrub phyir// rol cing rab tu dga'
336b5(rgyud): bar bya/ bde ba chen po rab grub don// spyod pa chen po tshul chen po// de bzhin rnal 'byor kun bsdus pa// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rdo rje hU~M mdzad rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub
336b6(rgyud): par bya// ji ltar yi ge hU~M las byung // gsang ba rgyal po rdo rje khyod// rdo rje hU~M mdzad sbyor ba yis// rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya// de ltar min pa phyag rgya ste// dam tshig zhes bya brtan mi 'grub/ 
336b7(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus nas// rdo rje phyag rgya yongs su bzung // de nas grub pa'i phyag rgya ste// grub pa phyag rgya yang dag gis// myur du rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// rmad 'byung chen po rab bshad
336b8(rgyud): byaM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA badz+ra sa ma ye hUM// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang bar bzhugs// phyag rgya chen po yongs su bzung // rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bya zhing // sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu sgrub
337a1(rgyud): hU~M badz+ra maT+Ta te rdo rje rig pa mchog rgya po// bdag nyid yongs su 'grub bya zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub byas nas// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// 
337a2(rgyud): b+hi kA tri ba ra Ta/ rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur ba// rin chen phyag rgya yongs su bzung // rin chen char ni rab phab nas// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// oM pad ma badz+ra tra Ta
337a3(rgyud): shes rab can du rang bdag nyid// rdo rje can ni yongs su bzung // rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhing // pad ma'i rigs can bskul bar bya// hUM badz+ra karma oM kri kId// sna chog rdo rje rgyal po che// bya ba sna tshogs ba
337a4(rgyud): nyid che// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod byas nas// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu// dkyil 'khor dag ni yang dag bya// mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po
337a5(rgyud): la/ rnam pa bzhi ni rab tu byung // de nas mtshan nyid sna tshogs yongs btus pa// rab tu spyan yangs dga' ba chen po mchog/ de bzhin tshogs dang rdo rje spyan ldan pa// shes rab can gyi btsun
337a6(rgyud): mo'i mchog chen ldan// // badz+ra ka ma ho/ badz+ra hUM hUM Ta ga ma/ ra Ta pa Ta/ kA ra Na/ badz+ro gr-i/ badz+ri grwa ru/ badz+ra phaT/ ka ra Na gri/ shud d+ha gri/ shud d+hi gri bud d+ha/ sa tAM/ ra dzA ra ga duSh+Ti
337a7(rgyud): rAd na/ tai dza ke ru/ hA sa d+harmA/ tigra stAM/ he du b+hU sh+tsa kArma rak+Sha/ yAk+Sha sana? d+hi/ sid d+hi yo gra guh+ya/ b+hI shwA gI tsar+yA/ tsi ri/ dz+nyA na tA tAM/ su br-i Tu ga g+ne/ hU~M phaT/ hUM braM/ hUM tsa/ hU~M ma/ hU~M sa/ ts+tsho ha~M/ 
337a8(rgyud): d+h+r-im+mu d+hAHd+h+r-i/ rjesarna/ d+hI d+hI DU /  rdzun mami d+hA sh+log tam dzod ma d+hi ta R+tha kau// ts+yai sh+ma ma~M/ 
337b1(rgyud): thA ga ta b+hi shA tsa/ oM saR+YA ta thA ga tats+tsha kle d+ha/ a nud pAn Ne/ aHau a nu rud d+he A/ oM ni le I/ au nI lI i/ rang ne uM/ oM ma ru tra u/ oM sa mo ri/ au la u ri/ au a ta le/ 
337b2(rgyud): oM ha twe ra l-I/ oM a sha ne/ e/ oM pre sha g+he AM/ oM saR+Wa sha ba raM pu ra NaM/ oM AM bA ra d+h+we/ oM au yA ra ne/ oM au bi shwa a.oM madz+dza tsa be kA o Ta shrA kha/ oM a mu le/ gA au
337b3(rgyud): a b+h+r-i neg+h+na/ au dz+nyA na.on+nad+hAH/ au bai ri h+yaM h+yeH/ o dza she/ oM b+h+re d+b+ha/ oM sha / okr-IH/ oM ra ha ne oM b+hi ga ta kau r+d+ha au kr-I bo D+hi/ au a d+h+yaNaM/ au bi pu d+ha
337b4(rgyud): oM gi le ta/ tha oM d+ha ra ni/ da/ oM ta ge d+ha/ oM sha lo ge na/ oM ta Te/ pa/ oM saR+YA ha ra ni/ pha/ oM bu sha ni/ byA/ oM a b+hi bi sha ni b+hA/ oM a ra te ma/ oM a li ni/ ya/ oM tra hri ra/ 
337b5(rgyud): oM be she la/ oM bud d+he/ wa/ oM d+ha me/ sha/ au yaM g+he Sha/ au so be sa/ oM d+ha la naM/ he/ ho tha/ hU~M dza/ ha sa/ oM a/ ba hi/ a ro ni bi/ da sha/ tra ra d+hi/ bu ba ya i hi/ klo d+hi/ hU~M ShaM/ da
337b6(rgyud): ma ra/ yug ti/ dar sha na/ ha sa ya/ he ma hA ne d+ha ra na/ oM saR+Wa ta thA ga ta sa b+hi dzA ma hA mu ni rA dzA ga ra nr-ik+Sho tsa ra kra ya hi/ hU~M hUM hUM d+hU// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo
337b7(rgyud): sngo gsang ba las gsungs pa'i// chos dbyings brtan pa'i rang bzhin ste// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung // de legs sgom pa byas dang mtshungs pa med// e ma ho/ gsang ba chen
337b8(rgyud): po gsang ba kun bsdus pa/ rnal 'byor rgya cher bsdus pa'ang mtshungs pa med// chen po 'di ni brtan zhing brtan pa'i dngos por gyur// dga' ba chen po'o dga' chen slob dpon chen po ste/ 
338a1(rgyud): mchod 'os gsang ba'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// dkyil 'khor gsungs las byung dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// tshogs brgya rab tu 'phel bar
338a2(rgyud): gyur pa gsungs pa yin// rdo rje chen po bskal pa chos// gsang ba thams cad bslab par bya// de nyid chos ni rnal 'byor che// sdug par bsdus pa 'jug par bya// brgya dang sum bcu
338a3(rgyud): rtsa drug lhag/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa'i// bri dang rdo rje'i tshig yi gos// dkyil 'khor gsang ba bslab par bya// rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// dkyil 'khor gsang
338a4(rgyud): ba 'di ru ni// 'di nyid yi ge rnam dag pa'i// rnal 'byor chen po 'jug par bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// drar gyi/ 
338a5(rgyud): chun pos rnam par brgyan// rdo rje'i dbyings sogs sbyor ba yis// stug po gsang ba shin du bstan// de nyid gsang ba bslab bya'i phyir// shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bslab// e ma ho/ 
338a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// gsang po'i rgyud ni klan bsdus pa// rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas yang dag blo zhing dgod// gru bzhi mnyam par rim par ni// de nyid kyi ni
338a7(rgyud): nang du bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi chan gzugs ni dgod par bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// ci rigs par ni yang dag bri// ngos bzhi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor/ 
338a8(rgyud): layi ge sum bcu rtsa drug dgod// sas kun du// yi ge drug bcu yang dag gi// yi ge drug bcu rgyal po ni// phyag rgya'i tshogs dang 'od bcas pa// dkyil 'a
338b1(rgyud): chen po logs pa zh-i ru/ yi ge rnams ni yang dwag+naSh+TaMbacu sum bcu ni// phyogs rnams kun d+hu dkod par bya// sangs rgyas thugs kha'i dbus su ni// yi ge hUM ni sbyar bar bya/ 
338b2(rgyud): gang zhig sbyor ba'i ming can gyis// sangs rgyus dbu slong tir bya// rdo rje'i yi ge ra ba sbyor byed// shis rab can gyi yig rnams bri// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yis// dbus su rdo rje rdo rje bzhi/ 
338b3(rgyud): sharI drA yi ge sum bcu bri// yi ge sum bcu de bzhini lho/ sum bcu byang gi phyogs cha ru// nub tu sum bcu sbyar bar bya// yi ge bcu drug yang dge sbyor// dbus su sangs rgyas bzhi ldan pa/ 
338b4(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor dbang phyug dbang phyug che// dpal ldan rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// dbab brtan pa yi tshogs byung ba// smra bo las byung rgyal po rgyu/ sangs rgyas nas sgro 'jug par
338b5(rgyud): bya/ u ro to ko ta ma hA h+ya h+ye byar te a ne// de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'jug pa yis// ha ha ho ho gsang chen po// rtse gsum ral pa gsum 'dzin pa// rgyal chen gzi brjid
338b6(rgyud): chen po'i don// rdo rje'i thig gis yongs su bskor// slob dpon chen po blta byas nas// yi ge rab tu brjod par bya// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yis// rdo rje'i 'khor lo kun du spro// a
338b7(rgyud): a'i rnal 'byor yang dag gzung // oM I'o dbang phyug chen po'i 'od// u U rnal 'byor 'chang ba ste// e I sgra dbyangs rab bskul ba// o au skyabs chen rtsibs chen po// aM
338b8(rgyud): e shes rab spyan bzang po// rdo rje lcags kyu 'di yis ni// rdo rje 'chang ni bskul bar bya// ji ltar 'khor lo ji ltar rigs// ji 'os ji ltar rdo rje'i tshogs// de bzhin 'khor lo yongs su dgod
339a1(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches// bskal pa chen po gastod pa 'di// rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag sbyor// rnam 'dul de ni rab tu bskor// 'khor lo drabab dang gzhug pa
339a2(rgyud): dang / cho ga ji bzhin 'jug par bya// rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// rgyas par ji skad bshad pa bzhin// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dang
339a3(rgyud): ldan pa// 'khor lo'i gnas ni gnas nu 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag ldan// rdo rje 'gugs dang skal ldan dang // nges byed rin chen gzi brjid dang // rgyal mtshan gzhad la yang
339a4(rgyud): dag ldan// chos dang rnon po gtso bo mched// rgyu dang gsum po drag po che// las dang bsrung ba gnod sbyin grub// sna tshogaso sbyor ba yang dag ldan// 'khor lo'i rnam par 'phrul par
339a5(rgyud): byang // de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje 'khor lo kun du bri// rdo rje 'dzin kan slob dpon gyis// dkyil 'khor 'di ni gzhug par bya// bu dang slob ma mni phul// gsang ba'i tshogs
339a6(rgyud): chen sbyin mi bya// gzhan du bskal ba dang ldan pa// zhi 'dod khyod kyis ci bder byin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po/ shin du
339a7(rgyud): gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog tu gsang bya/ rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje rtse mo las/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid shin du gsung ba'i bshad pa ste// le'u bzhi pa rdzogs spyo/ 
339a8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pas slar/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la
339b1(rgyud): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab par gyur to// rdo rje hU~M mdzad rdo rje mtshon// rdo rje mchog 'dzin rdo rje mda'// rdo rje khro gnyer rdo rje'i lusardo rje 'byur ba rgyal mtshan / 
339b2(rgyud): rdo rje glang+ga rgyangs rdo rje'i bdag/ rdo rje sde te chos mchog 'dzin// rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin du rno// rdo rje 'khor lo bzlas pa che/ lus kyi rdo rje rdo rje che// rdo rje gnod sbyin 'dzugs chen po/ 
339b3(rgyud): rdo rje phyag rgya sgra chen po// rdo rjekhu tshur brtan pa che/  rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje che/ lhas chen po ste mnga' chen po/ rdo rje legs pa dga' ba mo/ b+h+yo/ rdo rje brgyan ni 'phrog byed pa/ 
339b4(rgyud): 'od ste rgyal mtshan che// rdo rje tshems ni rab dga' ba// rdo rje padad+ma mu shin du gcod// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i rigs// rdo rje ljang ste sna tshogs che// sna tshogs mtshon chen skye dgu
339b5(rgyud): mngal/ go cha chen po rdo rje sku// rdo rje na che ba 'jigs med pa// rdo rje bsnams pa rdo rje che// rdo rje khro bo gzhu chen po// rdo rje lcags kyi mdzod chen po// zhags pa chen po rdo rje che/ 
339b6(rgyud): lcags sgrog 'byebyas pa che// rdo rje 'byab pa 'jug byed pa// rdo rje dzA ste yi ge hUM// yi gI hUM ni dam du bcing // yi ge hr-i s+t+waM yi ge ho// rdo rje'i phyag rgya dregs pa mchogardo rje sems
339b7(rgyud): dpa' bo n+ti/ klulcags kyu sdig med rdo rje khro/ rdo rje bdud sde bdud kyi mchog/ bdud kyis bdud ni rab 'joms pa// rdo rje dga' ba zhi pa // rdo rje dka' thub shes mdzad pa/ 
339b8(rgyud): rdo rje drag po shin du gdusardo rje rang dbang rdo rje mdzan// rdo rje 'dod pa ba che// rdo rje smra ste s+m+R+YuM chen po// sangs rgyas hU~M mdzad yi ge hUM// yi gI phaT srogs dang ldan pa// yig
340a1(rgyud): nI nye bar ba'i ba kAl+laN+Di/ yi ge smah+ma rang bzhin med// gtso bo gsod mdzad slong ba dang // dri med bsreg+sa dang du dwags 'byi
340a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khro bo chu/ khro ba rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags las byung de bzhin nyid// rdo rje khro bo khyod phyag mtshan pa
340a3(rgyud): rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// nyin re zhing ni lan cig ni// gang zhig 'don mar byed pa ste// de ngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyude dag la ni 'jigs pa med
340a4(rgyud): phyodas dang byan dag nyid mi 'gyun// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bstan pa// dza ngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// dpa' bo khyed la gsol ba 'debs// 
340a5(rgyud): gdug pa rnams ni gdul bya ba// de bzhin sems can don pa'i phyir// tshul chen bskyed nas mdzad pa gsol// rdo rje rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ 
340a6(rgyud): rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slab dpon chen po karma badz+ro'i zhal snga nas dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur
340a7(rgyud): tsing zhes pa'o// / ye d+har+m+ma he tu pA b+hA smA d+he tunra t+ye ShA na tA thA gA two h+ya lba dang / tAM Sh+Ta na yo ni rod+ha e wAM pA de ma hA sha ma Na
